description: Vintage & private loft centrally situated in the heart of Amsterdam, next to the famous Vondelpark, Museumplein, Leidseplein and Foodhallen. Consists of 2 separate bedrooms, sleeps 4 persons total, of which one can be made as double room. A bright spacious living room, bathroom and a basic pantry ( no stove), all private! Perfect for two couples or a family interested in Culture. Friendly host who is happy to share his secret city spots.

description: Spacious, ground level private ecoluxe two-room accommodation with sweeping views across the water and with bathroom and pantry. Including a charming lush waterside garden and floating terrace with lawn chairs. Your private jetty provides direct access to the natural swimming water. Free parking. Explore new city district IJburg with striking architecture, bustling harbor, many restaurants and shops and a splendid park. The tram around the corner brings you downtown Amsterdam in 15 minutes.

Unique and very comfortable 3 bedroom family home on one of the most special streets in Amsterdam. Situated on an old dike, surrounded by nature and with the ease of the city at your fingertips.

Enjoy a side of Amsterdam you've never seen before. With friends or with your family: quality time guaranteed. Whether you want to go for long walks or enjoy hip & happening restaurants & bars. Anything goes. Suitable for 6 adults and 2 kids

name: Cozy home & rooftop near center (6 adults& 2 kids)
description: Cozy apartment on the top floor of a typical late 1800s building in Amsterdam's lively neighborhood De Pijp, overlooking the beautiful Sarphatipark. Quiet, light, and very private for this area's standards because of its location, with a rooftop terrace. Beware of the STEEP stairs, though - my place is very comfy once inside, but you need to be rather fit and brave to haul your luggage upstairs. Also, note that Dutch houses were not built for hot weather and typically have no A/C.

name: Amsterdam Oasis Hideaway
description: Welcome to our cozy Amsterdam spot! Nestled in a quiet residential area, we're just an 8-minute walk from Kraaienest metro station. Super convenient for reaching Schiphol airport, Amsterdam City Centre, Ziggo Dome, Ajax Arena, and Rai. Plus, easy on-street parking for your car. Stay central, stay comfy – your perfect Amsterdam base awaits! Explore, relax, and make yourself at home.

name: Appartement in Amsterdam
description: Get away from it all at this tranquil, centrally-located retreat. A few minutes' walk from the Vondelpark. There are many nice restaurants, cafes and shops nearby.

name: Studio Apartment - Bens The Highdocks
description: This newly built property is located in Amsterdam Noord, just a 15-minute walk from the ferry to Central Station. It features a restaurant (not open yet), working area and free Wi-Fi. The apartments are split over three floors, and are modernly decorated with peaceful beige color decor.

name: Artsy and spacious apartment
description:
Our place in the charming Baarsjes is perfect for people looking for a unique and comfortable stay. Our apartment is over 100m2 with big windows and high ceilings and a separate room to work from home.

There is a tram-stop next to the apartment which goes directly into the city center. The Vondelpark and Erasmuspark are within walking distance.

Please note that this is not a 'professional' airbnb: it is our own home that we are renting out and we ask you to enjoy and treat it accordingly.
amenities: ['Blender', 'Coffee maker: espresso machine', 'Bathtub', 'Free dryer – In unit']

name: Nice family house at the canal, no groups accepted
description:
We live in a lovely house in Amsterdam North, a highly desirable and trendy area of the city. Its prime location is close to the city center and popular neighborhoods like NDSM, as well as restaurants, parks, and a cinema.

The house spans three floors and features three spacious bedrooms. It's particularly well-suited for families with children, to make them feel at home.

At the top of the house, there's a terrace offering fantastic views. Please note, we do not accept groups.

name: Apartment overlooking park
description:
Four years ago, I bought this apartment overlooking the Rembrandtpark and I renovated it with my dad. It has a spacious living room and when you sit on te couch, you only see the water and the trees.

It is a very peaceful place, but with everything close by. The busy Kinkerstraat has all the shops you need and is within walking distance. The city centre is only a short tram ride away.

Public transport is easily accessible and trams will leave every 7 minutes.

name: Cute ground floor house Jordaan
description: This ground floor house in the Jordaan (central of Amsterdam) is located in a quite little cute street overlooking the canal. It has a big kitchen with dining table, living room, separate bedroom with good bed, bathroom and an outside in front of the house.

name: Cosy family home in the North of Amsterdam
description: Cosy place to stay for a family in the peaceful and trendy North of Amsterdam, only 5-10 minutes to the ferry or subway towards the city by bike. It's in a nice family-friendly neighbourhood and close to the lovely Noorderpark. But also easy to acces the busy centre from our place.

name: Canal House of a Stylist
description: Lovely family house in a special and quiet part of the city center of Amsterdam. Located on the canal in the middle of 17th century warehouses and shipyards. Two large bedrooms.

name: licht en ruim appartement in Amsterdam
description:
Experience the ultimate convenience in this centrally located apartment, just steps away from the beautiful Vondelpark. Everything you need is within easy reach. The space boasts a fully-equipped kitchen, perfect for preparing your favorite meals, a spacious and modern bathroom, and a private balcony where you can unwind.

With the tram, you'll be just 10 minutes away from the vibrant Jordaan district and the lively Leidseplein, making this the perfect base for exploring the city.

name: Comfortable houseboat 5
description: Have you ever wanted to stay on a cosy Dutch pleasure boat right near the canals of Amsterdam? This is your perfect chance to experience Amsterdam on the water. Enjoy the small yet comfortable houseboat in this picturesque and quiet location in the middle of the famous Jordaan district. An amazing glamping experience on the water!

This studio offers a quiet place to stay. It's the perfect location to explore Amsterdam.
This studio is fully equipped and offers all the amenities you might need for a stay. Close to the city centre, and with plenty of shops, great restaurants and local bars.
There is a double sofa bed and a double bed, kitchen and bathroom with shower & toilet.

name: Luxury canal view room (self check-in possible)
description:
We are located on the Singel canal in the heart of historic Amsterdam. Touristic hotspots like the Anne Frank House, the Royal Palace on Dam Square and the Rijksmuseum are within walking distance. Enjoy the view from your room on either the peaceful gardens or on the lively Singel canal. We do not serve breakfast. However, coffee and tea making facilities are available in the communal area and there is a wide selection of places that serve breakfast and other meals in the neighborhood.

Please note: Because we are located in a historic Canal House in a residential area of the centre where people live, we prefer guests who want to enjoy a quiet stay. If you come to Amsterdam to party all night long, our property may not be the best choice for you.
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Citiez Hotel Amsterdam: Small Family Room
description: Our stylish hotel offers rooms that each represent a different international city; sleep in Paris, Montreal or Lucerne! Centrally located in a shopping centre (TKMaxx, ICIParis, H&M, McDonald's, 4 supermarkets), FoodMarket (international) and congress centre De Meervaart within walking distance, parking garage (FREE!), direct tram to the centre (15 minutes), direct express bus to Schiphol (15 minutes). Our allDayCafé is open 24/7 for coffees from our baristas and lots of fun!

name: Stylish Stay Near Amsterdam's Vibrant Center
description: This cozy one-bedroom apartment offers a delightful retreat for your stay in Amsterdam. The space is thoughtfully designed and fully furnished to provide you with everything you need for a comfortable and enjoyable stay. The apartment also includes a well-equipped kitchen.The location of the apartment is truly unbeatable. Situated in West, it provides a central and well-connected base for your Amsterdam adventures. Public transportation options are easily accessible.

name: Double Room
description: The extra large bed and modern amenities make this room a great base for a lengthy stay.

name: Spui's the Limit
description:
Cozy studio in a typical Amsterdam building, located very centrally near Dam Square and the famous 9 streets district.
You will have your own studio with bathroom en toilet. The bathroom and the studio are separated by a shared hallway with me :). But I will respect your privacy and only use the hallway when I come home or leave.

name: NEW| Cosy apartment in 9 streets
description: This cosy, stylish and authentic apartment is located in the famous nine streets of Amsterdam and just around the corner of dam square and the  famous Jordaan neighborhood!  The building dates back to the 17th century and the apartment includes a queen size bed, sitting area, small kitchenette and private bathroom. Furthermore the space is entirely private and ideal for couples or solo travelers who are ready to explore Amsterdam by foot as most city hot spots are within walking distance!

name: Room in Vondelpark apartment
description:
Enjoy a staying in a centrally located and stylish apartment.

It is located on the city side of the Overtoom, an iconic Amsterdam street just a few minutes walk from the Nine Streets shopping district, museum district and Vondelpark (Amsterdam's Central Park).

The apartment has a spacious living area and kitchen and a bedroom with a double bed. It has recently been renovated so all the interior and furnishings are brand new.

You will be staying with a travel loving 33 year old New Zealander.

name: Sunny canal house in Oud-West

For your convenience a kitchennete with coffee machine, eletric kettle, toaster, fridge, microwave, egg boiler. NO STOVE( COOKING IS NOT ALLOWED by Amsterdam city councill).

This spacious & luxurious house is located next to the iconic Vondelpark, making it the perfect place for families who want to be close to all city's highlights. With 150sqr meters, this house offers plenty of room: two spacious bedrooms, each with its own bathroom, a large kitchen and cozy fireplace

But the real highlight of this house is its location. You'll be just a short walk away from some of Amsterdam's best restaurants, cafes & shops, as well as world-famous museums (e.g., Rijksmuseum)

The hip NDSM wharf is only 7 bike minutes away, the citycenter 20 minutes (on the ferry) and the interstate a10 only 5 min by car.

A nice and quiet place the stay when exploring Amsterdam.

name: Spacious Stylish room @ Leidseplein
description: The bedroom is modernly decorated and still cozy and has a private bathroom with shower and bathtub. It's located in the true centre of Amsterdam. All the tourist attractions are in walking distance. I you don't know where to go, I will show you! :)

name: Spacious Gem in friendly Amsterdam North
description: Well decorated three story house with a big garden at the back which opens up to a common gated playground. Natural materials define our style of decoration, combined with a jungle of plants and many spots to chill out comfortably. You will feel straight at home. Two bikes are included and you are very welcome to have a nice bath after a long day of exploring this great part of Amsterdam and all the rest of our beautiful city.

name: Bright, furnished, centrally located appartment
description: Light, cosy appartment, very suitable for two perons. The appartment is fully furnished and centrally located inbetween the vondel- and rembrandt park. I am very happy to welcome you!

name: Lovely 1 bedroom apartment in Amsterdam
description:
This cosy apartment is centered in Amsterdam-Oost. It‘s just a 5min walk to the metro which will bring you right to the city center within another 5 minutes. There‘s also a lot to do in Oost and the Amstel is right around the corner for some nice walks and terraces.
The apartment itself is very spacious with an open kitchen and a bar.

name: Loft | Plantagebuurt | Amsterdam City Centre
description: This loft apartment in the Plantagebuurt in the centre of Amsterdam is the perfect place to stay for couples. You will enjoy spending time and being at home in this stylish apartment, whilst at the same time having all city highlights nearby. The Plantagebuurt is known for its green (as in trees and parks), it's wider set-up with more luxurious houses, its relaxed and bohemian lifestyle, Artis the Zoo and the Hortus Botanicus.

name: Spacious groundfloor family home
description: This family home is situated in the middle of the Pijp, which makes it a good place to explore the city from. The house is recently renovated and has 1 master bedroom, three children bedrooms and one spare room. The living room is very spacious and cosy, with an open well equipped kitchen.  Rijksmuseum, Albert Cuyp market, tons of restaurants & bars are on walking distance!

name: Light, cozy, centrally-located studio apartment
description: Studio-apartment in one of Amsterdam's nicest neighbourhoods, including all necessary amenities.

name: Ping Pong Apartment Noord
description: The apartment is situated in a quiet residential area. In 15 minutes by bicycle and ferry you are Central Station Amsterdam. The closest metro stop is a 15 minute walk away. You can also discover the countryside: in just 5 minutes cycling along the canal you are at the fields with cows and mills. The famous NDSM, Tolhuistuin and Eye are also just a few minutes away. The apartment is 58 square meters, with a balcony facing the south. Ideal for a couple.

name: Bright apartment with a garden
description: It's a very nice and cozy apartment located in a peaceful neighborhood in Amsterdam East 15 minutes from the Centre of Amsterdam. The apartment has a very nice, big and sunny garden which is rare in Amsterdam.

name: Nice-to-haves like free WiFi and 24/7 reception
description:
Just a 5-minute walk from the Vondelpark, Hotel Espresso offers modern rooms with free WiFi. The Van Gogh Museum, Rijksmuseum, and Leidseplein with their many restaurants and clubs are all within 5 minutes.

Comfy, twin or double beds make it tough to get up early.
Tucked away from the tourist crowds, yet just a short stroll from all the action in the city centre.
PLEASE NOTE THAT THE CITY TAX WILL HAVE TO BE PAID SEPARATELY AT THE HOTEL AND IS NOT INCLUDED

name: Modern ground floor flat with garden & 1 bedroom
description: Cozy and modern (59m2) flat located only 5 minutes by bike from Amsterdam central. Enjoy a coffee on the bench in front of the house or enjoy the sun in the very spacious garden (59m2). Bathroom with toilet, a lovely kitchen/dinning area and a cozy living room area.

name: Bright, balcony, prime location
description:
We moved in this apartment 2 years ago after falling in love with it. We put a lot of thoughts and efforts in making it a warm place to stay.
It is officially a one bedroom but can accommodate 3-4 people by making use of a single futon in the small room or double futon in the living room. Very bright living room as facing south and a spacious balcony outside the bedroom which gets the sun in the end of the afternoon so if you are lucky with the weather you could even dine outside.

name: Canal View House in 9streets! Private house
description: Keizer Canal View House in 9streets

name: Former Rembrandt Workshop 2 Br Canal View Apt
description: You're in the iconic Jordaan neighbourhood. Everything Amsterdam has to offer is steps from the front door.  You will be directly opposite the Anne-Frank House and the famous Westerkerk. The iconic bell-tower is the tallest structure in the city centre.

name: Cozy room in central 16th century home
description:
Super comfortable cozy room with dedicated private bathroom in historical 1670's building right in the heart of the old city centre.

Situated with everything within walking distance with are a host of great places to eat, drink & explore nearby.

Hosted by long time friendly locals, ready to give you all the secret tips of the city we are ready to help make your Amsterdam experience as comfortable and perfect as possible :)

name: Water view central appartment
description:
This centrally located appartment has an amazing view at the water with balcony's on both sides. It is very well located in a quite street with only a 15 minute walk from the famous Albert Cuyp. The nearest tram is a 5 minute walk and there are a lot of shops en restaurants and supermarkets around.

The appartment is very bright with a fully equipped kitchen, spacious bathroom including bath tub and shower.

name: Full apartment with amazing rooftop in Amsterdam
description:
Beautiful apartment on the South side of Amsterdam (Hoofddorppleinbuurt). Within 5 minutes by bike to the Vondelpark and 15 minutes to the Pijp (neighbourhood). Nice restaurants and bars at walking distance. Balcony on the south side of the apartment with morning sun and fully equipped roof terrace with loungeset, BBQ and diner table.

Spacious living room, fully equipped kitchen, flatscreen TV, Wifi, Bathtub and separate shower.

Affordable parking availability at walking distance.
amenities: ['Free washer – In unit', 'BBQ grill', 'Blender', 'Bathtub', 'Free dryer – In unit', 'Outdoor dining area']

name: Guest living lobby doubles as co-working space
description: The large hipster room offers you extra space and a quiet oasis of well-being for a comfortable stay with us, whether alone or with company. You sleep in a large double bed and enjoy an undisturbed night's rest thanks to the soundproof windows. Furthermore, you will find a flat screen TV with screen mirroring function, so you can connect your mobile device and watch your favorite movies, Invisible sound system, air conditioning and heating, full body mirror, a seating area and a private bathroom

name: Luxurieus apartment with garden!
description:
Luxurieus and stylish apartment with a spacious and sunny garden located in a beautiful and peaceful area next to the Rembrandtpark with great connectivity via tram and bus to the city centre of Amsterdam. Ample parking space right upfront. We have two bedrooms, the second bedroom is located in our chalet in our garden.

The Green Egg BBQ is not for rental use.

name: Lovely, trendy renovated loft. Center Amsterdam
description:
We are happy to welcome you in our lovely, recently renovated apartment in one of Amsterdams most popular areas: Amsterdam Old West! Located within walking distance from the city centre to many attractions such as Vondelpark, Museum district (Rijksmuseum etc), Westermarkt (Anne Frank House), Dam Square, Jordaan and Nine Streets.

We also have two entrance tickets to the very popular ‘Stedelijk Museum’ which you can use! Big tip! ;)

name: City center appartement
description:
**Charming City-Center Apartment with Spacious Rooftop Terrace and Garden**

Enjoy the vibrant city life while having a peaceful retreat with a generous outdoor space.

Situated in the city center, you'll be within walking distance to the trendy Jordaan neighborhood, the picturesque Negen Straatjes (Nine Streets), and an array of fantastic restaurants. Our apartment is well-equipped with all the amenities you need for a comfortable stay, including a spacious kitchen and reliable WiFi.

name: The little townhouse
description: Welcome to our lovely private townhouse in the center of de Pijp, the Quartier Latin of Amsterdam. We are centrally located within walking distance to all the museums and other highlights in de Pijp, one of the hippest neighborhoods in Amsterdam.
amenities: ['Private backyard – Fully fenced', 'Outdoor furniture', 'Bathtub', 'Outdoor dining area']

name: Traditional bunker ship
description: A beautiful boat (65m2) in Amsterdam north. Close to tram 26, which takes you to Centraal Station station in 5 minutes. The boat has a high bed in the tip and a sofa bed in the intermediate space. There is a kitchen with all the amenities to cook yourself. Downstairs is a large dining table and above a cabin where you can enjoy the views. With lots of outdoor space you can lie in the hammock or start the day with a dip! Parking is possible

name: Modern & light appartment Amsterdam City
description:
This appartment is located in central part of Amsterdam city, but silent at night. The rooms are light, spacious and stylishly furnished. On the first floor there’s a balcony and on the second floor there’s a small rooftop terrace with sunlight all day!

The house is fully equipped, which makes the appartment a comfortable place.

The biggest park of Amsterdam is around the corner and other beautiful famous areas, like the Jordaan, city center or canals, are only on a 10 min bike ride distance.

name: Luxury rooftop apartment with private hottub.
description:
Hi all,

Welcome to our place in Amsterdam known as: "Thegreenhideaway"
You have your OWN floor with a kitchenette, bathroom, toilet, 2 terraces, bedroom and a hottub on the terrace.
Your apartment is on the 5 th floor, we (Sander & Kim) live on the 4 th floor.
We just share one stairs, outside of the living area, so you have total privacy.
Normally this advertisement is listed as whole apartment, but for bureaucratic reasons i have to list it as a private room.
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Hotel schip Johanna Engelina
description:
You will never forget your stay in this unique accommodation. Stay on this traditional Dutch clipper from 1897. Previously, the Johanna Engelina transported cargo using her sails. Nowadays, in the old cargo space, a comfortable guesthouse has been realized with all modern comforts.

The ship is located on the NDSM property a stone's throw from the free ferries to Amsterdam Central Station.
If you want to come with more than 16 people, contact us.

name: Amazing renovated apt. in centre
description:
This unique Jordaan apartment has been renovated in August '23 and is equipped with everything you need for an unforgettable stay in Amsterdam. The perfect place for a couple, friends or a business trip at a central location.

The separate bedroom, a functional bathroom with washer and dryer, a generous living area with open kitchen, spacious couch and beautiful original stained glass windows and with a balcony viewing the courtyard.

Is there anything else you could wish for?
amenities: ['Outdoor furniture', 'Free dryer – In unit', 'Board games', 'Baking sheet']

name: Rooftop Garden in Museum Quarter
description:
You will find everything you need for a luxurious trip to Amsterdam in this newly renovated gem. The apartment is short walking distance from museumplein and the iconic vondelpark, yet nestled in the most exclusive and quiet neighborhood in the city.

On warm evenings you can relax in the beautiful rooftop garden, enjoy drinks, and watch the spectacular Amsterdam sunset. The room also has a ceiling fan, and portable air conditioning unit, a rare but important feature for in August!

description: This beautiful modern, bright and stylish apartment is located on the outskirts of the neighborhoods: Jordaan and Amsterdam West. Due to the convenient location of the apartment, it is the excellent place where you will relax optimally, and at the same time you are within walking distance of the city center and all Amsterdam hotspots! The apartment is easily accessible by car, train, and from Schiphol Airport. The public transport is also within walking distance of the apartment.

name: Stylish & Loft-like Apartment in perfect location!
description:
This apartment will charm you with its open, bright and loft-like atmosphere!
The huge windows on both sides, the long balcony to the green courtyard, the plastering on the ceiling and the old wooden floor give the apartment its unique Amsterdamer charm while being freshly renovated and equipped with a highly modern kitchen and bathroom.
And the location couldn’t be any better! Oud-West is the perfect starting point for explorations of the city because it’s located in the middle of Amsterdam.

name: 4 persons, 2 studio’s + 2 luxury bathrooms
description:
For more than 15 years we welcome guests in beautiful Amsterdam.

Enjoy Amsterdam from your own luxury, cosy and comfortable double-studio plus 2 bathrooms on a very central and quiet location.
The two stylish studio’s are based in a characteristic Amsterdam house (anno 1882) that has been recently renovated. The two studio’s for 4 persons in total are next to each other. Each studio has a private attached luxury bathroom with shower, toilet, double washbasin and floor heating.
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Appartement in Amsterdam
description: Welcome to our one bedroom apartment in Amsterdam Oost. This space has an industrial style with concrete walls and ceilings. The open living area offers comfort and a large amount of natural light. Rest in the large bedroom with a king-size bed. The well-equipped kitchen is perfect for culinary endeavours. Explore the trendy neighbourhood with its many cafés and restaurants, visit Oosterpark, the Tropenmuseum or Artis and easily reach the city center.

name: Modern apartment near Vondelpark
description: Modern and spacious apartment to have a great Amsterdam experience. Located in Oud-West, it's really close by to Leidsesquare and the Vondelpark. The apartment consist of 3 bedrooms and optimal for travelers. Nice restaurants and bars in the vicinity to enjoy your stay.

name: Geweldig huis in hip A'dam Noord
description: The perfect base for exploring Amsterdam! In the characteristic Nieuwendam you will find your peace and quiet in this tasteful house with garden. The bustling center is within cycling distance, but in Amsterdam Noord, within walking / cycling distance you will find the trendiest restaurants and bars. Around the corner, on the cozy Purmerplein, are all daily amenities such as a bakery. By bus and metro, you can reach Centraal Station in 15 minutes, or catch the free ferry. Parking in front of the door is free.

name: The July - Twenty Eight - Executive Apartment
description: Our Executive Apartment is more than just a room with a double bed. The apartment is spacious (mimimum 35m2) and luxurious and has all the home comforts you need including a comfortable king-size bed by Auping, a living space with a sofa, a flat screen TV, a modern bathroom and a fully equipped kitchen.

name: Spacious apartment near vondelpark
description: A warm and great get away place for a family, a couple or 2 friends. Our home is spacious and calm. Due to the transparent doors we have a lot of light in our appartement. We hope to welcome people who will enjoy the beauty of the city and the calmness of our place. We are located in the center but not in the touristic area. Locals call it the best quarter of the city as it is located next to Vondelpark but also in the center with a big variety of nice cafes & restaurant just around the corner.

name: Cosy luminous flat with 360 rooftop views
description:
Stylish and spacious property, ideal for group getaways, nestled in one of Amsterdam's most vibrant neighbourhoods. Embrace the beauty of Amsterdam from our 360-degree rooftop, offering breathtaking sunset views of the west, recently acclaimed by Time Out Magazine as one of the world's finest places to live. .
Please note, like many traditional Amsterdam buildings, our property does not feature an elevator, so it would not be suitable for people with mobility issues.

name: Spacious & bright house with sunny garden!
description:
Quiet & stylish house with sunny south facing garden!

The house features a fully equipped kitchen, bathroom with rainshower, seperate toilet and spacious livingroom which is connected to the garden.

Within 5 minutes walk you will find supermarkets/ drugsstore and public transport to the city centre.

If you like to walk/ run or swim you can escape to Sloterpark which is around the corner.

name: Fijn familiehuis nabij Jordaan

description:
This romantic houseboat ADRIANA in the heart of Amsterdam is for real lovers of historic ships.
Built in 1888 as "Haagsche Aak", this is one of the oldest boats in Amsterdam and is located in the Jordaan near the Anne Frank House and Centraal Station.
The ship has 5G internet, TV, central heating and free parking.
U has the exclusive use.
Outside on the deck one has a beautiful view of the Keizersgracht and there are many shops and restaurants around the corner.

There is underfloor heating, a bath and a rain shower, and access to balcony/patio from all areas. There is an office space with lots of light which can also be used as a second bedroom with a 140x200 mattress. The house is on the east side of the city center that is bustling with nice parks, museums and restaurants but not so many tourists yet.

The apartment is centrally located: 7 mins walk from albert cuyp, a 5 minute walk from Museum plein, a 10 min walk from Vondelpark and 20 mins walk from the city center (public transportation is right outside)

Camping Uilenstekkie (beautiful nature around and a cheap camping), camping Zeeburg, camping Badhoeve, camping de Lakens.

description:
Just renovated apartment in Amsterdam West- de Baarsjes. Walking distance to restaurants, cafe’s and nice shops. The famous ten Katemarkt and Foodhallen are close by! Walk a little bit further and you come in the historic Jordaan.

The apartment is just renovated and has a new kitchen and bathroom.

Just 10 minutes by bike to the city centre. Next to the apartment are two nice parks: Erasmuspark and Rembrandtpark. If you all the way threw Rembrandtpark you arrive at the famous Vondelpark!

name: Maisonette (full house) in Amsterdam
description: Experience the tranquility of this spacious maisonette in a peaceful Amsterdam neighborhood, just 400m from Postjesweg metro station. With generous living areas bathed in natural light, this home offers a serene retreat. Enjoy the beauty of Sloterplas Lake closeby, perfect for leisurely walks, and a lovely park just around the corner for outdoor activities. This residence combines comfort and nature, making it an ideal sanctuary in the city, where you can unwind and enjoy your stay.

name: Heerlijk Appartement met Groen Park Zicht
description:
Sunny and stylish apartment in West. Relax on the south facing balcony or relax in the very spacious bathroom with rain shower. The entire apartment was recently renovated.

Located in a top location in the hip district of the Baarsjes and directly on the Erasmus park. Around the corner, you will find plenty of coffee bars, restaurants and cafes. A serene and laid back home base.

Fortunately, you'll be downtown in no time. Public transport is 2 minutes away, or by bike you can reach the city center in 10/15 minutes.

name: Modern studio with late check-out
description:
This studio is in an apartment complex. A park is located right in front of the complex and a canal is around the corner. There is a variety of restaurants in the neighborhood. Public transport nearby goes directly to the center of Amsterdam. Check out at 15.00.

The studio has a kitchen, bathroom and there is a comfortable couch that can be used as a bed as well. There is big bed too. A French balcony with plants is situated in front of the studio. There is a TV with a variety of channels.

name: Warm&cozy apartment near centre
description: My apartment is on the ground floor near the Jordaan and the Westerpark (200 meter) which offers lots of nice bars and restaurants and you can go for a run. My house is tiny but cute and has everything you need. It’s design is a mix of vintage/ retro and modern. The place is renovated in 2021 with a brand new kitchen and floor. It is 48m2. You are near all the tourist highlights. The busstop to central station is in front of my home. You can rent bikes around the corner too. You will love it!

name: Amsterdam4holiday guestroom city center Amsterdam
description: We conviniently located in the very center of Amsterdam, walking distance to almost all tourist attractions, shops, resto, clubs, public tranport etc., Our apartment is in 17th century stracture equipped with modern comfort and facilities. We offer comfortable bedroom with private bathroom, In the room you can find minifridge, coffee & tea maker, smart tv with netflix, high speed wifi. You will have total privacy and comfort while you can explore the city on foot

name: Family apartment with garden in Amsterdam Noord
description: Welcome in our spacious, simple and kids-friendly apartment in hip Amsterdam Noord. It is  ideally located between the green parks of Amsterdam Noord and the vibrant NDSM and Buiksloterham with restaurants, bars and cafes. The apartment is perfect to have a quiet time with a family but near enough city life to enjoy everything Amsterdam has to offer.

name: Great place for a family
description:
When we are away we let out our entire house that consists of 3 floors including two large terraces and which is connected to a large, secluded square. We have a young child ourselves and the square is used as a big playground. Therefore, we love to welcome guests with children. If you travel with children we can allow four persons. (more is unfortunately not allowed by the municipality).
Otherwise we only rent to TWO ADULTS MAXIMUM.

name: Charming City Center apartment along the canal
description:
Welcome to the Mothership of all Casa Tomi!
Indulge your senses in this luxurious floral canal house residence that is located in an exquisite neighbourhood along the canal.

To unleash the full potential of your Amsterdam’s journey and experience, the possibility to rent an open boat is indeed offered.

name: Beautiful city loft with garden
description:
In the Hugo de Groot quarter in Amsterdam city centre, we offer you a timeless designed city loft. The original house dates from the early 20th century, as part of a traditional closed block with an green oasis as a courtyard. The house is recently renovated

The house was included in the list of most 50 beautiful houses of the world of 2021 selected by Archdaily.

The house is very close to the center and lovely and charming neighborhood de Jordaan, negen straatjes and Central Station

name: Cozy apartment in Amsterdam
description:
Cozy and renovated apartment in Amsterdam - Zeeburg.
The apartment is fully equipped and is located in a quiet neighborhood in East.
The Flevopark is 1 minute away where you can take wonderful walks. On the other side of the street you will find the pleasant Javaplein, followed by Javastraat. Here you will find a wide range of shops and restaurants.

name: Cosy single room with a view
description:
How comfortable a room can be, and how warm a welcome?
One feels at home here right away. Any questions? I'll try to help.
So make a booking, and it will be my pleasure to welcome you.

name: Monumentaal pand in Amsterdam
description:
Welcome to our beautiful home in the heart of Amsterdam! This spacious and stylish stay offers two bedrooms; a master bedroom and children's room (with crib or just bed), ideal for families, couples or business travelers who want to explore the bustling capital of the Netherlands.

We look forward to welcoming you and making sure your time here will be unforgettable!

name: Cocoon apartment in BoLo
description:
An ideal apartment for a couple (possibly with a baby), in a typical dutch neighbourhood of Amsterdam.
Very well placed around Westerpark and Erasmuspark, central station is only 20 min away by public transport, just as Schiphol airport which is only at 30 min.

Our apartment is very cosy, with comfy living room, big kitchen fully furnished, master bedroom with a nice and quiet balcony.

name: Amsterdam Lake Hotel - Single Room No Window
description: Located on Amsterdam Lake across from Amsterdam Forest, you can experience modern luxury and comfort for your trip to the Dutch capital. Offering an exclusive panoramic view over Amsterdam Lake the hotel is perfectly situated between the City of Amsterdam and Schiphol Airport.

name: Studio with private bathroom, kitchen and terrace
description:
-Exclusive studio with a view of the lake and access to a spacious terrace
-Located in a quiet, green neighborhood
- Within walking distance of public transport: train, tram and metro.
-Supermarket & bicycle rental and the city beach within walking distance
-Access through the main house to the studio on the third floor with sleeping, sitting and kitchen area. There is no elevator!

name: Boutique Houseboat in Amsterdam Center
description: Room for rent at the beautiful recently renovated residential park in the atmosphere of a romantic boutique hotel, heart of downtown just above the lively district of Jordaan. Restaurants and bars around the corner and even a visit to the palace on the dam can even be bridged on foot in 10 minutes. The Lady Luck has an air conditioning in the bedroom and a lovely gas fireplace in the lounge area. In the summer you can swim and at a small extra charge there are 2 sup boards ready.

name: Small Double room in Amsterdam
description: Max Brown Canal District is set at the intersection of Amsterdam’s most iconic canals and made up of three historical canal houses. Here you’ll find a modern interior and you’ll always have the Max Brown essentials—great coffee, free WiFi and the most comfortable bed around. Please note that this room is very small and it may only have a window facing the hall way. City tax to be paid at the hotel.

name: Numa | Medium Studio w/ Kitchen near Flevopark
description: This comfortable studio offers 24 sqm of space. Ideal for up to two people, its double bed (180x200) and modern bathroom with shower make this stay a perfect way to experience Amsterdam. There’s also a kitchen  and a dining table, so you’ll have everything you need for maximum comfort and minimal stress.
amenities: ['Free washer – In unit', 'Free dryer – In unit']

name: Bright apartment next to Amstel, 3 outdoor spaces
description:
This stylish place to stay is perfect for a couple looking to explore Amsterdam.

It is located next to the Amstel (3rd floor), and nearby to restaurants, pubs, and supermarkets. The apartment also has an office space (2 desks) with a great setup for remote working. It gets plenty of light throughout the day, and has a front balcony, back balcony, and terrace from the bedroom where you can enjoy the view of the city.

We hope you enjoy our place during your stay as much as we do!
amenities: ['Outdoor furniture', 'BBQ grill', 'Free dryer – In unit', 'Board games', 'Outdoor dining area']

name: Cityden | Studio | Aparthotel
description:
Cityden BoLo District is a unique 4-star aparthotel and offers 120 fully equipped Apartments, Penthouses and Studios + all the needed hotel facilities: gym, minimart, restaurant with outside terrace and bar.

The diversity of the neighbourhood breathes young and old, endless creativity, smells and colours with a matching range of shops. BoLo (Bos en Lommer) is an inspiring district in Amsterdam-West, The SoHo of Amsterdam.

name: Groot luxe appartement midden in Amsterdam
description: Spacious and large apartment right in the city center of Amsterdam. Just 5 minutes' walk to the Central Station and 2 minutes' walk to the Dam Square. The spacious apartment in the old town of Amsterdam offers a lot of space for 2 people. In the apartment you will find a luxurious living room with comfortable sofa, a dining area, an extensive kitchen, a separate toilet, a bedroom with connecting door, a bathroom, dryer, washing machine, luxury shower and a cute garden.

name: Sleeping near the mill.
description: Big suite,private entry,private bathroom,own terras with (URL HIDDEN) village is near Schiphol and 20 min frim the center.

name: Cosy double floor apartment in heart of Amsterdam
description:
I just moved to this new apartment of two floors with large living spaces.

Fully equipped with sonos, piano and lots of art and plants. Sleeping peacefully next to a courtyard while being super close to the city centre and its effervescent qualities. I’d like to rent out my apartment to people who respect, appreciate and are trustworthy. If you want you can also borrow my bike! Hope to meet you soon!

name: Appartement in Zeeburg
description: *NEW* Entire art deco appartement in one of the most vibrant and still authentic areas of Amsterdam.

name: Druïde Cabin with real tree
description: This small druïde cabin with a real living tree is built for a peaceful healing meditative sacred space and cool and cozy place.

name: Spacious two floor apartment in Amsterdam Ijburg
description: This great accommodation guarantees fun for the whole family.

name: Spacious 1 bedroom  appartment in Amsterdam
description:
Stay in this bright apartment with an excellent location, just 300 meters from Vondelpark and Leidseplein, in one of the most important leisure and shopping areas of Amsterdam. You will enjoy all the comforts of a hotel, as well as a restaurant, Gastrobar and buffet breakfast, if you wish. The apartment offers a living room with sofa, Smart TV and Chromecast, kitchen and bathroom with washing machine and dryer.

IMPORTANT: access to the apartment located on the first floor is only by stairs.

name: Cozy apartment in lovely oudwest
description:
Cozy apartment in the heart of Amsterdam neighbourhood oud-west. Perfect if you're looking to explore the city and also experience how the locals enjoy their time.

Easy to get to the center of Amsterdam walking in 10 minutes or by bike (depending on where in the center you go) and close to several restaurants and cafes.

name: Spacious Luxury Central Family Apartment (170 m²)
description:
Enjoy Amsterdam in this amazing luxury and family friendly apartment.
This bright and spacious apartment is located in the heart of De Pijp and has everything you need plus more.

While staying here, you're just a stroll away from everything you'd like to see: The Albert Cuyp market, Rijksmuseum, Sarphatipark, the canals and plenty of bars and restaurants.

name: Eco-friendly Double King Room in Museum Quarter

name: Cosy apartment near Vondelpark
description:
This stylish 3-room apartment is centrally-located near Vondelpark (5min) and the Foodhallen (10min). The apartment is located in a beautiful (and quiet) street in Amsterdam Oud-West, a lively neighborhood with lots of bars, restaurants and shops. The apartment was recently renovated and has all the amenities you require: luxurious kitchen, modern bathroom, French balcony, large balcony and tram nearby.

Note that some personal items will remain during your stay.

name: The African Lily private apartment in the Jordaan
description:
The cosy room with African decorations is situated in the downstairs guest apartment of a townhouse build in 1712, located in the heart of the old city centre 'De Jordaan'.
The bedroom and bathroom have just been renovated. The bedroom in the basement has a comfortable queen size bed and is surrounded by African beads. The small bathroom (shower and sink) is situated ensuite, the private toilet is located outside the room a few steps higher on the split level.
amenities: ['Free washer – In unit', 'Free dryer – In unit']

name: 2 Minuten van Centraal Station
description:
Are you looking for a nice place for your trip to Amsterdam as a couple or single.

The house is 2 minutes by bike from Central Station. The studio is 40m2 with a garden of 40m2.

Nice out of the hustle and bustle, but a few blocks away you are in the bustling city life.

The host has lived in Amsterdam for 34 years and can give you all the tips you want.


The Adamtoren, Central Station all within walking distance

name: Fantastic nice and bright flat
description:
Cosy and bright apartment available from 14th of December 2023 until 7th of January 2024 with a balcony on the second floor, in the cozy Borgerstraat in the middle of Old West, within walking distance of the Vondelpark, the Foodhallen and the trendy Jan Pieter Heijestraat with all kinds of nice shops and restaurants.
This apartment is cleverly laid out with a cozy, bright living room with open kitchen at the rear and access to the balcony.

name: Prime location for families in De Pijp!
description:
Your family will be close to everything when you stay at this centrally-located place.
In the most vibrant area of Amsterdam (near Albert Cuyp market, 5 minutes from subway tram 52), a charming apartment with elevator , located in De pijp in the heart of pubs, restaurants, public transport). 1 bedroom with double bed, 2nd bedroom for a toddler . great for couple or couple +1 .

There is also a possibility for an inflatable double mattress.

name: Bright and cozy design apartment
description:
This centrally located accommodation is very bright and tastefully decorated.

Layout:
Sitting room
Dining room
Separate kitchen
Bathroom with bathtub
Bedroom located at the back of the apartment

name: Appartement Amsterdam West
description:
Apartment of 56m2, located in the beloved neighborhood “de Baarsjes” in Amsterdam West.

South facing balcony. Tram connection for the door to westermarkt, the Dam Square and Central Station.

Apartment is quiet inside. No noise pollution.

name: Beautiful apartment near Vondel!
description: This beautiful light and stylish apartment is located in a quiet street in the neighbourhood Old-West and is just a 5 minute walk from the Vondelpark. Just a two minute walk from the apartment is a tram station that goes to the central station. Around the corner you have the famous Ten Katemarkt and the Foodhallen. There are a lot of shops, cafés, restaurants and bars in very close proximity.

name: Medium Triple Room | Max Brown Canal District
description: Max Brown Canal District is set at the intersection of Amsterdam's most iconic canals and made up of three historical canal houses. Walk inside and you'll find a completely modernized interior, art by local artist Gino Bud Hoiting and the much-admired-and-Instagr.-book wall. You'll always have the Max Brown essentials: great coffee, free WiFi and the most comfortable bed around.

name: Beautiful spacious sustainable house boat.
description: No description

name: Stylish & comfy apartment in Amsterdam West
description:
Welcome to our elegant apartment in the heart of Amsterdam Old West. Our beautifully decorated home offers the perfect balance between style and convenience. Situated on a quiet street amidst the vibrant charm of this beloved neighborhood, and within walking distance of the iconic Jordaan.
The bedroom provides tranquility and comfort, while the well-equipped kitchen invites culinary creations.
Reserve today and get ready for an unforgettable stay in enchanting Amsterdam!

name: @Plantage.interior
description: Discover Centrum Oost van Amsterdam on foot or by tram (200m). Our apartment, an oasis of peace after adventures, is stylish and fully furnished. Particularly close is the iconic Artis Zoo. You can hear the monkeys from time to time. Enjoy urban vibrancy and relax in our cozy space. A unique base for an unforgettable stay in Amsterdam!

name: Private Studio Central new
description: Keep it simple at this peaceful and centrally-located place.

name: Prachtig appartement met tuin
description: This beautiful apartment is an Amsterdam School monument, yet very stylish and modernly furnished and equipped with all the comforts. It is beautifully located on the Amstel in the popular De Pijp district. There is a south facing garden and a lower level with additional bedroom / study.

name: Great family houseboat Westerpark next to Jordaan
description: We would be very happy to rent our lovely houseboat to you. This houseboat is in fact an apartment on the water of in total 90m2.  It has the same facilities as a normal house. It has 2 bedrooms, a bathroom with double sink and a spacious walking-in shower, very light living room of 40m2 and a beautiful private terrace from where you can enjoy your coffee in the morning and a glass of wine in the evening while watching the ducks and swans passing by. We welcome couple above 30 yrs with/out kids.

name: Delight apartment
description: In this comfortable accommodation, you will undoubtedly have a good time.

name: Bright room in city center park
description: Our apartment is centrally located in an award winning housing project in a unique city center park close to Amsterdam's main attractions. Public transport (bus, tram) is just around the corner providing you with options to easily get around.

name: Spacious and bright apartment
description: Welcome to my home! A spacious, bright and modern city apartment (80m2), which perfectly suits a couple. Within 5-10 min from all the hotspots in town like the city centre, Westerpark and the charming 9 streets.

name: Great apartment in Amsterdam
description:
Hi Guys,

I rent my own place in Amsterdam. It's a nice apartment near the city center. I live in this apartment when You're not renting it!

name: Stylish apt in Iconic building
description:
Spend your vacation in the unique building by a famous architecture & just 10 min from the city center. Wonderful designer apartment with a water view and spacious terrace.

Our house is children friendly!

Enjoy Netflix and HBO on a big home cinema screen.

name: Amsterdam Lake Hotel - Deluxe Double/Twin Room
description: Located on Amsterdam Lake across from Amsterdam Forest, you can experience modern luxury and comfort for your trip to the Dutch capital. Offering an exclusive panoramic view over Amsterdam Lake the hotel is perfectly situated between the City of Amsterdam and Schiphol Airport.

name: The pearl of de Watergraafsmeer
description:
Perfect location, between the lively city center, but also easy to escape the hustle and bustle of the city in the green parks and quickly get out of the city.

The house has a perfect atmosphere, a real homely feeling with beautiful art and sculptures made by our friends and family. It is a cornerhouse with an unique wide view.

Cozy neighborhood with nice shops, cafes and terraces. Fantastic bakery/café down the street and a brewery with local beers opposite of the house.

name: Your little appartment on wheels
description:
A gypsy cart that is decorated like a hotel room. The gypsy cart is located on a farm on the outskirts of Amsterdam. A unique way to get to know farm life. A fresh farmer's breakfast every morning and during the day you experience life on the farm.

We have free bicycles available that will take you from A to B while supplies last. There are approximately 25 bicycles available for you and your fellow B&B guests.

If you want to rent a more luxurious bicycle, we can give a 20% discount at MacBike

name: Spacious studio, free parking & along the IJ river
description:
Spacious studio 55 m2, free parking & 8 minutes to Amsterdam Central Station by car or 15 minutes by tram

The studio is located in Amsterdam Oost, along the IJ-river. After entering the shared hall, you find the door to the studio. In the studio there is one double bed and a sofabed (baby cot is available), the private bathroom has a shower and toilet. There is a microwave/oven, toaster, fridge, kettle, nespresso coffee machine and a TV for streaming. Coffee and tea for free.

name: Watervilla, 200 m2,  garden, 3 terraces, IJ-burg
description: This designer water villa (build in 2019) is wonderfully situated at a dike between swimming water and a park and contains 3 bedrooms all with double bed,  a high end kitchen, and 3 bathrooms. Outside you find a garden, water terrace, inhouse-terrace/bar and a spacious roof terrace.  On the other hand you find high tech details like glass fiber high speed internet (100 MBit/sec up/down), Philips Hue lighting system, a high-end sound system and Gaggenau kitchen equipment. 3 free parking places.

name: Family villa in Amsterdam
description: No description

name: Lovely Two Bedroom Apartment with Roof Terrace
description:
The perfect place for enjoying Amsterdam. Cosy top floor apartment located on a peaceful street in the Oost just a minute's walk from vibey Javastraat.

Studio Bike rental is across the street and great for hiring bikes. There is also a tram route outside the apartment that can take you around the city. Alternately Muiderpoort Station is close by and handy for traveling to Schipol. The beautiful Flevopark and Oosterpark are also within walking distance.

name: A B&B in the historical centre with sauna.
description: In this unique accommodation you are right where it all happens. It is almost impossible to get more central than this room in the center of Amsterdam. The room is located at the back, the building can be a quiet place for city center concepts. Adjacent to the room is the bathroom, which is equipped with a sink, a shower and a shower.

name: Typical Dutch house
description: Driemond is a small village close to the center of Amsterdam. By car you are in the center in less than 20 minutes. Wit a taxi you are whitin 5 minutes at train station Weesp or metro station Gaasperplas.
amenities: ['Private backyard – Fully fenced', 'Outdoor furniture', 'BBQ grill', 'Bathtub', 'Children’s dinnerware', 'Board games', 'Baking sheet']

name: Jordaan apartment ground floor
description: Enjoy this wonderful place in the middle of the Jordaan and easily walk along the canals, visit many different pubs, museums and much more!

name: B&B near city center, free parking, trams in front
description: B&B just for you (your own entrance). Nearby city center and Amsterdam Central Station! Public transport in front of the door. Private car parking available.
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Light and Spacious Studio Flat with Sunset View
description: You are in the middle of green and friendly Amsterdam West with lots of small shops, bars and restaurants and a supermarket around the corner. My building is super quiet & peaceful yet you're well located to useful amenities! You're  also only 20 mins on a tram from Centraal. The studio flat is spacious 32sqm with a King Size bed, Cable TV, fast WiFI, washer/dryer, desk space and use of screen, mouse and keyboard if needed. No smoking inside.

name: Canal view suite in centre! (perfect location)
description:
Experience Amsterdam out of this stunning suite right in the heart of the historical centre!
This suite is located on the 3rd floor of a typical Dutch house, next to the Koepelkerk. (beautiful 17th century domed church, see picture)
Perfect view over the canal (Singel) from your bed!

It's fully renovated so everything is brand new and comfortable.
The new (prived) bathroom is equiped with a rainshower.
Only 10min. walk from the Central Station!
(Contact me for possibilities for 1 night)

name: Spacious modern bedroom w antique elements+parking
description:
Spacious private bedroom (5x5m2) in a modern apartment, ideally located in a green, quiet safe area near the water 'IJ', close to city centre, including (free) private underground parking space!
Shared luxurous bathroom with two Grohe showers: rainshower and jetstream plus a two-person bubble bath! Public transport to all directions at 3 minutes walking distance. Supermarkets, cosy restaurants, the famous Windmill 'Brewery 't IJ, the ARTIS-zoo, and many more attractions all at walking distance.

name: Private bedroom in a 17th century canal storehouse
description: It concerns a private bedroom in my apartment where I live. Towels  are provided, a black travel hairdryer is present. In the bedroom is a 40 inch flat screen. You can smoke tobacco or weed on the balcony.

name: Stylish two floor apartment in de Pijp
description: This stylish, spacious and bright two-floor apartment is located in the de Pijp neighbourhood in central Amsterdam, one of the city's trendiest areas. The house is a typical two-storied Amsterdam home. On the main floor, you will find a bright living room with an open kitchen that is fully equipped for cooking. The flat has a balcony that overlooks a green courtyard, perfect for sunny breakfasts. The spacious bedroom is located on the second floor together with a modern shower with a bath.

name: 5-min walk to Vonderpark, plus onsite bike rental
description:
Just a 5-minute walk from the Vondelpark, Hotel Espresso offers modern rooms with free WiFi. The Van Gogh Museum, Rijksmuseum, and Leidseplein with their many restaurants and clubs are all within 5 minutes.

Comfy, twin or double beds make it tough to get up early.
Tucked away from the tourist crowds, yet just a short stroll from all the action in the city centre.
PLEASE NOTE THAT THE CITY TAX WILL HAVE TO BE PAID SEPARATELY AT THE HOTEL AND IS NOT INCLUDED

name: Tranquil sanctuary near WTC
description: High ceiling open light area in tranquil neighborhood close to Schiphol and  easy access to AMS Central Station/ Utrecht/ Paris/ London/ Berlin with train.

name: Unique design loft
description:
You'll have a great time at this comfortable place to stay. Amazing Amsterdam experience! Top location - museum district, near Vondelpark.
Suitable for longterm, ask me for a discount.

name: Awesome stay near Vondel Park
description:
Amazing huge room in a lovely shared apartment, only shared with 1 person.

Only 1 mile from vondelpark

name: Appartement Amsterdam-West
description: This centrally located property is tastefully decorated. The apartment is located in Amsterdam West/De Baarsjes, on the second floor. It is a light house due to the amount of windows and comes with a separate kitchen, bathroom, bedroom and a spacious balcony (with lounge set) on the south/west. Because of this, there is sun until sunset from 13:00!

name: Prachtige ruime loft in monumentale school
description:
A characteristic apartment in a former lower school from 1900 in one of the nicest neighborhoods in Amsterdam!
It is a beautiful municipal monument with high ceilings and windows, lots of light, beautiful open kitchen and a bedroom on the mezzanine!
Great location: close to the Museum District, Vondelpark, Leidseplein, de Pijp and the Foodhallen. There are many shops, restaurants and cafes nearby but the street itself is nice and quiet. Easily accessible with public transportation, bike rental is around the corner.

name: Petit studio in Amsterdam city centre
description: From this perfectly located home base everything is within reach. In the middle of Amsterdam. In the heart of Jordaan, the district where everyone likes to come. A quiet place in busy Amsterdam.

name: The Lighthouse with Hot Tub
description:
A five-bed cottage of 65 m² with stairs leading to a unique second bedroom with a glass skylight and perfect views of our Dutch landscape. Large sliding doors on the ground floor open onto a private terrace with loungers and a private wood-fired hot tub next to it.

The Lighthouse is fully equipped, including two large bedrooms, a sofa bed in the living room, a full kitchen with oven, dishwasher and Quooker.

name: Spacious warm home (4 rooms) with roofterrace!
description: Bright and spacious family-apartment (120m2), centrally located near Vondelpark, Museums and Canals. The apartment has two big bed rooms and a large living room with an open kitchen, a roof terrace and a big balcony. There are two bicycles for kids, you can use for free. Our house is on the second floor (very quite and private) but situated in a lively neighbourhood full of shops, supermarkets, restaurants and bars.

name: Canals & Cocktails:  Canal view
description:
Welcome to Rosalia’s Menagerie, this modernized 17th-century canal house features a cocktail bar and six personally styled hotel rooms upstairs. Each a unique mix of style, charm and practicality.

Our three larger Canal View rooms (22m2) at the front of the building have king-sized beds with views over our lovely wide canal and en bathrooms with rain showers. All our Canal View rooms feature air-conditioning and white-noise machines to lull you to sleep.

On the principal floor you will find our cozy little cocktail bar inspired by Dutch heritage with its rich history in the trade, distilling, and innovation. We look forward to sharing our passion for Jenever and great locally-made spirits with you, as well as, showcase extraordinary products from abroad.

Upstairs you will find “Rosalia’s Inn Upstairs”, our lovely little hideaway. With six lovely rooms overlooking either the canal or a fetching Amsterdam secret garden. We offer exceptional hospital

name: Ruim & lichtrijk appartement
description:
The hustle and coziness is around the corner, but as soon as you step into this spacious and bright apartment you will experience peace and quiet. The apartment features a large living and dining room and spacious kitchen where you can easily stay with four people. When the weather is nice, you can sit on the balcony with sun on the south🌞

There are 2 separate bedrooms with both a double bed. A bedroom can be reached via a staircase (see photo) and can be easily closed via a hatch.

name: Trendy & Comfortable Apartment
description: Discover Amsterdam from our stylish and comfortable apartment, ideally located in a quiet residential area near several lively areas. Within 5 minutes cycling you will reach the idyllic Vondelpark, the tasteful Foodhallen and the unique center. After a long day, you can unwind in our cozy apartment. Enjoy local restaurants, unique shops, and all the comfort our home has to offer. A perfect base to experience the city in style.

name: Grachtenappartement in centrum
description:
Just get away from it all in this soothing, centrally located accommodation. The apartment is located on the canal and is all about in all the comforts.
Within walking distance to all the highlights of Amsterdam. Close to metro and tram stops.

name: Cozy & Light-filled 2BR close to everything
description: Enjoy a tranquil experience at this carefully decorated home in a centrally-located place. As a frequent traveller & Airbnb host, I carefully crafted my home as a resting place after a busy day in the hustle and bustle but also a place to share with friends over dinner or hang out on the balcony. This is my way in giving back to others to enjoy this space while exploring the wonderful city of Amsterdam.

name: Cozy apartment with city view
description: Enjoy the days watching the city from the warmth of our home while we are away. See the Adam Tower from your bed, watch the sunrise from the living room and see the sunset over the city skyline and the IJ. Top location in the NDSM, direct ferry to central station every day all day long. Super market, shops, many events, restaurantes all around the corner.

You will have 3 super nice bedrooms, fantastic living room with the best kitchen and bar.

The garden is also very big and has 3 very good spots to sit in the sun the whole day!

You get free bikes (2 adults and option for 3 kids bikes) and free carparking at the driveway.

We have a friendly little cat

Start your day off with a Nespresso and effortlessly explore the centre, next to lively Westerpark and charming Jordaan. Perfect for people who want to discover Amsterdam in style. Welcome to your ideal base!

name: Light filled canal-side apartment in Amsterdam
description:
Gorgeous light filled treehouse canal-side apartment in the centre of Amsterdam with three balconies. Stunning views to the canal and park from the lounge and bedroom.
Our suburb Bos and Lommer is filled with great coffee, bars and restaurants.
Well located with 2min walk to 3 supermarkets, 5 minute walk to 2 different parks, tram, metro and bus all within 5minute walk. 15 minute bike ride to the main shopping/tourist district. And only 25 minutes by public transport from the airport.

description:
This unique accommodation has its own unique style.
via the two elevators or the stairwell, the property can be reached on the 5th floor. Upon entering, you immediately notice how wonderfully light the space is, with high ceilings. The studio is almost soundproofed and has underfloor heating and cooling.
The kitchen has an induction hob, refrigerator, convection oven, coffee maker and kettle.
a locked bicycle shed and caretaker make the complex comfortable and safe.

name: Lovely Amsterdam center apartment with balcony
description:
Experience the best of Amsterdam in this lovely modern city studio.
All of Amsterdam highlights reachable in 10 minutes.
The apartment has a wide balcony with sun from midday till the evening.

(No reservations for same day arrivals)

The diversity of the neighbourhood breathes young and old, endless creativity, smells and colours with a matching range of shops. BoLo (Bos en Lommer) is an inspiring district in Amsterdam-West, The SoHo of Amsterdam.

We recently renovated this former farm which is now a fully equipped luxurious home. It has a monumental status, which means that many of the historic features have been maintained, but with a modern touch.

Is has three bedrooms, two bathrooms, a brand new kitchen with all amenities (espresso machine, toaster, boretti stove, kitchen aid etc.), two living rooms (one downstairs, one upstairs including large television) and a large garden.

The house is also perfect to visit with kids.

Our house has a lovely garden with heaters on the terrace.

Space for 4 adults + 1 child

- Bedroom 4: single high bed

name: Very central cosy apartment
description: Super nice and practically laid out two-room apartment in the heart of Amsterdam! The apartment is located around the corner from De Hallen in a popular part of Oud-West. The lively neighborhood offers a variety of shops, cafes, and restaurants. Just around the corner from the flat is the Filmhallen cinema, a library, and various specialty shops and supermarkets. Jordaan, Ten Katemarkt are a 5-min walk away and the Vondelpark is a 10-minute walk. Public transport is located in front of the door.

name: Lovely bright and cozy apartment
description:
Nestled in the vibrant and historic Old West of Amsterdam, our charming apartment offers the perfect blend of comfort and convenience. Whether you're here for a romantic getaway, a cultural exploration, or a business trip, this is your ideal home away from home.
Prime Location: Situated in the heart of Amsterdam, you’ll be steps away from the city’s best attractions, restaurants, and shopping districts.

name: Bright apartment (+hottub) centrally in Amsterdam
description:
Centrally located in a neighborhood called "De Pijp", which is famous for its many bars, restaurants, the Sarphatipark and the Albert Cuyp market.
Due to its central location within minutes you'll be around the city.
Public transport around the corner.

It's a bright apartment on the second floor.
There's one bedroom, a bathroom with a hot tub including a TV and a separate toilet. Each room has a TV with a chromecast. The living room has a large sofa, an open kitchen and dining table.

Enjoy!

The Staatsliedenbuurt is a real working-class neighborhood with many options of restaurants, bars, (Wester)park and terraces. The city center can be reached by bike within 5-10 minutes.

name: Stadsappartement met balkon
description:
Welcome to our charming Airbnb room located in the heart of the Jordaan neighborhood in Amsterdam.

Around the corner is the famous Anne Frank House, you'll find yourself immersed in the rich cultural heritage of Amsterdam. The area is steeped in history, with picturesque canals and quaint streets waiting to be explored.

The tram station is located around the corner from the Airbnb. So there is quick and flexible access to the city center.

One of the highlights of this Airbnb is the balcony.

name: Oud-West Oasis
description: A charming and bright 2-room apartment in the heart of the vibrant Oud-West, close to the iconic Vondelpark. This apartment, built in 1901 and located on the first floor, is a perfect blend of historical charm and modern comfort. Picture this: a small balcony at the back, where you can sip your morning coffee while watching the world wake up. And in the living room, a French balcony that opens wide to let in the fresh air—perfect for lazy afternoons.

name: Amstel City B&B
description: Fresh and fashionable one bedroom apartment, sleeping up to four people, situated in the heart of Amsterdam close to the Rijksmuseum and the Rembrandtplein.

name: Rokin Apartment
description: Enjoy a stylish vacation in this downtown space.

name: Romantic Design Apartment City Centre
description:
Romantic Design Apartment is located in the heart of Amsterdam. Nestled right in the Centre between the main canals of Prinsengracht and Museum square lies this this authentic 17th centry Amsterdam house from the famous architect Philip Vingbooms.
The apartment has a wonderful NY feel and with a minimalist/modern style. It's kept simple and clean. The apartment is perfect for couples who are looking for a getaway as well for people who are here for business. We hope to welcome you soon!

name: Lovely 2 bedroom apartment in popular "de pijp"
description:
Our lovely apartment in the heart of the popular neighbourhood "de pijp" is on the first floor and has a little garden in the back. Right near the house you can find many shops, stores, bars and restaurants.

The whole house is animal and smoke free and is perfect for a couple. Also there is a baby box and crib for if you want to bring your child.

The kitchen is fully equipped with oven, microwave and espresso machine and the bathroom has a jacuzzi.

The ideal place for couples, solo and business travellers.
Great central location in a residential quiet street, just 30 min. from Schiphol airport by bus 397 and 17 minutes by tram17 from AmsterdamCS.

Enjoy a living room,  a balcony with sun in the evening, fully equiped kitchen, a separate bedroom, bathroom , and amenities like a dishwasher and laundry machine. Located in a peaceful neighborhood, this is the apartment I live in, ensuring a welcoming and well-maintained space perfect for your stay.

When entering the loft you notice that the ceiling is made of glass! Downstairs you have a huge livingarea with 2 relaxing sofa's and a huge table with chairs. Also here you find the entrance to the spacious garden which you share. Upstairs are two separated bedrooms with 2 double size beds, bathroom and 2 sinks.

Well connected by tram, train and by bike.

description:
Museums, thrift shopping, and stroopwafels — your Amsterdam experience begins at Park House. Each room includes a coffee maker, space to work, and an HDMI-equipped television for streaming. To unwind, we love the cozy lounge and calming garden terrace.

In the Oud-Zuid neighborhood, there’s plenty to discover. The iconic Rijksmuseum is home to the best of Dutch art. And Vondelpark hosts seasonal outdoor concerts at the Openluchttheater. Enjoy a picturesque stay at Park House.

name: Sonder Park House | Double Room
description:

In the Oud-Zuid neighborhood, there’s plenty to discover. The iconic Rijksmuseum is home to the best of Dutch art. And Vondelpark hosts seasonal outdoor concerts at the Openluchttheater. Enjoy a picturesque stay at Park House.

* 2 bedroom Loft

name: Sunny Apt in Amsterdam Old South
description:
Welcome to our bright, sunny one-bedroom apartment in Amsterdam Old South!

Enjoy morning and evening sunlight with views of a tranquil courtyard and the historic Olympic Stadium.

Conveniently located near a bus stop with direct routes to Schiphol Airport (22 min) and Leidseplein (13 min). Just an 8-minute bike ride to Vondelpark and Amsterdamse Bos, and 8 minutes to Station Zuid.

Our apartment offers modern amenities, high-speed Wi-Fi, a fully equipped kitchen, and a cozy atmosphere.

name: floating studio nescio

Private Water studio Nescio on a private luxury houseboat. Not far from city center on a unique water and forrest side with great panoramic views.
15 minutes walk from the subway station "Noorderpark" 1 stop from Amsterdam central station. If you rent bikes at a bike rental you can bike in 13 minutes to the ferry (IJplein) who will to central station with you bike.

Perfect for families with children

(MORE AND BETTER PHOTOS WILL FOLLOW)

name: Charming duplex near Vondelpark
description:
Spacious house in the vibrant west of the city, close by the vondelpark. The street is quiet and well connected with public transports. The center of the city is less than 10 mins by bike.
The house has its own entrance, a nice open kitchen with its balcony, a guest room (double bed), a master bedroom (king size bed) and a large roof terrace to enjoy the sunny days. The house is well equipped and furnished to feel like home so you just have to drop your luggage and start enjoying your stay!

description:

Located in a vibrant neighbourhood in the east, close to the Dappermarkt, Flevo- and Oosterpark and with an amazing variety of cozy cafes & bars on your doorstep. With great public transport connections, for busses, trams as well as trains.

The apartment has a spacious bedroom, cozy living room, newly renovated kitchen, bathroom and separate toilet. The bedroom has a queen size bed and the sofa can be turned into a double bed.

name: Rembrandt center suite
description: The Rembrandt suite, located on our second floor, caries Class with 18th century antiques, without missing all the modern amenities you’d like when on holiday. High-end design, Right in the middle of the historical center, with famous canals right at your doorstep. The Enlightened House is located in a world heritage building. Renovated in detail to meet today’s highest comfort standards with a Jacuzzi tub, 4k smart-tv, a minibar and more extras alike.
