The brand new large room with ensuite bathroom is spacious, bright and decorated by an interior designer. It has a lounge corner with nespresso machine and tea, a mini-fridge, and a (small) desk. Your bathroom has a large shower, big wash-basin, and toilet.
The room is close to the centre of Amsterdam, in a quiet street so you can get a good night's sleep if you want, and in the area (5 min walk) you'll find lots of restaurants (also vegan), shops, parks, and a place to rent bikes.

name: Loft Leidsegracht - Private studio
description: The lively Leidse square area has plenty of bars, restaurans and nightlife suitable for all ages and budgets. Close to the Loft is the famous Vondelpark and cultural attractions like the Rijksmuseum, Van Gogh Museum, and the Stedelijk Museum.

name: Follow you heart in Amsterdam Terrace, 4 ppl
description:
Our well-situated condo is your perfect escape plan in every situation! Located next to fancy and food-to-go restaurants, you can order your food till 23:00, chill on the terrace and enjoy the beautiful views over Amsterdam. Just around the corner of the Vondelpark, the greenest area in Amsterdam.

Cozy apartment with access to a terrace for up to 4 people near Amsterdam city center.

name: Lovely bedroom available in AMS
description: This stylish place to stay is perfect for single or couple travellers looking for comfortable, clean, convenient place to stay.

name: Luxueus appartement Amsterdam Zuid
description: No description

name: Design Studio One
description:
This designed and comfortably furnished room Studio One is located in the bustling downtown area of Amsterdam in a 17th century monumental canal house on the Leidsegracht.
The studio has its own entrance and offers a lot of privacy.

name: Appartment in Old West (Oud-west) Amsterdam
description: My comfortable appartment is situated in the cozy district Oud-West (Old West) which is known for its cafes and restaurants. The appartment itself is located next to the Vondelpark in a quiet street. It’s centrally located, 1 minute walk from Vondelpark and 10 minute bike ride to the city centre/Grachtengordel. The tram is around the corner (Rhijnvis Feithstraat) which is a 6 minute ride to Leidseplein.

name: Trendy apartment in Amsterdam Oud-West
description:
The apartment is located in the trendy neighborhood Amsterdam Oud-West, this is within walking distance of the Vondel Park, the center of Amsterdam and many other nice neighborhoods. It is a classic style Amsterdam building, renovated with modern interior design.

This unique place has clean decor, beautiful lighting and
high-quality furniture. The apartment is spacious and it's easy to escape the the city while staying within walking distance of several of Amsterdam's highlights.

name: Hotel Not Hotel Amsterdam: Mrs de With
description: The reason for a second room for the De Withs is the hurricane-like force with which mister De With snores. When he’s in good shape and sober there’s nothing to worry about, but give the man a little cold, or two beers, and he’s rumbling like a bear. To prevent complaints from other guests a big red flashing alert will be placed on the website whenever the couple makes a reservation. A sort of weather alarm if you will…
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: The Isac, a luxurious getaway!
description:
Stay in a luxurious suite with private bathroom, part of a charming canal house located in a quiet area right in the middle of the heart of Amsterdam.

You'll have a private entrance that takes you to your stylish and relaxed bed- and bathroom!
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Hotel Not Hotel Ams: The Blue House Upstairs
description: This room is the permanently temporary result of different stages of evolution, inspired by the ever-changing nature of the hotel. Several houses have been altered or reconstructed over the last years, The Blue Room being one of them.
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Danish design ground floor apartment + cosy garden
description:
Central, stylish apartment tastefully furnished with designer furniture, a lush garden, and a fully equipped kitchen, all just 10 minutes from Amsterdam's center. Enjoy picking fresh herbs & vegetables from the garden!

The bedroom features a spacious 1.60x2.10 meter bed with a comfortable Auping mattress for a restful sleep.

Located in the vibrant De Baarsjes neighborhood, you'll find charming cafes, shops, and bakeries around the corner. This home is the perfect base for exploring Amsterdam!
amenities: ['Private backyard – Fully fenced', 'Outdoor furniture', 'Coffee maker: espresso machine', 'Outdoor dining area']

name: Beautiful room Authentic Amsterdam bed & breakfast
description:
Beautiful room in the peaceful "Amsterdamse School" Style neighbourhood.
Close to everything Amsterdam has to offer and next to the RAI congress building.
Perfect for RAI visitors and tourists.
The apartment is on the second floor with windows all
around.
The private bedroom has a double bed 160x200cm.
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: COZY ROOM ★ 17TH CENTURY CANAL HOUSE ★ CITY CENTER
description:
(UNDER NEW MANAGEMENT SINCE JUNE 2020)

If you want to get everything out of your stay in Amsterdam, you should stay in this room/studio! It's located in the middle of the city centre very close to a lot of tourist attractions! You will stay in a room at the back of the house. There is a small space with a shower and toilet. I am sure you will have a great time during your stay here!

The two comfortable single beds can be placed next to eachother or separated!

name: Mooi appartement in Amsterdam Oost
description: Beautiful and bright apartment in the cozy Transvaal neighborhood in Amsterdam East.

name: Betoverend verblijf in Amsterdam
description: Our tastefully decorated apartment from 1906 in the heart of Amsterdam, combines historic allure with modern comfort where you feel right at home. With large windows overlooking the canal, natural light creates a warm atmosphere in the living room. The kitchen is complete and ideal for delicious meals after a day exploring. The cozy bedroom and modern bathroom with two rain showers offer all the necessary comforts for a pleasant stay. On a walking distance, you'll find famous landmarks.

name: Spacious family house with sunny garden
description: Spacious fully equiped (4 bedroom, 2 bathroom) ground floor, family home with sunny south facing terrace and garden. Situated in the vibrant Baarsjes are you will find many restaurants, shops, a food market and bars at your doorstep. Parks, city centre and public transport at walking distance.
amenities: ['Outdoor furniture', 'Bathtub', 'Children’s books and toys', 'Children’s dinnerware', 'Board games', 'Outdoor dining area', 'High chair']

name: Sustainable home with lush garden in trendy Noord
description: Welcome to our modern family home, blending city comfort with natural beauty! With 108 m² space and a lush garden and shared courtyard, it's perfect for couples or families. Explore trendy Amsterdam-Noord, hop on the ferry to the city centre (20 mins), or head to the picturesque countryside (5 mins). Inside, find a fully-equipped kitchen, dining area, and TV lounge. Upstairs, relax in the master bedroom or use the study. Experience city life or nature's tranquility — our home offers both!
amenities: ['Free washer – In unit', 'Private backyard – Fully fenced', 'Outdoor furniture', 'Board games', 'Outdoor dining area', 'Baking sheet']

name: Private Room / Modern Apartment
description:
Welcome to your private room close to the city centre, located in the trendy east with great access to public transport.

- small and cosy room
- renovated
- shared bathroom
- double bed
- first floor (few steps / broad stairway)
- clean
- 10 min to centre by tram/train
- very safe neighbourhood
- tea & mini-fridge

* NO KITCHEN or living room access

Great for single travellers or couples (no party people)

name: Family house 160m2 - Vondelpark - Zuid
description:
This family house has everything for a comfortable stay in Amsterdam. It’s situated in a small street only a 1 min walk from the Vondelpark. 160mr with garden. Within 3 minutes you’ll find a local bakery, coffeebars, restaurants and fancy spots. The house has been renovated in 2022. It has two livingrooms, 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms

We only rent it out to families of max 4 persons (2 adults and 2 kids under 10yrs) or to 2/3 adults. Or to a couple. We do NOT rent it out to a group of >3 adults
amenities: ['Free washer – In unit', 'BBQ grill', 'Bathtub', 'Children’s books and toys', 'Children’s dinnerware', 'Board games', 'Outdoor dining area', 'High chair']

name: Penthouse with idillic view
description: Relax in this unique, restful place to stay and enjoy everything Amsterdam has to offer. The house has a view of the water and the forest, but is also close to the metro (15 minutes walk from Noorderpark metro station). Discover the characteristic Amsterdam Noord or take the metro or ferry to the city center. The house has all the comforts. Private roof terrace, parking space and private toilet for Airbnb guests. You will share the bathroom and kitchen with us, Marnix and Marieke

name: Spacious & light 3-room apartment in Rivierenbuurt
description: Find in the peaceful but central Rivierenbuurt this spacious and light 55m2 apartment perfect for a couple. Including a bedroom, a separated home office and a balcony to enjoy your morning coffee.

name: Charming apartment near Rembrandt and Vondelpark
description:
Lovely, sunny, apartment is in quiet location in a cozy, hip neighborhood "De Baarsjes" within the Amsterdam ring with variety of trendy cafes and restaurants around. Located right between Rembrandtpark and Vondelpark and 10-15 min bike distance from the city centre.
Perfect for a couple or couple with a child.

name: Hidden Gem Studio in De Jordaan
description:
Hidden Gem on Quiet Bloemstraat: Charm & Convenience in Amsterdam!

Seek refuge on the peaceful Bloemstraat in the middle of the Jordaan area, home to Amsterdam's oldest cafe, and yet steps away from the city's vibrant heart! Like the 9 streets for shopping and Anne Frank house on a stone throw away. This charming studio offers a unique blend of quiet charm and convenient access to all Amsterdam has to offer.

name: Sleeping in a Church - Compact Room at BUNK
description: After just minutes on the free ferry from Central Station, you’ll find Amsterdam’s true north. This up-and-coming neighbourhood is alive and kicking, bursting with cultural hotspots. At the centre of the neighbourhood’s social life there was always the Saint Rita church. Now that it is home to Bunk Amsterdam, this still holds true. Locals and travellers alike come to catch some rays on our terrace, sticking around for an affordable dinner and some free cultural nourishment.

name: Dubbel kamer, ontbijt is inbegrepen.
description:
From this charming accommodation located in the `Rosse neighborhood' you can reach popular shops, restaurants and bars in no time. Just an 8-minute walk from Central Station. Paid parking is 10 minutes away.
We are happy to help our guests with their plans and provide them with all the information for a pleasant stay in our beautiful city.

Breakfast included.

name: Private Vacation Apartment #4 in ArtHotel by metro
description: Conveniently located 50m away from the metro, our colorful ApartmentHotel is set in a thriving creative community just on the outskirts of the city. Within biking distance to several beautiful parks and a quick metro ride into the downtown area, our location makes it easy to take advantage of all the cool things our vibrant city has to offer, whether it's art, nature, history, or nightlife!

name: Great design at the park & lake.
description:
Wonderful apartment with a wide view.
All my guests had wonderful times.
15 mins by tram to Central Station.
Take a break from the busy center; stroll in the park, swim in the lake or chill on the couch. See my reviews.
I love good communications! I get lots of requests so please make an effort in your first message. Tell me about yourself, your travelling guests, your plans for your trip.

Morris the cat lives with me. He is fond of humans. Please feed him & take good care of my best friend.

name: Ruim familiehuis A'dam met gratis parkeerplek
description:
Spacious and bright family house in Amsterdam with nice garden near the water. Located in the quiet neighborhood of IJburg. And within 15 minutes by public transport at Amsterdam Centraal to discover bustling Amsterdam.

The space
Spacious house of 145 m2, spread over 3 floors, with a 3.2 m high ceiling in open kitchen and living room. 3 bedrooms with 1 king bed and 2 double beds. 2 toilets and 1 bathroom with bath and shower.

Registration number
0363 6E45 3F5A 630F 8F4C

name: Cozy duplex in Amsterdam East
description:
Relax with your family and friends in our beautiful duplex in Amsterdam East.

We are 1 minute away from the tram stop that takes 20 mins to Amsterdam Centraal station, where all the main attractions are.

Our 100m sq. 2 bedroom apartment has a patio in the ground floor and a balcony on the first floor; it accommodates up to 4 adults and 1 child (a cot can be provided); and you will be surrounded by parks, canals, supermarkets and a port full of restaurants.

Discover Amsterdam from our home!
amenities: ['Free washer – In unit', 'Outdoor furniture', 'Blender', 'Bathtub', 'Outdoor dining area']

name: NEW! Super cozy Amsterdam mini-loft: NachtMuseum
description: WELCOME! Super cozy loft-like space (34 m2) in Amsterdam Centre East! The private studio is part of our home, a converted industrial building in a great neighborhood. Your space has its own, separate entrance along the footpath to the park. You do not have to share anything. Downstairs area features a modern version of a Dutch closet-bed with a big, comfy double bed. On the mezzanine level 2 extra beds. Ideal for 1-3 people or families up to 4 (max).  FREE PARKING on premises (on request).

name: Numa | Modern apartment near Vondelpark
description: This comfortable apartment with one bedroom offers 32 sqm of space. Ideal for up to two people, its double bed (180x200) and modern bathroom with bathtub make this stay a perfect way to experience Amsterdam. There’s also a sofa, a kitchen and a dining table, so you’ll have everything you need for maximum comfort and minimal stress.

name: Comfortable 2 bedroom apartment in Amsterdam
description: Enjoy a comfortable stay in a privileged location, next to the famous Vondelpark. Stay at the Catalonia Vondel Amsterdam hotel, where you can, if you wish, have breakfast at our incredible buffet, eat at the Joost restaurant or have a drink at the Gastrobar. You will stay in one of the best areas of Amsterdam, in a building with Dutch architecture. The apartment has 2 large bedrooms, a bathroom and a living area with a sofa, electric fireplace and Smart TV with Chromecast.

name: Nieuw! Tiny house in Amsterdam aan het water.
description: A super nice Tiny house in Amsterdam that has just been built with all amenities. The tiny house is in the garden and this garden is located on the water. The house is located on one of the most beautiful streets in Amsterdam,  a dike with a view of the IJ. It is a very green area and yet a 10-minute bike ride to the center of Amsterdam. Free parking.

name: Heerlijke woning in  Amsterdam
description: This child-friendly double downstairs house in Amsterdam's trendy Baarsjes district offers the perfect combination of city life and comfort. With two bedrooms with two beds, one kitchen, two toilets, a bathroom with shower and bathtub, a cozy living room and a huge private garden, you have all the space you need. Enjoy the lively atmosphere of the neighborhood, full of fun coffee shops and so much more!
amenities: ['Private backyard – Fully fenced', 'Outdoor furniture', 'Blender', 'Bathtub', 'Free dryer – In unit', 'Children’s dinnerware']

name: NEW! Roof terrace apartment in Jordaan Area!
description: If you are looking for a spacious and stylish apartment with a super large roof terrace then this is your spot! The apartment is located super populair oldern south area of Amsterdam and is within a 5 minute walk from the museumsquare with the van gogh and rijksmuseum. You will feel like a local living in the famous Jordaan neighborhood with most city hotspots within walking distance. The apartment is located on the 4th floor, so you do have to climb some stairs, but the after this workout you c

name: Stolpboerderij, landelijk Amsterdam met grote tuin
description:
Wonderful spacious & completely renovated, rural and unique farmhouse with huge garden and beautiful unobstructed views located in the beautiful Waterland.
Quiet, rural but also very close to Amsterdam.
Hiking, biking and water sports are steps away. (IJmeer).
Garden, (over 30 x 10 m) with various seats and terraces and hammocks. Ideally suited for family holidays!
We only rent to families

name: Lovely central district apartment
description: In the historic heart of the city, a small street full of lovely plants will offer you a relative quiet space after your adventures in the city!  Your apartment is spacious, light, authentic, homely and at a prime location. You’ll love my place because of the green, lovely street, with most attractions at walking distance.  In addition you are also just around the corner from public transport. A perfect place for couples, solo adventurers and business travelers.

name: Monument Building Top Floor
description: Central apartment 2 minutes away from Amsterdam Central Station, close to everything in the city center, few minutes walking distance from Dam Square and from the most beautiful area of Amsterdam 1 minute walking from the beautiful canals. Amazing apartment in a monument building from XVII century at the top floor with view to one of the main arteries of Amsterdam.

name: Colorful and beautiful home in the Jordaan!
description: Welcome to this beautiful and colorful home located in the heart of the Jordaan, one of Amsterdam's most picturesque and vibrant neighborhoods. The historical building anno 1932 is surrounded by charming narrow streets and canals and gives you a a quintessential Amsterdam experience. This quiet and serene home makes it a very special retreat for solo travelers, couples, or business travelers looking to experience the vibrant energy of the city while enjoying a comfortable and inviting space.

name: Luxury Townhouse with Canal View & Private Patio!
description:
Luxurious two story townhouse suite welcomes up to 4 persons.
One Master bedroom suite with Large Bed for 2 persons.
Second Bedroom with 2 single beds.
Full kitchen, Large Living Room with Dining Table, Flat screen TV with NetFlix. Computer Desk & Free Wi-Fi, Canal view balcony & private Patio.
Very close to famous fashion 9 Streets shopping district, Anne Frank's house, Museums, Kings palace, City Nightlife & Coffee shops. Direct connection to and from Schiphol Airport and Central Station.
amenities: ['Free washer – In unit', 'Private backyard – Fully fenced', 'Outdoor furniture', 'Canal view', 'Free dryer – In unit', 'Children’s dinnerware', 'Outdoor dining area']

name: Private room at the  KNSM island Amsterdam
description: A beautiful quiet apartment on KNSM island with beautiful water views from a large balcony. So enjoy the tranquility of the city to the fullest. No through traffic! And still within 10 minutes in the city center bus 43 Centraal Station and tram 7  to the Leidseplein or Museumbuurt. A large bedroom offered for max. 2 people,  very nice bathroom with bath and steam shower and toilet!

name: Stylish private studio Center/Jordaan with garden
description: A lovely private studio (27m2) in the heart of Jordaan, a beautiful & cosy neighbourhood in Amsterdam. Enjoy your own stylish studio with a little garden decorated with a lot of love and care. With an old terrazzo flooring that was used once this studio was still a little shop in the old days. Close to the famous Northern Market, Anne Frank House, many restaurants, Haarlemmerstraat, the canals and all Amsterdam has to offer. 15 minutes walking from Central Station. Be welcome!

name: Cozy 3 BRM -Close to Park and Museums
description: Lovely fully furnished, bright 2 floor apartment on the best location of Amsterdam in chic Oud Zuid!  5 minute walk to the Vondelpark and Museumplein (Van Gogh, Rijksmuseum).  Easy access with line 2 to Central Station and the 397 bus from Schiphol airport. Amsterdam Registration number: Z/22/2047971

name: 60m2  free parking, close center
description: Just get away from it all in this soothing, centrally located accommodation.

name: App+rooftop, 2 min. from Vondelpark
description:
I had to replace my old advertisement (to become a primary host), which caused me to lose all my reviews. My old reviews can be found among the photos of the advertisement.
About my apartment:
Recently renovated apartment for rent in a typical Amsterdam house for up to 4 guests. Situated in the quiet & safe residential 'Helmersbuurt' neighborhood. Just a 2 minutes walk from the Vondelpark & 10 minutes from the city center, canals and museums.

name: Private Artist BwithoutB light, spacious & clean!
description: This spacious and very charming very private light artist - atelier bed-without-breakfast is located on the second floor of our 19th century building in what is known as a very 'gezellige' street. The place is part of our building but has it's own entrance. You can use the place to sleep, to chill, to compose music, to do yoga, to paint, we can provide materials on request. The neighbourhood has lots of nice cafe's and restaurants and is only 5 minutes away from leidseplein & vondelpark!

name: Cosy apartment in center of Amsterdam
description: This apartment is located in the center of Amsterdam on the canal site, with own entrance and private bathroom with shower. There is no kitchen, but there is the possibility to make some food. This 1-bedroom apartment is part of our family home, with complete privacy (day & night) during your entire stay. It is easy to reach the Amsterdam Central Station, Schiphol Airport and other places with public transport. Please note that the apartment is on the 4th floor and SMOKING IS NOT ALLOWED.

name: Private canal view apartment - bright & spacious
description:
Airy first floor apartment, with balcony overlooking the canal. Situated in the charming Jordaan area and on the edge of Oud-West and trendy 'nine-streets'.

You will enjoy this spacious private home, with modern decor and all the facilities you will need to have a memorable trip in Amsterdam. If you are a couple or solo traveler looking for a relaxed place to stay in Amsterdam this is your spot!

name: Modern Studio in Central location
description: This is a new studio apartment in a renovated building. I would like to share it with other travellers every time I go away on my holidays. It's located in a beautiful neighborhood just 10mins away from the train station.You can truly experience a local life when you stay here

name: Cozy Private Room in a Monumental Building in Dam
description: Explore the beauty of Amsterdam from the best starting point located at the heart of the city center. This private room is located only a few meters away from Dam square and offers a unique experience to live in a well-preserved heritage building, next to the  Nieuwe Kerk (new church), Royal Palace, the National Memorial Statue, and Madame Tussauds wax museum. Discover the city and almost all of the top destinations of the town within a few minutes due to its accessible location.

name: Gezellig en licht appartement in Amsterdam-Oost
description: Perfect place to stay during a few days in Amsterdam. By public transport you are quickly in the city center and walking you can enjoy Amsterdam-Oost, the most fun district of Amsterdam. You will find many restaurants, shops and cafes within walking distance. Around the house it is nice and quiet. There is a cat living in the house. He is super sweet and chill and can just go outside. So you don't have to pay attention to him. Only refill his tray when it's empty.

name: The Old Canal House: studio, right in center !
description:
Studio,with your own bathroom and kitchenette, view on oldest canal of Amsterdam.
Kitchenette,to make your own breakfast. Cooking not possible.
Guests can indicate whether they want a double bed or two singles.
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Private mews studio near Vondelpark & Museums
description:
Situated in a private mews, our recently refurbished studio offers a comfortable home within walking distance of the Museum Quarter (Rijks, Van Gogh and Stedelijk Museums), Vondelpark & Leidseplein

Sleeping up to two guests, the studio is ideal for your leisure or business stay in the centre of Amsterdam

We are a Lhbtiq+ friendly household

name: Prachtige woning in Westerpark
description: This unique place is located in one of the best neighborhoods of Amsterdam: Westerpark. The spacious and stylish house has all the comforts, adjoins the Westerpark Nature Park and is still only a 10-minute walk from the Center and the Jordaan. The park is great for walks, cycling, culture, museums, food and drinks.

name: Fantastisch familiehuis met parkeerplek en tuin
description:
Design house special for families
The house is located on Cruquiuseiland- next to swimming water (including supplank) and around the corner is a supermarket and beer brewery with a lovely terrace. Within 20 minutes you are everywhere in Amsterdam - by bike, car or public transportation.
Kid friendly home with crafts, indoor and outdoor toys for all ages

name: Apartment 4 min walk from Vondelpark
description: No description

name: Modern 2-level apt with garden in lively area
description: This modern and spacious two level 90 m2 apartment with garden makes for a comfortable stay in the lively Amsterdam-Oost neighbourhood, which is very popular with locals due to it's cozy cafes, fine restaurants, parks and the Dappermarket. The tram to the city centre is within a 2 minute walk.

name: Appartement in hartje Amsterdam
description: Experience our sunny apartment in the heart of Amsterdam, ideally located at Oostenburgerpark! With a sunny balcony to relax on and a comfortable bedroom for restful nights, this apartment is perfect for your stay. Enjoy a beer at Brouwerij 't IJ under Amsterdam's largest windmill. Top restaurants like Coulisse and Trattoria Breda are within walking distance, as well as several supermarkets. In short, this apartment offers the perfect combination of vibrant city life and serene park tranquility!

name: The most colourful apartment in Amsterdam
description: A colorful paradise. If you like a vibrant, refined style you've come to the right place. A king-size bed from COCO-MAT topped with crispy sheets from Tekla. The best sleep in Amsterdam is guaranteed. Bright orange blinds adjust light exposure according to your mood. A blue-tiled walk-in shower where you can enjoy the feeling of natural rain. A kitchen equipped with high-end kitchenware, such as a cooktop BORA, oven, dishwasher AEG, a retro SMEG fridge, and a Quooker water tap.

name: Generator - Private 4 bed Room
description: Stay in our Private 4-Bed Room at Generator Amsterdam, featuring 2 bunks (4 beds) and a private bathroom, ideal for small groups or families. Each bunk is equipped with a light, personal shelf, USB charging station, and under-bed lockers for secure storage. Pillow, duvet, and linen are all provided for your comfort. Towels are available at reception for a small fee. Enjoy the privacy and convenience of this comfortable room designed for a relaxing stay.

name: Appartement familial et cosy
description:
This peaceful accommodation offers a relaxing stay for the whole family.
It features two bedrooms and a comfortable convertible sofa bed.
Fully equipped, the apartment is ideal for families looking for comfort and tranquility in a residential area close to the lively city center.
Important: we have a cat in the apartment, so please let us know if this is a problem and we'll find a solution together to look after it during your stay.

name: NDSM Amsterdam North, for families
description:
Just 20 minutes from Amsterdam Central Station and city with ferry. Amsterdam Noord is an upcoming area, where you'll find the EYE film museum, the NDSM and restaurants. House has modern facilities and 5 sleeping rooms. We only accept families, as this area is a family area

We also have an aquarium, that only needs some fish food every two days.

name: Perfect location, beautiful view
description:
With this centrally-located yet quiet apartment you can step right out of the door and explore the streets and canals of the Jordaan, as well as being minutes away from top attractions.

The apartment is spacious and bright. It has a bedroom with open bathroom, a separate WC, fully equipped kitchen and living room with projector. There is also a south-facing balcony you can relax on and admire the view of the Westertoren.

name: Nice apartment in center of Amsterdam
description: This apartment is located in the center of Amsterdam on the canal site, with own entrance and private bathroom with shower. There is no kitchen, but there is the possibility to make some food. This 1-bedroom apartment is part of our family home, with complete privacy (day & night) during your entire stay. It is easy to reach the Amsterdam Central Station, Schiphol Airport and other places with public transport. Please note that the apartment is on the 1st floor and SMOKING IS NOT ALLOWED.

name: Da Costa Suite
description: A wonderful and comfortable appointed suite with a beautiful view overlooking the “Da Costa” and “Jacob van Lennep” canal. The suite is ideal for couples or two friends searching for a peaceful and relaxed stay in Amsterdam. The suite is situated on the first floor and three large windows allow an abundance of natural light into the apartment. The suite is set in the neighborhood "Oud-West" and is just 10 minutes away from the famous canal belt and city centre. Hope to see you soon!!

name: Cosy house + garden close to Westerpark
description: No description

name: Zimmer in einem charmanten Grachtenhaus (32)
description:
Living where all Amsterdam people want to live. Cheerful bright room in a historic canal house. Close to many museums & the Rembrandsplein & yet wonderfully quiet. Private room: 1 bed or 2 beds (depending on booking), shower & toilet ensuite.

Room is part of a licensed guesthouse with a total of 6 rooms

name: Family home Amsterdam
description: Welcome to our cozy family home on Johan Herman Doornstraat 27! This charming home offers comfort and convenience for the entire family. Enjoy the spacious living room, fully equipped kitchen and cozy bedrooms. The sunny garden is perfect for relaxation and games. Located in a quiet neighborhood, close to shops, parks and public transport, this is the ideal base for your stay. Feel at home and enjoy an unforgettable time!

name: Our west side place in Amsterdam
description: Just get away from it all at this restful, centrally-located place. Our apartment is surprisingly spacious and feels very safe, quiet and cozy. It is a nice place in the neighborhood in West, which we very much appreciated, with good food, terraces, parks to enjoy or work. The bedroom is very quiet and from the kitchen and south-facing balcony you can sit all day. Around 5 pm until the sun sets you will see the city go by on the balcony in the living room. x

name: Modern bedroom (Living room not shared)
description: Cozy, double bedroom in the heart of Amsterdam East.

name: Private studio at souterrain with garden.
description:
2/3 person private room (32 m2) with sunny garden situated in quiet part of Amsterdam-west. The room is at the souterrain of our house and directly connected to the garden.
We charge for 3rd person 30 euro per night and arrange an extra bed.

Well accessible by car (free parking), bike and public transport, 25 minutes to centre of Amsterdam (Leidseplein) with tram no. 1.

name: Centrally located 2-bedroom apartment in Oud-West
description:
The apartment is located in the middle of the lively Ten Katemarket. That means a fresh bakery, fruits, vegetables and delicious to go meals, right in front of your doorstep!

Besides the Ten Kate market, the area is full of bars, restaurants (Foodhallen is highly recommended!) and Vondelpark within walking distance.

If you want go explore Amsterdam and surroundings, you'll find a lot of bike shops where you could rent a bike.

Late night check in possible for additional Fee!

name: Sunny apt. The heart of Amsterdam by Vondelpark
description:

There is a double bed for you and a separate couch to chill on. Outside there is a bench to enjoy your view even more! Very quiet at night, but only 15 bus minutes away from the centre! Breakfast is included and we don't charge cleaning cost.

This exclusive houseboat features 2 bedrooms and a large living room with a spacious seating area including a sofa bed and a flat-screen TV with cable channels. Free Wi-Fi access is available.

name: Cozy Apartment. Amazing location
description: A cute one bedroom apartment in one of the most popular neighbourhoods in town. On the edge of Vondelpark, a stone's throw from Leidseplein and the Jordaan, Oud-West is a leafy, lively area filled with great restaurants, excellent coffee and all the amenities you could wish for. Having been super hosts for years, we're getting back in the game. Expect fresh linens, soft towels, local treats and a bottle of something chilled on arrival. There is also a boat in the mix if you're up for it!

name: Cozy guest bedroom in Amsterdam-Noord
description:
Our home is located in Amsterdam-Noord. You can access Amsterdam Central by metro (20 mins), bus, bike (17 mins) or foot. This place is suitable for a couple or for a solo-traveler. The room has a desk and office chair and can be converted into an office if needed.

We have a 4-year old cat, Otis, and she doesn't travel with us, so she'll hang out with you.
Registration number: 0363 56D8 7A33 85B3 F9E6

name: RedLight District Private Smokers Friendly Studio
description:
Nestled in the bustling heart of the famous Warmoesstraat, our studio apartment is your ultimate gateway to Amsterdam's vibrant nightlife scene. Surrounded by a kaleidoscope of lively cafes, bars, and restaurants, every moment promises excitement and adventure right at your doorstep.

Step inside our cozy retreat, where relaxation meets convenience. While our amenities are basic, you'll find comfort in every corner, ensuring a pleasant stay as you recharge for your next adventure.

name: Bright Rooftop Apartment ~
description:
This bright and cosy apartment is located on the top floor. With 2 rooftop terraces with lounge and dining area you fully enjoy the sun. With a modern and cosy decor you'll feel right at home.

A fresh market (the dappermarket) around the corner, provides you with a nice with fresh produce and delicious snacks 6 days a week. You'll find loads of great eateries in the neighborhood of many different types of kitchens: Asian to Yemenite.

A place you will enjoy!

name: Cosy appartment Amsterdam West
description:
Dive into an apartment filled with color and eye for design. Cozy and equipped with every living comfort.

Everything is still very new (renovated in 2021) and is completely at your disposal!
amenities: ['Private backyard – Fully fenced', 'Blender', 'Free dryer – In unit', 'Baking sheet']

name: Backstage Hotel Twin/Double Room
description:
Backstage Hotel is the perfect start and end for your Amsterdam adventure! Close by, you'll find iconic music venues like the Melkweg, Paradiso, BourbonStreet, and Maloe Melo.

You can pick up a guitar and play! (just bring a little talent). If you feel like listening, you can borrow a record player and some records from our collection. All of our rooms are designed in a music theme. Take a look at our gallery!

This room is a perfect fit for 2!

*The Backstage hotel does not have an elevator.

name: Cozy full flat in Amsterdam West between 2 parks
description:
Beautiful 1 bedroom full apartment in Amsterdam West, in between two big parks, lots of local bars, restaurants, and grocery stores, direct tram to the city center, and peaceful neighborhood.

Strictly no parties, and no noise apartment.

name: Bright Apartment in City Center
description:
Welcome to our bright apartment in the center of Amsterdam, located on a small side street behind the famous Leidseplein.

We're situated between De Jordaan, Oud West and Vondelpark in a conveniently located side street. Just a short walk from plenty of restaurants, bars, shops, attractions, museums and public transport options (30 minutes from Schiphol Airport).

name: Happy Amsterdam huisje
description:
From this perfectly located home base everything is within reach.
Beautiful bright apartment , sunny house with a west facing balcony.

name: City Centrum 6
description: Enjoy easy access to everything from this perfectly located home base. Only six minutes from central station and five minutes from dam square

name: Appartement in Amsterdam-Oost
description: In our apartment you will experience tranquility but with the city close by. Cozy, stylish and with the possibility to work (fast wifi and workspace)

name: Licht, comfortabel appartement met dakterras
description: Very bright apartment with a spacious kitchen. 2 bedrooms and 1 bathroom including bath. On the (private) roof terrace, the sun shines all day. 3 minutes walk from the Noorderpark metro station, within 5 minutes you are at Amsterdam Central Station. The apartment is in a particularly beautifully renovated old school building, a unique location. In addition to all the highlights in the city center, there are also many nice spots in Amsterdam North: the NDSM wharf, Urban Winery Chatteau Amsterdam.
amenities: ['Free washer – In unit', 'Outdoor furniture', 'City skyline view', 'Board games', 'Outdoor dining area']

name: Gezellig appartement oud west!
description: No description

name: Gaaf appartement naast het park
description:
Welcome in my cool apartment, around the corner of the Jordaan and the Westerpark. 40m2 on the first floor of a building from 1885! It has been fully renovated in 2009 so its well-maintained. In this place you are sleeping on a Auping matras, a very comfortable dutch bed. Next to that the TV has a chromecast. Enjoy your stay!

At this moment I am only accepting people with reviews. Thanks.

name: Amsterdam, Zunderdorp
description:
Since we are going on vacation from August 7 to 30, it is our great preference for tenants to rent our house for at least 2 weeks!

Relax with the whole family at this peaceful, green accommodation. Beautiful walks, boating and cycling. The city of Amsterdam is within cycling distance. It's very important that you are cat lovers, we have 2 very sweet cats. We have plants in the house that need some water 2x per week! Lovely, green garden with garden house.

name: Cozy Private Apartment
description:
Make some memories at this unique and family-friendly place.
The accommodation is all yours during your stay for optimal privacy and space.Come and enjoy the Amsterdam life next to Erasmus Park


2 Terraces with a green view
Breakfast/Coffee and tea included
Wifi and television
Dishwasher and washing machine
Bicycle available for guests

As the property is situated in a quiet, family-oriented neighbourhood, parties and other disturbances are not permitted.

name: Mooi, nieuw, luxe appartement in hartje Amsterdam
description: Unique, cozy and stylish apartment with one bedroom and attached balcony terrace. Beautifully renovated with, open kitchen, living room and home office. Located in a prime location with cozy terraces, shops and restaurants, a 5-minute walk to the Vondelpark, and close to popular neighborhoods such as De Pijp, Museum square, Zuid, Central Amsterdam. The street is very peaceful, for a good night sleep. Enough parking spots, or spots to lock your bike. A great Amsterdam experience!

name: Spacious private appartment
description:
This spacious appartment is located in Amsterdam City Center, with many highlights closeby. The Utrechtsestraat, the canals, the Pijp, the Heineken Experience, all within 5 minutes walking! Although super central, the street is very quiet and peaceful.

The apartment is recently renovated and luxurious. The kitchen / livingroom has a great couch and a fully equiped kitchen, while the bathroom has a bath tub for a relaxed evening after a busy day in the city.

Reg. nr: 0363 D441 59E6 A6F6 209D

name: Hotel-like guesthouse Amsterdam Centre
description:
A stylish bedroom with ensuite bathroom in the authentic central Amsterdam neighbourhood "the Jordaan". My apartment is part of a 19th century canal house conveniently located right in front of the airport express bus station. This will be your unique Amsterdam experience staying in the historic centre of the city, just a walk away from the main attractions.

Be aware that the building has a steep and narrow staircase, and bringing big and heavy luggage pieces is not advised!

name: Modern studio on edge citycenter
description: Centrally located Studio 50 meters out of the city center. private entrance and private place.

name: Beautiful family home (Amstel)
description: Beautiful spacious and stylist (featured in Vogue Australia, Frame Magazine) family home next to the Amstel river. Within 5 minutes biking distance to the city and just a crossover away from the Amstel River  for a swim. One large bedroom and twee kids room (3 kids beds). A small and sereen little garden and hotel like bathroom with large bath and shower. Three toilets. Open kitchen and lounge area. Cafes and restaurants around the corner. Designed by the famous Dutch design duo Nicemakers.

name: Private home with garden in Amsterdam
description: Ground floor apartment with private garden located in the district of Betondorp, Amsterdam East.

name: Catalonia Vondel Amsterdam 4* - Executive Premium
description: Welcome to Catalonia Vondel Amsterdam! This hotel is perfect for people looking to explore what Amsterdam has to offer. It is very well located, just 300 meters from Vondelpark and Leidseplein, in one of the most important leisure and shopping areas of Amsterdam. The Executive Premium rooms are spacious, with high ceilings and very bright. They feature a reading chair, large desk area and bathroom with rain shower. Their size is 20m2.

name: City Center/Mini Suite on Houseboat Stunning View
description:
You stay in a private room on a houseboat overlooking the famous Prinsengracht. The boat is heated and warm in winter time. Look left and see the Westertoren, look right to Noordermarkt. 2 Minutes stroll from Anne Frank House. Boutique shops and trendy restaurants everywhere. While you are chilling on the comfortable bed; ducks, swans, boats and really everything that floats passes-by. Or take a deep relaxing bath after a day of strolling in the city!

The perfect hide-out for romantic couples.

name: Origineel overnachten op woonboot
description: Knus tiny house op het water. You will stay in the old skipper's house of a former cargo ship.

name: Generator -  Deluxe King
description: Experience comfort and style in our Deluxe King Room at Generator Amsterdam. Relax in a spacious king-sized bed while enjoying treetop views of Oosterpark. This room includes a private en-suite bathroom with a walk-in shower, fresh towels, and complimentary toiletries. A hair dryer is also provided for your convenience. Perfect for couples or solo travelers, our Deluxe King Room offers a peaceful retreat in the heart of Amsterdam, combining modern design with natural beauty.

description:
Experience the joys of this peaceful area while being close to the liveliness of Amsterdam.

Our spacious 3-bedroom house is situated in the trendy Northern part of the city. It is 1 metrostop away from the central station of Amsterdam and 10-15 minutes by bike & (free) ferry from the city center.

Our house is located opposite a nice chill park in a residential area without many tourists.

All utilities and amenities are included, so all you need to do is bring your suitcase!

name: Intimate studio
description: An intimate studio in quiet neighborhood  of Amsterdam. Less than 20 minutes away from Schiphol airport and Amsterdam Central station, The Dam square and most museums. The public transport is nearby, tramway,metro, train, and bus are about 5 and max 8 minutes from here.  You share the front door. There are three separate floors with separate doors with a lock.

name: Entire family home in Amsterdam
description:
Our unique spacious family home in Amsterdam Old West area is centrally located close to many transport links and within walking distance of the city centre.
Our home is spread out over 4 floors and provides fantastic spacious accommodation for your visit to Amsterdam. There is plenty of space for you to spread out over the 3 double bedrooms 2 living areas and large open plan kitchen diner.
In our very cosy garden you can dine alfresco or enjoy the sunshine with a glass of wine.

name: Great Houseboat in Amsterdam Centrum
description:
It is a spacious and comfortable place on a quiet canal. You can see ducks from the windows. Two bedrooms, one bathroom and a nice living room to enjoy. It is decorated in a modern style and peaceful colors.

The kitchen has all the appliances and a dishwasher. In the living room there is a comfortable sofa and TV with cable.

The two bedrooms are perfect for two couples, but it is possible to separate on of the beds in two twin beds.

name: Amazing 2-story canal house with private garden!
description: This sunny 2-story canal house is situated in the beautiful Oud-West neighborhood of Amsterdam. Situated on a canal, the 2-story canal house is a stylish, spacious place to call home during your stay. The house has 2 large bedrooms, a large bathroom, large kitchen and dining area and plenty of space to lounge and relax - both inside or outside in the private garden. The house is next to one of the cutest cafes in the area and the beautiful Vondelpark and museums are a short bike ride/walk away.

Enjoy the peaceful garden with bbq and soak up the sun on the small bench in front of the house. The bedroom is super quiet, with a large and comfortable bed (1.80m wide).

name: Stunning Apt. in the Jordaan
description: Welcome to our charming 2-bedroom apartment located in the heart of Amsterdam's Jordaan area. The apartment features a stylish interior with modern amenities, providing you with a comfortable stay during your time in Amsterdam. With its prime location, you'll have easy access to the famous canals, trendy shops, delightful cafes, and renowned attractions that Amsterdam has to offer. Immerse yourself in the authentic charm of Jordaan and make unforgettable memories during your stay in Amsterdam.

name: Amsterdam North Loft
description:
We welcome you to Amsterdam-Noord. The sunny side of the city and upcoming area.
My house is near to the centre of Amsterdam by bike , the NDSM art city, the Twiske lakes, and Waterland biking routes. Our place is good for single travellers who like to explore Amsterdam.
Near the house is the subway station Noord to the Central Station. There is a bike rent around the corner. Everything you need is at walking distance.
Check out the city & enjoy beautiful architecture​.

name: Sunny 2 bedroom getaway - green heart of Amsterdam
description:
Located in the heart of Amsterdam's hippest neighbourhood. Experience outside, inside, open the balcony doors and watch the bikes and trams pass by from in between the tree tops.
This is an ideal apartment for travellers that want to work remote as it features a stylish corner with an adjustable desk and monitor.
In for a drink or a bite? Across the street there is a cosy restaurant. In for a walk? Within a few steps you are at the entrance of the vibrant Sarphatipark.

name: Unique houseboat studio
description: A truly unique experience. A brand new, fully fledged studio apartment with ensuite bathroom, aboard a former freight ship turned into a houseboat. The KNSM Island is one of the hidden gems of Amsterdam, quiet and peaceful, but close to the city center. The sunsets are pretty spectacular as well.

name: Authentic Groundfloor studio loft apartment East
description:
Charming 1908 Bed & Breakfast groundfloor level private studio loft apartment (32m2), With microwave and water cooker as part of a larger house. The studio has been completely renovated in 2020.
The owners are living in the main house.
Center East is a lively neighborhood with a lot of unique local shops and restaurants, just outside the busy touristic traps.
All the city highlights; museums, parks, historical centre, central station are reachable in about 15 min. on bike or public transport.

name: Monumental penthouse with rooftop terras and bath
description:
Monumental bright penthouse with rooftop terras and bath, 10 min. walk from Leidse Plein

The bedroom has air-conditioning, an air-cleaning system, noise-canceling windows, and a kingsize bed.

Get work done on a 27inch screen and fast WiFi.

We can arrange anything for you, groceries or restaurant bookings. Freely use our bike to get around

Ten Kate market, plenty of nice restaurants, and (natural) winebars within 1 minute walking distance

A true gem in the popular neighborhood Oud-west

The flat is ~20 min away from Amsterdam Central Station by direct bus. It sleeps ideally 2, max 3 (if using the couch in the living).

name: Private Lovely Room Amsterdam Central
description:
Welcome to Beautiful Dutch House, monumental house just few minute walking from central station where you can feel very homely and enjoy the Amsterdam experience.
Very typical for Amsterdam, the bedroom is tiny and the space has been very economically used. In your room, you will find a double bed, coffee/tea facilities, space to hang your clothes, a fresh bathroom with rainshower, tv with netflix access and free wifi.
Location of the apartment is perfect to rech all touristic place .

Welcome to our beautiful renovated apartment (136 m2) in the bustling district of De Pijp!

Located in the quiet Gerard Doustraat, this luxurious apartment is located on the 4th floor. It has all the comforts and is therefore ideal for a comfortable city trip in Amsterdam!

B & B “De 9 Straatjes” welcomes you to your ‘home away from home’.

Located in a monumental historic building in the middle of the famous Jordaan and nine shopping streets. It’s situated in the lively city center of Amsterdam offering a diversity of brown pubs, restaurants and boutiques in the direct area. B & B “De 9 Straatjes” is the most excellent location for a city trip.
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Light, Vondelpark-view apartment
description:
THE CENTRAL PARKING FEE IN AMSTERDAM!

This apartment is right on the Vondelpark. It is a tastefully decorated, 3-room apartment with 2 balconies and great views over the Vondelpark with the skyline of the Zuidas in the background.
 
The balcony to the rear of the house is directly on the Vondelpark. The bedroom at the rear of the house also overlooks the park. From your bed you can see the trees and plants, and in the morning you can hear the birds whistling.

name: Amsterdam centre share house
description:
My place is close to Amsterdam city centre friendly, share house 3 floor Central heating , within 13 min. distance to the Amsterdam city centre and Dam Square (by tram) and 3 min biking to the beach. Shops, restaurants, and bars are within walking distance.
American bulldog accompanies the people living in the house. You’ll love my place because of the light, the kitchen, the comfy bed, the coziness, and the high ceilings. My place is good for couples, business travelers, and big groups.

name: Groundfloor 2bdrm apartment next to Vondelpark
description:
This spacious ground floor apartment is located next to the iconic Vondelpark, making it the perfect place for a couple or a small family, 1 child who want to be close to all city's highlights. The apartment offers plenty of room: two bedrooms (one for child), a large living area with views into the garden.

But the real highlight of this apartment is its location. You'll be just a short walk away from some of Amsterdam's best restaurants, cafes & shops, as well as world-famous museums.

name: Cozy Appartement  Canal View Old West City Centre
description:
This beautiful appartement in the middle of Old-West is located in a quit street in the middle of Amsterdam. You have an exceptional view on the characteristic canals of Amsterdam.

Numerous restaurants, musea are a walk or a bike ride away. If you're looking for the nightlife both Leidsche and Rembrandt square are right around the corner.

The appartement has everything you need to make it your home during your stay.

Come discover the many adventures Amsterdam has to offer!

name: Renovated 3-bedroom apartment with huge garden
description: Welcome to Amsterdam West! Your family will be close to everything when you stay at this centrally-located place. We are surrounded by fantastic restaurants, cafes, bakery’s and shops! You can walk to the famous Kinkerstraat and easily cycle to the center in 7 to 10 minutes. The supermarket is 10 mins walking distance. We have a bicycle rental next to the house and the tram is 2 min walking distance (: the street is very quiet and our neighbours are mostly locals.

Enjoy proximity to the city center, parks, markets, and an array of restaurants including Fort Negen bakery, Thai Thai Poppetje, Benji’s, and Kauffman. Convenient tram access just 150m away provides a quick 12-minute journey to Amsterdam Central Station.

name: Penthouse De Pijp

Light top floor apartment with sunny spacious balcony on the south. My apartment is in the middle of de Pijp, an area with lots of restaurants. Also it is very near the Museum square. The neigbourhood has just been upgraded to a sustainable area without cars.
I have room for two people, since my apartment is 51 square meter.
Mind you that you have to climb lots of stairs, we dont have an elevator.

Located between Rembrandtpark and Sloterplas, with Vondelpark a 5-minute bike ride away. Close to supermarkets, cafes, and shops, and within walking distance to Lelylaan and Postjesweg metro stations.

There’s also a kitchen and a dining table, so you’ll have everything you need for maximum comfort and minimal stress.

description:
Room on the 4th floor. Two shared full bathrooms among a maximum of six people including myself. Steep Dutch stairs. Prime location. Albert Cuypmarket (3 min walk).
Heineken Experience (11 min walk). The Rijksmuseum, Van Gogh Museum, Rembrandt House, the world's only floating flower market ~ Bloemenmarkt are within walking distance. A bit further is Anne Frank House. Near public transportations, supermarkets and restaurants. 20 minutes from Central Station. Breakfast & snacks no longer served.

Btw, my cats are currently not around as they are vacationing long term in France!

Indische buurt (Indian Neighbourhood) is the upcoming area in Amsterdam. Of the last couple of year the area upgraded immensly. Now is filled with activity, coffee bars, nightlife and still the same relaxed atmosphere.

On walking distance of the lively Java street. Trainstation Muiderpoort is a 5 minute walk. Local transportation is nearby as is a bicycle rental.

description:
Be welcome in this lovely and airy private room with private bathroom in the lovely 'Oud West' neighbourhood. The bed is huge and comfy, specially ideal for tall people (it's 2.20m long).

The area is bustling with small cafes and lovely restaurants. Only a 5 minute walk away from the green of Vondelpark. Rent a bike and you'll be everywhere within 10 mins. description:

name: Cosy apartment in Amsterdam
description: Relax in a stylish apartment, located in the east side of Amsterdam! Public transportation is within short distance, with a bus stop at the end of the street, a tram around the corner, and a train station just a 5-minute walk away. Oostpoort shopping center, and both Park Frankendael + Oosterpark are a short stroll away. The apartment is located in a quiet neighbourhood with many bars and restaurants within walking distance. description: Your window situated right on the Canal. Its not suitable for young friends that want to enjoy night life or other wild things Amsterdam has to offer.

name: Beautiful appartment with garden at the canal
description:
Welcome to our newly remodeled apartment in Oud West! Our apartment is built in 1900 and therefore has a unique Amsterdam style. The house is brand new and has been remodeled in 2022.

The apartment is centrally located and just a stroll away from Vondelpark, Museumplein, charming canals and restaurants. It invites you to experience the city like a local! Additionally, it has a fully equipped and brand new kitchen, a dedicated workspace (perfect for remote working) and a private garden.

The toilet is cleaned extra and is always sparkling clean. Nearby a cafe restaurant, natural quiet area, swimming water, park to walk in. Great connection to center. Also possibility to rent bicycles at Central Station.

name: Luxurious apartment in trendy East of Amsterdam
description:
Based in the trendy "Indische Buurt" this apartment is very close to the city center. Within a five minute walk trams, buses and trains are available to take you into the center and beyond. It is also possible to rent bikes nearby.

In the nearby area you will find within one minute walking distance a supermarket, a cinema and an array of bars and restaurants.

The apartment is best suited for 2 people, an extra sofa bed is available and can be used in the living room for 1 more person.

name: Unique studio on cutter 'Rosita'
description: 'Rosita' is a seaworthy shrimper, built in 1948, converted into a comfortable yacht for two people. The entire boat is at your disposal, centrally heated, shower, small kitchen etc. The yacht is moored in the centre of Amsterdam on a very quiet spot.

name: Amazing duplex 2 bedrooms/office with roof de pijp
description:
- de Pijp - In the Albert Cuypstraat market street, market open 9-5, street is a pedestrian street, no cars accept service. You can find the lovely Sarthatipark 2 min walking and plenty restaurants and bars in the neighborhood
- Duplex, rear 2 bedrooms ( 1 office with laptop corner ) to back site of the street ( completely quiet, double glass windows
- Fully equipped apartment - coffee machine (espresso, beans), dishwasher,
- Private exit to the rooftop

name: Houseboat in central Amsterdam
description: No description

name: 3 bedrooms apartment in Amsterdam
description:
The apartment is located on the 4th floor of the building. There are 2 bedrooms & 1 living room with 6 beds with 1 bed extra when needed sometimes, so 2 families are welcome.
The living room includes a TV with Netflix & Viaplay.
The location is 20 minutes bus close to Amsterdam Central and tourism area leidseplein.
Please be quiet and keep clean during the stay, don't smoke.

From this charming accommodation located in the `Rosse neighborhood' you can reach popular shops, restaurants and bars in no time. Just an 8-minute walk from Central Station. Paid parking is 10 minutes away.
We are happy to help our guests with their plans and provide them with all the information for a pleasant stay in our beautiful city.

Breakfast included.

name: Knus appartement met groot dakterras
description: Relax and unwind in this stylish cozy upper house in a quiet but cozy and green neighborhood with a large roof terrace! Many nice restaurants, by the water, shopping center Oostpoort and the city center is easy to reach by bike or public transport. Perfect for single or couples.

name: Authentic appartement located at Utrechtsestraat
description: This stylish apartment is located on Utrechtsestraat, one of the most famous streets in the old city center of Amsterdam. The apartment is located between the famous Amsterdam canals. In the street are numerous beautiful and stylish stores and many good restaurants and cafes located. Rembrandt square is less than a 2-minute walk away. Dam Square, the Rokin and the Albert Cuyp market are within walking distance. The Jordaan and the Anne Frank house are less than 5 minutes cycling distance.

description:

Enjoy this bright home with luxurious finishes, high ceilings and both in front of and behind a sunny balcony!

We offer 1 bedroom only with your own private bathroom (11,4 square meters) in a centrally located apartment. The room is for a maximum of 2 guests. You can choose between 2 singles beds (80x200cm) or a double bed (160x200cm).

No access to the Kitchen and Living room (as local authority requests).
Breakfast is not provided.

No parties. No pets. No infants.

Self service check-in with a secure Masterlock box.

name: Boot L'Atlantide in Amsterdam
description: Discover Amsterdam from our houseboat L'Atlantide! Just 10-15 minutes from the center you will find our romantic and cozy place. Experience the peace of life on the water in our comfortable studio, which we decorated with great care and attention. You have your own wheelhouse, bedroom with large bed, bathroom and pantry where you can make a nice cup of coffee/tea or pour a wine. Take a seat in the wheelhouse or on the terrace and enjoy your day!

name: Cozy apartment with amazing view
description:
Recently renovated apartment of 47 m2 with a great view over the entire Javaplein! The apartment is located at the corner of the property and is very bright.

The perfect central location to visit Amsterdam with various shops, restaurants and cafes just a few meters away!

name: Stylish apt with roof terrace close to city center
description:
This unique and stylish apt has it all! a roof terrace with bbq and a fully equipped kitchen.

Restaurants and supermarkt within 3 min walk. Public transport within 2 min walk and takes you in 7 min to the city center!

A truly hidden gem in Amsterdam! This apartment is more likely suited to couples of 30 years and older.

You are in 10 min in the middle of the city centre because metro (Spaklerweg) and train (Amstelstation) are very nearby.

name: Downtown West BNB near Jordaan and Vondelpark
description:
The apartment is close to Foodhallen and Ten Katestraat. You'll love the place because of the comfy beds, the coziness, and the kitchen. Our place is good for couples, solo adventurers, small groups, business travelers, friends and families (with kids).
The Foodhallen (with food court) and supermarkets are right around the corner and the famous Leidseplein is only a 10 minute walk.
You will have access to the whole apartment which has a bedroom, a large kitchen, a large living room and balcony.

Enjoy the fully equipped kitchen, remote working station, and comfortable living space. Ideal for both work and relaxation, you'll feel right at home in this cozy haven.

name: Stylish and sunny apartment

The apartment is very clean, spacious, nicely decorated and has a very comfy bed. The big balcony faces the South-West, so catches the sun till late. The kitchen is very well-equipped with a Nespresso machine, a Quooker; instant boiling water, oven, dishwasher and everything else you would expect. Separated bathroom and toilet. The area is fantastic!

name: Beautiful 3 floor family house with garden (5Bdr)
description:
Spacious & light house in Watergraafsmeer: the perfect combination of livelihood and residential living. Bars, restaurants, shopping and the Frankendael park around the corner. Easy access to public transport and highway.15 min from the centre. 5 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms (with bad) and a sunny garden.The house is ideal for a (large) family with (young) kids. Lots of toys are available, a garden trampoline, kids- and baby bed available.
We also welcome (expat) couples. No pets. No (weed) smoking.

name: Cozy apartment near the park and city centre
description: In a beautiful location in East. Practical at the Oosterpark and Beukenplein. Easily accessible by public transport and within 10 minutes on the ring.

name: Full ground floor, 2 rooms, patio & private bath
description: My place is located on the ground floor of a historic townhouse. Built in the 17th century in the Jordaan! You will be staying next to the 9 little streets, Anne Frank House, Dam square & the famous Westertower.  It is well known to be the hippest area in Amsterdam: right in the middle of this all. Enjoy the many bars, restaurants and boutique shops. (4 persons max!). Note: The houses are old, if you seek absolute quietness then don't book in this townhouse ;)

name: Appartement Amsterdam oost
description:
This apartment is perfectly located in the Javastraat (10 min from centre) in the cosiest neighbourhood of Amsterdam: The Indische Buurt, which has everything you need. You'll find your local fruit store, bars, pubs, the best falafel in town, boutiques, bike rentals, coffee houses and the supermarket around the corner.

The apartment is a recently renovated and modernly furnished. It offers a bedroom with large windows, a nice living room, bathroom, kitchen and south-facing balcony!

name: Sweets hotel - Zeilstraatbrug
description: A relatively young and modern bridge house in the middle of a lively Amsterdam neighbourhood. With ribbon windows on three sides, Zeilstraatbrug feels like you’re floating above the river Schinkel. Expect many ships sailing by, as this is the south entrance for water traffic into Amsterdam.

name: NEW Hidden gem in city center
description:
NEW | Cozy Apartment | Pijp/Centrum | Albert Cuypmarket | RAI Amsterdam

Beautiful apartment located in the most popular area of Amsterdam, ''The Pijp''. This apartment is ideal for couples and business travelers seeking, without being overwhelmed by the tourist masses.

- Peaceful living, with all equipment
- Office with a large 32 inch monitor
- Balcony
- Comfortable double bed, at the back of the app (no noise).
- RAI 1 metro stop, 1 min walk to metro station.
- Museum square, 5 min walk.

Even though you are close to the Center, you can leave the bustle of the city behind and immerse yourself in an oasis of peace and nature. Along the Amstel you will find lively city harbors with terraces and restaurants, where you can relax and enjoy a cozy atmosphere.

name: Epic appartement! Good deal

If you are looking for a spacious place to stay, this house is definitely what you are looking for.

We have 3 children, so enough toys to play with if you come over with small children.

Public transport is nearby, where you can take a tube/metro to the city center (5 min) or to Schiphol airport (20 min) or to RAI congress center (3 min by metro). Or bike!!

There are 3 bedrooms (1x king size, 1x mid-size, 1x single). You can sleep in peace at the rear of the house. There is also a luxurious bathroom and fully equipped kitchen.

Wake up with the sound of birds; walk out to the hustle of the canals. Within 150 m you find the best restaurants and great shopping. It's the best area of the canals: near the Utrechtsestraat and the Amstel.

name: Amsterdam Noord, gateway to the wetlands
description:
Welkom!
Come over and explore Amsterdam and its surroundings by bike, car, bus, train!
Our house is situated in the North of Amsterdam, above the IJ (river). It will take you about 15 minutes to bike to the (free!) ferry, which will take you to the centre of Amsterdam.

The appartement is 82m2 containing 3 bedrooms, bathroom with shower, separate toilet, sunny livingroom, well equiped kitchen.
The apartment is situated on the 5th floor, elevator available.

description:
Cozy cozy 2-story apartment 80m2 with balcony. The apartment is in a quiet oasis in the middle of the bustling neighborhood ‘de Pijp’.
De Pijp is known for its many cozy restaurants, nice bars and the famous Albert Cuyp market. In addition, many museums such as the Rijksmuseum, the Van Gogh museum and the Heineken Experience can be reached in walking distance. The metro station can also be reached within 5 minutes.

name: licht appartement in rustig deel van het centrum.
description: This is a quiet part of the center of Amsterdam. In a couple of minutes you are at the city-center, central station or at the most nicest parts of Amsterdam. The kids will not be there, but you would have to like the  cat so you can give some attention to him. We think a perfect place to stay with or without kids to explore and enjoy Amsterdam and surrounding.

It features three bedrooms (with double beds), one bathroom, a separate toilet, a spacious kitchen and a cosy living room. Located in the heart of Amsterdam with a tram stop right outside the door, you can be at Dam Square or in the Jordaan within 15 minutes. Enjoy the many eateries in the immediate area.

description:

Come and experience Amsterdam to the fullest in this unique 1-bedroom apartment, centrally located ánd with the most amazing private rooftop.

The apartment is located in Oud-West, just next to the Jordaan. Walk through the Jordaan, or do you prefer the Nine Streets, and reach Dam Square with a 20-minute walk.

The apartment is on the 4th floor and the rooftop is just above it. Enjoy the sunrise with a coffee or the sunsets with a glass of wine.

name: Dubbel kamer, ontbijt is inbegrepen.
description:
From this charming accommodation located in the `Rosse neighborhood' you can reach popular shops, restaurants and bars in no time. Just an 8-minute walk from Central Station. Paid parking is 10 minutes away.
We are happy to help our guests with their plans and provide them with all the information for a pleasant stay in our beautiful city.

Breakfast included.

name: Minimal apartment amsterdam oost
description:
A beautiful apartment on the bustling Javastraat in Amsterdam East. The javastraat is known for its cozy restaurants, bars and boutiques. The apartment is stylishly and minimalistically furnished and features a spacious sunny living room with French south-facing balcony. The bedroom is located at the quiet rear of the apartment.
The accommodation is within walking distance of the city center, and you can also reach the central station within 10 minutes via the nearby Muiderpoort station.

name: Private 5*canalview, no stairs, in VOGUE’s top 5
description:
Amazing canalview (55m2) ground floor space, excellent location on Keizersgracht (Jordaan district) with many specialty stores and coffee/restaurants. Private living room with large canalview and separate bedroom with courtyard view. Very convenient, no stairs in this authentic 17th century monumental merchants house.
Beautifully furnished with design, huge bed 1,80m/2,00m, fridge, TV, BOSE speaker, Nespresso, water heater, towels, bathrobes, private bathroom, WC, notebook + fresh flowers.
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Generator - Private 6 bed Female Room

Each bunk is equipped with a light, personal shelf, USB charging station, and under-bed lockers. A hair dryer is provided for your convenience. Pillow, duvet, and linen are supplied, with towels available at reception for a small fee.

name: Trendy spacious, canal apartment + sunny terrace
description: Luxurious and spacious 2nd floor apartment (104 sq m) with canal views, centrally located in Amsterdam. The apartment is a 10 min walk from the Jordaan and the famous “Dutch Canals”. There is a sunny (3pm-9pm) private terrace (20 sqm) and a sunny small front balcony (from 7 am until 1 pm) + a sunny communal garden. The main bedroom has a large kingsize bed and an ensuite bathroom with large bathtub and double rain shower. The second bedroom has a smaller double bed. There is also a study room.

name: My lovely place of peace in ADAM
description: My lovely apartment in Amsterdam is my great pride! I have tried to create a beautiful place of tranquility in this apartment by using a lot of wood and beige tones. And it worked! The compliment I always get when people come here is that it is a nice place to relax and at the same time there is so much fun to be had outside the door. The perfect apartment for me and hopefully the same for you! And that within easy reach of the city centre of Amsterdam.

name: Happy in the Netherlands
description: Relax with your partner or the whole family at this place to stay. Next to the Ajax Stadium, Ziggo Dome and the beautiful Gaasperplas.

name: Generator - Single Pod

Each pod features a central control panel, light, cosmetic mirror, coat hook, USB charging station, and fresh air ventilation. Secure your belongings in lockers with an anti-theft lock and smart card access. Enjoy a slow rebound memory foam mattress, with pillow, duvet, and linen supplied. Shared bathroom. For guests aged 18 and over only.

description: Newly renovated luxury and spacious Amsterdam apartment in the city center next to the Concertbuilding & Rijksmuseum, as well as walking distance from the Vondelpark and countless restaurants. The apartment includes breathtaking views from the bedroom, the large rooftop terrace, and charming balcony. Finally, a spa-like bathroom with bronzen tiles, and a kitchen with top-notch amenities, such as built-in wine climate closet and instant boiled water, all radiating luxury and comfort.

You can pick up a guitar and play! (just bring a little talent). If you feel like listening, you can borrow a record player and some records from our collection. All of our rooms are designed in a music theme. Take a look at our gallery!

This room is a perfect fit for 4!

This apartment is situated in a very nice and quiet area of Amsterdam. There is a bar and restaurant at the end of the street. Within 20 mins walk you'll be at the Javastraat, a very nice area with bars and restaurants. The apartment is very comfortable, with floor heating and cooling. It's small but it has everything you need. Amsterdam Centraal Station is not too far, so you will have easy acces with the center.

Toilets and showers are shared and are located on every floor in the hallway.
Room comes with mobile AC unit that is installed only during the summer period.
All of our rooms are smoke-free but we have a smoking room next to the reception. We are located in the Leidseplein area at walking distance from all the great landmarks.

name: Spacious, light apartment Amsterdam
description:
A bright, clean, spacious apartment in the popular east side of Amsterdam. With sunny balcony with view of a square, and trendy bars/cafes around the corner.

City trip? Love? Workation? Ideal app. where you can 'unwind' from your daily activities or relax and (work on your) dream.

description:
Enjoy the sunny balcony with a glass of rosé, or work from home in our seperate office space including standing desk. When you're ready to explore, you're just a short walk away from all the excitement.

This light, authentic and quiet apartment is located in Amsterdam's charming Jordaan district, known for its trendy restaurants and boutique shops. It's within a 10-minute walk of the Anne Frank House, Rijksmuseum, and Van Gogh Museum. The tram and bus stop is just 30 meters away.

Nice big cosy family house, lots of space and playroom for kids and a sunny garden (south west) and park right behind the house. Lots of kids in the neighborhood and a river ('t IJ) where you can swim at only 5 minutes distance.
Close to beautiful natural area Waterland but also right near all the hip new bars and restaurants.
We do ask you to take good care of our warm and fuzzy red cat Marley who needs food twice a day but for the rest is independent.

On the first floor you will find the dining and living room with playful stairs in the middle. You will also find the large terrace with table and chairs and a lounge couch. On the top 2 floors there are 4 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, one with shower and one with bathtub.

name: Hotel Not Hotel Amsterdam: Crisis Free Zone
description:
The Crisis Free Zone is the only place on earth (at least at our ground floor) where you can truly get away from the daily drag of negative news and spiralling economies. Woodcarvings on the outside and on the impressive fence; loosely based on Transylvanian symbolism, are there to keep out evil in all its forms. That’s why creatures like vampires, ghosts, and bankers will never be able to enter the Crisis Free Zone.

Please note that this room has shared bathrooms.
