name: Charming & cozy home
description:
Enjoy a relaxed experience at this centrally-located place. Close to many bars, restaurants and shops. Ideally situated close to trams that will take you to the centre, or to train stations. Also close to Vondelpark, Rijks museum, bussling Kinkerstraat and more!
The space is cozy and bright and has everything you need for your stay in Amsterdam. It even has a lovely balcony with a calming view of a gorgeous garden.
You will feel comfortable as this place has a ton of amenities!

name: Canal View/Roofterrace Apartment
description:
Discover our 110 sqm, 2-floor apartment with canal views in Amsterdam's vibrant Oud-West district. Just a 5-min walk to Vondelpark and close to Foodhallen, many bars and restaurants. Enjoy a 40 sqm rooftop terrace, 2 bedrooms (king & queen beds), modern bathroom, 2 toilets, and a fully-equipped kitchen. Steep Dutch stairs add local charm.

As this is our home, we kindly ask our guests to treat everything with care and respect, just as they would their own home

name: Large and cosy house on the water: free Parking
description: This beautiful and stylish house is one of a kind. It has 2 terrases facing the water. Its only 12 min by tram 26 from Central Station. It has a free parking spot in the parking garage. The area is open, nice, and lots of water views. Supermarket is on walking distance and the tram stop is around the corner, 1 min walking.  Its a large house with 2 bedrooms, and it has 3 floors. Amazing for families.

name: Superior Double 500m from Amsterdam Arena
description:
Superior Double Room with a queen bed is smartly designed and just what you need for a solid night's sleep. Room features air-conditioning, shower, hair & body wash, fresh towels & linen, TV, free Wifi, en-suite bathroom and blackout blinds for your comfort.
Please note that 12.5% Amsterdam city tourist tax is not included in the Airbnb price and must be paid directly to the hotel.

name: Great apartment close to Vondelpark!
description:
Beautiful and luminous apartment, with balcony, situated on a quiet street.

This is my home, not Airbn commercial space.

Residential and safe neighbourhood (not suitable for parties :)

5min walk from Vondelpark,
2min walk from a restaurants/cafes/bars street (still quiet).
5min bike from Museumplein
15min bike from Central Station
15min taxi from the airport

Renovated in 2021. With massive kitchen , sound system, and video projector.

Around 60m2 with balcony.

name: Bright apartment near Anne Frank House Amsterdam
description:
The apartment is located on the third and fourth floor. On the third floor you will find the bright living room, kitchen and toilet. From the living room you have views of the famous west tower. Through the kitchen you can reach the terrace where to enjoy the quiet courtyard garden, the bells of the west tower and have the sun until late.
On the 4th floor is the spacious bedroom from where you overlook the west tower.

name: Wonderful apartment in Oud-West, close to centre
description:
This apartment is everything you need for a nice stay in Amsterdam. An oasis close to all the buzz! This is a very nice and cosy apartment in the lovely neigbourhoud of Oud-West. The vibrant Kinkerstraat with shops, the local market, the Hallen food hall / cinema / shops and the Vondelpark are just minutes away!
There is a newly renovated bathroom, the kitchen has all facilities and there's a balcony.
Be sure to get in touch for requests or questions :-)
You are very welcome at my place!

name: Garden Studio, 20 min with tram 1 to city center!
description: Big studio (40m2/sqm) in a house, private entrance, private bathroom, kitchen and a big garden to the water. The studio is near Schiphol and 20 min from the lively city center. For those who travel by car, parking is Free!

name: Luxe Bed&Breakfast midden in de Jordaan, Amsterdam
description: In the middle of Amsterdam ( De Jordaan) you find Maison Rose. A brand new renovate private appartment with all you want. 60 m2 for yourself. A big sleeping room with airco, a balcony, a pantry (no kitchen) with coffee and hot water and a little fridge. A little living room with a gas fireplace and a view at the canal. A big bathroom with bath and rain shower. Also a private toilet. Excluded breakfast.
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Former canal House - Jordaan - Centre of Amsterdam
description:
We warmly welcome you to our canal house in the center of Amsterdam!

From our house, almost everything you want to see in Amsterdam is within walking distance. Located in the heart of Jordaan, the most charming part of the city! Enjoy strolling through the 9 Streets, Noordermarkt, or Haarlemmerstraat with its cozy shops.

The house has 4 bedrooms, a living room, a kitchen, and a large terrace. No shared rooms, the entire house is private for you!

We hope to see you soon!

name: Hotel Not Hotel Amsterdam: Poison Ivy
description: No description
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Green Terrace Studio
description: Charming guest studio with private garden on AAA-location by the Raamgracht and Nieuwmarkt. Very quiet spot on the back side on first floor(not ground flour) with luscious green terrace. Flowering plants and herbs. Private shower and toilet. Selected kitchen equipment and wifi. Private entrance through alley and up open stairs. Inside mixing vintage with design, focus on natural materials and naturally coloured textiles. This area is were Rembrandt lived and painted and Spinoza wrote.

name: Private room in the CENTER
description:
Hi we are Emy and Derek. We live in Amsterdam and think airbnb is a great way to meet different people and share our beautiful city. we love traveling and going to news places.
We are looking forward to welcoming you to our great city.

###COVID-19 update###
We disinfect the room thoroughly between guests and clean the common areas daily. We also provide you with hand sanitizer and disinfectant and will be helpfull at a 1.5 meter distance :)

name: pay a little more   get a lot more
description:
Nice renovated appartment in the center of the Jordaan. 63 m² privat space with full equipt kitchen - even a ricecoocker- and bathroom with jacuzi.
Several bars and restaurants in a real short distance.
Walking distance to the museums and shopping center. The cosy saterdaymarket in front of the house

name: Spacious 2-bedroom apartment next to Vondelpark!
description:
Hello! Welcome to our listing. Our recently renovated two bedroom apartment (85 m2, suitable for 2 persons (and baby and/or little child or youngster, in the quiet neighbourhood of Amsterdam-West. Our apartment has a sunny garden (with an extra home office) and is located next to the Vondelpark and Rembrandtpark (5 min walk). Public transport is nearby (2min walk) as is Schiphol Airport. Please let us know if you have any questions.

Regards, Martin & Eva

name: Cosy private 2-beds bedroom close to city center!
description:
Beautifully located newly renovated bedroom. Only 8 walking minutes away from shops and metro station Reigersbos, from where it is a 19 min. trip to Amsterdam Center.

Completely new decorated. Closet, water boiler, senseo coffee maker, microwave and a small refrigerator are available.

The bedroom door can be locked. you have your own private bedroom, you share the bathroom and toilet.

name: Large home in central Amsterdam.
description:
Large house in central Amsterdam.

Close to all attractions, supermarkets, parks, cafe, public transport.

Our house has:
- 2 bedrooms
- 1.5 bathrooms
- large garden
- sofa bed
- large kitchen/dining space
- fully equipped kitchen
- linen provided
- wifi

name: Home away from home
description:
Enjoy the this lovely quiet and central location of amsterdam.
They appartement is a perfect get away, and gives you that you need.

The apartment is on the 3rd floor. Has 1 bedroom and is unfortunately not suitable for kids

name: Cozy two bedroom guest wing in the old center
description: Dormer bedroom and courtyard bedroom both with a queen-size double bed, private bathroom all on your private floor (the guest wing). Located next to the lively Leidseplein (City Centre), with the scenic and world-famous Canals of Amsterdam just around the corner.

name: Beautiful Pijp apartment overlooking Sarphatipark
description:
Beautiful light and spacious apartment with many classic details right on the Sarphatipark!!

The spacious living room with fantastic views over the Sarphatipark is located at the front of the apartment and has a balcony.

name: Boardwalk Suite
description: The Boardwalk Suite of 30m2 m is perfect for two. Fully unwind in a luxurious queen-size bed, located in a separate bedroom. Top-floor suites have a balcony and give access to a shared rooftop terrace. Groups can book up to four suites in one cabin.

name: Luxurious Maisonette Amst South
description:
This three-floor breathtaking jewel, located in the “Oud-Zuid” District - within walking distance of Museumsquare and Vondelpark - provides stunning and panoramic views on the city, from its spacious roof terrace, as well as a luxurious and comfortable living experience with its marble stone kitchen and bathroom.

A 65 sony bravia TV powered by sonos sound system evokes stellar cinematic performance, next to a library of history, novel and travel books.

You simply won”t want to leave anymore!

name: Bali in Amsterdam
description: No description

name: Comfortabel schip Amsterdam
description:
Near the city center of Amsterdam, our comfortably authentic sailing ship is located. On the one hand you will see the bustling city and on the other hand you will see the rural area of Amsterdam Waterland, Durgerdam.
The ship is modern, contemporary and equipped with every comfort. The ship feels like a wonderfully spacious ship with a sustainable jacket. Thanks to the renovation that has been carried out in a sustainable way, you can enjoy all the comforts with peace of mind in summer and winter.

name: Amstel canal renovated bright apartment
description: Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally-located place.

name: Charming Apartment -Own courtyard
description: Charmingapartment

name: Sonder Park House | King Suite
description:
Museums, thrift shopping, and stroopwafels — your Amsterdam experience begins at Park House. Each room includes a coffee maker, space to work, and an HDMI-equipped television for streaming. To unwind, we love the cozy lounge and calming garden terrace.

In the Oud-Zuid neighborhood, there’s plenty to discover. The iconic Rijksmuseum is home to the best of Dutch art. And Vondelpark hosts seasonal outdoor concerts at the Openluchttheater. Enjoy a picturesque stay at Park House.

name: Sunny apartment Amsterdam Zuid behind Museumsquare
description:
It's located behind the Concerthall, only five minutes walk from the Museumplein where the Rijksmuseum, van Gogh Museum and the Stedelijk Museum, are situated. The apartment is on the first floor and is spacious. There are classical Dutch sliding doors and a little balcony with lots of light. In the front is the sitting room. It has a shared entrance with the owners.
We have two supermarkets nearby and a good bakkery. On Saturday there is a market with products from local farmers.

name: Sunny & Vibrant studio in Center of Town.
description: Situated next to the Amstel hotel and Carré theatre, this cute but well functioning condo has exactly all that you need to feel comfortable during your stay. It has big windows that reach to the high ceiling, where you get the afternoon sunlight.  The apartment is simple with a kitchenette that has the essentials, a large bathroom with a deep bath and a small cozy bedroom. Next to the house you have a bakery where you can pick up a coffee and a croissant before you get on the metro beside.

name: Luxurious studio in the center
description:
Beautiful fully equipped studio in the heart of Amsterdam. Close by the Jordaan and Leidse square. Balcony with morning sun and views over a canal.

Separated bed from the living room via a modern wall. A lot of daylight coming in.

Public transport in front of the studio to all areas in Amsterdam including the airport.

name: Modern apartment in beautiful street near Vondel
description: This beautifully furnished and sun-lit apartment is located in the leafy streets of Oud West. Cafes, Restaurants, Markets & Vondel Park at your doorstep. Family friendly, with front and back balconies, you're a short walk to the 1 tram which takes you to Central Station or Station Lelylaan (towards Schiphol - airport).

name: 3-Storey Family Home Green Neighbourhood Amsterdam
description: Enjoy a lovely stay in our family home with 3 bedrooms! This light and spacious house in a very quiet neighbourhood is only 15 minutes from Amsterdam Central Station by tram. Ideal if you want to enjoy buzzing Amsterdam with your family including young children. Our home is fully renovated in 2021 with all modern facilities, it also includes a front porch and a garden with a sitting area.
amenities: ['Outdoor furniture', 'Blender', 'Bathtub', 'Free dryer – In unit', 'Outdoor dining area', 'Baking sheet']

name: Townhouse in Historic Jordaan
description:
Our modern and cozy house offers all the amenities you could need. The house has 4 bedrooms, large living spaces a clean bathroom and a seperate toilet. The large fully equipped kitchen includes modern appliances and ample counter space.

Located in the middle of Amsterdam, just an 8-minute walk from the Anne Frank House, you'll be surrounded by Jordaan's boutique shops, cafes, and restaurants. Experience Amsterdam's rich history and vibrant atmosphere from our beautiful home.

name: Sweets hotel - Meeuwenpleinbrug
description: A 1960s bridge house perched between a neighbourhood park and a bustling intersection in Amsterdam North; a perfect overnight stop for cyclists on the LF7 cycle route. Explore the hottest spots in the city with the new North-South metro line; station 'Noorderpark' is right across the street! (2 minutes to Amsterdam Central Station) Or discover trendy Amsterdam North with the Eye Film Museum, A'DAM Lookout and De Ceuvel. In summer, the neighbouring Noorderpark is a popular leafy oasis for locals.

name: Cosy, central canal-side apartm
description:
Enjoy a canal side experience in Amsterdam, on a quiet corner in a busy city. Walking distance from museum and the city centre.

Restaurants, bars and tram stop around the corner.

One bedroom with a double bed and a big couch for one…

Oh yes, and free tips and tricks for visitors.

name: Singel Hotel Amsterdam: Double Room Canal View
description:
A charming gem, right in the heart of Amsterdam. The Singel Hotel Amsterdam*** is known for its historic charm and offers daily accommodation to both tourists and business travellers. Our fantastic location, atmospheric accommodation and excellent service guarantee you one of the most pleasant overnight stays in Amsterdam.


Our rich breakfast buffet can be booked at check-in for only € 15.00.

name: Loft apartment in the Old West district
description: This beautiful modern, cozy, bright and stylish apartment is located in the Oud-West district and is only a five-minute walk from the Vondelpark. Just a two-minute walk from the apartment is a tram station that goes to Central station and Lelylaan station. Around the corner you have the famous Ten Katemarkt and the Foodhallen and the Leidseplein and the canals are also within walking distance.

name: Cozy 60m2 central flat w. garden
description:
Cozy 60m2 flat with garden near central Amsterdam.

Peaceful and centrally-located place, fully furnished and equipped, with king size bed (180cm) and large extensible couch.

Kitchen with dish-washing machine, fridge, and kettle. Dining table.

Bright, natural light in all rooms. Garden with dinner table and garden office with central green area. Quiet escape from the busy center.

Distances: 8 min by bus to Amsterdam Centraal Station, 10-15 min by bus or tram or bike to city center.

name: Bright 2 bedroom appartment in central Amsterdam
description:
Stay in an apartment next to the popular Vondelpark and a 10-minute walk from the Museumplein while enjoying all the amenities of a hotel, such as a 24-hour reception or room service. If you wish, you won't have to worry about breakfast thanks to our complete buffet. In this 80 m2 apartment you will find 2 bedrooms, an equipped kitchen, a bathroom and a living room with a sofa and Smart TV.

IMPORTANT: access to the apartment located on the first floor is only by stairs.

name: Gezinswoning
description: Great family home east of the city centre with garden. Nice, quiet area with lots of green area and also nice restaurants, bars and shops nearby
amenities: ['Barbecue utensils', 'Private backyard – Fully fenced', 'BBQ grill', 'Blender', 'Bathtub', 'Free dryer – In unit', 'Children’s dinnerware', 'Outdoor dining area']

name: The Best of Both Worlds on the Edge of Amsterdam
description: Our family home is in our very favorite neighborhood of Amsterdam - Gein!  A 5 minute walk from the metro station, you can get to central Amsterdam in 30 minutes, then come back to enjoy the quiet of our green neighborhood and the beautiful walks it offers.  Our apartment has balconies at both the front and back so you can catch the sun morning and evening.

name: Awesome home, convenient location.
description:
Conveniently located 50 meters from metro stop Wibautstraat you find my lovely apartment. Within 5 minutes walking distance you reach the Pijp, the Amstel river or Oosterpark. City center is 15 - 30 minutes of walking. And a great connection from Amsterdam central station or Schiphol airport.

Apartment is recently refurbished and includes smart lighting, beamer (projector), home cinema system, fresh ground coffee machine & more. Also a dedicated office-room with external monitor is included.

name: Cozy House in Amsterdam
description: This unique place has a style all its own. 2 bedroom place in Oud-Zuid (old south), Amsterdam. Very close to the Vondelpark, Museum square, shops and grocery stores, easy access to public transport and 20 minutes from Amsterdam Schiphol Airport. 2 comfortable Queen size bed. Rooftop and balcony

name: My Quiet Garden House in Amsterdam
description: Relax and unwind in my cozy garden house. If you have green hands, enjoy some gardening in my 100m2 garden. If not, enjoy a meal and treat yourself with something to drink, candlelight and a book. In case you didn’t bring a book, I have plenty. Need some focus time? I have good WiFi and a big screen in the office. You can also philosophize with some table cards. In summary, just feel at home! I carefully selected everything and I’m happy to share!
amenities: ['Private backyard – Fully fenced', 'Outdoor furniture', 'Blender', 'Outdoor dining area']

name: Stylish Studio, Great Location
description: Welcome to my cozy studio, designed with a blend of Scandinavian and Persian styles. Perfectly located near the supermarket square, it's a 5-minute walk to Rembrandt Park and a short trip to Sloterpark. A bus stop in front offers direct access to the central station, and Postjesweg tram and metro stops are 5 minutes away, with routes to Amsterdam Zuid and Central. The studio is calm, with a high bed and sofa bed, keyboard, and PA system. Book your stay for comfort, style, and convenience.

name: City Center Canal area apartment
description: This bright apartment is one of the most centered places in the City. Only 8mins walk from the famous Rijksmuseum & Van Gogh Museum. Only 8 mins walking from the Rembrandtplein or Leidseplein district for restaurants, bars & clubs. Only 5 mins walking from the Heineken Museum & trendy 'Pijp' district. Less than 300m from the all-new Metro Line which connects all parts of the city. All in all, this place is good for couples, business travelers, and families

name: Luxury 2 beds in the heart of Amsterdam
description:
We’re Emma and Adam, welcome to our home!

We live in De Pijp, a bougie neighbourhood away from the tourists, the best way to truly experience Amsterdam as a local.

We’re located right next to Safartipark, with tons of incredible restaurants nearby, from cosy local secrets, to trendy burger bars and Michelin starred restaurants, De Pijp has it all!

The Heineken museum is a 10 minute walk away, with a metro also a short walk which will take you to all the tourist attractions very quickly!

description:
The apartment has been renovated 3 years ago and has been our lovely home ever since.
It's the perfect base for a trip to Amsterdam and comes with a fully functional kitchen and bathroom, as well as a lovely balcony.
The building was constructed in 1911 in typical Amsterdam style architecture.

Well-located in Oud-West:
Vondel Park: 5 min walking
Jan-Pieter Heijestraat (restaurants and stores): 5 min walking
Central Train station: 20 min by tram

name: Lovely modern apartment in Amsterdam with garden
description:
Our lovely apartment in Amsterdam Oud-West (de Baarsjes) is located on a perfect spot to explore Amsterdam. There are many restaurants, shops, market and public transport near by.

The Apartment has been renovated some years ago. It is modern and has all appliances to have a good stay in Amsterdam.
In about 10 minutes you arrive by tram at the famous canals and in approximately 20 minutes you reach Amsterdam Airport (Schiphol) by taxi.

name: Private waterside apartment & parking
description: 15 minutes away (by public transport) from downtown Amsterdam, 1 minute walk from city beach Bogor, in a quiet neighborhood with lovely courtyards and close to the water is our small studio of 25 m2 with private entrance, private sanitary facilities, cheap private parking & the possibility to rent bicycles and boat!! Please note, there is no kitchen (coffee and tea is possible). Fantastic combination of peace and urban dynamics.

name: Appartement in Amsterdam Centrum/West
description: We offer our apartment in Amsterdam Center/West. The house is central and quietly located. For example, the Amsterdam canals, the Vondelpark and many other attractions can be visited on foot. There are many hip coffee shops, shops and restaurants in the neighborhood. The apartment is stylishly decorated and is very bright due to the many windows. The private balcony overlooks one of Amsterdam's oldest mills.

name: 107 Hotel Jansen Bajeskwartier
description:
Hotel Jansen Bajeskwartier has 200 fully furnished rooms, designed and built with sustainability top of mind. Our rooms have a super comfortable queen size bed, a kitchen pantry, en suite luxurious bathroom with rain-shower and a comfy dining, work and chill corner.

Each two floors have spacious Club Rooms which function as a living room and self-catering kitchen. On the ground floor you find Cafe Jansen and its terrace, a hybrid space with room for dining and working.

name: Apartment in Calm Neighbourhoud
description:
Spacious apartment in Amsterdam West with easy access to public transport (tram, metro and train) and less than 10 minutes cycle away from Vondelpark.

3 minutes walking distance to the tram station.
6 minutes walking distance to the metro station.

name: Prachtig stijlvol appartement in bruisend de Pijp
description:
Unique quiet, stylish and spacious Apartment in the lovely central neighborhood 'the Pijp' with lots of restaurants and cafes. This is the most popular area among locals.

The apartment has a fully equipped work desks for working from home including fast internet, monitors and professional office chairs. Ideally for working remote while enjoying a lovely apartment.

The street is quiet and you can access every place in the city by bike.

name: Whole apartment in the old centre of Amsterdam
description:
In the middle of the old part of Amsterdam. On a children's playground and around the corner of Haarlemmerstraat and the canals. Restaurants and boutique shops steps away. An oasis of peace, in the middle of the bustle of the city center. In front of the apartment you can sit outside at your own garden table, while watching the children play. You can grab the bike from the house and get into the city!

Price is up to 4 people.
A maximum of 6 people can stay.

name: Spacious Family Home in Centre With Roof Terrace
description:
Stay in our spacious 100 year old authentic & recently renovated 3-story house in the heart of the Pijp, a cool and quiet part of Amsterdam. Perfect for families, it's close to the Museumplein and has great restaurants nearby. The house is comfy and has everything you need, including a rooftop terrace and two spacious bathrooms. It's a great base for exploring lively Amsterdam, with the metro just 100 meters away.

Book now for an unforgettable stay.

name: Sunny spot in Amsterdam oost
description:
Keep it simple at this peaceful and centrally-located place.

Although the apartment is small it has everything you need for the perfect stay.

With 2 balconies front and back it feels much more spacious than it is, the front balcony is also south facing so you get the sun all day long.

Lots of cafes and restaurants to choose for within 5/10 minutes walking distance. If you need to go a bit further the tram and train are only around the corner and plenty of bike hiring options are available.

name: nice cozy room near Vondelpark
description:
A nice cozy small room with a big bed for one person. Women only!
You can use the nice bathroom, and a separate dedicated toilet. The room is light and peaceful. Also there’s wireless internet (wifi) available free of charge, and in the morning a nice breakfast.

name: NEW: Cosy | Authentic | Private Gem @ Dam Square
description:
Indulge in Amsterdam's charm at this cosy studio near Dam Square. Original features like exposed beams and characteristic windows create an inviting ambiance, marrying historic allure with modern convenience.

The compact kitchenette (no cooking stove!), cleverly arranged, offers a seamless culinary experience. Adjacent, the small bathroom maximizes space without sacrificing comfort, providing a private retreat with a well-appointed shower, toilet, and sink.

Washer and dryer free for use!

name: Top of the City on super location with canal view!
description: In the beating heart of Amsterdam you will find this B&B in a typical historical Canal House. One step out of the door and you are on the famous Flowermarket. Within walking distance (2 /3 min) from the Munttower, Rembrandtplein (square) and the Kalverstraat. A very central spot from where to explore the City Center, the Museums, the Anne Frank House and the night life. Bike rental, Canal tours and good cheese on the corner. Dutch pancakes downstairs. Tramstop to Central Station 1 minute away.

name: Happiness and Joy!
description:
-The house is in the middle of Jordaan and very close to Dam Square but is quiet, tramway and bus station is just 100m from the house and you can even walk to Central Station in 15 min.

-You have a private terrace

-House cleaned and maintained by professional cleaning company with steam cleaners

-You have your private floor. There are 2 separate bedrooms with new and orthopedic beds.

-Private mini fridge, Nespresso Coffee machine and a kettle (but no kitchen)

-Private small bathroom

name: Large & Sunny Canal Apartment
description: The whole group will enjoy easy access to everything from this centrally located place. A stunning canal view, full of light, where you can watch the boats go by. Big windows, a terrace and three bedrooms available.

name: Little Amstel view
description:
Located on the top floor you will find this quiet private (non-smoking) room with private balcony on the sunny side. It's located in the Hip and happening EAST side. Walking/cycling distance to highlights of the city and near the Amstel river.
This bedroom (with real bed) is nice decorated and has a (shared) bathroom with shower.
Perfect place for exploring the city of Amsterdam and for business occasion the room is only 10 minutes away from conferences and RAI. And nearby all public transport

name: beautiful designed ap.+bikes+garden+boat!
description:
Cosy and comfortable apartment on the ground floor of a typical Amsterdam building (1888) in the very populair neighbourhood 'De Pijp'.
'De Pijp' as we Amsterdammers know it today is without doubt a melting pot of cultures and nationalities. The Pijp is known for the vividness of it, and almost feels like a little village inside the city.

The beautifully finished spaces, the sturdy concrete look, the wooden ceilings, the kitchen that invites to cook, the hanging fireplace where you can sit with all the evenings and roast a marshmallow yourself. There are 2 bathrooms, one of which has a bathtub. Large TV room for wonderful relaxation.

My place is located in a quiet district of Amsterdam but within walking distance of the center and shops. It is comfortable and easy to reach by public transport. I will be delighted to welcome you and advise you on all your needs for a fantastic stay. As an important note: I will provide masks and sanitizing gel.
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

The apartment is very well located in the 'Old-West' part of Amsterdam in the beautiful Helmersbuurt. You will be steps away from Vondelpark, Museum Square and the canals where many popular Amsterdam sights can be found.

name: Modern city apartment in vibing heart of old-west
description:

The accommodation is located in one of the most beautiful streets of Amsterdam, around the corner of the canals, 9 streets & historic centre.
Max capacity = 3 adults
1 bedroom with large bed (220x200).
1 double aerobed you can place in the living in case you need room for an extra adult.
10% discount negotiable :-)
No sleeping on the couch.

description: Discover the charm of our 2-bedroom apartment in Amsterdam North with a beautiful wooden kitchen and a modern concrete pouring floor. Amidst greenery, walking distance to Amsterdam Noord metro station, it offers the perfect mix of tranquility and city life. Enjoy movie nights with our projector and enjoy a soothing stroll along the nearby water. Book now for an unforgettable Amsterdam experience!

name: Monumental loft in Centre of Amsterdam
description: Located in the Center of Amsterdam, in an old Dutch home (1680-1870), on a calm street, near Rijksmuseum, van Gogh museum and close to the subway and tram. A perfect and unique location with stylish interior.

name: Apartment Amsterdam city
description: Welcome to our charming and perfectly curated studio apartment, a hidden gem nestled in the heart of the city! Whether you're a solo traveler seeking tranquility or a couple looking for a romantic getaway, our cozy and stylish space is just perfect for your needs.

description:

Bathroom with a shower and toilet. Central location, Vondelpark/Leidse Square within minutes walk. Wide range of shops and nightlife. Tram line 7/17 stops at the door and bus stop with many bus lines on walking distance.
Minimum rental period 3 nights
Holiday rental Amsterdam license number Z/23/2262360.

description:
This cool oasis of peace with garden in the heart of Old South is tastefully decorated. Close to the Vondelpark and the chic Cornelis Schuijt with restaurants and shops, within walking distance of museums, the Concertgebouw and the city center. The tram to the city center also stops around the corner, as well as the direct bus connection to Schiphol Airport.
Ideal for a couple but also suitable for 2 couples, or a family, who want to discover all the fun and cultural of Amsterdam and then relax at home or in the garden.

important note: there is no shower in the bedroom, but a bath as showed on the pictures.

The apartment has everything for a comfortable stay to experience the city. description:
There is great history behind the hotel. The Vergulden Eenhoorn was established in 1702 as a city farm and used to be one of very few farmhouses the city of Amsterdam has.

Together with the city of Amsterdam the farmhouse was fully renovated to modern standards, while maintaining the historic value and its features.

The space is fully equipped with all necessities to make your stay as comfortable as possible!

This spacious suite includes a queen bed, 2 twin beds, and a sofa bed, accommodating your group in comfort. Enjoy the convenience of 2 private bathrooms, a living room with TV, and a kitchenette equipped with a mini fridge and dishwasher. Towels, toiletries, and a hair dryer are supplied. I am the owner of this calm and peaceful house and wish to welcome you to share the spacious attic bedroom and a few of the common areas of the apartment.
It's my pleasure to host guest and be a part of their Amsterdam experience.

Enjoy comfort in this beautiful apartment, equipped with a cozy living room, a modern kitchen, a handy clothes rack, a stylish bathroom and a separate toilet.

"Duivendrecht" train station, an 8-minute walk away, connects you to Schiphol Airport in 15 minutes.

Enjoy nearby restaurants within a 15-minute walk, plus Johan Cruijff Arena, Ziggo Dome and Afas Live are also within walking distance.

Our digital-enabled guest journey without a physical reception and staff on-site makes your stay more convenient.

description: The apartment features a spacious sunlit living room with unobstructed water views and a large bedroom with a kingsize bed. The semi-open kitchen, adorned with high-gloss white cabinetry and a wooden worktop, includes a porcelain sink and built-in appliances such as a gas stove, oven, and dishwasher. Beautiful wooden floors extend throughout the home. Stroll to the bustling Ten Kate market, De Hallen, boutique shops, restaurants, parks and reach the city center within 5-10 minutes.

name: Room in a very peaceful part of Amsterdam.
description:
Please take in account this is a residential neighbourhood, so I would like to ask not to make too much noise after 22.00-22.30.

Only access to room and shared Toilet and badroom.

Cooking not allowed by Amsterdam municipalty rules for BnB/B&B. Microwafe available.

name: A'dam (1) Twiske  prive kamer- (incl 2 fietsen)
description:
This private room has the most beautifull view in Amsterdam. Very relaxing and you will think your in the middle of the wouds.
IN the moring you'll wake-up and will hear the birds sing.

name: Tranquil wooden house with free parking
description:
Peaceful/ Priv. Bath/ Free Parking

Located 25-30 minutes by public transport to anywhere in the center via the new Noord-Zuid metro line. Or a 20-25 minute walk and a free ferry to Central Station at the heart of the old town.

name: Beautiful Loft Apartment near Westerpark
description: The apartment is 2 mins walk to Westerpark, with great access to public transport (3 stops to Amsterdam Centraal with bus 22). The Spaarndammerstraat also offers lots of bars, restaurants, supermarket, cafe, bakery and convenience stores.

name: NEW! Studio apartment Eelhouse @Jordaan
description:
Charming and quaint B&B in the historic heart of the 'Jordaan' in Amsterdam's city centre.

Our historic building dates from 1619 and is of typical Amsterdam authentic style with stepped gables.

name: Private studio's next Westerpark!
description: Two modern and spacious studio's with each separate batroom  and tv. Common space in between the studio's with a possibility for preparing a breakfast and come together. Beatiful terrace with the bird sang.  All you need for a quite and beautiful stay in our beautiful city and close to the center!

name: Kamer in Amsterdam met balkon
description: Quiet room located in Bos en Lommer, 10 minutes away by bus or tram from the city center. In consultation, you can store your luggage for free in the Airbnb owner's cafe before check-in or after check-out. This cafe is located near the center of Amsterdam, 15 minutes away from the Airbnb by bus.

name: Luxury studio incl. bikes. Close to De Pijp & RAI
description:
New and stylish studio in the south of Amsterdam, within walking distance of the popular neighborhood 'de Pijp' and only a few minutes travel distance from the center of Amsterdam and the Zuidas. Exhibition and conference center 'RAI' 350 meters away.

Two bicycles can be used free of charge.
amenities: ['Free washer – In unit', 'Coffee maker: espresso machine', 'Free dryer – In unit']

name: Cargo Vessel now a Modern Studio
description: Let yourself know the sounds of nature in this unique place to stay.

name: De Stijlkamer
description: Welcome to the Style Room, a beautiful room with original details in the heart of the bustling Pijp with its own front door , hallway and bathroom. There is no kitchen.

name: Amsterdam Farm Lodge: 6-persons , green area
description:
Experience this 'off the beaten track' accommodation just on the outskirts of Amsterdam. 'Amsterdam Farm Lodge' is a haven for those seeking a sustainable stay, offering a basic but comfortable and spacious accommodation. Nestled within the innovative urban farming project, 'NoordOogst', the lodge offers an escape from the city's hustle and bustle without straying too far away from its joys.

Please note that we're not located directly in the city center so check our location before booking.

description:
-Free Wi-Fi
-Free Parking
-Free Ferry to Amsterdam Central and back!
-TV(Netflix & Youtube) with Chromecast. You can use apps like Netflix, Youtube and anything else supported by Chromecast by using your smartphone!
-CLEAN, COMFORTABLE & spacious room!
-Full Kitchen and equipement including refrigerator!

-Just 15 min to Amsterdam Central very close to city center!

-Lots of hip cafe's, restaurants and the best festival area!

name: Always wanted to spend a night on a houseboat?!
description:
Discover what it feels like to live like a Dutch person on a houseboat!
There is a comfortable double king size bed in your room. Next to your room is a modern shared bathroom. You can enjoy your breakfast in the special breakfast nook and watch the many varieties of water birds swim past or on the private veranda directly on the water.
Situated on the IJ river close to the cultural hub NDSM and only a fifteen minute busdrive to the central station. You can park your car for free.

name: Great Apartment near City Centre
description:
My lovely apartment is the perfect place to enjoy your vacation in a green neighborhood close to city centre and a place that offers a lot:
#Spacious place (92M2!!!)
#Vintage design
#Perfect for 2 people (so couples would benefit from it)
#Kids seat available
#Can also fit 4 adults
#Near CITY CENTRE
#Balcony and Rooftopterrace
#Fully equipped kitchen
#High quality double bed
#Extra Double bed
#Free WIFI+Internet

name: Comfortabel schip Amsterdam City
description: In the center of Amsterdam, our comfortably authentic sailing ship is located. The ship is modern, contemporary and equipped with every comfort. The ship feels like a wonderfully spacious ship with a sustainable jacket. Thanks to the renovation that has been carried out in a sustainable way, you can enjoy all the comforts with peace of mind in summer and winter.

name: Typical 3-bedroom  Amsterdam Canal House
description:
Dear visitor,

Behold the world famous canals of Amsterdam. From this canal house you’ll be right in the city center, within walking distance of of many of the nicest shops, restaurants and bars.
With the cosy rooftop terrace you can relax after a long day walking through the city! 10 min walk from the station will have you here in no time!

I am happy to help you with any recommendations and will share with you my favorite spots!

All the best.

(For reviews: https://abnb.me/vz7Di4Pz1Gb)

name: Two rooms in City Center
description:
In this appartment we have two rooms available for a maximum of 4 persons to stay.


Our appartment is located nearby the heart if city center.
Within 10-15 minutes walk you can walk towards many things as Dam Square, Rembrandt district, Red Light
Area, shopping streets and many more.

In the appartment we have tenants living on the first floor.
The two rooms to stay are on the ground floor.
Also the bathroom (shared) is on the ground floor.
Please notice, the kitchen is not accessible.

name: Large Room ( 2 pers) 25 mins from centre Amsterdam
description:
Hi and welcome,

My house is located in a suburb of Amsterdam, a very nice and quite area with excellent transportation to the city and airport nearby.
The room is on the first floor, spacious, furnished and has a double bed. The bathroom is next to the room with fresh towels, and the toilet is downstairs. There is a free WiFi connection, as well as free coffee and tea. Every morning, I have breakfast ready for you at the time you desire. I have a closet for you to hang up your clothes.

name: Rooftop apartment with a terrace in Amsterdam.
description: hello, you are very welcome to your apartment in a very nice and quiet neighborhood, with the subway to the city or to central Station just at the end of the street . Your appartement does have a bathroom with a shower and toilet, and a balcony, both will be your own. You will have an eating corner, with a fridge, a microwave/oven and a coffee machine.

name: Amsterdam Sailboat Hub
description: Experience the thrill our cosy and classic well-equipped sailboat! With a view of the Amsterdam skyline, this boat offer a unique blend of comfort, style and adventure. Explore Amsterdam during the day, relax in your floating coccoon by night. Perfect for water enthusiasts and city lovers alike! Book now to ensure the boat is not taken or privately in use!

name: CCentre Light gf. apt. | 150m² | garden + view
description:
Welcome to our place.

Our apartment is situated at the lower two floors of at 19th century building with a lot of interesting Dutch Architecture.

And lies opposite of the Park, within 5 minutes you are in the heart of City Center. In the street you find several restaurants and bars and the Tropen Museum. Wihtin 500m from our home you have high-end Hotels like Hyat, Pillows and Arena.

PUBLIC TRANSPORT (door to door):
- JohanCruijff Arena: 20m
- Rai: 20m
- Museumsquare: 19m
- Damsquare: 18m

description:
I am a single social guy, I have a very cute and friendly male Mittelschnauzer puppy, he is 9 months now.
Free fiber-optic Internet.
Great bike rental deal, no deposit 100 euro per bike.
Smoking on the shared loggia. What happens in Amsterdam, stays in Amsterdam.

name: Ideal for a family with children I  Cat co-hosting

description:
Welcome aboard the Amsterdam Houseboat Family!

Sergio has two private self catering studios moored on a quiet canal in the Jordaan. With windows all around, you really get the feel you are floating on water!

name: Homely studio close to main sights.
description: Bedroom with separate kitchenette and a private bathroom in a real Amsterdam souterrain. Very central location, in walking distance from Museum square and Dam square. Amidst nice restaurants and shops and public transport right on your doorstep this BnB will make your stay in Amsterdam very easy going.
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

description:
-- NEW NEW NEW --

Welcome to our LUXURY APARTMENT in the heart of Oud-Zuid Area (with private entrance). This contemporary jewel offers convenience and elegance, WALKING DISTANCE to the Vondelpark, City Center and the Museum Quarter!

name: NEW! Museum City Centre Apartment
description:
Set in a beautiful Amsterdam canal house at 700 metres from Leidseplein and 230 metres from Rijksmuseum, Museum City Centre Apartment offers a fully furnished, spacious apartment with a balcony overlooking the canal.

The apartment comes with a large living room including a flat-screen TV with DVD player. The kitchen is equipped with a dishwasher, stove, microwave and refrigerator. The bathroom is fitted with a walk-in shower :)
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: JVL appartement
description: Bordering the centre of the city, Oud-West is a special corner of Amsterdam; a popular, dynamic neighbourhood dotted by trendy design stores, cool cafe bars and some of the best restaurants in the city. Right in the middle of this lovely neighbourhood is my home - a loft style appartment covering the top two floors. It is within walking distance of all major attractions and will make you feel right at home.

name: Appartement in Amsterdam-west met groot dakterras
description: This centrally located accommodation is tastefully furnished. The apartment is in  a quiet street in “de Baarsjes”. In the street are nice restaurants and the Rembrandtpark, Erasmuspark and Westerpark are a stone's throw away. The apartment is walking distance to the Jordaan and has around the corner opportunities to take the tram and bus. Within 10-15 minutes by tram in the city center of Amsterdam.

name: Beautiful, private home with porch and garden
description:
Our beautiful & private house is situated in a friendly urban area and has a nice rural feeling due to the iconic porch that wraps around our corner house. Surrounded by a beautiful garden and a basketball/soccer court and kids playground. Nature (Dutch windmills, forest, parks and lake) are right around the corner for stunning running or cycling tracks. You'll find yourself in the vibrant city-centre of Amsterdam in a 15 minute metro ride.
We only rent out to families, or adult groups <4.
amenities: ['Barbecue utensils', 'Outdoor furniture', 'BBQ grill', 'Blender', 'Coffee maker: espresso machine', 'Bathtub', 'Free dryer – In unit', 'Children’s dinnerware', 'Outdoor dining area']

name: Room 3-Jordaan canal/Pool Table/Spa bath/Roof area
description:
On a main canal in the Jordaan, near Anne Franks house.

Guests can use pool table; piano; spa bath; baby roof area; kitchen; massage chair; internet; sports equipment/half rack; 16 boats out front for hire, no license required

Centrally located, 15 minutes ish to Westerpark (right), Leidseplein/Vondelpark (left), Dam Sqr (Sout East), we are in the centre of it all :-)

I also live here. Guests: live like a local, you will be my flatmate for the time you are here - make yourself at home :-)

name: Family home in Amsterdam-Noord
description: This amazing house guarantees fun with the whole family. Within cycling distance from the ferry to the center, but at the same time quietly located in a green area. Living room has a spacious sitting area, wood-burning stove, central kitchen, large dining table, piano and craft spot for the kids. There is an open connection to the garden with outdoor shower and dining table. Next to our houses is a mini beach where you can swim in a side canal of the IJ. We have two cats and three chickens in the front yard.

name: Cozy chamber + free bike (& also free parking!)
description:
Cozy room (9 sq mtr) in a cute and stylish semi detached house with urban garden. This house is part of a 100y old historical site, it’s pretty here, calm and there is easy access to all vibrant things everybody loves about Amsterdam. Best of both worlds! Your private room has a comfy single bed (190x80). You share the rest of the house with me and my cat. I have a bike you can use for free. I love yo give you local tips & trips to make the most of your stay!
** not for party people**

name: Charming apartment near Jordaan
description: Comfortable, fully-renovated, stylish, non-smoking apartment in amazing location in the famous Spaarndammerbuurt neighbourhood. Authentic atmosphere of old Amsterdam: dozens of cafes/bars, restaurants, shops, open-air markets, & places of interest. All walkable. Quiet bedroom with comfortable bed for a good night's sleep. Well-equipped kitchen. Paid car parking before the door. Everything you need to enjoy Amsterdam & live like a local!

name: Numa | 1-Bedroom (2 PAX) Apartment near Flevopark
description: This comfortable apartment offers 37 sqm of space. Ideal for up to two people, its double bed (180x200) and modern bathroom with shower make this stay a perfect way to experience Amsterdam. There’s also a kitchen, a dining table, and a sofa, so you’ll have everything you need for maximum comfort and minimal stress.

name: Great downtown aprtmnt w/ yard!
description: Fantastic 1 bed  (+ pull-out sofa) / 1 bath. ground floor apartment. Downtown Amsterdam - about 10 min. walk from Anne Frank huis. About 20 min. to Vondelpark & Rijksmuseum. Quiet street (but close to all the action). Family friendly. Recently remodeled. New bathroom, kitchen. Washer/dryer. Pull-out sofa w/ queen size mattress for extra guests. Tastefully furnished plus full excess to the private yard!
amenities: ['Private backyard – Fully fenced', 'Outdoor furniture', 'Free dryer – In unit']

name: Bed & Breakfast Zunderdorp, Studio 1
description:
B&B Zunderdorp is a typical Dutch Stolp which was formerly a farmhouse, now with 5 fully equipped studio appartments, each with a private kitchen & bathroom and free parking.
The modern & energy neutral house is at a working farm surrounded by farm animals with the beauty of the Dutch polders nature, the peaceful meadows, but still not too far from Amsterdam town centre.
This is an ideal place for a family holiday or a romantic getaway.
I work and live on the farm so I am always available.
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Ground floor city home
description:
Everything is nearby this lovely apartment, located in a quiet but central neighborhood. You can walk to the Vondelpark, the Museumsquare and the Foodhallen, but there is also plenty to do / explore in the neighborhood (Amsterdam West/De Baarsjes).

Start your day with a morning coffee in our private, city garden, and walk over the cozy Ten Katemarkt.

Our home is perfect for a couple, a couple with a child under 2, or someone alone. We hope you enjoy it as much as we do!

Fleur & Jan-Erik

name: Petit luxe sur les canaux
description: From this ideally located accommodation you can do all kinds of activities.

name: Room in Amsterdam Apartment
description:
Located right behind Rembrandtpark, with easy access to public transport. The bedroom exudes warmth and charm, soft and ambient lighting. A double bed with plush pillows and a thick, cozy duvet promises restful nights. Shower and toilet by next doors.
The overall atmosphere is one of serene comfort, making it the perfect retreat after a day of exploring the city.

name: Loft with private bathroom in centre Adam West
description:
Enjoy our spacious bright Bed and Breakfast with luxurious private bathroom near beautiful park in Amsterdam.

Tram/Metro: 8 min walk
Supermarket: 6 min walk
Park: 2 min walk

We can give you all kinds of insider recommendations: restaurants, bars, clubs, festivals, place 2 be, bike rides, walks

Bed consists of 2 matrasses and separate bedlinen.

Top floor.

Shared stairs.

Check-in 15.00-22.00
Check-out 11.00

Plse let us know if you would like to use our breakfast service.
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

description: Nice little studio (20m²) in the hart of Amsterdam in the swinging 'de Pijp'  area. The studio is perfect for a couple because there is a double bed (140). You can stay completely independent in the studio, there is a small kitchen, bathroom with bath and shower and we can also provide everything you need for a baby (bed, bath, chair etc).

name: Studio in the heart of de Pijp
description: Clean and well equipped studio in De Pijp. Next to Sarphatipark and Albert Cuyp market.  De studio has everything you need and it is located in a lovely street on walking distance to all the hot spots in Amsterdam.

name: Perfect Private Studio In UNIQUE Houseboat Village!
description: A beautiful houseboat in a unique and quiet houseboat village. This lovely quiet place between boats makes you feel like a local. It's the perfect hideaway located in a sportive area next to the Olympic Stadium. However, also very close to business hotspots WTC, RAI, World Fashion Center. With lots of restaurants and lunch rooms in the neighbourhood, your stay will be without any doubt an experience you will never forget!
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

This stylish and spacious place to stay is perfect for solo/couple trips.

You will share the bathroom/living room and kitchen only with me. (if I will be at home during this period)

name: Light, airy room with view in historic canal belt
description:
Centrally located, airy and quiet room with its own entrance. Lots of light, double bed and roof terrace with stunning views. 4th floor walk-up.

Desk, toilet, sink, fridge, water-boiler in room. Shared shower is 1 floor down in my apartment.

On a charming street in cultural heart of the city. Looks over gardens in interior of block. Walk to best attractions.

Very close to North-South Metro - quick & easy connection to Central train Station & airport.

registration: 0363 4F20 B6D5 3584 1B93

description: Our boathouse (20m2) is an idyllic, quiet location in the trendy Amsterdam North. It offers privacy, tranquility, a private terrace on the water and free parking. The boathouse is within walking distance of the city centre Amsterdam and easily accessible.

Comfortable short stay in Amsterdam!
1 single bed, desk and one big closet in a cozy bedroom (13M2 on First floor) in 3-floor house, it faces to South and is bright with 2 big windows.
Bathroom/Toilet are shared.
500 meter away from metro station
16 mins walk to nearest Lelylaan train station
Schiphol airport: 15 min
City centre by tram or bike: 15-20 min.
Within walking distance about 5 minutes, there're 2 supermarkets, Pizzeria and Turkey’s restaurants and lovely park,and a lot more.

name: Vintage, Stylish, Romantic close to city-center
description: Welcome to the perfect holiday house in Amsterdam 😃 The house features a king bed (180x210), an ensuite bathroom, a fully equipped kitchen, and is ready for some really cool and romantic Amsterdam living. Located in City Centre West, you'll find all the arts, culture, restaurants, and bars. It's safe, free from tourist traps, yet still in the city centre and near a big park. The house itself is decorated with items from all over the world and features fast WIFI/Netflix. We love living here! ☀️

description:
This @amsterdam_homestay is located half a block away from the hip Foodhallen. It’s a 4th floor studio, very central yet extremely quiet (The street is a dead-end for traffic) and the window overlooks the internal gardens. The popular street market is only 2 min walk from the studio. Public transport and all sorts of handy shops are 3 min away in the parallel Kinkerstraat.
The area has dozens of bars/cafes, restaurants, shops, etc. You are 5 min walk to the central canal ring.

description:
Enjoy a very special green setting on the edges of Amsterdam. A sustainable place to stay, to play and to relax. Not too far from the city, yet tranquille and lots off space.

If you come for a drugs vacation, please find another place to stay. This place is not suited for that, we don't allow the use of marihuana at our premesis.

name: Room quiet neighborhood nr centre Amsterdam
description:
Room in top floor in a quiet, green, upcoming neighborhood for 1 or 2 people. You'll find everything you need for a pleasant stay. Great connections to all parts of the city, train 6 min to center.

Before you book, please contact me to a) check availability, b) introduce yourselves, c) shed some light on the reason you'll visit Amsterdam.

To ensure a 5 star experience (and review :-)) please read through my entire listing to ensure your expectations align with what I provide.

name: great big, beautiful apartment with roof terrace
description:
Our apartment is 100m2 and has 2 bedrooms, a big kitchen with a big dinner table and adjoining our living room with a great couch to relax and watch Netflix :). We have two balconies but best of all a great roof terrace where you can barbecue and enjoy the view of (a piece) of Amsterdam and enjoy your wine or eat your breakfast.
We live on the second floor and on the third floor live my son and daughter who can always help you with any questions you have

name: Spacious & convenient stay in Amsterdam South
description: Located next to one of Amsterdam's beloved recreational spaces, the Radisson Hotel & Suites Amsterdam South offers the perfect base for longer stays in the city. Start your day with a canalside walk or bike ride before making your way to the Middelpolder area. Our hotel is also easily accessible from the Zuidas, Amsterdam's financial district, and Schiphol Airport. Amsterdam Zuid station is only 25 mins away by train and tram. Planning on driving? Secure private parking is available.

name: Private Single Ensuite
description:
Our multi award winning hostel has its own on-site party bar Belushi’s located directly below where guests can enjoy exclusive drink deals, Happy Hours & 25% off our awesome menu! We host live DJs, live sports and epic parties.

When it comes to sightseeing you won’t find a better location than with us. We’re a short walk from the Anne Frank House, The Rijksmuseum and Madame Tussauds.

We offer free WiFi, a range of dorms & private rooms to choose from and a 24hr reception for your convenience.

name: Our stylish apartment in Amsterdam
description:
Do you want to stay in our newly renovated 2 bedroom appartment when we are out of town?

In our appartment, you will find sun almost all day on the 2 balconies, one connected to the large modern equipped dining kitchen. Next to the living room you find a small bedroom with a comfortable twin 160cm bed and spare bedroom with an extra guest bed.

Every 8 minutes, a bus from the bus stop 200m from the appartment departs towards central station (15 min) or to the metro line 50&51 (3 min)

name: Comfortable boat 'Amalia' city center
description: This 17 meter comfortable Yacht is unique and on a A-location in city center Amsterdam. Ever wanted to stay on a boat in the middle of the center of Amsterdam? This is your change which you will not forget. Guests will have the boat privately for them selfs. Nearly all places on walking distance! We would like to welcome you in Amsterdam.

name: ★★★★★ | BEST LOCATION | UNIQUE EXPERIENCE | ★★★★★
description:
This Authentic Amsterdam house was built four centuries ago.

Your apartment (2nd floor) consists out of two floors.

On the first floor: a living room, with an open kitchen, sitting & dining area & bathroom + Separate toilet.

On the second floor, there are two bedrooms with king/queen

It's absolutely the perfect base for exploring and discovering the magical city of Amsterdam!

name: Bright central apartment by Museum square
description:
Bright and stylish Dutch apartment right next to Museum square. Walking distance to the Pijp, Vondelpark, and public transport stops.

Close to many good restaurants and bars, for any tips let me know and I’ll share my top list with you :)

name: Custom design studio in trendy spot
description: This apartment has everything you need to live, work and play. Get the practical things like a fully equipped kitchen, fast WiFi, 24/7 support, regular professional cleaning, and fun stuff like a smart TV. Stay in comfort for as long as you’d like – days, weeks or months.

name: Amsterdam Farm Lodge: quircky, old farmers style
description:
Experience this 'off the beaten track' accommodation just on the outskirts of Amsterdam. 'Amsterdam Farm Lodge' is a haven for those seeking a sustainable stay, offering a basic but comfortable and spacious accommodation. Nestled within the innovative urban farming project, 'NoordOogst', the lodge offers an escape from the city's hustle and bustle without straying too far away from its joys.

Please note that we're not located directly in the city center so check our location before booking.

name: Sweets hotel - Gerben Wagenaarbrug
description: Sit on high! A soaring 3-storey bridge house close to Amsterdam North’s favourite bars and cafés. Cocoon in this colourful bridge house with a view of the boats moored on the North Holland canal. This is the largest of all our bridge houses, including a living room, bedroom and bathroom. This bridge house is a perfect overnight stop for cyclists on the LF7 cycle route. Amsterdam Central Station is accessible by a short walk (12 minutes) and a ferry ride (6 minutes).

name: Amsterdam East with garden
description: The whole group will enjoy easy access to everything from this centrally located place.

name: Amsterdam Fairytales
description:
Cozy shared terraced house, located in a quite and lovely neighborhood, surrounded with a tiny park and farm fields.

House has 3 floors and 3 bedrooms. Only 2 bedrooms are for rent.

Bedroom #1 - (Name: Bled): Spacious room on the 3rd floor with 160cm-wide double bed and contains working space and the Laundry.

Bedroom #2 - (Name: St. Petersburg): Smaller room on 2nd floor with a 140cm-wide double bed. (Only offered in case of more than 1 guest)

Third bedroom (Name: Barcelona) is for the host.

With tram nr. 2 you will be able to reach the city centre within 10-15min.

name: Cosy apartment near the Jordaan
description: A stylish and attractive apartment in a cozy, quiet neighbourhood in Amsterdam West, near the Jordaan. The house is located next to a park where you can swim, or lie by the water. It also has a wonderful kitchen, cozy living room, study and nice bedroom. In the morning you can drink a cup of coffee on the sunny balcony. Multiple public transport option are just around the corner. Towels, sheets and essentials are included!

name: Cozy/New Apartment on the Canal
description:
This centrally located property is tastefully decorated. Lots of peace at the back of the house so you don't suffer from the hustle and bustle at the front and the light falls through beautifully all day.

It is a historic apartment in a classic Amsterdam canal house, but recently renovated so equipped with all modern comforts such as a Smart TV, Wi-Fi, Playstation 5, a built-in dishwasher and intercom.

More central than this, with an oasis of peace in front of the door, it's not going to be.

name: Private Room in family house, central Amsterdam
description:
At a unique location in central Amsterdam this private room consists of a bright, spacious room, a quiet bedroom and a very small bathroom.
The area is lively, with shops, cafes and restaurants.
Popular tourist attractions are within walking distance. Public transport as well as bicycles rentals are nearby.
Breakfast is not included, but many places around the square serve breakfast and there are supermarkets.
This is comfortable room, from which you can visit and explore Amsterdam.

name: Heerlijk en schoon appartement hartje centrum
description: Enjoy a delightful 35m2 apartment in the heart of Amsterdam's city center, adjacent to Westerpark! Everything is within reach here. Trendy hotspots like Westerpark are within walking distance, while other attractions are easily accessible by tram. The apartment is clean, safe, and cozy, with its own kitchen, bathroom, washing machine, and bedroom. Book now and experience the best of Amsterdam!

name: Wooden Garden House, the Mulberry
description: 15 minutes from Amsterdam, in the back yard of our traditional farm house, we can offer you a wooden garden house. It's a spacious but simple accommodation with a magnificent view on the lake and meadows. Shared garden with the owners.

Bridge house IJdoornlaanbrug is only a few minutes by foot from metro station 'Noord', from where you'll be at Amsterdam Central Station in only 8 minutes.

The bathroom features a rain shower, toilet and our signature terrazzo flooring. Steel-reinforced doors separate the living from the sleeping area. Canal view.

Our apartment has everything you need, from a fully-equipped kitchen to cozy living areas, ensuring a comfortable and memorable stay.

Situated in a family-friendly area close to restaurants and bars. Conveniently accessible by car or public transport.

description:
Experience the utmost luxury in a private room within this splendid apartment. It comes fully equipped with all the essentials. This charming abode is nestled along the scenic Amstel River, right in the heart of Amsterdam.

When we say "private," we mean it - your solitude is assured. There's an exceptionally low probability of encountering anyone during your stay, allowing you to relish the sensation of having the entire place exclusively to yourself!

You're in the heart of Oud-Zuid, surrounded by cozy cafes, trendy boutiques, and cultural attractions. Explore the charming streets, wander through the nearby Vondelpark, or immerse yourself in the city's rich history at the nearby museums.

The bathroom is provided with high quality soaps and shower gels.

name: Boot met prachtig uitzicht en gratis parkeren
description:
Swim or sup directly from the boat! This boat is located in the picturesque harbor of the old village of Nieuwendam, which was swallowed up by Amsterdam in 1922. This is one of the few places in the city where you feel like you are still in that small village, with the wooden cottages, typical of this North Holland region.

Within 15 minutes you are in the center of the city. The bus stop is less than a 1-minute walk away. Parking is free here.

The outdoor space allows you to have your coffee outside in the morning or dinner at night. For the warmer days, the apartment has airconditioning.

A private and comfortable stay to explore Amsterdam.

The kitchen table is also a great place to work. Public transport brings you quickly to the centre, but Amsterdam North also has a lot to offer - think Eye, NDSM and many restaurants in all sorts and price ranges.

This beautiful room for 1 or 2 is situated near Amsterdam city center. it has 2 single beds next to each other. Its on the ground floor.
Its my daughters room so I use it when she is away. Please keep it low at night. & No partys!

name: Comfy modern apartment with garden in de Pijp
description:
I love my apartment because it is quite central in Amsterdam, it’s very peaceful and it has a small but wonderful garden (with tiny pond) on the west so you can enjoy the sunshine for a long time. Looking out of the apartment you see mostly green and no houses.

I think my apartment is a perfect place to unwind after a busy day of Amsterdam.

It is close to the museums (25 minutes walk) and Albert Cuyp market (11 minutes).

The architecture is 'Amsterdamse School'. Have a look in the Takstraat.

name: Sunny Apartment - Jordaan
description:
Enjoy a real Amsterdam experience in the heart of the Jordaan. This sun-drenched corner apartment of 38m2 is close to action but on a quiet street where you feel a world away from the busy center. Only a 400m walk to Anne Frank house and historical canals, 15 minutes walk to Dam Square and a multitude of great bars and restaurants within meters.

With one good sized double bedroom and large bathroom that are separate from the open living space, this house is either ideal for long or short stays.

name: Ground floor apt near Vondelpark
description: This charming ground floor apartment is only a short walk away from the southern entrance of the popular Vondelpark. The apartment has its own private patio and is equipped with a 55 inch TV, front loading washer and dryer, and a comfortable 160x200 size bed.

name: Knusse benedenwoning, Stadionbuurt
description:
Atmospheric downstairs home with views of the children's playground. Close to tram, metro, bus and Amsterdam Zuid station. Easy connection to Schiphol. Stores are in walking distance. Small backyard with evening sun. Cozy kitchen. Bathroom with shower and wc.

Cosy, homey appartment on the ground floor. Playarea for children at the door. Nearby shops and restaurants. Quiet part of Amsterdam. Easy to visit the city center by bus/tram. Close to train station Amsterdam Zuid (train to Schiphol). Small garden.

name: Cozy apartment near Westerpark and Jordaan
description:
Small but cozy and complete apartment with separate bedroom and balcony.

Around the corner from the beautiful Westerpark. There are cozy restaurants in the neighborhood and the tram stops nearby.
However, you can easily explore the city on foot. The Jordaan is approximately a 10-minute walk away.

Please take the neighbors into account and treat my apartment as you would your own home. Parties and smoking are not allowed. I hope you enjoy the neighborhood as much as I do!

name: Authentic houseboat Messi
description: Have you ever wanted to stay on a cosy Dutch boat right near the canals of Amsterdam? This is your perfect chance to experience Amsterdam on the water. Enjoy the small yet comfortable pleasure boat in this picturesque and quiet location in the middle of the famous Jordaan district. An amazing glamping experience on the water!

name: Cozy apartment with private roofterrace
description: This apartment is centrally located, 5 minutes walk from Westerpark and a 17 minute walk to the Jordaan. Close to several restaurants, bars and public transport stops (bus/tram). The apartment offers also a private rooftop terrace with view over the city! It’s the perfect place to discover and enjoy Amsterdam.
amenities: ['Free washer – In unit', 'Outdoor furniture', 'Blender', 'City skyline view', 'Outdoor dining area']

name: Large house in Amsterdam with garden
description:
This is a big family house in the lovely neighborhood Bos en Lommer. The house has place for two adults and a maximum of four children.
There are a lot of coffee places and restaurants nearby. Public transportation to the city center or trainstation are around the corner. A playground is just next to the house and a lot of other playgrounds with coffee for the parents are at walking distances. This house is the ideal place to explore Amsterdam with or without children.
