name: Geek BnB -  1 to 4 guests close to metro
description:
Welcome to my Geek BnB. I am happy to host travellers looking for a nice place to rest and relax, while visiting Amsterdam.

My BnB has great connection to the city, 10 minutes walking to the metro/train station and 15 minutes ride to the center.

Closest station (train/metro/bus): Bijlmer Arena -10 min walk
AIRPORT: 15 min train-ride from Schipol
Street parking: 1,40/hour - free 9pm-9am
Q-Park: 13,50/day (around corner)
There is no free parking in this area of Amsterdam

name: Lijnderdijk Lofts-Waterside (5 km from Amsterdam)
description:
The lofts:

Beautiful stylish apartments, built in 2020 that are a hop and a skip away from Amsterdam because we are located at the edge of the city, ON a dijk! Your stay will be comfortable and relaxing.

We deliver a high standard of cleaning.

name: Warm and child-friendly house
description:
Warm and child-friendly house in one of the nicest neighborhoods of Amsterdam East; Watergraafsmeer. Child-friendly neighborhood where you can eat delicious food, drink coffee or enjoy parks and shops.

Our wonderfully quiet house is a relief in a busy city like Amsterdam. In summer you can sit outside on the terrace. We have 3 beds and a bathroom with bath.

Wammes, our cuddly cat loves attention. Sufficient toys in the house. Wifi, electric piano and a good TV.

For couples & families.

name: Stylish 1-bedroom apartment | Ideal for couples
description:
Stylish apartment in a relaxed neighborhood of Amsterdam-West (De Baarsjes).

Located close to Mercatorplein which is a good tram connection. Walking distance to city centre, especially Jordaan area.

Working remotely? Upon request, there is a possibility to use our ''home-office''. This can be discussed for stays of 4+ nights.
amenities: ['Free washer – In unit', 'Outdoor furniture', 'Blender', 'Coffee maker: espresso machine', 'Free dryer – In unit', 'Board games', 'Outdoor dining area', 'Baking sheet']

name: Appartement Amsterdam-Zuid
description: Cozy apartment in the Southern part of Amsterdam. This charming home features a spacious living room, a fully equipped kitchen, a comfortable bedroom, and a bathroom with both a shower and a bathtub. Located in a popular neighborhood with excellent public transport links, shops, restaurants, and parks all within walking distance. Perfect for a relaxing stay in the heart of the city.

name: Spacious apartment with view in Amsterdam
description: Our light-filled corner house in the family-friendly Rivierenbuurt offers a unique combination of space and comfort. With three balconies, a master bedroom, a separate toilet and an optional extra sleeping space for two people, it is ideal for families. The location, between Amstel and Rai station, provides easy access to transportation. You can swim and dine on the Amstel river, and groceries in the Rijnstraat. Pets welcome after consultation. Parties and nuisance are not allowed.

name: Appartement in Amsterdam Zuid
description: Recently renovated apartment on the ground floor with 1 bedroom, spacious bathroom, 2 toilets and garden in Amsterdam South.

name: Huge 2 floor apartment with garden!
description:
Our apartment is a great place to stay when you want to explore beautiful Amsterdam.
The apartment is very spacious, with a fire place, a big kitchen, and lots of beautiful interior assets. Next to that we have a sunny garden. All in the centre of Amsterdam.
The apartment is situated at a very convenient location close to all the best Amsterdam has to offer.
From the Foodhallen to the Rijksmuseum or Anne Frank house, it is all on walking distance.
amenities: ['Free washer – In unit', 'Private backyard – Fully fenced', 'Outdoor furniture', 'BBQ grill', 'Outdoor dining area']

name: 3km from Central Station Private Entry | King bed
description:
Guest suite with private entrance & private bathroom. No shared spaces! 3.0 km from Central Station! King Size bed, fast WiFi. Near hotspot NDSM.

Bus stops near house. No 35, 36. 38, 391 & 394

In our house we created a lovely private place with its own entrance. 100% privacy.

Ceiling 3.30m, feels spacious

Fridge, water cooker & Nespresso machine in the room.

Small park on the water just behind the house.

The awesome bed has both hard and soft pillows. You will sleep well :)

name: Modern, spacious designer house
description:
260 sqm of stunning architecture, very child friendly neighborhood surrounded by water yet only 12 minutes by tram from Amsterdam's city center.

We live in IJburg, a new residential neighbourhood. We developed the house our selves.

name: Limited-edition design apartment
description: This duplex apartment across two floors has everything you need to live, work and play. Get the practical things like a fully equipped kitchen, fast WiFi, 24/7 support, regular professional cleaning, and fun stuff like a small balcony, custom art and smart TV. Stay in comfort for as long as you’d like – days, weeks or months.

name: Sunny 2 Bd Apartment in the ❤️ of the Jordaan
description:
Enjoy a stylish Amsterdam experience in the heart of the Jordaan. This newly renovated sun-drenched apartment of 96m2 is close to action but located on a quiet street where you feel a world away from the busy center. Only a 400m walk to Anne Frank house and canals, 15 minutes walk to Dam Square and a multitude of great bars and restaurants within meters.

With two good sized double bedrooms, fully-equipped kitchen and open plan living, this house is either ideal for long or short stays.

name: Nemo Guests House
description:
People from all backgrounds are welcome in my home. The double room is located on the 1st floor and situated in the middle of the private house with typical Dutch steep stairs, no elevator. The room has private bathroom ( shower & toilet ), small area to make tea/coffee or toast & small fridge.
The house was build around XVIII Century and was reconstructed inside a few times.

name: Canal maisonnette
description: Relax and unwind in this peaceful, stylish space.
amenities: ['Barbecue utensils', 'Outdoor furniture', 'BBQ grill', 'Canal view', 'Free dryer – In unit', 'Baking sheet']

name: Unique Bohemian Flat in the Pijp
description: Welcome to our unique bohemian flat in the Pijp. Located at just a short tramride south from the Central Station, the Pijp is one of the most cosmopolitan and vibrant districts of Amsterdam. The flat is recently renovated and offers all the comfort necessary for an unique Amsterdam experience.

name: Luxurious apartment near RAI
description:
Welcome to our cozy apartment in the charming Maasstraat! Located in the peaceful Rivierenbuurt, it's the perfect base for exploring the city.

From here, you can reach the best places of Amsterdam in no-time on foot, by bike, or by metro. Enjoy iconic landmarks like the Rijksmuseum, the Jordaan district, the Red Light District, and of course, the beautiful canals!

Additionally, the apartment is super close to the RAI convention center, the Zuidas business district, and major train stations.

name: Stylish home in Amsterdam-West
description: Our home is unlike other listings you will come across! It's in one of the most popular areas of Amsterdam, yet it's tranquil and authentic. We have made an effort in decorating our home with eye for detail and lot's of love. You can enjoy our artworks and in spring and summer time you can enjoy our little garden.

name: the Boathouse bed&bike A'dam centre
description:
The studio on the ground floor of a canalhouse, is near the Damsquare, the' 9 streets, Hermitage, Amsterdam Historical museum, Rembrandthouse, Waterlooplein, Nieuwmarkt.
You will enjoy 'The Bike shed' because Amsterdam is at your feet, Everything is walking distance away. The restaurants, musea and theaters and filmhouses are all around the corner. It is still a real neighbourhood where you have coffee with the locals. The studio is perfect for couples and friends / travellers.

name: Room near city centre
description:
Hi! We're renting our spare bedroom in our bright and modern apartment close to the city center. You'll find everything you need to make your stay comfortable in a magical city.

We kindly ask to tell a little about yourself and who you will be traveling with (if so). We will most likely be present during your stay and work from home, along with our little dog.

Don't hesitate to ask any questions.

Looking forward to welcoming you!

name: Spacious & bright loft
description:
My flat is located in Zuid, which is a safe, central and quiet area. The Vondelpark is around the corner and so are many shops and restaurants.
Its a 10/15 min drive from the airport and also close to Amsterdam Zuid train station.

The apartment is situated on the 3’d floor and has the sun all day. The open layout and high ceiling makes it even more spacious.

name: Sunny apartment with terrace next to Vondelpark
description:
Beautiful apartment on the top floor with a terrace on the south/west side of the building, feeling like a true extension of our spacious living room and kitchen. Vondelpark - the most beautiful park of Amsterdam - is only a few minutes walk away, and although there are many very nice restaurants and bars around in the area, this part of Amsterdam is very peaceful.

Our street ends at Museumplein, the famous square locating the Rijksmuseum and Van Gogh museum.

20 minutes from Schiphol.

name: 3Dubbel Amsterdam
description: Everything you need is easy to get in the area ( restaurants-cafes-supermarkets-coffeeshops-bikesshop-photographer-icecreamshop-Shishabar )  less than 50 meters away you can find them all

name: Lovely cosy stay for two in hip West
description:
This light and cosy home provides everything you need for a wonderful stay in Amsterdam. It is perfect for one or two guests. Located on the first floor of an apartment building in the upcoming Amsterdam West area.

The city centre is just 15 minutes away. Bus, tram and train are in walking distance and take you anywhere in and around the city. Schiphol Airport is 40 minutes away. Parking in the street is expensive, I recommend coming by public transport or park at train station Sloterdijk.

name: Cosy apartment - just for absolute catlovers!
description:
My apartment is in trendy neighbourhood Indische Buurt. Living room, bedroom, kitchen and bathroom/toilet. Great restaurants/bars literally around the corner, easy public transport to the city center (10-15 min.),station and the airport. With garden.

(registration number municipality Z/21/1978745)

name: apartment in vibrant "old west"
description:
modern - bright - perfect location!

characteristic one bedroom apartment (55 m2) in the heart of old west, the centre for amsterdam local citizens. with the historic city centre just 10 minutes away, this is a perfect place to discover amsterdam.

name: Cozy Living room
description:
My house is in the classic Dutch neighborhood where you can find plenty of cafes, restaurants and supermarkets in few minutes. It is very close to Jordaan, Museum Plein and Vondelpark ( just 3/4 mins by walking). It is mid of 2 different tram stations that are only 3-4 mins away from
House. You will be very close to everywhere when you stay this central place!

name: Appartement Amsterdam Centrum
description:
Wonderfully stylishly furnished apartment in the heart of Amsterdam. Located within steps of Leidseplein and perfect for 2 people!

// The Space.
- Spacious kitchen with cooking island and wine cabinet.
- Internet en TV (Apple TV & Chromecast included).
- Bathroom including bath.
- Bedroom equipped with plenty of closet space, a king size bed and TV.
- Cozy dining area.

Located at/on:
- Leidseplein
- De la mar
- Milky Way
- Vondelpark
- Jordaan/Grachten

Send a message for questions or tips!

name: Sweets hotel - Sluis Haveneiland
description: If you are looking for a hotel room with a view in Amsterdam, this is it! Located in upcoming neighbourhood IJburg, bridge house 'Sluis Haveneiland' has the most magical view across the IJ lake. Watch sailing boats entering and leaving the harbour through the lock next to your bridge house, and enjoy sunbathing on the jetty. Directly behind Sluis Haveneiland, a ferry leaves for Fort Pampus and Castle Muiderslot. Tram 26 takes you from Sluis Haveneiland to Amsterdam Central Station (30 minutes).

name: Comfy 2 bedroom apartment with sunny terrace
description: Comfy 2 bedroom apartment with terrace in a quiet neighbourhood perfectly located in Amsterdam West, close to Westerpark and the Jordaan Area

name: Luxury Canal Suite De Heren
description:
Luxury Canal Suite De Heren has a fantastic location in the heart of the historic canals of Amsterdam.
The property is close to a number of famous sights:
The Anne Frank House, Royal Palace, the Rijks and Van Gogh museum are within walking distance.

name: Beautiful apartment - authentic Amsterdam building
description:
Our apartment is nestled in a historical building, in the centre of Amsterdam, just minutes a way from Central Station. It is the perfect starting point to discover Amsterdam and its canals, just around the corner. Our stylish apartment offers a blend of elegance and comfort.
Enter the living area, with a fully equipped kitchen. High ceiling and wooden beams are inviting you to the sitting area. The true highlight of this apartment is its outdoor area, with an authentic view on Amsterdam roofs.

name: High end luxury appartement
description: This beautiful new apartment is located in the new Buiksloterham district in Amsterdam Noord. The apartment is located in a very quiet location and has all the luxury. The location is only 10-15 minutes from Amsterdam CS. In addition to all the luxury in the apartment, the property also has a gym and a sauna. The bathroom has a separate shower and a bathtub, separate toilet. In addition, there is a Miele washing machine and dryer in the bathroom. Gorgeous Italian walk in closet. Italian gray marble kitchen
amenities: ['Blender', 'Coffee maker: espresso machine', 'Bathtub', 'Free dryer – In unit']

name: Amsterdam DoubleSpace
description:
DoubleSpace consist in 2 fully furnsihed apartments next to each other with a total of 5 bedrooms for up 10 guests is located right in the centre of Amsterdam and comes with private outdoor space patio where you can seat. If you book up to 7 you only get 1 apartment with 1 bathroom

The 1st apartment has three bedrooms, bathroom, separate toilet, full kitchen and comfortable living room.

The 2nd apartment has two bedrooms, bathroom, separate toilet, full kitchen and comfortable living room.

name: Modern  stylish villa: My Amsterdam Houseboat
description: No description
amenities: ['Free washer – In unit', 'Private backyard – Fully fenced', 'Outdoor furniture', 'Blender', 'Bathtub', 'Free dryer – In unit', 'Board games', 'Outdoor dining area']

name: Unique art/cosy house center in the PIJP
description: The appartement is on the thirst floor, in the middle of “the Pijp, “ a neighborhood what is the most popular in Amsterdam. Close by foodmarket, park an 8 min walk to the Van Gogh, Stedelijk and Rijks museum. And to the canals. No need for tram you can walk everything.All bars and restaurant on the corner. The house has a nice white fresh feeling with fresco walls, a good bathroom what feels like a sauna, and there is a little outside. The interieur is very cosy with lots of art.

name: Luxe en Modern Appartement
description: Enjoy a comfortable, clean and luxurious apartment with a modern look and equipped with every comfort. The apartment has a large TV with Netflix, modern kitchen with island bar and wine fridge. Furthermore, a lovely south-facing balcony. There is a kamado  BBQ, dishwasher and hot water tap. Everything to make your stay great in Amsterdam. It is possible to park your car under the building. By bike/ metro/ tram, you are in the city center in 10 minutes.

name: Bright one bedroom appartment
description:
Bright and spacious space with a certain character. Very quiet. You will feel at home here. Large living room with a sofa (not convertible) where a person can sleep.

There is also a workspace with a desk in the living room and a TV as well as a library of books.

To the right of the entrance there is an open plan kitchen that gives access to the balcony.

The bedroom has access to balcony and bathroom. The 2 toilets are separated.

name: B&B Hakuna Matata
description: Beautiful private studio above our beautiful dike house in Amsterdam.  In this private studio you will find all the comfort that you need for a visit in Amsterdam and around the city. It is located in the north area of Amsterdam. only 5 km van A'DAM Lookout, 8 km from Rembrandthuis en 8,1 km from Stopera. there is a nice view on the river and the small nature area at the back of the house and free WIFI.
amenities: ['Children’s books and toys', 'Pack ’n play/Travel crib', 'Board games']

name: Penthouse with roof terrace incl 2 bikes
description:
Bright penthouse with private roof terrace (and terrace heater!) at canal and park. 15min bike/tram ride from city centre, 7min from Amsterdam's best market & popular hip foodcourt 'Foodhallen'. Dutch cheese shop, great bakery, supermarket and hot yoga around the corner.

2 bikes included in rental! Well equipped apartment with bath tub, shower, separate toilet. The kitchen has a Quooker (instant boiled water), oven, induction, fridge, freezer. There's a SUP-board & many sport tools.

name: Gezellig appartement met tuin in Noord
description:
This comfortable downstairs apartment is located in the lively district of "Noord". NDSM with many restaurants and museums is a 15-minute bike ride, from there the pound goes to cetral statio. There are two bikes available at the property.
Bus stop (line 34) is 200m away.
The shopping center with supermarket, bakery, butcher is within walking distance.

name: Beautiful apartment in the heart of Amsterdam
description: Enjoy a quiet stay in a large studio apartment while exploring the city. The studio has a double sleeping couch and a single one that is fitted for 1, 2, or 3 travelers. You have a fully equipped kitchen to prepare your breakfast or cook a meal. The studio is located in the best neighborhood of Amsterdam, De Pijp, with many trendy shops, cozy cafes, and excellent wine bars.  You are also only 5’ walk to the museum district and to the most popular market, Albert Cuyp, and 15' walk to Leidseplein.

name: Luxury Canal House room historical city centre
description:
We are located on the Singel canal in the heart of historic Amsterdam. Touristic hotspots like the Anne Frank House, the Royal Palace on Dam Square and the Rijksmuseum are within walking distance. Enjoy the view from your room on either the peaceful gardens or on the lively Singel canal. We do not serve breakfast. However, coffee and tea making facilities are available in the communal area and there is a wide selection of places that serve breakfast and other meals in the neighborhood.

Please note: Because we are located in a historic Canal House in a residential area of the centre where people live, we prefer guests who want to enjoy a quiet stay. If you come to Amsterdam to party all night long, our property may not be the best choice for you.
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Spacious and Bright Apartment
description: Stylish apartment in Amsterdam West, on the edge of the Jordaan. Enjoy the space and natural light. Walking distance to the charming Jordaan, Noordermarkt, and Westerpark, ideal for discovering the city. Modern decor with all amenities for a comfortable stay. The perfect place to relax after a day full of adventure. Book now and experience an unforgettable stay in lively Amsterdam West!

name: Bright Amsterdam West Gem
description:
Our charming apartment is nestled in the heart of Amsterdam and situated close to the city center and the Jordaan - the nearby tram and bus stop is only a 1 minute walk away and the Jordaan a mere 5 minutes walk! The bus also takes you to Amsterdam central station within 10 minutes.

Located on the third floor, the apartment offers an open plan living area, fully equipped kitchen, double bed, working desk and balcony -
making it the ideal base for exploring all that Amsterdam has to offer!

name: Nice Park View Apartment in West - 1/2 pax
description:
Our lovely home will be available for you to experience Amsterdam the way we love to.

Close to the city center, but far away to escape its noise and frenzy, you will experience the excellent quality of life that defines Amsterdam Old West. The apartment is suitable for couples and families with children or business guests (note there is a working space). It is spacious but with a lot of privacy - particularly.

name: Cosy and Light Apartment Modern
description:
Spacious and light appartment, 100m2, on the 6th floor with elevator.
Large and stylish living room, open modern kitchen, 2 large bedrooms and and lovely bathroom. Sunny living room and nice balcony.
Open view, free feeling and very quiet. Very good beds. Incheck until 20.00 hours. Leaving unti.12.00 hours

name: Cosy and stylish apartment in the De Baarsjes area
description: De Baarsjes is on the rise as an up-and-coming Amsterdam neighbourhood with a population that is both young and multicultural. Situated close to the city centre (10 minutes by bike), the highway and with plenty of green, the area is attractive for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers. My place is close to restaurants and many shops. You’ll love my place because of the location (very easy to reach by public transportation), the ambiance, the people.

name: Hotel Not Hotel Amsterdam: Mr de With
description:
The De Withs have lived on the hotel’s grounds for a little over 70 years. Being true blue colour folk, they were the heart of the neighbourhood.

Please note that this room has shared bathrooms.
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Family home close to  vibrant square
description:
Enjoy the city with the whole family or with friends from our lovely home. Quiet sleep at our backyard. A great neighborhood with the cozy hustle and bustle on a stone's throw away.

Nice cafes around the corner for breakfast, lunch, or dinner. Nice takeaway restaurants for convenience. The bustling Oosterpark at the end of the street. Bus, tram and subway metro station nearby.

name: Uniek verblijf op het water!
description:
Discover the city from my nice houseboat in Amsterdam North! The place can comfortably accommodate two guests and has all of the amenities you'll need for a wonderful stay.

The cozy living space is tastefully decorated and equipped with modern conveniences. The kitchen is fully equipped.

Discover Amsterdam Noord with ease from this location at NDSM, with markets, trendy cafes and cultural hotspots within walking distance. The free ferry to the center is 10 minutes away.

name: Brand new 120m2 designer apartment
description: Welcome to my 120 m2 designer apartment in Amsterdam's new hip hotspot Amsterdam Noord, the 'sunny side of Amsterdam'. Although it is getting very popular among locals/visitors, it's still a chill area as most of the main tourist spots are on the other side of the water, just 10-15 minutes away by bike or public transport. So if you want to be close to the center and at the same time be able to relax away from the crowds and discover the more edgy North-side, you have found your place to stay!

name: Studio in Amsterdam city villa, close to centre.
description: Your private studio has 2 rooms with kitchen and bathroom and is part of a new city villa (close to Artemis Design Hotel). Public transport is close and tramline 2 brings you in 15 minutes into the centre of Amsterdam. Tramline 2 is going directly to Vondelpark, Museum Square (Van Gogh, Rijks Museum), Leidsche Square, Dam Square (Anne Frank House, Red Light District). The house has private parking and in 25 minutes you drive to the North Sea beaches of Zandvoort, Scheveningen and to Keukenhof.

name: Venice Big Room Herisson
description:
The room is about 17 square meters, with a comfortable double big bed, small table, kettles,microwave, refrigerator, and coffee machine. Easy access to the toilets and the shower (shared with the owners).
The apartment is situated on the ground floor in a very quiet residential area in the heart of Amsterdam.

name: Luxurious ground floor apt AMS!
description:
This luxurious ground floor apartment has it all, a fully equipped open-plan kitchen, a beautiful large bedroom with enough closet space and an open living with open doors to the garden/patio. Also, you find the nicely renovated bathroom and a washing machine.

All is private for you, no sharing.

Supermarket, shops and restaurants are all within a 5-10 min walk.

Tram 2 takes you in 12 min to the inner city.

This is a true-hidden gem!

name: Apartment near Amstel & Centre
description: Spacious apartment (approx. 70m2), peaceful location, next to the Amstel and 10 min. walking distance from the city centre

name: Luxury houseboat 'Dolte' city center
description: Have you ever wanted to stay on a cosy Dutch pleasure boat right near the canals of Amsterdam? This is your perfect chance to experience Amsterdam on the water. Enjoy the new comfortable houseboat in this picturesque and quiet location in the middle of the famous Jordaan district. An amazing experience on the water within everything on walking distance.

name: Unique sustainable water home
description:
Come and experience this peaceful, relaxing most sustainable, floating residential area in Europe. Thirty water homes with 46 households form a revolutionary new neighborhood that generates its own energy. The fantastic apartment of 103 square meters on the water also floats here.
The house has three bedrooms, two bathrooms, two toilets and a spacious living room on the third floor, with a bed sofa, in split-level with an open kitchen. A spacious terrace on the water and a floating garden.

name: Appartement in stadsdeel West
description: Welcome to our modern apartment in Stadsdeel West, Amsterdam. Enjoy a spacious bedroom, fully equipped kitchen and cozy living area. Free Wi-Fi, washing machine & essentials included. Easy walking distance to cafes, restaurants and public transports. Ideal for couples, solo travelers and business travellers. Clean, safe and welcoming. Book now for a pleasant stay!

name: The Red Ox - Super Central Canal View Rooms
description:
In our canal house from 1723, we offer this comfortable room, with ensuite bathroom.
You will enjoy a fantastic view over multiple canals and bridges.
On the ground floor is a shared lounge where you can work or relax, and make a cup of coffee or tea.
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Tiny house in the heart of the “Jordaan”
description: Tiny house in the heart of the “Jordaan”, city center of Amsterdam
amenities: ['Free washer – In unit', 'Blender', 'Coffee maker: espresso machine', 'Free dryer – In unit', 'City skyline view', 'Baking sheet']

name: Mystique Suite  (45 mtrs)
description: Located in the heart of the NDSM wharf of Amsterdam with panoramic views of the city skyline. On top of the crane are three spacious suites, with underneath a studio for Corporate & Music events. Only a private invite shows you Amsterdams best kept secret that's hidden behind an iron door. You'll enter a completely different world after closing that door: an underground scene where artists, free spirits and open-minded people meet. The height and structure makes your stay completely incognito.

name: Ground floor apartment
description: This apartment is quietly located in Amsterdam Noord. Within 7 minutes by bike you are at the ferry that takes you to the central station. The apartment is on the ground floor and has a small private front yard. There is a possibility to park your car for free in the parking garage near the apartment. The apartment has an entire kitchen, bathroom with rain shower and two beds.

name: Lovely appartment with sunny balcony
description:
Fully furnished apartment comes with all kind of luxury.

Grocery stores and nirestaurants are available in the area. Within 5 min you can be at the ferry to the center and 5 min in the other direction there is plenty of nature.
During our holiday, our friendly cat stays at home. He lives mostly outside.
We request a minimum stay of 1 weeks.

name: Cute appartement in peaceful area near city centre
description: Our house was built in the 1920’s for working class people and was designed by the famous Berlage School. The north of Amsterdam has changed immensely since then and in our neighborhood, you will now find the coolest new restaurants, bars and clubs. Alongside peaceful parks, a little forest and a bike ride away from the characteristic country dike houses. The nearest metro is a 5-minute walk away and the ferry that takes you right into the city centre is a 5-minute bike ride (15 minute walk).

description: The flat is located in a new area across from the central station, on the IJ, the main water in Amsterdam. It is a modern building, designed by architects, with floor heating and double glazing. The interior is a mixture between modern and antique.

The perfect blend of relaxation and city exploration in this conveniently located apartment. Book now for an unforgettable Amsterdam experience!

The location has a private entrance so you don't see any other people living in the building.

The house is standing in an old village not far from the city center. The dike is older than Amsterdam. From the house you wolk to the metro wich go to the city center in 3 minutes. Walking to the city center is 20 minutes. The neighborhood is quiet and safe.
I have two bikes, these you can use for free, I only want a deposit of €100,00, which you get back on the end of your stay If the bikes are of course okey.

Each two floors have spacious Club Rooms which function as a living room and self-catering kitchen. On the ground floor you find Cafe Jansen and its terrace, a hybrid space with room for dining and working.

description:
Elegant royal room with private bathroom and free bikes. Also a free parking spot is available. We are so proud of our official licensed B&B.
Since 2013, we received many satisfied guests from all over the world. Hopefully you want to become one too!
The most important for us is to give our guests their privacy but we are always stand by to share local tips and tricks. So you can explore our beautiful city by yourself without worries, but you can count on a personal touch! See you soon.

It has a nice comfortable double bed, and a comfortable double sofa bed.  It has dishwashing machine, coffee maker, microwave.

The open-concept main living area includes the kitchen and dining room, leading to the lush garden with an elevated terrace and cozy seating area.
The first floor houses the bedroom, large bathroom, a study and a balcony.

The apartment is located on a wide avenue with unobstructed views at the front and easy parking by car, but also super accessible by public transport.

The apartment is within walking distance of the Jordaan and sits in the middle of a bustling neighborhood yet completely quiet inside. Just a fantastic place to live and stay :-) I can recommend it to everyone but well I live there for a reason as well.

Most of the time she's strolling & chilling outside. You'll only need to refresh her water once a day, we have a robot friend called Trixie to supply her food.

From the bedroom with double on the 4th floor you reach the terrace with afternoon and evening sun. Our house is well stocked with toys, puzzles and games.

The apartment is a 20 minute drive from the airport.

Overall the ideal place to stay while visiting Amsterdam!

name: Sunny Rooftop in Amsterdam
description:
Welcome to your stylish urban retreat in the heart of Amsterdam!
This sun-drenched rooftop apartment features a chic interior and one of the city's best roof terraces. Enjoy a vibrant neighborhood with cafes, restaurants, and a cinema just steps away.
Just a 5-minute stroll to the bustling Ten Kate Market, and within easy reach of Dam Square and main tram lines, this is the perfect base for exploring the best of Amsterdam.

name: Attractive central canal-view apartment
description:
Our house is situated in the Baarsjes, one of the most lively neighbourhoods of Amsterdam. It is very centrally located. Close by Rijksmuseum, van Goghmuseum, FOAM, Huis Marseille, Concertgebouw, AnneFrank Huis, Galleries, the Negen Straatjes, the Dam, EYE, Jordaan, Vondelpark and of course the Leidseplein.
The bright and sunny house is located on a tree-lined quiet street and overlooks the largest canal (actually a connecting point of two different canals) of Amsterdam.

name: appartement with garden in Amsterdam west center
description: Attractive apartment of 80 square meters with garden and 2 cats ! in Amsterdam west near the halls near center for rent
amenities: ['Free washer – In unit', 'Private backyard – Fully fenced', 'Outdoor furniture', 'Blender', 'Bathtub', 'Outdoor dining area', 'Baking sheet']

name: Ground Floor of a 200 Year Old Canal House
description: Centrally located canal house with modern facilities in the best street of amsterdam. Get the local experience by being right outside of the tourist area but still just minutes away from all the hotspots. Dine at the best restaurants or just walk along our beautiful canals and eat pizza from the box. In my comfortable apartment you can get the mosts out of your visit to Amsterdam and The Netherlands by having downtime but also being where you want to be within minutes.

name: Private 2-4p studio and your own private entrance!
description: This 2-4 person studio has everything you need for a pleasant stay. You will enter through your own private entrance to this newly renovated studio from 1930. A Queen-size bed and 2x1 murphy bed system with private bathroom with toilet,  HD TV with Chromecast, fast Wifi connection, a seating area to read or relax after a long day of walking, a table with high chairs for eating, a coffee and tea machine with free coffee and tea. Even a kitchenette. You will certainly feel at home!

With views onto the Vondelpark, a fully equipped kitchen, cozy living room, and three balconies, it's the perfect stylish retreat. Unwind in class and convenience. Just a leisurely 15-minute bike ride to the city centre. Your Amsterdam adventure begins here!

description: Come and stay in one of the coolest neighborhoods in the world, according to Time Out. This central, light and welcoming canal apartment is close to all the hustle and bustle but situated on a nice and quiet canal, offering you the best of both worlds.

name: Cozy private garden room + bath
description:
We welcome you to a beautiful private and quiet room with private bathroom in our garden. You access crossing through our house. Very close to diverse public transports and 10 min walk to the Vondelpark. Very close to the city center (10 min by bike or 20 by tram).

We are a quiet couple with two little dogs. We love this city and we have a lot of information and secrets we'd love to share with you.

name: Cosy house in city center
description: Discover Amsterdam's heart from our cosy canal-side home. Clean and inviting, it boasts a stylish kitchen, three spacious bedrooms, bathrooms, and a cozy TV area stocked with books and games. Located amidst vibrant cafés, acclaimed restaurants, and lots of museums, you'll find excitement at every corner. With the metro around the corner and central station a 10-minute walk, our home marries comfort with convenience, offering the best of city-center living.

name: 21st-Century Fashion & Luxury Upstairs Apartment
description:
21st century fashion & luxury, completely renovated upstairs apartment of 68m² on the second floor of the famous boutiques of P.C. Hooftstraat in Oud-Zuid Amsterdam. The apartment has underfloor heating and has a spacious balcony.

The residence is within a 5-minute walking distance of the Vondelpark and Van Gogh Museum.

Relax in this calm, stylish space. 🧘‍♂️

name: ★★★ BRIGHT & COMFY APARTMENT ★  AMSTERDAM EAST ★★★
description: This is a spacious, bright apartment which will suit a couple, two friends or relatives. It is a private space for you to relax while discovering Amsterdam. It has a large couch with a reading light and TV. You can cook in our fully equipped kitchen with electric plate and oven.  The bathroom was recently (March 2020) renovated with a separate toilet. Bedroom is big and comfy with a closet for your use. We have a nice sunny balcony. You can't smoke inside, but are allowed on the balcony.

name: Licht en kleurrijk appartement
description: Bright and colorful apartment. Very centrally located in a quiet neighborhood. Large balcony with beautiful view. Supermarket and bus stop right around the corner.

name: Private 4 person room, Euphemia Hotel, city center
description:
The Euphemia was formerly a monastery built at the turn of the century.
The hotel is in proximity to all the main tourist attractions within the city center: Heineken Brewery, Leidseplein, nightlife area and the museums.
Due to its location on a quiet side street, one is able to escape the hustle of the city.
Stay with us, and you will be able to enjoy a great experience with comfortable accommodation and friendly service.
Accommodation to suit your budget!

name: Deckhouse on houseboat // Studio on Houseboat
description:
The HE-JA is a cargo ship that has been decommissioned and converted into a houseboat since 2015. We try to heat our ship sustainably with a heat pump and generate electricity with the solar panels. We appreciate it if our guests take this into account.

The ship is located in the Eastern Harbour area about 10 minutes from the city centre. A fantastic place. In summer, you can jump right off the deck for a swim, so bring your swimming trunks.

name: SunShine, A Sunny Amsterdam Center Special
description: No description

name: 2 double bed apartment with beautiful garden
description:
In a nice and quiet neighbourhood in Amsterdam you'll find my 70m2 ground floor apartment with a similar sized well maintained garden, 2 double beds (one in a separate bedroom, the other in the living room), WIFI and a very well equipped kitchen in a convenient area of Amsterdam away from tourist but close to all.

Trams and busses are within 1 minute walking distance and bring you anywhere in the center within a short time. The beautiful Vondelpark and Rembrantpark are just around the corner.

description: Private double room in a canal house dating from 1608 situated on Singel Canal in the oldest part of Amsterdam. Centrally located.

★ 10 minute walking distance from Amsterdam Central Station

name: Sonder Park House | Superior Double Room
description:
Museums, thrift shopping, and stroopwafels — your Amsterdam experience begins at Park House. Each room includes a coffee maker, space to work, and an HDMI-equipped television for streaming. To unwind, we love the cozy lounge and calming garden terrace.

In the Oud-Zuid neighborhood, there’s plenty to discover. The iconic Rijksmuseum is home to the best of Dutch art. And Vondelpark hosts seasonal outdoor concerts at the Openluchttheater. Enjoy a picturesque stay at Park House.

name: Semi Private floor (50 m2/538ft2) in Amsterdam
description: Discover the beautiful spots in Amsterdam Noord staying in our semi private floor (50 m2/538ft2) with double bedroom, chill out room, private bathroom and toilet. The house is surrounded by green areas, a lake, park, playgrounds and close to the centre of the city.

Room/Private Bathr'm & Free Parking

Located 25-30 minutes by public transport to anywhere in the center via the new Noord-Zuid metro line. Or a 2km walk and a free ferry to Central Station at the heart of the old town.

name: LOTUS, Classic Dutch Saling Barge
description:
Staying on our sailing ship is a truly unique experience, not only is it comfortable and one of the cheapest and nicest spots to stay with a larger group, it has everything you need while being away from home.
It's located in Amsterdams 'up & coming' NDSMdistrict, that's packed with old warehouses, graffiti arts and plenty of cultural cafes and restaurants, within walking distance.
The free ferry will get you from the ship to central station and thus downtown within 10 minutes.

description:
Welcome to our B&B located in the famous Amsterdam district "de Jordaan". We offer a comfortable studio, carefully designed with an eye for detail and luxury. Enjoy modern amenities in a historic setting for a relaxing and enjoyable stay.

With a convenient location just a fifteen minute walk from Central Station and a 10-minute walk from attractions like the Anne Frank house, the Westerkerk and Dam Square, our B&B is easily accessible.
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Cosy apartment in De Pijp
description:
Cosy 1-bedroom apartment in the heart of De Pijp. Located in the very center of De Pijp, only 2 min away from Metro station and trams. Situated on a quiet side street, the apartment is surrounded by small concept stores, cafes & wine bars, supermarkets and food stores.
10 min walking distance from Van Gogh & Rijksmuseum.

name: Vondelpark House Room 2.
description: Vondelpark House  is on the 2nd floor of a hundred year old townhouse in the Zocherstraat, a quiet residential street in the Old West district of Amsterdam, but only 2 minutes walk from the busy Overtoom with Restaurants, Shops and Wine Bars.  The street is next to the Vondelpark, the most famous park in the Netherlands. The accommodation is good for couples, solo adventurers and business travelers.
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Catalonia Vondel Amsterdam 4* - Premium room
description: Welcome to Catalonia Vondel Amsterdam! This hotel is perfect for people looking to explore what Amsterdam has to offer. It is very well located, just 300 meters from Vondelpark and Leidseplein, in one of the most important leisure and shopping areas of Amsterdam. Premium rooms are recently renovated rooms with a modern and minimalist design. Its size is 15 m2.

name: Stunning apartment in Oud-West
description:
Light, airy and newly renovated apartment in the amazing oud-west neighborhood in Amsterdam.

The apartment is situated in a quiet side street on the 3rd & 4th floor with walking distance to multiple restaurants and cafes nearby. Known cites like Vondelpark and the nine streets are also within a 1 km radius.

The apartment is ideal for 2-4 guests with two bedrooms, one with a king bed (180) and one with a pullout couch (150). It also has a private terrace with sun from 7 am to 9 pm.

name: Q-Factory Hotel: The Studio
description:
Featuring free WiFi throughout the property, Q-Factory Hotel offers accommodation in Amsterdam. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant. Parking is available at the nearby Q-Park Oostpoort at a surcharge.

Every room is fitted with a flat-screen TV with cable channels. Each room includes a private bathroom.

name: Architecture gem with a private terrace
description:
Spend your vacation in the unique building by a famous architecture & just 10 min from the city center. Wonderful designer apartment with a water view and spacious terrace.

Our house is children friendly!

Enjoy Netflix and HBO on a big home cinema screen.

name: Familyfriendly Suite incl breakfast
description: Our charming suite with sitting/sleeping area comfortably fits 2-4 pers. Located in our farmhouse @ 10 mins drive from city centre. Enjoy the countryside and the city centre. Breakfast included (in nice weather in the garden). Excellent free wifi. Towels  (fresh daily) and sheets/blankets included. Coffeemaker, water boiler, fridge present in suite. Nice garden by the water to relax, with trampoline and small football field.

name: Signature Studio in the Picturesque Canal District
description: Luxury Studio with no spared expense. Wake up in a heavenly bed right on the edge of Amsterdam's famous Browersgraght and Herengracht canals! Really get to enjoy all the best of the city being in the perfect proximity to everything central yet experience the real neighborhood comforts and culture. We aim to make your experience with us the very best possible, so please don't hesitate to ask us for assistance setting up a bike or where to grab a bite to eat!

name: Comfortable 2BR apartment near citycenter
description: Bright and modern apt. in the hip and lively neighborhood of Amsterdam Oost. With a comfortable bed and double sofa bed and cooking island, it is apt. perfect for couples or families. It is on the second floor, with a nice view. Oost is within biking distance of the center of Amsterdam, but is characterized by the many restaurants and bars where the locals like to come and close to Artis Zoo. The city center is easily accessible by train, tram or bicycle

name: Practical apartment in the lively Indische Buurt
description: This practical and cozy apartment on the 2nd floor, has everything you need and is set a the wonderful Indische Buurt, an area that is has everything you need and a little more.

name: Mooi appartement met balkon in Amsterdam Oost
description:
Enjoy your stay at Javastraat, the coziest street in Amsterdam!
In Javastraat you will find dozens of restaurants, stores and bars. Further nearby include Artis, Bierbrouwerij 't IJ and the Dappermarkt.

There are two parks within walking distance and you are within 15 minutes to the central station and in the city center. Tram, bus and train connection are a 5-minute walk away.

Note: our apartment is on the 4th floor, there is no elevator available.

name: A jungle apartment in Oud-West
description: Enjoy a stylish jungle apartment in central part of Amsterdam, In hip neighbourhood Oud-West. If you are looking for an authentic experience of staying in a typical Amsterdamse house, look no further! It comes with a steep staircase and no elevator as a price (the apartment is on the 2nd floor, so not too bad). Thanks to 50 plants, the apartment has a real jungle vibe. I also have a record player, beamer and an old piano, older than the building. Just be mindful about the neighbours ;)

name: Apartment on trendy hotspot!
description: You'll just love my apartment! Scandinavian looks, amazing view, light, top floor, elevator, modern and still cozy. Centrally located, downstairs just 1 step outside the Food Hallen, movie theatre and (mon-sat) local market. Next to great bars, cosy restaurants. Feel like a local in Amsterdam! Walking distance to centre and musea. I have to mention that I am picky in who is staying so therefore at least 3 good reviews for you as a guest are essential to me. If present  I’ll be happy to host you🙏

name: Stylish canal view apartment
description: Beautiful renovated apartment on one of the iconic canals. The apartment is located in the heart of Amsterdam, in the famous Jordaan area. Even though you are in the middle of this always buzzling neighbourhood, in the apartment there is a tranquility. Divided over the 3rd and 4th floor and with an unique roof terrace attached to the kitchen. Open the doors and inside seamlessy flows over in the outside.

name: One of a kind houseboat on the river Amstel
description: Experience Amsterdam like never before with this charming and one-of-a-kind houseboat located in the heart of the city. Enjoy breathtaking panoramic views of the famous Amsterdam canals and the city's most iconic bridge from the comfort of your own private sanctuary. The houseboat features three walls of large windows, offering a front-row seat to the bustling canal scene by day and a picturesque light show at night. Book your stay now and make memories you'll never forget.

A charming gem, right in the heart of Amsterdam. The Singel Hotel Amsterdam*** is known for its historic charm and offers daily accommodation to both tourists and business travellers. Our fantastic location, atmospheric accommodation and excellent service guarantee you one of the most pleasant overnight stays in Amsterdam.

Our rich breakfast buffet can be booked at check-in for only € 15,00.

name: Newly Renovated Double Room in a Historic Building
description: This room has everything you need to live, work and play. Get the practical things like fast WiFi, 24/7 support, regular professional cleaning, and fun stuff like a smart TV. Stay in comfort for as long as you’d like – days, weeks or months. The layout of individual rooms in this category may vary. Some rooms have very little window (showed in photos).

description:
This specious 2 bedroom apartment is located in the west part of Amsterdam, very centrally located and in a quiet street, Supermarket and tram stop are just within 2 min walk.

Around the area you can find some coffee places, restaurants and shops. The tramstop is 1 min walking There you have the direct tram 13 to Amsterdam central station. It only 15 min to Central Station and 8 min to the Anne Frank house area and the 9streets area.

If you rent a bike it takes 10 min to the city center!

name: Beautiful apartment near city centre (2 bedrooms)
description:
Spacious, beautiful two bedroom apartment in a great neighbourhood. Apartment is 100+ m2, has a beautiful hardwood floor, lots of original vintage details, very high ceilings, large live-in kitchen, balcony, and is situated on a tree-lined, quiet street, about 8 minutes by bike from Anne Frank House and Dam Square.

Please note: we really cannot accomodate more than 2 adults.

description: Welcome to our charming apartment in the heart of Amsterdam! Experience the comfort and uniqueness of this recently renovated space, boasting a fairytale canal view. Enjoy the sun-drenched balcony from 16:00 until sunset, while the large windows and high ceilings fill the house with natural light. The open kitchen, complete with a beautiful kitchen island, is fully equipped. The spacious living room features a dining area and a cozy sitting area offering stunning views.

name: Spacious light family house in Amsterdam
description:
Our home is self-designed, it is spacious, it is light. It is looking out over the water, where you can swim or sup. It's a short walk to the tram, the tram takes you to Amsterdam center city in 15 minutes. Or you can take a walk or a bike of us to discover the surrounding Amsterdam landscape.
There's private (free) parking in front of the house.
We offer our house to a minimum of 7-night-stay, preferable to a couple or a family. Our house isn't suited for a group of friends.

Welcome to our own spacious and typical Amsterdam house (1930's) with comfort (full equiped kitchen, large bath & rain shower head), space (60 sqm) and a unique location.

- Perfect location in Amsterdam close to Oosterpark, Pijp and City Center (straight centrum connection with public transport)

name: Luxury Apartment City Centre
description: The apartment is perfectly located in the heart of the City Centre, near museums and within walking distance from the H'Art Museum (Hermitage), Rembrandt Museum, Jewish Museum, Portuguese Synagogue, Dam Square, and Artis Zoo. The neighbourhood is vibrant but has local cosy areas in Plantagebuurt with many beautiful parks. Although perfectly centrally located, the apartment is located on a quiet street. The apartment has perfect connections to public transport.

name: Corner Apartment with Vondelpark Entrance
description: Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally-located place. Located at the entrance of Vondelpark and in the middle of the popular and vibrant Oud-West area, this spacious apartment offers room for 4 people. The perfect place to spend a week(end) in Amsterdam. Walking distance from the Museum Quarter, Leidseplein and Oud-Zuid, this park-situated apartment has something for everybody.

name: Appartment Amsterdam centre - Oud West (garden)
description:
This wonderfully decorated deluxe appartment is located on the ground floor of a typical Dutch building from the 1890’s. You have the entire floor to yourself.
The apartment has one bedroom with a kingsize bed, and an open kitchen and living room. You can enjoy a lovely breakfast in of the wonderful places around the corner or in the Vondelpark or Foodhallen, all within walking distance.

name: Central canal apartment
description:
This bright & stylish apartment is perfectly located in a very central part of the city.
The key Amsterdam highlights are within short walking distance: main museums are 8 minute walk, De Pijps trendy restaurants, bars & cafes are a 2 minute walk & many metro or tram stops from 200m.
Located on a canal and facing north you can sit in the beautiful afternoon sun & enjoy an exceptional view of classic Amsterdam canals.
This place is perfectly set up for couples, business traveler’s & families.

name: Your  waggon at the cows paradise

This house is centrally located on the edge of the Jordaan. It is spacious (100 sqr meters) has 2 floors, 3 bedrooms, 2 balconies and a roofterras.
We focus on families or couples as the house is located near all hotpots of Amsterdam but located in a quiet neighborhood. It his only 200 meters away from 'the Jordaan' and has all necessary shops for groceries within 100 meters.

name: M&M's Guest House (with free parking space)
description:
We're back! After being closed due to our own travels, our B&B is open again.

Like to get away from the busy city center?Come stay with us in "Amsterdam Noord," the up-and-coming, creative northern part of our beautiful city. We have prepared you a cozy, private little apartment in a former shipyard building, adjacent to Amsterdam's oldest city forest.

From our B&B it's a 10-minute bike ride to the free ferry that will take you to city center, or a 20-minute walk to the metro station.

name: Great apartment in central location in Amsterdam.
description: Our apartment lies in a quiet neighbourhood, though very close to the city center. That makes it a great getaway for people who want to be in the city but prefer to sleep quietly during the night. Our house is 85 m2 and is suitable for couples or a family with two small children.

description:
This stylish place to stay is perfect for a city trip in Amsterdam.

Spacious light apartment (75m2) with one spacious bedroom, modern bathroom and kitchen, desk for remote working and sunny balcony.

We live in a safe neighbourhood nearby public transport, culinary restaurants, coffee spots, park, shops and museums.

name: Marshall speakers and a bar await you
description: Welcome to Ruby Emma Hotel, Amsterdam. Embracing a modern vibe, these stylish yet compact rooms offer contemporary comforts in a retro-chic setting. Order an e-guitar and enjoy your in-room Marshall speakers, or relax at the bar. Experience the perfect blend of convenience, sophistication, and vintage flair during your stay in the heart of the city.

name: Woning in Amsterdam noord met tuin
description:
Full house in Amsterdam Noord, 1 minute walk from the Noorderpark and the Noorderpark swimming pool. Within 5 minutes cycling you are on the ferry, or you can take the metro, which is a 15-minute walk away. This will take you to the city center of Amsterdam in 20 minutes.

In addition, it is a 7-minute bike ride from NDSM wharf and there are nice restaurants and bars nearby. For fun tips, send a message. Booking in advance is often recommended.

name: Light-filled modern apartment with rooftop terrace
description:
Enjoy the quiet of our stunning, light-filled apartment located between two city parks. The living space has a modern cozy charm and is set up for a young family. There are two bedrooms, 1 with a sofa bed for visitors and access to both a roof terrace and balcony.
We live in the residential area of Oud West, known for its community vibe. Our apartment looks out on a much loved playground. At a walks distance you will find local cafes, ethnic restaurants, vintage shops and outdoor markets.

name: Chic apartment in De Baarjes
description:
Welcome to this cozy 65 m² apartment in the vibrant De Baarsjes. This open-concept home combines a fully-equipped kitchen with a relaxing living area. The bedroom features a comfortable elevating king-size bed and, like the living room, is equipped with a TV and Netflix. Just steps from the door, enjoy Amsterdam's famed coffee culture. Rembrandtpark and Vondelpark are within walking distance. A tram stop in front of the building (10 min ride to Dam)
Registration number: 0363 637B 6D39 17CD A5B4

name: Romantic Boathouse inclusive hot tub
description: Escape to tranquil Eastern Docks, an island near Amsterdam's center. The Wheelhouse, our unique Airbnb, is a haven for true relaxation. Enjoy delightful breakfast views and leisurely afternoons with a beer, wine, or a cozy bath. Towels provided, 1.95 height clearance for cozy comfort. Experience city buzz and serene Eastern Docks, a peaceful retreat moments from the bustling center. Welcome to our Wheelhouse paradise—your gateway to a new Amsterdam adventure. See you soon!

name: Cosy house with garden, 10min. from City centre!
description:
My house, that I share with my two kids is a cute and cosy house, located in the North of Amsterdam. The house is 100m2, two floors and a nice little garden. The house had three bedrooms, one bedroom with a big double bed, two rooms with single beds. If wanted an extra matrass can be placed on the floor.
I have two cats that need to be taken care of as well. They are called Pim and Einstein and are super cute and great with kids. My house is not suitable for party people!

name: Luxury Wellness - Boat & Boost Amsterdam
description:
Discover a world of luxury and relaxation in the Luxury Wellness Suite of Boost Amsterdam.

Stay in style on our unique Luxury Wellness Houseboat and experience the freedom of life on the bustling waters of Amsterdam. Wake up with breathtaking views and enjoy the serene tranquility that the water provides as you surround yourself with luxury and comfort.

Don't miss this unique experience and book your magical wellness stay at Boost on Amsterdam's water today.
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Cozy apartment in Amsterdam West
description:
The flat is located in the heart of Oud West. 10-mins walking from the beautiful Vondelpark and Rembrandpark, in a quiet and peaceful street. By bike you can reach Joordan district in 9 mins and Dam square in 12.
Flat has been renovated in May 2022 and has all the comforts. The lovely balcony outside overlooks a beautiful tree that occupies the courtyard. A few meters from the house is Jan pieter Heijestraat, a beautiful characteristic street full of restaurants, bars and stores. Enjoy!

name: Triple Room, ontbijt is inbegrepen.
description:
From this charming accommodation located in the `Rosse neighborhood' you can reach popular shops, restaurants and bars in no time. Just an 8-minute walk from Central Station. Paid parking is 10 minutes away.
We are happy to help our guests with their plans and provide them with all the information for a pleasant stay in our beautiful city.

Breakfast included.

name: lovely apartment Amsterdam West
description:
We like to welcome you in our beautiful old (1937) apartment in one of the nicest neighborhoods in Amsterdam. Its only a 20 minute walk to the hart of the center (Dam square, Jordaan) or 4 min with the tram. But also in the direct area there are lots of nice bars, restaurants, coffee & thee rooms etc. The street itself is very quiet with no street noise. Hope to welcome you soon!

NOTE: suitable for 1 couple, or parents and 2 children (as one bed is only 120 meter)

name: Fully renovated funky/classic house in Amsterdam
description: Beautiful, renovated traditional home in trendy North Amsterdam. Families preferred. Suitable for 5 adults and 1 child.  1 master bedroom with 180x210 bed & bathroom ensuite.  1 bedroom with 180x200 bed and bathroom. 1 bedroom with kids bed (small and not suitable for adults) and adult single bed. Big garden and space to relax. Reach the city centre by bike in 20 mins or use the metro/bus. Best of both worlds: quiet green place yet close to city centre. You will love it!

name: Luxurious Canal View Apartment
description:
Located in the most exclusive canal in Amsterdam, you cannot beat this AAA location. In the heart of the old town, located in the Jordaan district, you are close to all of the major attractions and will be in the vibe of the creative district of Amsterdam.

There is one main bedroom with a brand new king sized bed, and an extra flexible bedroom (queen size fold down bed) joined to the living room, via a privacy curtain. In total here are 2 double beds, 2 toilets, 1 shower.

Stay in the gorgeous flat located next to the Vondelpark in the well known Helmersbuurt of Amsterdam.

This spacious flat located on the ground floor in a quite residential area offers the perfect spot to explore Amsterdam from.

description: Go for the real life Amsterdam boathouse experience!! A beautiful private room with a private bathroom in the centre of Amsterdam. A nice houseboat near the 9 streets, Anne Frank House, the Dam, Flowermarket, Kalverstraat, Westermarkt, Vondelpark, Leidsesquare, Museumsquare, Rembrandsquare. You will enjoy this place a lot, you have a lot of privacy, there is a nice atmosphere and the neighborhood is great. This space is fit for couples, solo adventurers and business travelers.

name: Comfortable apartement Amsterdam (East, Amstel)
description: Modern 2-room apartment in the Transvaalbuurt, quietly located but still close to the city center. The apartment has a hall, living room, separate kitchen, bathroom with shower and sink, separate toilet and a bedroom (1 x double bed). Facilities: a supermarket (2 minutes walking distance), many restaurants and bars (Beukenplein; 4 minutes walking distance) and the Oosterpark (3 minutes). Accessibility: Metro Wibaut (5 minutes walking distance), Amstel Train Station (8 minutes)

name: Luxe en grote appartement 624

name: Windmill Apartment
description:
Enjoy one of the most iconic views in Amsterdam. Our apartment overlooks beautiful canals and a windmill.

A clean, spacious and central apartment, perfect for two to explore trendy Amsterdam East. Wander through the bustling, vibrant Dappermarkt with a coffee, or hire a boat and float along the canals. If you are looking for open leafy spaces, the Oosterpark, Flevopark and Frankendael are perfect destinations for a bike ride.

Excellent public transport connections to take you anywhere!

name: 17th Century Monumental Canal house
description: Spacious 180m2 2 level apartment in a 17th Century Monumental Canal house directly along the Amstel. 50m2 private garden. It's a short taxi or bikeride to various other highlights, like the Rijksmuseum, the Van Gogh Museum or the Stedelijk museum.

name: Apartment in Amsterdam with balcony
description: Welcome to our charming apartment with balcony in Amsterdam Oost! Nestled in a vibrant neighbourhood, our one-bedroom space offers the perfect base for your Amsterdam adventure. Enjoy the convenience of nearby cafes, shops, and public transport, making it easy to explore all that Amsterdam has to offer.  There are multiple bus and tram connections to Central Station or other parts of the city or go by bike. Book now and experience the best of Amsterdam! Apartment located on the 2nd floor.

name: A city centre location
description:
The apartment is well-located in the center of Amsterdam in the typical area of De Jordaan. The Anne Frank house is 600 meters walking into the center and around the house there are a lot of nice bars, restaurants and shops.

In front of the house is a tramstop, where tram 13 and 17 can take you to or from the Amsterdam Central Station. There are also several busses that can take you to all the corners of the city. The room is above my embroidery shop, which opens at 11:00 closes at 18:00.

name: Private & Cozy Room close to centre.
description: Private Room in a historic building (late 19th century)  in the East of Amsterdam. Close to the center (15 min) and to the main attractions; well connected with public transportation. And Dog kisses included.

name: City Centre Boutique Deluxe Room in Monument
description: The Blossom House Amsterdam is located in a typical monumental Amsterdam House and is located in the Jordaan, in the center of Amsterdam around the corner of the Prinsengracht, Anne Frank House, nine streets and Westerkerk. The ideal location to explore Amsterdam! The room has a seating area and a sleeping area. You have your own bathroom and separate toilet. The room also has a dining table and a pantry with a water kettle and a Nespresso coffee machine.

name: Appartement in centrum Amsterdam
description: From this perfectly located home base, all the attractions are at your fingertips. Vondelpark, Jordaan, museum square, Leidseplein, the Kate market, market halls, museums. Very central in the popular Kinkerbuurt and easily accessible by public transport from Schiphol and Central Station. Tram literally stops in front of the door. You step out the front door and you get directly into the lively and cozy Kinkerstraat. Between the Bilderdijkstraak and Hoek da costa quay with shops and restaurants.

name: Private room - Amsterdam Oost
description:
Private room in the shared apartment with shared bathroom in Amsterdam East.
Amsterdam Central Station or Dam Square in 20 min.
2 single beds, which can be put together and make King size bed. + Big sofa.

In the apartment there is a balcony, shared bathroom, shared toilette.

Cooking is NOT ALLOWED! but you can use fridge and kettle.

Please DON'T consider this place if you plan to come to be only inside and constantly smoke a weed.

Windows faces quiet neighborhood

I live in this flat myself

name: Luxurious and Modern apartment|Fully private
description: Located in the vibrant Old-East district of Amsterdam! This newly renovated studio includes a bedroom with comfy queen-size bed,  en-suite bathroom, a smart tv and  a small kitchenette that includes a fridge, kettle and coffee machine equipped with high quality coffee and tea options. If you are looking to stay in a luxurious apartment, located in a quiet yet lively neighborhood with perfect connection into the city center, then this is the place for you! Ideal for couples and solo travelers.

name: Cozy room in a quiet area of Amsterdam centre.
description: Private room in a quiet residential area in the city centre. You're a 20  minute walk or 5 minute bus ride away from central station and Dam square. The local market, city beach, zoo and micro brewery are all within walking distance. Simple bathroom and separate toilet in the hallway. (Shared with me, the host/resident when there). The apartment is at the quiet top floor (4th) of the building, stairs only!

description:
We rent out our apartment in the cozy Amsterdam Oud-West. This apartment is spacious, bright and recently renovated and therefore equipped with every comfort (including new kitchen and bathroom)!
Less than a minute walk away, you are on the cozy: J.P. Heijestraat. There are many restaurants and boutiques here.

In short: many highlights of Amsterdam within a stone's throw.

of which 1 kingssize) and is fully equipped. From the cozy and bright living room you look out over the roofs of other houses. In addition, the apartment has a bathroom with a spacious walk-in shower. The open kitchen has a dishwasher and is fully equipped.

description:
Situated in a private mews, our recently refurbished studio offers a comfortable home within walking distance of the Museum Quarter (Rijks, Van Gogh and Stedelijk Museums), Vondelpark & Leidseplein

Sleeping up to two guests, the studio is ideal for your leisure or business stay in the centre of Amsterdam and for long(er) term stays

description:
Sunny houseboat apartment. The ideal spot for a relaxed and safe holiday.
Private entrance, kitchen, living room, bathroom + 2 bedrooms.
The bright kitchen in the lofty former wheelhouse has windows all around + a private little deck, to enjoy sun rise and sun set.
Supermarket, restaurants etc at 5 minutes walking.
Boat ride and swimming possible, right from the boat.

name: Lovely private bedroom in Amsterdam East!
description:
Hi! My girlfriend and I welcome you to our house! You’ll have a bedroom next to the (shared) bathroom and there is a study-room inbetween our bedrooms. So you’ll have plenty of privacy!
We’re happy to provide tips and try to give you the best stay possible.

You can always ask for an arrangement: so book for 1 night through the app and do the other days informally.

Btw we work during the week, so we find it really important that our night’s rest is respected!

See you soon!

Macey and Thomas

name: City beach apartment
description:
Prived sunny apartment with a big terrace on the island of Wittenburg in a quiet part of the center of Amsterdam.
Wittenburg Island is a part of the city centre where in 1700 the Dutch ships where built. The Maritime Museum is around the corner and the central station close by. Today Wittenburg is a quiet area of the center of Amsterdam, surrounded by water. Next door is a city beach with a nice bar/restaurant.

name: Authentic Farmhouse The Vergulden Eenhoorn 3
description:
There is great history behind the hotel. The Vergulden Eenhoorn was established in 1702 as a city farm and used to be one of very few farmhouses the city of Amsterdam has.

Together with the city of Amsterdam the farmhouse was fully renovated to modern standards, while maintaining the historic value and its features.

The space is fully equipped with all necessities to make your stay as comfortable as possible!

name: Your nice waggon at the cows paradise
description: The pipowaggon, as we call the caravan, is located on a modern farm where cows are milked. You have a marvellous view over the countryside and you will experience silence and darkness. So close to Amsterdam you are in an overwhelming nature. The cowstable is a real adventure to visit. Cows everywhere. They walk around freely and in the same stable you can see the just born calves. Outside the waggon is a terrace with a nice view on the countryside. In the night you can count the stars.
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Appartement Amsterdam De Pijp
description: This centrally located accommodation in the Amsterdam Pijp is tastefully decorated.

name: Cosy apartment, only for small families
description:
Our comfortable and romantically lit apartment in the city centre (58 square meters) is suitable for, and will only be rented to, small families (two adults and a child, and a baby). There is a large double bed and, in the second room, a double sofa bed.
The apartment is on the top (4th) floor and can be reached by elevator. Prize is all-inclusive. Free wifi.

name: Stylish apartment with garden
description:
Welcome to our charming Airbnb apartment in the bustling neighborhood of the Baarsjes, close to the Vondelpark. Our cozy stay is great for couples and adventurous travelers. De Baarsjes offers boutiques, cozy cafes and eateries. The Vondelpark, Amsterdam's green lung, is a short walk away, ideal for picnics and relaxation.
This apartment offers an authentic experience. Please book now for an unforgettable adventure!

name: Ruime woning in Amsterdam oost
description: Get away from it all in this spacious accommodation located in a quiet but very centrally located neighborhood in the center of Amsterdam. A 5-minute walk away, there are 2 supermarkets (Albert Heijn and Vomar). There are also several cafes and restaurants within walking distance. Amsterdam central station can be reached within 10 minutes by bike or bus; walking it is 20-25 minutes. Recommended nearby are Artis (Zoo), the Maritime Museum, the Hortus, the Tropenmuseum and the Nemo Science Museum.

name: Generator -Superior Twin
description: Enjoy comfort in our Superior Twin room at Generator Amsterdam, featuring 2 single beds perfect for sharing with a friend or travel partner. The room includes a private bathroom for your convenience, with towels and toiletries supplied. A hair dryer is also provided to ensure you have everything you need for a comfortable stay. This room offers a cozy and practical space for your visit to Amsterdam.

name: Lovely independent room Amsterdam Center near IJ
description: Room near  Amsterdam-Center, Central Station, river IJ. Tram 7, tram 26. Walking distance: shopping center, restaurants, cafés, Bagels&Beans, bakery, bookshop. Cosy, independent, privacy, no stairs. In architectural interesting area. Room has floor heating, Moroccan floor tiles, private bathroom with rain/handshower, bath towels. Refrigerator, nespresso, watercooker, showergel, douchegel, handsoap, fohn. Internet, wifi, smart tv, table with two chairs. Bicycles can be rented nearby.

name: Kamer aan de mooiste gracht van Amsterdam
description: Guest accommodation in a monumental building on a quiet canal in the heart of Amsterdam (Jordaan), just around the corner from Anne Frank's Secret Annex and the Westerkerk, overlooking the Bloemgracht. Everything is nearby to enjoy!
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Appartement in Stadsdeel Noord
description: Discover the perfect blend of comfort and convenience in this cozy 1-bedroom apartment. Featuring a fully equipped kitchen, a comfortable couch, and a queen-size bed, this charming space is ideal for singles or couples. Located just minutes away from the bustling city center by metro, you'll have easy access to all the excitement and amenities the city has to offer!

name: Exclusive studio. Sarphatipark de Pijp
description: Exclusive studio 30m2 on the 2nd floor. At the back of a mansion. Acces is via a steep stairway. You’ll get a charming room and a small bathroom with shower and toilet. To enrich our guests, there is a comfortable bed with hotel linens, modern art and vintage items. It's got a view over the gardens.

name: Enchanting parkview penthouse w/fireplace&terrace!
description: Exquisitely designed  90 m2 apartment with a unique delightful rooftop terrace in the elegant historical Amsterdam East area, overlooking an old graceful park! Enjoy the observatory Oosterpark views from a spacious living room with a wood-burning fireplace or get enchanted by the intimate cosiness of our renovated bedroom upstairs, fusing Art Deco and Marrakech riad inspirations! Indulge in our spa bathroom with mother-in-pearl mosaic or lounge on a magnificent 220x240 bed with a view :)

name: Scandinavian-inspired apartment - Amsterdam center
description:
Experience the best both worlds Amsterdam has to offer - sit in an authentic residential area, yet close to the dazzling center of Amsterdam!

Situated between Maritime Museum (8-min walk) and Artis zoo (12-min walk), this Scandinavian-inspired apartment is perfect for couples, solo travelers & business visitors seeking a relaxing base to explore the city. Supermarket literally around the corner, cafes/restaurants/bars nearby.

Feeling cozy staying inside? A home cinema is ready for your use!

name: Charmante woonboot Amsterdam
description:
Your stay in this charming houseboat will stay with you for a long time. You imagine yourself "on vacation", even in the middle of all the cozy hustle and bustle of the city, you will experience peace, romance and privacy here.
Except for the ducks swimming by, they just cheekily lurk in ;)

name: Stylish private garden studio
description:
In the heart of Amsterdam East, a popular area in Amsterdam, you’ll find the groundfloor studio. It is located in a typical Amsterdam house, built in 1884. We recently transformed our library into this nice and cosy private studio.
Possibly, there is a baby cot available.

name: Spacious 2 story family apartment + small garden
description: House is suitable for max 2 adults and 2 kids. Beautiful light home, on the ground and first floor including a garden, two small bedrooms and 1 master bedroom. 10 minutes by bike to city centre. Shops nearby, park nearby, in friendly neighborhood.

name: Canal Room
description:
Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally-located place.We are located on the Passeerdersgracht in the heart of historic Amsterdam. Touristic hotspots like the Anne Frank House, Dam Square, Leidse Square and the Rijksmuseum are within walking distance. Enjoy the view from your room on the peaceful gardens.

The apartment is fully equipped: a fully equipped kitchen, full bathroom, two half bathrooms, dining table, double king beds, comfortable couch, a lovely balcony and air conditioning!

Perfect for a romantic weekend away in Amsterdam!

Midtown Hotel is situated at the edge of the center in one of the most popular areas in Amsterdam. Only 5 minutes from Leidseplein, Vondelpark, Museum district and the “9 straatjes” popular for its cozy restaurants and boutique shops.

name: Beautiful studio on river front
description: Our studio-appartement is situated in a new neighborhood, along the IJ-river. You can stay with us with a maximum of 4 people. There is one double bed and a sleeping couch for 2. The studio has it's own bathroom, there is a microwave-oven and fridge and you can make your own coffee or tea. We also have a small garden that you can use. The center of Amsterdam is nearby, with the tram you can reach it in 3 stops, approx. 10 minutes. The highway is nearby and we have one free parking space.

name: Luxury Leidseplein with Private Patio
description:
Awesome and quiet spot, 1 minute from Leidseplein, 3 minutes from Vondelpark and 5 minutes from Museumdistrict and on the edge of Jordaan in centre of Amsterdam.

The owner lives above the unit and is available to make your stay as pleasant as possible. It also means no-party rule will be strictly observed.

It is on the ground floor (no steep stairs), there are two separate bedrooms, one of them ensuite to the living room.

Patio in the back has a curfew in place from 22:00 to 10:00.
