Our digital-enabled guest journey without a physical reception and staff on-site makes your stay more convenient.

name: Cosy room (& 2 bikes) in a lively neighborhood
description: We offer a cosy private room inside our own apartment (home sharing) for you to enjoy Amsterdam the local way! Make it even more local by using the two bikes that are included in the price! You will be able to stay in our cosy apartment in a lovely and lively neighborhood. The room has a double bed and a closet for you to use. You share the living room, kitchen, bathroom and toilet with us.

name: The Majestic pearl
description:
Catamaran Yachting Experience – Majestic Pearl Schellingwoude

Welcome aboard the Majestic Pearl, a unique experience at a luxurious catamaran yacht. Enjoy stunning lake views from the spacious lounge area, sit down for the famous sunset from Schellingwoude (8-10pm), or take the bicycle and do a tremendous bicycle right true traditional Dutch villages and sluices and dikes.

name: Hotel Weber Four Person Room
description: This hotel is located in the heart of Amsterdam and surrounded by Amsterdams favorite hotspots. The room suits 4 people and has everything you need for a pleasant stay in Amsterdam.

name: Nice apartment in hotspot Oud-West
description: In the middle of hotspot 'De Hallen', in the 'cosy village within Oud-West: WG-terrain', you can stay in a nice, comfortable apartment, within 10/15 minutes walking of the centre (Leidseplein).

name: Cozy & Spacious Green Oasis  — Free Parking!
description:
Enjoy a spacious and bright apartment in Amsterdam North, with easy access to the city center of Amsterdam.

The entire house is available for your use, with two spacious bedrooms, one with a double bed and one with two single beds, perfect for couples or families.

Take advantage of the proximity to plenty of green spaces and supermarkets, while parking for free right in front of the door.

Note: Parties are not allowed in this house.

name: Private studio with amazing canal view & bathroom
description:
*Unique canal view & Perfect location!*

We are located on the Prinsengracht canal in the heart of historic Amsterdam.
The room is located on the first floor, front side, in a 17th century monumental canal house. The room and bathroom are private for you.

!!Please be aware that because this location is in the middle of the city, you might experience noise disturbance at night from the city that never sleeps!!

We hope to welcome you soon and enjoy the lively Prinsengracht canal.
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Sunny Amsterdam East Harbor View
description: Lofty, sunny apartment with great view over the water. Relaxing and chilled atmosphere that balances the Amsterdam buzz. A good place for couples, young families and groups of three.
amenities: ['Free washer – In unit', 'Canal view', 'Bathtub', 'City skyline view', 'Board games', 'Baking sheet']

name: ★ AMAZING PRIVATE CANAL APARTMENT ★ A++ LOCATION ★
description:
This is just the perfect location to explore Amsterdam.

Your place is fully private in a quiet, residential building and has recently been renovated.

The bedroom has a comfortable double queen sized bed.

In the direct surrounding there is ample choice of hundreds of nice local shops and restaurants. There's also a laundromat directly around the corner.

name: Gypsy Waggon - A villa on wheels
description:
A huge Gypsy waggon is redesigned as a hotel room and located on a sheepfarm just outside Amsterdam. A unique way to become familiar with the life on the countryside. The waggon has two bedrooms with two single beds and four single beds. In the wagen is a kitchen, a fridge, coffee and tea machines, heating and it has electricity.
Minimum stay is 2 nights. Full corona proof with a private bathroom.

name: Prachtig appartement in Oud-West
description:
This beautifully centrally located accommodation is tastefully decorated retro. Location absolute must, 10 minutes walk from the canals and downtown Amsterdam.

The apartment is next to a local craft market for delicious food. It is also around the corner from "de Hallen", cultural and gastronomic center in Amsterdam. In 10 minutes walk you will be in the hip Jordaan neighborhood.

Upon arrival, there is a laundry list of tips and insights about the nicest places and attractions nearby.

name: Best location Lovely 2BR Jordaan  Apartment
description: Welcome to our charming apartment located in the heart of the Jordaan! This stylish and comfortable accommodation can accommodate up to four guests, making it perfect for a family getaway or a trip with friends. The apartment features two beautiful bedrooms, each decorated with attention to detail and comfort. The unique atmosphere of the Jordaan is just around the corner, with picturesque streets, cozy cafes, and local markets waiting to be explored.

name: Houseboat Suite Canal Prinsengracht van Gogh Suite
description:
2 HouseBoatSuites Amsterdam ! Stop looking, you found the most characteristic way to stay and enjoy Amsterdam: have your own floating home experience. There are no shared areas, just the hallway. Rest is private. You have a 1 suite and private bathroom with you own entrance on It's docked at Prinsengracht, right at the most beautiful main canal.
2 houseboat suites Amsterdam has a bigger room on the corner also available. see advertising BoatHouse, House Boat, Canal House, Nine streets,.

name: Jordaan Corner: A stylish studio.
description: The studio is located in the heart of the Jordaan. You'll be living in the nicest street of the Jordaan. The Jordaan is one of the oldest and most beautiful areas of Amsterdam with its authentic architecture, fine restaurants, cute shops and hip galleries. The studio is on the  first floor. You'll have the comfort of a private bathroom.

name: City Oasis in Park Centraal
description:
Urban-modern interior is a cool contrast to its historic architecture and location.
Smack dab in the middle of the Fashion & Museum district.
Houses trendy MOMO, where the locals come to wine, dine and unwind.

Our cosiest room sets the bar for style and substance. Enjoy a supremely comfortable double bed, desk study and a bathroom with a walk-in rain shower.

16 m²
Open-concept bathroom with walk-in rain shower
Espresso machine
Minibar
City Tax to be paid at check-in/check-out

name: Cute apartment in the east
description:
Perfect getaway form the crowded city centre of Amsterdam and Utrecht.
Spacious home perfect for large groups of coworkers or a big family.

14 minute walk to the local train station, from which it takes you roughly 30 minutes to the hart of Amsterdam or Utrecht.
Even though the big cities are close by, everything you might need on a relaxing holiday is whit in grasp.
The house is ideal for the combining of leisure and work.

By car 35 minutes tot international airport Schiphol Amsterdam.

name: Top located Apartment In Amsterdam Old West
description:
Welcome to our cozy 70m² apartment in Amsterdam’s Old-West. It features:

- A quiet bedroom with a balcony
- Fully-equipped modern kitchen
- Comfy living area
- Separate office with a screen

Extra room that can be made into a second bedroom for stays of 2 weeks or more

Ideal for exploring the city or staying longer term, but not suitable for parties or loud activities.

(Photos are not professional, but I will make sure tenants arrive to a very clean and professionally prepared apartment!)

name: Knusse studio in bijzonder pand.
description:
The b&b is in a new quiet neighborhood in a green area surrounded by water. In the neighborhood, a lot of special architecture with a modern character. Swimming water is 20 meters away from the house.
Nearby Restaurant with terrace on the water. Shops nearby. Bike rental at Central Station. Connection to the center of Amsterdam by tram 26 in less than 15 minutes. For parking P+R sea castle, or in front of the door ( paid)

name: Luxury house with beautiful garden - Amsterdam
description:
Our beautiful ground floor house (70 m2) with garden (70 m2) in the heart of Amsterdam East, 10 minutes from downtown Amsterdam.
The house where we live and which we rent out when we go on vacation ourselves or are away for a weekend.
The house is located in a cozy neighborhood with many terraces, cafes, restaurants, shops and two beautiful parks within 5 minutes walking distance. Tram, train and bus in front of the door.
amenities: ['Free washer – In unit', 'Barbecue utensils', 'Private backyard – Fully fenced', 'Outdoor furniture', 'Blender', 'Outdoor dining area', 'Baking sheet']

name: Exclusive Private Room Canalhouse I
description: We are a young couple who can provide a beautiful Bed/Bath Room (En suite) in an unique Canal-House on the most beautiful and peaceful part of the Keizers Canal in the City Centre.

name: Casa Nana - New House & Perfect for Working Online
description:
Available Short&Long term stay with Affordable Price!
Feel Free to ask us :)

NEW stunning 2 story apartment!
Natural light fills the cosy living room, modern fully-equipped style kitchen, comfy bedroom & Balcony.

Work&play seamlessly!
Dedicated office(standing desk&2 Monitors+Apple Keyboard+Sonos Beam Soundbar)

*ROOFTOP Terrace*

Central gem!
Steps from shops, parks, restaurants & bars.
City convenience in a quiet Neighbourhood.

Modern perks: rain shower, washing machine, smart lights.

name: Appartement with view, Oud-West (Old-west)
description:
Spacious apartment, about 75 m2 in Oud West with a view over the Bellamyplein. Right across is the famous Foodhallen and Cinema. The neighbourhood is quiet, and near to the Jordaan and Vondelpark.

The appartement is on the second and third floor. It has its own entrance which is not shared with other neighbours. On the second floor is the large livingroom (40m2) and the kitchen, on the third floor the bathroom and bedroom as well as a terrace.

name: Appartment walking distance from Jordaan!
description: Nice modern apartment walking distance from the Jordaan! Perfect for a couple, with a small extra room for a baby. Ground floor with a big sunny garden and a big living room with couch.
amenities: ['Free washer – In unit', 'Private backyard – Fully fenced', 'Outdoor furniture', 'Bathtub', 'Free dryer – In unit']

name: Apartment near Vondelpark
description:
Welcome to our apartment located in the vibrant Oud-West neighborhood, just steps away from Vondelpark in Amsterdam, situated on the first floor (no elevator). This cozy apartment offers a comfortable stay for couples or solo travelers. It features a spacious living room, equipped kitchen, and a cozy bedroom for a restful sleep. Enjoy the lovely bathroom and a sunny balcony throughout the day.

Tramlines are a 5-minute walk away, and Station Lelylaan (near Schiphol) is a 30-minute walk.

name: Sneeuwbalstraat
description: Experience authentic Dutch charm in our cozy 100m2 house in peaceful Amsterdam Noord. Complete with a lush garden, to enjoy your morning coffee, open kitchen, comfy bedroom, versatile office space with a balcony. Ideal for a couple or 2 friends to enjoy a longer stay. A true gem hidden away just minutes from the city heart. Next to the park, swimming pool, shops bars and natural reserve. (Z/24/2309843)
amenities: ['Private backyard – Fully fenced', 'Outdoor furniture', 'Blender', 'Bathtub', 'Board games', 'Outdoor dining area', 'Baking sheet']

name: Lovely loft next to the Vondelpark
description: No description
amenities: ['Free washer – In unit', 'Private backyard – Fully fenced', 'Outdoor furniture', 'Blender', 'Bathtub', 'Children’s dinnerware']

name: Renovated Bright & Cosy Apartment near City Center
description:
A beautiful, light, and renovated apartment in Amsterdam East. The apartment exudes a cozy warmth with 2 delightful balconies at the front and rear. The open kitchen ensures a continuous connection with the inviting living and dining area, allowing you to unwind after a vibrant day in the city.

Shops, restaurants, cafes, and public transportation are all within walking distance.

We look forward to welcoming you here!

name: Cosy & sunny apartment. Perfect location!
description: This cosy & sunny apartment is in the best area of Amsterdam,  in 'Oud West' . Which is the perfect location in Amsterdam if you want to be close to the center  (5 minutes by bike / 15 minutes walking )  but have your privacy, chilled strolls trough the city and quiet sleeps. Strolling around in the lovely neighborhood is my favorite thing with so many great coffee places, shops and restaurants. Also only 5 minute walk from the beautiful Vondelpark <3

name: Unieke Historische Woonboot In Amsterdam
description: Looking for an unforgettable experience in Amsterdam? Come and stay on our newly built houseboat. We offer a lovely quiet space where you have everything to yourself and have your own entrance. The ship is located in Amsterdam East in a cozy, bustling neighborhood, yet close to the city center. When you are on the ship you have a beautiful view over the harbor and drink something on your own terrace. Borrow our bikes and discover the bustling city center where you can be in 10 minutes.
amenities: ['Free washer – In unit', 'Outdoor furniture', 'Free dryer – In unit', 'Outdoor dining area']

name: Lovely apartment in Old West
description: Cosy and creative one bedroom apartment with roof top terrace. Located in a vibrant neighborhood close to the city centre.

name: Bright one bedroom apartment
description: This bright, spacious apartment is located in the heart of the city, in the famous neighbour hood of the Jordaan. The apartment has stunning views of Amsterdam, a clean minimalistic interior yet a fun pop of colour throughout the apartment, making it youthful, yet stylish.

name: Nathalie and Dave's Studio
description: The studio is in a quiet residential area in the East of Amsterdam.  Off the beaten tourist track it offers a great variety of bars, cafes and restaurants.  With a subway line nearby it offers a 5 minute direct link with downtown Amsterdam.

name: Wellness Suite in center+ bicycles+ SAUNA
description: This canal house is located in the city center at the picturesque Prinsengracht, facing the famous nine little streets, which is a unique area for shopping.  Anne Frank House, Rijksmuseum, Van Gogh museum and Vondelpark  are a 15-minute walk.  Two bicycles free to use. The private bathroom includes a whirlpool bath and personal sauna. No breakfast provided, but restaurants and supermarket around the corner.

name: Q-Factory Hotel: The Artist for 4
description:
Featuring free WiFi throughout the property, Q-Factory Hotel offers accommodation in Amsterdam. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant. Parking is available at the nearby Q-Park Oostpoort at a surcharge.

Every room is fitted with a flat-screen TV with cable channels. Each room includes a private bathroom.

name: Sunny apartment in Amsterdam
description:
Sunny, spacious and airy apartment in the middle of Amsterdam West - Baarsjes. It's been my favourite place for the last decade and still enjoying it every day. The open layout, wall lighting and many windows creates a relaxed vibe and enables perfectly for day to day work, evening diners or Sunday chill sessions.

The apartment accommodates working remote work perfectly. A light room with a wooden desk, 27" monitor and perfect internet.

** Preferably for remote worker(s)

name: Perfectly located & pretty loft
description:
This spacious and sunny hood home is in the most perfect location in the heart of Amsterdam! With stunning views! The studio has a nice kitchen with a combi oven microwave, Quooker and coffee maker! In addition, there is a lovely double sofa bed.

This spacious and sunny studio is located in the most perfect location in the heart of Amsterdam! The studio has a nice kitchen with an oven, microwave, Quooker and coffee maker! There is also a lovely double sofa bed.

name: Marnix Modern: Supercentral
description:
APARTMENT HIGHLIGHTS:
- Modern and light
- 5 single beds and a comfortable sleeping sofa
- Fully equipped open kitchen
- Bathroom with walk-in shower + bathtub
- Separate toilet
- Great view
- Free Wi-fi and TV
- Superb location, downtown and close to everything!

name: Bright modern apartment - near city center
description: Great bright living room with well equiped kitchen, a bedroom with queen size bed and nice bathroom. The apartment is located in a quite area but is just 3km away from Amsterdam Central Station. Within 10 minutes you can be at Central Station; by walking 5 min to metro stop Noord and from there a 5 min metro ride. Perfect for couples or individuals who want to stay in a calm area yet be close to Amsterdam city center.
amenities: ['Free washer – In unit', 'Free dryer – In unit']

name: Houseboat with a panoramic city-view
description: Welcome! I'd like to invite you to come stay at my recently renovated houseboat. Surrounded by nature and only 20 min. from the city center!

name: Amsterdam, IJburg - bnb kamer met eigen voordeur
description: We are in the modern residential area of Ijburg. Our bnb room is suitable for couples or solo travelers who want to visit the city and/or the area. The room has a private front door and bathroom. Bedlinen and towels are included and there is a refrigerator and a kettle to make coffee and tea and WiFi is provided. The tram takes you to the central station in 15 - 20 minutes. Smoking is  not permitted, also not outside in front of the door.

name: Vondelpark house
description: Location next to Vondelpark and in 5 min in city center by bike or tram

name: Retro-mod gem next to 1928 Olympic Stadium
description: Perfect for a family of four (or a group of friends, if two of you don't mind bunk beds!), this room features a walk-in shower and a coffee machine, as well as a walk-in shower and air conditioning . Breakfast is served daily (additional cost) or check out the hotel bar for a night cap. Rent the bikes for a fun family adventure. Free access to the gym and rooftop on the second floor (there's a sauna and a hot tub – need we say more?). The rate does not include city tax.

name: Flat with garden in Oud West, Amsterdam
description:
The flat:
60m2 space that includes one double bedroom with a double bed, single bedroom, kitchen, bathroom with bath/shower, bright open space living/dining area and private garden (approx 35m2)!

The area:
Situated in the Kinkerbuurt in Oud West. You are on the doorstep of de Hallen, a plethora of cafes & restaurants and a local market (Ten Kate Markt).

Getting about:
Well connected with trams 3, 7, 13, 17 & 19 all within 2 minutes walk or nice stroll to the centre.

name: ! Lovely Room in best part of Amsterdam Zuid
description:
This is a Private room with bathroom/WC/Kitchen shared! - Great private room in a very nice apartment in Amsterdam South - Near Vondelpark, WTC and Olympic stadium. Keep it simple at this peaceful and centrally-located place. This is a shared apartment !!!

The room is separated, fully private, and can be locked (both sides) - Visitors can use the common areas including Kitchen/Bar, Bathroom and Toilets as well as the sunny terrace. The private room is hosted by the main host.

name: Modern apartment in Amsterdam South w/ balcony
description:
The 60m2 one-bedroom apartment is located in the Hoofddorpplein area of Amsterdam South. It is within walking distance of various shops, restaurants and the famous Vondelpark. It is also close to the City Center (15 minutes by tram) and is conveniently located close to a metro and bus station.

The apartment is located on the first floor. It is modern and there is a well-equipped kitchen and separate bedroom with queen bed, as well as a spacious living area and balcony.

name: Zen Canal App to rest from a busy day in Amsterdam
description:
Newly renovated!!! Easy access to everything from this centrally located luxurious and zen app. 15-30 minutes to airport, next to trams and buses, 3 minutes walk to the Central Park Vondel Park, and close to all Tourist attractions.

In a trendy neighbourhood Oud West, which has lots of cafes and restaurants to eat and unwind.

Next to the big Canal In Amsterdam, which means viewing the boats coming in from afar. Absolutely relaxed, as there are two balconies, which captures the sun.

name: New: attractive attic with elevator in city center
description: The bnb Heerensolder is located on the Herenmarkt in the famous canal belt of Amsterdam, a UNESCO World Heritage Site,  and less than 10 minutes walking from Central Station. It's on the attic floor of the top apartment in a five-storey building, the Heerenhuys. The bnb can be reached directly from the communal hall with a platform elevator and offers a typical Amsterdam experience. The Heerensolder is characterized by the beautiful original roof trusses and lifting beam and has two beds.

name: Private Apartment in City Center on the Canal Side
description:
Sun’s Home B&B Amsterdam is a luxury guest house nestled in one of Amsterdam’s most popular central suburbs, the Jordaan district.
Nearby you can find the famous Leidseplein and the Damsquare.

The accommodation is defined by a peaceful environment in a beautiful setting.

The guest house owner runs everything with passion and enthusiasm and her goal is to provide our guests with warm and homely accommodation and let it be a home away from home.

name: Attic Monkeys Lodge
description:
Since 2017 this B&B welcomes it's guests in it's playful 400-yr old house in a quiet street in the city center of Amsterdam.

Guests are staying in the top two floors of the building. As the house is old, there is no elevator and you will have to climb the traditional steep stairs (like a monkey) to get to the attic.

After this climb, you'll get rewarded with a cosy, colorful, clean suite with one double and two single beds, private bathroom, private balcony, coffee/ tea & sitting area.

<3

name: Cozy apartment in De Pijp
description: Just get away from it all in this soothing, centrally located accommodation.

name: Luxe appartement op Java eiland
description:
Centrally located apartment in Amsterdam (10 min bike/bus to central station). The apartment is located on the quiet Java Island and has a beautiful view over het IJ-harbour. Within a 10 minute bike ride you find several restaurants and bars
The one bedroom apartment has been fully renovated in 2022 and has a modern and luxurious design. It is fully equipped with a spacious kitchen and living room and a Emperor size bed.

name: Cosy double 500m from Amsterdam Arena
description:
Small Double Room with a double bed is ultra compact, smartly designed, and just what you need for a solid night's sleep. Room features air-conditioning, shower, hair & body wash, fresh towels & linen, TV, free Wifi, en-suite bathroom and blackout blinds for your comfort.
Please note that 12.5% Amsterdam city tourist tax is not included in the Airbnb price and must be paid directly to the hotel.

name: City Center - Romantic Room on Houseboat
description:
Cozy, warm and heated in winter! Welcome on board in B&B Amstel. We are located in front of the H'Art Museum with an overwhelming view on the famous Skinny Bridge.

Anything that floats passes by. Boats, ducks, swans...

Enjoy your own private entry, shower and toilet. Nothing shared. Enter the rear of our 28 meters barge with a key safe.

We are in the City Center yet on a quiet street with no cars, only bikes. Around us lots of things to see and do. We're in the middle of the fun.

25+ up!

name: Complete apartment on best canal
description: Great apartment on the best possible location in central amsterdam, right accross the Pulitzer hotel. 2 large bedrooms, good living room, balcony, all amenities and great view. The apartment is clean, light, and perfect for a maximum of 4 visitors.

name: Casa Vrolik, Amsterdam, Oosterparkbuurt BnB 2pp.
description:
Here you can book the double room for 1 or 2 with a small dining area on the same floor. There is a smaller 1 pp room on the same floor under the listing 1pp. Guests share the shower, bathroom and kitchenette as well as the sitting area with the guest in the other room.

If you fly into Europe, i'd love it if you'd compensate for your CO2-emisssion. When you let me know you did i will give you a little discount. I dont support flying within Europe. Do consider the train or bus instead. Tell me!
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Charming loft apartment Jordaan
description: On the top floor (4 stairs) of a characteristic monumental building in the middle of the lively Jordaan, you will find this soothing and atmospheric sunbathing house overlooking the Westertoren. The loft apartment is spacious 65m2 and has 1 bathroom (shower, sink and wc), 1 double bed, an open living room and kitchen (incl. dishwasher and washing machine) and a workspace. Within walking distance are the 9-streets, the Anne Frank house, the Elandsgracht, Dam Square, Westermarkt, Noordermarkt and canal belt.

name: Revitalized industrial harbour district home base
description: The spacious Townster room with plenty of room offers every traveler, whether alone or with company, a modern retreat oasis with the highest comfort. You will find a spacious double bed, a flat-screen TV with screen mirroring function, so you can connect your mobile device and watch your favorite movies, Invisible sound system, a room safe for your valuables, air conditioning and heating, soundproof windows for a good night's sleep, a seating area, full-length mirror and a private bathroom.

name: Ruim en luxe appartement in de Jordaan!
description:
Beautifully spacious and stylishly renovated apartment in a quiet street in the Jordaan.
Walking distance to the nine streets, canals, Noordermarkt, vintage shops and many bars and restaurants.
Central station is also a 10-minute walk away. The apartment is ideal for a couple. For a child, there may be a sofa bed.

name: Numa | M (2 PAX) Studio w/ Kitchen near Flevopark
description: This comfortable studio offers 24 sqm of space. Ideal for up to two people, its double bed (180x200) and modern bathroom with shower make this stay a perfect way to experience Amsterdam. There’s also a kitchen and a dining table, so you’ll have everything you need for maximum comfort and minimal stress.

name: Prachtig appartement in centrum Jordaan
description: Beautiful, bright, centrally located and spacious apartment of 64 m2 in Amsterdam. Ideal for couples. Large kitchen-living room, bedroom and separate workspace if required.  In spring and summer, you can sit in the sun on our balcony during the day. Walking distance to lots of nice restaurants, cafes, and museums.

name: Small Twin Room
description: This stylish space is close to landmarks not to be missed.

name: Lovely & bright apartment with big balcony
description:
This apartment is located in the east part of Amsterdam next to Oosterpark, with walking distance to shops, restaurants, bars and parks. The tram station is just outside of the apartment and which can take you to the centre in 10 minutes.

The apartment is bright and spacious with a big balcony towards the lush inner garden. Here you can enjoy a BBQ and a big lounge during the summer months.
(One extra bedroom with a sleeping couch that can be available upon request for families with children).

name: Luxurious Canal View Loft
description:
Welcome to my canal view loft in the heart of Amsterdam! Fully furnished one-bedroom loft offers a modern living space with stunning canal views. Located in the best central location of Oud-West, you'll be just minutes away from top attractions and some of the city's best restaurants and cafes. Book your stay today and experience the best of Amsterdam in style!

Within 300 meters you will have a bike rental, restaurants and a supermarkt. You can contact me for a boat tour as wel.

name: Spacious apartment near CS
description:
Spacious, very pleasant apartment in the lively district of north Amsterdam. Two bedrooms, both with a king bed and an option for a cod, or small (toddler) bed.
A lovely spacious bathroom with a bath and a separate rain shower, 2 toilets, small kitchen with all the equipment, large living area and a work space.

Even though the center of Amsterdam (and CS) is just 5 minutes away, the north has a lot to offer. It is one of the hippest, most vibrant parts of Amsterdam these days!

name: Beautiful and spacious apartment in Old-West
description: Our recently renovated typical Amsterdam apartment will make your stay in the city unforgettable. It is well designed and spacious and you will feel at home the moment you walk in. The house is located in the trendy area "Old West", walking distance from the city center and the Jordaan. It has everything you need: a large living area with a living room and kitchen, 2 separate bedrooms with double beds, and last but not least a large balcony and an amazing rooftop. Parties are NOT allowed.

name: Charming Amsterdam Loft Canal View & Sunny Terrace
description:
Welcome to our charming apartment in the heart of Amsterdam! We are thrilled to offer you a comfortable and unique space that is just steps away from all the must-see museums and the picturesque Jordaan neighbourhood.

Our apartment boasts an incredible view over the canals, and you will have your own balcony to take it all in. With plenty of natural light streaming in from the windows reflecting on the high ceilings, you will feel right at home in this bright space.

name: Gezellig appartement
description: No description

name: Stijlvol familiehuis in Amsterdam
description:
Entire, stylish family house in a quiet residential neighborhood with garden, within walking distance of the vondelpark and 15 min bike ride to downtown Amsterdam.
4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, large living room with multiple seats, fully equipped kitchen, garden and a play basement
Good (paid) parking in front of the door and tram and bus within walking distance. Nearest station is Amsterdam Lelylaan Station (2 stops by tram).

name: Numa | XL 1-Bedroom Apartment w/ Sofabed
description: This spacious apartment offers 94 sqm of space. Ideal for up to four people, its double bed (180x200), sofabed (160x200), and modern bathroom with shower and bathtub make this stay a perfect way to experience Amsterdam. There’s also a kitchen and a dining table, so you’ll have everything you need for maximum comfort and minimal stress.
amenities: ['Free washer – In unit', 'Bathtub', 'Free dryer – In unit']

name: Beautiful apartment with 2 balconies in Amsterdam
description:
New apartment in Amsterdam.

This gorgeous apartment is excellently designed with your comfort in mind. It has spacious living room with chic wooden flooring and design furniture. The great Dutch furniture brands, inspired by the Nordics, can be found here.

The large bedroom is stylishly presented with enough room for your cloths.

The apartment contains a private bathroom fitted with a sink, shower & bath and a private toilet.

Near to all bars and restaurants in the area of 'Oosterpark'

name: 2 person studio with private luxury bathroom
description:
For more than 15 years we welcome guests in beautiful Amsterdam.

Enjoy from your own cosy and comfortable studio on a very central and quiet location.

It has it's own private luxury, stylish bathroom with shower, toilet and double washbasins. This means you will have complete privacy.

The luxury studio is in a typical Amsterdam house (build in 1882) that has been recently renovated.

There is a direct bus-connection from Schiphol Airport. The bus stops only 250 meters away from our house.

name: Sleeping under the Amsterdam Stars- Free Parking!
description: Sleeping under Stars & Free Parking! Authentic restored dike house from 1903, situated on the Schellingwouderdijk in Amsterdam. The beautiful surroundings are a perfect combination for people that love both the City Center and Rural Life. The characteristic Family House offers views on the Amsterdam IJ and meadow for children to play, with tables from where to enjoy the panoramic sight of horses and ships sailing by. In summer swim in front, skate in winter! Registered under 97188. Z/20/1761348.
amenities: ['Babysitter recommendations', 'Outdoor furniture', 'Blender', 'Children’s books and toys', 'City skyline view', 'Children’s dinnerware', 'Board games', 'Outdoor dining area', 'High chair']

name: Apartment in Amsterdam
description:
This beautiful apartment with authentic details is perfect for exploring and discovering the magical city of Amsterdam!

It is spacious, clean and equipped with every comfort.
If you travel to Amsterdam with your partner and want easy access to the center and most major attractions, this apartment is ideal for you. Centrally located near Artis, the Rijksmuseum, the Heineken brewery and the Dappermarkt.

name: Beautiful characteristic apartment in Amsterdam

description:
situated in a prime location right in the heart of the city center, near the iconic Dam Square, the Kalverstraat with trendy stores, several supermarkets, restaurants and optimal public transport within walking distance.

This beautiful apartment with a monumental facade is located on the first floor of the old printing office of the financial newspaper.

No parties, drugs allowed!

name: Houseboat central fine location with great comfort
description: From the houseboat, it's just a short and nice walk to Anne Frank (10min), Rijks / Van Gogh museum (20 min), and the Jordan area (2min). My houseboat offers a wonderful, quiet and peaceful place in one of the finest canals. It is very central and at the same time, you will enjoy local Amsterdam. Sitting calm on the canal, there are lots of windows that let in a lot of light. Feel free to use my kitchen, if you can resist the many lovely restaurants and breakfast places just around the corner.

name: Light and spacious appartment
description:
You will be close to everything when you stay at our beautiful, centrally located place in the east side of Amsterdam, surrounded by water, next to the ferry which brings you to the north side of town.
We live close to the 'Indische Buurt' which is a lively, multicural, 'young' area with some very nice bars, good restaurants, an arthouse cinema, nice bookshop etc. Public transport is in front of our appartment: You're only 15 minutes away, by tram, from centre of the city or take a bicycle:)

name: Two Amsterdam Rooms, Oost, 3pp in Casa Vrolik bnb
description:
When available you can book both rooms, and get the whole tiny floor. Its a tiny but lovely floor in my house: i live upstairs and we share the open stairs within the apartment and the cat walks up and down. Casa Vrolik is a non-smoking house in Oosterpark neighbourhood.

If you fly into Europe, i'd love it if you'd compensate for your CO2-emisssion. When you let me know you did i will give you a little discount. I dont support flying within Europe. Do consider the train or bus instead. Tell me!
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Mooi appartement aan gracht
description:
NB: SOFA IS GONE (already moved), showcase cabinet too. That's why we offer a good price!
Check-in & check-out time in consultation

Unique, bright and modern furnished apartment on the canal belt.

Beautiful one bedroom apartment in the heart of a lively neighborhood in Central Amsterdam and on the edge of the Jordaan.

Well furnished with a private living room with kitchen, bathroom and bedroom with king bed. Walking distance to local cafes, shops and museums.

No wifi available anymore.

name: Central location private room all facillities
description:
West town center. Private bright room 4x4 m, central heating, fully equipped kitchen, private shower+toilet. Third floor, stairs.
WiFi, tv set, DVD, hairdryer. Towels, bed linen provided.
Lively lovely neighborhood, quiet and safe at night. Street with characteristic Amsterdam houses and big trees.
Museums, park, market, shops, bars, restaurants in radius of 1,5 km.
Public transport from Airport nearby. All places of interest walk able, buses trams in proximity as are bicycle and car rentals.

name: Lovely spacious appartement with canal view
description:
Lovely 19th century apartment on one of the five most beautiful streets of Amsterdam, in the center-eastside. Great canalview, peaceful and quiet yet on walking distance of restaurants, bars, market, coffeecorners, shops, the zoo and museums. 10 minutes bicycling or tram from Dam square.
Bicycle rent just around the corner. Car parking nearby. Tram around the corner.
Also very suitable for a longer stay or a trip with family or friends. We are looking forward to welcome you!
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Numa | Accessible apartment in Amsterdam East
description:
This accessible apartment offers 44.3 sqm of space. Ideal for up to four people, its two double beds (180x200), living room, and modern bathroom with accessible shower make this stay a perfect way to experience Amsterdam. The apartment also offers a built-in kitchen, a dining table, and a sofa, so you’ll have everything you need for maximum comfort and minimal stress.

Please note that the second bed is on the open space on the top floor and it is not accessible.

name: De Cornelia, large houseboat
description:
Welcome to The Cornelia,
The Cornelia, once a sturdy working vessel, was converted into a unique houseboat in the 1980s. Four seasons a year we enjoy the tranquility and rusticity here at our special place in Amsterdam-North. Living in a metropolis and living outside with the elements. Rowing and swimming or walking in the forest right on the other side of the gangway. And with only twenty minutes by bike or subway we are in the middle of the splendor and bustle of our beloved city.

name: Spacious Museumsquare House
description:
Welcome in this 130m2 monumental house which is light, spacious and has exceptional views on the city!
Enjoy two large bedrooms with comfortable boxspring beds, third single bed, two bathrooms, a large living room with smart tv, fully equipped kitchen, laundry room and of course wifi throughout the entire house..

name: Retreat in Amsterdam Noord
description: Discover your perfect getaway  in Amsterdam Noord. This modern home, built in 2021, blends city life with nature's tranquility. Featuring a sunny backyard, high-end kitchen appliances, underfloor heating, and luxurious bathrooms. Ideal for families with spacious living areas, including a versatile attic workspace. Enjoy city convenience and serene nature at this elegant retreat. Book now for an unforgettable stay!

name: Modern private apartment in the heart of Amsterdam
description:
We live here very comfortably and enjoy everything the city has to offer us, and we hope you will enjoy your stay here too!

Comfortable and centrally located apartment for two people. Around the corner from the popular Javastreet in Amsterdam Oost, which is full of nice restaurants, bars, coffee shops and clothing stores.

Between the sights you can take some time to relax in the apartment on the comfortable sofa or in the hotel-worthy bed.
amenities: ['Free washer – In unit', 'Outdoor furniture', 'Free dryer – In unit', 'City skyline view', 'Outdoor dining area']

name: Canal Suite | City Centre
description: In the heart of the city centre a private suite. it is situated in an original Amsterdam canal house. This is Location, location,located!! This stylish and well decorated brand new suite apartment is located on the first floor. This is a typical Amsterdam Canal house located on the Amstel river.Everything is within walking distance: you're literally in the city centre! Rembrandtplein is 3 minutes by foot. Here you'll find a lot of cool bars, lovely restaurants.

name: Modern, child friendly 2 bed by Vondelpark & city
description:
A stylish, child-friendly, recently refurbished, ground floor, 2 bedroom apartment with garden, located in one of the best neighbourhoods in Amsterdam, near to the wonderful Vondelpark as well as close to the city centre via tram, bike or walking.
Local neighbourhood comprises of numerous great cafes, bakeries, bars and restaurants! We are less than 50m from the nearest supermarket.
An extra high quality mattress is available for the kids' bedroom giving space for two kids to stay.
amenities: ['Private backyard – Fully fenced', 'Outdoor furniture', 'BBQ grill', 'Children’s books and toys', 'Children’s dinnerware', 'Outdoor dining area']

name: Charmant dijkhuis in Amsterdam Noord
description:
Welcome to our charming dike house in Stadsdeel Noord! This characteristic family home, completely and lovingly renovated, offers the perfect retreat for your family vacation in the vibrant capital of the Netherlands

Discover the city center just 15 minutes by bike, while you get home to enjoy the peace and serenity of our neighborhood.
The house has enough space for a family with 2 or 3 children. With private garden and at the front a playground with picnic tables and a swing

name: Complete studio Amsterdam centre
description: This apartment is perfect for 2 people who want to discover Amsterdam! The apartment is located in the heart of Amsterdam, 2 minutes walking to waterlooplein and the new market. Guests have a private kitchen, bathroom and living space with beautiful views over the river Amstel. The kitchen is equipped with a coffee maker, toaster, oven, microwave and everything you need for extensive cooking. Perfect for a trip to Amsterdam!

name: Amsterdam Sleeping under Stars. Free Parking!
description: Sleeping under Stars & Free Parking! Authentic restored dike house from 1903, situated on the Schellingwouderdijk in Amsterdam. The beautiful surroundings are a perfect combination for people that love both the City Center and Rural Life. The characteristic Family House offers views on the Amsterdam IJ and meadow for children to play, with tables from where to enjoy the panoramic sight of horses and ships sailing by. In summer swim in front, skate in winter! Registered under 97188. Z/20/1761348.

name: Hip Amsterdam apartement
description: This lovely place in Amsterdam has everything you need for the perfect visit. A comfy bed, and all utilities are present. Just a few minutes away for central Amsterdam and next to toerist sights as Artis (the Zoo) and the Tropenmuseum.

name: NEW Sunny Spacious City Centre Top Floor Apartment
description: Newly renovated, luxurious, top floor apartment in a very quiet street of the historic city centre. Next to the beautiful canals and the famous Utrechtsestraat (Bars, Restaurants & Shopping). Perfect for those who want to fully experience the real Amsterdam vibe. Very central, very vibrant & very quiet at the same time!

name: Two rooms guest apartment
description: The  guest apartment (located on floor 2) has two bedrooms, a private bathroom and a private balcony. Besides this there is also a shared roof terrace of 40 m2 on floor 6, which is ideal for smoking too! The area has many popular cafés and restaurants which are visited by both locals and tourists. The bus close to the apartment provides a direct connection to the airport.  Due to the construction of the building, the staircase is the only way to access the apartment and roof terrace.

name: Spazio Arte 2 Rooms max. 4 persons
description: The 2 rooms are on the same floor where the bathroom and toilet are. So the entire floor is practically yours. We are about 25 min. away from the Amsterdam city center, and the house is easy to achieve by Underground (10 min 2 stops) from the central station. The Underground is on 5 min walking from the house.
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Beautiful big 5-star luxury apartment  (130m2)
description: Our beautiful spacious apartment (130 m2) with big roof terrace (60m2) and  2 balconies and king size beds, is located in the popular neighborhood Old West, right next to the city center and the famous Foodhallen. Only 5-10 minutes’ walk from Leidsesquare, Vondelpark, Rijksmuseum, Jordaan & 9 streets.

name: Charming houseboat in Central Amsterdam
description:
Great and unique place to stay in Amsterdam. Updated and stylish apartment on the water! It is a spacious and comfortable place on a quiet canal. You can see ducks from the windows. One bedroom, one bathroom and a nice living room with an open kitchen to enjoy. It is decorated in a modern style and peaceful colours. The kitchen is supplied with appliances to cook. Central heating and floor heating system for the winter.
It is the perfect place for a romantic stay in Amsterdam.

name: Spacious Houseboat in Amsterdam
description:
A modern and well equipped houseboat. The center of Amsterdam is easy to reach (few minutes). In the neighbourhood you can find many nice restaurants, supermarkets, two large parks and playgrounds for children.

The houseboat has 3 bedrooms and 2 complete bathrooms. A baby bed is available, just as all other necessary equipment for small children.

The boat is perfect for families or two couples.
2 bikes included !

name: Cosy appartment
description: Welcome to our nice apartment in Amsterdam East! Perfectly located near Oosterpark, beukenplein and Amstel station, with supermarkets, restaurants and public transport around the corner. Relax after a day in the city and enjoy our comfortable home with one spacious bedroom, a cozy living room, fully equipped kitchen and bathroom. Everything you need during your stay is there! With good wifi and workspaces, this home is also particularly suitable for working at home

name: Apartment with balcony close to Vondelpark
description:
Nice and cozy apartment in between Vondelpark and Rembrandpark, in a relaxt neighborhood in Amsterdam. Within 10 minutes by bike or public transportation you can be at all the highlights the city has to offer.

This two-bedroom apartment is spaciously furbished and is fully equipped. Your ideal stay for a few days or weeks in Amsterdam!

name: Family House
description: Newly renovated house, 2 bedrooms and a baby room, two bathers, spacious kitchen and cozy living room, located on an old village street in the middle of Amsterdam, equipped with a garden behind it, with a forest and open water.

name: Chill vibe & spot-on location for dining & shops
description:
Just a 5-minute walk from the Vondelpark, Hotel Espresso offers modern rooms with free WiFi. The Van Gogh Museum, Rijksmuseum, and Leidseplein with their many restaurants and clubs are all within 5 minutes.

Comfy, twin or double beds make it tough to get up early.
Tucked away from the tourist crowds, yet just a short stroll from all the action in the city centre.
PLEASE NOTE THAT THE CITY TAX WILL HAVE TO BE PAID SEPARATELY AT THE HOTEL AND IS NOT INCLUDED

name: Luxury Designer Canal Apartment
description:
This sought-after Designer Amsterdam Canal Apartment is back on the market for an occasional short stay.
A real Amsterdam experience by the canal. This large luxury floor (110 m2) has two bedrooms (very quiet as they are located at the back overlooking the gardens), 1.5 bathrooms and an open kitchen and dining area.
The location is extremely central with lots of trendy restaurants and the best museums in walking distance.
No parties or loud music.

name: Deluxe King · Spacious and stylish downtown suite
description:
Welcome to The Student Hotel — a place where everyone is welcome. With beautiful rooms, incredible design and a lively vibe we offer much more than just a room — enjoy our in-house gym, co-working space, restaurant and much more.

Be aware that the city tax is not included in the price on the website and is payable upon arrival at the hotel. The city tax is €3 per person per night and 7% of the total booking amount.

name: Light Bohemian Penthouse, 2,5 floors, city heart
description:
Bohemian Penthouse, 2,5 floors in the heart of Amsterdam. Spacious and light apartment in the lively popular neighbourhood De Jordaan, 5 to 10 minutes walk to Dam Square, museums, concert halls, parks, everything. Quiet street, bright corner house. With view over Amsterdam.
Families and groups of friends (max 4) over 25 years old are very perfectly welcome.
I regret not to accept guests under the age of 25 years, unattended by parents.

name: Cozy & quiet studio at Great Location | Private
description:
Come and enjoy my small but cozy studio in the beautiful Oud-West area of ​​Amsterdam.
The Ideal place for couples and solo or business travelers!! The apartment is not suitable for visitors who enjoy the pleasure of smoking as it is located in a quiet and child friendly neighbourhood smoking in or near the apartment is not appreciated nor allowed!!

You will love my place because of the great neighborhood, very comfortable and large bed, your private side bar, bathroom, and the nice relaxed

name: Light appartement in city center
description: Easily enjoy all that Amsterdam has to offer! Completely renovated apartment with all modern amenities in a  comfortable apartment.

name: Scandinavian Design House on the Amsterdam Canal
description: Charming and compact design house, recently renovated. Overlooking the small boats on the Egelantiersgracht (Amsterdam Canal)
amenities: ['Private backyard – Fully fenced', 'Canal view', 'Pack ’n play/Travel crib']

name: Lovely light apartment 66m2 (center/old west)
description: Plenty of light, open kitchen, hight ceiling and comfortable living area. Situated just minutes (by bike) from the centre, the Jordaan (Anna Frank House) or de Dam (Dam Square). The appartement is located at the border of the centre and Oud-West in the new area called 'The Hallen'. Right out the door you will find a variety of bars, restaurants and shops to really experience the Amsterdam life without the crowed tourist spots, but be close enough to the action and sites the city is known for!

name: The one you'll love—clean,central,quiet & private!
description: The charming clean, quiet & cozy recently renovated room is equipped with all modern comforts and balcony. The room is for 2 people, has it‘s own private bathroom and toilet in the room so total privacy, no shared spaces.Walking distance to all major attractions and al lot of restaurants and lunchrooms in the neighborhood, all listed in my handmade information map you'll find in your room. Last busstop from Amsterdam Airport is at 250m, leaves every 10 minutes, takes only 30 minutes.

name: Vondel 99 suites (A)
description: Vondel 99, 2 beautiful suites in the hart of Amsterdam near Vondelpark, museum district and Leidseplein. Located in a quite charming street in popular Oud-West with its many cute shops and restaurants. 2 Just renovated Spacious rooms of 17 and 25m2 with private bathroom, balcony or sunny terras.
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Stylish apartment on prime location (65m2)
description: This stylish, 65 m2 apartment is situated on a prime location in a quiet street, in the heart of the vibrant, popular neighbourhood Oud-West. The Ten Katemarkt is around the corner, providing fresh products on a daily basis. At the end of the street you can find the Foodhallen, including a cinema and a variety of nice stores. There are also plenty of cozy cafes and restaurants on walking distance. You can reach the city centre of Amsterdam and other popular areas, within 5 minutes by bike.

name: Stylish Boutique Apt. | Garden | Vondelpark
description: Explore our boutique and luxury apartment (ground floor/100m2) next to Vondelpark in charming, lush and peaceful Old-West. Step inside a uniquely designed living room, fully equipped open kitchen, two bedrooms, and two bathrooms (incl. bath). Relax in the serene garden after a day of city exploration. Within a short walking distance, you'll find a vibrant array of cafes, restaurants, and boutiques. The Rijksmuseum & Van Gogh are only a five-minute bike ride away or a walk through the Vondelpark.

name: Cosy appartment located in a lovely area.
description: In a very nice, relaxed neighborhood 10 minutes walk from the city center is located this nice ground floor apartment. The apartment is perfect for two people. The appartement has a bathroom with a bath and a separate shower, a living room and an open kitchen and a large bedroom. The apartment is 3 minutes walk from the Vondelpark and 15 minutes from the Olympic Stadium.

name: Great apt. in city center w/ beautiful canal view
description: This stylish apartment is centrally located in ‘Old West’, within less than a 10 minute walk to the city center and the popular ‘Jordaan’ neighborhood. Other neighborhoods can be explored with ease using the excellent public transport options around the corner. The apartment is on the 2nd floor in a quiet street with almost no traffic and has a spectacular view over the canals and a lovely patio to enjoy it. The large kitchen has all necessary appliances and offers a unique cooking experience.

name: Beautiful home adjacent to Vondelpark
description: This unique accommodation has its own unique style. Located on the Vondelpark in Amsterdam. The apartment consists of 2 bedrooms with 1 bathroom.
amenities: ['Blender', 'Bathtub', 'Free dryer – In unit', 'City skyline view', 'Outdoor dining area', 'Baking sheet']

name: Woonschip Cornelis
description: A unique Amsterdam experience! Welcome to this beautiful ship in the central waters of Amsterdam. Wake up, take a refreshing dive into the water, enjoy the view, walk or take a tram to the center and get back to your private boat.

name: Modern 2-bedroom Apartment in trendy A'dam West!
description:
Welcome to this modern-bright apartment in a quiet neighborhood in the west part of Amsterdam. When entering the apartment you directly notice how stylish it has been decorated and space it has.
The apartment has 2 bedrooms with 2 double size beds. A living room with open kitchen and big dinner table. The toilet and bathroom are recently renovated. Wifi and TV are also present!

This area of A'dam is really relaxed, but well connected to the center. supermarkets/coffee places within 5 min walk!

This apartment is subject to short-stay rules, which means that it is only bookable for minimum of 7 nights. Since we want to avoid gaps between bookings, we recommend to book as close as possible to other already booked dates.

name: Midtown Triple Room
description:
Cosy and bright apartment with three single beds with quality mattresses, a kitchenette with a comfort dining area. Perfect for a couple or a group of three!

Midtown Hotel is situated at the edge of the center in one of the most popular areas in Amsterdam. Only 5 minutes from Leidseplein, Vondelpark, Museum district and the “9 straatjes” popular for its cozy restaurants and boutique shops.

name: Traditional Dutch "Dyke House" 1914
description: This tradional Dutch "Dyke House" is built in 1914 against a dyke. This means that at the front you enter mid-level in the living. Downstairs the garden and the front is in the old dyke.  Situated directly at a park. Only 5 min from city center!

name: Amsterdam city garden
description:
Lovely groundfloor apartment for plant lovers in Amsterdam west. Close to center, foodhallen, tram, supermarkets, restaurants, shops and beautiful parks.
If you like plants, you will love this place.

name: sunny and spacious apartment in central Amsterdam
description: A very bright apartment and feels like a real home in the middle of Amsterdam. It's only 10 minutes cycling to Leidseplein, 'Old West' and the Vondelpark, plenty of nice bars and restaurants. The apartment has two big living area's, two smaller bedrooms, small bathroom, renovated kitchen and a new roofterrace with lots of sun.  It's an old house in a family neighbourhood, so really not suitable for a party house or any other nuisances. That makes us and our neighbours happy:)

name: Family house Amsterdam Free Parking
description: This beautiful spacious family house is located within 10 minutes from Amsterdam City Center. The house is located in Amsterdam North, a quite and calm area and it is very close to all hotspots. The house has 3 bedrooms, modern kitchen, spacious living room with access to the garden. Free parking. Reg number: 0363 184A E39A 6879 6A5C
amenities: ['Private backyard – Fully fenced', 'Outdoor furniture', 'Bathtub', 'Children’s books and toys']

name: Top location with canal view!
description:
Typical Amsterdam apartment with amazing canal view! Wake up with a morning coffee in the sun by opening the windows.

The location is perfect with 5 minutes walk to the famous (9-straatjes) and 10 min walk to the Vondelpark!

name: Luxurious, light & cosy boat in central Amsterdam
description: Have the real Amsterdam experience on this cosy, luxurious, modern, and spacious house boat. Hidden on a tranquil canal in the heart of the city, your new home gives you the authentic experience of life on the water - now with a 2-person kayak included so you can explore the canals by water too. Walking distance from all the major tourist attractions & well connected by public transport, this is the perfect base for exploring the city in true Amsterdam style.

name: Apartment in Amsterdam Oud West
description:
A central, cozy apt with balcony. A fully furnished 50m² 1-bedroom apartment with a private balcony.
★ Located in the main street in one of the most young & vibrant neighborhood (Oud West)
★ Conveniently located close to city center - Leidseplein, Dam (10 mins walking, 3 mins by bike). Well connected by public transport
★ All kind of shops, restaurants and bars literally in the same street
★ Shared rooftop
★Fresh towels & bedding included, as well as coffee&milk
★Wifi
★Bike upon consult

name: Zimmer in einem charmanten Grachtenhaus (33)
description:
Stay where all Amsterdam people want to live. Small private room in a historic canal house. In the vicinity of many museums, the Rembrandsplein and yet wonderfully quiet. Room with shower and toilet ensuite.

This room is part of a licensed guesthouse.

name: Private modern apartment next to Foodhallen/Centre
description: Very centrally-located and recently renovated apartment with 1 bedroom (Queen bed). It's the top floor apartment in a 1900's house minutes outside the busy centre of Amsterdam. Old West is a vibrant and happening area, the apartment is close to the city centre and has excellent public transport connections. Located in a quiet street next to Bellamyplein. Close to Vondelpark, Museumdistrict, Leidseplein. Next door: Foodhallen, Ten Katemarket, loads of shops, cafes and restaurants!

name: The Ship's Cabin
description: The Ship's Cabin is a unique guesthouse on a sailing houseboat in Amsterdam IJburg. Located on a floating jetty with about 30 houseboats on the IJmeer, a stone's throw from the center of Amsterdam. Parking is available in front of the door, but also easily accessible by public transport or by bicycle. IJburg is a very good choice for those who like modern architecture, water and tranquility, but in the vicinity of the city. With plenty of restaurants, cafes, fitness and shops nearby.

name: Penthouse Loft Amsterdam Central
description:
In the heart of Amsterdam, 5mins walking from Central Station, is a beautiful rooftop and spacious apartment. With a unique interior design and sun-facing balcony.

The loft is equipped with all you need for a cozy, fun, and elegant stay.

Though you are literally at the heart of the center of Amsterdam within minutes walk to all Amsterdam could offer, the apartment is quiet and without noise.

You’ll use staircase for accessing the loft. Please take good care of the apartment :)

Enjoy 😊!

name: Cosy & trendy: A perfect getaway
description: "Recently renovated ground floor city apartment. It offers a perfect blend of comfort , space and style, ideally situated near the vibrant city center and perfect connection to the airport. Discover modern convenience and coziness in this thoughtfully designed space, where every detail ensures a pleasant stay. Enjoy the proximity to both urban excitement, parks and other explorations.
amenities: ['Private backyard – Fully fenced', 'BBQ grill', 'Bathtub', 'Free dryer – In unit', 'Outdoor dining area']

name: Sonder Park House | Twin Single Room
description:
Museums, thrift shopping, and stroopwafels — your Amsterdam experience begins at Park House. Each room includes a coffee maker, space to work, and an HDMI-equipped television for streaming. To unwind, we love the cozy lounge and calming garden terrace.

In the Oud-Zuid neighborhood, there’s plenty to discover. The iconic Rijksmuseum is home to the best of Dutch art. And Vondelpark hosts seasonal outdoor concerts at the Openluchttheater. Enjoy a picturesque stay at Park House.

name: Charming & Cozy Appartment
description:
This beautifully charming and cozy house has a spacious front- and backyard! You can chill and sit in the sun or go and explore buzzing Amsterdam as the bus and tram are next to the house!

In our backyard you’ll hear birds chirping while the tram (100 meters away) will take you to the city centre within 10 minutes - Leidseplein, the 9 streets, the Museum District etc.

Go for a nice and easy stroll in famous Vondelpark or in Rembrandtpark as they are both just a short walk away.

name: Quad room / Bunk beds - The Fantastic Four
description:
The Sex Pistols, The Beatles, KISS, Queen, ABBA... You guest it: all bands of four. Because four is a magic number. And this is just the perfect room for you guys. Comfortable bunk beds leaving enough space in the rest of the room to perform the dancing queen (That’s right, from all the above we chose ABBA).

This room (21 m2) has four full size bunk beds (90x200) and is suitable for maximum four people. Baby cot is possible upon request in this room.
Extra bed or person is not possible.

name: Riant familiehuis met hottub direct aan het water!
description:
Unique and traffic-free family house, garage with Tesla Charger.
Breathtaking views of roof terrace 60m2 with wood-fired hot tub. Swim right outside the house door or paddle with our sup. Within cycling distance or 15 min. by tram from downtown Amsterdam. Split level for garage, kitchen, living. Upstairs there are 2 bedrooms, a bathroom with shower/bath, toilet and bidet. Sunny living room 40m2 with sofa, flat screen TV, adjoining balcony. Luxury kitchen with Illy espresso, induction, oven.
amenities: ['Barbecue utensils', 'Outdoor furniture', 'BBQ grill', 'Blender', 'Coffee maker: espresso machine', 'Bathtub', 'City skyline view', 'Board games', 'Outdoor dining area', 'Baking sheet']

name: Spacious modernistic loft-house with garden
description: Spacious hideaway in the city Amsterdam, close to Erasmuspark. The house has an open loft space with nice atmosphere lightning designed by Van Bennekom Architecture. It has a big window-frame in the back to the terrace and garden. A perfect luxurious and quiet stay with all luxury you need.

name: Numa | Comfy Duplex in Amsterdam East
description: This comfortable apartment offers 41 sqm of space. Ideal for up to six people, its two double beds (180x200 or 160x200), sofabed (160x200), living room, and modern bathroom with bathtub and shower make this stay a perfect way to experience Amsterdam. The apartment also offers a built-in kitchen and a dining table, so you’ll have everything you need for maximum comfort and minimal stress.

name: Private and cosy apartment in North
description: Looking for a quiet stay just a stone's throw from Amsterdam city center? This cozy apartment in Amsterdam Noord is the perfect combination for your stay: The apartment is located on the fourth floor (no elevator) in a quiet neighborhood and Amsterdam Centraal can be reached within 30 minutes with a good public transport connection.  The green, typical Dutch hinterland of Amsterdam with its mills and small villages is within walking distance. Parking directly in front of the apartment is free.

name: Stylish apartment in Amsterdam Oost
description:
Welcome to our ground floor apartment in Amsterdam East! With its cozy private garden, modern bathroom, and fully equipped kitchen, this is the perfect place to enjoy Amsterdam.

Located in the relaxed and green neighborhood of Amsterdam East, you'll be surrounded by trendy cafes, bars, restaurants, and parks. Explore the charming streets and soak in the city's unique ambiance.

Upon arrival you will find a guide including information on our favorite places in the neighbourhood and city.

name: Exceptional  lake view house for romantic stay
description:
Rent this unique and fully equipped house (incl. garage) on a traffic free dyke, close to Amsterdam city center and within travel distance to Zandvoort (beach) and Veluwe NP.

Enjoy your morning coffee looking at the sunrise while ships find their way to Amsterdam harbor. Or have your drink in a romantic setting during sunset while swimmers pass by. This unique location is only a direct 15 mins tram ride away from Amsterdam center. Come to experience an unexplored part of Amsterdam!

description:
Just a 5-minute walk from the Vondelpark, Hotel Espresso offers modern rooms with free WiFi. The Van Gogh Museum, Rijksmuseum, and Leidseplein with their many restaurants and clubs are all within 5 minutes.

Comfy beds make it tough to get up early. But the free coffee in the lobby certainly helps.
Tucked away from the tourist crowds, yet just a short stroll from all the action in the city centre.
PLEASE NOTE THAT THE CITY TAX WILL HAVE TO BE PAID SEPARATELY AT THE HOTEL AND IS NOT INCLUDED

name: Studio&Kitchen, Newly Renovated Historic Building
description: Bob W is the smart alternative to hotels and random rentals. Get everything you need to live, work and play: kitchens, keyless access, fast WiFi, smart TVs, local gym access, 24/7 support, regular professional cleaning and more. Stay in Oosterpark, central Amsterdam in a historic former courthouse from 1777. Every night is climate-neutral and fully carbon offset.

name: Light apartment Oud-West
description:
Welcome to our cozy apartment, perfectly located in the middle of the popular Oud-West of Amsterdam. The apartment is bright and has all the amenities you need.

Our apartment is really top located, with a range of shops, cafes, restaurants, terraces and bars literally on your doorstep. The famous Ten Katemarkt and the hip Foodhallen are just a few minutes walk away. The Vondelpark and the Jordaan are also easy to reach by foot or by bike.

description:
This unique spacious family home (renovated in 2018) is situated on a corner in the middle of the popular De Pijp neighbourhood. Just behind the famous Albert Cuyp Market, surrounded by cosy restaurants & bars, close to different tramlines and the Noord-Zuid Metro line to take you around other parts of Amsterdam.

We will only welcome families with children (aged from 3 yrs up).

Our house cat Lily will appreciate your company.

STAYCATION

We hope to welcome you on board soon on our/your houseboat in the Amsterdam canals.

The Amsterdam canals are also magical in the winter months. We still have some spots available.

1 bedroom with a convenient boxspring bed. Dining room with adjoining kitchen and balcony. Sun during the afternoon until the sun goes down.

Vondelpark, Rembrandtpark within walking distance, city centre in 5 minutes. Great access to public transport, taxi and rental bikes.

name: Lovely canal facing one bedroom condo in Amsterdam

name: Stylish home with roof terrace in a lovely area
description:
Welcome to the Watergraafsmeer, the best area to stay in Amsterdam if you enjoy a less busy neighbourhood within the city!

You can walk to 3 public parks, the zoo, many restaurants (including Michelin-star rewarded De Kas), local shops, and multiple supermarkets. The city center is just 10 minutes by bike or public transport.

You will stay in our family home. This is no commercial airbnb, so you will enjoy some luxury and feeling of home. We ask you to treat it like that as well.

Featuring free WiFi throughout the property, Q-Factory Hotel offers accommodation in Amsterdam. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant. Parking is available at the nearby Q-Park Oostpoort at a surcharge.

Every room is fitted with a flat-screen TV with cable channels. Each room includes a private bathroom.

name: Bright & comfy private room, close to Vondelpark
description: Stylish private room situated in one of the most popular neighbourhood (Old South) of the city. The location is perfect for your visit to Amsterdam. You will be close to the infamous Vondelpark and Museum Square, where you will find Rijksmuseum and many more museums who are worth a visit. The canals are close by, you can cycle or take the tram to visit all the beautiful sights. All you need for an amazing stay in the city!

name: Private house in Amsterdam (North)! with garden
description:
Original 1930s house, kids friendly, design interior, garden, only 1 metro stop from Central Station!

Feel welcome in our original 1930s house in the North of Amsterdam. Enjoy our spacious house with private garden in this trendy neighborhood. Only 1 metro stop from Amsterdam Central Station (Noorderpark). Quiet area of town but many cool restaurants and bars in the area.

After many airbnb trips, we decided to rent out my our home in November 2016. Looking forward to meet our guests!

name: Luxury modern in the hip inner east
description: Light, bright and modern, this well-appointed loft-style apartment is the perfect place to kick back after a day in the Dutch capital. With a beautiful park metres away and a bustling neighbourhood of cafés, markets and restaurants at your doorstep, you're set for an unforgettable stay in Amsterdam.

name: Private center apartment with rooftop terrace
description:
Sun’s Home B&B Amsterdam is a luxury guest house nestled in one of Amsterdam’s most popular central suburbs, the Jordaan district.
Nearby you can find the famous Leidseplein and the Damsquare.

The accommodation is defined by a peaceful environment in a beautiful setting.

The guest house owner runs everything with passion and enthusiasm and her goal is to provide our guests with warm and homely accommodation and let it be a home away from home.

name: Appartement centrum Amsterdam
description: Bright apartment located in a quiet neighborhood in the center of Amsterdam with one bedroom with double bed,  a study with desk and two balconies. Never suffer from noise pollution. Everything is easily accessible by public transportation. Since it is an apartment in a complex, please consider the neighbours.

name: Spacious 4p canal apartment in perfect location
description: This great canal apartment on the quiet Bloemgracht (Flower Canal) is located right in the most beautiful neighborhood of Amsterdam called the Jordaan, where most city hotspots can be found within walking distance! The apartment is specially fitted for 4 people, ideal for 2 couples or a family with 2 children. There are two bedrooms, both with their own private bathroom, a fully equipped living room and a nice and cosy kitchenette for preparing coffee (Nespresso machine) and tea.

name: Luxury private bathroom garden 15 min city center
description: Newly renovated and private space in Amsterdam with private ensuite bathroom. There's direct access to a shared garden. Metro station Ganzenhoef is on 5 min walking distance from the house and will take you in 15 min to the city center. The space contains a king sized bed, table/desk with two chairs, lockable entrance door, an electric heating system, watercooker and some other amenities needed for a great short stay. Also access to a shared area with fridge/freezer, sink, dishes and silverware.

name: Small Double Room | Max Brown Hotel Canal District
description: Max Brown Canal District is set at the intersection of Amsterdam's most iconic canals and made up of three historical canal houses. Walk inside and you'll find a completely modernized interior, art by local artist Gino Bud Hoiting and the much-admired-and-Instagr.-book wall. You'll always have the Max Brown essentials: great coffee, free WiFi and the most comfortable bed around.

name: Hotel Not Hotel Amsterdam: Secret Bookcase Medium
description: No description

description: This is centrally located accommodation is tastefully decorated, with a beautiful outdoor location. Plenty of room to eat outside or relax on the lounge sofa, all for private. Inside it is also a very light appartement on the first floor.

name: Modern apartment with garden
description:
Modern apartment located on the quiet Hoofddorpplein, 10 minutes by bike or bus from the city center. Enjoy living in one of Amsterdam's most chic neighborhoods, with many bars, restaurants and services nearby (e.g. bike rental, supermarket). Walking distance to the famous Vondel Park and Amsterdamse Bos.
Strategically located next to the metro and bus stop, and Zuid train station. Direct bus service from Schiphol Airport.

There is a view of wide water, a covered private seat outside and if you like, take a dip from the apartment.
The boat is located in the Oostelijk Havengebied van Amsterdam, the city-building knowledge of many famous neighborhood is close to the city center. Feel welcome in this beautiful place and discover our beautiful city by bike (included in the price) or walk through our beautiful neighborhood. All facilities are close by.

Tram 2 stops in front of the door, which runs directly to Museumplein, Leidseplein, Dam Square and Amsterdam Centraal Station. In the neighborhood there are many nice eateries, coffee shops and supermarkets. The apartment is all equipped with comforts, such as a dishwasher, washing machine and bathtub. Additionally we have a nice workspace with screen.

description:
Welcome to our brand new stylish B&Bs located in the well-known Amsterdam district 'de Jordaan'. We offer two comfortable studios, carefully designed with attention to detail and luxury. Enjoy modern amenities in a historic setting for a relaxing and enjoyable stay.

With a convenient location just a fifteen minute walk from Central Station and a 10-minute walk from attractions like the Anne Frank house, the Westerkerk and Dam Square, our B&B is easily accessible.

Relaxing garden.
Bathtub.
Comfortable relaxed atmosphere.

Mi casa es su casa. Enjoy!!!

I am easygoing and communicate quick and clear.

description:
In our house we have this adorable bedroom with bathroom for rent. It is based in a lovely characteristic building in Amsterdam. It was build in 1785 as the National Navy School. The building is drenched in history, even the Dutch king Willem I and Napoleon Bonaparte spent time in here. It still has the beautiful original decorated ceilings and woodwork.

The room is located on the 1st floor (no steep stairs).

description:
From this charming accommodation located in the `Rosse neighborhood' you can reach popular shops, restaurants and bars in no time. Just an 8-minute walk from Central Station. Paid parking is 10 minutes away.
We are happy to help our guests with their plans and provide them with all the information for a pleasant stay in our beautiful city.

Breakfast included.

name: Modern spacious waterfront apartment
description:
Light spacious, modern waterfront appartment. Wifi available. Beautiful neighborhood just outside the center of town. Shops, bars and restaurants all within walking distance. Possibility to swim right outside of the appartment. Central Station just three tramstops away.
Parking is possible, but not free (except on Sundays).
No smoking, no pets.

description: "The Real B&B"  located in the center of Amsterdam in a quiet authentic easily accessible residential area, only a 15 minute walk from the train station. You will stay in a 45m2 private souterain of a unique canal house. The location is quiet and famous for it's historical sights, but in a short walk you'll find a busy area with special shops, bars and restaurants or take our free bikes to explore the city. A centrally located spot to relax and explore Amsterdam. So stop looking and book now!

The bathroom with shower and bath tap is separate from the toilet. ... no queuing . When you are ready to leave the house, you just walk along the waterway in front of the house and reach the Rijsmuseum in 7min.

AnneFrank House, Rijksmuseum, Van Gogh museum and Vondelpark  are a 15-minute walk. The private bathroom includes a rainshower. Two bicycles  free to use. description: Superhost offers comfortable loft, peace and comfort in the bustling centre of Amsterdam. The room features a delightful double bed, ensuring you a good night's sleep. The luxurious bathroom, equipped with a power shower and toilet, is indulgent. The green mini-garden is a living painting. All of Amsterdam's highlights are just a short walk away and in your street you will find many restaurants and cozy pubs. Of course, excellent wifi and modern conveniences like Nespresso, tea, microwave, etc.

For us as artists, the energy of the house is of great importance. Color and plants make the house lively and connect to the multicultural neighborhood close to the center.

The Javastraat, is a household name in Amsterdam because of its restaurants, clothing and vegetable shops, and cafes. From our neighborhood, I'm also in the centre of town in 10 minutes.

Within 10 minutes you will be on Dam Square, central of Amsterdam. Waking up with the view of the park is quite unique in Amsterdam! The metro is a 5 min. walk & will bring you everywhere you want.

Apartment located in the heart of the bustling Indian Neighborhood in Amsterdam East, an environment with a unique mix of cultural diversity and historical charm. The apartment is surrounded by local shops, cozy cafes, and international eateries where the flavors of the world come together. The green oasis of the Flevopark is a stone's throw away (8 min walk) and the Oosterpark (15 min walk).
By bus, you can reach Amsterdam Central Station in 12 min.

name: Central Stylish Souterrain suite &private bathroom
description:
My house is perfect for couples who want to explore Amsterdam. Please note, I can only host a maximum of two guests.
The house is located close by the Vondelpark, the central park of Amsterdam. With the tram just stopping in front of my door my place has very easy access to the train station (15 min) or the airport (20min). This is a great area to stay, with many theaters, Foodhallen, bike rental stores and Van Gogh Museum just around the corner!

name: Charming apartment by Vondelpark
description:
Explore Amsterdam from our cozy apartment, only steps from Vondelpark. Immerse yourself in the vibrant Oud-West with hip restaurants and bars just around the corner. Perfectly located, with excellent transport links to the airport, central station and city attractions. Need to work during your stay? We've got a dedicated desk with external monitor. Enjoy a fully equipped kitchen, comfy living area, modern bathroom with a spa bath & high-speed Wi-Fi.
Your Amsterdam adventure starts here!

Every detail, like the rainshower, amenities, window bench with canal views, and floating bed, has been thoughtfully curated by us to ensure your stay is a seamless blend of tranquility, comfort, and the authentic charm of Amsterdam.

The B&B is tough, romantic and adventurous at the same time. The room has typical ship windows with a beautiful view over the water. In the backyard enjoy the sunset. Quiet location in Amsterdam Ijburg on the Markermeer, nice swimming in summer.

description:
