There's a spacious cosy livingroom with fully equipped kitchen, huge bedroom, nice 1,5 bathroom with bath&rain shower and great south facing balcony. There's an elevator, fast internet, Netflix/HBO/Prime/Sky, coffee/tea/beer and everything else (restaurants, bars, groceries, museums) is around the corner.

The perfect romantic getaway!

Flexible bookings possible, message me

This spacious apartment features 3 bedrooms with king size beds. Each bedroom has an attached private bathroom.

You will be in the heart of the City Centre, steps away from the famous canals. The beautiful 'Nine Streets' with their charming boutique shops, restaurants and cafes, are located right around the corner. Attractions like the Anne Frank House and Dam Square are within walking distance. Public transport includes a direct airport connection.

description:
Very clean and quiet PRIVATE STUDIO APARTMENT, very popular, in the city centre, near Leidseplein and easy connected to the airport. In the near surroundings of the apartment there are a lot of good and local restaurants as well as the main city park.
This is a spacious luxury and beautiful 30m2 recently renovated studio apartment with double bed, kitchenette, bathroom on a private floor level.
The apartment is part of a larger property..

name: Sunny, luxurious apartment on picturesque canal
description: A bright, sunny and luxurious apartment in the center of Amsterdam, within walking distance of the famous Vondelpark, Leidseplein and Museum Square. The apartment offers unparalled views over the Singel canal and is located on a quiet street (gracht), away from the bustle that is typically associated with being in the center of the city. The apartment is renovated, so you will find all necessary ammenities available for you. Key-exchange is in person, or at a lockbox at airport / trainstation.

name: 5 star premium flat in the heart of Amsterdam
description: Highly appointed, fully equipped and newly renovated, boutique experience apartment in the heart of Amsterdam. With over 60M2 space to indulge and relax in after exploring the gems Amsterdam has to offer.  A large king bed upstairs, a beautiful lounge area with outside patio that has the summer sun well into the evening. A wonderfully highly spec'd kitchen and eat in dining area for those who feel like cooking.

Close to Rembrandtpark and Vondelpark.

Our house is on walking distance to supermarkets, harbour with restaurants and city-beach. We prefer families with kids but also friendly couples and (kite)surfers, sailors, hikers, bikers etc.

description: My nice apartment in Amsterdam Baarsjes is centrally located, on the water and easy to live. Within walking distance: parks, coffee shops, terraces, shops, the canals and 10 minutes by bike to be in the heart of the Center. I normally live here myself, so you live like a local. The apartment is clean and practically furnished. In addition, you can always text me for good restaurants and to do's, I have been living here for 14 years.

name: Comfortable 2 BR apt. with Balcony in AMS-EAST
description: Welcome in our charming apartment with balcony in front and back in Amsterdam East! Our two-bedroom space is in a lively neighborhood and offers the perfect base for your Amsterdam Trip. Enjoy the convenience of nearby cafes, shops and public transportation, making it easy to explore all that Amsterdam has to offer.  There are multiple bus and tram connections to Centraal Station or other parts of the city or by bike.

name: Child-friendly apartment
description:
Our child-friendly apartment is located in a quiet street in the lovely and vibrant Indische Buurt district in the east of Amsterdam.
Within a 5 minute walking radius you can find everything you want: bars, restaurants, shops, supermarkets and just around the corner is a big and beautiful park.
Grab a bus, tram or bicycle to get to the city center in no time.

Our apartment features a queen size bed, and a toddler floor bed in the kids room, which can be exchanged for a cot if desired.

name: Kleurijk en ruim appartement in Amsterdam West
description:
A spacious and bright apartment in the trendy Baarsjes neighborhood of Amsterdam-West. The house has a view of a lively intersection at the front, and a balcony on the quiet green courtyard.

This spacious apartment is colorfully and greenly decorated. The large living room has a spacious sofa to relax with a TV. And a dining table that can seat up to 8 people.

The kitchen and bathroom are Amsterdam basic. The bedroom has a large bed of 210x180 cm for a nice and spacious night sleep.

name: Nice room in quiet and green location
description: My house is near shops and all public transport facilities and hospital. The location of my house is very quiet, you can enjoy the green surroundings and cycling opportunities. The room is very comfortable with special nice matrasses also very suited for people with backissues. My house is suitable for couples, friends and business travellers.
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Spacious & Sunny Apartment in Oost
description:
The apartment is spacious and comfortable, 5 minutes walk from Tropenmuseum and Oosterpark, 3.5km to Dam , 2.1km to Artis.

Receives loads of sun especially from afternoon to sunset. Many shops and facilities under the building.

180meters to tram and bus (centraal and sloterdijk stations), all public transportation is extremely handy. Muiderport train station is 5mins walk.

Large balcony and study room with with curved monitor

PtV, playstation and one bicycle . other one is stolen :(

name: Elegant city retreat on canal
description: This elegant, full of light loft apartment is located in a historic 17th Century warehouse at the Brouwersgracht - one of the most picturesque canals of Amsterdam -  in the famous Jordaan area. It’s an ideal place if you want to explore the city centre. This stylish apartment is a perfect holiday stay for a couple, with spacious bedroom, private bathroom and separate guest entrance. So all the privacy you want! Guests are invited to enjoy the whole apartment, so no sharing.

name: Private cosy light studio in Old-west with airco
description: Our studio is located in Old-West, a popular dynamic trendy neighborhood nearby the center with locals and tourists alike. It is a vibrant place with hipster shops, various coffee places, nice restaurants. It is less than 5 minutes walk from the famous Foodhallen. The comfortable studio has a warm look, a perfect place to relax after a busy day sightseeing Amsterdam. (The studio has no shared facilities.)

name: Lovely renovated light apartment!
description: Completely renovated very light apartment located in the Amsterdam West District. The fully furnished 3-room apartment meets all your needs for a perfect stay in Amsterdam city!

name: Luxe room, private garden, Amsterdam city center
description:
The sunny room with private garden and bathroom is a 40m2, luxury place in a former printing factory in the historical centre of Amsterdam with everything of interest within a short walk. For example:
- Central station (8 minutes)
- UNESCO world heritage canal ring
- The famous museums
- The Anne Frank house etc.
A wonderful and bright place on the ground floor with lots of privacy for two persons with the possibility for two extra beds.

name: Stylish duplex for couples
description: Enjoy our stylish duplex in the heart of Amsterdam, offering open-plan living across 58 sqm with great canal views. Recently renovated, this top-floor gem is a short bike ride from the city center, close to historic Plantage and lively Oosterpark. Our apartment blends the buzz of vibrant city life, near fantastic bars and restaurants, with the comfort of a quiet, warm apartment. It's the perfect place to unwind and recharge, promising an unforgettable Amsterdam experience.

name: Amsterdams appartement met tuin
description: Welcome in our stylish and recently renovated apartment in the bustling Amsterdam East. You can enjoy the luxurious and spacious living room with open kitchen, cozy coffee corner, bathroom and bedroom. Within 5 minutes walking distance you are in the Flevopark or on the Javastraat with nice restaurants and bars. By bike or tram (tram stop 3 minutes walk), you can reach the center of Amsterdam in 10 minutes.

The big living room consists of a fully equipped kitchen. The master bedroom has a 180x200 bed, and the smaller kids bedroom can host your mini me. Amenities like kids cod (toddler bed is also available on request), children cutlery, trip trap chair, are all present.
Explore Amsterdam from the Javastraat, a lively neighborhood with lots of places to eat/drink.

4th floor (stairs).
Max 2 adults + 1 child

This sunny appartment is located on the 5th and 6th floor, on a canal, in a vibrant neighbourhood in the centre of Amsterdam.

The large livingroom is light and zen. There is a fully equipped kitchen and on the 6th floor you'll find a lovely studio including a big rooftop terrace with an incredible view. The bedroom is quiet w/ excellent 180 x 220 Boxspring. The bathroom is very comfortable. The appartment is 115 m2.

This is not a commercial vacationhouse: This is our home. Feel welcome.

Welcome to our special apartment located on the east side of bustling Amsterdam

- Central location, enjoy everything the city has to offer.
- Green oases: Oosterpark, Frankendaelpark, Amstelrivier.
- Near City Pet Garden Artis.
- Cozy terraces and restaurants on Beukenplein.
- Trendy bars and restaurants in abundance.
Discover the perfect balance between urban liveliness and green tranquility!

The garden view room is a beautiful room with a coco-mat bed famous for it's size and comfort.
The room overlooks the inner garden area of all the townhouses.
Annex your room you have a walk in closet adjoing a very spacious bathroom with floor heating.

name: Family House Amsterdam
description:
Family House Amsterdam is situated in the North of Amsterdam at the Nieuwendammerdijk. This neighbourhood is one of the cutest of Amsterdam with low-rise storybook houses on both sides of the street. To stay in our guesthouse on the quiet Nieuwendammerdijk is a peaceful start and ending of your day.
This part of Amsterdam has many nice hotspots like, Eye-Filmmuseum, Tolhuistuin, industrial NDSM warf with street art and creative spots, and some lovely restaurants as Goudfazant, Pllek.
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Numa | 1-Bedroom Apartment near Flevopark

The apartment is just renovated, with brand new kitchen. All necessary house supplies are available. There is fast WiFi, a bath, and south-facing balcony.

Through the two bedrooms, the second with a designer sofa bed, you can sleep with the four of you.

In the middle of all new restaurants and other hotspots you get to know Amsterdam as a local :)

Close to bustling bars and restaurants and walking distance to the popular Museum Square, but on a very quiet and peaceful street. A perfect location to relax, hike to the Vondelpark, drink coffee in the morning in one of the amazing breakfast bars, but also a great place to enjoy the nights in town.

We live above our "De Koffiesalon" with great coffee and pastries.Your stay will include a gift voucher of 15 euro to spend in 'De Koffiesalon".
Public transport to anywhere widely available. Bike rental next door.

Located in a quiet neighborhood with bakery, coffee shop, ice cream shop, supermarket and restaurants around the corner. In 15 minutes, you are in the middle of Amsterdam by metro (walking distance). Our house is a great place to celebrate holidays and a perfect base to explore Amsterdam and surroundings with small or large children. From Waterland and Durgerdam to Zandvoort aan Zee and Haarlem.

name: Bright & cozy apartment - perfectly located!!

This spacious house is extremely suitable for families. The house features a spacious garden facing south with a trampoline. The house is situated in the quiet district of Elzenhagen in Amsterdam-Noord. Within 5 minutes walking distance is the metro North/South line with which you are within 5 minutes in the city center of Amsterdam. Furthermore, the house is located near the A10 motorway, so also easily accessible by car. The house features a private parking space.

The Square around thet corner is a nice meeting place mith Coffee Bru for subliem coffee and sweets. Maxwell is a restaurant with the best cheese fondue in town and has on Sunday live music. Erik's is al delicatesse shop with great wine and cheese!

Experience the joy of this spacious 3-bedroom house while being close to Amsterdam's city center!

The house is situated in a green & child friendly neighbourhood in the trendy Northern part of Amsterdam.

Central station is 15 min with bike (including the free ferry) or a 5 min walk to the metro station that brings you to CS in 5 minutes.

We prefer to rent to 30+ couples and families. We have two sweet cats called Bowie & Grace, that will stay while we are away.

This Apartment is in Amsterdam Noord, which is only maximal 15 minutes away from the central station.
You can either go by bike/walk, combined with a beuatiful ferry ride or by metro.
It is in a colourful and kind of special Style.
Dowstairs you can find the living room, kitchen and the toilet.
Upstairs are two rooms. One is my sleeping room and the other room mis my workroom with a very comfortable sleeping couch ;-). Also the shower is upstairs.

description:
Well equiped apartment in a quiet neighborhood, with easy access to all highlights of Amsterdam.

The bedroom has a super comfortable bed, and a foldable bed is available in the ensuite part of the apartment.

Everthing is well maintained and all needed equipment is available.

Restaurants, supermarkets and 2 major parks are all within 5 min walking distance.

Nienke has been an airbnb host for 8 years and will make sure you will enjoy your stay!

description:
Nice and cozy apartment in Amsterdam-Oost, all to yourself! The apartment is in a quiet area. Muiderpoort train station and Wibaut metro station are both 10
minutes walk. To the center it is a 30-minute walk. On Sundays you can park for free on the street.
For a walk, you'll be at the Oosterpark within 5 minutes.
It is a cozy apartment with everything you need for a good time in Amsterdam. There is also a big screen provided if you would like to work.

name: Cozy 1 br apartment in vibrant Oosterpark area
description:
This apartment is great for couples or travelers who want to experience another part of Amsterdam than just the touristic hotspots.

It is a basic apartment with all the comfort needed. There's one bedroom, a spacious living room and a completely renovated kitchen.

The apartment is located in the lovely Amsterdam Oost with its many great restaurants, café's and Oosterpark. Also public transportation will take you to the center in 10 minutes!

name: Townhouse close to citycenter

name: Apt in Prime Amsterdam location
description: This renovated first-floor apartment is perfect for families, featuring a spacious main bedroom with a king bed and a children’s room with a crib. Enjoy a large bathroom with two sinks, shower, bath, and toilet. Plus an extra half bath. The living room offers a queen-sized sofa bed with a mattress topper. The modern kitchen is complete with a hot water tap & oven + microwave. Washer/dryer also available in apartment. Relax on two balconies. Prime location near Vondelpark, shops, and dining.

name: Geweldig huisje in het hippe Amsterdam Noord
description:
A great cottage in the hip Amsterdam North with all the comforts.
It is ideally located in the most beautiful and oldest part of Amsterdam North, 10 minutes by bike to the ferry to the city center and within walking distance of swimming water and nature.
A quiet and child-friendly village feel in the middle of the big city.

Walking distance to Brouwersgracht and Haarlemmerdijk with lovely stores, restaurants and markets like Noordermarkt. Also close to Westerpark and het IJ to enjoy the water and boats. The apartment is situated on the first floor and has an elevator. We enjoy cooking and coffee and all equipment makes it happen. You can open the doors to our green balcony to enjoy the early sun. Good public transport in our neighborhood.

description: The room is double on the second floor separate from the rest of the house. There is a bathroom on the same floor only for the guest separated from the house (recently renovated) with shower.

name: Authentic renovated apartment Amsterdam
description: This trendy renovated apartment is located in the Southern part of the city (Amsterdam Oud-Zuid). The typical Amsterdam neighbourhood is very quiet but close to shops and supermarkets. Ideal to stay for a couple or two friends. It is located on the Van Tuyll van Serooskerken Square, which leads to the historical Olympic Stadium of Amsterdam. The bus and tram stop is around the corner and takes you to other places in Amsterdam in minutes. A unique and comfortable apartment with a great location!

name: Playful, cozy home in The Pijp
description:
Welcome to our playful, unique home on two floors with a lovely roof terrace located at central location in the popular 'De Pijp'.

You enter through the shared entrance on the ground floor. The cozy, spacious kitchen is located with a staircase downstairs and is equipped with every comfort and more. From the ground floor, the staircase gives access to the cozy living room, where the unique sitting room is located with a lovely corner to relax.

name: City Centre Gem
description:
Tucked away between Leidsegracht, one of the prettiest and quietest canals of the city, and the bustling Leidseplein Theatre quarter, you could hardly be more centrally located.
Many buildings in the vicinity date back to the 1600’s.
The Museum quarter and Vondelpark are a stone’s throw away as well as hundreds of bars and restaurants.
Excellent public transport connections to railway stations (Central Station 20 minutes) and airport (Schiphol Airport 35 minutes). Do not bring a car. Queries? DM

name: Private Romantic Little Houseboat on Amstel River
description:
Cosy, private little houseboat on one of the most beautiful spots on the Amstel River. After a crowdy day in the city this is the place to relax and enjoy a typical way of living in Amsterdam. For max 2 people.
The hole boat is your private place. You have a stunning view from the boat and from you private little terrace.
Free parking and free BBQ available, with own kitchen and a comfortable small 2 pers. bed. Bike's available. For entering the boat you have to be able to climb on board.

name: Cozy flat + bikes in Amsterdam
description:
We are renting out our little apartment while we are on vacation ourselves.

Our apartment is the perfect place to make yourself feel at home and to get an authentic idea about what it is like to live in Amsterdam.

To dive into the full experience, you are welcome to use our bikes when you are here! Alternatively, a tram station is right around the corner.

name: Renovated & comfortable apartment in city center
description:
Recently renovated apartment in Amsterdam!

Experience Amsterdam to the fullest, this area is full of life! Great coffee spots, local bars, Oosterpark and Amstel rivier are just around the corner. Cycle in a few minutes to Museumplein, Leidseplein, etc. The subway or tram next door takes you quickly to Central Station or other vibrant parts of the city.

Highlights:
• Fully NEW equipped kitchen & bathroom
• Sunny balcony
• Airconditioning
• Nespresso machine
• Private entry on 1st floor

name: Sleep in a Hub!
description:
Welcome to CityHub Amsterdam. Comfy sleeping pods, luxurious shared spaces, a CityHub app and your very own CityHost, CityHub revolutionises city tripping.

This neighbourhood, called Oud-West, borders the famous canal-filled city centre. It’s known to be vibrant, diverse, and culturally rich. Leavy and lively, Oud-West is dotted with fun restaurants, bars, and art galleries.

name: Generator - Bed in 4 bed Dorm
description: Book a bed (or more) in our shared 4-Bed Dorm at Generator Amsterdam. This room features 2 bunks (4 beds) and a private bathroom, offering a comfortable stay for travelers. Each bunk is equipped with a light, personal shelf, USB charging station, and under-bed lockers. Pillow, duvet, and linen are included. Towels are available at reception for a small fee. Please note, this room is for guests aged 18 and over only. Perfect for those seeking a social yet comfortable experience.

name: Luxe appartement 2 bed met parkeerplek & dakterras
description:
This new unique accommodation with private parking garage 100 meters away from the metro, has its own style. (2022)
The apartment 118m2 has two double bedrooms, each with its own bathroom and shower toilet. The luxurious kitchen has all the comforts with steam oven, boiling and bubbling water tap, ice cubes, washing machine and dryer. A spacious balcony 12m2 and roof terrace 80m2

Apple TVs with Netflix, Prime, Disney+, HBO Max, Viaplay, Plex, discovery+, Apple music, spotify

name: Little palace in golden west
description:
Enjoy a stylish, contemporary experience at this centrally-located place. Because it is a corner house, beautiful light comes in. With a small balcony on the corner.
In the large sitting/ dining room there is a gas fireplace. The open kitchen has all the comforts. A separate toilet on each floor.
Two bedrooms, both with a double bed.
A large bathroom with bath and shower.
Furthermore, a beautiful roof terrace with amazing views over the city, many plants, a lovely lounge sofa and shade.

description:
Fully furnished, spacious room on first floor of inner city apartment. Huge windows give plenty of light and a view of the hustle and bustle of the city. You couldn't be more central.
The beauty of Amsterdam is best seen on foot, by boat, or of course, by bike. The markets of the Jordaan are just minutes away, as is the amazing new EYE Film Museum just over the water (the 5 minute ferry is free), the Anne Frank House, the Amsterdam Museum, and the bustling Red Light District.

The famous Anne Frank house, Noordermarkt and great shopping street the Haarlemmerstraat are all within minutes walking distance. The huge sliding windows can opened fully on warm days and give you a wonderful view on the canals. Also they have built in shades so you can also enjoy your privacy..

In the heart of Amsterdam, in the pipe, overlooking the Albert Cuyp market is this nice apartment of about 55 m2 with new kitchen and bathroom.

You will be renting the entire home.

description: Two separate stylish double rooms only steps away from the historic Noorderkerk (Northern Church) in the heart of Amsterdam’s fashionable Jordaan. The “Rose Room” and the “Gold Room” are on the SECOND FLOOR of an elegant 18th-19th-century house in the quiet and quaint Boomstraat (Tree Street) in the Jordaan, which borders on Amsterdam’s Centrum. The beautifully-appointed, newly restored rooms each have their own spacious private bathroom
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Quiet and Peacefull apartment
description: During your stay in this spacious, soothing place to stay, you'll forget all your concerns.

name: Flat in the center of Amsterdam
description:
Our place is the really best place you can pick. Why?

Old Dutch house totally renovated with modern look and a boho/vintage touch situated next to a canal. Lively by day and peaceful at night.

Best, best, best location to move anywhere you want (no kidding):
100 meters from our door you have the 52-metro that takes you North to South and Tram that takes you West to East. Rijksmuseum, De Pijp, Dam Square, LGBT street all in less 15mins walk distance!

Very Dutch, very modern & very easy!

name: Luxury Canal Apartment
description: The property is set on Amsterdam's oldest canal in the beautiful historical part of Amsterdam. With Dam square, the Royal palace, the Flower Market and the bustling Red Light District all within a minute's walk - you will be very well positioned to explore all the wonders Amsterdam has to offer. The property has direct canal views and is placed right opposite the 5-star Grand Hotel.

name: luxury penthouse in city centre
description:
A wonderful light and spacious penthouse apartment right in the middle of the city centre with a balcony on a canal ,with elevator,3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and all amenities for a perfect stay. especially suitable for families.This apartment is located in a residential building and smoking inside is not allowed. please take a look at our reviews!
due to government regulations reservations for more than 4 guests are only allowed for families!

name: Light modern house with terrace
description:
The living room is spacious & light. And furnished with a mix of modern and vintage design. The kitchen is open. It is a place to feel home.

The apartment is central located between the airport Schiphol and the city centre of Amsterdam.

name: Spacious apartment with garden in AMSTERDAM WEST
description:
Come and stay in our beautifully decorated ground floor apartment (with garden!) in West Amsterdam, only 10 min from city centre!

Bike rental and the tram are all just around the corner (3 min walk). 10 min to city centre by bike or tram, but I reccomend you to also discover West Amsterdam: Vondelpark, the Foodhallen, Ten Kate Market and the JP Heijestraat with lots of great places to eat and shop!

name: Adam Place
description: Right in the best part of town. 10 minute walk from the Central Station. Organic foodmarket right around the corner, every Saturday. Little nice bars and restaurants all around the area.

Welcome to our bright and colorful apartment, located in a serene neighborhood in East Amsterdam. This stylish space offers the perfect balance between tranquility and convenience, with metro and tram stations just a short walk away. You'll be in the heart of the city within 10- 20 minutes, while still enjoying the calm of a residential area.

We’ve updated our listing and photos this month to give you the most accurate view of the space.

name: Stijlvol en huiselijk appartement in Oost
description:
Experience the best of Amsterdam from this stylish and nice apartment. Located in a quiet neighborhood in Amsterdam East, just a few steps from the Oosterpark. By tram and Amstel station within walking distance, you are within a few minutes in the beautiful city center.

The apartment offers the perfect balance between comfort and location. It is ideal for couples who want to discover the rich culture of Amsterdam and for business travelers looking for a comfortable base.

name: Beautiful apartment in the Pijp
description:
A beautiful large full of light, duplex apartment (162m2) located on the 3rd and 4rd floor, in the most trendy and loved area of Amsterdam ‘De Pijp’.

The apartment is fantastically located next to most attractions, museums, main squares, endless number of cafes and restaurants, parks, shops, metro stations, trams.

The apartment is accessible from its own private staircase. There is a large sun balcony opening up from the kitchen.

The apartment is on the top floor and has lots of natural light

name: Appartment @TOP Location City Centre
description: Welcome to our renovated apartment in the heart of Amsterdam. Our stylish, monumental home from 1884 is located on Bickerseiland. The characteristic ground-floor apartment is placed in a peaceful area, with the vibrant city life in walking distance. The Central Station is a 15-minute walk (5 min by bus), a charming shopping street (Haarlemmerstraat) and the Westerpark is just a 5-minute walk away. The location is perfect to explore all the beauty of Amsterdam; canals, narrow streets, and shops.

name: Private Apartment 20 min from city centre
description: Wonderful two-room apartment near metro stop strandvliet. Located in a quiet neighborhood near the Amsterdam gate and the ArenA. There is a direct metro connection to the city center. With 20 minutes, you'll be in the heart of Amsterdam!

name: Fully renovated apartment near famous Rembrandtpark
description: Beautiful Modern Style apartment in Amsterdam West. Refurbished and decorated with a double bed, fully equipped kitchen and cozy balcony to welcome 2 guests in the beautiful city of Amsterdam!

name: Studio on a ship in the city center
description: Our ship, built in 1901, is located in the midst of Amsterdam, surrounded by many of the cities landmarks (St Nicholas Basilica, Maritime Museum, Science Museum). Walking distance to Central Station is 5 minutes. The studio (which has its own entrance and private bathroom) has a king bed fit for two guests (2x1.80m), and a sofabed for a third guest.

name: 100m2 newly renovated apartment by the Vondelpark

In the garden you can eat outside or barbecue and children love the large trampoline and football goals.

Our house has a spacious living room with open kitchen and doors to the garden.

name: East-Central 1-bedroom flat + private garden
description:
Hi 👋 Welcome to our cozy flat! It’s perfect for a single traveller or a couple. Situated in a popular & lively part of town, the house itself is in a quiet residential street. The area is tourist-free and perfect for someone who's looking to get a piece of authentic Amsterdam life.

- 1 min to restaurant / bars
- 2 min walk to Oosterpark
- 1 min walk to farmer's market
- 1 min walk to the nearest tram stop
- 10 min walk to Amsterdam Zoo (Artis)
- 10min cycling to Amsterdam Centraal

name: Leuk en sfeervol appartement met zonnig dakterras
description:
This spacious and bright apartment of 77m2 is located in the bustling neighborhood "De Kinkerbuurt" in Amsterdam Oud-West. The apartment is centrally located, but is located in a quiet neighborhood. It's ideal place to return to after a long day strolling through beautiful Amsterdam.

An open kitchen, elegant bedroom, comfortable bathroom, and the large roof terrace of >30m2 located on the sunny south will make your stay unforgettable.

name: Home with garden near to the Amstel
description:
This centrally located accommodation is tastefully furnished. There are more than enough hospitality opportunities nearby (both hip coffee tents, eateries and restaurant de Kas, with one Michelin star). You can take a dive in the Amstel less than 5 minutes away.
Close to public transportation, just a few steps from the center.

The mansion dates back to 1905 and from there it is a 2 minute walk to the famous Vondelpark and a 10 minute walk to the center and musea. You are close to the Concert hall (Concertgebouw), Rijks/Van Gogh museum, City Centre and fashionable shops, and many restaurants and cafés.

This charming apartment is in a great location, right off the tram line, in a great neighbourhood with lots of interesting businesses nearby.
Very quiet street with view on trees and two canals intersecting. Although small (welcome to Amsterdam), it fits a group of 4 very comfortably.

name: Wheelhouse Euphrate Houseboat
description:
WHEELHOUSE EUPHRATE HOUSEBOAT is a B&B aboard the former cargo ship Euphrate.
Entire ship just renovated and a splint new B&B made from the former house. It consists of two rooms in front and behind the wheelhouse.
This room measures 30m2. The B&B is tough, romantic and adventurous at the same time as a beautiful view over the water. In the backyard enjoy the sunset. Quiet location in Amsterdam Ijburg on the Markermeer where you can swim in the summer.

You will reach the city center within 20 min by feet and metro.

Enjoy the convenience of city living with the added bonus of a health center, pool, gym, and two saunas. Step outside to the terrace overlooking the water for a serene retreat in the heart of the city. Experience the best of Amsterdam living at our waterfront gem!

Fully private for 2-3 persons to use with a bathroom, a bedroom and a small seating area with a television. There is a pantry with a microwave, coffee maker, kettle and plates/cutlery.

name: Design loft w/ canal & mill view
description:
Spacious penthouse with spectacular canal view, directly opposite Amsterdam's oldest mill. Large outdoor balcony (28 m2) facing west to enjoy romantic sunsets.
Completely renovated in 2023 with floor heating, designer kitchen, contemporary furniture, fire place, the most comfortable Hästens bed (180 x 210 cm), and bath tub in spacious bathroom.

Our house has all the comforts and is close to shops and restaurants. Kitchen with Quooker faucet, Nespresso coffee maker and combi oven/microwave. Spacious living area with TV and Chromecast. Separate toilet. Nice garden with trampoline and seating.

Upstairs a spacious master bedroom with king size bed, a sink and a small desk. Bathroom with bathtub and separate spacious walk-in shower. Two nice children's bedrooms, each with a bunk bed. Separate toilet upstairs. Washing machine and dryer.

Kitchen and living room and bedroom with double bed with access to a french balcony and bathroom downstairs and one bedrooms with double bed and access to a balcony and extra bathroom on the second floor. There is an elevator.

description: This charming appartement in the middle of the vibrant neighborhood of the Jordaan offers views on the iconic Westerkerk just down the street. The Bloemstraat itself is a quiet street, offering a refuge from the bustling streets of de the city centre. A spacious apartment with great amenities and large beds. 2 bathrooms, 3 bedrooms.

name: Unique & spacious canal view apt in Jordaan
description:

-One master bedroom with king-size bed and TV.
-Second bedroom/office with desk and 2-person sofa-bed.

-Balcony with 4 seat lounge set.

name: Appartment Amsterdam Oost with sauna

A peaceful villa full of light with private entrance and green garden.

3 bedrooms, all on 1 level makes it perfect for families:
- Master (Double bed)
- Teen room (expends into Double bed)
- Kid room (solo bed) (atm room being renovated)

Well connected to public transport.

name: Canal view apartment&roofterrace
description:
Welcome to our home!

The apartment is located in the popular Oud-West area, close to the famous Foodhallen. Everything is within walking distance: a local street market, coffee places & restaurants, museums, the 9 streets, Vondelpark and supermarkets.

We want to rent our place to families only to enjoy some time in Amsterdam in a safe surrounding. If you travel with young children, there are plenty of toys that can be used. We have a beautiful 35sqm large roof terrace with an amazing view.

name: Cosy apartment in Amsterdam East!
description: Nice and cosy 2-person apartment in the lively Amsterdam Centrum-East, 10 minutes from the the city center! On the corner of Oosterpark, close to Tropen Museum and perfectly connected with public transport from and to the Airport/Central station (there is a direct train every 15/20 minutes to and from Airport, station is 5 minute walk away)

name: Bed & Breakfast Zunderdorp - Gypsy wagon XL
description:
BnB Zunderdorp is the ideal place to stay (also in Wintertime) at a farm in the beautiful polder of Amsterdam. It takes 10min by bike to reach Gare du Nord (station Ams North), from there you can take the subway to the city center (it takes around 8 min).
You will stay in a gypsy wagon (33m2) provided with all the comforts.
There is a private terrace attached to the gypsy wagon.
In the wagons there are two heaters, that makes it even in the winter time a nice place to be. Its a save place to be.

name: Appartement met tuin op de begane grond
description: Retreat to a peaceful apartament: ideal for relaxing and/or exploring the city. The property is steps away from the city's grandest park & and trendy JP Heijestraat. Foodhallen is a 5-minute walk, Canal Belt, Jordaan, Museumplein & Vondelpark within a 10-minute walk. Also many public transport options within a few minutes' walk. On the corner of the street there is the possibility to rent bikes. Individuals, couples or families with children are welcome.

name: beautiful ground floor apartment with garden.
description: If you love the historical roots of Amsterdam this is the ultimate destination to stay downtown. This  lovely spacious 120 square meters apartment is on the ground floor with a nice, large garden 130 square meters. Unique in Amsterdam. Located on the historical Realen Island, near by the cool streets of the Haarlemmerdijk, Jordaan and Westerpark. With nice restaurants, shops and bars on walking distance.

name: Romantic Loft apartment with canal view
description: Beautiful attic apartment in the city centre. With its beautiful canal view this apartment of 65m2 surface has an enormous light and open character. The luxurious and cosy refurbishment makes you feel at home immediately. With its queen size bed, a cosy living room with a huge sofa, TV and dining table this apartment is really a gem. It contains all kitchen utensils and also a fridge, microwave, coffee and tea maker. Outside the room you will find the private bathroom with bath tub and toilet.

name: Straight Tree Residence - "Bamboo Room"
description:
Welcome to my gorgeous getaway, a haven of peace within the heart of the vibrating city centre of Amsterdam!

Feel at home in this cosy and beautiful getaway, including queen size bed, mini fridge and brand new bathroom. The entire house has been newly renovated.

After a long day of walking, watch some Netflix on the Smart TV, or enjoy a drink surrounded by the beautiful canal houses from the bench in front outside of the house.

Looking forward to welcome you!

name: Family house with garden in Amsterdam
description:
Best of Both Worlds!
Charming family home in a green, peaceful area, just 3 km from Amsterdam's historic center. Enjoy urban convenience and natural beauty within a 10-minute bike ride.

Prime Location: 10 minutes by bike to the city center and a nature reserve.
Nature at Your Doorstep: Garden borders a park with a picturesque lake.
Nearby Amenities: Grocery stores and bike rentals within a 5-minute walk.
Experience the perfect blend of city life and nature in this ideally located family home.

The apartment is equipped with all comforts, high ceilings, lots of light and a wonderful place to relax in the busy city. The apartment is 72m2. There is also a spacious and sun-drenched balcony.

description: Welcome in our unique and charming home on Amsterdam's most beautiful square. Our home owes her character to her year of construction, 1889, and her warmth and coziness to the contemporary layout and Bohemian interior. Located in the lively centre of Amsterdam, but in a quiet area near the green Oosterpark, our 3-bedroom house is the ideal spot for a family with 2/3 children. A lot of light, underfloor heating and fireplace make our cozy house a true delight

name: Sailing ship nearby city centre.
description: Historic luxury renovated 130 m2 sailing ship from 1890 for combi sailing/sleeping. Moored nearby the city centre of Amsterdam in a quit harbor with nice restaurants, and bars. Around the corner is a big supermarket and a  beach with watersport facilities. On board are 4 sleeping area's for 14 persons. There are 2 toilets and 2 showers. There is a complete kitchen, large living and dinning area and an outside area with beautiful lake views. For families, couples or groups.

name: Leidse Bosje Amsterdam Center
description: Almost 200 m2 with a quiet garden, within a 5-minute walk of the Museumplein with the Rijks- Stedelijk and Van Gogh museum, Concert building and the nightlife of Leidseplein. Next to the Vondelpark and with supermarket and bike rental across the street. Restaurants within 100 meters.

name: Citiez Hotel Amsterdam: Urban Twin Room
description: Our stylish hotel offers rooms that each represent a different international city; sleep in Paris, Montreal or Lucerne! Centrally located in a shopping centre (TKMaxx, ICIParis, H&M, McDonald's, 4 supermarkets), FoodMarket (international) and congress centre De Meervaart within walking distance, parking garage (FREE!), direct tram to the centre (15 minutes), direct express bus to Schiphol (15 minutes). Our allDayCafé is open 24/7 for coffees from our baristas and lots of fun!

name: Fully equipped apartment in vibrant neighbourhood
description: Discover the urban retreat in the vibrant neighborhood of Amsterdam Oost in my colorfully decorated and fully equipped apartment. Feel a local as you explore the nearby museums, trendy bars, craft breweries, and charming local shops. Take a leisurely walk to Oosterpark or indulge in a mouthwatering local pastry at the Javastraat. With convenient tram and bus connection, you'll have easy access to Amsterdam Central Station and Schiphol Airport. Experience the best of Amsterdam here!

name: Unique canal view stylish apartment
description:
A beautiful very central quiet apartment with a unique canal view.
The apartment is very stylish, renovated with a lot of art from a Dutch artist.On top of that there is a terrace where you can look out all over the city!
The apartment is situated on the top 2 floors. It has a very spacious living room with lots of light and a unique view on the canal, a well equipped kitchen, a bathroom with bath and a Kingsize bed.Due to very central location all main attractions are on walking distance!

name: Private entrance and bathroom, FREE parking!
description:
In the northern part of Amsterdam is our family house, a former bathhouse. It was used as such until 1970. Your bedroom was the children's changing room of the bath house and is recently designated by the municipality as a monument. The rental income from my guest room is used entirely for the maintenance of our monumental house.

Parking your car is on the public road and free of charge in our neighborhood.
Parking your bicycles is safe in our gated backyard.

name: Private room in a Historical Building! City Centre
description:
A private bedroom in an amazing building what is build in 1785 ! An historical building with typical Amsterdam architecture !

The bedroom and bathroom / toilet with are located on the 1th floor of the appartment. The appartment is on the 2th floor of the building. (In the appartment we have two young females living, they have their own bathroom on the ground floor of the appartment)

name: The North:The Place to Be!Very Private&Coronafree!
description:
The North is happening right now ! Covid19-free Area ! Extra cleaning after each visit ! The room is like an apartment and very private . A Real Big Balinese lounge-bed to sleep in. Mattress is 2meters 55 cm long ! Big spacious room .City Center is only 10 min away by Bus and Metro . Rental of Bikes is possible . Quiet area. Shopping mall only 50 meters away. Working Pinball machine inside !
Shower and toilet straight opposite the room. Washing sink inside the room with cold running water.

name: Sweets hotel - Theophile de Bockbrug
description: Comfortable bridge house on the doorstep of Amsterdam’s vibrant Vondelpark. Your bedroom window is the perfect spot for watching locals on their daily bicycle commute. Skip across to the park and enjoy the greenest part of the city, or relax at one of the street-side cafés. The neighbourhood has a village feel, but in a 30-minute walk you are at the Leidseplein or the music venue Paradiso. Enjoy the public picnic table on the banks of the canal, directly adjacent to your bridge house.

name: Private Canal Studio
description: There is a private studio opposite Vondelpark on the waterfront, which is 5 minutes away from Leidseplein and Museumplein, and cafes and shops 100 m away. There is public transport practically in front of the door. It is warm and cozy furnished and wonderfully illuminated by daylight.

name: Bright apt. with Rooftop Terrace @ shopping street
description:
This stylish apt. is located in Amsterdam Old-West, bordering the old city center, the Jordaan and the museum & canal belt district. All within walking distance!

The apt. is stylish & bright and has a great atmosphere! There is a fully equipped & open kitchen, a comfortable double bed, nice bathroom &walk-in shower, toilet, dining & lounge area.

We're sure you'll have a great time in this apt. that is located in a nice shopping street.

name: Moderne studioappartement
description: Be welcome in this comfortable, sun-drenched house in a nice, quiet and centrally located neighborhood. It is on the second floor of a monumental building with a steep and narrow staircase in true Amsterdam style :-). For that reason it is not suitable for people with mobility issues. The house is clean and modernly decorated and has all the amenities that will make your stay enjoyable. It offers the perfect blend of tranquility and easy access to all attractions.

name: Cosy Amsterdam Appartment
description: My loft is located at a residential area close to Leidseplein, which is 20 minutes walk from Dam Square. All major attractions : Rijksmuseum, Van Gogh museum, the world famous Concert Hall, city park, shopping area like the Jordaan, P.C. Hooftstraat are of walking distance. You can rent a bike, take the tram or even a stroll.  The Loft is at a relatively quiet neighbourhood yet filled with good quality pubs, cafes, restaurants, food court, supermarkets and other shops offering daily needs.

name: Apartment in Amsterdam
description:
Lovely recent renovated apartment of 75 m2 ( 810 ft2) with garden and fully equipped kitchen (incl. washer).

Located in a characteristic - vibrant - old Amsterdam neighborhood. The Oosterpark, Dappermarkt and many restaurants & bars and famous museums are around the corner. 10 minutes walk from the heart of the city, but also with short and frequent tram and bus connection.

Happy to help with great restaurants & bars, museums and other recommendations.
amenities: ['Private backyard – Fully fenced', 'Outdoor furniture', 'Bathtub', 'Outdoor dining area']

name: The Studio Sixty Six
description: The Studio Sixty Six is located in the petite Wetering neighborhood, nestled right in the centre between the main canals of Prinsengracht. Locals and visitors alike are charmed by the beautiful architecture and village-like feel.  The surrounding area, the Spiegelkwartier, is known for its antique shops and galleries. The studio is perfect when your are a couple looking for a place on a great location!!! A great way to visit Amsterdam and live like a local!

name: Stylish and central appartment nearby Vondel parc
description:
Cosy 55M2 for two.
Please note that only the 2 registered guests are allowed inside the appartement.
2 two persons beds.
No cleaning fee. Walking distance from touristic center.

Bathtub shower combo.

Central, all amenities ( supermarkets, restaurants, coffee shops, trams).
Museums, Vondel parc, Leidseplein at walking distance.
Trams to all the touristic attractions.

name: Appartement naast centrum Amsterdam
description:
Welcome to our canal view apartment in the heart of Amsterdam!
Fully furnished apartment with separate bedrooms, spacious living room and balcony. Located in the best central location of Oud-West, you're just minutes away from the Anne Frank House and some of the city's best restaurants and cafes.

Book your stay today and experience the best of Amsterdam in style!

Within 100 meters you have a bike rental, restaurants and a supermarket.

A beautiful private, spacious apartment on the first floor in the center of Amsterdam overlooking the canal. Artis, the holocaust museum, Tropenmuseum and the Oosterpark are within walking distance. Furthermore, there are all kinds of cozy cafes and restaurants around the corner, such as the Green Elephant, Café Eik and Linde and the Bakhuys. Also Amsterdam-Oost, a bustling city stall, can be reached by foot.

description:
Live like a local on a houseboat, close to all hotspots in Amsterdam. You will stay at our b&b with private bedroom & bathroom, which is renovated recently to a comfortable cozy room, looking over the Canal and all the boats passing by..

name: Quiet room + bicycles near centre Amsterdam
description:
The room with kitchenette and private toilet / shower is very quiet and is situated in the neighborhood "West". At 200 meters : cozy fresh food market "Ten Katemarkt", small entertainment center Foodhallen ( cafe, cinema ), Kinkerstraat with a lot of nice cafe's / shops.
At 1 km : Vondelpark, from where the centre of Amsterdam begins : Leidseplein, Rijksmuseum, Van Gogh Museum and more.
There are 2 bikes for you ( free, no pay ). We live here with Faouzia (my wife), Nabil ( son ) and Ed (me)

name: New studio near Vondelpark, private entrance
description: In the popular Old-West area, close to the famous Vondelpark and Leidse square, is our beautiful and cozy studio situated. It's newly renovated, with a beautiful bathroom with rain shower, kitchenette with Nespresso machine and dishwasher, a comfortable double bed with luxurious linnen and your own private entrance. Perfect for a getaway to Amsterdam! We became superhosts with our other studio, with almost 200 5 star reviews. We used all our hosting experience for renovating this new space.

name: Captain's quarters in classic ship.
description:
Romantic, cosy room in the back of an antique barge, perfect for couples. Private room, with extra hangout in the steeringhut and on the sunny deck terrace outside.
Our boat is located in the Jordaan, a beautiful and lively area in the centre of Amsterdam.

name: Knus appartement met tuin en WFH
description:
Cozy apartment in Amsterdam East.
Equipped with 1 bedroom with king size bed, with 2x wireless charging points.
The bedroom offers access to the cozy garden.
The living room+kitchen has a nice corner sofa and large TV. In the evening, it is wonderfully quiet and you can eat cozy in the garden with evening sun.

In the garden is the home office with USB-C dock and 2 screens, where you can easily work alone or with 2 of us!

There are also 2 bikes available on request.

Our house is newly build outside the citycentre. It has 3 bedrooms, living-kitchen, tv room, office, big bathroom, rooftop terras and a terras in front of the house.
It is very sunny and spacious and situated on an island next to the centre of A'dam (by tram only 10 min from central station) The neighbourhood is new and located inbetween hip and happening Amsterdam North and Amsterdam East: The best parts of town are at your fingertips (gem. Amsterdam reg nr: 0363 0994 3D4E B2E5 9D0A)

name: Unique family house in the centre of Amsterdam
description: Our place is a 150 m2 house with a garden in a unique part of Amsterdam close to the Middenweg with lots of shops and public transport. Downstairs: two big rooms 'en-suite' with a serre and a semi open kitchen - a terrace and a garden facing the south. Via an internal staircase you arrive upstairs where you will find a master bedroom with a kingsize bed and three separate bedrooms for children and  a modern bathroom containing both a bath and a shower. For more info: robert@roosenstein.com

name: Generator - Private 6 bed Female Room
description: Experience privacy and comfort in our Female-Only Private 6-Bed Room at Generator Amsterdam. Designed exclusively for women, this room features 2 bunks (6 beds) and a private bathroom. Each bunk is equipped with a light, personal shelf, USB charging station, and under-bed lockers. A hair dryer is provided for your convenience. Pillow, duvet, and linen are supplied, with towels available at reception for a small fee.

name: Great apartment in Amsterdam! (Centre-East)
description:
A very nice stay in Amsterdam Oost! This cosy apartment has it all and is on the edge of the city centre. But why go to the centre? Because the East is already a unique place to stay. Hot and happening! Lots of nice bars, restaurants, musea, Artis, Oosterpark, Beer Brewery 't IJ and the Dappermarkt one of the best markets of NL. Actually when you look outside the window, you can see the Dappermarkt. Buy yourself some bread, cheese, fish, vegetables. For couples, friends, business!

Z/23/2140059

name: Luxury light and lovely studio at top location
description: Welcome in  B@B, Bed at Brederode! The room is for max. 3 people and offers complete privacy , with own bathroom and entry. The room has all modern comforts but still has original details like the ornamental ceiling. It has a small kitchenette were you can make coffee and tea, no breakfast is served. We live with our family on the ground floor. Centrally located at quiet residential area 15-20 min walk from city centre and museum quarter.
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Luxury designer apartment
description: Beautiful designer apartment in the heart of Amsterdam overlooking the canals. Hotspots like the 9 streets, Dam square, Anne Frank house and Leidse square within walking distance. Enjoy the canal view from the living room. There is a big, fully equipped kitchen. The bedroom with an en suite bathroom is located quietly in the back of the apartment. In the front of the apartment there is a bench and table where you can sit enjoy the sun. Bikes available. Driver comes pick you up from the airport.

name: Appartement Oosterpark
description: This apartment is wonderfully centrally located and yet you can leave the hustle and bustle of the city behind here. The beautiful Oosterparkbuurt is green and has many nice coffee shops and shops. You will be on the canal belt within 10 minutes. Perfect for couples or solo travelers looking to enjoy the city. After a long day walking around the city, you can relax in the bath. I love sharing my favorite places and restaurants in town!

name: Cheerful two-bedroom home with garden
description: Enjoy the charm of Amsterdam from a green oasis in the North part of the city.

name: Nice apartment with balcony and Whirlpool
description: Nice apartment (for 2 persons) with a cozy balcony and whirlpool in a 60m2 apartment  in Amsterdam.  The apartment is fully equipped and perfectly located, close to a supermarket, restaurants, public transport and just 10 minutes to centre and 20 min the airport.

name: Large family house with garden
description:
Cat-Lovers only!
Lovely early-twentieth century house with beautiful garden. Public transport to the center of Amsterdam right outside the door. Close to shopping center. Close to park with good restaurants. 250 m2 backyard and private parking space in front yard.
Our cats Rocco and Skippy, will not join us for our holiday and need to be taken care of. They're very sweet, cute and require low maintenance.

name: Houseboat for rent in Amsterdam!
description:
Residential ship for rent in Amsterdam!

Would you also like to experience what it's like to walk through the bustling center of Amsterdam one day and wake up on a houseboat the next day? On the houseboat where you will enjoy your breakfast outside on the deck, you dive directly into the water, go paddle boarding and enjoy on the Markermeer!

name: Appartement in Stadsdeel West
description:
Welcome to this spacious apartment in the Amsterdam Oud-West district.

A 2-minute walk from the Vondelpark and a 10-minute walk from Leidseplein, this apartment is very centrally located but in a nice and relaxed neighborhood. With many cafes, restaurants and shops just a few minutes walk away, the area offers something for everyone. Perfect for a couple who wants to see more of Amsterdam than just the standard highlights, but also if an Amsterdammer wants to live.

name: Historical sailing ship in the center of Amsterdam
description: Welcome on board of our historical sailing ship "Chateauroux", in the summer sailing the Dutch waters and in the winter docked in a unique spot in the heart of the city. Experience the free way of living on the water, like many local Amsterdammers do. Our skipper will be happy to tell you all about the ship, sailing and the city.

name: Gezellig, licht en knus appartement in de Baarsjes
description:
Welcome! Experience Amsterdam in the cozy neighborhood "De Baarsjes." 10 minutes away from Dam Square, Jordaan, De Pijp and Vondelpark. Within walking distance are many shops, supermarkets and nightlife.

Our stylish apartment (72m2) is equipped with everything you need for the perfect home away from home. Make use of our extensive kitchen, queen-size box spring, home office, cozy balcony and spacious living and dining room!

name: Big design apt - comfy bed & luxury bathroom
description:
Welcome to our stylish design apartment in the hip district of De Baarsjes! You can comfortably enjoy the city from this spacious (55m2/590 sq ft), bright & luxurious home.
Discover the bustling neighborhood, known for its trendy restaurants, or the famous city center (15 min walk or 5 min by public transport).

The apartment has, among other things:
- Comfortable, luxurious bed
- Design bathroom with rain shower and underfloor heating
- Romantic, green balcony with morning sun
- Walk in closet
- Professional induction stove

name: Mooi en ruim familiehuis bij Vondelpark
description: Spacious and beautiful family home in Oud-West, only 1 minute from the Vondelpark. Around the corner from coffee shops and nice restaurants. Walk through the park to Leidseplein or Museumplein (with the Rijksmuseum and the Van Gogh Museum). Tram 1 at the end of the street and takes you quickly to the city center or central station. The house has two living rooms, four bedrooms, two bathrooms and a lovely large and sunny garden.

name: Eco-friendly 2 Single Beds Room by Vondelpark

name: Beautiful design apartment near Vondelpark
description:
Welcome to our stylish and spacious 80m2 apartment, right in the heart of Amsterdam next to the famous Vondelpark. Our place features a large kitchen, modern bathroom, two bedrooms, and a cozy balcony. Convenient tram access makes getting around easy.

Situated on a quiet street in Amsterdam Oud-West, we're just a short walk (5-10 minutes) from Museum Square, the Canals, and the charming 9 streets area. Our neighborhood is lively with great bars, restaurants, and shops.

name: Inside 4 traditional Amsterdam townhouses
description: Amsterdam has some of the world’s greatest museums, and Max Brown Museum Square has them right on its doorstep. The hotel is located within a neighbourhood full of vibrant bars, restaurants and cafés, so your nights here can be as exciting as your days. If you ever want a local recommendation, just ask a member of the Max Brown team. Space is tight in this historic buildings so be aware the rooms may not offer a lot of extra space – but plenty of local charm. City tax not incl.

name: Authentic Farmhouse The Vergulden Eenhoorn 2
description:
There is great history behind the hotel. The Vergulden Eenhoorn was established in 1702 as a city farm and used to be one of very few farmhouses the city of Amsterdam has.

Together with the city of Amsterdam the farmhouse was fully renovated to modern standards, while maintaining the historic value and its features.

The space is fully equipped with all necessities to make your stay as comfortable as possible!

name: Sweets hotel - Buiksloterdraaibrug
description: Situated on a cycle route in a rustic setting with a view directly over a tiny lake in Amsterdam north. Your neighbours are the local swans. Picturesque Dutch character houses line the street and a postcard-perfect 18th-century windmill is within walking distance. Enjoy a picnic on your private lake-side lawn in summer. In winter this bridge house is a romantic and cosy hide-out. Buiksloterdraaibrug is a perfect overnight stop for cyclists on the LF7 cycle route.

name: Luxury Apartment in Trendy Oud-West Amsterdam
description:
Hi! Welcome to this apartment in the Old West part of Amsterdam. Everything is renovated in 2017.
You will have a completely private apartment with 2 bedrooms, a bathroom and a kitchenette located on the first floor (second for americans) with your own entrance.
In the near vicinity of the apartment you will find many bars,restaurants and supermarkets, with highlight the FoodHallen and a daily freshmarket!
The City Centre and it's Museums are even on walking distance.

name: Beautiful Luxury Canalhouse AP @ Oud-west
description: High-quality luxury renovated apartment. Spanning approximately 115 m² on one floor, it boasts spectacular, unobstructed views of the Singelgracht, Jordaan, and Westertoren. The very bright living room is enhanced by these views, with 2 terraces, one at each end. This apartment features a spacious layout with 3m high ceilings, a modern designer kitchen with French doors leading to the balcony, and an open living room. The bedroom includes a luxurious en-suite and a separate toilet.

name: Stylish apartment next to Vondelpark in Amsterdam
description: Stylishly renovated spacious ground floor apartment located right next to the Vondelpark.  This apartment offers proximity to the best Amsterdam has to offer: Stunning canals, the best markets in town, hip eateries, cozy pubs and restaurants and charming streets.

name: 3-room appartement with balcony
description: Welcome to our modern and renovated apartment in Amsterdam, located between Vondelpark and Rembrandtpark. Our apartment features three cozy rooms and a balcony with outdoor furniture. The living area has a dining table,  sofa and smart TV. The fully equipped kitchen has everything you'll need. Our apartment has floor heating and fast WiFi and laundry facilities.
amenities: ['Blender', 'Coffee maker: espresso machine', 'Free dryer – In unit', 'Board games', 'Outdoor dining area']

name: Javaplein with a view
description:
Discover our cozy duplex apartment in lively Amsterdam Oost, with views of Javaplein. Bright and inviting, it offers a true local experience. Nearby, lively Javastraat will give you plenty of cafes and restaurants and Flevopark will give you the perfect way to unwind.

Inside, find two double bedrooms (1m80 bed in one, 1m40 in the other) two toilets, and a bath/shower. While not hotel-perfect, our home exudes warmth and charm, with personal touches reflecting our love for this space.

name: Super cosy apartment with garden!
description: This apartment is a real pearl for people that like Amsterdam but also like to stay in a quiet green area. The apartment got totally renovated 2 years ago into a sweet vintage jazzy crib :) You can play vinyls or listen to the birds in the nice private garden. The apartment is located in Amsterdam North. 15 min by bike or 20 min by public transport from Amsterdam Central Station. Supermarkets around the corner and surrounded by beautifull nature.

name: Homy & Sunny Apartment
description:
The apartment is located in the busy Kinkerstraat street where you can find a lot of coffee places, shops, and supermarkets.

The apartment is located on 4th floor and living room windows are having the sun all day.

The bedroom is looking on the inside of the building and it is very quiet, so no streer noises are a problem.

The apartment is our home where we live, and therefore you can find a lot of: art, books, magazines, candles and flowers.

The apartment has a back yard terrace.

name: Lovely 90m2 apartment in Amsterdam centre
description: Beautiful 90 square meter (1000 sq ft.)  apartment centrally located in Old-West in a quiet street - Ideal for couples or single travellers

name: Singel Hotel Amsterdam: Economy Twin Room
description:
A charming gem, right in the heart of Amsterdam. The Singel Hotel Amsterdam*** is known for its historic charm and offers daily accommodation to both tourists and business travellers. Our fantastic location, atmospheric accommodation and excellent service guarantee you one of the most pleasant overnight stays in Amsterdam.


Our rich breakfast buffet can be booked at check-in for only € 15.00.

name: Appartement in Stadsdeel West
description: Central located Apartment in Amsterdam West

name: InnAmsterdam4U Bed and breakfast
description:
You will never want to leave this charming, unique accommodation.
We serve breakfast and upon request we offer our guests a Malaysian meal and a half-day trip around Amsterdam for a fee.
By public transport you can be in the heart of the city in 10 minutes and we are easily accessible. 20 minutes from Schiphol (by public transport) and cheap parking at P+R under the Olympic Stadium and Bos en Lommerplein. You can rent bicycles across the street.
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Light-filled living lobby with long communal table
description: The large hipster room offers you extra space and a quiet oasis of well-being for a comfortable stay with us, whether alone or with company. You sleep in a large double bed and enjoy an undisturbed night's rest thanks to the soundproof windows. Furthermore, you will find a flat screen TV with screen mirroring function, so you can connect your mobile device and watch your favorite movies, Invisible sound system, air conditioning and heating, full body mirror, a seating area and a private bathroom

name: Private Studio with garden and own entrance
description:
Private, Spacious and Modern Studio in Amsterdam Zuid with garden.

Private studio (40 sqm) for 2 persons in Amsterdam Zuid. Private bathroom with rain shower and toilet. Near Train station Zuid with good connections to the city centre (by public transport within 10 minutes) and to Schiphol Airport in 10 minutes. Room fully renovated in 2022. Own entrance to the street so very private. Guests can use the garden for relaxing. Free WIFI. Netflix available.
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Mid-century modern luxury in the heart of Jordaan
description: Unique mid-century designer home in the middle of the center of Amsterdam. Our neighborhood is in the original Amsterdam area of the Jordaan, centrally located and full of restaurants and local markets yet a quiet haven in the middle of the city. We have carefully remodeled and decorated the house in a modern way, providing a luxury experience for our guests, featuring a full bar, contactless entry, smart home features and a unique outside landscaped terrace.

name: 3-bedroom serviced apartment in Amsterdam oud-west
description: Bring the whole family to this great place with lots of room for fun in quiet vondel park area, where supermarkets, restaurants, museums are 3-5 minutes walking distance, tram stops to train station.

name: Not your average apartment
description:
The apartment is on floors 2, 3 and 4 (above ground floor).
Floor 1: front door and stairs to floor 2.
Floor 2: large room with dining and sitting area and fully equipped kitchen. Separate wardrobe and toilet.
Floor 3: study annex sitting room with sliding doors to bedroom 1, which has its own separate bathroom.
Floor 4: Bedroom 2, which has its own separate bathroom. Small roof terrace.

name: Lovely & spacious apartment in the center of AMS
description:
This bright and modern space has everything you wish for including a balcony in front of the water:
- large & open living room with view on the canal
- cozy bedroom with queen-size bed
- big fully-equipped kitchen
- modern bathroom incl bathtub
- total size: 80m2, renovated in 2021
- suitable for remote work

The flat is located in a atmospheric residential neighborhood in the popular Eastern part of the city-center of Amsterdam.

Permit number:
Z/22/2049761
Z/23/2135146

name: Chic Sunlit Flat
description: Welcome to our chic, sunlit apartment on Alexanderplein. Nestled in the "Garden of Amsterdam," our spacious second-floor retreat boasts a study, living and dining rooms, an equipped kitchen, and a cozy bedroom with an en-suite bathroom. Enjoy the green surroundings and nearby attractions like Artis Zoo and Oosterpark. With tram and metro access just steps away, explore Amsterdam with ease. Surrounded by charming cafes, restaurants, and a bike shop, immerse yourself in the full Dutch experience!

name: Holiday Suite: 2 bedrooms including private shower
description:
Newly renovated apartment maisonette offering up to two bedrooms. Main
bedroom has one double bed and is a mini suit with a private shower and
WC. All bedrooms can use an additional WC on hallways. Digital lock for
automatic check-in at anytime. You can go to city center in 25 min with
bus (stop 1 min from home). My place is exceptionally clean, quiet and
equipped with brand new items. Family/big-groups can rest easily here
and enjoy a high speed wifi.

name: 105 Hotel Jansen Bajeskwartier
description:
Hotel Jansen Bajeskwartier has 200 fully furnished rooms, designed and built with sustainability top of mind. Our rooms have a super comfortable queen size bed, a kitchen pantry, en suite luxurious bathroom with rain-shower and a comfy dining, work and chill corner.

Each two floors have spacious Club Rooms which function as a living room and self-catering kitchen. On the ground floor you find Cafe Jansen and its terrace, a hybrid space with room for dining and working.

name: Stylish and newly renovated home
description: This centrally located accommodation is tastefully furnished.

name: Luxe en stijlvol stadshuis met zonnige tuin
description: Double ground floor apartment (120m2) in the heart of Amsterdam, located on the Amstel, close to the Albert Cuyp market and the Sarphatipark. The house is very high-end finished down to the smallest details. The warm atmosphere invites you to cook deliciously, dine or have a drink in the kitchen with cooking island and large table. Also exploring the city is easy due to its very convenient location. The house is very spacious and is located in a quiet street in the bustling Pijp and has a sunny garden on the south.

name: Chinese suite with private bathroom & toilet
description: No description

name: Full apartment, Oost Park AMS
description:
Discover tranquility in this fully equipped apartment on the edge of Amsterdam's famous Oost Park. Enjoy serene surroundings from your private balcony. The apartment features a spacious main bedroom and an additional bedroom.
With an elevator, 10-minute walk to the metro and 3 minutes to the tram (bike rental shop 5 minutes away). It boasts a well-appointed kitchen, fridge, separate toilet, and an extra room with a comfortable mattress. Ideal for a quiet stay close to Amsterdam's vibrant life.

name: Sunny Jordaan - 2 Bedroom and Balcony
description:
Located in the heart of Amsterdam, our sunny 2 bedroom apartment in Jordaan is perfect to explore the city.

Located in the lively heart of the city, you are surrounded by cafes, bars and the Amsterdam canals, with the famous Prinsengracht canal at the end of the street. Anne Franks house is an easy stroll, the train station is 10 minutes walk and the central Dam square is also 10 minutes. The apartment has 2 bedrooms, a French balcony at the front, large balcony at rear

0363851D49D683F4D75A

name: Enjoy Amsterdam
description:
Spacious and quiet 3-storey town house perfect for a stay with your family or friends: master bedroom, 2 children’s rooms, sofa bed, kitchen, kitchenette, living room, bathroom, 2 toilets, 2 terraces. Free and safe parking is available.

Explore IJburg with striking architecture, a bustling harbour, cafes and a shopping centre at your doorstep.

Both city excitement and beach life are only 15 min away: the tram takes you to the city center, while the beach can be reached through a lovely walk.

name: Bright studio, excellent central location!
description: This elegant, bright little studio is great for your Amsterdam experience! Direct connection with the airport and central station, self check in. Quiet and private. Museums and canal area are within walking distance. A chair folds in seconds into a comfy extra bed (0,90x2,00m), see pics. Flexible check in and check out times. Two long steep steps.

name: bright & cozy space next to park
description:
Discover the canal city of Amsterdam in an authentic and cozy location. This apartment in Oud-West, right in between Rembrandt and Vondelpark welcomes you with a sunny balcony, a cozy kitchen-living open space, private bedroom, and a large bathtub to relax after a day out. The place is close to many other attractions walking and biking distance: Street market, foodhall, supermarkets and restaurants (5-10 min)
Museums and Central area well connected via public transport or biking (15 min)

name: NEW: Stylish Family houseboat apartment Amsterdam
description:
Welcome aboard our brand new houseboat apartment, where modern comfort meets the tranquility of waterfront living!

Nestled along the shimmering waters, this charming retreat promises a unique getaway experience like no other.

Whether you're seeking a romantic escape or a peaceful retreat with loved ones, our houseboat apartment provides the perfect blend of luxury and serenity for an unforgettable stay.

Come experience the magic of waterfront living with us!

Please note that there is AC!

name: Luxe appartement in groen Amsterdam Noord
description:
Our apartment is a new (opened on September 1, 2020) luxurious and cozy guest house with its own entrance, a terrace at the bedroom and a lovely bench in front of the door. The apartment is quietly located in a beautiful spot in Amsterdam North, surrounded by greenery and by the water. Within 10 minutes you are downtown.

It is the place to enjoy everything that Amsterdam has to offer and to explore the beautiful nature of Waterland within a few minutes on the (free) bicycles.

name: Ruim appartement, rustige buurt.
description:
Spacious cozy apartment with cats. One wants to be cuddled and one that wants to be left alone.
In a quiet neighborhood with Rembrandtpark and Vondelpark, shops and nightlife area De Hallen within walking/cycling distance. With tram in about 15 min at Central Station.
Up to 4 people. Fully furnished. With lovely roof terrace. Book at least 5 nights in the summer. Arrival/departure time negotiable.

Includes cleaning after a week or at the end of the stay. Book after consultation.

name: City centre cosy apartment with garden
description: In a very central and cozy location a cozy apartment with garden. Easily accessible and public transport is just around the corner. The Vondelpark is located at 10 minutes' walking distance and Dam Square is a 15-minute walk away. Cafes and restaurants are just around the corner. Outside you can visit the hustle and bustle, nice terraces, museums and nightlife. At home and in the garden, the hustle and bustle passes by and you don't hear everything outside. This newly renovated cozy apartment is furnished with everything you may need!

name: centrally located gem for two,
description: Welcome to our cozy 1-bedroom apartment, Situated in Amsterdam's center, it's ideal for exploring the city. Designed for comfort, it's child-friendly and offers a baby cot upon request. With a double bed, well-equipped kitchen, and cozy seating area, it's perfect for couples. Enjoy nearby cafes, restaurants, and attractions like the Anne Frank House and Rijksmuseum. Whether you're here for history, nightlife, or relaxation, our apartment offers the perfect base for your Amsterdam adventure.

name: Spacious charming & light apt (kingsize bed)
description:
Our 2016 renovated 145m2 appartement is perfect for couples or families situated in a picture perfect villa in one of Amsterdams most pitoresque streets. The street itself is quiet and a perfect startingpoint to explore the old city center. Within 100 meters are several restaurants and bars.
We are situated is in the hearth of the trendy neighborhood Watergraafsmeer with multiple (local) shops, restaurants, cafe's within walking distance. We are happy to tell you our favorite spots!

name: 2 new studios, own bathrooms
description: 2 studios to rent both with own private bathroom, perfect for 2 couples! located in a new spot close to the centre of Amsterdam. Hand sanitizer is provided, each room has a private bathroom, 50-inch TV with cable,  internet and a Chromecast to stream your own content, WiFi, small fridge, tea and coffee making facilities, hair dryer and a super comfortable bed (160x200)!

name: Private canal apartment in city center (Jordaan)
description: Lovely private apartment in the city centre (jordaan) with canalview!! Free wifi available. Fantastic location in the heart of Amsterdam’s famous Jordaan district. My studio is the perfect place to discover Amsterdam by foot, Dam square 500meter.

name: Home in the most outstanding area of Amsterdam
description:
Cosy apartment located in the heart of the East End of Amsterdam. The most underground part of the city. Nearby you can find vibrant pubs and restaurant which attract the locals by offering any sort of crafted beer, delicious food and gin tonic.

You’ll love my place because of the neighbourhood, the ambience and the accessibility. And it's great for couples.

name: 1 Bedroom Apartment - Centre of Jordaan
description: Great 1 bedroom apartment within central Jordaan, stones throw away from Anne Frank's, great public transport throughout Amsterdam.

name: Sunny Apt in Centre Amsterdam
description: The modern and bright apartment is situated in one of the best parts of Amsterdam, walking distance from Vondelpark and Museumplein and with lotsa hip bars and restaurants around.

name: Amazing Amsterdam Accomodation
description: Our house (three stories, 170 m2), double free parking spot, garden (35 m2) facing south and a canal is simply amazing. City centre is at 10-15 minutes by bike (included) and public transport is at less than 5 minutes walking distance. We rent to families and couples only, but small groups can send a request of course. Amsterdam only allows a maximum of four adults per booking.

Spacious room for two in a modern Amsterdam West apartment. Your private room offers a brand-new double bed, a workspace, a chest of drawers for storage, a full-length mirror, books, and artwork.

Located on the third floor with elevator access, the apartment is right next to a metro station and a bus/tram stop with direct connections to the central station. 5-minute walk to BoLo Center for cafes, a gym, and shops, and a 10-minute walk to the tranquil Erasmus Park to enjoy a calm walk or a jog.

name: Historic home, 50m2 B&B, private, garden, center!
description: Our beautiful historic home (1768) still has all the original features such as beams and fireplaces. Perfect neighborhood, all public transport within walking distance, right between art and culture, great locations for food or a drink, a lot of couleur local. The neighborhood is modern and historical at the same time and our House is a great base for all of the attractions, quiet yet right in the Centre. We look forward to receive you in our private house!
