name: Cozy apartment in Amsterdam East
description: Our cozy apartment ensures a warm welcome every time you step inside. Equipped with all the necessities for comfortable living, this home features a charming bedroom with a double bed, spacious bathroom and the living space with a snug couch. Great place to unwind after a long day exploring beautiful Amsterdam.

name: Amsterdam Family & Friends Retreat
description:
Welcome to Amsterdam Retreat

Located in Amsterdam North, our family-friendly home is your perfect city getaway. The ground floor features a modern kitchen, cozy living room with TV, and access to a private garden. Upstairs, you’ll find three bedrooms and a bathroom, with a loft attic on the top floor offering a double bed, workspace, music studio, and laundry facilities. Enjoy easy access to local cafes and a quick ferry to the city center. Our home is fully equipped for a comfortable stay.

name: Independent studio with canal views
description:
Lovely studio with canal views where everything is just brand new and convenient: bed, bathroom, linnen, towels, kitchen. You’ll love our place because of the area, the comfy bed, the light, the kitchen, and the coziness. Our place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travellers and families(we have a crib and a stroller).

Amsterdam has a lot to offer and you can easily travel to other cities or the countryside. Most guests regret they didn't stay longer. Ask a 5% midweek discount!

name: Exclusive duplex penthouse in Amsterdam
description:
This fantastic duplex penthouse awaits you in an exceptional location for your trip to Amsterdam. A worry-free stay, as you can enjoy all the hotel services, such as a wake-up service or, if you wish, buffet breakfast and room service. Stay next to the Vondelpark in an apartment with a spacious living room with a sloping ceiling, 2 bedrooms and a fully equipped kitchen.

IMPORTANT: access to the apartment located on the first floor is only by stairs.

name: Urban paradise for digital nomads
description: The large hipster room offers you extra space and a quiet oasis of well-being for a comfortable stay with us, whether alone or with company. You sleep in a large double bed and enjoy an undisturbed night's rest thanks to the soundproof windows. Furthermore, you will find a flat screen TV with screen mirroring function, so you can connect your mobile device and watch your favorite movies, Invisible sound system, air conditioning and heating, full body mirror, a seating area and a private bathroom

name: Design and location are key in this hotel
description: The spacious Townster room with plenty of room offers every traveler, whether alone or with company, a modern retreat oasis with the highest comfort. You will find a spacious double bed, a flat-screen TV with screen mirroring function, so you can connect your mobile device and watch your favorite movies, Invisible sound system, a room safe for your valuables, air conditioning and heating, soundproof windows for a good night's sleep, a seating area, full-length mirror and a private bathroom.

name: Lovely new apartment 15 min from Amsterdam Center
description:
Welcome to our bright, modern, comfortable and warm apartment in Amsterdam!

- Perfect location in Amsterdam East close to Oosterpark, Pijp and City Center
- Second floor corner apartment (with elevator)
- Spacious balcony with lounge set for a sunny break of the day
- Fully-equipped kitchen including Quooker and oven
- Modern bathroom with a big bathtup and separate shower
- Fast and free WIFI & TV with Netflix
- Close to two supermarkets (3 min walk)

Send us a request and we will answer asap

name: Beautiful spacious house in a popular area
description: The apartment is very well situated. The old West is in itself a beautiful area with bars and restaurants on every corner but we are also situated close to Museumplein and the Canals. If you want to visit museums and the city center (the canals) all is within walking distance.  Public transport could also take you everywhere. Ideal location if you want to be close to the action but live in a calmer environment.

name: Classy Apartment In #1 Area
description: Located on the Albert Cuyp Market in the lively 'De Pijp' area, this is the perfect private apartment to stay in. It's decorated classy and equipped with a comfortable Kingsized bed, a kitchen, bathroom and even a home theatre set. It also has a big table with double screen in case you would like to work. All the cities highlights are within walking distance including Amsterdams famous canal belt.

name: Charming AirBnB along canal - Adam-centre.
description: Romantic AirBnB at the Canal (SUPERHOST LISTING), in the city-center near Rembrandtplein. All kinds of popular bars & restaurants, shops & museums are within 1-10 min walking distance. The location couldn't be better for people who like to explore all Amsterdam has to offer. The  AirBnB is suitable for 2 people, has fast wifi and a BIG 65 inch tv-screen including Netflix and YouTube. AirBnB & bathroom is fully private with your own locked door! You DON’T share the place with others!
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Spaceous apartment in Oud-West
description:
Perfect place for exploring Amsterdam, just around the corner of many places to eat and drink.

On the corner of the building, with view over the Admiralengracht, is this apartment located on the second floor. It has everything you need for a week away in Amsterdam: a large livingroom and kitchen, spaceous bedroom and a large balcony on the sun side.
Om walking distance from many bars and cafes in Oud-West, and tram stop in front of the door, with <10 min to the city center.

name: Spacious apartment canal view and a large balcony
description:
The Apartment is located in "De Pijp", nearby The Rai, Van Gogh Museum, Heineken Experience, Stedelijk Museum Amsterdam.
The apartment is located at the third floor and has a large balcony an spacious kitchen.
The apartment is suited for couples, solo-avonturiers and business travelers.

name: Stijlvolle woning in de Pijp met 2 balkons!
description: This centrally located accommodation is tastefully decorated. The apartment is distinctive because it has two balconies, allowing you to enjoy the sun all day long. The rear balcony is enormous and features a lounge set. The front balcony is a charming, French-style balcony. The double bed is spacious and comes with a TV, providing a relaxed way to start your day. The apartment is centrally located. Within 2 minutes, you can reach all the bars in De Pijp and the Albert Cuyp Market.

name: Apartment in the centre of Amsterdam
description: Apartment in the centre of Amsterdam

name: Spacious and unique apartment 85m2 with garden
description: Feel at home in Amsterdam at this spacious apartment with a sweet little garden, located right in the middle of the trendy Frederiksbuurt and just a block away from the Jordaan area, Westerpark and Anne Frank House.

name: Five Person Room
description: No description

name: Apartment in the best location! Pets allowed
description:
Welcome to our comfy apartment right in the heart of the city. It's super close to cool places like Vondelpark and Leidseplein, but it's also tucked away from the noisy crowds. You can walk to Vondelpark in just 4 minutes, and Leidseplein is nearby too. There's a lively market called Ten Kate just 2 minutes away!
Our apartment has two big bedrooms, each with a comfy queen-sized bed.

We're happy to host families, no groups of friends. We want to keep things quiet and cozy for everyone.

name: 2 bedroom apt, with 2 balconies
description:
Two bedroom place on the top floor of an East Amsterdam apartment. Mid-size balcony on the back, with outdoor dining table.

Large living room with big, comfy sofa and additional arm chair - very bright, and due to south facing nature benefits from sunshine all day.

Kitchen is complete with air fryer, hobs and toaster.

Second bedroom is slightly smaller, but has double bed and wardrobe space.

70m2 overall space, only available to groups of +25 years of age.

name: Luxurious family home near Vondelpark in Amsterdam
description:
Our nice, spacious house offers everything for a great stay in Amsterdam. It is centrally located in the city, in a quiet and green neighborhood but close to many hotspots. The museum square, Vondelpark are just around the corner, as are the many nice cafes, restaurants & shops.

The house is very spacious and completely renovated in 2021. There are 3 floors, 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, one with sauna & rain shower and a bathroom with an XL bath and separate shower. There is also a private garden.

name: Modern City Apartment
description:
Beautiful 50 m2 apartment centrally located, 3 minute walk from the Leidse square & 5 minute walk from the Museum district. It has a village feel with the buzz of lots of nice coffee places and restaurants. Located on the first floor of a typical Dutch building from the 1910’s. You have the entire floor to yourself. You can open the balcony doors to let the sounds of the city in. If you prefer more stillness, just close the soundproof windows.
Available: wifi, chromecast, washing/drying machine

name: Midtown Royal Apartment
description:
The 45m2 Royal Apartment features a modern living area, 4 single beds with comfortable mattresses, a fully equipped kitchen and a brand new spacious bathroom.

Midtown Hotel is situated at the edge of the center in one of the most popular areas in Amsterdam. Only 5 minutes from Leidseplein, Vondelpark, Museum district and the “9 straatjes” popular for its cozy restaurants and boutique shops.

name: Spacious Penthouse with view over Vondelpark
description: Spectacular penthouse with many terraces, directly located next to the Vondelpark in a quiet street without traffic. The many windows and terraces make the apartment really bright and allow for a magnificent view over the Vondelpark.

name: Spacious appartment in Amsterdam
description:
This apartment (60m2) is located in Amsterdam East, near the beautiful Flevopark and the hip/vibrant Javaplein and is fully equipped.
Think of a spacious kitchen and living room, a beautiful rain shower and a bedroom with a 160x200 bed overlooking the courtyard, a smart TV and a desk to work at. By tram (3 minutes walk) you can reach the center within 10 minutes. The supermarket, coffee shop, restaurants, etc. are all within 5 minutes walking distance.
What else do you want?

name: Loft in het oude centrum van Amsterdam
description: In our city apartment studio it is nice to stay near the sights such as De Hermitage, Het Rembrandthuis and Artis zoo. We have a quiet, quiet garden of 25 m2 on the South East. Our house is a characteristic loft in an old garage. You will find a big supermarket 5 mins walk away (councilbreestraat). We offer our ground floor space as a studio. So there is one space in which the sleeping accommodation is also. However, there is a separate bathroom + toilet.

description:
Luxurious newly renovated apartment in Centrum Amsterdam. All the highlight, parks, musea, squares and many bars and restaurants are walking distance and the apartment is located at a very quiet, peaceful apartment complex. You will LOVE it!

The apartment is spacious (65m2), has 2 bedrooms (2-person beds & comfortable 2-person sleeping couch) , a large kitchen and living room and a beautiful balcony overlooking the world famous Skinny bridge (Magere brug) and the Canal's. The Wifi is 100Mbps.

name: Groot appartement met tuin A'dam
description:
Lovely apartment 114 m2 with garden of 50 m2. Large living room and bedrooms.
Within 20 minutes in the city center of Amsterdam and central station.
10mins walk to town beach.

name: Sweets hotel - Beltbrug
description: Wake up to a view of a 16th century Dutch windmill, nestled close to local cafés in hip west Amsterdam. Take a leisurely 20-minute stroll to the popular 9 Streets for shopping nirvana or stay closer to home for an expert espresso and a delicious local pastry. Amsterdam Central Station is directly accessible by bus (14 minutes).

name: Cosy well located apartment
description:
1 bed apartment in the centre-west of Amsterdam, within walking distance of the city centre, the Jordaan area, the museums and the popular local neighbourhood of old-west. Based in a quiet area close to the canal with a feeling of being "out of the city", and with great amenities, transport connections, restaurants and bars close by.

The apartment itself is cosy, and very light during the day and evening with all the basic essentials.

A perfect place to discover Amsterdam from!

name: Bright apartment with PRIVATE rooftop terrace
description:
Our home is located in one of the most cozy neighbourhoods of Amsterdam. Super spacious and bright, hard of find something like this in this city. You'll feel an open space to breath, relax and feel at home.

5 min walking distance from Vondelpark, nice cafes, restaurants and canals to visit around.

We work at a tech company with a work-from-anywhere policy. We rent it when we are on travels. Note that we both work from home. WiFi is fast. There are big monitors and office chairs too

Kick back and relax in this calm, stylish space and delightful neighborhood.

The apartment is located just 5 minutes walking distance to famous Vondelpark.

The area is full of trendy bars - restaurants and cafes. 17 minutes walking to Leidseplein, easily connected with trams 1-17-7 and close to train station Lelylaan(via tram). Foodhallen and Ten Kate Market are 5 minutes by foot.

Museumplein is 15 minutes away via Vondelpark. Het Sieraad, Staring at Jacobs, Lennep are def. worth to visit!

name: NLS Amsterdam
description: Enjoy a stylish entire home experience, located in the Jordaan-heart of Amsterdam.

This stylish place is perfect for families, friends or to combine with working holidays.

One bedroom apartment in the ground floor with private entrance. Bedroom with a double bed + sofa bed in the living-room, hosting up to 4 guests.

Located in one of the most lively and local neighbourhoods of Amsterdam. A few minutes away from the city center. Enjoy the beautiful Amsterdam streets, the canals, local bars and stores just around the corner.

Relax in the patio on the sunny summer day

The balcony is really nice for a morning coffee, or a drink in the late evening sun!

name: Amsterdam oost Privat room

name: Family home Amsterdam

description:
Peaceful room on a houseboat with a big view on the canal, yet in a vibrant neighborhood and a fantastic public transportation connection to the city centre.

Nearby include: the mill 'de Gooyer', with the famous brewery Brouwerij 't IJ underneath the mill, the Dappermarkt street market, Artis Royal Zoo and de Indische Buurt.
The #7 and #14 tram stops that will take you to the city centre are very close by.

Multiple supermarkets are close by that are open every day from 08.00-22.00.

name: Magical courtyard rooftop apt
description: Our little palace is the upper half of a beautiful Amsterdam house from the 1920s, located in the middle of one of the most romantic little courtyards of the city. It's got a lot of modern comforts next to traditional charm. It's a very light place, and has balconies on both floors next to a beautiful roof terrace with a lot of sun and privacy.

name: Ruim appartement in Amsterdam
description: This classy apartment is perfectly suited for a romantic getaway

name: Amsterdam! Ground flour appt! + Sunny garden!
description: It is a bright, very clean en beautiful  app. in the populair eastside of Amsterdam. With a sunny garden en trendy bars en cafés around the corner. Only 10 minutes with the tram to the city center. Tram stops in the street! Famous Dapper market 5 min

name: Unique family apmnt Amsterdam, private parking
description:
Spacious open, loft-style family apartment in a great neighborhood in the center of Amsterdam. Modern and homey. Perfect house to relax after a day in Amsterdam. Close to public transport to all major sights. Three bedrooms with double beds. Unique kitchen, well equipped. Outside terras for sunny days and breakfast outside, this space can also be used as a private parking place right outside the house! Wifi in the whole house.
Sorry we are not renting the house to students and people under 25.

name: 114 Hotel Jansen Bajeskwartier
description:
Hotel Jansen Bajeskwartier has 200 fully furnished rooms, designed and built with sustainability top of mind. Our rooms have a super comfortable queen size bed, a kitchen pantry, en suite luxurious bathroom with rain-shower and a comfy dining, work and chill corner.

Each two floors have spacious Club Rooms which function as a living room and self-catering kitchen. On the ground floor you find Cafe Jansen and its terrace, a hybrid space with room for dining and working.

name: Spacious Apt Amsterdam East
description: Step inside the bustling world of Amsterdam East with bakeries within walking distance, cozy cafes, a local market, a convenient train station and the Tropenmuseum where both adults and children can immerse themselves in the diverse cultures and history of the world. Experience the ultimate style and comfort in our spacious apartment, perfectly suited for families up to 4 people. This oasis offers not only an elegant interior, but also a kitchen equipped with all comforts.

name: Comfortable room - central + WIFI
description: Private room with floor heating, wifi, single bed + double bed (on entresol). Quiet street in safe area with a great vibe. Trams/buses/train taking you in minutes to the city's hotspots. Spacious shared bathroom with bath tub and walk-in shower.

name: Brand NEW renovated apt. for 4 in city centre AMS!
description: Enjoy easy access to popular shops and restaurants from this charming place to stay. It is a brand new apartment on the first floor. Everything is totally private and you don't have to share anything with someone else. The apartment has 2 bedrooms with both kingsize comfortable beds. Both a tv with Netflix and the best working WIFI you can get. This stylish apartment offers a renovated bathroom with a bathtub and a walk in shower. Separate toilet as well. You will get all the privacy and comfort
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Room in Amsterdam Apartment
description: Peaceful and cozy apartment in Oud- West Amsterdam. You will be sharing the apartment with us and one dog. The apartment has a roof terrance and canal view. Very central, easy to get to most places around Amsterdam within 5mins by bike. Multiple tram and bus stops nearby. Lots of amazing restaurants and bars within walking distance, as well as the 9 Streets and popular Jordaan district.

name: Stylish Apartment with Asian influences
description:
9th SUPERHOST YEAR!

The B&B has a shower and separate private toilet.
Guests have acces to a big beautiful garden, bohemian garden room, stylish living room and full kitchen.

Nearby:MUSEUMS, lively PIJP and South districts, PC Hoofdstraat shopping, ANNE FRANK's childhood home, RAI train/metro (4 mins to center), all within 5 mins walk.

The B&B is exclusively reserved for one group of guests, ensuring a private and intimate experience without any other B&B guests during your stay. WELCOME!

If however this is not enough for you, all public transport is around the corner and takes you in <15 minutes to the center (6 min. to central station). Or even better: 20 min by bike :-)

name: Cozy and light appartment
description: Relax and unwind in this peaceful, stylish space, close to Amsterdam city center.

name: Spacious city flat near nature
description: Indulge in the allure of our spacious, cozy, and fully equipped apartment. Nestled at a perfect distance from the enchanting wonders of Amsterdam, your stay promises both city vibrancy and natural serenity. Good access to public transport (train, bus, tram) brings you easily into the heart of the city, while nature's embrace remains within arm's reach. Escape the urban bustle at your leisure, For instance, the Flevopark is literally around the corner. Also very much suitable for working abroad.

name: Charming captain's cabin on historic ship De Hoop
description: We would like to welcome you on board for a unique stay in the captain's cabin of our ship De Hoop. Once an active cargo boat that transported goods and supplies along the Dutch waterways, De Hoop is currently enjoying her well deserved retirement and one hundredth birthday in 2022. De Hoop is perfectly located for those who wish to experience the best of both worlds. You’ll wake up with the serenity of the water, whilst being just a 15 min tram ride from Amsterdam city.

name: Stijlvolle kamer aan straat in centrum met privacy
description: 23 SouS is centrally located in the old part of the center. Our 18th-century house offers two comfortable double rooms, each with its own entrance and en-suite bathroom. These can be booked separately or together as a family stay. 23 SouS is ideally located for discovering the city on foot and by bike. 23 SouS is also suitable for a family with children and business travellers. For business travellers, conference locations are easily accessible from 23 SouS.
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Central Amsterdam studio full kitchen 2 free bikes
description:
You will be walking and biking distance to all the must see places in Amsterdam.

You will be provided with a free sim (without charge), to help stay connected to the internet. Charge can be bought in the supermarket right in front of the apartment.

Right outside the door you will get to see house boats, eat on a canal bridge, or rent a boat couple of minutes walk away.

If you are coming by bus, the station is just a couple of minutes walk away,
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Private studio at houseboat Alma in Amsterdam
description: Our ship ALMA, signifies SOUL, is a former freight ship transformed into a comfortable houseboat. It is docked on the verge of the Jordaan, in the heart of Amsterdam. Close to lots of paramount landmarks, yet very quiet at night. We warmly welcome aboard guests who want to enjoy the ultimate Amsterdam houseboat experience. Your own space on the starboard of our houseboat has all necessities you need for a great stay in Amsterdam. The interior of the boat has been completely renovated recently.

name: Bright apartment in Baarsjes!
description: Welcome to Amsterdam's hidden gem in the heart of the vibrant Barsjees area! Apartment is between the famous Rembrandt and Vondelpark. This charming and centrally located apartment is the perfect home base for your unforgettable Amsterdam adventure. Supermarket is at your doorstep, as you can easily explore the city on foot or hop on the nearby tram which leaves just a minute away.  Surrounded by a plethora of cozy bars, trendy restaurants, and delightful cafes.

name: Luxury Vondelpark Penthouse
description:
Whistling birds from the Vondelpark on your deep and sunny balcony? What a location, what a nice apartment.

I’m offering at a prime location in the hip and wanted Oud-West area, between the Vondelpark and the Overtoom. The apartment was completely renovated in 2014, while retaining the traditional facade. The apartment is finished high end with an eye for detail: from the Luxury kitchen to the modern-classic herringbone floor.

The is your perfect apartment in Amsterdam...

name: Beautiful spacious apartment

City center is 10 min by bike of public transport.

name: Van Westhouse #1 City centre canal house studio!
description:
Welcome to the Van Westhouse, a recently renovated canal house in the historic heart of Amsterdam city centre!
This modern and cosy studio (25m2) with double bed, private bathroom (including shower and toilet) and kitchenette is conveniently located at a very quiet canal, yet with all facilities you need around the corner.

Amsterdam central station (train, tram, bus, metro), Dam Square, Nieuwmarkt, Anne Frank house, Rembrandtplein, Waterlooplein are all within walking distance!
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Bright 1930s apartment
description:
My home is a characteristic 1930's bright apartment with bay-window and west-facing balcony. It has a spacious kitchen with doors opening towards the balcony. There is a separate office space.
It is located in a quiet, green and safe street within walking distance from the Vondelpark and the popular Oud-West area. Lots of bars, restaurants and good public transport connection to the city center are around the corner.

name: Eastern Eclectic Palace
description:
101sqm space with 2 bedrooms and 1.5 bathroom.

Large couch and a very comfy inflatable (queen) mattress for additional guest.

Available for July with 1 room shared with owner. Can provide a bike if needed.

Coffee, tea, matcha included and a possibility for breakfast on weekends.

Two patios, one facing the north and the other south.

Extremely sunny location!

name: 1 bedroom + study in Amsterdam
description:
Our 1 bedroom apartment with a study is situated in the heart of Amsterdam's Jordaan neighbourhood. Our apartment is a 5 minute walk from Westerpark and 15 minute walk to Amsterdam Central Station. It is also situated near the tram and bus. The apartment is in a great location near shops, restaurants and supermarkets.

Our modern apartment is a great place to work remotely as it has a study. The kitchen is fully equipped.

name: Bed at Pander, centrally located
description:
As an artist and independent minded traveller I created a room in my house as I like to stay in.
The house is located in a unique quiet street in Amsterdam, it feels as a village in the middle of Amsterdam center, the lively neighbourhood De Pijp.

name: Trendy space, cool area: 2 private bedrooms+bathr.
description:
Beautiful apartment in great location. Our modern, cosy space is designed for city breaks without the busyness. Nice, quiet street in trendy, charming area inc. some o/t best bars, restaurants and parks of the city- all a few mins walking distance. Superb transport links: train station, tram & bus all only 2 mins walk, all with connections to Schipol airport & Central Station.
The apartment is on the 1st floor, with 2 bedrooms, a bathroom, a toilet, a balcony. There is no living room nor kitchen

name: Central & spacious family house in hip area
description: This is a beautiful and peaceful house in Amsterdams greenest neighbourhood and perfect for a family stay. It is very central and just a 10 minute bike or tram ride from the city centre.  Amsterdam Oost / Watergraafsmeer is one of the city's hippest neighbourhoods with many cosy cafes, excellent restaurants,  great shops, parks, swimming pools and numerous sports facilities.

name: Room in hip Amsterdam East
description:
Room with a king-size bed. Cute kitchen.

The living room and balcony is at the south side and has great light coming in throughout the day. A balcony overlooking a garden that makes you wonder if you are really in the heart of Amsterdam.

This apartment is ideally located to make the most of the best that Amsterdam has to offer. A neighborhood full or restaurants, parks, cinema, coffee bars and the tram, train and bus are all close by.

name: And the rest of the apartment
description: Live like a local in this one of a kind ground-floor apt in the city's top location. Enjoy the large living area - bathing in light, a luxurious kingsize bed and our quaint garden. We love to share our hotspots of the city, for a preview see below!

name: Enjoyable Stay in museum district (#1 eco badge)
description: Victorian room in 1900 style, no-nonsense, minimalistic, clean, bright, and very eco-friendly. Central location, deluxe bedding, fiber internet connection, and the cutest dog, Pom. This baroque-style house contains all you need for an unforgettable visit. The Enjoyable Stay has a relaxing one-person bed, a large closet, a stool, and a table. The room is bright, comfortable, calm, and cozy to make you feel at home. The sun shines in the morning, so you can wake refreshed for a new day.

name: Luxury Park View Apartment in Amsterdam East

Apartment

Each bunk includes a light, personal shelf, USB charging station, and under-bed lockers. Pillow, duvet, and linen are provided. Towels are available at reception for a small fee. Welcome in my house, a cosy calm apartment in the north of Amsterdam, the perfect location. It is quiet and green, yet only a 15 minutes bike ride to the center, or 2 metro stops. Still the center is not far, so after a busy day of Amsterdam you will sleep in peaceful quietness.
You can park your car for free, which is unicum in Amsterdam.

I have 2 cats but they have their toilet outside.

The studio is in the back of the house. It has a sitting area with a coach, a dining table with coffee and tea area plus a small fridge, a bedroom with sufficient closet space and large private bathroom.

name: Bed & Breakfast Zunderdorp, Studio 3
description:
B&B Zunderdorp is a typical Dutch Stolp which was formerly a farmhouse, now with 5 fully equipped studio appartments, each with a private kitchen & bathroom and free parking.
The modern & energy neutral house is at a working farm surrounded by farm animals with the beauty of the Dutch polders nature, the peaceful meadows, but still not too far from Amsterdam town centre.
This is an ideal place for a family holiday or a romantic getaway.
I work and live on the farm so I am always available.
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Arty house in Amsterdam Centre
description: We are renting out our beautiful appartment with garden in central Amsterdam (oud-west). It is spacious, gallery-like and quirky with an open kitchen livingroom and french doors attached to our 70 square meter garden. The garden is very green with fresh vegtables and greens, very cool during the summerdays and sunny at dinner time (18:00). It is close to some local restaurants, supermarkets and vondelpark and trams to all directions (incl. airport). Biking to the city center takes 5 minutes.

Last few dates in Oct 2024! Last chance to book then I’m stopping with AirBnB.

This is a Private room with bathroom/WC/Kitchen shared! - Great private room in a very nice apartment in Amsterdam South - Near Vondelpark, WTC and Olympic stadium. Keep it simple at this peaceful and centrally-located place. This is a shared apartment !!!

The room is separated, fully private, and can be locked (both sides) - Visitors can use the common areas including Kitchen/Bar, Bathroom and Toilets as well as the sunny terrace. The private room is hosted by the main host.

Summer in Amsterdam!

There is no 24/7 lobby, make sure that we agree on a check in time. All guests need to show a valid ID upon arrival mandatory by Dutch criminal law (art. 438) and the City of Amsterdam.

check in: 2PM
check out: 11AM

FYI: I have two cats. One of them is very quiet and shy, the other one is active, outgoing and clever. They freely roam around.

The entertainment area, the Arena, the AMC and the Airport are nearby. Very comfortable for those who travel to A'dam for business or study. And I love to offer high service.
Due to the coronavirus, we regularly disinfect all surfaces that are often touched.

Unwind in modern comfort with amenities like flat-screen TV, microwave, kettle, and coffee maker. Immerse yourself in the city's charm in our smoke-free units. Book now for an unforgettable Amsterdam experience!

There are 2 single beds and 1 foldable bed. In the kitchen you can find all you need to prepare a meal or a coffee/tea. There is a fridge and a microwave, coffee and teamaker etc. We have also bikes available if you like and there is free parking on the street.
The cabinhouse has airco and als a terrace with a picnictable.

Part of the Amsterdam Houseboat Family, Michele has two delightful compact modern studios situated on her boat in ‘de Pijp’. Each private studio comes with all the necessary amenities needed for a comfortable stay in Amsterdam plus access to a large roof terrace for your summer bbq or swim. It is ideally situated for easy access to every part of the city and is located on an extremely charming and peaceful canal in ‘de Pijp’.

From Schiphol, but also by train and car, the B&B is easily accessible.

Parking in front of the door or in the street. Paid during the day. Free after 9 p.m. Shared shower. Shared use of the kitchen. Swimming pool "around the corner", close to Theatre, park, and multicultural shopping hall.
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Loft Jordaan 1620, with private entry
description:
Amazing loft in the heart of Amsterdam. 17th century townhouse, with private entry to the attic where you stay in a spacious room with double bed, sitting area and bathroom en-suite.
You will be in the heart of the Jordaan, walking distance to Anne Frank House, Dam Square, the nine streets, many canals and much more.
Discover some hidden gems in the Jordaan (hofjes) and enjoy the markets on Saturday and Monday.
Please think when packing, it's a historic building with traditional steep stairs!

description: Lovely new studio (2018) of 60m2 at one of the most upcoming trendy parts of Amsterdam: Amsterdam New West. Close to the evergreen popular Rembrandpark, urban Amsterdam beach at the Sloterplas, not far from the famous Vondelpark and Museum discrict and only 15 minutes from Schiphol Airport by public transport . Suitable for 1 or 2 couples, family or business travellers. Public transport (metro) on a 2 min. walking distance. The studio is very light, with plenty of parking spaces in direct area.
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Captains Logde / privé studio houseboat
description:
Welcome to the modern bed and breakfast aboard houseship Sequana. With a berth on the shore of the IJmeer.

We look forward to welcoming you to the captain's cabin of this beautiful houseship. The spacious private studio (30 m2) has a lovely double sofa bed in the living room, a private bathroom and toilet and a fully-equipped kitchen. You can use a kettle and coffee maker and a fridge. Free coffee, tea, sugar and herbs are available. You'll feel right at home here!
amenities: ['Barbecue utensils', 'Outdoor furniture', 'BBQ grill', 'City skyline view', 'Outdoor dining area']

name: Houseboat.712; Unique! Private & airconditioned.
description:
I finally did it! This brandnew houseboat is designed with you in mind. Meaning private entrance and amenities, sound proof walls and the best view in Amsterdam overlooking the Amstel River.
On the left you see the Grand Amstel Hotel and the Royal Theater Carre, opposite Amsterdam oldest rowing club.
The light is reflected over the water. Have you ever seen a Swan lifting up out of the water? Nature at its best straight in the center of the Pijp area with little restaurants and bars gallore.

name: Splendid loft with garden in the heart of AMS
description:
Enjoy the full comfort of a unique city residence with a garden, located in a most charming street in the very heart of the city.
The bright and open space of this loft will welcome and excite you time and over again.

name: Vondelpark cosy and warm appartement
description:
Spacious, bright and modern apartment with plants, art and an overall cozy atmosphere. Modern kitchen with a bar and all kitchen necessities. Two bed rooms and a clean bath room.

Supermarkets and local shops around the corner. Exploring the city from here is super easy: Vondelpark 5-minute walk, ten Katen Markt: 5-minute bike & city center (De Dam) 10-minute bike ride. But I'm pleased to guide you to the best spots around :)

Parking space, bikes and SUP's available for rent.
amenities: ['Children’s books and toys', 'City skyline view', 'High chair']

name: Huis met tuin tegenover Amsterdamse Bos
description:
Yes! Our house is available for you and your family. The house is around 110m2, has one master bedroom, one children's bedroom, private garden, shared garden and everything else you would need.

Located next to the entrance of the "Amsterdamse Bos". Or go for a swim in "Het Nieuwe Meer", 5 minutes from our house.
Within 15-25 minutes you'll be in the city centre and you can enjoy everything Amsterdam is famous for.

Please note we won't rent out to group of friends to visit festivals

name: Fantastic Area - Stunning Garden & Appartment
description:
Hi explorers

Great for families or friendly groups!

Relax, quiet & specious apartment in one of the most lively and popular scene - de Pijp. Sweet garden for the sunny days & cosy living-room with easy access to public transport and within walking distance from some of the city's hippest neighbourhoods.

name: Amazing Amsterdam houseboat (watervilla)
description: Our wonderful, modern houseboat is on a great location in the centre of Amsterdam, right on the beautiful Amstel river.  It is in the popular area De Pijp, and close to the Amstel Hotel, the Rijksmuseum, van Gogh museum and Museum of Modern Art.

name: Albert Cuyp III A Studio Amsterdam
description: Modern studio apartment, housing up to two people in Amsterdam’s Pijp district, overlooking the vibrant Albert Cuyp Market.

name: Nice bedroom easily access to city centre
description: A cozy and enjoyable bedroom with a double bed of 1.4m. The apartment is located in Amsterdam Old West, which takes you 15 minutes to Amsterdam Central by bus and 8 minutes to Sloterdijk Train station by tram. Bus and tram station is 1 minute walking distance. You share a clean and tidy bathroom with us.

name: Modern and spacious duplex apartment w/ large deck
description:
Welcome to our 3-bedroom modern and spacious apartment, perfect for families with children. Located in the charming Plantage quarter, this two-story home offers a 116m / 1250 sq ft. of living space. The master bedroom features a comfortable king size bed, and the entire house is bathed in natural light.

Our home beautifully blends the charm of an old house with modern design furniture.

Relax on our roof terrace in the evening and wake up to the delightful sound of birds in the morning.
﻿

name: Former ferry houseboat right at the National Opera
description: Right at the Opera in the heart of the city. Charming recently renovated full private and self containing studio at unique houseboat for tiny people. Panoramic views of city and river ! Well equipped kitchen - living. En suite brand new bed-bath. Easy connections to airport, CS, P&R and anywhere in the city. Nearby all points of interest, supermarket, bars, restaurants . 2 mins walk from Waterloo metro. Welcome to your private hide away studio aboard former IJ-river ferry Heen & Weer. Central !

name: Cozy park side flat close to Central
description:
We welcome you to our guest room in Amsterdam as one of our own family.

Our spacious 10 square meters room is the perfect retreat for travellers/couples who are seeking to explore the city. We invite you to use our kitchen if you need to cook something and the balcony to breath some fresh air.

We live at the property in another room with our Husky dog called Happy (he's super chilled and friendly). Sometimes we're away from the property travelling ourselves, if not, we're happy to greet you!

name: Private Spacious Apartment With Urban Garden
description: This ground floor apartment has been newly renovated and includes a bedroom with comfortable queen-size bed, smart-tv, lounge, a spacious dining area and lovely urban garden! It is located on a quiet street in the trendy and authentic pijp area, close to nice restaurants, local bars and the wonderful Sarphatipark just around the corner. If you are looking for a spacious and comfortable apartment where you can experience Amsterdam as a true local is your place! Ideal for couples!
amenities: ['Free washer – In unit', 'Private backyard – Fully fenced', 'Free dryer – In unit', 'Outdoor dining area']

name: Cozy flat in Central Flower Market with great view
description:
Is a charming corner in the vibrant heart of Amsterdam. Located on one of the most iconic and colorful streets in the city (Reguliersdwarsstraat) also just a minute walk from the historic FlowerMarket where colors and fragrances bring your mornings to life.
The location couldn't be better, as just a 3m walk is Rembrandtplein, a place full of nightlife and entertainment. Down the stairs the tram awaits you, which easily connects with the entire city center or just a 15m walk to Central Station

name: Cozy, Modern and Bright apartment 2 guests
description:
Recently renovated house decorated with love and attention. The apartment is remarkably cozy and comfy. Flooded with direct natural light the apartment has all the amenities you can require, even a balcony! You like music? you are welcome to dig the records collection and treat yourself with some jazz classics.
Only requirement if you decide to stay, please treat the space with respect and care. :)

name: Family appartement with garden near centrum.
description:
Apartment for a family or (adult) couple only in a quiet green child-friendly neighborhood, the popular Watergraafsmeer (Amsterdam / East). Within 12 minutes you are in the center with tram line 19. The apartment is 100m2 with three bedrooms, one with a double bed, one with a single bed and one loft bed.
And our lovely cat Minoes!
Please note that we will not accept reservations request from students our young adults.
(registration number Amsterdam: Z/23/2136504

name: Gezellig en modern appartement
description:
Welcome to our spacious apartment in the vibrant New West district of Amsterdam!

Located just a 5minute walk from Lelylaan station, we provide easy access to the bustling city center only 10 minutes by tram and a short 10minute train ride to Schiphol Airport.

Our apartment is ideal for your comfort and enjoyment. The living space is generous and tastefully decorated, with plenty of natural light to relish. The bedrooms offer a haven of tranquility after a day filled with adventures in the city

name: Classic and spacious appartment with roof terrace
description: This spacious classic home is located in the green Amsterdam East, opposite the Frankedaelpark. The house occupies the top two floors of a mansion from 1900 and is wonderfully bright and spacious (146m2!). In addition to a French balcony and a south-facing balcony, the house has a very spacious roof terrace with beautiful views of the park and the city. The house has all amenities; a SMEG stove and refrigerator, dishwasher, fireplace, bathtub, rain shower, etc.

name: Robin's RoofTop
description: WATERVIEW is a 48m2 private space on the top floor of a four-story house of in a quiet neighborhood of the city along a canal, adjacent to the Jordaan. The apartment is very light and ideally located in the city, with good access to the center.

name: Luxury apartment in Oud-Zuid
description:
Spacious and Luxurious Apartment with Character in Amsterdam Oud-Zuid.

Enjoy this gorgeous, spacious apartment in chic Amsterdam Oud-Zuid. The bright living room with modern fireplace, stylish dining space and fully equipped marble kitchen offer ultimate comfort. The large windows with sunny terrace offer a view of the green street. Located near Vondelpark and museums, perfect for culture and relaxation. Experience the charm of Amsterdam from this luxurious base!

name: B&B Houseboat Amsterdam | Privé Sauna & small boat
description:
The perfect romantic getaway for two, relax & enjoy the private sauna and home cinema. Options for Champagnes, rose leaves, chocolate and bites.

Some call it 'the loveboat'

(some go for the ultimate relaxation with their best friend)

You'll stay on a recently renovated former cargovessel with a private mooring at the IJmeer of Amsterdam! Wanna go out? It's less than 15 minutes to central station by tram, it runs every six minutes and goes till late.

Breakfast is served at bagels and beans.

name: 2 Bedrooms, Terrace, BBQ, 2 floors 120m2
description:
Welcome to our 120m2, 2-floor apartment in Valeriusstraat.

We rent out the whole apartment, or our guest room separately. Here you can book the whole apartment.

The whole apartment consists of 2 bedrooms, a big living/dining room and a roof terrace. It is located on the 3rd and 4th floor in lovely, local Oud-Zuid, Amsterdam in close proximity to Vondelpark and Museumsplein.

name: Apartment @1ee Keucheniusstraat
description:
Beautiful, bright & spacious apartment in the heart of Amsterdam. Located in the 4th floor, it's a cozy & green apartment with a big terrace that gets sun all day.

Very close to commercial streets, bars & restaurants but conveniently situated in a calm street, away from noises and touristic areas.

You are 600 meters from Westerpark, 2-3 min walk to bus & tram stops, 5 min away by bike from the classic Jordaan neighborhood, 10 min bike ride from Central Station & the Dam Square.

name: Family house w/ garden in Old South Amsterdam
description:
If you want to feel the energy of Amsterdam, but also want to enjoy greenery in the vicinity (Vondelpark / Amsterdamse Bos), then this family home is perfect for visiting Amsterdam!

Suitable for families with two children in a cozy neighborhood in Oud-Zuid (Old South area). Easily accessible by car and public transport and close to Schiphol without being bothered by it.
Plenty of toys for the children and a spacious double bed downstairs.

Minimal 4 night stay.

name: Apartment with parking and elevator
description:
The apartment is centrally located in trendy Amsterdam West. It's situated in a quiet street with many restaurants, bars, shops, attractions and public transport just around the corner.

The apartment is decorated with designer items and souvenirs which were brought home from our travels around the globe. The apartment is cozy and warm with modern facilities to give you all the comfort you need, such as an elevator, parking space, bath tub, separate toilet and a fully equipped kitchen.

name: Apartment with rooftop terrace
description: This apartment has a large roof terrace and a modern kitchen. It is located on the Mercatorplein, in the cozy district of De Baarsjes. There are a lot of cute cafes and restaurants here. The tram and bus stop in front of the door. In 15 minutes you are at Dam Square and in 20 minutes you are at Amsterdam Central Station. On the shared roof terrace there are two picnic tables where you can dine with beautiful views.

name: Charmant 5 star City Home with sunny garden
description:
This 2-floor apartment house with all comfort and luxury in one of the most beautiful streets in the heart of high-end neighborhood OUD-ZUID. Perfect for those who love culture, musea and stay in a quiet neighborhood.

The apartment (120m2) consisting of the ground and first floor, 2 (sunny-) gardens, friendly street with grass and canal in front.
2 bedrooms:
- 1 master bedroom: double bed (180X200)
- 1 sleeping room: high end sleeping couch (140x200)

name: Cozy apartment with balcony
description:
Quiet non-smoking apartment located in a beautiful monument street in the trendy De Baarsjes.
Bedroom comprises a comfy queen bed (foam mattress) & a work from home office area (wifi up to 100Mbps) with a view of the internal courtyard.
Located around the corner from a lively street with supermarkets, bakeries, bars, restaurants, gym and an outdoor/indoor swimming pool.
Trams and buses are within 5min walk taking you to any part of Amsterdam; lovely park 2min walk away from the flat.

name: Spacious, light, cosy apt. in the Jordaan district

name: Prachtig, ruim en luxe appartement op toplocatie
description: A beautiful, spacious (165 m2) and luxury apartment in the center of Amsterdam. This 2-storey house, with its own entrance, has no less than 4 bedrooms and a very luxurious bathroom. In addition to a beautiful view on both sides, the very spacious and bright living room offers a luxurious kitchen with cooking island and American fridge, a lovely sitting area with fireplace, a spacious dining table, a wing and access to 1 of the 2 sunny terraces.

name: Canal View 2-bedroom apartment
description:
Enjoy the real laid back Amsterdam lifestyle from this canal view apartment. Perfectly located in the center, you would be able to discover the beautiful Jordaan, wander in the picturesque Prinseneiland, relax in WesterPark, get a coffee in Haarlemmerdijk... Best spots are only 5 minutes away by walk!
It is well connected (bus 48/18/22, tram 5, Ferry F7), central station is 10 minutes away by bus/bike.
We renovated our 60m2 apartment & hope you will enjoy & take care of it as much as we do!

name: Super cosy and cute apartment in "the Pijp"
description: A cozy apartment in the middel of everything. Located at 500m walking from Museumplein, MOCO museum, Rijksmuseum, Concert gebouw, metro station de Pijp and the Heineken experience! It has a unique style and it has two double COCO-MAT beds!

name: Bright apartment with roofterrace in the Jordaan
description:
Our apartment is located in the Jordaan; the most beautiful neighborhood in Amsterdam! However, our street is one of the quietest streets in the Jordaan and that is wonderful.
Do you want to go to the crowded places or visit places of interest? The well-known Saturday markets on Lindengracht and Noordermarkt are a 5-min walk away and the Anne Frank House is only a 12-min walk away. The beautiful Westerpark is also within walking distance.

Our house is the perfect base to discover Amsterdam.

name: Lovely appartment in Amsterdam West
description:
Lovely spacious appartment in Amsterdam. Nice view and lots of light inside. 5 minutes walking distance from De Jordaan. Also 5 minutes walking distance from De Hallen. Nice bars and restaurants in the area, but not as crowded as in the center of town.
Living room, bedroom for 2 adults and sleeping room for two children. Kitchen with oven and microwave.
One friendly black cat.

name: Nordic Design Riverfront Apartment w Views
description:
New opening on February 2024.

Beatiful and cozy 40m2 mezzanine apartment with wonderful views to the river. It has one double bedroom, a bathroom, a comfortable living room including a dining table and a fully equiped kitchen. The ideal apartment for your stay in Amsterdam.

Maximum capacity: 4 people (double sofa bed for 2 guests)

For stays of 7 nights or more, there is weekly housekeeping. Additional cleaning services can be booked at an extra cost. Bed linen and towels included.
amenities: ['Free washer – In unit', 'Free dryer – In unit']

name: Light, cosy & warm appartment
description:
Tasteful, cozy, quiet and light, that's how I would describe my apartment. It is located on the top (3rd) floor, has a balcony and roof terrace, living room, dining area, a bright bathroom, comfortable kingsize bed and kitchen with all the trimmings. Everything you need for a comfortable stay in Amsterdam!

The neighborhood is super quiet but also very central, within 5-15 min you are at Central Station, in the Jordaan, at Westerpark (my fav park in the city) or at the buzzing Haarlemmerstraat.

name: Houseboat in centre of Amsterdam with riverview
description: Unique place to stay in middle of historic center if Amsterdam: houseboat Waterloo. This houseboat has a new refurbished apartment for maximum 4 persons with stunning views over the river, a nice terrace, 2 double bedrooms and a fully equipped kitchen. A spot on location, all kinds of bars and restaurants around the corner and all must sees of Amsterdam within walking distance. I warmly welcome you on my beautiful boat for a pleasant and unique experience. (judith)

name: Appartement + parkingplace/garage
description: No description

name: Modern & Spacious luxury apartment in Willemspark
description:
Bright and spacious apartment next to Vondelpark!
This modern, spacious 2 bedroom apartment has been recently renovated. It is situated in the posh Willemspark area and right by Vondelpark.
Expect a relaxing bathtub & shower. Kitchen is fully equipped to make you feel at home; kettle, coffee beaned espresso machine, milk frother- we've got it all!
*Please make sure to read our rules below.

name: Huis Roomolen
description:
Studio Huis Roomolen is located at Roomolenstraat in the center of Amsterdam, a little street beween canals, yet; in the middle of things.
Three large windows give a nice view over the Roomolenstraat. The size of the luxurious studio is 26m² including private kitchen, shower and toilet. Private roof terrace of 10m² at the backside enclosed by the neighbor buildings.
The place is very warm and personal, perfectly suited for a single traveler or couple to retreat as well as to discover Amsterdam.

name: Brand new luxurious 6 bedroom villa in Amsterdam
description:
Forget all your worries in this spacious and serene house incl garden & park around the corner. A small little 'island' with 6 villa's in a super quiet & green area. This is the ultimate escape right around the corner of our city centre. Step outside of the house and take a nice walk in Sieger park or walk to Nieuwe Meer for some fresh air.

Schiphol Airport is 10 minutes away by car and free parking for 2 cars is included. From the house it's a 12 minute walk to the tram to go to city centre.

name: Quiet Gem, lovely B&B in the Heart of Amsterdam
description: Independent B&B on our houseboat with your own entrance. We are located on a sunny and quiet canal in the heart of Amsterdam, close to Centraal Station, Anne Frank House, The Jordaan and the Canals. Your space is totally private with your own bathroom, bedroom, captain's room and wheel house. The space is centrally heated and double glazed for chilly days. You also have access to outside space on our pier where you can relax into the evening on warm summer nights.

name: Spacious and beautiful apartment
description: Spread across 120m2, this spacious abode features 2 spacious bedrooms, a sleek study for work or relaxation, and breathtaking waterfront views with no intrusive neighbors in sight. The recently renovated bathroom enyoys a walk-in shower and separate bathtub. Also, make sure to take in some sun on the  rooftop terrace! With the tram line a mere 2-minute walk away, whisking you to the city center in just 10 minutes. Plus, the airport is just a 15-minute Uber ride away, ensuring hassle-free travel.

name: Private studio in Amsterdam center
description:
Quietly located upper (4th) floor studio apartment in the Jordaan district is this cosy place for 2, with a fully fitted kitchen. It’s in a typical Amsterdam building so reaching the apartment only by stairs.

The apartment is completely private and centered on a comfortably living room with ample seating and a TV. The compact kitchen is great for cooking all sorts of meals, and the bed is elevated can be reached by some stairs (see pictures). The bathroom has a shower and a washing machine.

name: Design apartement Amsterdam-west
description: Spacious and stylish apartment. If you like a warm Scandinavian interior, you've come to the right place. A king-size bed from Swiss Sense and blackout curtains, so you will sleep wonderfully. A very spacious bathroom with rain shower and a separate toilet. The large wooden kitchen has a BORA cooktop and a tap with boiling water.The house is located in the pleasant neighborhood of the Baarsjes, full of delicious bakeries, coffee shops, restaurants, cinema and parks.

name: Modern & Cozy Apt in Amsterdam - near the center
description: Welcome to our bright 1-bed apartment! Relax in the cozy double bed or indulge in the spacious bathroom's large bathtub. Enjoy the balcony with a comfy sofa. Just a 15-minute ride to the center by bike or public transport. Two nearby parks (Rembrandt and Erasmus) and handy amenities close by. Book now for a delightful stay!

name: Light bedroom with private bathroom
description:
Our light and spacious bedroom is looking out over IJburgs recent experimental architecture. With the tram you're traveling to the city centre in about 15 min. At the end of our block there is option to swim in IJ, Amsterdams river.

Our neighborhood is quiet, with lot's of children.

name: 200 m2 delightful houseboat on an Amsterdam lake
description:
We live on a unique three-stories housebout on the 'buiten-IJ' lake in the North of amsterdam. You can overlook the green pastures and the pastoral Durgerdam, an old fisherman village.
We are restoring the whole boat and it is in different stages of finished/yet to do.. The middle floor (living area) however is finished and very comfortable.
We have 3 bedrooms of which 2 with double beds and 1 children's room, and 1 cat that needs to be fed twice a day.

name: Spacious Family House in the Museum District
description:
The place is located in the heart of Amsterdam's most popular neighborhood, the Museum District. You would get the entire place, including a beautiful garden, for yourself. The house has just been renovated (2017).

The best thing of the location is that every highlight of Amsterdam is within walking distance. The Van Gogh Museum, Stedelijk Museum and the Albert Cuypmarket are just around the corner.

We live here ourselves so we can provide you with lots of local suggestions.

name: Lovely new room
description:
Stylish apartment in a quiet street. Not far from the centre, and there's enough entertainment around. The place is very comfortable with a lovely Auping bed, own entrance, Nespresso and good shower.

WIFI, Nespresso, shower, no cooking facilities.

Bos en Lommer is a great neighborhood, with many restaurants and shops.

name: Sunny & big apartment well connected to the center
description: Please bear in mind it is a 5th floor with no elevator. This is a one bedroom apartment with big living room & terrace. The master bedroom has two good individual beds, can be separate or together. One bathroom and one toilet. Kitchen fully equipped. House full of plants & light. East & south facing. Big TV for Chromecast. Fast WiFi. Permit number Z/22/2059838.

name: Secret Suite (40 mtrs)
description: Located in the heart of the NDSM wharf of Amsterdam with panoramic views of the city skyline. On top of the crane are three spacious suites, with underneath a studio for Corporate & Music events. Only a private invite shows you Amsterdams best kept secret that's hidden behind an iron door. You'll enter a completely different world after closing that door: an underground scene where artists, free spirits and open-minded people meet. The height and structure makes your stay completely incognito.

name: Spectecular house! Close to city centre.
description:
Amsterdam Noord (North) is booming!

Great restaurants and bars within a few minutes by bike. Amsterdam Central Station is only 12 minutes by bike or 15 minutes by bus.

The house is located in a special neighborhood where everyone designed their own house. The result is a great mix of different styles.

The house (2017) is super spacious and light! It has 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, huge kitchen, living room and a sunny garden! Max 4 people or one family.

Registration 0363 CDA1 D8C3 1581 3C5A

name: Cute Amsterdam Apartment
description:
Discover your own piece of cuteness in the trendy Baarsjes neighborhood! Enjoy the two room apartment in a central location.

- Prime Location: Explore the vibrant Baarsjes district with its cool cafes, parks, and easy access to Amsterdam's top attractions.
- Sunny Balcony: Enjoy afternoons in the sun on your cute, private balcony.

name: Spacious Apartment in South-Central location
description:
Our newly renovated apartment is exclusively available for you and it's situated in the South of Amsterdam, a few minutes away by foot from the famous Vondelpark. The South of Amsterdam is well known for its high quality of living, luxury stores and a safe environment.

The city center, including Leidseplein, the 9 Streets and Dam Square is only 15min away by bike or public transport. Our apartment is situated at the ground floor and you will have access to our back garden.

description: This lovely, three story monumental house is located in De Pijp, also known as the 'Quartier Latin' of Amsterdam. It is owned by Federica and Ton, an Italian/Dutch couple with three kids.

name: Specious appartment with large sundeck
description: Just renovated spacious bright appartment with very large sundeck (sun from 12:00 - 20:00). Kitchen & living room are next to the sun deck. You will have your own appartment with private entrance (no shared stairs).

name: Peaceful apartment with garden
description: This apartment is situated on a very quiet street in the heart of the Pijp. It's within walking distance of the city centre, museum square  and around the corner of metro 52 and several tram lines giving you easy access to all of Amsterdam. Enjoy all the bars and restaurants of the Pijp, or stay in and enjoy a homemade meal in the garden made in the fully equipped kitchen or on the BBQ. Relax in the hammock while listening to your music on the Sonos sound system, before you start your day.

name: Cozy apartment at Erasmuspark
description:
Located right next to the park, you'll find yourself in an oasis of tranquility.

The city center is just 10 minutes away. The apartment is bright and fully equipped with modern conveniences. The area offers a range of dining options and nature, and there is a fitness center with both an indoor and outdoor swimming pool just a 3-minute walk from the apartment.

It's perfect for a relaxing getaway to explore Amsterdam at your leisure.
A workspace with an extra screen is also available.

name: Spacious Family Apartment
description:
Spacious & bright apartment in Amsterdam.
Solar powered! Free parking included (excl. summer).

Location (East)
- Quiet street, 5 mins walk max to all commodities (many tram & bus lines, supermarket, park...)
- Direct tram for the center (20 min)
- Great bars, coffee places and restaurants (we leave our tips guide)

- 100m2
- 1 parental bedroom
- 1 separate attic double bed (140x200)
- Big bathroom with shower + tub
- Very bright (that is rare in Amsterdam)

The Jordaan, Oud-West and Westerpark are within walking distance of the apartment. The canals and, for example, the Anne Frank House are also around the corner.

Several trams and buses stop one street away.

It has 3 bedrooms, a big living room and a kitchen. Kick back and relax in the sunny garden incl. a picnic table, a 'kids castle'...and a trampoline!
The popular 'De Pijp' is just a stone's throw away from the apartment. Bus stops, metro, restaurants, green parks and grocery stores are around the corner.

The room has all you would need for a comfortable stay - nice shower, fridge, heating/AC in summer, cosy bed, fresh linens, etc.
High Speed Internet and dedicated work desk.
It is few minutes walk to all attractions and transport.
Central station is 3 mins walk, easy access to airport.
Recently renovated room in a monumental property. Old world charm with clean modern amenities. True Amsterdam experience!

Docked only a few minutes from Amsterdam Central Station, newly renovated and designed under architecture: that's the Amsterdam 2 Bedroom Lux.

The the location could not be better: close to the buzzing city center, yet you are assured to enjoy a good night rest since our harbor is peaceful.
Two separated bedrooms both with a bathroom en suite are a guarantee for a luxurious private stay.

description: My boyfriend, our baby and I live in our beautiful palace in Amsterdam Old-West. We enjoy our modern apartment immensely. We have a large kitchen, with a bar and a big dining table. We also love to chill on our lounge sofa in the TV corner and watch a Netflix series. Or we like to relax in our private spa, our bathroom, where we have installed a large bathtub and a rain shower. And finally, our bedroom is a nice place where you can have a good night of sleep.

description: Renovated private studio close to the Foodhallen

name: Private full floor suite In Historic Canal House
description:
This is a beautiful historic canal house. Restored in original condition. It is located in the centre of Amsterdam on the Canal. It has everything you need for a great stay. A big bath, steam shower, fireplace and a very nice design.
All the rooms on the picture are private rooms and not accesible by others. Also the bathroom and toilet are private and only used by you.
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast
amenities: ['Free washer – In unit', 'Canal view', 'Bathtub', 'Free dryer – In unit']

name: Shore Studio 33
description: Once you step in, you'll be welcomed by the serene landscape of IJburg, Amsterdam Bay Area - a green enclave of Amsterdam, surrounded by shimmering waters, a city beach, vast parks, and modern architecture. Here, in this unique studio, you are not only immersed in the beauty of IJburg, but also just a few steps away from the bustling energy of central Amsterdam.

name: 207 - Nieuwe Amstelbrug
description: A cosy bridge house on the Amstel river in a vibrant neighbourhood near the popular Albert Cuyp market. The interior is divided into two floors with bathroom facilities on the lower level and a playful mezzanine bedroom above. Stroll to local cafés in the fashionable neighbourhood of De Pijp or take a walk into the centre of Amsterdam along the Amstel river (25 minutes).

name: Bohemian chic city oasis
description: This chic accommodation is ideal for a remote working getaway in the heart of Amsterdam. Featuring ample indoor and outdoor space, it serves as your urban oasis, conveniently located near three major parks. Start your day with a cup of coffee and enjoy the refreshing breeze by simply opening the doors of this ground floor apartment on the west end.

name: "Charming Oasis in Amsterdam!" (80m2)
description: Step into a 80m2 bright and cozy retreat right in the heart of Amsterdam. This lovely one-bedroom apartment peacefull, stylish and homelike.  After a day of exploring, treat yourself to a relaxing bath in the modern bathroom. Enjoy your own private oasis with all the luxury you have at home!

name: Charming cocoon 10 min from the city center
description:
Charming apartment in the East, 10 min by transport from the center. Line 14 brings you down to the house from Central Station.

Renowned for its cosmopolitan shops. Our neighborhood is full of bars and restaurants. Located between two parks, ideal places for a Dutch picnic.

Perched on the 3rd floor, in the spring our living room gives the impression of living in the trees. Our terraces located on each side of the apartment bring us light during the day and evening.
amenities: ['Coffee maker: espresso machine', 'Bathtub', 'Free dryer – In unit', 'Board games', 'Baking sheet']

name: @ VeroVitaal: Perfect Comfort; Perfect Location
description: "The comfort of your home, the luxury of a hotel, the charm of one of Amsterdam's most famous boutique streets." #Old City Center #Canal Ring #

name: Private modern Studio at quiet Parc
description: This new renovated studio of 45m2 is located at the rooftop. The whole area is yours. Beside acces to the lovely nature of the park, you've access to the sharing garden where you'll find the start of you're day with a good coffee and delicious organic breakfast! The studio is at the rooftop at the 3th level, please be aware there's no elevator, but the lazy stairs are very easy to go!

name: Unique stay at authentic ship
description:
Feel the swell of the water, find the tranquility of the surroundings and explore Amsterdam from this unique location.
This house boat is exactly what you are looking for while staying in our great city!

name: Beautiful room own bathroom @ housebout in centre!
description: Experience Amsterdam like a local on this typical cozy Amsterdam houseboat! Very comfortable and close to the center and popular locations like Brewery 't IJ (beer brewery+bar), Natura Artis Magistra (zoo), Café-Restaurant De Plantage. A lot of fun things within walking distance and a tram stop just around the corner. Guests will have acces to their own private bedroom and private bathroom. You will enjoy this place because of the great location, the beautiful view and the unique experience.

name: Alberdingk Thijmstraat
description:
We do not accept groups of young adults, the apartment is for couples or families.

This centrally located property is tastefully decorated. The apartment has one bedroom and a sofa bed, the sofa bed is very small 1.20 m-1.40 m so very tight for 2 adults but good for 2 children. The living room has an open kitchen. The kitchen has a dishwasher and an oven. 5 minutes from Leidseplein. Easily accessible by public transport. Parties are not allowed

name: Spacious appartment with kingsize bed in calm area
description:
Beautiful big appartment in a quiet area of Amsterdam. Just 10 min. from city centre by public transport!

Do you want to have a good night sleep without loud tourists, tram bells and other noise? Than this is the place to be!

We offer you our beautiful, renovated appartment in a quiet area, but still really close to the city centre and airport. The appartment is really spacious and light, and has all the luxury that you need, like an elevator, 200x200 bed, rain shower, and washing machine.
amenities: ['Outdoor furniture', 'Blender', 'Coffee maker: espresso machine', 'Board games', 'Baking sheet']

name: Dubbel kamer, ontbijt is inbegrepen.
description:
From this charming accommodation located in the `Rosse neighborhood' you can reach popular shops, restaurants and bars in no time. Just an 8-minute walk from Central Station. Paid parking is 10 minutes away.
We are happy to help our guests with their plans and provide them with all the information for a pleasant stay in our beautiful city.

Breakfast included.

name: Delightfull spacious room in gorgeous home
description:
Free Wi-Fi
Free Parking
Free Ferry to Amsterdam Central & back!
CLEAN, COMFORTABLE & spacious rooms!
Full Kitchen and equipement including refrigerator!

Just 15 min to Amsterdam Central very close to city center!

Lots of hip cafe's, restaurants and the best festival area!

name: Old Pijp Studio
description:
This studio is located in very hip area of Amsterdam called “De Pijp”, with all kinds of restaurants and bars and also the touristic city centre is very close.
Staying in this studio will give you a typical taste of how the Dutch people live in Amsterdam.

name: Amsterdam Grand Apartments
description: Without a doubt the most luxurious short stay apartments of Amsterdam!! These recently renovated apartments are perfectly located next the Vondelpark and within walking distance of all the musea. The apartments have wooden floors throughout, marble kitchens, electric curtains and a gas fireplace. This 180 m2 apartments is the most luxury way to stay in Amsterdam!

name: Cosy private room in Amsterdam
description: Welcome to our Amsterdam abode! Just a 10-minute away from Amsterdam Arena, Ziggo Dome, and AFAS Live. Strandvliet metro station is conveniently located just 1 minute away, providing quick access to the city center in just 10 minutes. Two train stations, Duivendrecht and Bijlmer Arena, are within walking distance. They're linked to Schiphol Airport, a mere 10-minute train ride away! .

name: Stylish Home | 15 min to City
description: Welcome to our bright and spacious home in IJburg, perfect for a comfortable stay. This modern 103 m² house features 3 stylish bedrooms, a cozy kitchen, a sunny living room with a terrace, and ample natural light. Ideally located, just 15 minutes by tram to Central Station or by bus to Amsterdam Southeast, home to the Ziggo Dome and Arena. The peaceful area offers easy access to the city via bike routes. Whether for work or leisure, this is your ideal Amsterdam base.

name: *Modern, central & clean APT @ Ams City Center!*
description:
Central, modern & clean apartment with WiFi, located in the heart of Amsterdam city center!

My apartment is located at just 5 minutes walking distance from Amsterdam Central Station and Dam Square. Main sights and facilities easily reachable by foot or bike! Ideal if you ar relocating to Amsterdam and are looking for an accommodation to set foot on the ground, or a just coming for a longer visit. My apartment is available for mid/long term stays. Any questions? Please feel free to get in touch.

name: Spacious Canal House Loft | City center
description:
This is a luxurious private canal house loft, located in the middle of Amsterdam Jordaan.

- 1 minute walking distance to the Jordaan / Amsterdam Canals
- 5 minutes walking distance to the Anne Frank house
- 10 minutes walking distance to Dam Square
- 12 minutes walking distance to the Vondelpark
- 15 minutes walking distance to Central Station
- 15 minutes walking distance to Museum District
- 15 minute walking distance to Heineken Brewery
- 15 minutes walking distance to Amsterdam de Pijp

name: Spacious ground floor apartment
description: This centrally located accommodation is tastefully decorated. The house has a spacious kitchen and is equipped with all comforts. The home has a spacious bathroom with bath and two sinks and a separate toilet.

name: Cozy apartment in BEST location
description:
Enjoy easy access to everything from this perfectly located home base. 15 minutes walk to Amsterdam centre. Located in one of the best parts of Amsterdam, Kinkerbuurt. TenKate Markt, Food hallen, trams and plenty of bars and shops super close by.

The apartment itself is cozy but bright and offers everything you need. A double bed, spacious living area and fully equipped kitchen. Everything is kept extremely clean and in good working order.

name: Cosy apartment in the heart of Amsterdam (Jordaan)
description:
This bright apartment is located in the city center (Jordaan), just 5 minutes away from the Anne Frank House, close to the "9 Straatjes" and other major sights. The Central Train Station is within walking distance as well.
You will have your own kitchen, bedroom, bathroom, living room and balcony. In the street you can find quality restaurants, cafe's, shops & markets.
There is a large HD projector that has access to all major streaming services.
