name: Zimmer in einem charmanten Grachtenhaus (22)
description:
Stay where all Amsterdam people want to live. Cheerful, bright room in a historic canal house. Close to many museums & the Rembrandsplein & yet wonderfully quiet.

Private room:1 or 2 beds, shower (ensuite), toilet in the hallway for your own use.

name: bright room + private roof terrace
description: No description

name: Private room in quiet parkside neighborhood.
description: Comfortable room with excellent connections to the old city, Anne Frank house, (25 min) and museum quarter (30 min). You will need to climb the staircase to your room with a luxury double bed 160x200 cm. There is a luxury bathroom with smart shower which you'll need to share, but I will provide you with bathrobes, slippers and shower items. Refrigerator in the hal as well as a small library with historic books about Amsterdam. The rooms are in a quiet area.I do not serve breakfast
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: 2BR City House-ground floor
description:
This unique ground floor house is modern and stylish. With open plan concept you have a fully equipped kitchen and living area. Also 2 bedrooms and 1 bathroom.

Its on walking distance to the supermarket and shops and public transport. The famous: Haarlemmerdijk street with shops/restaurants coffee place etc is within 3 min walk!

name: Rembrandt Studio Two
description:
This awesomely cosy studio is located in the heart of Amsterdam, you can walk to museums, bars, the park, canals, restaurants, etc. Situated next to Rembrandtplein makes sure that you are in the centre the minute you walk outside the door.

The studio has a comfortable two-person bed and a spacious bathroom, also there is a small lounge area with two nice chairs.
Check out the pictures and imagine yourself staying in this cozy place!

name: Charming room near Metro/train
description: Comfortable stay and relax in this calm, stylish space in Amsterdam!one single bed, table and build-in closet in a charming and private bedroom (10M2 on 2nd floor)in 3-floor house, it's bright with one big window. Bathroom/Toilet are shared. 500 meter away from metro station,15 mins walk to nearest Lelylaan train station,Schiphol airport: 15 min, City centre by tram or bike: 15-20 min. 2 supermarkets within 5 min walking, lots of restaurants (Pizzeria,  Turkey’s) and lovely park, and a lot more.

name: Stylish large studio apartment Westerpark, Jordaan
description:
The cozy, warm, quiet studio flat is light, charming and spacious, with all the comforts of home : you have everything you need to have a great stay in Amsterdam ! You have your own privacy. 
Comfortable mattress a lot of thoughtful touches such as a hairdryer, maps, guidebooks, umbrellas, etc. A fully equipped kitchen, great shower, storage space, work surface, large digital TV ; incl. international channels + Netflix, the Fast and easy to connect Wi-Fi. My flat can only accommodate 2 people.

name: Great spacious house with rooftop
description: Ideal for 2 couples or a family. It is a spacious, light 125m2 apartment with large living room, open kitchen with balcony and rooftop. On the top floor there is a spacious bedroom with en suite bathroom with stairs to the sunny roof terrace. On the middle floor we have another bedroom and bathroom and two kids rooms. We have two daughters ourselves so if you plan on travelling with a family we have two kids beds and lots of toys if requested.

name: Beach Apartment - Stunning Waterfront View
description:
Long term availability only! Monthly stays only

Welcome to our charming waterfront retreat in Amsterdam IJburg! This modern 2-bed apartment offers stunning water views, proximity to IJburg Beach, and contemporary design. Relax in the living area, enjoy the French balcony, and sleep well in the queen-size beds. The fully equipped kitchen is perfect for making simple meals. Explore the beach and vibrant city center, then return to this peaceful haven.

name: Amsterdam Central in 10 min - nearby metro
description:
Welcome to our recently renovated comfy spot in Amsterdam! We're in a safe neighborhood, just a 1-minute walk to Venserpolder metro station. You can reach the city center in 10 minutes by metro and the airport in 15 minutes by train from Duivendrecht station.

Good news – we've got free parking!

You'll find Johan Cruijff Arena, Ziggo Dome, AFAS Live, and yummy restaurants all within walking distance.

Ready for a great stay? Book with us! 🌟

name: Comfortable room in quiet parkside neighborhood
description: Comfortable room with excellent connections to the old city, Anne Frank house, (25 min) and museum quarter (30 min). You will need to climb the staircase to your room with a luxury double bed 160x200 cm. There is a luxury bathroom with smart shower which you'll need to share, but I will provide you with bathrobes, slippers and shower items. Refrigerator in the hal as well as a small library with historic books about Amsterdam. The rooms are in a quiet area.I do not serve breakfast
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Beautiful room with a graden
description: Come enjoy Amsterdam and stay at a beautiful place. Great space, beautifully decorated. Spacious room with kingsize bed with a door to the garden. Very friendly and openminded host. And located at a great area, close to everything you want and need. But also very quiet to help you sleep. LGBTQIA+ friendly. Come and experience Amsterdam this summer. Pride week is coming up!!!

name: 'Westerpark Sanctuary', Office-Apt. across W-Park.
description: Just west of the Centre, it's a most strategic, well connected place to be, right across Westerpark, in walking distance from the historic centre, in a monument (atmosphere) on a quiet interior square. The well equipped loft apt. is a castle for 2, but could easily accommodate 4 guests. We are LGBT and Child- friendly. A great Home Base for you!

name: Private Room with Smokey Area Amsterdam Central
description:
Welcome to Beautiful Dutch House, monumental house just few minute walking from central station where you can feel very homely and enjoy the Amsterdam experience.
Very typical for Amsterdam, the bedroom is tiny and the space has been very economically used. In your room, you will find a double bed, coffee/tea facilities, space to hang your clothes, a fresh bathroom with rainshower, tv with netflix access and free wifi.
Location of the apartment is perfect to reach all touristic place walking.

name: Cozy Private Apartment | Central, near city sights
description: Discover Amsterdam's charm in our cosy apartment nestled in Frederik Hendrikbuurt. Live from the comfort of a local and enjoy easy access to popular spots like Negen Straatjes, Vondel Park, Wester Park, De Hallen, Leidseplein and Anne Frank Museum. There are multiple supermarkets around the corner. Explore charming streets close by with cafes and shops. Convenient transportation with tram lines and Central Station nearby. Enjoy Amsterdam's hidden gems as a local from this lovely apartment!

name: Charming canal apartment Jordaan
description:
Charming apartment in a canal house in the Jordaan, situated on the first floor (stairs) with a beautiful view on the canal. Comfortable Swiss Sense bed, small bathroom and living with kitchenette, dinner table and couch to relax.
In a quiet area in the centre of Amsterdam, close to restaurants, shops and the Anne Frank house. 15 min from Central Station.
amenities: ['Outdoor furniture', 'Children’s books and toys', 'Pack ’n play/Travel crib', 'High chair']

name: Beautiful, stylish apartment in Amsterdam
description:
Feel welcome in this modern and well-styled apartment in 'Amsterdam Zuid'. It is located in one of the best neighborhoods in Amsterdam. The apartment is within walking distance of 'de Pijp' where many nice restaurants are located and life is bustling. The metro stop is a 5-minute walk and takes you to the city center in 10 minutes.

In short, the perfect accommodation for a couple or friends.

name: Bright cozy apartment in beautiful Amsterdam South
description: This apartment is perfect for couples, friends & business travelers. It's situated in one of the hippest neighbourhood called 'Rivierenbuurt' and is just a 10 minute walk from the Sarphatipark. This location makes it a great experience to see the city. There is a lot of public transport in this area, as well as bike rentals. The apartment offers you everything you need to have a great stay. A great couch, dining table kitchen, a nice bedroom and small bathroom including bathtub.
amenities: ['Free washer – In unit', 'Outdoor furniture', 'Free dryer – In unit']

name: Bella B&B in the heart of the Pijp, Amsterdam
description:
Bella B&B is located in the heart of the popular Amsterdam district the Pijp, with great public transport connections right in front and plenty of local eateries, (super)markets and bars right around the corner.
It's an ideal location to discover the city by having the benefits of living the local life but also having a quick and easy connection to the center and museum area.

name: Bright and modern apartment in West
description: Spacious, modern, and fully equipped 3rd floor apartment situated in the heart of Bos en Lommer, the western part of Amsterdam. Experience where the locals go for coffee, dinners and drinks, close to the Westerpark which is home to a varied mix of independent shops, old-school street markets, new restaurants and cafés, or De Hallen, a recently renovated tram-remise turned into a popular hotspot with an amazing food market. The apartment has direct access to all kinds of public transport, easy to get to the city center's canal district, and easy to reach.

name: Brightroom I -  City ParkView Rembrandtpark
description:
This comfortable but also very practical room offers space for a large bed, with a small table to work and swivel chair. A chest of drawers under the bed and an open hanging rack for clothes. Luggage can be placed under the bed. Blackout curtains for a good night's sleep. The room comes with clean towels and bed linen.
Coffee and tea are on the house!

The room is equipped with a lock. It is located a 10-minute walk from the Vondelpark and is next to the Rembrandtpark.

name: Appartement in Amsterdam
description: Nice and original apartment. Located between Erasmuspark and Westerpark. In lively Bos en Lommer.

name: Licht en fijn appartement bij Westerpark
description:
This nice one bedroom apartment is the perfect place for your stay in Amsterdam! Just get away from it all at this peaceful, centrally-located place to stay.

The apartment is located in a quiet and authentic Amsterdam residential area near the Westerpark. The famous Amsterdam canals, the Jordaan and the Anne Frankhuis are just a 20-minute walk away.

name: Spacious elegant apartment near city center!
description:
Relax in our stylish apartment where you can relax well. At the same time, the nicest neighborhoods of Amsterdam are a stone's throw away such as the Jordaan and the Westerpark. Nearby you will find good restaurants and nice bars.

The bedroom has a king size bed of 2 meters by 2.20 m.

The apartment has a balcony and roof terrace. Wonderful places to start the day with breakfast or to relax after a day exploring the city.

name: Lovely & quite room near center with green view!
description: We welcome you in our house for a stay close to the city center. From here you enjoy the quiet and green around the house and at the lake (10 min walking distance) and be close to the buzz of Amsterdam at the same time! Within 10 minutes by bike or tram you are in the center.

name: SWEETS hotel Willemsbrug
description:
A charming former bridge house from 1928 with a panoramic view, located in between Amsterdam's city centre, the Jordaan area and the culture-friendly Westerpark. Stay in your own little house in Amsterdam and feel like being a part of the city!

Bridge house Willemsbrug is located at just a stone's throw away from many of Amsterdam's must-sees. Central Station is only 9 minutes by bus and 20 minutes on foot.

name: All private, city center @ homestay Wendie
description:
★ Location - In the middle of the center!
★ Room - Private, Bathroom, Balcony, Cosy & Comfortable
★ Safe & peaceful
★ Internet connection - Fast enough for business & Amsterdam...

Be Aware:
- The 3 stairways keep you fit but are steep
- No kitchen access but coffee/tea maker in the room.
- No TV...you will not miss it ;-)

name: Charming waterfront apartment
description:
Welcome to our cozy apartment in Amsterdam!

Fully renovated early 2023. With 2 bedrooms, a fully equipped open kitchen, and a balcony, it's perfect for exploring the city.

Just 2 mins from the central station, it's easy to get anywhere. Yet the apartment is located in a quiet residential area.

The kitchen has all the appliances you need, and the balcony is perfect for relaxing.

Both bedrooms are spacious with comfortable beds and storage. Our apartment is the perfect home away.

name: Houseboat in Amsterdam: terras to swim/sup/relax
description: The apartment in the houseboat has its own toilet, shower and floating terrace with lounge sofa with beautiful views over the water. It is an oasis of peace, while within a 15-minute walk you will find the bars and restaurants of the trendy NDSM. Take the free ferry there to Amsterdam Central or the nice neighborhoods in Amsterdam West. From the terrace you can swim or SUP (free). In the communal garden is a covered outdoor kitchen, a big hammock and fire pit. Breakfast not included.

Good bed in pleasant surrounding. One bedroom (the one with the painting and not the one with the mirror), and sharing of bathroom.

the different city centres (Pijp, Jordaan, Museumquarter, Vondelpark, Eye,

or coffee.

description: It is a tastefully furnished studio ground floor suitable for 2 persons Senseo coffee machine, kettle, electric egg cooker, fridge, oven, 4-burner stove, bathroom, hair dryer, iron+shelf, sitting area, dining area and city garden with bench outside. No pets and no smoking.  Supermarkets within walking distance, including Lidl, Vomar, AH. Greek restaurant nearby. Downtown is quickly accessible by bus 21 and tram 13. Wifi, paid parking, air conditioning, TV. Breakfast can be ordered for a fee.

name: Amsterdam Farm Lodge: green area, great with kids
description:
Enjoy a very special green setting on the edges of Amsterdam. A sustainable place to stay, to play and to relax. Not too far from the city, yet tranquille and lots off space.

If you come for a drugs vacation, please find another place to stay. This place is not suited for that, we don't allow the use of marihuana at our premesis.

We are not located in the center of Amsterdam, check the location before booking.

Please read our COVID-19 measures in the description beneath.

name: Family apartment with garden, spacious and light
description:
(suitable for up to two adults + two children) Welcome to our lovely family apartment located in the Oud-West area of the city. Do you fancy a perfect city location combined with a quiet comfortable night of sleep, a bathroom with a rain shower and access to our private garden? Then this is where you should stay! Located in a quiet residential street, yet close to so many great spots.

The apartment offers a kingsize bed, a junior bed and a baby crib. Perfect for families.

The supermarket and bakery at 1 minute walk for delicious fresh bread in the morning or other groceries. The kitchen is on the ground floor and we share. WIFI in the room. Breakfast is not included. You are very welcome!

name: Middle of city center - 4 people
description: This peaceful and cozy apartment in the city center is 5 minutes walking distance from Central Station. Truly a top tier location! Close to Dam Square, the Red Light District and several great local bars, restaurants & coffeeshops. Smoking is allowed inside the apartment as well. The sofa doubles as a sofa bed that you can pull out, so the apartment is suitable for groups of maximum 4 friends, but also for singles and couples.

name: Lovely apartment in vibrant Amsterdam-West
description:
My apartment is located in Amsterdam West, the cool part of town :) There are plenty of restaurants and bars to choose from and you're right around the corner from the main canals.

For reviews please visit the listing apartment under called: "Beautiful Apartment in Vibrant Amsterdam-West". I've had to create a new profile due to a technical issue but it's the same place :)

Please keep in mind that you are staying where I normally live; it is a third floor with no lift and the stairs are steep!

name: Light and modern studio in Jordaan area
description:
Light and modern studio in Jordaan area.

Spacious, clean and bright attic studio with well equipped open-plan kitchen, living/dining area and two single beds or one double bed.
The studio has a private bathroom with shower, sink and toilet.




REG.: 036347ED8CF7AB42283B

name: comfortable apt. 10mins walking from Rai & musea
description:
This 2 room apartment (living room + 1 bedroom) and kitchen, balcony facing south with seating arrangement is perfect for a couple or people visiting for business.

Located walking distance (10 mins) from the Museum square with the key Amsterdam musea (Rijksmuseum, Van Gogh Museum, Stedelijk Museum). Equally close to conference centre the Rai.

Take the tram or metro around the corner to the city centre (10-20mins) for shopping in the Jordaan/9streets, Kalverstraat and Dam Square.

name: Stylish city apartment with roof terrace!
description:
This stylish city apartment is one of the best.

It has 2 bedrooms and a large roof terrace with a gorgeous view!
(with baby bed)

The apartment is located in de Pijp, one of the best areas in Amsterdam.

Within walking distance you find cafes, restaurants, coffee places, supermarkets.
Museum square is 7 min away on foot; you'll find several museums there (Van Gogh, Rijksmuseum, Stedelijk), as well as the concert hall (Concertgebouw) and green area that often hosts events in the summer.

name: Luxury Waterfront Studio
description: Welcome to Amsterdam! Our comfortable, light and peaceful Waterfront Studio in IJburg makes you feel at home. IJburg is the modern island district of Amsterdam. Do you love architecture, wind and water, sports and nature? This is your place! The studio is located on the ground floor in our recently built house. The view over the water and the sunsets are amazing! You can even swim, or sup in front of the house! Tram 26 takes you in 20 minutes to the pulsating heart of the city (30 min. by bike).
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Luxury Hôtel room in Amsterdam!
description:
Relax in this unique and quiet accommodation. 25 minutes from the city center accessible by metro or bus or by bike.
2 minutes walk from the beaches to relax after a long day in the city. You are on the ideal address for your dream vacation in Amsterdam.

name: Citiez Hotel Amsterdam: Small Double Room
description: Our stylish hotel offers rooms that each represent a different international city; sleep in Paris, Montreal or Lucerne! Centrally located in a shopping centre (TKMaxx, ICIParis, H&M, McDonald's, 4 supermarkets), FoodMarket (international) and congress centre De Meervaart within walking distance, parking garage (FREE!), direct tram to the centre (15 minutes), direct express bus to Schiphol (15 minutes). Our allDayCafé is open 24/7 for coffees from our baristas and lots of fun!

name: Cozy, big and bright appartment
description:
This is a very spacious apartment with funky corners and lot of windows and light. Bathroom and toilet are modern and big. Kitchen is fully equipped and you can use anything you need.
About me: I live here myself as well, and I like hosting people for temporary stays. I work as a doctor, I love doing yoga and roadcycling. During the weekend I have my supercute dog named Pasha, I hope you don’t mind.
Don’t hesitate to send me a message if you have any questions.

name: Beautiful luxury Casa Delea Olive in De Pijp

name: Luxurious Suite with Canal View in Heart of City
description:
Perfectly located along the UNESCO World Heritage Herengracht canal in Amsterdam’s City Center. The Historic Canal Suites will have you surrounded by the most iconic Amsterdam sights when you’re out and about in the neighborhood, and steeped in rich Dutch culture when you’re relaxing in your suite built for luxury.

The building housing the suites is an authentic piece of Dutch history, built in 1637. Each suite is inspired by one of the great Dutch masters of the 17th century.

name: Apartment with rooftop terrace
description: The apartment is located in the popular Weesperzijdebuurt, between the Amstel and the Wibautstraat and with “De Pijp” within walking distance, in a beautiful quiet street. With countless trendy places to eat and drink such as Rijssel, café Hesp, Villa Ruysch, Volkshotel, Baut and Dauphine around the corner. Royal Theater Carré and the Amstel Hotel are nearby as well. Exit roads such as A2, A1 and A10 are easily accessible. The metro is at 1 min walking distance and the Amstel station is just around the corner.

name: FireJuice B&B Shroom Room
description: Welcome to Sonia & Ben’s lovely and unique house in Amsterdam North, in a green and tranquil neighborhood. 30 min from the center, 10 min from a huge park with beaches and km of walking trails!  We offer a FANTASTIC double room with immersive psychedelic artwork, and access to our garden and fully equipped kitchen. The FireJuice is a registered B&B but we don't offer breakfast on airbnb. It is accessible through our own website. Vegans, weirdoes, queers, poly, neurospicy people welcome :)

Just a five-minute walk from Amsterdam Central Station, you'll have effortless access to all of Amsterdam and the surrounding area.

description: Situated on one of the most beautiful canals of the canal belt in the historic centre of Amsterdam you will find this lovely houseboat. The houseboat studio is very nice and the location is super. It is the ultimate way to enjoy the best of Amsterdam on the water.

The bedroom has a large, comfortable bed (180x200cm) and the bathroom, like the rest of the house, has recently been renovated.

The neighborhood is quiet, but close to the lively Jordaan and all kinds of bars and cultural attractions. The beach is also a 30-minute drive away.

The apartment has a great atmosphere with lots of day light. It features a comfortable bedroom, a separate toilet and shower, a kitchen with a Nespresso coffee maker and milk frother.

Central station, Dam Square and the Canals are all within crawling distance. The Red Light District is a bit further away, about 10 minutes walking.

This 17th century monument is perfect if you prefer not to travel long distances. Fun fact: it leans slightly to the front like all our old houses, but inside you won't notice;)

Enjoy the inviting living space, fully equipped kitchen, cozy balcony, and dedicated workspace with high-speed Wi-Fi.

Public transportation to the city center is just a short walk away, making it easy to explore all that Amsterdam has to offer.

You have two large balconies: one with views over the city, the other with a view of the Sloterplas, surrounded by greenery and with a glimpse of the dunes in the distance. On the balcony with a lounge set and dining table you can relax and enjoy a sunset dinner. You can be in the center within 15 minutes, but still have the feeling of a "home away from home" here.

For people who are looking for a nice working environment, we offer the perfect workspace with a view of the garden including Wi-Fi.

Located near Amsterdam Schiphol Airport, Amsterdam city center, Haarlem, Zandvoort Beach.

Newly renovated gem steps from beloved neighbourhood 'de Jordaan', right next to Westerpark and directly at the canals with a luxury kitchen and bathroom, large balcony with a lounge and bistro seating.

Immerse yourself in all Amsterdam offers with a stroll to the Anne Frank House, mere minutes away. Explore the paths of Vondelpark and experience the heart of the city with a 15-minute jaunt to Dam Square. Central Station is within easy reach, connecting you to the Netherlands treasures.

The apartment consists of a master bed room and a bedroom in the garden house with a 160meter wide pull out coach and own bathroom.

name: Stylish city apartment in central Amsterdam
description:
EN: This stylish and fully equipped accommodation is centrally located, just outside of the busy city centre. Enjoy the characteristic elements such as stained-glass windows, combined with modern facilities.

Within 15 minutes you can be in Amsterdam's city centre and both buses and trams are just around the corner.

Have fun!

name: B&B Amsterdam West
description:
Welcome to our completely new and renovated apartment, located just outside the city center, with free parking for two cars on the premises!

This charming B&B offers two beautiful, high-quality bedrooms, each equipped with a comfortable double sofa bed with high quality natural linnen pillow cases and duvet covers for a restful night's sleep.

name: Luxury and spacious apartment
description:
Luxury and spacious apartment in the heart of Amsterdam. The apartment is situated in Oud West bordering the old town area of the Jordaan and the 9 Straatjes (famous shopping area in Amsterdam), all in walking distance! Central station is 10 minutes by bus (line 18) or tram.

Equipped with all comfortabilities and amenities and stylish decorated. Perfect for a couple who want to spend a great time in Amsterdam!

name: Apartment in Amsterdam
description:
Location
This apartment is on the nassau canal and across one of the loveliest neighbourhoods - Jordaan.
Just 15 minutes walking distance from Anne Frank House, 10 minutes from Westerpark as well as surrounded by great restaurants, bars and supermarkets you will access everything you need easily.

Space
It is fully equipped, ideal for 1 or 2 people. There is an inbuilt closet in the bedroom, cosy balcony with a papasan chair to relax, and both a shower and a bathtub with a jacuzzi option.

name: Amazing studio with city views!
description: Gorgeous studio apartment boasting a breathtaking view. Situated in a wonderful neighborhood with excellent access to public transportation. Equipped with all amenities for a delightful city getaway. Prepare to be mesmerized by the captivating panoramic view.

name: Beautiful new apartment close to the Jordaan
description: This recently renovated apartment (January 2021) against the Westerpark and within walking distance of the Jordaan is perfect for a couple or two friends. The apartment has a balcony, large spacious bedroom, a separate toilet and spacious bathroom. The living room is cozy and here you will find the kitchen with bar with stools. In the living room is a small French balcony that can be opened completely.

name: Lovely apartment in Amsterdam
description:
You will feel at home in this sunny apartment.

Close to public transport (tram, train and bus). Within 30 minutes, you will be at the main tourist attractions or the airport. By bike, the Dutch way, you will be within 15 minutes at damsquare.

The house is situated in Amsterdam East, a local neighbourhood.

With very comfortable beds, you will sleep like a rose after a busy day in vibie Amsterdam. There is a nice terrace to have breakfast in the sun.

name: Cosy houseboats WIEL city center
description: Have you ever wanted to stay on a cosy Dutch boat right near the canals of Amsterdam? This is your perfect chance to experience Amsterdam on the water. Enjoy the small yet comfortable pleasure boat in this picturesque and quiet location in the middle of the famous Jordaan district. An amazing glamping experience on the water!

name: Idyllic apartment in Amsterdam, view on the water
description: You can do all kinds of activities from this ideally located accommodation. The Vondelpark is a 5-minute walk away, the supermarket is a 2-minute walk away, and there are many nice cafes and restaurant nearby !

name: Cozy Longstay Apt. with Terrace - 10 Min. to City
description: This apartment is located in the cozy Amsterdam North. It is surrounded with many nice restaurants and bars. It is just a 15 minute walk to the ferry that brings you to the center of Amsterdam. The apartment itself is beautiful and has a shared roof terrace. The perfect stay for people who would like to discover the beauty of Amsterdam. The apt. has air conditioning allowing you to stay cool in the city.

name: Nice appartment in Amsterdam
description: My nice f situated in a nice neighbourhood next to the metro/tram/trainstation, at 10 minutes from Schiphol.

name: 50m2 apartment in the Pijp | Airco & Balcony
description:
My girlfriend and I recently bought this apartment, so this will be the 1st time to rent out!

Our top floor 50m2 apartment in the famous Pijp area. The neighborhood is really cozy and quiet.

There is a modern kitchen with a bar table for 4p. Living room has a large flatscreen and diner table for 6. Bedroom has a new and comfy kingsize bed + AC and TV.

Public transport, supermarkets, restaurants and bars all located within 3 minutes of walking distance.

Hope you love it as much as we do!

name: Sweet little house in Amsterdam
description: Our sweet little house is in the green and quiet area of North Amsterdam. It has a small front and back garden, and two floors of 70 m2 together. There is a two-person bedroom and a baby room. You can also use our garden office, everything with wifi. From the house you can make beautiful walks and cycling tours. The house is nearby cultural hub NDSM terrain, from where the free ferry to Central Station in ten minutes. You will be staying here with our cat Kirí.

The apartment has a double bed room, one bathroom with a rain shower and a living / dining room with an open kitchen and bar. The kitchen and bathroom are fully equipped. There is also a washing machine available. The apartment is located in the Baarsjes at a very central location, near the Jordaan (5min) and city centre (10min). Bed linen and towels are included.

description: This luxurious villa offers everything: Nature, relaxation (suana), luxury, space and also perfect for a familiy with children. The villa is situated next to the last protected bird breeding spot in Amsterdam but only 20 min from the city center! We have room for a couple or a family with a maximum of 2 childs. one baby band qnd one single child bed. We also have a cat you need to take care of.

To ultimate relaxation in a city where there is always something to do?
In Amsterdam North, in the circular district of Buiksloterham, the new “place to be” of Amsterdam, you will find the studio, an oasis of peace for the visitors of bustling Amsterdam.
The bright studio has a private entrance and is located on a small “Japanese” courtyard garden. When you open the sliding door, you are in the garden.
In the cozy quiet room there is a queen-sized bed. The bathroom en suite is also located in the courtyard garden.

description:
A modern, yet cozy apartment on the top floor in an up and coming Amsterdam Noord neighbourhood. The bus stop is 2 min walking distance on the corner of the house. City centre can be reached within about 15 minutes by public transport.

This is a SMART home with Voice Assistant, remote controlled lights, and wireless connected speakers.

You are welcome to use the massive 65" OLED TV, BOSE Chromecast sound system (speakers in every room), Turntable, and PS4 with many different games

The full spacious apartment (149 m2) is shared with us. You have your own bedroom including a private bathroom. We share an open kitchen/living room. There is a big and sunny balcony on the south west side.

name: Privat  apartment / Canal House Western Church
description:
Spacious private appartment on the 1st floor of a canal house in the city centre.
Amsterdam is a great and lively city and when staying in this apartment you will enjoy your Amsterdam experience as a local!

description:
My place is bright and clean. Easy access from airport and public transport. Loads of restaurants, bars, park and shops just a few steps away.

This home is a great place because of the coziness, light and chillnes of the house and location. Central but also good to recharge after a day exploring. Experience Amsterdam as a local.

Just renewed all and I like that to share with people who can enjoy/respect that.

Due to energy prices there is a very reasonable limit applicable. Ask by booking.

The best bakeries, cheese shops and restaurants are just around the corner.

description: Welcome to our charming Bed & Breakfast, located a 15 to 20 minute bike ride from the historic center of Amsterdam. This lively district is known for its artistic flair and vibrant cultural scene. Our B&B is easily accessible by public transport and bike. We also provide the possibility of bike rental.

name: Sunny apartment with dedicated workspace
description: Welcome to our sunny and bright 2 bedroom apartment, where comfort meets productivity! This stylish space is designed for both relaxation and focused work, featuring a private workstation for your convenience.

description: A spacious ground floor studio. On Prinsengracht in the heart of the city, Museumdistrict and city centre with its numerous shops and restaurants. The house is a national monument, built in 1655. It's character is carefully maintained through out the years with all modern necessities melted into the original framework. Our family is really attached to the house on the canal. We hope you will enjoy it just as much. The studio is suited for 2 friends or a couple.

name: Comfortable bedroom in 9 streets
description: I am Eduard, a Dutch local. I am offering a comfortable bedroom within the apartment, where I live, in the heart of the Amsterdam canal district and trendy “9 Streets” area.

name: Eco-friendly Double Room
description: No description

Both bedrooms have queen size beds and electronic roof lights. One of the beds is a "wall bed" so that the room can conveniently be transformed into home office or kids/baby room. The apartment is very light with a direct view onto the canal.

Enjoy!

name: Lovely apartment in a quiet street in the center
description:
My place is close to Nieuwmarkt - Central Station - Fleamarket - Rembrandt house - Scheepvaartmuseum - Nemo.
You are in the middle of the 17th age center of Amsterdam.

name: Modern, sunny apartment in popular area the Pijp
description:
Discover our large home in the heart of the well-known area "The Pijp" neighborhood, popular among locals. City center is either a 15min walk or 5min walk to the main metro line, which takes you to the city center in just 5 minutes and Schiphol Airport in 15 minutes. The RAI conference center is also just 5 minutes away.

Our tasteful apartment of 90m2 has its own entrance on the 2nd floor, featuring a spacious living room with an open kitchen, a workspace, and a balcony.

name: Amazing new loft, very central
description:
You'll have a great time at this comfortable place to stay.
Apartment with completely private access, no shared spaces, entrance from the streets
Apartment fully furnished and equipped: it has hi-tech kitchen, dishes, bed linen and towels, hot water, heating, wifi - all included in the price.
Longterm avaialble, please ask me about the discounts.

name: Full Apartment in the Jordaan
description: The apartment lies in the heart of Amsterdam in the lovely lively neighborhood Jordaan. It is a cozy 1 bedroom with a big livingroom and full kitchen area. You will have the whole space to yourselves and as I live here myself you will have all amenities that you might require.

name: Appartement met balkon.
description:
I welcome you as a guest in my family house/building, it's a non-smoking apartment.

You will love my place because of the high ceilings, the coziness, the location, the view and the kitchenette. My space is suitable for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, families (with children) and groups up to 4 people.

name: Kleurrijke woning Rivierenbuurt
description:
Our colorful and sunny two-bedroom apartment with two balconies in Amsterdam-Zuid is a lovely base. Here you have the best of both worlds.

On one side you stay in a quiet neighborhood with four parks and the beautiful Amstel river within walking distance. On the other hand, you will stay a stone's throw from Rai, where you can get to the city center within 8 minutes by metro. A little further begins the bustling Rivierenbuurt, where you can enjoy nice restaurants and shops.

name: Apartment canal front with rooftop
description: Last floor apartment with 2 bedrooms, roof-terrace, incredibly bright in front of a canal
amenities: ['Canal view', 'Bathtub', 'Free dryer – In unit', 'Outdoor dining area']

name: Great appartement - free parking
description:
This great place to stay guarantees fun for the family. The living room is a nice spacious place with an open kitchen. You can cook, eat and have a drink together. There is one bedroom with a double bed. The other bedroom is divided in two: one double bed and one adjoining baby room.
Nearby are nice pubs, good restaurants and the Vondelpark (1 km).
- Private parking space under the house
- Metro 150 m, tram 200 m, train 850 m
- 10 min cycling to the canals

name: Charming house close to the RAI station
description:
Spacious apartment in a peaceful, child-friendly neighborhood, located within walking distance of the hustle and bustle of the city and just a short walk from the RAI Convention Centre, multiple parks, cafe's and restaurants and various modes of public transportation.

Open to extended stays, please contact for more information.

name: Apartment +beautiful roofterrace
description:
The apartment is very well located, 5 min drive from central station. The big roofterrace with several lounge spots, BBQ and sun all day is very unique in Amsterdam.
The street contains several nice cafes and restaurants. The bedroom is at the backside of the house and therefore you won’t hear any noise. Although people have slept with 3 in the kingsize bed, it’s also possible to sleep at the (regular) couch.
The beautiful Westerpark is just a 2 min walk from the house.
Energy label: C

name: Heerlijke eengezinswoning in Amsterdam!
description:
This bright, spacious house is located in a green area in Amsterdam. It is the ideal place to stay with the family and discover the city and the beautiful surroundings!
It is a wonderful family home with a spacious southwest garden. One stone's throw away is the Sloterplas where it is great to spend time. You'll be in the center of Amsterdam in 20 minutes!

name: Amsterdam Central Apartment with balcony
description:
This two bedroom apartment with private balcony, air coinditioning and fully furnished kitchen can sleep 6 guests and is located 5 minutes walk from Central Station and Dam Square.

We provide Luggage Luggage Storage facility.

name: Spacious & Comfy flat with Sunny Rooftop
description:
The apartment is ideal for those who want to have an authentic experience of Amsterdam.
You will feel at home from the moment you will enter in the flat, which has everything you need. We are sure that you will also enjoy our amazing rooftop where you can enjoy food/drinks & beautiful sunsets.
It's also perfect to enjoy the city as you are at walking distance from the some of nicest restaurants, bars, parks, museums, ect...
We are also super happy to share our recommendations upon request :)

name: Volharding Amsterdam
description:
Lovely houseboat in the centre of Amsterdam, close to the famous Jordaan and nearby the central station. Perfect for couples. The boat has a separate entrance for the guests. Inside you find a nice double bed with view on the canal. A great place to relax after a day in town. Both inside and outside. You can even consider a swim!

Listing not appropriate for babies and children under 12.

name: Cozy-arty apartment with king size bedroom+office
description:
Arty and very cozy apartment, with lots of daylight, on a quite street of Amsterdam's hip West.

Extra office room with standing desk for comfort of working professionals.

Ideal space for couples.

Within walking distance from Westerpark. 10-12 mins biking from Jordaan (the historic center with beautiful canals).

name: Cozy room Amsterdam, Ensuitebathroom/Netflix/Bikes
description:
Welcome to our small room! The Cozy Room offers a 1.40 x 2.00 bed and a tiny private bathroom (toilet, shower, sink).

There is a small fridge, toaster, Dolce gusto coffeemachine, cooker & a hairdryer.

Coffee & tea are in the room, as the ingredients for a basic do it yourself breakfast.. So everything you need for a short stay in Amsterdam!

TV with Netflix & free WIFI.

Only 20 minutes to citycentre by public transport.

Bikes for rent with us.
Babies, Dogs & cats are ok just let me know!

name: The Room Downstairs - Free parking
description: This is certainly a great place to stay when you visit our lovely city. This cozy room on the first floor of a family house has everything you need it’s the perfect place to stay during your visit to Amsterdam.

name: Lovely apartment with rooftop near Vondelpark
description:
Welcome to a modern two-bedroom apartment near Vondelpark. The open living and dining area is bright with natural light. The fully equipped kitchen is practical for your cooking needs. The master bedroom has a comfy queen-size bed, and the second bedroom features a sofa bed and a fully equipped desktop. This second bedroom would fit perfectly two children or one adult.

The standout feature is the fantastic rooftop terrace, providing panoramic views of Amsterdam.

name: Big room in renovated apartment
description: You will find the spacious room in my newly renovated apartment in one of the most upcoming neighbourhoods in Amsterdam. The street where the apartment is situated is quiet but very beautiful and at the end you will find the Erasmus park. Around the corner you will find a bus and tram stop and all the stores and bars necessary. It's a shared apartment with a private room just for you! Note that If you are not easy going and expect an hotel with room service then please don't book my place!

name: house with garden, 10 min from centre
description: My relatively large house (65m2) with a private garden is situated at 10 minutes from the centre, next to a beautiful park (Rembrandtpark) and next to a lovely square with lots of places to eat and drink. It is very well reachable by public transport and a perfect place to explore Amsterdam!

name: Cozy East-Amsterdam apartment!
description:
Vibrant ground floor appartment in the "Indische Buurt" close to all amenities, within 200m several bars & restaurants with a variaty of eating options that East has to offer, but at the same time not a lot of traffic or noise.

A 20 minute bike or tram ride to the centre of Amsterdam (tram stop is 1m walk away).
2 toilets, 1 bathroom with walk-in shower, washer/dryer combination available for use and a nice garden to sit in.

Renting my apartment while im out on holiday!

name: The City Center Treehouse
description:
Located in the heart of the city, with direct access to public transport, the Anne Frank house, supermarkets, the lovely Amsterdam canal belt with all its cute bars, restaurants, & lots more.

Apartment is on the top floor with its own private roof terrace, getting sun from 12pm to 9pm. Comes with a Japanese toilet, workspace & full HD TV with all your favourite channels.

Only two tram stops away from Central Station.

Quiet & in the middle of the city, doesn't get any better than that! :-)

name: Amsterdam Haven: Trendy Nieuw Sloten Apartment
description: Welcome to your ideal Amsterdam getaway! This immaculate and newly renovated apartment offers everything you need for a memorable stay in this vibrant city. With a convenient location, modern amenities, and a welcoming atmosphere, your Amsterdam adventure starts here.

name: Luxury water-side flat in the Canal District
description:
Luxurious, fully equipped, 106m2 1st - floor apartment located in the Canal District and pinned to the famous 9 Streets.
Stunning views onto the best canal in Amsterdam. You have access to all the central and Jordaan shops & restaurants as well walking distance to the Anne Frank House.
Separate bedroom and bathroom with access to canal views by being very Dutch and sitting in the windows to enjoy the world pass by. Enjoy this sort-after famous interior-styled property.

name: Comfortabel appartement met heerlijk bed.
description:
Spacious and fully equipped apartment just 10 minutes from city center and RAI. Bedroom with balcony, bathroom with shower and bath, free wifi. Close to the ADE dance locations.

If you book during ADE (between 19-23 October) a late check out (18:00) is included.

Supermarket 0,1km. ATM 0,1km. Bus and tram 0,1km. Train station 0,8km. Vondelpark 1,2km. Museumplein 2,0km. Perfect location for both city trips as your business trip.

name: De Rivierenbuurt ruimte
description: Welcome to this beautiful apartment in the quiet and charming streets of the Rivierenbuurt, one of the most popular neighborhoods in Amsterdam. One of the great advantages of this location is the proximity to the RAI (Amsterdam Rai Exhibition and Convention Centre) and the metro station. You are literally in the lively center of Amsterdam in just 5 minutes. The apartment itself is tastefully decorated and offers all the amenities you need for a comfortable stay.

name: Charming Apartment for 3P @ Amsterdam City Center
description: You’re staying in the heart of beautiful Amsterdam! With its charming old-world character, high ceilings, large windows, and unbeatable location, this apartment is the perfect choice for an unforgettable city stay. Less than 10 minutes from Central Station, the apartment places you just a short stroll from Amsterdam’s most iconic landmarks, trendy cafes, and picturesque canals. The enchanting atmosphere of the city is right at your doorstep.

name: Lovely small appartement ‘Pijp’
description: Welcome to our cozy apartment in 'De Pijp', Amsterdam! Walking distance to Carré and Artis Zoo. Free WiFi, comfortable rooms with a private bath. Non-smoking. Explore the lively neighborhood and enjoy your stay in Amsterdam!

name: Spacious Apartment at good spot
description:
Bright, spacious apartment in Rivierenbuurt, Amsterdam, ideal for couples exploring the city.

Located on Amstelkade at the canal. It has a spacious bedroom, open kitchen, large open dining/living area, workspace, and bathroom with all necessities.

Near public transport, bike rentals, and centrally located: 20-25 mins from Schiphol, 5-10 mins to city center. Enjoy the restaurants, pubs, and cafes in the fun neighborhood.

Including fast wifi, netflix, washing machine and plenty of boardgames

name: Sunny Apartment with private garden
description:
A beautiful ground floor apartment with lots of natural light located in Amsterdam west.

The cozy and bright space is right next to the Jordaan and within walking distance of the Bilderdijkstraat, Erasmuspark and Westerpark.

It is in a quiet neighbourhood with lots of cafes, restaurants and bars.

Easy access to public transportation. Bus 80 & 18 Tram 3 & 5

name: Artistic loft in green oasis with view on windmill
description:
Modern and light apartment in green oasis with garden and view on the old windmill.

It has a spacious living room, a sleeping room with a big comfortable bed, a fully equipped kitchen and a bathroom with shower. There is also a private garden.

The place is located in a quiet street (no traffic) in the centre/east side of the city. Only 10 minutes away from Central Station by bike/public transport. Walking distance to Artis (the zoo) and other highlights.

name: Cozy home in a historic Amsterdam building
description: We are renting out our own home while we are traveling. We will accept only the guests who need a temporary stay for several days or weeks in Amsterdam and would take care of our space as their own home. It is perfect as home office. Not suitable for large group (more than 2 guests) of individuals sharing. Parties are strickly restricted. Our co-host will be available next building for check-in and any in person support.

name: Cozy, sun filled appartement
description: Welcome to our sun-filled Amsterdam Oost apartment, thoughtfully designed for a comfortable stay for two. Begin your mornings by enjoying breakfast on the sunny balcony, basking in the warmth and tranquility. The cozy living room offers a perfect retreat after a day of exploration. The fully equipped kitchen is at your disposal. Nearby metro access ensures convenient exploration of the city. Your comfort is our utmost priority, and we're here to assist you for a memorable stay.

name: Heerlijke woning in de bruisende Pijp met tuin!
description:
This centrally located property right in the middle of “ de Pijp” is tastefully decorated. It is possible to lock the living room in the middle of a sliding door. It is also possible to open the doors to the garden through the bedroom and master bed room.

Located in the cosiest neighborhood of Amsterdam '' de Pfep'', this lovely ground floor home with a sunny garden is located. With French doors from the kitchen and from the master bed room, the garden can be reached.

Short stay!

This nice decorated Houseboat is located at one of the most desired locations in this part of Amsterdam and a few minutes’ walking distance from the city centre near the famous area "The Jordaan” district, Saturday "Noordermarkt" and many more attractions.

This large nicely decorated houseboat features 2 bedrooms and a living room including a sofa bed and a flat-screen TV with cable channels. Free Wi-Fi access is available. The bathroom is fitted with a bath tub/shower and a separa

name: Triple room in the lively de Pijp neighbourhood
description:
This bright and spacious accessible triple room comes with one double and one single bed, air-conditioning, 32" TV and free Wi-Fi. All rooms in the Amsterdam City Centre hotel offer comfort and cleanliness at a budget price to allow you to spend time exploring this great city outside of your hotel room.
Please note that 12.5% Amsterdam city tourist tax is not included in the Airbnb price and must be paid directly to the hotel.

name: Houseboat “De Zachte Piraat”
description: Houseboat The Gentle Pirate

name: AMAZING PRIVATE LUXURY BOAT ACCOMMODATION!
description:
"Sailing barge Egberdina" is over a century old. During her long life she has explored the Dutch waters carrying cargo and goods from one place to the next.

Nowadays she has been refitted to accommodate groups of passengers. With a luxury design that is reminiscent of the early 1900's, she provides a place to stay, unwind and relax.

The atmosphere makes you wonder about the adventures of earlier days, the life people must have lived and all the unknown shores this ship must have visited..

name: Family apartment Amsterdam
description:
Our beautiful apartment was fully renovated in 2019.
Our neighborhood of Stadionbuurt is one of the well developed areas of the city with lots of restaurants, bars, cafes and other activities. Supermarket is across the street and all sorts of public transport including metro and Amsterdam Zuid train station are within walking distance.

name: Great modern apartment near Amsterdam center.
description:
Lovely apartment at a great location. It’s situated between the city center (10 min walk) and Artis Zoo (10 min walk). Within 5 minutes you can visit the Oosterpark.

The apartment is a two level maisonnette on the 3rd floor of the building (no elevator).

There is a kingsize bed and the possibility to add another one or two person bed. Also suitable for families with babies as all facilities are available.

Easy access by public transportation as the metro/tram station are near.

name: Cozy modern appartment with garden
description: Our place is in the renewed area of the historical Olympic Stadium, with a big variety of cafés, bars and restaurants and a farmer's market on Saturday. Ideal for couples who want a cozy environment without the noise of the more touristic neighbourhoods.

name: House with garden Amsterdam west
description: Everything for the whole group is at your fingertips from this centrally located space. The tram and bus stop are a 3-minute walk away. The Erasmus park and Rembrandt park are within 5-10 min walk. The ideal base with garden for a trip in Amsterdam.

name: Big central Jordaan apt + rooftop!
description: This bright apartement is a stylish starting point for the best of the Jordaan. 4 guests can easily enjoy the spacious interior in a comfy and original style while discovering wonderful Amsterdam: by bike, on foot or simply from the great rooftop.

name: Amstelrivier appartement
description: This lovely new apartment is located on the Wibautpark and 100 meters from the Amstel River. The location is unique, close to the city center, metro stop Wibautatraat, over the bridge you are in “De Pijp” and close to the Oosterpark. Sun facing east, lovely with a coffee in the morning and afternoon sun on the balcony. Everything is new and well insulated. The apartment is small but has everything in it for a romantic weekend away. Bicycles can be rented per day.

name: Elegant & Stylish apartment centre of Amsterdam
description:
Elegant, stylish, non-smoking, apartment in a calm spot in the centre of Amsterdam.
Perfectly located for culture & shopping.

The apartment has been fully renovated in 2017 & decorated with fine art and design. Has 2 bedrooms, double beds, so place for 4.

A living with fire place. A fully equipped, modern open kitchen.
Bathroom with 2 showers & wc.
Two bedrooms, double beds.

The apartment is great and very easy to arrive at. Under two minutes from central station and 25 from the airport.

name: Great location modern apartment
description:
Welcome to my house and say hi to Suus the black cat!

Perfect location, spacious and light 1 Bedroom Apartment in the area Jordaan. Canal view over Brouwersgracht.

Expect to experience the local Amsterdam feeling,having a base to relax and feel home.

The area is famous for its bars, cafe's and restaurants.

High speed wifi, Kitchen with dishwasher, oven microwave plus a 75"plasma TV with great blue tooth speakers for when it rains.

It's my cat so please make your introduction good!

name: NEW! Grand Casa Bilyve, 15 min to Central Station
description: Enjoy our house in a quiet neighborhood of Amsterdam, 15 min from city center. The ground floor has a large office and garden. The 1st floor offers a spacious living room with open kitchen and access to a terrace. There are 2 jungle-themed children's rooms with luxury bathroom on the 2nd floor. The penthouse floor has a 2nd luxury bathroom and gym. Only for cat lovers: You will be sharing it with our Blue Russian cats, Kendi and Bowie, who are independent but like to get a hug and food.

name: Houseboat Apartment  Amsterdam Center
description: This nice houseboat apartment is located in a cargo boat from 1907 in the old Amsterdam harbor of the 16th century. The boat is moored in between the oldest part of the historic city centre and the modern architecture of the Oosterdok Island, between Central Station and the Technology Museum. The boat and the surrounding boats form a quite little  village right in the center of town. Central heating makes the apartment nice and warm in the winter.

name: Family friendly apartment in nice & green area
description:
Only suitable for a couple or a family!

Beautiful modern comfortable family apartment with garden in Watergraafsmeer/ East Amsterdam; a very nice residential neighborhood. The house is light, 80m2, modern design (fully refurbished in 2019) and is fully equipped for a familiy with 2/3 children or a couple.

We love to live in this (green) and quite part of Amsterdam; you'll find restaurants, bakeries, a supermarket, flower stall etc. around the corner.

Free and fast Wifi

name: Spacious and Bright Apartment in Center-East
description: Perfect for a family to enjoy an Amsterdam getaway, the apartment is ideally located on a quiet street close to a beautiful park, the city center and the Amstel river. It is fully renovated, featuring a sleek design, high ceilings, a sunny French balcony, a large balcony on the backside, and warm lighting for cozy evenings. name: Cosy studio on HOUSEBOAT with large roof terrace!
description:
Welcome aboard the Amsterdam Houseboat Family!

Part of the Amsterdam Houseboat Family, Michele has two delightful compact modern studios situated on her boat in ‘de Pijp’. Each private studio comes with all the necessary amenities needed for a comfortable stay in Amsterdam plus access to a large roof terrace for your summer bbq or swim. It is ideally situated for easy access to every part of the city and is located on an extremely charming and peaceful canal in ‘de Pijp’.

name: Prachtige gezinswoning in Amsterdam
description:
Our beautiful family home is available for you (and your family). The house has a master bedroom, a guest bedroom, baby bedroom, 2 bathrooms, large living area, and a kitchen with everything you need. There are 2 terraces, a smaller one on the lower level and a large sunny one on the upper level.

The house is located near the "Amsterdamse bos", a really nice park to go for a run or just a walk. There are plenty of restaurants/cafes in the area and the Amsterdam city center is about 20m away.

name: Top Location -beautifull apartment
description:
Our 2 floor house is located in one of the most beautiful streets in the heart of high-end neighbourhood OUD-ZUID - Museumquarter, everything is in walking distance. 4 bedrooms, perfect for family or friends travelling together.
You will enjoy it!

name: Fantastic modern & luxurious!

A beautiful modern and luxurious apartment located in the most beautiful place in Amsterdam. A very quiet place, right in the heart of Amsterdam.

The apartment is equipped with all amenities, completely new and stylishly furnished, where you can relax, but also enjoy the lovely city.
Everything is available in the house, a luxurious kitchen, a wonderful bathroom including a bath, a living area where you can relax and start the day with a cup of coffee in the window overlooking the canal.

name: Family home with garden and private parking

Welcome to my lovely apartment in popular "The Baarsjes". It's a domain of peace & quiet - in the middle of a thriving neighborhood that offers lots of great restaurants & bars. The apartment is perfect for a couple or expat that loves the thrill of the city, but is also looking for a place to feel completely at home.

name: Garden View Apartement | Amsterdam Canal Suites
description:
Enjoy your stay like a real local in one of our garden view apartments!
Your fully serviced apartment located in a 17th century canal house, is one of our 7 luxurious boutique apartments from Amsterdam Canal Suites. The duplex garden apartments have a lounge, bathroom, 2 bedrooms, a fully equipped kitchen and laundry facilities. You will have a quiet and peaceful view over the courtyard. The minimum stay is 7 days.

name: NEW | Luxury apartment Amsterdam centre| waterview
description:
NEW ON AIRBNB - Be one of our first guests :)

Fully renovated and clean 2-room apartment with a spacious layout and view over the water. The apartment is located on the nicest part of the Nassaukade; surrounded by a park and a 2-minute walk from the Jordaan.
Various shops and great restaurants are nearby.

name: Family house in A'dam city-centre (by the water)
description: Stylish and modern (eco) family house (180 m2's) in the centre of Amsterdam, includes a parking.  An ideal home for families who would like to enjoy the water or explore the old city centre. Our beautiful home (Water House) lies on a child friendly island (no cars), next to the river 'Het IJ' and is a ten minute walk away from A'dam centre (canals, Jordaan). There are 3 bedrooms (on request a 4th), 2 bathrooms, 2 terraces and a movie room with 75" film screen and PlayStation 5.

name: Spacious & modern family house in Amsterdam
description:
Our three-floor home is located in vibrant Amsterdam West. Next to the Sloterplas and within 10 minutes by bike or tram to Leidse Plein, the canals and the attractions at Museum Plein.

Have the best of both worlds with the bustling city center around the corner while you can enjoy the green surroundings, light and space of our family house. It's perfect for couples and families. It has a spacious living, five bedrooms, two bathrooms and a private garden.

name: Prachtig appartement nabij Centrum
description: Beautifully quiet apartment in the trendy district of the Baarsjes. The apartment features a nice garden of 45 square meters and 2 bedrooms, one with a double bed and 1 with a cot. Quiet area, close to the city center.

name: Beautiful 2 Bed w/ sunny garden
description: Stay in our beautiful two bedroom house in the middle of the hip Amsterdam East, with a sunny garden that has sun the whole day. The house is very suitable for families or two couples and is located a short distance (10 min bike or by public transport) from the city center of Amsterdam and all the main attractions. In addition, you will find a lot of cozy cafes, restaurants & shops, in the immediate vicinity within walking distance.

name: Private Vacation Apartment #8 in ArtHotel by metro
description: Conveniently located 50m away from the metro, our colorful ApartmentHotel is set in a thriving creative community just on the outskirts of the city. Within biking distance to several beautiful parks and a quick metro ride into the downtown area, our location makes it easy to take advantage of all the cool things our vibrant city has to offer, whether it's art, nature, history, or nightlife!

name: Flat in the lively Westerpark
description:
Experience real Amsterdam life in this two-room house with two balconies, open kitchen and wonderful view of the canal.

This apartment is surrounded by cozy local cafes, restaurants, and shops.

A stones throw away is the Westerpark with the bustling Westergasfabriek cultural complex, not only known as a center of art, culture and creativity, but also as a beautifully landscaped city park for walking, sports and picnics.

name: Cute place in popular Westerpark
description: Westerpark is one of the most fantastic areas of Amsterdam! The space is 7min. from the station with the bus, 2 min. on the bike to the  gorgeous & 'happening' (for all ages!) Wester Park itself, a 15 min. stroll to the Jordaan & canals, centre 20min

name: Light and comfortable apartment in Amsterdam
description: A very nice apartment in Amsterdam Zuid. From the main bedroom, a door leads to the balcony. The apartment offers a cozy living room/kitchen,  1 bathroom, and 2 bedrooms (queen-sized beds).  3 minutes walk to Tram line 2 (+bus), which brings you directly into the city center (stops at Central Station). 25 minutes from Schiphol airport to the front door of the apartment by bus, 9 minutes with Uber. Good location to explore the city, 5 minutes walk from the famous Vondelpark.

name: Luxury big apartment 5 min from Amsterdam Centrum

🌟 DISCOVER Amsterdam's charm in style at our luxury double floor apartment in the HEART of EAST! 🌟

Step into our beautiful renovated apartment, spanning 85 square meters across the 3rd and 4th floors. Outside we have two balconies, offering sun-kissed relaxation from dawn till dusk.

Nestled in the heart of East with very easy access to the city center. All public transport options are just a short stroll away.
🏡✨

My houseboat is provided with all the luxury you might expect from a regular house with the extra benefits of a terrace with all day sun and airco in the bedroom. In summer we swim in the canal.

No smoking inside and on the rooftop. No parties

Your room measures 20 m2, large windows overlooking a garden, absolute tranquility.
The bathroom has a shower and a bathtub.
I am French but live in Amsterdam for a long time and can guide you in your choices of outings, restaurants etc.
Drugs prohibited!
Am I vaccinated against covid 19

description: Enjoy what Amsterdam has to offer from this centrally located 1 bedroom apartment in the vibrant neighbourhood - de Pijp. Just step outside the door and you will find yourself surrounded  by numerous cafes and restaurants. Albert Cuijp market, the Museum Square, Heineken Museum and the most of the touristic sites are within 5-15 minutes walking distance. The metro station which will take you to the Central station  is only 100 meters away.

name: 100m2 apt with 2 balconies
description: Experience Amsterdam from our stylish and spacious 100m² apartment in the tranquil Rivierenbuurt neighborhood. This beautifully furnished space offers two balconies, perfect for enjoying your morning coffee. Located in a calm area, you'll find yourself well-connected to the city center and major attractions. Enjoy the best of both worlds with nearby parks, cafes, and shops while relishing a peaceful retreat. Ideal for partners or business travelers seeking comfort and convenience.

name: Appartement met terras Amsterdam
description:
Unique, stylish apartment of 70m2 with spacious, sunny south-facing roof terrace in the Rivierenbuurt (Amsterdam Zuid).

The apartment has a spacious living room with a nice, open kitchen. Next to the kitchen is a balcony. The apartment has 1 spacious bedroom with air conditioning, 1 bathroom and a study.

Please note: apartment is on the 3rd floor and there is no elevator!

From the house you are in 15 minutes walk in the cozy Pijp. Amstelstation is 17 minutes away on foot.

description:
Light and cozy appartment. Completely renovated in 2020. Located in lovely Amsterdam East. Oosterpark, Beukenplein and Amstel river are around the corner, with lots of cafes, bars and restaurants in the area. Supermarket 200 meters away.
Multiple tram stops nearby and metro station Wibautstraat (+-3 min) and metro/train station Amstel (+-8 minutes) takes you to Central Station within 7min. Ground floor app so no steep Amsterdam stairs.

Two comfy and clean private bedrooms in a authentic canal house with amazing views. In the common hallway, there is a bathroom and a separate toilet to share. A kitchenette offers the possibility to make some coffee or tea, a small breakfast, or a nighttime snack.

Only 5 minutes walking distance from the central station with public transport in all directions. Attractions like China town, Red Light District, Dam Square, and the famous 9 Streets are within walking distance.

Also Bikes 4 Rent!

Just walk down the Prinsengracht towards the Anne Frank house in about 10 minutes. Afterwards keep on following the Prinsengracht towards the Leidseplein, the Rijksmuseum, Van Gogh museum and the Contemporary art museum.  Explore the city highlights on foot

name: Bright & spacious (100m2) apartment in Zuid
description: This stunning apartment in Amsterdam-Zuid is conveniently located to major attractions and transportation hubs. It is a 10 minute walk to Station Zuid, which is one stop from Schiphol Airport. Major concert venues like Ziggo Dome are 15 minutes by subway, and Museum Square and Albert Cuyp Market are just a 10 minute tram ride away. Several supermarkets and the best French bakery in town are within a five minute walk, and electric boat and bicycle rentals are available across the street.

name: Cozy apartment in Amsterdam West
description: Relax and unwind in this peaceful, stylish space. Authentic and cosy apartment with everything you need.  Between Rembrandt and Erasmus Park and 1 min walk from the bustling Jan Evertsenstraat (Amsterdam West, de Baarsjes) . Within 5 to 10 minutes in the center of the city. name: Dicht bij centrum en Vondelpark
description: This unique accommodation exudes its own style and is located near the Vondelpark and the city center. You can get to the city quickly by tram. The neighborhood is quiet, safe and ideal for young families, with a supermarket around the corner. The apartment is fully equipped for a nice stay: a modern living room with induction stove, comfortable seating area with TV, dining table, and a balcony. The spacious bedroom has a double bed and the bathroom has a shower, toilet, washing machine and dryer.

name: Luxurious Villa Park Amsterdam at Sloterweg 781
description: This villa in Amsterdam is a luxurious property with 6 bedrooms, private garden, 2 parking spaces, and elegant interiors. The bedrooms are designed for comfort with plush bedding and linens. The living area is spacious, perfect for entertaining guests. The kitchen is equipped with top-of-the-line appliances, perfect for cooking. The bathrooms are spa-like with walk-in showers. This villa is a gem offering luxury and comfort in the heart of Amsterdam.

description: Accommodation in quiet surroundings of the beautiful Amsterdam Noord with its many different faces. The nearby NDSM terrain offers several nice cafes and restaurants. With the free ferry to Central Station, you can be in the center of Amsterdam within 15  minutes, a perfect base for a family to discover Amsterdam.

name: Romantic & cozy souterrain studio | City Centre
description: This 17th century canal house located in the heart of Amsterdam is ideal for couples or families who want to experience Amsterdam as a local. Our apartment studio has a comfortable bed, a great living area and also the bathroom is completely new. The location is amazing as it is located in the middle of the Jordaan filled with shops, bars and restaurants and at the same time one of the quietest places in town! Also Central Station and two markets are at walking distance.

name: Canals, museums, and rooftop views
description: Spend your days in Amsterdam in a national monument right in the canal belt! Cosy and quirky, stylish and homey, within steps of the city's premier attractions.

name: Cosy family home near industrial NDSM wharf
description:
Welcome to the coziest 'village' of Amsterdam. This 'village' is a historic part of Amsterdam. Decades ago it used to be home to workers from the nearby NDSM ship wharf. Nowadays the wharf is one of Amsterdam's most popular hot-spots due to its industrial feel, bars and cafe's overlooking the water, a huge flee market and art galleries.
Enjoy a ride on the free ferry which will take you to Amsterdam Central Station within 15 minutes.
The neighborhood is also near a wonderful nature parc.

name: Amsterdam Blossom Houseboat
description: Docked only a few minutes from Amsterdam Central Station, newly renovated and designed under architecture: that's the Amsterdam Blossom. You will be sleeping in the hull of a historical freight ship, in a bed that is basically a throne. The houseboat studio offers lots of space and light getting in via the many stylish portholes. And the location could not be better: close to the buzzing city centre, yet you are assured to enjoy a good night rest since our harbor is peaceful.

name: Stylish Amsterdam apartment
description: Welcome to our beautiful apartment at Woestduinstraat 120-1 in Amsterdam! Stylishly furnished with a large TV, it comfortably accommodates two guests. Enjoy the south-facing terrace, master bedroom, and walk-in closet. Located in a charming, tranquil neighborhood near Vondelpark, you'll be surrounded by delightful bars. Experience the vibrant atmosphere with direct access to the city center. Your stay will be unforgettable!

name: Gorgeous Central Apartment with Canal View

name: Big Bright Centre apartment Amsterdam

We live as a family with 2 children in this house. We only welcome families and couples. We ask our guests to treat the personal items that are in and around the house with respect.Events/parties are not allowed.

name: Jasmin Garden
description:
Our lovely modern, comfortable and spacious family home is located in a quiet family friendly neighbourhood. It is close to city centre by public transport/bike. Relax and recharge after busy city trip or travels.
- public parking spots available, parking fee applies.
- 9 min walk to tram stop (20 min to city centre by tram).
- Shopping centre 10 min walk, 2 large supermarkets and lots of shops.
- very green neighbourhood, in close proximity to Amsterdam Forest & Amstelpark
-close to RAI (2km)

name: Spacious Penthouse w/ Roof Terrace
description: 100m2 light and stylish apartment with 50m2 private sunny roof terrace. The fine restaurants of the Scheldestraat, the artisanal F&B shops of the Maasstraat and RAI convention center are right around the corner! 4 nights minimum.
amenities: ['Outdoor furniture', 'BBQ grill', 'Bathtub', 'Children’s books and toys', 'Children’s dinnerware', 'Board games', 'Outdoor dining area', 'High chair', 'Baking sheet']

name: Family town house :)
description:
Wonderful -2020 renovated- family town house where we live with our 4 teenage kids. Located in Amsterdam Zuid. This house combines modern elements with typical 18th century ornaments. With 5 bedrooms, bright kitchen, bathroom (bath and shower), living room, and private garden, it is the perfect base from which to explore the city and celebrate restful moments to regain your energy.
Location is close to historic landmarks, public transport and the direct bus line (397) from/to Schiphol Airport.

name: Private apt (4 pax)  possible (pls text first)
description:
Welcome to my lovely bright canalside apartment!
My house is conveniently located with metro/ tram stops just footsteps away. very close to loads of lovely restaurants, like Pazzi, Gitane and so on!

★ 20m2 sunny ROOFTOP with bbq and fridge
★ Great Location NEAR CITY CENTER
★ Close to Vondelpark
★ Fully-equipped Kitchen
★ BALCONY

Pls note the apartment is listed as a private room within an apartment. If you would like to rent it as a private apartment there will be surcharges.
amenities: ['Free washer – In unit', 'Outdoor furniture', 'BBQ grill', 'Canal view', 'Outdoor dining area']

name: Studio for 1 or 2 persons
description: Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally-located place. Supermarket/food places under the house and public transport (Amstel station) across. The building has a big shared roof terrace and is on walking distance from Amstel river and terraces.

name: Dream house on the canal
description:
You want to stay in the most beautiful house located on the canals of Amsterdam?This is your chance!You will find this gem from the 17th century next to the famous seven bridges.Completely renovated, tastefully decorated and with natural light coming in from all sides, it will give you incomparable views on the canals.This little dream house is perfect for a romantic getaway in the beautiful and historic Amsterdam.
Steep staircases so not suitable for children and people with mobility issues.

name: Spacious Apartment with Garden
description:
Welcome to your stylish retreat in the heart of Amsterdam Zuid!
This cozy, renovated ground-floor apartment is perfect for couples or couples with baby. Make yourself at home in the living room with an open kitchen including a bar. Or relax in the sunny 75m2 garden. The house has a large bedroom, and a modern bathroom with a seperate toilet. Perfectly situated close to shops, cafes, Vondelpark, and busy areas such as the Pijp, West and Zuidas making it easy to explore the city.

name: Perfect 1-bedroom apartment with hot tub.
description:
Kick back and relax in this calm, stylish space located in the heart of Amsterdam Zuid (Zuidas).

You’ll be 3 minute walking distance away from train and metro station and 1 metro away from city center. Perfect for some nice and peaceful holidays at Amsterdam.

name: 2 bed topfloor apartment | Pijp, Center, Museum
description: The characteristic triangle window, makes this topfloor apartment unique. It is located in a relaxed street very close to the center in the buzzing neigborhood the Pijp. You will have all you need to need in this lovely apartment, such as a modern bathroom, fully equipped open kitchen, 2 bedrooms with comfortable beds, good wifi and fresh towels and linen. You will find restaurants, bars, public transport, shops and museums all within a minute walking.

name: New renovated Luxury Condo next to Lake w/ Paddle
description:
We have carefully thought of every aspect of your stay, from the luxurious amenities, welcome box based on your preference and breakfast to the personalised touches. The 14th-floor apartment offers a unique view of Amsterdam, incl. airplanes & an impressive cityscape.

In the newly renovated luxury condo you will find spa & welness features: infra red sauna, rain shower, waterfall, handshower, 48 massage jets, luxurious toilet (smart speaker, magazines and diffuser) and art of local artists.
