name: Creative apartment along the canals
description:
Situated in a calm residential area in the center of Amsterdam around the corner of the Museum plein this apartment is located along the beautiful canals to which Amsterdam owes its fame, among other things

The apartment will feel like a home. You will find many personal details, objects and paintings that I collected over the years. I’m an interior designer and lighting specialist my house is a never ending project that I love to tweak and twist.

name: Unique apartment in Amsterdam
description: No description

name: Cozy & Clean apartm @ Amsterdam!
description: Wonderful 2BR (50 m2) apartment in Amsterdam Osdorp by the beautiful Sloterplas lake, few min walk to ‘Osdorpplein' shopping centre, theatre, restaurants, tram & bus to AMS center.  Master BR 1.40m double bed. Small BR has a triple (!) bunk bed for kids (1.70m long!). Bed sofa in living sleeps 2  Plz note: - Apartment on 3rd floor (upper floor) NO elevator! - Bathroom ON-SUITE only, in Master Bedroom (toilet seperate)  ***Please get in touch with me first to check availability for your dates***

name: Westerpark Loft, private studio
description:
Westerpark Loft
Stay in an art lovers loft in the Westerpark area.
The loft studio is located in the center of Amsterdam, between the uberhip Westerpark and the cosy Jordaan/Canal district.
The studio is part of a bigger loft in a quiet residential loft building and neighborhood.
Smoking is not allowed. We use the hygiene and cleaning protocol as recommended by Airbnb to provide you a safe stay!

name: Spacious & central appt + private roof terrace!
description:
Please note: due to the corona virus we will do an extra thorough cleaning of the house before you arrive, and treat surfaces with a special disinfectant.
Contact free check-in is possible.

This is a spacious, peaceful and characteristic apartment 10 minutes from the city centre, in the trendy neighborhood De Baarsjes - with many shops, restaurants and convenience stores, and easily reached by public transport. The private roof terrace with lounging furniture is a big bonus. Come and enjoy!
amenities: ['Free washer – In unit', 'BBQ grill', 'Free dryer – In unit', 'City skyline view']

name: Ruim driekamerappartement, rustige buurt
description:
In this quiet neighborhood, you are still close to all the hotspots. With public transportation, you'll be downtown in no time. Within walking distance of the Vondelpark


The apartment has lots of light. Two spacious bedrooms and spacious bathrooms. Ideal for a family or two couples.

Close to Amsterdam Zuid Station with a good connection to Schiphol Airport.

name: Mooi en knus huis met zonnige tuin, vlakbij park.
description:
Bright, renovated house of 100m2 with open kitchen, new garden, double rain shower and three bedrooms. The garden has sun all day!

In the third room upstairs (the study) an extra bed can be made so that there are three separate bedrooms.

The metro and bike rental are in walking distance.

The house is in a quiet neighborhood. It can therefore not be used for parties and/or guests who would like to make noise in and around the house after 10 p.m.

name: Studio 10 minutes From City centre
description: A studio on a great location in Amsterdam in a new and trending part of Amsterdam. It's a two minute walk to metrostation Spaklerweg, and 10 minutes from the city centre by public transport or bike. In the direct surrounding of the studio their are several restaurants, sporting facilities, shops and a nice recreation area next to the Amstel river. Part of the building are several furnished outside terraces and a garden which you may use.

name: Design appartement with 3 terraces
description:
Our 3-floor late 19th century apartment of 140 sqm is turned upside down. The kitchen overlooks the city with a view of the Rembrandt Tower. Even in winter time sunny breakfasts and dinners with beautiful sunsets are guaranteed! The living has a huge, fluffy, and soft sheep carpet as well as a gas-heated remote-controlled fireplace for cozy winter days.

Located in a quiet street with, just around the corner, lots of restaurants, good coffee, 2 parks, and too many nice shops.

name: Familyhouse Amsterdam near centre with lakeview
description:
You can find our very nice familyhome in one of the most beautiful areas of Amsterdam. In front of our house you will find a beautiful city lake, park and a little beach which is absolutely great in summer! The tram stops around the corner and takes you to the city centre within only 15 minutes. We live in a child friendly neighbourhood with a lots of activities you can undertake.

Haarlem and Zandvoort are very close and easily reachable with public transport.

name: Two clean comfy private studio's in De Pijp
description:
Two spacious centrally located studio's next to eachother with each their own private bathroom en suite and kitchenette on the second floor of an old Dutch building (1886) in vibrant neighbourhood 'De Pijp', central Amsterdam.

The studio's are connected by the communal central staircase of the house.

Each studio is for two people only, and not suitable for children and infants under 12 years old.

RAI conference center can easily be reached within 15 minutes.

The property has energy label A.

name: Lovely and quiet couples' apartment in city centre
description:
During our holidays, we would like to rent out our lovely apartment to those who want to explore the city of Amsterdam and its surroundings.

The apartment is on the ground floor and souterrain and is in the central but quiet 'Kadijken' neighbourhood (1 km from Central station), which is known as one of the most beautiful neighbourhoods of Amsterdam.

We hope you enjoy it as much as we do, but please keep the following rules in mind:
- No parties and/or drugs
- No (loud) music
- No pets

name: Spacious canal view apt.
description: A unique experience: a newly renovated ground floor spacious 3 bed apartment in a traditional canal house. Located in the center of Amsterdam next to the Amstel and close to Centraal Station. It is a beautiful location with endless things to do and see, overlooking the Hermitage Museum and next to the Opera House. There are several museums in the area and Utrechtsestraat is very close by with a good baker, butcher and excellent confectioner to hip clothing stores and specialty shops.

name: Authentic, cozy apartment near Museum Square
description:
Step outside and explore De Pijp's bustling streets, filled with a variety of restaurants, cafes, and shops. The perfect place for travellers looking for an authentic and convenient base to experience Amsterdam.

Two bed, one bath, two floor apartment with an open plan living + dining area featuring modern furnishings. Spacious bedroom with kingsize bed located on the ground floor and a comfortable sofa bed in the living room.

Hosting parties or inviting guests is strictly prohibited.

name: kramerskamer
description: It is a small studio, like a big camper. The studio is near the river Amstel and in an quiet neighboorhood in the old jewish part of Amsterdam. Public transport around the corner, lots of restaurants, musea, open markets and nice pubs nearby.

name: Cozy flat with balcony in the heart of Amsterdam
description:
Welcome to our cozy boho-style apartment in Amsterdam's vibrant De Pijp area. Surrounded by great museums, restaurants, bars, cinema, and parks just a 5-min walk away, it offers both tranquility and excitement.

Well-connected by trams and Metro, you can explore the city effortlessly. Stylish and zen, perfect for couples, families, or friends . Come and experience Amsterdam's magic with us!

Note: strictly no smoking or parties. This is my actual house so there will be some personal items.

name: Cozy appartment (75m2) in Pijp region
description: Lovely, spacious, and tidy apartment (75m2) in the heart of De Pijp, one of the most vibrant and beloved neighborhoods in Amsterdam. The apartment is fully equipped and stylishly furnished. The property features 2 balconies with afternoon and evening sun, perfect for relaxation after a busy day. The open kitchen is located in the middle of the living area, seamlessly integrating cooking and socializing. The bedroom has a luxurious king-size bed and a spacious wardrobe.

name: Classic apartment with two balconies
description: Light and sunny, furnished classical and cozy. The balcony on the street side is faced east so you can drink your coffee in the rising sun. On the back side you can enjoy a glass of wine in the sunset! It’s located in a super lively and very popular street where neighbours, shop- and restaurant-owners know each other :-) It's such a nice area! Feel free to ask any question! [ps: looks slightly bigger due to wide angle lens]

name: Hotel-like guesthouse Amsterdam Centre canal view
description:
A stylish bedroom with ensuite bathroom in the authentic central Amsterdam neighbourhood "the Jordaan". My apartment is part of a 19th century canal house conveniently located right in front of the airport express bus station. This will be your unique Amsterdam experience staying in the historic centre of the city, just a walk away from the main attractions.

Be aware that the building has a steep and narrow staircase, and bringing big and heavy luggage pieces is not advised!

name: Room with a view
description: Stylish room with a nice view on Disteldorp, a cosy ‘village’ in Amsterdam. Here you are in the calm area of Amsterdam-Noord (North) , only 10 minutes walk to  the city centre. You can stay here alone or with a friend. One bed is in the attic, which you reach by stairs in your room. There is a desk and a chair to relax in.  The height of the room gives it a spacious feel. Another bed is placed downstairs in the room when you book the room for 2.

name: Comfortable apartment Baarsjes
description:
The bright apartment is located on the corner of a complex, granting views over square and a gospel church.
Public transportation (bus and tram) to Amsterdam's city centre and the South and Western Railway stations (Zuid, Lelylaan and Sloterdijk) are within 5 minutes of walking.
The strategic apartment is located in de Baarsjes with its many (coffee)bars, restaurants, parks and nightlife.

name: Canal-style house located in the city centre
description: It is a narrow and steep house like there are many in the heart of the city of Amsterdam. Located in the museum district with many restaurants and hotspots nearby to visit, it is a typical 2 bedroom ensuite apartment with a fully equipped kitchen and living/dining room. Furthermore, the public transport connection is great while travelling in and out, while within the city most activities are within walking and cycling (at your own peril) distance!

name: Amsterdam Exclusive: book now!
description: Step into the heart of Amsterdam in this beautifully curated, centrally located home. Our exclusive 72m2 property provides the perfect blend of comfort, luxury, and authentic Dutch charm. Take a stroll along the nearby canals, immerse in the vibrant culture, then unwind in your private oasis. Fully equipped with modern amenities, it's the perfect base for exploring the city. Don't miss out on this rare opportunity to experience Amsterdam like never before.

name: Studio Koggeschip Amsterdam BB
description: Our uniquely decorated Koggeschip studio in the heart of historical Amsterdam is the perfect starting point for your city trip

name: Charming apartment Amsterdam Old West
description: We would love to welcome you to our charming apartment in the delightful Oud-West area, one of the city's most popular neighborhoods just outside the busy center. Within walking distance, you’ll find coffee spots, bars, restaurants, boutiques, and two beautiful parks, as well as specialty stores with delicious delicacies. Located on a quiet street, yet with everything you need around the corner. Easy access to public transportation makes exploring the city a breeze!

name: Stylish Apartment in East Amsterdam
description: Stylish one-bedroom apartment in East Amsterdam, featuring a spacious terrace, a dedicated office room, a selection of toys for kids if needed and an open living and kitchen area. Fully equipped with kitchen essentials, this modern space offers comfortable living in a quiet and green neighborhood. Enjoy the convenience of nearby parks, playgrounds, cafes, restaurants, shops and public transport. Ideal for couples and small families seeking a blend of comfort, calm and urban lifestyle.

name: Maisonnette Amsterdam
description: Welcome to our bright maisonette in Amsterdam! Enjoy the large roof terrace with lots of greenery, wonderful in the evening sun. Within walking distance of Ganzenhoef metro station (within 20 minutes at central station) and close to the Bijlmer ArenaZiggo Dome, AFAs live. Free parking and close to cycling and hiking routes. Perfect for a comfortable stay with excellent connection to downtown.

name: Unique guest suite close to CS and Jordaan
description:
The apartment is located on the lower floor of a typical Amsterdam 'canal house' (Dutch: Grachtenhuis) dating back to 1665. In the characteristic place you will find everything you need for a comfortable stay in Amsterdam. There is separate bedroom with 2 comfortable beds
. The living space includes a modern bathroom and a television. I am sure you will enjoy it during your stay in Amsterdam!

name: Great view from rooftop terrace
description:
Beautiful and spacious loft at the Albert Cuypmarket, 3rd floor. Private rooftop terrace. 2 bedrooms, 1 separate toilet in hallway. 1 bathroom inc bathtub and 1 shower. W machine, dryer,
dishwasher, nespresso machine, oven, etc
Right in the middle of the popular neighbourhood de Pijp with all the restaurants and unique shops!
AC Market right in front with flowers, clothes and food. Dont forget to try the Dutch Stroopwafels!
Come and enjoy this lively
neighbourhood.
No elevator.
Stairs.

Fun with the whole family in this stylish space. With a friend, your family, partner, or for business? Come and enjoy our house with a lovely sunny garden. The house is equipped with all the comforts and has all the comforts you can think of. From nice beds, a bath to a walk-in shower. And practically located at the Erasmus park!

This cozy neighborhood also has everything from shops to supermarkets, to cafes and restaurants.

Registration number 0363 673B C58A F889 AF0B.

name: Cosy Arty guest suite old city
description:
A cosy NONE SMOKING STUDIO, newlyrenovated, private studio including bathroom, nothing shared. Large stable doors providing character and charm. A cosy lounge for 2 persons only. Separate entrance on the ground floor. Several shops in the area within 5mins & walking distance to all main attractions.
located in a side street in the very heart of the old city on the ground floor of the house, on Fri & Sat nights the area is busy.Newly added internal sliding doors for noise reduction.

name: Private stay on luxury houseboat near city center
description:
Welcome on board!

The "Aqua Libre" is a historical ship that floats in the 'Oude Houthaven', just a 10 minute walk from the city center. Musea & restaurants are close by.

The B&B has its own private entry & terrace with view over the harbour. There are 2 bedrooms, a luxury bathroom, a toilet, a living room with kitchenette (microwave, fridge, Nespresso, electric cettle, milk beater, tableware & cuttlery. Be aware: no stove)

We offer you a great experience how it is to live in a houseboat!

name: Cozy apartment in De Pijp
description:
The apartment is located in a quite street of the centre of De Pijp, behind the Heineken brewery. The main attractions like Dam Square, the Rijkmuseum, Museumplein and the centre are at a walking distance.
The apartment is at the first floor and it has a bedroom, a kitchen, a big bathroom and a typical Dutch living room with Van Gogh vibes.
The apartment is good for couples, limited group of friends or a family.

name: SWEETS hotel Van Hallbrug
description: Tiny and typical 1930s bridge house with lots of daylight and an amazing view. Situated in the quiet ‘Staatslieden’ neighbourhood, yet right next to the Jordaan area and close to Amsterdam Centre (15 min) and Westerpark (10 min). The surrounding neighbourhood offers an endless number of shopping, dining and sightseeing options that are worth a visit. Heads up tiny house lovers: this is SWEETS hotel’s tiniest bridge house (only 10,5 m2) with the tiniest bathroom. For curious travellers!

name: Spacious appartment Westerpark
description:
Very spacious (80m2) appartment next to Westerpark, from a Dutch-Swedish couple. We're happy to give you all our local tips!

Central location, at the heart of upcoming and trendy area Spaarndammerbuurt. It's a 1 min walk to the ferry to Amsterdam North (young and creative), 5-min walk to Westerpark (most beautiful park) and a 10 min walk to the Jordaan (true amsterdam).

The appartment is fully equipped with everything from dishwasher and wachinmachine to cosy living room and working space.

name: Modern apartment in Amsterdam with balcony
description: Just get away from it all at this restful, centrally-located place. Good connection from Mercatorplein. Balcony with morning sun. Brand new bathroom.

name: Luxury spacious house in best area, Amsterdam Zuid
description: Our luxury house is perfectly located in the best and fanciest area, and quiet part of Old South, near Vondelpark. All the best restaurants are on walking distance or short tram ride away. Also a short drive (25 min) will get you to the best beaches. The house is 10 min walk from the Zuid-As (business district with train station (10 min from Schiphol airport), the museum quarter, and the PIJP area. The house has 3 levels, 230m2 with high ceilings. You will experience Amsterdam like a resident.

name: The Unbound Village

name: Lux Jordaan Apartment
description:
The luxury design apartment (65m2) is situated in the heart of Amsterdam on the Prinsengracht.
The spacious living room has a wooden floor and brick walls gives the apartment an industrial look & feel.
It's furnished with a comfortable sofa, TV, dining table and seating, all design furniture in a modern style with a cozy, rustic tone.

name: Appartement vlak bij Vondelpark
description: The apartment was recently completely renovated. It's located near the Vondelpark. The apartment is in a quiet street and is within walking/cycling distance of the city center. If you have had enough of the hustle and bustle of the city, you can retreat and unwind in the garden, where there is the possibility to eat and bbq.

name: Cosy Apartment in De Pijp
description: Cosy home in beautiful De Pijp, with 1 bedroom and a sofa bed. The home is fully equipped, homely and perfectly located. It is 1 minute from the metro, and Albert Cuypmarkt market. De Pijp is one of the trendiest areas in Amsterdam, full of boutiques, shops, cafes and bars. Museumplein is also around the corner with the Rijksmuseum and Van Gogh Museum. Great amounts of public transport on the doorstep.

name: Cosy bright appartement with canal & sunset view
description:
Cosy and very bright apartment located on the top/ 4th floor of a building with canal view. It’s very green within the building and outside, you will enjoy the quietness of the neighbourhood while being at walking distance to Amsterdam central station, Haarlemestraat and Jordaan.

Everything you need is there, there is a sleeping couch to open for an extra 2 persons to sleep on.

You can enjoy watching the sunset from the west facing balcony.

Don’t hesitate to ask me for any recommendations.

name: Quiet apartment in the center - with cute cat
description:
Bright and stylish apartment in the heart of Amsterdam but away from the tourist-buzz.

**I have a cute cat and he’ll be staying with you! You don’t need to feed him, but he likes to get some love. 😻For bookings confirmed after 1-4-22**

Enjoy a relaxing time with art books and a glass of wine after exploring the city, feel like a local browsing through hip bars and cafes just around the corner.

Pretty Westerpark with cool cafes and bars is just a 2min walk away. Tram and bus stop are 70m away.

name: Sauna and sunny garden in luxurious appartment
description:
This spacious apartment of more than 100 m2 is located on the ground floor in a quiet street in Amsterdam Zuid. The house is fully equipped with a luxurious kitchen, lovely bathroom with sauna and with a sunny backyard.

This house is ideally suited for a couple who want to enjoy the city of Amsterdam without compromising on living comfort.

We enjoy living here with our daughters, which is why a second bedroom is only suitable for young children.

description: It is wonderful to share a nice place with others. I offer an apartment of 28 m2 on the first floor in my cozy house in the centre of Amsterdam. It is located in a quiet street very near to the beautiful museums of Amsterdam:  Rijksmuseum,  Van Gogh, Stedelijk museum, Foam and the Hermitage.  All within 10 minutes walk. The Anne Frankhuis is about 15 minutes walk. The canals are around the corner. The neighborhood is full of restaurants, pubs, nice shops and the famous Albert Cuyp market.

name: Cozy modern "Loft XL" apartment in canal district
description:
Discover a new kind of business hotel in the heart of the canal district.

Located within 1 mile of Amsterdam Central Station, Zoku is designed for professionals, business travelers, and remote workers who are on the lookout for a trendy & sustainable apartment hotel for 1 day, to 1 month, to 1 year.

When you feel like leaving your private Loft to socialize, the rooftop Social Spaces are open 24/7 and cater to your fun, practical, and professional needs - all while providing amazing views!
amenities: ['Outdoor furniture', 'Piano', 'City skyline view', 'Outdoor dining area', 'Baking sheet']

name: Modern apartment in the heart of Amsterdam
description: My home is just off the Prinsengracht, in the heart of the Jordaan. The Anne Frank house, Noorderkerk, and Westerkerk are within a 5 minute walk. My home is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and furry friends (pets).

name: Large penthouse with roof terrace near Vondelpark.
description:
The 150m2 luxurious penthouse is stunningly designed with four bedrooms, two bathrooms and a large roof terrace overlooking Amsterdam. It is fully equipped with all necessities and more to make sure it feels like home away from home.

The apartment is ideal for families and sleeps a maximum of 4 adults. No parties allowed and strictly non smoking.

Located close to the Vondelpark, Rijksmuseum, van Gogh Museum and Stedelijk Museum and has shops, restaurants and bars within walking distance.

name: Twin Studio with Street Art in Amsterdam
description:
Are you looking for a colorful, fully furnished and bright studio with private bathrooms and kitchenette then don't look any further! All our Twin Studios have an amazing piece of street art on the wall, are equipped with two comfortable twin beds, a kitchenette, a flat screen screen TV and an ensuite private bathroom.

All our guests are welcomed as our friends and we will do anything to help you to make the most out of your Amsterdam experience with excellent recommendations.

name: Stunning Canal View Apartment in Central Amsterdam
description:
!!!Message me for a discount if you stay more than few days!!!

Experience the Amsterdam charm from this bright and spacious apartment. With 5 large windows, the apartment offers an abundance of natural light and breathtaking views of the canal. Enjoy the vibrant city life and easy access to major tourist attractions right at your doorstep

This fully furnished apartment is your home away from home. I live here myself and rent it out while traveling, so you'll have the entire space to yourself

name: Appartement A’dam West/Jordaan
description: Centrally located and modern apartment with garden in Amsterdam West/Jordaan. Public transport at your doorstep, park around the corner and walking distance to downtown.

name: Cosy appartment in vibrant 'De Pijp' Area!
description:
Centrally located cosy 1 bedroom apartment in vibrant 'de Pijp' area. Neighborhood is known for lovely restaurants and cool cafes.

Albert Cuyp market, the Museum district and Sarphatipark are within walking distance. The appartment is fully equipped of all conveniences such as WIFI and a dishwasher. Metro stop to and from Central Station is less than 1 a minute walk.

name: Family apartment (3BR 120m2) near Vondelpark
description:
Welcome to our spacious appartment in the Amsterdam South!

Location is spot on. It’s a 10m taxi drive from Schiphol Airport and it’s very close to the Vondelpark. Tram 2 stops next to the door which takes you to the museum district area or the canals / central in 5-10m. However, everything in Amsterdam South is on walking distance and if you rent a bike you can enjoy Amsterdam to the fullest.

When you rent our home we can share a list of tips for food, drinks, entertainment or chilling out.

name: Spacious apartment Amsterdam.
description: This amazing accommodation guarantees fun with the whole family. Everything available for 2 adult and a child. Very large outdoor space, cozy dining kitchen and beautiful open living room with a great view. Tram stops in front of the door and within 15 min in the heart of the city center.

name: Jordaan Dream: Cozy Canal House
description: Experience Amsterdam like a local in our beloved apartment in the Jordaan. This charming two-story apartment on quiet Palmgracht offers a fully-equipped kitchen, comfortable bedroom, and bathroom with canal views. Steps away from markets, cafes, and attractions like Anne Frank House.  Easy accessible by foot from Central Station. High-speed WiFi and work space available. Receive our curated local tips for an authentic Amsterdam experience. Your perfect home base for exploring the city!

name: Heerlijke woning aan de gracht in hartje Amsterdam
description: This original cozy house is located on the Zieseniskade and the famous Spiegelgracht. The house is furnished with all typical Amsterdam attributes, such as Heineken works of art that can be purchased 5 minutes away at the Heineken brewery. It is a 1-minute walk to Leidseplein and Rijksmuseum. All of Amsterdam's best sights are within walking distance.

name: Stylish house with big sunny garden, near Zuid As.
description: This beautiful 140m2 ground floor apartment, situated in a high end neighborhood, is decorated with great care. The street is quiet. Nearby you will find all you need; the Beethovenstraat with it's wonderful shops, cafe's and restaurants, the Vondelpark, the Museumsquare, Beatrixpark etc. If you are here on business: we are very near to the Zuid-As and the RAI. Public transport and the train station Amsterdam Zuid WTC are nearby and will take you all over town and the rest of Holland.

name: Stylish Canal House B
description:
Stylish Canal House in Amsterdam offers accommodation with free WiFi, less than 1 km from Anne Frank House, a 13-minute walk from Basilica of St. Nicholas and 1.5 km from Flower Market. The property is 2.9 km from Rembrandthuis and 4.4 km from Museum Ons' Lieve Heer op Solder.

The apartment features 2 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a microwave, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower.

name: Joy, beauty and peace in our urban oase
description: A very inviting, open space opposite of Parc Frankendael that brings joy, beauty and peace. Many aspects of the interior are of Italian design and craftsmanship. The colouring hints a latin feel - as well as the music collection that is available. You will definitely enjoy the sun, the birds in the garden. You can retreat for a nap, for work, quiet reading or yoga in the garden room, have breakfast on the terrace. The city centre is in walking distance of our village-esque neighbourhood.
amenities: ['Private backyard – Fully fenced', 'Outdoor furniture', 'Blender', 'Outdoor dining area', 'Baking sheet']

name: Apartment close to city centre
description: Our apartment is close to the city centre. Anne Frank House, Jordaan, famous canals and Westerpark are within walking distance. It is a nice family house in a quiet neighbourhood. The apartment is on the third floor and there is no elevator, only steep typical Amsterdam stairs. Our apartment has 4 bedrooms. A master bedroom with a queen size bed, a child's bedroom with a bed (1,50 meter) and a child's bedroom with a bed (1,80 meter). The fourth bedroom has a two-person bunkbed.

name: Casa Rosa in downtown Amsterdam
description: Welcome to your oasis of serenity and style in the heart of Amsterdam's bustling city center! We are thrilled to introduce our beautifully decorated studio apartment, located at walking distance from pretty much all the hotspots! This charming and cosy retreat is designed with light and peaceful colors, creating a tranquil ambiance that invites you to unwind, relax and feel at home.

name: Shared couch on my stylish condo
description: Enjoy a stylish experience at my centrally-located place close to conference center Rai. I am sharing my couch for those who would like to join me enjoying my stylistic Amsterdam condo.

name: Beautiful renovated apartment
description:
A beautiful, classic, bright apartment in Amsterdam’ Oud West district next to the Vondelpark.
It’s a classic hook appartement build in 1893 at the first floor and has been fully renovated in 2022.

The apartment is located next to the Vondelpark and close to the city centre (15min walk).

The apartment is fully equipped with the luxurious necessaries, such as a bath, dishwasher, dryer and a washing machine. TVs with all streaming subscriptions.

name: Sunny & Cozy Apartment in De Baarsjes
description:
We’re excited to offer our bright and sunny apartment in the lovely neighbourhood De Baarsjes in central Amsterdam while we’re away on holiday.

Our home is located in a charming neighborhood, just a few minute walk from the beautiful Rembrandtpark. You’ll find one of the best bakeries in Amsterdam nearby, as well as cozy bars and cafés within a few minutes’ walk. The Jordaan is easily accessible by bike or just three stops away by tram.

name: Modern renovated Apartment in south Amsterdam
description: Completely modern renovated bright and spacious  2 bed room apartment of approximately 84m2 on the first floor with living room, Kitchen, 2 balconies. Very convenient location in Buitenveldert near the Gijsbrecht of Amstelpark, Great Gelderlandplein, RAI, public transport( Metro, Bus and Tram) and roads to Schiphol, Utrecht and Haarlem. Also near te business centre "Zuid As" and the University.
amenities: ['Blender', 'Coffee maker: espresso machine', 'Free dryer – In unit', 'High chair', 'Baking sheet']

name: Modern en sfeervol appartement
description:
The house overlooking the Maasstraat has been very tastefully renovated ('21). The living room with open kitchen is in front of the property and is very spacious. The modern kitchen has a Bora hob, Quooker, wine fridge, dishwasher, oven, combination microwave and fridge and freezer combination.

There are also two bedrooms, one of which is an office. The master bedroom has access to the south-facing balcony.

The bathroom has a walk-in shower, wide washbasin, toilet and a washing machine.

name: Boat House with view over the water
description: The accommodation is a spacious private room of 48m2 on a houseboat of 200m2 meters. From the room you have a great view of the water with the passing boats and nature. The room has  4 single beds. This modern houseboat has its own toilet, shower and kitchenette. There is also a dining table where 4 people can sit on. A big seating area, flatscreen with chromecast and computer is also available.  It is possible to have a open fire in the garden[campfire]

name: Stylish house w garden steps away from Vondelpark
description:
NEW LISTING! Kick back and relax in this stylish, sunny, spacious and fully renovated apartment on the ground floor, with a fully fenced garden, in the cultural heart of Amsterdam and across the street from the Vondelpark.
Through an entrance on Overtoom, you find the apartment on the ground floor, with double bed and bathroom. There is a full kitchen, with fridge, oven/microwave and electric stove, and coffee/tea facilities. There is a second bedroom on the first floor w own bathroom and tub.

name: Stijlvolle kamer aan tuin in centrum met privacy
description: 23 SouS is centrally located in the old part of the center. Our 18th-century house offers two comfortable double rooms, each with its own entrance and en-suite bathroom. These can be booked separately or together as a stay for family and friends. 23 SouS is ideally located for discovering the city on foot and by bike. 23 SouS is also suitable for a family with children and business travellers. For business travellers, conference locations are easily accessible from 23 SouS.
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Charming apartment 4 persons Amsterdam/Westerpark
description:
My apartment is located close to Westerpark which is a very pleasant parc with lot of restaurants where you will enjoy drinking and eating with your friends, family or partner in love ! Very close from the famous Jordaan area you will find everything you need.
There is one bedroom with a very confortable King Size Bed. You have a door which goes directly to the terrace where you will have your breakfast, enjoying the sun. There is also a sofa bed in the living room.

Cheers :)

name: First Class houseboat studio (corner)
description: The houseboat is in the heart of the Jordaan area, in the centre of our city. The boat has 2 separate studios of 16m2 for my guests and another part of the boat where I live myself. In walking distance of the famous Anne Frank House and Noordermarkt. The comfortable kingsize bed is a guarantee for a good nights sleep. The huge sliding windows which can be fully openend on warm days and built in shades to give you a great view and privacy.

name: Numa | Comfortable apartment in central Amsterdam
description: This comfortable apartment with 2 bedrooms offers 60.6 sqm of space. Ideal for up to four people, its double bed (160x200), two single beds (90x200), and modern bathroom with bathtub make this stay a perfect way to experience Amsterdam. There’s also a sofa, a kitchen and a dining table, so you’ll have everything you need for maximum comfort and minimal stress.

name: 5 stars Beautiful Sunny & new Renovated apartment
description: This stylish accommodation is perfect for a couple. Recently renovated with high quality products. The apartment is on a shopping street and a park right around the corner. All neighborhoods in Amsterdam are reachable by public transportation. Public transportation is in front of the door. In the summer the entire apartment is sunny and the large balcony has sun from 14:00 to late in the evening. All other facilities such as supermarket, cafes, restaurant and shops are within a 5-minute walk of a 5-minute walk.

name: Relaxing home across the Anne Frank House

Relaxing apartment in the middle of the Jordaan opposite the Anne Frank house. Rental period is 15 days minimum
• Appartment to yourself
• Work from home in the side room
• Play the silent piano (or out loud if you’re any good 🥳)

name: Spacious & centrally located home & garden
description: Lovely family home in the beautiful district of Amsterdam-Zuid, within walking distance of Rijksmuseum, Van Goghmuseum, Station Zuid (airport access), and the cosy Pijp area. Quiet garden with afternoon sun, perfect to enjoy after a day of sightseeing. Two spacious bedrooms with kingsize double bed, one with a bathroom en-suite, the other with a separate bathroom. Both bedrooms are located on the quiet garden side. Baby/ toddler cot available upon request. Fully equipped kitchen and BBQ.

name: Amsterdam stylish home near by city center and rai
description: Unique family home  located in the hip Watergraafsmeer. Quiet house with three floors . Top floor has a fantastic beautiful roof terrace of 30m2. There is a balcony on all floors. Property is located near the city center and near the nicest cafes restaurants and shops . Next to our house is an electric neighborhood cargo bike that you can rent by the hour.

name: Ruime woning aan het water!
description: A spacious house with a kitchen-living room on the ground floor and a living room on the first floor with the first bedroom. On the 2nd floor there are two more bedrooms and a bathroom. The waterfront garden is on the South so a lot of sunlight in the house all day. You can park for free at the house which is almost unprecedented in Amsterdam. Within 2 minutes walking distance there is a bus stop that will take you to the metro in 10 minutes which will take you to Central Station in 5 minutes.

name: Cosy renovated apartment in Amsterdam West
description: Don’t miss out! Stay in the lively and central neighbourhood De Baarsjes in Amsterdam West. This renovated apartment gives a perfect balance between urban inner city life and nature. The city centre is only a 10-minute bike ride away and easily reachable with public transport. There are multiple bus/tram-stops (with a direct connection to the city centre) 1 minute walking distance from the apartment. If you want to have a break from vibrant Amsterdam,  the Rembrandtpark is your perfect getaway.

name: Suite de Pijp
description: Discover the real Amsterdam life in this beautiful apartment with a spectacular roof terrace, in the middle of the bustling Pijp. Close to the famous Albert Cuyp market and surrounded by trendy boutique shops and cozy cafes. Ideal starting point for exploring the town. Stylish interiors and comfortable amenities make for a home feel. Spacious living room for relaxing and a fully equipped kitchen for delicious meals.

name: Lovely luxurious 42m2 studio in "9 Streets"
description:
Romantic 42m2 studio in one of the most beautiful streets ("9 streets") in Amsterdam. You can hardly be more centrally located.

There's a "fold into the closet automatically" full double bed, rain shower and fully equipped luxurious kitchen with dishwasher, microwave and oven. Ideal for a solo traveler or couple. No TV, you won't need it :)

We also have a yoga mat. And some nice little chairs to sit by the canals (which you can view from the apartment).

Check in before 21:00.

name: Heart of the Jordaan B&B - Spacious
description: The Heart of the Jordaan B&B is located in the downtown centre of Amsterdam in the historical and world famous Jordaan District. This cozy neighbourhood is known worldwide for its beautiful canals, the Anne Frank House, shopping streets & markets.

The location of the houseboat is quiet, visually spacious thanks to the harbor and river, but it's also very Central.

name: Appartement in the city center
description:
Appartment located in the Jordaan: the most central location you can be in. Close to Central Station, within walking distance from the Anne Frank house, surrounded by great restaurants and local shops, several markets, pop-up galleries and the Westerpark.
Please feel free to use: the washing machine, full-service kitchen (microwave/ oven in one) as well as a dishwasher and a refrigerator and high-speed Wifi. Feel like a real Amsterdammer during your stay.

name: Cozy apartment in Jordaan area (2 guests)
description: Welcome to my characteristic and cozy one bedroom apartment in the middle of the old Jordaan district. This area is one of the most iconic (and most central) parts of Amsterdam, with a very intimate vibe, and therefore gives you the opportunity to explore Amsterdam like a local! While the area itself has enough bars, restaurants and shops to explore, you also find the main sights of Amsterdam like Anne Frank House, Noordermarkt and the 9 streets district within walking distance.

name: Van Gogh room
description: Take it easy at this unique, restful place to stay. Very nice apartment located by water and greenery and close to public transport and shops

name: Vondelpark View Oasis
description:
Welcome to our charming Airbnb nestled next to the Vondelpark, located just a 5min walk from all the major museums, our cozy apartment offers the perfect blend of convenience and tranquillity.
Step inside and be greeted by two spacious full size bedrooms, or step out on one of two beautiful balconies that perfectly follow the path of the sun. The apartment is bathed in natural light, creating a warm and inviting atmosphere throughout. Relax on the plush sofa,or utilize a fully equipped kitchen.

name: Appartement met privé dakterras
description:
Enjoy this spacious apartment with private roof terrace in the center of Amsterdam.

The apartment is located in the Oud-West district. This neighborhood has an excellent connection with public transportation. Within walking distance are the Ten Katemarkt, Foodhallen, the canals, several museums, the Vondelpark and many cozy restaurants & cafes.

80+ m2 apartment with 44+ m2 of roof terrace. Large open plan living room with fully equipped cooking island and market view. Bathroom including bath and 1 bedroom.

description: This modern, apartment with canal views is the perfect base to enjoy Amsterdam’s culture and hotspots. It features a luxury kitchen, bathroom, balcony with morning sun, bedroom with king-size bed, and a second bedroom that serves as an office but can convert to a single bedroom. Suitable for 3 people and possibly a baby, it provides everything you need, from kitchenware to towels. Centrally located in Jordaan area, you’ll have easy access to museums, trendy shops, public transport, and more!

You can enjoy a night in the house and do some wining & dining either at the kitchentable or outside in the garden - you will have the place to yourself!

description:
Are you looking for a colorful, fully furnished and bright studio with private bathrooms and kitchenette then don't look any further! All our Friend Studios have an amazing piece of street art on the wall, are equipped with four bunk beds and an external, private bathroom.

All of our Friend Studios are equipped with one of the following entertainment facilities: football table, pool table, table tennis table or old school arcade machine!

name: Private room & WC at Noord design apt
description: Casa Coral design apartment is 1 metro stop from AMS Central. The private bedroom and bathroom is perfect for anyone that loves retro aesthetics and wants to experience the city like a local. Amsterdam Noord is the most vibey area in the city and offers a range of very cool spots (restaurants, cafes, vintage markets & stores). Only 2 min walk from the metro & 6 min cycling to the ferry that takes you to the heart of AMS (4 min ferry ride 24/7). A design apartment to make you feel like home.

name: Loft Leidsegracht - Private studio + Roof terrace!
description: The lively Leidse square area has plenty of bars, restaurans and nightlife suitable for all ages and budgets. Close to the Loft is the famous Vondelpark and cultural attractions like the Rijksmuseum, Van Gogh Museum, and the Stedelijk Museum.

name: Lux and charming apt with balcony and roof deck
description:
Beautifully remodeled, luxurious, 1-bed apartment in the perfect location for exploring Amsterdam. Phenomenal outside space with roof deck and balcony.

Peaceful yet trendy neighborhood, close to gorgeous park, the zoo and the botanical gardens. Walking distance from cafes, shops, restaurants and public transport.

name: Stylish studio in the citycenter
description:
A stylish studio apartment located in the heart of Amsterdam, close to the famous Nieuwmarkt and Red Light District.
Sleep in a tipical old style Amsterdam house in a tranquil little street and enjoy the best Amsterdam has to offer right at your doorstep.

name: Palace de Pijp
description: Unwind in this tranquil, centrally located accommodation in the middle of the centrum. The location is in the heart of De Pijp, around the corner from the famous Albert Cuyp market and many beautiful restaurants and clothing boutiques. De Pijp is the most trendiest neighborhood in Amsterdam. The spacious apartment is stylishly furnished with designer furniture and features a rooftop terrace and balcony! Despite being located in the city center, it's wonderfully peaceful and quiet inside.

name: Small Double Room Hotel Weber
description: The hotel is surrounded by Amsterdams favorite hotspots. The room is perfectly suitable for 2 persons and boosts all the essentials for a comfy stay.

name: Private studio beautiful view
description:
A roomy studio at a unique location in the east of Amsterdam. Suitable for families with children. Trampoline and playhouse in large waterfront backgarden with spectacular view of the city.Extra room available at additional fee. Within walking distance (about 600m) from public transportation: 4 stops from Central Station (10 minute ride on tram 26). Free parking. Ideal for people who want to relax in a quiet area after a busy day in the city.
2 simple bycicles available.

name: Studio @30m from Vondelpark, in a quiet street.
description:
Location, location and...location! The 3 most important criteria for your address in Amsterdam. The studio is cosy, quiet, located next to Vondelpark in a tranquil street.
Around the corner from cinema’s, restaurants and cafes. Leidse square and Museum square (Concertgebouw, 3 major museums) @600m. A tram stop @50 m serving 3 lines, for easy connections. The fully independent studio (25m2) has a private entrance, garden, espresso machine (whole beans incl), shower and toilet.

name: Canal View
description: Light and Bright with Canal Views.

name: Luxurious & light appartement with rooftop terrace
description:
** 2 bikes included **

This authentic corner apartment, in 'Amsterdamse School' architecture, has a protected monumental status, which will make your stay extra special. It is sun-drenched, recently renovated, and modernly furnished. It offers a peaceful luxurious base for your stay in Amsterdam.

To make sure you experience Amsterdam as a local, we created a guide of our favorite spots in the city - and you can use our bicycles during your stay :) The 2 bicycles are included in the rental fee.

description: The apartment is located on the beech square. This is a bustling square with many different catering tents and something for everyone. The Oosterpark is a 2-minute walk from the apartment, here you can enjoy hiking in a green area. Public transportation stops in the square. From here you can catch the bus, tram or metro.

name: The White Room (a private apartment in the center)
description:
Stay in the very centre of Amsterdam near one of the most beautiful canals of the city (Groenburgwal). This unique 40m2 luxury studio apartment on the ground floor of an old Amsterdam warehouse is located in the heart of the old city center between Rembrandt square and Waterloo square (the flea market).

You will have your own studio with your own entrance, private bathroom and toilet.!!

We just renovated the whole place. So everything is, clean new and very nice.

name: Cozy house in heart of Amsterdam
description: My accommodation is situated in the famous Jordaan area in the heart of Amsterdam. The surrounding area is very peaceful and green while restaurants and bars are around the corner. Anne Frank museum is 500 meters away.

name: Lovely apartment of 76m2.
description: Lovely apartment of 76m2 incl balcony with an amazing view.

name: Spacious Suite at Park and Museum
description:
Spacious and stylish suite to relax after a day of sightseeing, or for that matter in the middle of it. Nothing is ever far away from this spot.

Its perfect spot for a family get-away, we can host only 2 adults but up to 2 children (up to 16 years) are welcome to join free of charge. The sofa is a double bed pull out.

It is located next to Vondelpark and Museum square, 3-4 minutes from Canal belt and Jordaan. De Pijp is only a 10 minute walk away.

name: Ruim appartement met tuin.
description: This apartment is in a quiet street but in a lively neighbourhood. Public transport, shops and restaurants are close by. Due to the height of the space and the south-facing garden, it is still wonderful to stay there in the summer. Private  shower/ toilet. Private entrance and private kitchen.  So everything is nice and private.

name: Room with bathroom in City villa, close to centre.
description: Your private room with private bathroom and private entrance, is part of a new city villa in Amsterdam. The room has a great view on the water. Public transport is close and tramline 2 brings you in 15 minutes to centre of Amsterdam. Tramline 2 is going directly to Vondelpark, Museum Square (Van Gogh, Rijks Museum), Leidsche Square, Dam Square (Anne Frank House, Red Light District). We have free private parking. It is 25 minutes drive to North Sea beaches, Zandvoort, Scheveningen or Keukenhof.

name: Spacious studio with terrace on waterside
description: M&M Bed & Bubbles is situated in Amsterdam on Reed Island (IJburg), an archipelago created in the IJmeer early 2000.  Nearby by you'll find a shopping centre, several restaurants and take away. The neighbourhood has a park, beach and a charming small harbour and the centre of Amsterdam is within 15 minutes reach by tram.

name: 2 kleine DISNEYkamers met toilet,douche:Deel etage
description: Hello travellers!I am Olaf,social,respectfull.Since 2001 I live in a colourfull DISNEY apartment in: "DE PIJP".Close to Albert Cuyp market, Sarphatipark, Heineken Experience,Musea.Available: 2 small rooms/2 beds on floor 4.With your own bathroom: toilet, shower. Led tv, dvd, washbowl, 2 bar fridges. Free wifi. Maximum 3 guests.Roof terrace. Silent street.Share with me: kitchen on stock 3.No shoes in the apartment.Do not smoke in my apartment.Smoke on the balcony/roofterrace.You are most welcome!

name: Waterwoning voor de water liefhebbers
description:
Staying on the water with your family in Amsterdam? Then you've found a little secret in Amsterdam. Swimming all day. Paddling or boating has never been easier. If you want to spend a day in Amsterdam, the tram will take you to Central Station within 10 minutes.

We offer our house for families and extended families who want to experience an unforgettable summer. Anyone who takes a step on the scaffolding immediately has the holiday feeling.

Located just 5 minutes cycle from the heart of Amsterdam, our beautiful apartment is the perfect base for your city break. Nestled on a quiet, residential street with a canal at one end, and trams and shops at the other; everything you need is within easy reach.

The apartment is ideal for a couple looking for a space “to work home-from-home”; there is a spacious king-sized double bedroom and a separate office room. This room can be converted into a second bedroom with a double sofa bed.

The house has a big kitchen, a fireplace, 3 bedrooms, two toilets, a bathroom, small garden where you have plenty of sun and can have dinner together.

For a welcoming stay in a top neighbourhood, look no further!
Reg.no. 0363 C12F 7058 B036 15E7.

name: Private Room at our LoveNest in Amsterdam
description: We host in 1 of our 2 rooms. We sleep in the other one.  Your room has a very comfy double bed and a closet. The apartment is very well located, walking distance from most attractions, and it is well connected to public transport (50mts from metro and tram). We are a couple, very friendly and relaxed. World travelers ourselves, with a lot of experience in home staying both as guests and hosts. We are always glad to help, share and respect your time and space.

name: Q-Factory Hotel: The Backstage Double Room
description:
Featuring free WiFi throughout the property, Q-Factory Hotel offers accommodation in Amsterdam. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant. Parking is available at the nearby Q-Park Oostpoort at a surcharge.

Every room is fitted with a flat-screen TV with cable channels. Each room includes a private bathroom.

name: Bright room for families and friends in A'dam 1
description: You can stay in this PRIVATE room by yourself or with your friends and family.  With private shower and toilet. We are an education center in Amsterdam-East and rent out our comfortable bright rooms when we do not hold our own international schools and seminars. When you stay with us, you do not only get a comfortable, private room for an affordable price in Amsterdam, but also support a progressive institute organizing trainings on topics such as global justice, feminism, and LGBTQI liberation.

name: Lovely Studio on unique Houseboat
description:
Your Own Private Studio in the forward of our lovely Historical Houseboat.
Our Ship is moored at a peaceful and scenic harbour in Het IJ. It is only a short walk to the centre of Amsterdam as well as to the Central Railway Station.

name: Luxury Penthouse - Vondelpark
description:
Welcome to our newly renovated luxurious top-floor apartment with a spacious rooftop terrace overlooking iconic city landmarks.

Located on the 3rd/4th floors (and 5th if you count the terrace), it features 3 bedrooms, 2 toilets, and 2 balconies.

Fully equipped for a luxurious stay in Amsterdam, this apartment is on a quiet street, yet just a minute's walk to Vondelpark and under 10 minutes to Leidseplein. Shops, restaurants, and bars are nearby.

Feel free to ask any questions!

name: Awesome Canal View App @ City Center
description: Experience timeless charm in our 1902 corner apartment, boasting high ceilings, vintage vitreous doors, and a midcentury modern design. Renovated last year, it offers an authentic taste of Amsterdam living. Gaze upon the serene canal view from your balcony while enjoying the heart of the city without the tourist crowds. Nestled in the coveted local neighborhood, bathed in natural light all day. Live like a local with easy access to iconic sights and a peaceful retreat from the city buzz.

name: Cozy apartment with balcony on the South
description:
Spacious flat features a large bedroom with walk-in wardrobe and a nice south-facing balcony. The house has a large living room with open kitchen plus a shower with toilet.
Ideally located in the well-known Oud-West district, around the corner from Vondelpark, Leidseplein and the Nine Streets. Also Museumplein and Food Hallen within walking distance. Also nice to know that the street opens onto the Ten Katemarkt, where fresh produce is sold every day (supermarket a 3-minute walk away).

name: Private luxury suite in Museum Quarter (40m2)
description:
Welcome to our luxury studio in the heart of Amsterdam! Located in the Museum Quarter, just a few minutes away from some of the city's most iconic sites (Vondelpark, Rijksmuseum, Van Gogh Museum, Concertgebouw and Leidse Square).

You’re surrounded by restaurants, (coffee) bars, and even a cozy neighbourhood market (Saturdays) - all within walking distance. And when you stay with us, you'll get our insider tips on our favourite hotspots in the area and beyond.

name: Fully Private Stay, garden side, 1 stp city centre
description: Charming, peacefull and private stay of 60 m2 in lovely dike house situated in a pitoresque street, right at a lovely park. Consists 1 master bedroom with box spring bed, large living area with pull out sofa bed,  modern bathroom, south facing terrace in spacious garden. Only one metro stop (2-3) min. away from  city centre, ten minute walk to metro. Within walking distance free parking. Nice big park with tennis court and natural swim facillty. Also nearby you can hire bikes.

name: Private room with bathroom, close to the centre!
description: Private room with prive bathroom close to city centre of Amsterdam. The brand new room is only 15 minutes from Central Station in an up and coming area in de Houthavens.

name: NEW: private room Canal Amsterdam Centre/Jordaan
description: Charming room with private entrance in the center of Amsterdam in a super location on the outskirts of De Jordaan. Close to stores, restaurants and museums.

name: Loft in Amsterdam with a bathtub
description: Welcome to the Loft at Ruby Emma Hotel, Amsterdam. In the LOFT category, luxury meets panoramic views and indulgent relaxation. Enjoy stunning cityscapes from your room and the bath tub is perfect after a long day. Too quiet? Order one of the rental electric guitars to the room!

name: Cosy room in Amsterdam Noord
description:
Hi, I am Maya, and I live in this cosy home in the greenest neighbourhood of Amsterdam. From time to time, I offer the spare bedroom up for rent for solo female travellers. If you'd like to stay in a beautiful, quiet and green neighbourhood, close to the centre of Amsterdam, you'll love staying here.

This room in my home is best suitable for 1 solo traveler.

This is not a "business Airbnb", so please treat this home with the same respect you would your own.

name: Canal View Apartment
description:
Dear Future Guest,
My place is 10 min away biking from most sightseeing locations (Anne Frank, Leidseplein, Vondelpark, Van Gogh Museum).
The area is residential, quiet, with view on canals, and a wide variety of shops, restaurants and bars.
Fully furnished, can host up to 4 guests (2 double beds), washing machine, hair dryer, microwave, oven, blender, office setup, TV, wifi, and balcony to enjoy summer days. Suitable for a couple, family, remote worker, or solo traveler.

name: Vivian’s bed and breakfast, the great place to be
description: No description

name: Well-connected Sunny Apartment
description:
Perfectly suited for all - from business trips to a couple getaways or family stays. A light and spacious apartment will be close to everything you need.

Newly renovated, with superb connections to public transport. Amsterdam hotspots in your doorstep.

Beautiful Amsterdam parks & playgrounds, top restaurants, and shopping a stone's throw away.

Master bedroom with king bed. 2nd bedroom with both bunk bed and double pull down bed.

Bath and large rain shower.
level 3. Stair access only

name: Comfortable sky room 2 12th floor
description: Comfortable bedroom 1/2 persons on 12th floor of a 16th store flat in Rembrandtpark. Good public transport connections with Amsterdam centre with tram 1 and 17, metro 50 and bus 18 or nightbus 751/752. Self service breakfast.

name: 5-bedrooms house; central location; free parking
description: The apartment is a modern five bedroom apartment with large (55 m2) living/dining room with Yamaha U1 piano. Sleeping up to eight, the apartment is perfect for big groups and families. The location is very close to Museum Square.

name: Amsterdam Woning
description:
Spacious, luxurious, modern and cozy family house in a quiet neighbourhood. The house has three bedrooms, study, spacious living room, kitchen and front and back garden.
The house is equipped with good beds, bath, wood stove, high quality equipment, fitness appliances, Sonos and HBO.
The house is just over a 10-minute walk away and three bus stops from the metro, the NZ line (nr.52) and a 5-minute walk from the shopping center.
With good weather you can swim in the canal just behind the house.
NO SMOKING!

name: Comfortable Stay in museum district (#1 eco badge)
description: Victorian room in 1900 style, no-nonsense, minimalistic, clean, bright, and very eco-friendly. Central location, deluxe bedding, fiber internet connection, and the cutest dog, Pom. This baroque-style house contains all you need for an unforgettable visit. The comfortable, large, and bright room for one or two has two beds to put together or separate, lamps, a desk, a massive closet, and an authentic chimney. Elements are in the original 1900 baroque style. The sun shines in the afternoon.

name: Luxurious apartment with garden in Amsterdam!
description: This spacious ground floor apartment with garden is located in a populair area in Amsterdam West. The apartment is based in a child-friendly neighborhood between two city parks. Moreover, public transport is around the corner with only 10 minutes away from the city centre. In the neighbourhood facilitates ample of populair restaurants and cafe's or supermarkets. In addition, a babybed can be prepared at request for young families.

description:
Authentic house from the 30s with an original en-suite door, newly renovated and equipped with a luxury kitchen and bathroom. In addition, the house has a southwest-facing balcony. It is and very bright and sunny apartment in a quiet cul-de-sac with no traffic.
It has its own entrance, with a large open plan kitchen with dining room, living room, bathroom with double shower and queen size bed.
We hope you enjoy our beautiful house, neighborhood and Amsterdam as much as we do!

description:
SINGLE / COUPLES / PARENT & CHILD ONLY

Charming and modern apartment located in a quiet very green street in the popular Amsterdam Oud-West.

The apartment is located around the corner from the cozy Kinkerstraat, Elandsgracht '9 streets' and 'De Hallen', which include the Foodhallen, a cinema and a library. The Vondelpark is also nearby.

description: The hotel is located in a popular area right in the centre of Amsterdam. The room is spacious and fits 2 people.

name: AMS West Gem: Style Awaits
description:
Perfectly situated, this centrally located accommodation offers your group effortless access to all Amsterdam has to show. Discover the beauty of two nearby parks, or hop on a quick 10-minute tram or bus ride to the city center. The vibrant neighbourhood comes alive with artisan bakeries, inviting restaurants, and lively bars, promising a delightful taste of local life.

No parties - No smoking inside - No drugs

name: Spacious Apartment in Amsterdam Old West
description:
Spacious, full of light and cosy apartment in a perfect location: Walking distance to the center of Amsterdam and in a green and calm neighbourhood. Master Bedroom, baby bedroom, fully equipped kitchen and a beautiful balcony with a canal view. Walking distance from parks bars and restaurants. Easily accessible with public transport. Perfect for a couple with young children
Edit
Your family will be close to everything when you stay at this centrally-located place.

name: Spacious 2BDR loft near Vondelpark.
description: Our spacious apartment, situated in an old school building, has high ceilings, a lovely bathroom, two bedrooms, large windows and a very well equipped kitchen. The famous Vondelpark is around the corner, as are numerous bars, restaurants and markets.

name: Comfortabel gezinshuis aan Vondelpark
description: Spacious and bright family house on the Vondelpark with garden and parking next to the house. Next to the four bedrooms there is a playroom/TV room with direct access to the garden. Easily accessible by car and public transport company, close to museums, theatres and shops.

name: Duplex for Family with small child or Couple
description: Two-levels apartment with rooftop terrace located  in Amsterdam Oost. Suitable for Family with kid or Couple

name: Cosy 2-bedroom appartment for couple with kids
description:
This lovely non-smoking family appartment in a quiet neighbourhood is ideal for a couple plus kids. We DO NOT rent this appartment to friend groups as it is not suitable for more then two adults.

It offers a great base for seeing Amsterdam (15 min. by bus/metro) and the rest of The Netherlands. Situated on a city park in a trendy residential neigborhood (former shipyard area Nieuwendam) it sleeps 4 + a baby in 2 bedrooms. With private bathroom, entrance and free parking with e-car charger.

Our location was completely renovated in 2023. The renovated studio is located in the cozy Indian Neighborhood in Amsterdam East at the edge of the Center and the Eastern Port area.

name: Cosy apartment in De  Pijp bed and breakfast
description: A lovely apartment located across the Sarphatipark in De Pijp neighborhood. The famous streetmarket Albert Cuyp is at 2 minutes and the Vincent van Gogh museum, National Museum and Stedelijk Museum are very closeby ( 5 minutes by tramway)

name: Sunny ground floor family apartment
description:
Spacious three bedroom ground floor family apartment on a quiet square in Amsterdam. This is a light, newly renovated apartment that can easily host a family of four. The large downstairs living area offers an open plan area with living room, dining room and kitchen. The 1st floor has a bathroom, two bedrooms and a TV room.

The friendly local area has many supermarkets, shops, small bars, cafes and restaurants. We are close to the Vondelpark and a short tram or cycle ride from the canal area.

name: Modern 1 Bed Apartment with balcony nr Vondelpark
description:
Cool1-Bedroom Apartment with balcony in a popular area of Amsterdam, sandwiched between Rembrandt park and Vondelpark. Perfect place for 4 people or small family (double bed and double sofa bed). This home away from home is full of character and charm.

It is cycling/walking distance from Leidseplein, 9 Straatjes and Museum quarter. There are lots of restaurants, bars, bakeries and cafes in the area such as Ron Gastrobar, Levain & Le vin, Bar Bonnie, Otto Vollante and kosta.

name: Cosy private room in de 'Pijp' area
description:
This warm&cosy eco-style room in the heart of the popular bustling area in Amsterdam ‘de Pijp” has a high double bed (1.40x2m), a fridge, Nespresso machine, kettle, microwave and plenty of storage space. The room (1st floor) faces the street side and has a lot of natural light. It is situated on walking distance from:
⁃ Albert Cuypmarket: 1 min
⁃ Subway station De Pijp: 1 min
⁃ Heineken Experience: 4 min
⁃ Museum Square: 10 min
⁃ Rembrandt square: 15 min or 2 stops M

name: Beautiful 4-bedroom house (250m2) with garden
description:
For a chic and ultra luxurious stay in Amsterdam, this ultimate downstairs house (250m2) with a beautiful garden is the perfect base. It is located in the heart of Oud-Zuid next to the Vondelpark and within walking distance of the PC Hooftstraat, the Museumplein and the Concertgebouw.

The recently stylishly renovated downstairs house has 4 bedrooms with double beds (1x doubler). Furthermore, the house has 3 bathrooms with 2 baths, 4 toilets, a living room, a gameroom and a cooking island.

name: Fijn appartement in Amsterdam Oud-West
description:
My lovely apartment is located in Amsterdam Oud-West, within walking distance of, among other things, the Kinkerstraat, Ten Katemarkt, the Foodhallen and the Vondelpark. Other attractions such as Leidseplein and museums are also close!

Check-in and check-out time are flexible.


Permit number City of Amsterdam: Z/24/2319460

name: * Beautiful canalview Suite*
description:
Luxurious junior suite with a bedroom, bathroom and living room with 3 grand windows onto the canal. On the first floor of a 17th century, national monument building in the centre of Amsterdam.

Features:

• Daily cleaning included
• Approximately 25m2
• Luxurious rain shower
• 400 cotton count sheets
• Free Wifi
• Parking on street or in a secured garage 5 min walk away (Prinsengracht 540) or at a P&R.

name: City Centre Modern Vondelhouse
description: Leidse square is walking distance (2 min). Also all the needed stores such as supermarket and cafetaria’s are really close. You could get the best coffee of Amsterdam on 1 min walking (usually a long queue, but goes quick!). Also the house contains a luxury environment.

name: Huize Harry & Gompie
description:
Fantastically centrally located downstairs house in the heart of Amsterdam right next to the famous Vondelpark. 145m2 living pleasure with garden and balcony. Ideal for your family.

Two separate bedrooms: 1 master bedroom and 1 cozy children's room. The children's room is suitable for 2 children. Still working? Spacious study with desk at your disposal and double sofa bed.

And then we almost forget Harry and Gompie. Our two red hangovers who love cuddling! Love cats? Then you're in the right place!

name: Beautiful city apartment next to Vondelpark
description:
This newly renovated city apartment is situated in the beautiful Old-West area. Adjacent to Vondelpark and 5 minutes from the canals, the apartment is located in a quiet area close to all the places to be in Amsterdam. A stroll through the beautiful Vondelpark will lead you to the city center; a perfect start of the day.

The apartment has 2 bedrooms with 2 double beds and a large living room with a fully equipped kitchen in the middle.

name: Authentic Farmhouse The Vergulden Eenhoorn 4
description:
There is great history behind the hotel. The Vergulden Eenhoorn was established in 1702 as a city farm and used to be one of very few farmhouses the city of Amsterdam has.

Together with the city of Amsterdam the farmhouse was fully renovated to modern standards, while maintaining the historic value and its features.

The space is fully equipped with all necessities to make your stay as comfortable as possible!

name: Verblijf met privé ingang en badkamers in kamers
description: Two Double Rooms, 2 Private Bathrooms with Walk-in Shower, 1 Double Bed (King), 2 Twin Beds.  The family stay consists of a Private Entrance with a hallway that gives access to the Canal Room and the Garden Room.  Each has a private bathroom.                                                                               For more information about both rooms, the Canal Room and the Garden Room, you can check the information at each of these rooms on our website.

name: City centre apartment “Jordaan”
description: This charming 40 m² apartment, near Johnny Jordaanplein, borders Kinkerbuurt and Jordaan. It features a bright living room with large windows, a quiet rear bedroom with balcony access, a modern kitchen, and separate bathroom and toilet. The efficient layout and wooden floors add elegance. Centrally located in Old West, it offers easy access to coffee bars, restaurants, parks, and excellent tram and bus connectivity throughout Amsterdam.

name: Unique Peaceful Houseboat next to the city centre
description: Our houseboat is an authentic houseboat, located very close to the city centre of Amsterdam. From our home you will have an amazing view over the water, you will be very close to the canals and the hotspots of the Jordaan but at the same time very relaxed and quiet.

name: Leidse Square 5 star Luxury-apartment
description: Our lovely monumental 5 stories house originates from 1887 and is situated in the middle of the centre of Amsterdam, near Leidsesquare. Luxury Apartment has just been renovated, you will experience excellent quality, love and eye for detail. The apartment is very suitable for families with children or business guests, as it's spacious with a lot of privacy.

Every room is fitted with a flat-screen TV with cable channels. Each room includes a private bathroom.

Welcome aboard the Amsterdam Houseboat Family!

Enjoy the simplicity and comfort of our studio, making it the perfect base for your Amsterdam adventure!

Attractions nearby are The Artis Zoo, Tropen museum, Oosterpark, The Dapper and Albert Cuyp markets,

name: New and light apartment!

• Luxury Open Kitchen: Fully equipped for family meals.
• Comfortable Living Area: Large sofa with park views.

The room is very light and suitable for two people. It has a double bed, sofa, private shower (cabine in the room), private toilet, airconditioning and a fridge. Enjoy the special area, living on the water and there is an easy and quick access by public transport to the inner city centre (5min walk to tram /13 min tram to central station).

name: Stylish & Spacious apartment in Oud-West
description: Welcome to our apartment located in one of the most beautiful parts of the Oud-West area. You are only a 5-minute walk away from the Canal district, 'De Jordaan', 'De Hallen', Vondelpark and the museum district.

name: Lovely quiet fam house & garden,10 min from centre
description:
Familyhouse (120m2) . With garden in popular area Amsterdam North. We're a couple with 2 kids (9&12 yrs), musician and filmmaker. 10 min biking from Central station. Bus (5 min to metro) goes every 10 mins. Max 4 people, preferably families with kids.

reg. nr Amsterdam 0363 62AB 416F EDAE 3E27

name: Houseboat in nature, 15 minutes from C. Station.
description:
My houseboat is situated on one of the most beautiful spots in Amsterdam. It's got a big open garden, that borders on some wild woods and opposite the wide canal (in which you can swim) is a forest. I love my home, it has everything you need and it's very quiet.
It's like living in the country, a 20 minute walk along woods and water takes you to the next village on a lake.
And a 15 minute bike-ride takes you to the ferry opposite the CS and one of the most beautiful towns in the world!

Step inside our cozy retreat, where relaxation meets convenience. While our amenities are basic, you'll find comfort in every corner, ensuring a pleasant stay as you recharge for your next adventure. ence!

description:
This unique and recently renovated studio - The Princess - is ideal for those looking to stay on a houseboat in the centre of Amsterdam. Fully equipped with kitchenette, ensuite shower and luxury double bed. Wonderful canal views and within walking distance to the museums and renowned shopping streets, make this a superb spot! :-)

Don't let restaurants being closed stop you coming to the city. Make the most of restaurant delivery services and dine in style on the boat...what could be better?!

name: Central, unique artsy house with garden
description:
Kick back and relax in this calm, stylish space. Very charming and lively house located in Vondelparkbuurt, which most people consider the real centre of Amsterdam as it's the intersection of all the most vibrant neighbourhoods and museums.

It has a large living room, a double-showered bathroom, a home-cinema and authentic decoration.

You can also enjoy authentic sound throughout the apartment (living room, kitchen and even bathroom) thanks to a complete SONOS system.

name: Beautiful Canalhouse Ap @ Oud-West | 4 guests
description: We’re thrilled to welcome you to our light-filled and spacious corner apartment in Amsterdam. This is our first time hosting, and we can’t wait to share our home with you. Featuring two cozy bedrooms, a Juliette balcony, and a large back deck, our apartment offers stunning views of the Bilderdijkkade canal, blending comfort with tranquility.

name: Peaceful, private room in spacious apt.
description:
Welcome! Are you looking to get away from it all and end up in a relaxing but centrally located place in the popular Amsterdam Center East? Then you can rent a private bedroom!
It's the perfect place to explore Amsterdam. 2 min. away from public transport and nice bars and cafés. From the quiet bedroom with a lovely large bed, you overlook a beautiful courtyard garden. We share the rest of the spacious apartment. I live alone. If you have any questions you can always ask me.

name: City centre Amsterdam studio apartment with view t
description: This fully equiped studio is at front side of large canal house in the city of Amsterdam. Recently renovated it offers a new modern bathroom and very comfortable double sized bed. All for private use. Right in the city centre which makes everything very easy to reach by foot or public transport.

name: Modern appartement dichtbij Amsterdam Centraal

The tram station is located around the corner from the Airbnb. So there is quick and flexible access to the city center.

Special features include a garden with seating area, a working space and two bedrooms (note: one bedroom is attached to the kitchen and does not have a door and therefore limited privacy).

name: Private 'hotelroom' in canal house
description:
Room with private bathroom (25m2) on the second floor of a 17th century canal house.
2 windows with view on the canal, in the part of Amsterdam Centrum known as The Nine Little Streets.
(no hidden costs)

name: Gorgeous Modern Large Hideout | Close 2 Everything
description:
This is a spacious, bright and modern accommodation, located right in the cultural and entertainment center of Amsterdam!

Enjoy your morning coffee on the cozy balcony or enjoy a lovely well deserved bath after a long day of sight-seeing!

The room is quiet, with a very nice atmosphere and is accommodated with a king-size double bed. For even more comfort there are fresh towels and soft bathrobes.

The room includes a Nespresso machine, water boiler, fridge, TV, hairdryer, iron and free WIFI!

name: (Private) luxury apartment 103m, balcony, parking!
description: Welcome in my modern apartment with balcony. Please, note this is a private room for 2 persons in a shared apartment in Amsterdam West. You'll share the livingroom and bathroom with me (Melanie).

name: Comfortable double room
description: No description

name: Private studio with own bathroom&terrace
description:
We are located on the Prinsengracht canal in the heart of historic Amsterdam. Touristic hotspots like the Anne Frank House, the Royal Palace on Dam Square and the Rijksmuseum are within walking distance. The location can't be better and besides that the studio is located in the back, which gives you peace at night.

The airbnb is located on the first floor in a 17th century monumental canal house. The studio and bathroom are private for you! We hope to welcome you soon.
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Cozy & clean bedroom with bicycles to rent.
description:
We are in Bos en Lommer, Amsterdam West. A local quiet neighbourhood, away from the hustle & bustle!

Our flat is 20 mins by tram or bus from the city centre of Amsterdam, even quicker on a bike.

*Please note we are not in the centre nor walking distance. 4 km from Dam Square.

We have two bedrooms, one we live in and the guest room. You will share the kitchen, bathroom, living area and garden with us.

We look forward to welcoming you to Amsterdam!

Martijn & Betina <3

description: Neat, cozy and bright room for one person, in a beautiful and spacious apartment. The room is simple, yet comfortable and with a lot of character, you will feel right at home. The house itself is quite big, with a large open kitchen and a beautiful bathroom with rain shower and bath tub. Great location, walking distance from Central Station and the center of Amsterdam. Hip and upcoming neighbourhood, yet quiet enough for a good night's sleep :)

name: COZY STYLISH ROOM PARKING WHIRLPOOL WIFI
description:
Spring in Amsterdam! If you like to stay in
a stylish, affordable room with easy and cheap parking possibilities close to the city centre, then I would be more than happy to welcome you as my guest!

name: City Centre Room. Private Bathroom. Roof Terrace.
description:
Comfortable Bed & Coffee room on top location in the city centre with a king sized bed and a private shower and toilet. The room is located on the 2nd floor in city centre Jordaan area in between the canals near the Anne Frank House on walking distance of everything the city offers. The room includes access to a large roof terrace on the 4th gloor with several seatings and spectacular view.
Safe & easy self check in into the building at anytime with a key code. Luggage storage possible all day.
