name: Houseboat apartment with water terrace &free bikes
description:
Houseboat B&B The Seal is a 35m2 private apartement. It has it's own entry, a kitchenette, refrigerator & microwave & cooking equipment. Private bathroom, living room and a loft bedroom (hght +\- 1.65 m), water side terrace . Free wifi, free parking. Sofa bed with memory foam matras!
The Seal is situated in North Amsterdam near the NDSM warf where you can find fun restaurants. You are only 15 minutes away from the city centre (by free ferry) and also a bike ride away from the lovely Waterland.

name: De Parel van de Stad (Free Parking!)
description:
Welcome to our recently renovated apartment on the beautiful Amstelveenseweg in Amsterdam South WITH A FREE PARKING LOT!

Enjoy luxury and comfort in your own Airbnb room, complete with a luxurious bathroom. Our stylish, sleek and modern apartment offers the perfect combination of convenience and elegance, and is within walking distance from the AMSTERDAM FOREST , CITY CENTER and major attractions. Just outside the hustle and bustle of the city center in the MOST BEAUTIFUL LOCATION IN AMSTERDAM!

name: 2-Bedroom Condo with View of Amstel River
description: Experience the charm of Amsterdam from our centrally located two-bedroom apartment, with stunning Amstel River views. Just blocks away from the InterContinental Amstel Amsterdam Hotel, our spacious and convenient flat ensures a comfortable stay near the heart of the city.

name: De Pijp B&B
description: It is rare to find tranquility in the midst of a bustling, thriving neighborhood. This room offers just that, a clean, cozy hide away. A few minutes walk from the city center and the river Amstel! Early bag drop off and late pick up is possible!

name: Central Amsterdam Garden Suite
description: The Plantage Suite is an "independent" small, double guest suite,  a home from home. The Plantage Suite is physically part of our own apartment therefore late arrivals are not a problem. It is situated on the ground floor, centrally located, with own private bathroom, a small fridge but NO KITCHEN.  It  has a private garden and direct access to a very large, shared, private inner garden. A calm oasis in the centre of the city.

name: Light & trendy apartment in Amsterdam West
description:
This light and trendy apartment offers everything you need for a perfect stay in Amsterdam.

It is located in hip and happening Amsterdam West, a 10 minute ride from the city center. You find lunch and coffee places, restaurants and bars in the neighborhood. There are lots of stores and a daily market across the street.

The apartment is conveniently located close to Sloterdijk train station and public transport. Tram 12 & 14 and bus 21 bring you everywhere in town.

name: Sunny topfloor apartment!
description:
Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally-located place at westergas area the 4th floor, this charming space is a tranquil retreat.
Living Area:
A open-concept living with a kitchen. It is a harmonious blend of modern and cozy.
Kitchen:
The kitchen is an open kitchen space.
Bedroom:
The bedroom is connected to the outside terrace. You can pull the bed down or have a sofa and put the bed up. Is is very easy done.
Bathroom:
There is a shower and toilet in a fairly simple yet modern bathroom

name: Parkview for two
description: In this building from 1888 is next to the Sarphatipark, just outside the Singelgracht so near the old town, near the river Amstel and within walking distance of the major museums. It is a nice neighborhood, where there is a lot of living, working, shopping, with restaurants and cafes and a day market around the corner. Almost everything is within walking distance, but also well connected by public transportation.

name: Cozy Authentic Apartment Amsterdam
description:
Welcome to our beautiful and charming apartment in the heart of Amsterdam!

Situated in a quiet neighborhood, our location is perfect for those seeking a peaceful retreat. The area is known for its abundance of young families, creating a friendly and welcoming atmosphere. A mere 10-minute bike ride through the picturesque Vondelpark will lead you to the bustling city center, allowing you to explore the iconic landmarks and attractions Amsterdam has to offer.

name: Stylish typical ‘North’ house, big garden, free P
description:
Looking for a real, urban experience with the comfort of home and the style of a boutique hotel?
I am renting out my lovely stylish house with lovely big and green garden. This is a typical Amsterdam North house in a quiet and cute street with lovely ambience (and FREE PARKING in the street!). The house (115m2) is newly renovated, very light and open. It is an energy-neutral house, fully self sufficiënt and luxurious. Metro and Ferry take you to the centre in no time. I require a ID verify..

name: Quiet 4p-appt in green area at park in center
description: Unique place to stay for a maximum of 4 people in the green, quiet part of the centre of Amsterdam. In the middle of the 'Plantage-area', the green neighborhood of Amsterdam. Close to where it all happens (15-20 minutes on foot), but a peaceful and friendly area to stay. Perfect for families with kids.

name: #Amsterdam #Schiphol Airport # Private Room
description:
Perfect for travellers like us. Nice quiet clean place near Schiphol Airport and Central Amsterdam.
Private entrance, breakfast. Apple TV, WIFI, Park, small shopping center, Gym, Windmill and more nearby.
Sleep, rest, go out and enjoy.

name: Whole building for yourself with friends or family
description:
Ready to try something new but still wants the comfort and privacy you used to? Try to rent a whole B&B building by yourself, with friends or family.

The location is very nearby public transports which bring you directly to the central station of Amsterdam.

Within 10 minutes walking you will find a shopping area with a supermarket and different kind of coffee shops and restaurants for lunch and diner.

Bedsheets and towels are included.

name: Beautiful, bright apartment near city center
description:
This family friendly house is 100 m2. The house is located in Westerpark area a quiet and friendly neighborhood.
Near central station and city centre, both 10 min on your bike. We live very close to the Westergasfabriek. An area with a lot of
cultural activities and nice restaurants. Very close to the house, 2 min walk there is the stop for the tram wich takes you to the centre
all the museums and the Artis zoo. And lots of other things to do.

name: Cosy appartment in 'de pijp'
description: A renovated apartment in the middle of the nice neighborhood ''de Pijp''! Just a 5 minutes walk from all the big museums and a 10 minute tram ride to the center! 2 bedrooms, a balcony with a big couch, a cosy living room and a good kitchen!

name: Lovely apartment in Amsterdam
description:
Warm and modern 1- room apartment on the first floor in the pretty Staatsliedenbuurt area near the Westerpark and close to the city centre of Amsterdam.
1 Queensize bed and a big matras for a third person. Great kitchen + bathroom and a sunny (15 m2) terrace en suite.
Public transport (Bus 21 and Tram 3) within less than a 1 minute walk. Lots of restaurants and bars closeby.
amenities: ['Free washer – In unit', 'Outdoor furniture', 'Outdoor dining area']

name: Apartment with terrace in quiet street in Centre!
description:
A cozy place to stay in the centre of Amsterdam (5 minutes walk from the Central Station, 2 minutes from the Dam Square). And guess what?
It is quiet.
No trams and busses since it is a pedestrian area.
The Bijenkorf department store the Dam Square with the Palace are just around the corner as well as the Metro and other public transportation.
But if you walk around the area you are in the middle of the historical centre.

name: Sunny apartment at a great location
description:
Our sunny and spacious 2-bedroom apartment on the 2nd floor is very well located between the Jordaan and Westerpark. Ideal for couples (or with child of max 4 years). On our balconies you can enjoy the sun, every time of the day.
We have a queensize bed and a bed for a toddler (up to 4 years).
Lots of bars and restaurants are right around the corner, as well as supermarkets, pharmacies and a post office.
Public transport, tram 3, is right in front of our house. (to Leidseplein in 10min.)

name: Modern One-Bedroom Apartment
description:
Located in a tranquil yet convenient area, this apartment offers the best of both worlds! Just a short walk from the bustling city center and easily accessible by public transport, it combines modern living with a charming twist on Amsterdam architecture.

It is equipped with smart lights and fun features like Sonos and Bathroom Disco Light (just for fun 😅).

It is also possible to use a bike during your stay - as long as you keep it save and treat it well.

name: Comfortable apartment in popular 'De Pijp' area
description:
Lovely newly renovated apartment, located on the quiet Van Ostadestraat in the popular area called De Pijp. Enjoy one of the two sunny balconies!

In the neighborhood you will find plenty of nice boutiques, trendy restaurants and museums. With the Sarphatipark as your backyard and the Amstel River, the Vondelpark, the canals and the Museumplein within walking distance, this is a great place to be.

name: Spacious Central 1BDR apartment with Roof Terrace
description:
This spacious one-bedroom apartment is the perfect place for your stay in Amsterdam! The apartment has everything you need for a comfortable stay such as a fully equipped kitchen, a comfortable bathroom and a spectacular view on the city from the roof terrace (lounge area).

The apartment is located in a quiet and authentic Dutch residential area called the Frederik Hendrik area and very near to the centre. The renowned Amsterdam Canals and the Anne Frank House are just 10 minutes away by foot.

name: Motor Yacht Amazone close to centre of Amsterdam
description: Make your visit to Amsterdam even more special, stay on your own private motor yacht 'Amazone'. The yacht offers all facilities and comfort and will make your stay unforgettable. Staying aboard the Amazone is a wonderful way to experience Amsterdam. This beautiful ship is no less than 11.00 meters long and offers lots of charm and cosiness. We can accommodate up to 4 guests. You have the whole ship to yourself, you do not share the boat with other guests.

name: Cosy room in a cosy house
description:
A cozy room in Amsterdam-West! 7 minutes walk from Sloterdijk station and within 15 minutes you are in the center by tram, 5 minutes to Amsterdam Central Station by train. You share the house with two nice women, a dog, and a cat.
We rent out 2 rooms in total, so you may encounter other guests during your stay. The bathroom is shared and there is an extra toilet downstairs.

name: Mooi en licht appartement
description: Bright and comfortable apartment. Easily accessible by tram and metro city center of Amsterdam. Quiet area with lots of greenery.

name: One-bedroom Apartment with sofa bed
description: This newly built property is located in Amsterdam Noord, just a 15-minute walk from the ferry to Central Station. It features a restaurant (not open yet), working area and free Wi-Fi. The apartments are split over three floors, and are modernly decorated with peaceful beige color decor.

name: Apartment next to the park
description: Apartment in the creative part of Amsterdam with a great mixture of culture, food, entrepreneurs in the creative field, markets, summerfestivals and a great park.

name: Lovely house with peaceful green garden
description:
Big open living room with big lounge sofa ,connecting via open kitchen to ensuite sleeping room with garden access. Robust interior with natural stone and wood. All conveniences present.

Back garden covered with green lush plants and very tranquil place in the evenings and wknds. Hammock and outdoor eating facilities present.

Located in upcoming Bos&Lommer (BOLO)West where new coffee bars/resto's are popping up like mushrooms. Near canal & 2 big parks, excellent for chilling or running.

name: Tiny house - 4,2 km from Amsterdam central station
description: Welcome to our tiny house! In 2017 we were able to get our hands on one of the most beautiful pieces of land in the heart of amsterdam, containg a house and a tiny house, both destined to be demolished according to the seller. We started by renovating the shed, so we could live there during the years we spent renovating the big house. Now, we are happy to share our experience of living in this very special piece of amsterdam!

name: Prinsengracht 969, your home to explore Amsterdam
description: Our house, built in 1680, is on the Prinsengracht. The apartment is in the basement of the house with its own front door. With a love for antique details, we made it a comfortable place to stay. Situated in the centre of the city of Amsterdam you can reach the musea and restaurants within a ten-minute walk.

name: Numa | 1-Bedroom (4 PAX) Apartment w/ Sofabed
description: This comfortable apartment offers 40 sqm of space. Ideal for up to four people, its double bed (180x200), sofabed (160x200), and modern bathroom with shower make this stay a perfect way to experience Amsterdam. There’s also a kitchen and a dining table, so you’ll have everything you need for maximum comfort and minimal stress.

name: CANAL OASIS STUDIO / VONDELPARK / 2 FREE BIKES
description:
Welcome at the Studio Oasis where everyone is welcome, close to the famous and most beautiful Vondelpark in Amsterdam. A perfect hide-out place to enjoy your holiday or business trip.

• GROUND FLOOR STUDIO
• PERFECT CANAL VIEW
• TWO BIKES FREE TO USE

• 100% PRIVACY

• GREAT LOCATION AND TRANSPORT ROUTE
• SHARED HALLWAY

name: 2 very clean, cozy and private Rooms for max.4 P.
description:
Completely new, 2 lovely apartements with a great view on the Park. Just a few minutes away from the Central City, Dam Square and Leidseplein.
Very relaxing after a busy day shopping, visiting Musea or a tiring Congress.
Nice to breath the fresh air, hear the birds singing and look at the nice view.

* Rooms can be locked
* Nice little garden ( togethers with us)
* Dubbel boxspring bed (180 x 200) or 2 singel beds
* A small but all you need kitchen (actually you 're on holiday and we have a lo

name: Rooftop apartment in the heart of Amsterdam
description:
Welcome to my home!

This apartment is in between the Jordaan and Westerpark neighbourhood's. About 15 min from the train station (Amsterdam Centraal) by public transport and 12 min walk to the nearest park (Westerpark).

Whats so unique about this place is you get to be in the city centre (near the Anne Frank house, emblematic canals) without the hassle and noise that comes with it.

Ideal for solo/duo travellers, couples or remote worker(s)

Hablamos espanol!

name: Spacious & convenient stay in Amsterdam South
description: Located next to one of Amsterdam's beloved recreational spaces, the Radisson Hotel & Suites Amsterdam South offers the perfect base for longer stays in the city. Start your day with a canalside walk or bike ride before making your way to the Middelpolder area. Our hotel is also easily accessible from the Zuidas, Amsterdam's financial district, and Schiphol Airport. Amsterdam Zuid station is only 25 mins away by train and tram. Planning on driving? Secure private parking is available.

name: 2BR| Spacious 110M2 cozy & modern apartment
description:
We're offering a spacious 2-floor apartment located only a 2 minute walk away from the metro/train/bus/tram station Lelylaan. It takes 7 minutes with the train from Schiphol Airport to the apartment, convenient! From the Lelylaan station you can take all types of transport to your desired location.

Apartment highlights:

★ Close to Schiphol Airport
★ 2 spacious bedrooms with double bed
★ Fully equipped kitchen
★ Space to work from home
★ Fast and free Wi-Fi

I'm sure you will enjoy your stay

name: Bright and spacious apartment close to the center
description:
Welcome to the beautiful Weesperzijde in Amsterdam!

This spacious 2 bedroom apartment is located 50m from the Amstel river, which is great for walking, swimming or enjoying a drink or meal in one of the many bars or restaurants at the waterfront. Furthermore, other neighbourhoods such as Amsterdam Oost en de Pijp are on walking distance!

The apartment itself offers a peaceful and sunny balcony, two bedrooms and a new kitchen and living room.

Enjoy your time and don't hesitate to reach out!

The apartment features:

A fully equiped kitchen and luxe bathroom with rainshower. Located in our own 4 storey house. We live above. Neighbourhood is beautiful, save and cosy, 19th century, green, lively but residential. 10 min./2 km from centre. description:
Come enjoy some well deserved time in Amsterdam in this very bright, central and cozy fully equipped (including a top notch coffee machine) flat with TWO balconies and many bars, restaus, parks and supermarkets close by.

We'll be happy to share our best recommendations based on what you prefer to do in the city.

name: Amsterdam Farm Lodge: spacious and parentfriendly
description:
Experience this 'off the beaten track' accommodation just on the outskirts of Amsterdam. 'Amsterdam Farm Lodge' is a haven for those seeking a sustainable stay, offering a basic but comfortable and spacious accommodation. Nestled within the innovative urban farming project, 'NoordOogst', the lodge offers an escape from the city's hustle and bustle without straying too far away from its joys.
Please note that we're not located directly in the city center so check our location before booking.

name: Stylish apartment next to the Amstel river- Unit F
description: Welcome to our lovely newly renovated apartment (July 2024), right by the famous Amstel river. Situated in a peaceful courtyard, this spacious and bright apartment has everything you need for a comfortable stay.

name: Apt with Garden in Westerpark
description: Peaceful and centrally-located place, with a nice garden in the back where to enjoy some quite from the hectic Amterdam. Recently bought and renovated, 5 mins walk from Westerpark, 10 mins walk from Jordaan and 10 mins by direct bus from Central Station. There is one king bed and a single sofa-bed. Groceries stores around the corner, friendly neighbourhood and super cozy loft

description: Newly built in 2024. Modern houseboat but built with beautiful old antique furniture, 2 double beds & 2 single beds, so also suitable for 4 people who do not want to share a bed, or just for 2 couples who want to share both beds. Extra children are only allowed in consultation, because due to permit, the apartment may be rented to a maximum of 4 adults. Washing machine on request

name: b&b einstein was here amsterdam centrum albert II
description:
albert II is a modern furnished double room with entresol and private bathroom in b&b einstein was here in one of the most beautiful buildings of the Plantagebuurt in the heart of Amsterdam. you will find nice restaurants and cozy pubs in this neighborhood.
The Hermitage, Artis, Hortus Botanicus, Jewish Historical Museum, Rembrandtplein, Waterlooplein, the old Nieuwmarkt with the Waag and the Wallen, theatre Carré and the Stopera, the Amstel with the Magere Brug. all within walking distance.
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: romantic stay in the centre of Amsterdam
description:
Our place is in the heart of the most colorful and popular neighborhood of Amsterdam, de Pijp, around the corner from the Sarphatipark and Albert Cuyp market. De Pijp has a high density of cafés, and many nice places to have breakfast, lunch or dinner. It is also a stone's throw from the river from which Amsterdam takes its name: the Amstel.
Almost all museums such as the Van Gogh Museum and the Rijksmuseum, canals and the city centre are all a short walk away.
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: High-end boutique apartment near city center!
description:
Our property is situated in an old historical building located in the West part of Amsterdam, only a stroll away from the Rembrandt Park. The airport is only 7 minutes away by train. Bens The Walton features free Wi-Fi. Furthermore bicycles are available for rent. The apartments are split over two floors with modern decoration and a natural colour interior.

We offer free coffee, tea and chocolate milk for our guests in the lobby, next to the workbar as we love given back to our guests.

name: NEW: Cosy | Hidden | Private Gem near Dam Square
description:
Indulge in Amsterdam's charm at this cosy studio near Dam Square. Original features like exposed beams and characteristic windows create an inviting ambiance, marrying historic allure with modern convenience.

The compact kitchenette (no cooking stove!), cleverly arranged, offers a seamless culinary experience. Adjacent, the small bathroom maximizes space without sacrificing comfort, providing a private retreat with a well-appointed shower, toilet, and sink.

name: Room Aldo, not for parties
description:
We are offering 1 bedroom only (about 10 square meters) in a centrally located, bright and airy apartment

The room is strictly for a maximum of two guests

You can choose between two single beds (80x200cm) or one double bed (160x200cm)

The heated bathroom is shared with the host.

Self service check-in with a secure key box

Breakfast is not provided

No smoking. No drugs. Quiet time between 23.00 and 08.00

No parties. No pets. No infants.

Check-in from 15.00. Check-out no later than 10.00

name: Knus &stijlvol ingericht appartement aan de gracht
description: Unwind and explore Amsterdam from this stunning 1930s canal house, located near the famous Vondelpark in Amsterdam South.

name: Cozy modern "Loft" apartment in canal district
description:
Discover a new kind of business hotel in the heart of the canal district.

Located within 1 mile of Amsterdam Central Station, Zoku is designed for professionals, business travelers, and remote workers who are on the lookout for a trendy & sustainable apartment hotel for 1 day, to 1 month, to 1 year.

When you feel like leaving your private Loft to socialize, the rooftop Social Spaces are open 24/7 and cater to your fun, practical, and professional needs - all while providing amazing views!

name: Private Floor in Canal House at the Skinny Bridge
description:
A beautiful living space, ideally located alongside the Amstel canal, next to the skinny bridge in the centre of Amsterdam.

You'll find it to be an excellent starting point to explore the lively Amsterdam, while you're also able to enjoy the peace and quiet of the local area and the lovely courtyard.

Look forward to a comfortable stay, as it offers everything you need.

name: Cozy apartment in Amsterdam Zuid (near Vondelpark)
description:
A 2 bedroom apartment with a spacious balcony, situated near the renowned Vondelpark. This apartment features one master bedroom and a second bedroom with a dedicated working space with a standing desk. The kitchen is modern and fully equipped. One of the highlights of this apartment is the delightful balcony.
The apartment is conveniently situated within reach of public transportation options. A range of shops, restaurants, cafes, and entertainment venues are just a short walk away.

name: Ruim, licht appartement met werkplek in A'dam west
description:
Great recently renovated appartment with an office located in Amsterdam West (Bos en Lommer).
Station Sloterdijk is a 5 minute tram ride / 15 minute walk away from which trains can bring you to Schiphol in 10 minutes. Tram 19 also stops in front of the house which runs into the city center.
The bed are two single beds stacked, but will be put next to eachother when two guests are coming.
The balcony is sunny all day and has two nice chairs and a small table as well.

name: Anna / Amsterdam B&b Twiske Zuid

name: City Centre Amsterdam Queen Apartment > 70m3

name: 2 bed apartment sunny terrace
description:
Welcome to your home away from home in the lively Rivierenbuurt neighborhood of Amsterdam! This charming 2-bedroom apartment with a sunny terrace is the perfect spot for your next getaway.

You'll find a modern kitchen equipped with everything you need to make a quick breakfast or prepare a gourmet dinner.

The Rivierenbuurt/De Pijp is a lively area with lots of bars and restaurants, and public transportation makes the whole city easily reachable. Also, it is walking distrance to the canals

Children will be happy with a lot of toys and parents too with the Vondepark on the corner and a large number of restaurants in the immediate vicinity.
Being at 3rd and 4th floor, the apartment is very bright and typically Dutch being a walk-through apartment.

name: Amsterdam Appartement 'de Pijp'
description:
This appartment is very bright and fresh.
Perfect for 1 or 2 persons.
Really central of Amsterdam. By bike from every spot in Amsterdam takes you 5/10 minutes(the best places, Zuid, Center, Oud West, Oost). It depends on how fast you can drive ;-)
1 minute walk from the big supermarket.
TV, Netflix, dishwashers, washing machine, oven... all the basics you need is inside.

Spend spring and summer on our spacious terrace, with sun from 1 pm to 8 pm. In just a 5-minute walk, you will find yourself in the heart of Amsterdam's finest neighborhood, the Jordaan. Our fully equiped 54m2 apartment has a seperate bedroom and study room and you will love our Swiss Sense quality box spring bed.

name: Luxury private room with own bath & kitchenette
description: *For quiet people only!* This is the perfect place if you enjoy quality and space. The room is brand new, large, private and well-equipped. It is ideal for resting after a long day walking in the city or on a business trip. Public transport allows you to reach the central station in 30 minutes, and there is free parking on the streets until October 2024. Please note that we have a quiet hour policy between 8:00 and 23:00. Unregistered guests or drugs are strictly prohibited.

name: A clean an relaxing private room.

Are you searching for a relaxed and quiet place, far from the noise of the city but still want to be 20 minutes close to the centre? You have found the right spot!
My apartment is the perfect choice, a combination of a peace, relax and comfort , but very close to the bustling city centre.

name: Stylish apartment w garden near famous “Pijp” area
description:
The well-maintained (approx 82 sq m) apartment is clean and equipped with all comforts. The bedroom with a kingsize bed and optional a baby bed make it the perfect place to stay with your young family.

The bathroom has two rain showers and a large bath tub (with disco lights). The kitchen is provided with all necessary cooking facilities (stove, oven, magnetron, nespresso machine).

The sunny garden is a lovely place for coffee or dinner. The barbecue can be used to prepare amazing meals.

Close to the lively neighborhood and the city center and also close to nature. The interior is located on the lower level of the boat. The cozy studio consists of a king size bed, a small dining area, a bathroom and a separate toilet.

name: Cosy & Modern Apartment with lift in OudWest
description:
Since I am not using the apartment for a while I decided to rent.
This well-laid-out, fully furnished 2-bedroom apartment spans 75m² and is situated on the second floor of a modern complex built in 2013. Located at Piri Reïsplein in the heart of De Baarsjes, Amsterdam West, the apartment is just around the corner from the charming J.P. Heijestraat, which offers a variety of shops, cozy cafés, and restaurants.

Within walking distance, you will find the Overtoom, Vondelpark, Foodhallen and more.

name: Corner view apartment in de Pijp
description:
This very spacious, 80m2 one bedroom apartment is located in the very centre of Amsterdam and in the most elegant area of de Pijp, de Frans Hals neighbourhood. It is located a stone's throw away from the Museumsquare, the Alber Cuyp Market, the canals of Amsterdam and has the metro station at a 2 minute walk.

We would love to share our apartment with you. You will be facilitated in having a wonderful stay, however; we are not a hotel. Please take that in mind when booking.

name: Gezellige benedenwoning met tuin
description:
Cozy and stylish apartment with private garden and garden house in Amsterdam-Oost!

Located in the lively Oosterparkbuurt with many nice restaurants and shops nearby. Close to the Oosterpark and metro station Wibautstraat, where you can reach central station within 7 min. The cozy neighborhood de Pijp is also only a 15-minute walk away, and you can reach the city center in 7 minutes by bike.

This house has everything for a wonderful time in Amsterdam!

name: Houseboat: Our little paradise in Amsterdam
description: 10 minutes from the center of Amsterdam you imagine yourself in the middle of untouched nature. Jump from the living room into the clear water to have a swim, ride with your bike in just a few minutes to the lively center of town. Visit one of the many museums, go shopping followed by lunch on one of the inviting terraces. A city trip combined the calmness of nature.

name: Newly renovated  apartment with sunny&quiet garden
description:
Welcome to our house in the typical architectural ‘ Amsterdamse School’ neighborhood.

The apartment was completely renovated in 2023 in a modern Scandinavian style and has a very relaxing green garden of 100m*2.

If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us.

Kind regards,

Justine and Julian

The owner lives on the bottom two floors of the house, so is always close-by to assist and help out with tips and recommendations. It also means no-party policy is strictly observed.

The seating lounge area is warm and cozy, and has awesome views of the most beautiful canal of Amsterdam.

We provide limited cooking facilities; please read description of space for more information.

Bright and spacious canalhouse on the groundfloor, 2 separate bedrooms with double beds, separate toilet.

Subway and tram around the corner, as well as the Skinny Bridge, Utrechtsestraat, Flowermarket, Rembrandtplein, H'ART Museum and theater Carré!

name: Single Studio with Street Art in Amsterdam
description:
Are you looking for a colorful, fully furnished and bright studio with private bathrooms and kitchenette then don't look any further! All our Single Studios have an amazing piece of street art on the wall, are equipped with a comfortable twin bed, a kitchenette, a flat screen screen TV and an ensuite private bathroom.

All our guests are welcomed as our friends and we will do anything to help you to make the most out of your Amsterdam experience with excellent recommendations.

name: Cozy room Mercedesbnb Amsterdam center
description: Mercedes B&B is the perfect place to stay to dive into the typically Amsterdam vibe! A quiet place around the corner of the Prinsengracht and the charming shopping street of Haarlemmerdijk where there are lots of restaurants and food places. Just walk down the Prinsengracht towards the Anne Frank house in about 10 minutes. Afterwards keep on following the Prinsengracht towards the Leidseplein, the Rijksmuseum, Van Gogh museum and the Contemporary art museum. Explore the city highlights on foot.
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Little room for 1 person
description: This room is for 1 person that likes to stay with a local and that is easy going. I'm a relaxed guy and everybody is welcome at my place. Note that I live here myself and that there might also be other guests in the room next to your room. So good to know that it's not an hotel. The area is very lively with restaurants, coffee shops, shops and bars around. There are two parks at the end of the street where you could go for gymnastics or even for a swim in the summer. Just like the locals do.

name: Quiet large park-side apartment with great view
description:
Want to enjoy the vibrant city of Amsterdam and get some proper rest at night? Then this is your ideal place! Our colourful apartment is at a large, quiet park. Conveniently near public transport it's a short distance to the heart of Amsterdam.
>> We have a brand new floor and fresh paint on the walls. Pictures are available on request! >>

The Jordaan is famous for its specialty restaurants, bars, galeries and Saturday and Monday markets.From here you are a short walking distance to most of the city's places of interest. "nine little streets" boutique shopping and Anne Frank House are literally around the corner.
The loft is a modern and bright room on the 3th floor with private bathroom with rain shower.

This charming house consists of a belétage and a basement and has a lovely terrace on the back. The house has 4 (sleeping)rooms and a beautiful view over the water of the Schippersgracht. Ground floor!

name: Beautiful apartment in the centre of Amsterdam!

Private living-, bed- & bathroom * Bike rental in street * Near major landmarks, restaurants, shopping * Clean, cosy & comfortable.

Important note: VERY STEEP STAIRS and NO KITCHEN.

Welcom to my lovable apartment, located at a very good spot of Amsterdam in a quiet and pleasant neighborhood ''de rijnbuurt''.

The appartement is easy to reach with public transport and is on the first floor and has his own entrance. My property is very nice renovated, has lots of daylight. The balcony is located on the south which means that you can sit in the sun from the noon until sunset goes down.

It has a lot of natural light. Very organized, clean and comfortable.

description:
Freshly renovated 3 story, 140 m2 family home in a cosy, peaceful street in Amsterdam-Noord. The house is perfect for families with (young) children. Free parking, 10 minutes by bike to the famous NDSM Wharf, full of restaurants and cultural highlights. Central Amsterdam is just across the water, accessible via all day ferries.

The house features a huge sofa pit, a modern open kitchen, a garden with BBQ, a deluxe bathroom with double shower, 4 bedrooms and a dedicated children's bedroom.

ONE GUEST ONLY - please no inquiry for 2 guests.

Old style apartment in beautiful old west canal district is 6 minutes by bike, tram and bus to the Center District. Bus and tram stop a 2 minute walk.

Usually no wait for toilet and shower rooms.

Amsterdam West is TIME OUT magazine's 2023 top ten ''coolest'' districts on the planet.

Cafés, restaurants, bars, shops, boutiques and supermarkets are minutes walking from this quiet street. Diverse architecture and theaters.

name: 3-floor 2-bedroom town house in heart of Amsterdam
description:
Very spacious and high-end house ideally located in central Amsterdam, in one of the most trendy streets, and walking distance away to all major tourist attractions: 15 min from Central Station, 2 min Waterloo square, 10 min Dam square.

Recently renovated and provided with new furniture, the house has two rooms available which is suitable up to 4 persons. There is a huge living room, kitchen, bathroom with hot tub, and two rest rooms.

name: Canal House in the Jordaan.
description:
This unique 2 floor apartment in the Centre of Amsterdam has its own unique style. An Old Canal House with a new design and interior as you can see in the pictures. With a view at the canals and a lot of sunshine coming in during the day, you will be sure to enjoy your stay to the fullest!

The Jordaans' the best cultural area in the Centre of Amsterdam with a lot of nice restaurants, bars, markets, clothing shops, museums and more.

name: 18th Century Groundfloor Canal House with patio
description: With its picturesque canal view, rich history and modern design, this 2 floor house is a unique city destination. Each area of Amsterdam has its own character and charm. This listed monument dating back to the 18th century, and completely renovated, is truly a quiet retreat and a hidden treasure. Situated directly in the heart of the city, the oldest and most beautiful part of town, this canal house is part of Amsterdam’s iconic Canal Ring and listed as a UNESCO’s World Heritage Site.

Rent a bike or hop on one of the canal boats to explore the city like a local.

description:
Our place is a light, recently renovated loft with a great view. Peaceful spot next to a park. Easy access from airport and central station. Loads of restaurants, bars and shops just few steps away.

We love our place because of the high ceilings, the coziness and the light.

This place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families (with kids).

name: Nice apartment in Amsterdam close by city
description:
Relax and unwind in this peaceful, stylish space. Completely private apartment of 60m2. Wake up in the morning with a coffee on the back balcony, laze all afternoon in the hanging chairs on the front balcony.
Within walking distance of the shopping center Bos en Lommerplein.
Get on a bike and you'll be downtown within 15 min!
There is 1 bedroom with 1 double bed. If you would like to come with more people (Max 4 in total), I can put a double mattress in the living room.

name: Spacious and cozy apartment
description:
Enjoy a stylish experience at my centrally-located place. Very close to public transport and main stations like Amsterdam Sloterdijk or Amsterdam Centraal. Great bars and restaurants all within minutes walking distance.

I live here with my cousins and you are more than welcome to spend your time during a stay in Amsterdam in my nice apartment when we are away. You can make use of all that is there, e.g. loads of spices for the foodies amongst us.

name: Room with private garden in CENTER of Amsterdam!
description:
Ground-floor apartment in the CENTER of Amsterdam in a peaceful area. Museums, red-light district, parks, and central attractions are close by! Your private room has a mini fridge, hot water maker, lockable door, and private access to a small garden in the courtyard.

Buses and trams are around the corner about a 3 min walk away. Central Station is about a 20-25 min walk away.

You can use the shared fully-stocked kitchen. It's easy-going environment! Free fast wifi. 4/20. We have a kitten.

name: Amsterdam Houseboat oposite ZOO Artis
description:
This location beats everything! Front row views on the Elephants, Giraffes and Zebras, many little bars and restaurants around the corner and within a 10 minute walking distance of all major Tourist sites.

We guarantee that this houseboat will give you the special and authentic Amsterdam experience, regardless of the purpose of your visit.

The passersby envy those sitting on the sundeck of houseboat 'The Medicine Man'!

Unforgettable stay
A new shimmering penthouse downtown. One that’s genuinely welcoming, warmly livable, highly enviable, and begging to be discovered.

With space for everyone to spread out, Alexander Penthouse is a great base for families. It has no fewer than 2 bedrooms, each with a separate bathroom. under which rain shower will you stand?

With the spacious dining area there is room for the entire clan.
With its glossy kitchen and modern seating area, Alexander's Penthouse open-plan living room feels very smart.

name: Light, spacious apartment, two balconies
description: Light, spacious, and modern apartment in Amsterdam. The living room is large with windows on both sides. We have two balconies for all-day sun enjoyment. Optional two bedrooms. It's located in a quiet neighborhood with a lot of parks nearby, and public transport around the corner. A 10-minute bike ride will bring you to the Vondelpark, and with 5 min extra you'll arrive at the museum quarter and city center. Many nice restaurants, (coffee) shops, nightlife, and other activities nearby!

name: 60m apartment Amsterdam-West
description: Nice 60m apartment in Amsterdam-west, with a 5m balcony with lovely morning sun until 12/1. It has one bedroom with a big bed of 1.80x2.00m.  The kitchen has everything and you can also do laundry. Bathroom and toilet are recently renovated and therefore beautiful and clean. The busses and trams stop almost in front of the door, which can take you anywhere in Amsterdam.
amenities: ['Blender', 'Free dryer – In unit', 'Board games', 'Outdoor dining area', 'Baking sheet']

name: Brand new bright & luxurious villa in Amsterdam!
description:
Forget all your worries in this spacious and serene house incl garden & park around the corner. A small little 'island' with 6 houses in a super quiet & green area. This is the ultimate escape right around the corner of our city centre. Step outside of the house and take a nice walk in Sieger park or walk to Nieuwe Meer for some fresh air.

Schiphol Airport is 10 minutes away by car and free parking for 2 cars is included. From the house it's a 12 minute walk to the tram to go to city centre.

name: Gorgeous family home with sun-drenched garden.
description:
Our house is an ideal choice for couples or families seeking comfort and convenience in a charming environment. Here's what you can expect:

Location: Situated in the heart of Tuindorp-Oostzaan, a green and family-friendly neighborhood with a playground at your doorstep, our house offers a haven of tranquility with all the city conveniences within easy reach. Just a ten-minute walk takes you to the vibrant NDSM wharf. From there, ferries depart for the city center every 15-20 minutes.

name: Cosy 1-bedroom apt in Amsterdam
description: Stylish and cozy apartment in Amsterdam West

name: Modern Apartment 2 Bedroom 2 baths in De Pijp
description:
Our apartment is located in the vibrant area of De Pijp. Walking distance from the Museum Quarter, Heineken Experience, The Albert Cuyp market and many concept stores making the neighborhood great for cultural visits and shopping. The area is characterized by an abundance of dining options for all tastes.

You’ll love the modern yet cozy feel of the spaces. Our apartment is great for couples, business travelers, and families.
We are looking forward to host you in our beloved home.

name: Bright, large, city center apartment
description:
Large and clean apartment in center of Amsterdam (neighbourhood Oost) with a beautiful canal view!
Big park (Oosterpark), zoo (Artis), bars, pubs, restaurant and supermarked (Albert Heijn) within walking distance around the corner.
The apartment has one bedroom with balcony, large livingroom, your own spacious contemporary kitchen and up-to-date bathroom.
Tram and subway stop in the street.

name: (New!) Amsterdam Luxury Apartment (Free Parking!)
description:
Welcome to our recently renovated LUXURY PRIVATE APARTMENT on the beautiful Amstelveenseweg in Amsterdam Zuid (with private entrance), WITH FREE PARKING, a few minutes from the city center!

Our stylish, sleek apartment offers the perfect combination of convenience and elegance, and is within walking distance from the CITY CENTER and major attractions.

Are you with 3 people? Then ask for the options!

Read more >>
amenities: ['Private backyard – Fully fenced', 'Children’s books and toys', 'Pack ’n play/Travel crib', 'Board games', 'High chair']

name: Cosy & Comfortable sailing boat for your own!
description:
Welcome to this sailing ship from 1897 in Amsterdam, and now functioning as a group-accommodation at a spot where it's hip!
In the summer months, the boat sails on the Wadden Sea as a charter. With a cosy interior and pleasant atmosphere you feel at home right away. The NDSM area is a new hotspot of Amsterdam, in a view minutes you walk to the free ferry's which will take you to the centre of Amsterdam! Hope to see you aboard!

name: Quiet apartment by canals 75m2
description:
Fully equipped flat in central Amsterdam. Comes with towels shower gel, kitchen basics etc.

A workspace, a nice balcony with view of a quiet & picturesque courtyard, a French balcony on the (quiet & social) square side, which has a children's theatre, a playground & a nice outside café.

-Cafés & bars in vicinity
-5 min walk from Amsterdam Zoo
-3 min walk to supermarket
-1 min walk from Oosterpark - cafés & bars
amenities: ['Free washer – In unit', 'Blender', 'Coffee maker: espresso machine', 'Baking sheet']

name: Petite city center loft apartment on Amstel river
description:
My small loft appartment, build in 1648, is situated on the Amstel river and close to Rembrandt square, Dam and Waterloo square.
You will enjoy my spot because it's on an ideal location in inner city center with everything on walking distance. With an amazing view over the Amstel river.

name: Design House in De Pijp Amsterdam
description: Our house is perfect for couples and families alike. Located in Amsterdam's buzzy, energising, central neighbourhood of de Pijp - our place is a large, spacious, tranquil two-floor house with professional Pilates equipment and home gym set-up (optional; can also be stored away). Our open-plan home is stylishly designed, modern, unique, airy and light. It also has a ton of Scandi children/baby supplies in case you're travelling with little folk (let us know in advance :)

name: Amazing place along Amstel-river
description: Welcome to your cozy oasis in the heart of Amsterdam! This immaculate 2-bedroom apartment boasts modern amenities and a serene atmosphere in a central A++ location. Nestled in a quiet neighborhood, you'll be just steps away from the vibrant city center. Whether you're exploring the iconic canals or savoring local delights, this is the perfect retreat for your Amsterdam adventure. Book now for an unforgettable stay!
amenities: ['Blender', 'Coffee maker: espresso machine', 'Free dryer – In unit', 'Baking sheet', 'Outdoor dining area']

name: Appartement in Amsterdam
description: Nice apartment in the pipe, located on the Albertcuypmarkt, with the metro a 1-minute walk. 10 minutes walk from the Rijksmuseum, Van Gogh and the Heineken experience is just around the corner.  This place is perfect for your stay in Amsterdam!

name: Spacious Amsterdam flat with sunny outdoor spaces
description:
The perfect blend of comfort and style at my apartment, centrally located in Amsterdam. Walking distance to great parks & restaurants, and the airport & city centre are within 15 min. by public transport.

With beautiful natural light, this apartment offers comfort and privacy after a day of exploring the city.

The apartment has everything: from a very comfortable bedroom, a great bathroom, a fully-equipped kitchen and living room, to a home office, balcony and a roof terrace with sun all day.

name: Amsterdam city center Apartment
description: This centrally located property is tastefully decorated. The location within walking distance of the Rijksmuseum, Van Gogh Museum and MOCO is brilliant. Located within the old canal belt, right in the Arts&Antiques District. Charming Apartment with typical Amsterdam steep canal house stairs. Features a private kitchen and bathroom with a walk-in shower.

name: Home away from home - A'dam South
description: From the chique Beethovenstraat & trendy Cornelis Schuytstraat, A'dam South is overflowing with nice areas. Looking for more fun? The centre is a 10m drive by tram. Look forward to welcome you in my apartment and share my favorite hidden gems.

name: Luxurious spacious apt -Amsterdam city centre -2BR
description:
Centrally located, nicely decorated and large apartment, within 10mins from central station. With 130m2 it can host 4 people (we have a babybed if needed) Strictly no more than 4 and no parties.

The apartment has a sunny garden, balcony and own entrance.

There is a luxury bathroom with bath and separate shower/toilet.

The 2 bedrooms contain 1 kingsize, 1 double bed and office space.

The kitchen has all amenities. Towels and bedlinnen included.

We have two cats who love a bowl of food.

name: Stylish Riverfront Aparment with Stunning Views
description:
Comfortable and spacious 50m2 mezzanine apartment with wonderful views to the river. It has 2 bedrooms, a bathroom, a living/dining room and a fully equipped kitchen. The perfect stay in Amsterdam.

The apartments have 2 double beds, except for one that has 2 single beds. Subject to availability.

Max. capacity: 5 people (sofa bed for 1 guest)

For stays of 7 nights or more, there is weekly housekeeping. Additional cleaning services can be booked at an extra cost. Bed linen & towels included.

name: ★★★ NEW: FAMILY-FRIENDLY APARTMENT + GARDEN ★★★
description:
Make your stay in Amsterdam memorable by staying in this brand new apartment with a (shared) garden.

The two bedrooms, bathroom, toilet, dining and lounging area (sofa which can also transform into a bed) are fully private. The garden is shared with our family.

You will enter the apartment through a separate (own) entrance through the garden.

Located in upscale and safe neighborhood Amsterdam Old-South, next to Amsterdam forest - with easy and direct public transport into the city center.

name: Family apartment, large terrace.
description:
Only suitable for - couples or family with 2 kids.

We love food so the kitchen is well-equipped. The kids can play on the large terrace that is connected to a gated square.. There is a parking garage underneath the house where you can park your car. Within 15 min you are in the Jordaan but there are also several nice parks and restaurants around the corner.

name: villadepijp + free bicycles
description:
A very bright room with a bathroom and little pantry on the groundfloor with its own entrance.
In a part of town known as "the Pijp". A neighborhood with bars and restaurants from all nationalities.
The apartment is about 35 sqm with a kingsize bed or two single beds.
The kitchenette is equipped with a nespressomachine, watercooker, and toaster.

name: Urban jungle apartment with private garden
description:
The house of 80 m2 is located on a quiet place in the Baarsjes in Amsterdam-West. Located between Jan Evertsenstraat with supermarket, shops, coffee bars and Mercatorplein. This square includes Zurich cafe and the Beer Garden.
The house is suitable for couples, solo adventurers and business travelers.

name: Iconic apartment with fabulous view
description: No description

name: City Centre Apartment - 2nd floor
description:
The apartment is just a 10-minute walk from Central Station, in a street that is not used as a thoroughfare for traffic. So it's very quiet.

Both bedrooms have a private bathroom. A washing machine and dryer are provided.

Paid parking space available. depending on availability

possibility to rent a boat tour

Het gehele appartement is in April 2023 gerenoveerd. ** second floor apartment, no lift but the stairs are wide**

name: Bright water villa on superb location CheapParking
description: This water villa is situated at the beginning of the most beautiful canal of Amsterdam . Located in the center between the Central Station and the Jordaan. 10 min walk from the C.S. and 5 min to the Jordaan. Lovely modern water villa in the middle of the centre with everything handy.  Living room is overlooking the water, large open windows facing the canal, design interior, large dining table, three bedrooms. Many museums, shops, railway station, boat cruise on the canals, plenty of restaurants
amenities: ['Free washer – In unit', 'Private backyard – Fully fenced', 'Outdoor furniture', 'Canal view', 'Free dryer – In unit', 'Pack ’n play/Travel crib']

name: Numa | Modern Apartment with Amsterdam Canal View
description: This comfortable apartment with canal view offers 46 sqm of space. Ideal for up to four people, its double bed (160x200), sofabed (160x200), and modern bathroom with shower make this stay a perfect way to experience Amsterdam. There’s also a kitchen and a dining table, so you’ll have everything you need for maximum comfort and minimal stress.

name: Ruim en Rustig Familie Appartement in Oost
description:
A spacious apartment that is centrally located and adjacent to a quiet, beautiful park (Frankendael) with many occasions for children. The tram to the city center stops at the door and the shops are within walking distance.

The apartment has 2 bedrooms, one of which is the children's room. At the moment there is only a crib, if needed a single bed can be set up.

name: Beautiful apartment in centre
description: Beautiful and very light apartment in centre of Amsterdam. Very close to the Amstel river, Skinny Bridge, and walking distance from the canals, the famous Albert Cuyp market and Rembrandt plein (Rembrandt Square)

name: Houseboat on Amstel river, next to a park.
description:
Houseboat from 1913 turned into a modern floating apartment. 360 degree view on the river and Martin Luther King park. Quiet and safe area. Only minutes away (by foot) from Rijnstraat with supermarkets, bakeries, coffee places, boutique shops and public transport.

Located in Rivierenbuurt (in the top-3 of best neighbourhoods in Amsterdam).

The popular Pijp area is only 15 min. away by foot.

Note: pls take care of my cat: feed 1~2x a day, that's all.

name: Nice well-accessible gastsuite/studio in Amsterdam
description:
Renovated studio with all kitchen facilities and private bathroom. The studio is located in a quiet street close to the Sloterdijk Station where you can take a train to the airport 10 min or Central Station A'dam 10 min.
You can go to the supermarkt “Spar” at the Station and find some nice café’s and restaurants around : Wissenkerke, Grand Café Hermes and BRET.
A bit closer to home at only 2 minutes walking distance, you find some nice food: good Chinees restaurant and a pizzeria at the corner.

name: Canal View Apartment | Amsterdam Canal Suites
description: Make your stay even more memorable and stay in one of our canal view apartments. They give a splendid view over the authentic canals of amsterdam. You will have a gorgeous view over the Keizersgracht (Emperor Canal). This fully serviced apartment located in a 17th century canal house is one of 7 luxurious boutique apartments from Amsterdam Canal Suites. Your apartment has a lounge, bathroom, bedroom, a fully equipped kitchen and laundry facilities. The minimum stay is 7 days.

name: Studio at outstanding location
description:
Hi there,

Welcome! A small studio but at the perfect location. Just outside the usual crowdedness but very close to the city centre (30 minute walk).

Swim in the Amstel, get your cappu at Bam Boa, Hesp, Ysbreker or one of the other reknown places close by!

name: Stunning canal apartment, perfect location
description: This wonderful apartment in one of the best areas of town, De Pijp, is waiting to be your Amsterdam base. The 1890 building offers huge windows overlooking the historic Singel canal, a top location. Designer kitchen,  spacious modern living room and three great bedrooms with quality beds. The small but very well appointed balcony is the ideal place for your morning coffee or evening drinks. The apartment is spread over two floors. The ceilings are unusually high offering abundance of light.

name: Super Central Design Home
description:
Stay at the very heart of the center and enjoy the many windows with views on the city buzz!
Experience its old Amsterdam atmosphere with modern amenities such as large boxspring beds, a cosy living room with smart tv, fully equipped kitchen and fast wifi throughout the entire 100m2 home.

name: Amsterdam townhouse with garden in city center
description:
Welcome to our beautiful home in the heart of Amsterdam! Located in the charming and vibrant Staatsliedenbuurt neighborhood close to the Jordaan.
As you step inside our home, you'll be immediately struck by the warm and welcoming atmosphere. The house is full of light and features an open-plan layout, sunny garden, kitchen and 3 bedrooms. All in all, our home is the perfect choice for anyone looking for a comfortable and convenient base while exploring Amsterdam. We can't wait to welcome you!

description: Unique opportunity to stay in a 2BR/2B stylish designer canal view apartment in the middle of the historic center; everything walking distance!  Quiet, spacious, luxurious and comfortable. Featured in international design magazines.

name: Amstel Nest - an urban retreat for two
description:
Amstel Nest is a stylish guest room for those who are looking for a quality accommodation.

Located in the neighborhood of the Amstel river, adjacent to the popular district de Pijp, you can easily taste the authentic Amsterdam life and enjoy the great connectivity.

name: Apt. near Vondelpark and Schiphol
description:
A neat, cosy and spacious apartment close to the Vondelpark, Schiphol and tram 2.
Within the close vicinity to a supermarket, several busses/trams, bike rental, cafés & restaurants this apartment is a perfect gem on the outskirts of the city centre

name: 3 bedroom design apartment in Amsterdam Zuid
description:
Our recently renovated ground-floor apartment is within walking distance to de Pijp, Herengracht, RAI and Amstelriver. Our fully equipped family home offers 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, a spacious living kitchen and separate living room (with TV). While our home is in a quiet street, plenty of restaurants, shops and bars are around the corner. Public transport connects you to all main stations and highlights of Amsterdam.
The garden is great for sunny days.
We have plenty of toys for small kids.

name: Entire rental unit with garden. Centrally located.
description:
Beautiful, centrally located accommodation with a lovely garden.
Everything your heart desires few minutes walk from the location, yet you have peace, space and comfort at home.
Nice shopping streets, cafes, restaurants, museums, the Vondelpark and the canals, everything is close by.
A walk along the Amstel to the mill, but also the lively Pijp and the beautiful canal belt, everything at your fingertips. Nothing better than coming home to this large, comfortable home after an Amsterdam day out!

name: J+R Fabulous Apartment in the Heart of Amsterdam
description:
It can't be more central! Light modern spacious appartment with two bedrooms and roof terrace. This amazing place is all you need to have great time in Amsterdam!

Please NOTE: Apartment located on 3d floor and as most apartment buildings and houses in Central Amsterdam our building DOES NOT have an elevator.

name: Fijne gezinswoning!
description: Fun with the whole family in this stylish space. Nice spacious living space with 3 bedrooms. A lovely playroom next to a sitting area where you can chill out and read undisturbed. A good base to explore the city from here, but also to discover nature and the sea next to the city. The house is in a quiet neighborhood with good amenities.

name: Designed Penthouse, Amsterdam city center
description:
Modern-designed penthouse apartment with rooftop terrace in quiet neighbourhood De Baarsjes on westside of Amsterdam.
30 mins to Amsterdam Schiphol airport. 2 Mins walk to bus/tram stops. Direct transport within 15 mins to city center and all famous tourist resorts, Amsterdam Center, Amsterdam Sloterdijk etc. train stations.

name: Apartment @De Wittenkade
description:
Welcome at De Wittenkade!

Our renovated apartment has modern furniture and brand new bedding. Our house is situated on a canal with typical Amsterdam houseboats.
Located in popular Westerpark/Jordaan with cozy restaurants and grocery stores within a few steps, and a 15-20 minute walk from Amsterdam Central Station. The appt is suitable for a couple, or business travelers.

The apartment is a private part of our house, has your own entrance and is located on the second floor (2 stairs up).

name: Cozy Apartment in Amsterdam
description:
Welcome to our beautiful apartment in Amsterdam East! This cozy accommodation offers the perfect getaway during your stay.

This apartment is in the popular neighborhood Amsterdam Oost. From hip bars and restaurants to local markets and parks, this area offers a lot of different experiences. The city center is easily reachable from here via public transport (or by bike of course).

Come and stay in this beautiful apartment and explore the beauty of Amsterdam from a truly unique perspective!

name: Captain's House
description:
Neat and Clean, two floor apartment in historic building (1652), central located in a quiet pedestrian street.

Very central and so easy to reach and to explore from, in a quiet pocket of the the heart of the old center.

Apartment is plug and play with all you might need, orientation tour is included (where to do groceries, eat and where not and other information you might need over the city etc.)

I do not take groups in their 20ties or anybody coming for partying/festivals.

name: Cozy apartment in "De Pijp" with a lovely garden.
description:
This apartment is located in a great location in the popular " De Pijp" district this is a living cozy area. With many nice restaurants, bars and shops.

The metro station is 5 minutes walking distance and the center can be reached very quickly. But most of the city's highlights are within walking distance such as the; Rijksmuseum, Van Gogh, Heineken Experience.

name: Cosy Loft in Amsterdam City Centre
description: Great Loft right in the heart of Amsterdam foot steps away from Leidseplein, the newly renovated Rijksmuseum, Van Gogh Museum, restaurants and Amsterdams best shopping streets!

name: Charming apt with beautiful garden @ de Pijp
description: Your family will be close to everything when you stay at this centrally-located place. In this ground floor apartment you can enjoy having your meals in our beautiful and quiet garden after a day in the busy city.

name: Beautifull home Amsterdam

Located in a nice neighborhood with supermarket nearby and good bus connection to the rest of the city. The house has just been renovated and furnished with new furniture and kitchen. In the garden there is a great place for children to play safely or light the BBQ.

name: Cozy family home in Amsterdam
description:
Welcome to our cozy ground-floor apartment with garden located in the beautiful area of Amsterdam East alongside the Amstel river with easy access to all that the city has to offer.

Enjoy your stay with all essentials covered. Our bright living room, newly renovated fully equipped kitchen and comfy bedrooms make it an amazing spot to unwind. There’s a private garden to enjoy some fresh air. The bathroom is perfect for some relaxation. We’ve got everything you need for a comfortable stay!

name: Mooi gezinsappartement Amsterdam

name: Lovely place in Old-West
description: Take a break and unwind at this peaceful oasis. The place is a minute away from the most iconic Amsterdam area: Jordaan, where you can enjoy beautiful canal walks and delicious restaurants.

name: Big apartment near de Pijp / RAI
description: Apartment on the 3rd floor, with roof terrace and air con. Three bedrooms (one double, two singles) sleeps 4 people comfortably. A few minutes walk to the Europaplein (RAI) subway station, straight to the center and Dam square in only 10 minutes. Close to cute restaurants and cafe’s around the corner. De Pijp full of restaurants and bars, and the iconic Albert Cuypmarket, is at only 15 minutes walking distance. Located in a quiet, family-oriented street, near the most beautiful Beatrix park

name: Sunny Retreat by the Lake.
description: Experience tranquility in our and sunny apartment 75m2, located in the lush, green area of Amsterdam. The apartment is uniquely divided into two parts, offering flexibility and privacy. One half is a cozy studio. It features its own bathroom with toilet and a shower cabin. The other half is a larger unit, complete with a comfortable sleeping room, a spacious living room connected to a kitchen, and a balcony where you can relax. There is also a large bathroom with a bathtub and a toilet.

name: Charming appartment in vibrant De Pijp
description: This cozy appartment is located in the heart of the Pijp, the most vibrant and popular neighbourhood of Amsterdam, with the best bars and restaurants just a 2 minute walk away (Gerard Douplein). Around the corner you will find the famous Albert Cuyp market, and the Museumplein is just a 10 minute walk. A great location, the big attractions closeby, an atmospheric street, but also tranquility!

name: Centrum Amsterdam Appartement
description: Charming apartment in the lively Frans Halsbuurt, De Pijp. Walking distance to Leidseplein and Museumplein, ideal for exploring Amsterdam. The apartment has 2 spacious bedrooms, a modern bathroom, separate toilet, and a cozy living room with flat-screen TV. The fully equipped kitchen offers an oven, microwave and all other necessities. Washing machine, dryer, air conditioning and wifi are provided for extra comfort. Perfect for a relaxed stay in the heart of the city!

name: Cute place in populair area!
description:
A peaceful gem in the populair area of Amsterdam! The neighbourhood is called old-west and it's full of cafe's, restaurants and cute shopping streets. It's a 5 min bike ride from the Jordaan and the canals. And the tram stops right next to the house which takes you there in less than 3 minutes. The Vondelpark is just 5 minutes walk from the apartment, the most famous park in Amsterdam. It's super central, but in a quiet street!

Keep it simple at this peaceful and centrally-located place.

name: Udoban stan u mirnom kraju.
description: The apartment is located in a quiet area, close to shopping and WTC business centa. The tram stop is a 3-minute walk away and the metro line is 7 minutes away. This ride takes you to the city center in 15 minutes. The metro station is also reached by train from Schiphol Airport in 10 minutes. For nature lovers and bike rides, there is a lake and an Amsterdam forest nearby. Enjoy.

name: Wonderful and spacious apartment
description:
You'll have a great time at this comfortable place to stay.
With 2 separate bedrooms, large kitchen and living room and a roof terrace!

The houseboat is 164m2 in total, with 47m2 set aside just for you. Living on a houseboat is such a unique and exciting experience, giving you the chance to live like a local and truly immerse yourself in the city. I highly recommend giving it a try!

description: Relax and make yourself at home in this spacious and serene apartment in Amsterdam West. The open plan living space has natural light coming in from both sides. A fully equipped country-styled kitchen has everything you need. The master bedroom opens up to a sunny patio. A separate bathroom and toilet, office, and washer/dryer complete the apartment - perfect for longer stays. A private rooftop provide panoramic views, and the prime location offers easy access to cafes and cultural attractions.

Because the calm, village-like qualities of this part of the city, it’s one of the most wanted and appreciated living areas with the nicest restaurants, bars, musea and best shopping area in walking distance. The apartment is fully equipped for a short or longer stay and is perfect for business or holiday travels.

name: Knusse loft.

Located just 10 minutes from the city center and the bustling De Pijp district, you will enjoy a central location with metro and train stations around the corner. Ideal for exploring Amsterdam!

Nearby you can find plenty of restaurants to dine in and some cafes, pizzerias, public transport is well located (1 min to catch a tram #14 to the Central Station). 10 min walk to the metro at Weesperplein. Our neighbours are the Botanical Garden and the popular Zoo Artis.

The famous Dam square is just a 10 min walk. Everywhere you will want to go in Amsterdam is within walking distance of this perfectly located apartment.

Stroll over to the vibrant Vondelpark in 15 minutes or discover some of the cozy cafe's and restaurants in the immediate vicinity.
You will have 2 bicycles to explore the rest of the city the Dutch way.

If the weather is good, you'll eat breakfast on a small patio enjoying this freedom in the middle of the bustling tourist life of the capital. The apartment is bright by day, atmospheric at night. The interior and furnishing have been completely redone in April 2022. With its separate study/office and excellent WiFi, this apartment is also very suitable as a work-away-from-home option.

Enjoy the fireplace in winter, sit out on the south facing terrace all day in summer. Comfortable designer couch. Airconditioning. Close to museums, shops and restaurants. Rijksmuseum is just a five minute walk and the Utrechtsestraat is fantastic for shopping. Last but not least: Luxury orthopedic bedding. You will sleep like a baby!

Nice and bright apartment located in a trendy neighbourhood in the South of Amsterdam. It has a spacious large sunny garden and there is a double bed in the bedroom.
There is a bathroom with a bath (incl. television) and a separate shower.

The perfect base to explore the nicest area of the city; check out all the coffee bars, taverns and nicest shops. If the weather is good, you'll enjoy the private and spacious garden. It's a great apartment where you can relax after a long day of sightseeing.

description:
Welcome to my cozy haven in Amsterdam-West!

Open plan living area with a fully equipped kitchen, a couch to melt on, big screen TV, and a digital piano, cozy window nooks to enjoy your coffee with a view.

Bathroom featuring a walk-in shower and a bathtub.

Big sunny balcony and a rooftop terrace with bbq

name: Historic canal-side apartment in Central Amsterdam
description: Two bedrooms, each with its own full-bathroom, Amsterdam canal apartment in a historic monument building dating back to the 1500's, enjoying breathtaking views over one of Amsterdam's oldest and most beautiful canals. The apartment is in Amsterdam's coolest, most interesting and vibrant neighbourhood and combines historic architecture and inspired design.

name: Renovated spacious apartment with home office
description:
This recently renovated apartment (90m2) has a spacious layout. The two front rooms consist of a quiet home office with street view and a large living room with an incredibly comfortable sofa. The backside of the apartment has direct access to the balcony and covers the bedroom (Auping mattresses) and the diner room with modern kitchen (Bosch).

Nearby are three parks, famous canals, many boutique stores, delicious delis, and Dam Square is just 10min away (by tramline or Dutch-style bicycle).

name: Gem of De Wetering
description: Welcome to this beautiful Amsterdam corner apartment with lots of natural light and modern amenities, including a 6-burner gas stove, extractor hood, dishwasher and fridge. On the second floor there are two luxurious bedrooms with private bathrooms and custom fitted wardrobes. Enjoy historical charm and modern comfort in the quiet Wetering district, within walking distance of Vijzelstraat metro station and several museums, as well as the bustling Leidseplein and Museumplein.

name: Cosy, colorful appartment (pijp)
description:
A cosy two-floor appartement in the heart of Amsterdam. It is a sunny, bright, colourful appartement with a spacious livingroom and a cosy balcony (with sun most of the day!). The location is super central, so a perfect homebase to explore the city!
I have a spacious living room, a bedroom with a balcony, a kitchen, a toilets and a bathroom. The appartment will be an ideal place for a single or couple (or maybe three people, if you are willing to sleep on an air mattress ;))

name: Spacious Artistic Living in the Heart of Amsterdam
description:
Come and stay in a beautiful, artistic apartment in the heart of old Amsterdam - the Jordaan neighborhood.

You will be close to the action but enjoy quiet in the apartment. It's only a 400m walk to Anne Frank House and the canals, 15 mins to Dam Square and many fantastic bars and restaurants within meters.

With a large open plan kitchen and dining plus living room, it is perfectly suited for enjoying the Amsterdam way of life.

Living room with brand new kitchen, a cozy corner sofa, and smart TV. One bedroom offers a kingsize bed, and the other is furnished with a sofa bed, an adjustable desk and comfy office chair.

For a perfect stay in Amsterdam!

In 5-10 minutes walking distance you are at Central Station, can visit the Anne Frank House or the Nine Streets with its famous boutique shops.

description:
More than 100 year old traditional dutch sailing ship (refurbished in 1998 ;-) with cosy mess room, 5 cabins for max. 16 guests, 2 showers and toilets and central heating... about 20 minutes to go from Central Station (about 10 minutes by bus).
To book the ship in Amsterdam is only possible in combination with a sailing trip of at least one day - a unique experience for you and your group. The trip is included in the price. Ask for the possibilities.
NO GROUPS FOR PARTIES OR NIGHTLIFE!

name: Luxury apartment near the Amstel
description:
Welcome to our newly renovated design apartment nestled in the charming Pijp neighborhood of Amsterdam, just a stone's throw away from the serene Amstel river. This space combines design and comfort to offer you a pleasant stay in one of the city's most loved areas.

Discover the vibrant Pijp neighborhood, known for its lively atmosphere, boutique shops, and cafes. The Amstel river, just a short stroll away, offers an idyllic setting for walks or bike rides.

name: Bright Apartment close to City Center
description: This newly renovated house (2023) is located in the lively and charming Amsterdam-West. In Amsterdam-West you will experience the real 'Amsterdam vibe', with old bars/cafe's, little shops and locals. Public transportation is excellent, several the tram-lines stops in front of the door will take you through the entire city. Within 10 minutes you will be in the center, e.g. Leidseplein, Museums, Dam, Spui, Central Station, Canals and Anne Frank house. There is a supermarket in front of the house.

name: NEW! Modern Gallery loft apartment
description:
Our Gallery Loft with mondern chique styling is located around the corner of the Nieuwmarkt at 3 minutes by foot from the City Centre and all it's hotspots!

The front of our house is made from thick glass and Iron to give it an industrial look and we just planted plants to cover the outside bars to create a cool intriguing mix. We have meters high curtains, a full equiped kitchen, dining area, working desk, TV's, two bathrooms and a loft bedroom area with walk-in closet

Come and have a look!
