name: Charming park retreat in vibrant Amsterdam West
description:
Welcome to a vibrant part of Amsterdam, and relax in my charming apartment including a jacuzzi. The street and surrounding area is green and quiet. The Rembrandtpark and Vondelpark offer you a beautiful area to stroll in and take you directly into the city centre. Of course you can also stay in West and enjoy all the café's, restaurants, and nightlife it presents.

A wonderful space in which to enjoy your stay, in all the style and calm of real Amsterdam!

name: Unique private loft appartment in the center
description:
The appartment is situated in the very popular Oosterpark neighbourhood.
It is very close to city center, only 15 min walk to the shopping area, famous Rembrandtplein and Leidseplein.
Metro and tram are at the end of the street, as well as the beautiful Oosterpark. In the neighbourhood you find all sorts of great bars and restaurants.

The appartment is very open and spacious with everything you need to for a great stay. It is on the fourth floor so you need to be able to walk the stairs.

name: Moderne flat in Amsterdam-West
description: Relax and unwind in this peaceful, stylish apartment. Everything is available for a comfortable private stay, such as a nice rain shower and a fully equipped kitchen. The apartment is located in a cozy residential neighborhood, where children play on the street and there are also pubs on every corner. Easily reach the airport Schiphol and the Amsterdam city center,  by public transport (metro, tram, bus) or by the autoring-A10.

name: Great apartment Amsterdam South!
description: Beautiful apartment close to the centre of Amsterdam. A quiet area of Amsterdam south. This apartment is clean and very light. 2 minutes from Vondelpark. By tram or bike in 10 minutes in the centre of Amsterdam.

name: Budget Twin Studio + External Private Bathroom
description:
Are you looking for a colorful, fully furnished and bright studio with private bathrooms and kitchenette then don't look any further! All our Budget Twin Studios have an amazing piece of street art on the wall, are equipped with two comfortable twin beds, a kitchenette, a flat screen screen TV and an external, private bathroom.

All our guests are welcomed as our friends and we will do anything to help you to make the most out of your Amsterdam experience with excellent recommendations.

name: Private studio on houseboat close to city center
description:
Characteristic houseboat on the river Amstel, private and with a wonderful view from the deck. Close to the city centre and all kind of public transport nearby. Several hotspots, like the Rijksmuseum and Heineken Brewery, just a short walk away.
We're happy to supply you with tips for sightseeing, café's, restaurants etc.
Private boat tour through the canals or down the river can be arranged.
I would like to welcome you in my special B&B. A cool drink is ready for you. Hope to see you soon!

name: Cosy apartment Amsterdam South
description:
At 15 minutes drive from Schiphol Airport and a 3-minute drive from Amsterdam Zuid train station, our apartment is very easy to reach. The apartment is in a very quiet neighborhood with little traffic.

In addition, you are in the center with public transportation (tram).

name: Great Apartment in Finest Area
description: Welcome to my stylish 1-bedroom in Amsterdam's Jordaan! Enjoy modern comforts like high-speed Wi-Fi, a fully-equipped kitchen, and a workspace with a large screen. Despite being on a popular street filled with bars and restaurants, my first-floor apartment is a quiet haven. A supermarket is just steps away, and a local market sets up in front of the house on Mondays and Saturdays. Stairs only, no smoking.

name: Cosy Amstel guestroom free bicycles and parking.
description: Very nice cosy and private room for 1/2/3  persons and 4 if really needed.+/_ 22 square meter. Free parking and free bike's, with terms of use. Distance to centre by bike 15 minutes public transport 15 minutes walk. Comfortable 2p bed and also a 1p bed. Enjoy the fire of the pelletstove in winter! Enjoy the garden in summer.  We don't want people who use drugs. Normal smoking is only allowed in the garden.    Please send us a message if you need more information. We are pleased to answer!

name: Cityden | Studio XL | Aparthotel
description:
Cityden BoLo District is a unique 4-star aparthotel and offers 120 fully equipped Apartments, Penthouses and Studios + all the needed hotel facilities: gym, minimart, restaurant with outside terrace and bar.

The diversity of the neighbourhood breathes young and old, endless creativity, smells and colours with a matching range of shops. BoLo (Bos en Lommer) is an inspiring district in Amsterdam-West, The SoHo of Amsterdam.

name: Exclusive: The Hermitage Houseboat, City Center
description: Our boat is docked in the most beautiful and central part of Amsterdam, on the Amstel River, right in front of the Hermitage Museum. It's just a three-minute walk from Rembrandt Square, one of the city's most famous squares, and five minutes from Nieuwmarkt, a hotspot for nightlife, restaurants, and the famous Red Light District. The captain’s hut features a bar with views of the iconic Skinny Bridge, which lights up beautifully at night, making this a truly magical place.

name: Prachtig appartement niet ver van het centrum.
description: Beautifully furnished apartment available on the days I am not present. The apartment is in a nice location. Within 20 minutes by public transportation, you're in the center. Public transport and local supermarkets are within walking distance. Ideally located for visiting the Johan Cruijff ArenA, Ziggo Dome and AFAs live. In addition, the apartment has all the comforts. A spacious balcony, washing machine, Wi-Fi, kitchen equipment. Any transfers are negotiable.

The apartment of 100 m2 is equipped with a luxury open kitchen (incl. all necessities), with 2 bedrooms and a sunny balcony. The apartment is stylish and modernly furnished, and the office space offers the possibility for a 3rd bedroom.

The house is located in the popular district de Baarsjes, with many coffee shops, restaurants, shops and public transport within walking distance.

description: A modern, well-equipped studio situated in the buzzing Spaarndammer neighbourhood with the beautiful canals of Amsterdam at only a 5-minute walk. The studio also offers free access to a shared gym, a common area and roof terrace. Public transport is right around the corner as are supermarkets, bakeries, shops and a bike rental. Enjoy a nice lunch or a tasty diner in- or outside one of the modern cafes and restaurants. Visit all the famous places or just stroll around. You'll love it!

name: Cosy apartment in the heart of Amsterdam
description:
Enjoy this clean and cosy apartment, located right on famous Albert Cuyp market. Main city attractions are at a walking distance. The metro (10min walk) and tram (2 min walk) take you to the central train station.

Apartment is 42sq meter and feels spacious and light thanks to 3m ceiling and large windows. There is 1 bedroom (bed 160x200cm), 1 bathroom and open kitchen in living room with a comfy couch.

Fun fact about this place: The famous Dutch painter Piet Mondrian lived in this building.

name: Delightful 2 bedrooms houseboat in Amsterdam-Pijp
description:
This memorable place is anything but ordinary. Within walking distance of the Pijp, the Martin Luther King park (known for the Parade) and the pleasant shopping streets such as the Rijnstraat, Maasstraat and Scheldestraat with numerous boutiques, delis and eateries.
You can reach the center of Amsterdam in less then 10 minutes by bike.

name: Contemporary and secluded gem in Amsterdam
description:
It's located just a short tram ride away from the city center, and it's surrounded by lush green surroundings.
This 3-story contemporary home is the perfect place to relax and unwind after a day of exploring the city.

The house has been recently renovated, and it's decorated with stylish design furniture and artworks. The living room and kitchen are light and open spaces. There is a sunny terrace with a table, benches, and chairs, as well as a hammock where you can relax.

Spread across 58 square meters, the apartment offers a cozy living and dining area, a comfortable bedroom and you can cook a meal in the well-equipped kitchen.

description: Stay in a three-dimensional Mondriaan painting on top of a canal! A true icon in the middle of Amsterdam Centre, perfect for lovers of architecture and design, located in between quaint 17th-century canal houses and Amsterdam’s historic botanical garden ‘Hortus Botanicus’. The white cubical structure with its black, blue and yellow details reminisces of De Stijl and the famous Dutch architect and designer Gerrit Rietveld. Free entrance to Hortus Botanicus included!

name: Cosy, central located apartment
description: Just take a break in this centrally located but quiet accommodation. Our house has all the amenities and is well suited as a starting point for discovering Amsterdam. A cozy place and in our own personal style in the middle of Amsterdam.

description: Beautifully styled B&B in historic townhouse near river Amstel. A quiet get-away in Amsterdam's vibrant top neighbourhood 'De Pijp'. Excellent restaurants, breakfast spots, trendy bars, design shops and the daily market are all around the corner. The museums and canals are in walking distance. We love to wellcome you personally.

name: Apartment in the lovely Pijp area
description: +++ Location! This lovely apartment with balcony is the perfect base for your trip to Amsterdam. Located in the middle of the popular area the Pijp. It's situated around the corner of Museum square and you can walk into the heart of the city in a matter of minutes. There is also a metro stop around the corner. Easy access to the RAI convention center. The neighborhood is filled with great restaurants, coffee places and concept stores. The Albert Cuyp market is also around the corner.

name: Historic garage loft with private garden
description: In the heart of The Pijp district and only 5 minutes from museum square. The entire apartment of 92 square meter is completely renovated and has a modern and stylish interior and nice cosy garden for a drink. The apartment is located in a quiet street with the bedroom in the back of the apartment for a good night sleep. Further more a a separate tv room and office are to relax or work. Feel free to reach out for any questions.

description:
Beautiful apartment in a quiet street, close to the Amsterdam canals and the bustling district of West.

The apartment is in a quiet location, but the highlights of Amsterdam West are nearby, such as the Ten Katemarkt and the Filmhallen. By public transport, you'll be at the other highlights of the city in no time.

Within a few minutes walking distance you are in the Erasmuspark and around the corner are countless nice bars and restaurants.

When you are at our home we want you to feel at home and enjoy yourself to the fullest- if there is anything we can do prior or during your stay to make it more comfortable, we will do our very best! Please let us know if you have any further questions.

Our 2-bedroom apartment is located on a quiet street (10-15 minutes bike or 20 min tram ride from the center of Amsterdam!), in a diverse, young, and vital neighborhood. Grocers, supermarkets, bakeries/cafes, and great affordable restaurants and bars can be found just around the corner. Easy to get to and from with public transportation.
You will be staying in a well-lit bedroom (see pictures) with a view of the garden.

description: Welcome to the most charming neighborhood of the city  "the nine little streets".  This is the perfect location to enjoy the many shops, bars and restaurants this neighborhood has to offer. With two cozy bedrooms, a modern bathroom, a roof terrace with an unreal view, and all the well-known sights within walking distance. This apartment ideal for a group of up to 4 people who are looking for an unforgettable stay in Amsterdam.

name: Fantastic Family City Home

A double bed, private bathroom and an opened kitchenette with microwave, fridge, kettle, toaster and a coffee machine.
Close to all main attractions but at the same time in very quite area, called Jordaan. There are many restaurants and cafes closed by and 2 of the biggest supermarkets are just 4 min. walking distance. Live your experience like a local!

Come to feel the Dutch spirit in our bright and spacious duplex apartment (125m2). The flat has 2 bedrooms, 2 bathroom + 1 kids bedroom, many windows and all facilities (fully equipped kitchen, hair dryer, iron and TV with foreign channels and Netflix).

This tasteful and pleasantly designed apartment with spacious roof terrace has approximately 125 m2 of living space and is located on the third and fourth floor of a Monumental building (built in 1906) with stately entrance.

The house is full of plants and is right next to Amsterdamse Bos, a really special place with a huge lake which is great for cold dips (Wim Hof eat your heart out). Easy to cycle or public transport to Central Amsterdam.

It is located in a monumental house from 1750.  Free wifi is available. Main tram and metro stops are only two minutes walking away. Dam square is just around the corner.

Its location makes the apartment extra attractive, near Westerpark, where every first Sunday of the month is market, the Jordaan and the center can be reached in 5-10 minutes by bike. The apartment is located in the quiet and popular Staatsliedenbuurt around the corner of a large park. We like to give you unique tips, which will help you get to know Amsterdam at its best!

Comfortable studio on ground floor in the Westside area of Amsterdam Centre.

5 minutes walk from the well known Westerpark area. shopping facilities nearby: supermarket, bakery et cetera. Near tramline 5 stop.
Everything you need is in the apartment to make your stay comfortable: kitchen, shower and toilet.
Comfortable double bed, size 180x200 cm.
Plenty of cupboard space when needed.

Wifi included.

Not intended for party people. Respect the neighbors

name: Spacious Serviced Apartment with River View
description:
Large & spacious 75m2 apartment. Two double bedrooms and one twin bedroom, two bathrooms, a living-dining room and fully equipped kitchen. Located near Amsterdam Central Station. The apartment has no balcony, but it has nice views of the IJ river that will let your imagination run free.

Total sleeping capacity: 7 people (sofa bed for 1 guest)

For stays of 7 nights or more, there is weekly housekeeping. Additional cleaning services can be booked at an extra cost. Bed linen and towels included.

The photos in the listing may differ slightly from your selected apartment.

name: Comfort Apartment next to Central Station
description:
Ideal, 55m2 apartment. It has 2 double bedrooms for get-aways with family or friends, a living-dining room, a bathroom and a fully equipped kitchen.

Maximum capacity: 6 people (sofa bed for 2 guest)

For stays of 7 nights or more, there is weekly housekeeping. Additional cleaning services can be booked at an extra cost. Bed linen and towels included.

name: Cosy houseboat ZIJP city center
description: Have you ever wanted to stay on a cosy Dutch boat right near the canals of Amsterdam? This is your perfect chance to experience Amsterdam on the water. Enjoy the small yet comfortable pleasure boat in this picturesque and quiet location in the middle of the famous Jordaan district. An amazing glamping experience on the water!

name: Light and Spacious  family Apartment Amsterdam
description:
*NEW*
Welcome to our family-friendly loft close to the heart of Amsterdam! In the hip and 'upcoming' Amsterdam- North.

Our lovely, spacious and bright 2-bedroom apartment is within walking distance of Amsterdam Central Station. Your family will be close to everything when you stay at this centrally-located place.

An ideal accommodation for a family with 2 (small) children but also very suitable for 2 max. 3 adults.

name: Aparthotel North, Cozy Studio With Patio For 2
description:
Discover Aparthotel North, steps from Adam Tower in vibrant Amsterdam. Strategically located, just 2.1 km from A'DAM Lookout and 5 km from Rembrandt House. Explore landmarks like Basilica of St. Nicholas, Dam Square, and Museum Ons' Lieve Heer op Solder, all within 7 km.

Unwind in modern comfort with amenities like flat-screen TV, microwave, kettle, and coffee maker. Immerse yourself in the city's charm in our smoke-free units. Book now for an unforgettable Amsterdam experience!

name: Saint Claire 3
description:
Saint Claire is located in one of the smallest streets and in one of the oldest neighborhoods, while still in the middle of the centre (only 5 minutes walk from Dam Square). When you spend some nights here, you will feel the atmosphere of the real Amsterdam.
The Studio itself has been finished very cozy, it is perfect for two people wanting to explore Amsterdam. You will be able to use a kitchenette and your own bathroom. The pictures will speak for themselves!
Hope to welcome you here!

name: Room Charlotte (not for parties)
description:
10 square meters bedroom, in my apartment located in the 'Leidseplein' area. No breakfast served.
The museums are at walking distance and my house is located right next to the canals.
The bathroom is shared, there is no kitchen available and pets are not allowed.
Please note that i live in the apartment too, so is very important that you are mindful and respectful of others.
No party allowed, please if you wanna have a house party, this is not the place.

name: Perfectly located, clean and cosy apartment
description:
This beautiful apartment can be yours for a few weeks! The apartment is located in Amsterdam West, only a few minutes from Station Sloterdijk.
Next to a nice neighbourhood the apartment is very light and comfortable.

You will find a supermarket next to the apartment, it's only a 2 minute walk.

Public transportation stops right in front of the apartment. Amsterdam West also knows a lot of trendy restaurants and bars, it's possible to walk. Perfectly located to explore the city!

name: Fijn, sfeervol, recent gerenoveerd appartement
description: In this very recently renovated apartment, with garden in the sun, you can relax. A nice space in a pleasant, cozy neighborhood in Amsterdam West. Located between the Erasmuspark and Westerpark, enough greenery in the neighborhood. In addition to the greenery, there are also many nice bars and restaurants within walking distance. At Bos en Lommerweg you will find everything you need in shops. With 15 minutes cycling you are in the heart of the center of Amsterdam, with 5 minutes cycling in the cozy old west.
amenities: ['Outdoor furniture', 'Blender', 'Free dryer – In unit', 'Board games', 'Outdoor dining area']

name: Green and spacious apartment in Amsterdam West
description:
Spacious apartment with a comfortable location and layout. Kitchen for home cooking and a living room with an eating and lounging space.
100m from the entrance of Westerpark, nearby the shopping area of Bos en Lommerweg as well as Jan van Galenstraat. Other parks nearby include Rembrandtpark, Erasmuspark and slightly further is Vondelpark. It is less than 10 minutes from the city center by bicycle, tram or bus, and is 5 minutes from Sloterdijk train station, which connects you to Schiphol.

name: Spacious rooftop apartment close to Westerpark
description:
Welcome to our beloved apartment! It is spacious, bright and cozy; all you need for an amazing stay in Amsterdam.

It is located in the Westerpark area, a 10 minute walk from the Jordaan, where you can find hip cafés, bars, restaurants. After a day of being out and about, returning here will be like a safe haven. There is a roof terrace where you can stretch your legs and enjoy the sunset.

Central station can easily be reached by bus within 10 minutes.

name: Cosy and comfy apartment for couples.
description:
The entrance of the apartment is at the second floor. When you open the door you will see a cozy and light living room. The two big windows will allow the daylight to come in and the fully equipped kitchen has everything you might need.

The newly renovated (dec 2023) bathroom has a shower, sink and toilet. Towels are provided.

The sleeping room is separate from the living room. Behind the bed there is a balcony door which allows the morning sun to enter.

You will have a sunny-good-morning.

name: Amsterdam apartment - close to Museum Square
description:
2-person apartment, 300 meters from 'Museum Square,' known for its various major museums such as the 'Rijksmuseum,' 'Van Gogh Museum,' 'Stedelijk Museum,' and 'Concertgebouw.'

The best location in the Southern part to discover Amsterdam, with the Amsterdam center, the Eastern, and the Western parts within walking distance.

name: Vorstelijk verblijven in de bruisende Pijp?
description: Looking for a stay in a modern and characteristic apartment in the bustling Pijp with a spacious south facing balcony and a luxurious open kitchen? Then my apartment probably meets all your wishes. Because of the high ceilings (3.10 meters) with ornaments, it is royal residence. The Albert Cuyp and the North/South line are a few minutes' walk away and the apartment is surrounded by popular dining and coffee venues. A luxurious and clean stay in the best place of Amsterdam!

name: *Lovely Modern and Luxury Apartment Amsterdam*
description: This modern apartment is situated in the “Old Pipe” area.  30 meters walking distance from several tram connections. Amsterdam-Rai, the city center and the old historic museums square can be reached easily by foot. It’s located on the ground floor with the option to rent a parking space in the garage close by. The apartment boasts high speed WIFI, a wireless sound system and HD TV. The kitchen is fully equipped incl. washing machine and dryer. As owners we have put a lot of passion in this flat.

name: Nice room in Amsterdam Sloten
description:
Double room with two separate beds ( 2* single bed) very neat and modern furnishings. Television available/ internet and Netflix.

It is a new building. Modern bathroom and kitchen.

The apartment is close to all the exciting parts of Amsterdam.
Most nice sights are on walking distance, like the Red light district, The Damsquare, the canals and the central station.
Public transport stop is a 2 min walk and always nearby.

name: Nice and cosy studio in Amsterdam
description:
Nice and functional studio only 15 minutes cycling or with an uber/ public transport about 20 min from Amsterdam City Center. The studio has a modern bathroom which is fully renovated 2 months a go. The bed is 160x 200 cm. There is a TV and WIFI connection.

The studio is on the ground floor in a family friendly street. Pets are not allowed and also smoking is prohibited. Because it is a very family friendly area, partying is not allowed.

This accommodation is specially fitted for 4 people, for 2 couples or a family with 2 children. Next to the bedrooms there is 1 bathroom & separate toilet. There are no cooking facilities. A Nespresso coffee machine, tea facilities and refrigerator are at your disposal.

15 min from the city-center, on walking distance of the subway, small Shopping Mall, beautiful Park with a lake.
Also very close to the Ziggo Dome, AFAS Live Stadium and the Amsterdam Arena.
Your Apartment is fully equipped with a romantic fireplace, bathroom with a washer and dryer, Garden, two bikes and spacious kitchen with cooking Island, two TVs, free Wi-Fi and towels and bed-linen.

description:
Stay in a central, newly renovated designer studio at Amsterdam’s Weesperzijde, right on the Amstel river.
Enjoy modern luxuries: large bathtub, rain shower, high-speed WiFi (+300mbs), Sonos sound system, curved monitor for work and enjoy the sunset view from your balcony bar.
Steps from the metro( >1 min) and iconic landmarks: Albert Cuyp, De Pijp, Magere Brug.
Experience the city as a local, not a tourist, with a fully-equipped kitchen at your fingertips!

description: Hello, I would like to welcome you to my apartment. The  house is located on the water, is recently renovated and equipped with all comforts. From the apartment, you can reach the city center within 15 minutes by public transportation and within 20 minutes by train at Schiphol. Bicycles can be rented around the corner and especially remember to take a walk along the banks of the Sloterplas. Feel free to contact me if you have any other questions!

Modern Loft in Vibrant Amsterdam-North
Floor to ceiling windows, mezzanine, light and bright.
located in re-developed Buiksloterham near the NDSM previous shipyard of Amsterdam. A modern urban centre with Boho flair. Film museum, digital museum, Graffity museum and a wide offer of urban food and drink venues. Centre of Amsterdam within easy reach by Metro, Ferry, bike and bus

description:
Sunny, spacious and clean apartment in an original Dutch barge literally on the Amstel right in the city center of Amsterdam.

Sit on the deck and enjoy views of the river, curl up by the fire place or visit the many restaurants, museums and bars at walking distance. I'll be more than happy to recommend you some good spots off the beaten track.

name: BedBikeBoat
description:
The apartment is part of a houseboat which we designed & build ourselves.
The apartment has two bed-cupboards which was typical for houseboats. There is a kitchen and a bathroom with toilet. It has a terrace with a BBQ.

Its located in a quiet area in Amsterdam north.
From Central Station its 15 min by bus or 10 min by ferry (free & accessible for bikes) plus 5 min by bike. Bike rental is possible with us on request.

There is a supermarket nearby. We offer free wifi and free parking.

name: Delightful Modern Houseboat with  sunny patio
description: You'll love this unique and romantic escape. This enviromentaly friendly Houseboat is a new build with triple glazed windows, underfloor heating, heat pump and solar panels. It is wonderfully relaxing to sleep on the water, with swans and ducks passing by. The boat is south facing so you can enjoy sunshine on the terrace with eating area, bbq and sun loungers.

There are plenty of bars, restaurants and shops just around the corner. Central Station is around 4 minutes walk away.

Museums and attractions are within short walking distance.

name: Best Neighbourhood Apartment
description: Welcome to Best Neighbourhood Apartment in the heart of Amsterdam, just 500 meters from Central Station. Enjoy the breathtaking city views from our double rooms apartment, with free WiFi and parquet floors, equipped with flat-screen TVs, safe, bed linen and towels. Conveniently located near major attractions like Anna Frank House 1km, Flower Market 1.3km and Leidsplein & Rembrandtplein at 1,7km and with a tram stop at our doorstep for easy access to all the touristic destination.

name: Entire Apartment in Amsterdam
description:
This amazing apartment is located in one of the nicest areas in Amsterdam. You will be very close to all the famous Amsterdam Museum's like the Rijksmuseum, Van Gogh and others. At the same time you have on the other side the popular de pijp where you can find a variety of restaurants & cafes, local brewery/bars. It's guaranteed that you'll enjoy your time here!

Finally, in a short walking distance you have several public transport options and can reach the airport in less than 30min.

The location is pretty nearby the Amsterdam Central Station. Via public transports in the neighborhood you will arrive in 10 minutes in the center of Amsterdam or try the 24-hours free ferry (20 minuts walk from the loft).

Within 10 minutes walking you will find a shopping area with supermarkets and different kind of coffee shops and restaurants for lunch and diner.

description:

This family-friendly home features an open living space with large windows, a private balcony, and chic industrial decor. One bedroom with a double bed for adults and a second bedroom for children with a climbing wall and movie corner.

Enjoy a fully equipped modern kitchen, a fitness area, and access to a communal sauna and swimming pool.

Perfect for an unforgettable and pleasant stay in Amsterdam.

name: Colourful design apartment close to Metro station
description:
Enjoy a stylish and comfortable home base for your city trip to Amsterdam.

Conveniently located a 3-minute walk to the Noorderpark metro station, with line 52 taking you to Centraal station and other trendy neighbourhoods like Jordaan and De Pijp within minutes. The free ferry across the Ij river is a 15-minute walk away.

After a busy day exploring the city, relax in the bath tub, watch Netflix, HBO or Prime on our smart TV, or enjoy a wine on the balcony overlooking the canal.

The flat comes with a double bedroom, modern kitchen, bathroom, living room and south facing balcony.

-Recently renovated
-Third-floor apartment
-Peaceful and quiet street
-Close proximity to Erasmuspark
-Popular Bos en Lommer area with a multitude of nearby shops and amenities

The house is within the ring, bus and tram stops are around the corner and will take you to the city center and central station in no time.

Comfortable, cosy, lockable studio (like a hotel room) with comfortable queen size bed and with private bathroom, 4x glazed windows and night blackout curtains, mini fridge, Wi-Fi. Private bathroom. No kitchen. No curfew. You feel 100% privacy. No children/infants policy!!!

Ideal for up to two people, its double bed (160x200) and modern bathroom with shower make this stay a perfect way to experience Amsterdam. There’s also a kitchen, a sofa, and a dining table, so you’ll have everything you need for maximum comfort and minimal stress.

name: Bright and spacious apartment with roof terrace
description: This bright and spacious apartment (88m2) in Amsterdam-West, with a large roof terrace (18m2) and balcony, is ideal to enjoy a few days off in Amsterdam. The apartment is located on a very quiet street, but the hustle and bustle of the city is just around the corner. The Jordaan, city center and Westerpark are within 5 minutes walking distance.

Your Amsterdam Oasis Awaits!
Stay in our beautiful, light-filled apartment with two serene balconies, located in one of Amsterdam's most vibrant areas.

name: Canal View Apartment
description:
The apartment is quietly located on the Amsterdam canals close by the Brewery't IJ's Windmill, Artis Zoo, Nemo and Central Station. Also, near by countless landmarks attractions, shopping streets and night life spots.
Lots of light into the living space and a cozy balcony to enjoy the view of the canal. No traffic/no city sounds.
A shared yard at the back of the flat for quiet moments & meals.
It is fully furnished and equipped: wifi, washing machine, dryer, dish washer, central heating.

name: Fabulous city house with garden & view on park!
description:
* Families/couples only
* Cat Max is on holiday himself

In the middle of the lively area 'De Pijp' you will find this spacious, light and well decorated family house with garden. Have your coffee in the living room overlooking the park, enjoy lunch on the terraces around the corner, prepare your dinner in the well equipped kitchen and enjoy the sunny garden between 3 and 8 pm! Live a local life when on holiday!

name: Big house close to NDSM, 2 cats. Max 4 people.
description:
PLEASE NO LOUD MUSIC OR DISTURBANCE.
Because of the rules in Amsterdam no more than 4 guests.
Our house is close to the center of Amsterdam and the trendy NDSM-wharf. The house is ideal for young families, couples or small quiet groups. Besides trips to the busy center of Amsterdam, you can choose to relax around the house. The neighborhood is very kids-friendly, with a playground in front of the house. We have green small garden and relaxing bathtub. Parking is free! We have two cats.

name: Luxury City Studio Next to Canals of Amsterdam
description:
This stylish loft is located in Amsterdam Jordaan, in the middle of the old city center, and next to the museum & canal belt district. The nine streets is in a walking distance of 100 meter!

The loft is stylish, spacious & bright and has a great atmosphere! There is a fully equipped & open kitchen, a comfortable double bed, nice bathroom & shower & lounge area.

We're sure you'll have a great time in this loft with open floor plan, prepare for the trip of a lifetime!

name: Spacious house for family / friends

Modern furnishings, comfortable couch, comfortable large dining table, large wel equipped kitchen, floor heating, nice rug on the floor, enclosed garden to play, free parking in front of the door. And around the corner you can jump into the water from the bathing jetty. The sky is the limit!

It is surrounded by water and close to many hip bars and restaurants favourited by the locals.

Situated about 10 minutes by car from central, the property is well connected and a brisk 10 minute walk from the nearest public transport.

The house has been elegantly furnished with art, high quality furniture, a SONOS system on both floors, newest tv's with all international Chanels, floor heating in every room and a great rain shower.

This stylishly furnished small studio (30m2) apartment is located in the Jordaan, in the historic center of Amsterdam. Right around the corner of the Anne Frank house, the Westerkerk and the famous 9 streets. The central station is close by and many sightseeing activities, bars, restaurants and shops are all in walking distance.

The apartment with a newly renovated bathroom is on the second floor in an apartment complex with a small terrace at the entrance.

name: Prachtig licht appartement in Amsterdam Oud-West
description: A characteristic three-room apartment with everything you need. The house is centrally located in Amsterdam, 5 minutes walking distance from the Jordaan. You can be on Dam Square and Leidse square in 10 minutes. Suitable for two people (box spring), possibly a third person can be on the sofa.

name: Fijn huis in Indische buurt Amsterdam!
description: The apartment is located in the east of Amsterdam, the Indian neighborhood. The apartment has all the facilities you need, with a beautiful garden, and very close to nice restaurant, museums and the beautiful Flevopark.

name: Stylish family house in Amsterdam with big garden
description:
Are you looking for a charming, spacious home in a quiet and green area a stone's throw from Amsterdam? This beautiful detached house in picturesque Ransdorp offers you everything you wish. With five bedrooms, two bathrooms and a spacious garden of 800 M2, this is the ideal place for an one or two families.

Ransdorp is a beautiful little village which is located in the north of Amsterdam. It’s in the country side but still close to the city centre (15 mins by car, 30 mins by bike). Win-win.

name: Appartement in oud-west
description: Experience the allure of Amsterdam's Old-West district from our cozy apartment on Hugo de Grootkade. Nestled in a serene street, this retreat offers tranquility alongside convenience. Enjoy a spacious living area with a large TV and Netflix, speedy WiFi, and a fully equipped kitchen with a generous dining table. Supermarkets are a 2-minute walk away, while bars and cafes await within 5 minutes. Wake up to charming canal views, adding a touch of magic to your stay.

name: Sunny stay, 2 p, zwemsteiger, free parking 200 m
description: Enjoy the tranquility behind our house in the most beautiful street of Amsterdam-NOORD (!). The space has a combination of microwave, kettle, Nespresso, toaster, milk frother, coffee & tea and refrigerator. Free parking 200 meters away and private (!) swimming jetty. To the CITY CENTER of Amsterdam? Tip: rent bikes (can be nearby at camping Vliegenbos) and bike to ferry ‘IJveer’ or ‘Buiksloterwegveer’ (crossing takes 3 minutes). Or walk or take bus 35 (Wervershoofstraat) to subway Noorderpark.
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Family house in Amsterdam Noord
description: We are renting out our cozy one-family house in Amsterdam Noord during our own holidays abroad. We live here ourselves, and, thus, the house has everything you need (Wi-Fi, TV, dishwasher, washing machine, dryer, etc.). Because we have twin toddlers of 2,5 years, the house is especially well suited for families. One of the bedrooms is a kids room with two cribs. You can stay with up to four adults and two toddlers.

name: Spacious & Hip Split Level Home near Vondelpark
description: For Amsterdam standards our apartment is huge! A stunning 135 square meters which is divided over 3 levels. Starting in the living kitchen, which has high ceilings, great for cooking family dinners. Moving up the stairs you will find the super large living room fully equipped and with two french balconies looking out at the 200 square meter private inner yard. Ideally for hanging out and just lounging before hitting the city. Located in the old-west of Amsterdam very close to the Vondelpark.

On the ground floor you will find a tv-room with a fire place, a dining room and a new open kitchen. Our first floor has 3 bedrooms and a bathroom with a bath and a shower. children

description:
Room for one or two people with its own bathroom and toilet.
We are an education center in Amsterdam-East and rent out our comfortable bright rooms when we do not hold our own international schools and seminars. When you stay with us, you do not only get a comfortable, private room for an affordable price in Amsterdam, but also support a progressive institute organizing trainings on topics such as global justice, feminism, and LGBTQI liberation.

name: Sunny apartment with garden near de Jordaan
description:
If you are looking for a quiet neighborhood to stay, but still within walking distance from Vondelpark, the nine streets and the foodhallen, this apartment is the best choice!

A sunny apartment with all the necessities you need for a comfortable, fun stay in Amsterdam. With a large garden where you can chill and drink a coffee before you start the day. Or not, because there are soooo many nice coffee spots, bars and restaurants nearby :)

Enjoy!

- CLOSE TO AMSTERDAM CENTRAAL STATION! -

Live, eat, work, stay at Hotel Beethoven.
Located in the heart of Amsterdam Old-South: a neighborhood with a rich history of art, music, design and architecture. The neighborhood is rapidly changing from traditional and a little reserved to young, energetic, international and cosmopolitan. Our restaurant BROOKS is open for breakfast at a price of €16.50 per person, available on request.
We want to make you feel at home!

name: Studio Deluxe with private luxury  bathroom
description:
For more than 15 years we welcome guests in beautiful Amsterdam.

Enjoy from your own cosy and comfortable studio on a very central and quiet location.

It has it's own private luxury, stylish bathroom with shower, toilet and double washbasins. This means you will have complete privacy.

The luxury studio is in a typical Amsterdam house (build in 1882) that has been recently renovated.

There is a direct bus-connection from Schiphol Airport. The bus stops only 250 meters away from our house.

Enjoy the vibrant local scene with cafes, shops, and public transport nearby. Perfect for couples, solo travelers, and business visitors looking for a central and chic stay in Amsterdam.

description:
Cozy, stylish apartment (47m2) in lively Amsterdam East, a 5 minute train ride from Amsterdam Central station. Conveniently located close to train station, bus and tram stations. It has everything you need down the street: supermarkets, restaurants, gyms, shops, etc.

When not traveling myself, I normally live in the apartment, so looking for guests who respect the space. I am happy to share my favourite spots and restaurants in the city and neighborhood and always available via text for tips.

name: Stunning boat with a view - luxurious with sauna
description:
Picture a bright and comfortable houseboat with an amazing deck. Surrounded by glistening water, gently swaying in your hammock al fresco, rewinding after a day in the hustle & bustle of the city.

The top floor of our boat where you are staying (note: downstairs is inhabited) provides the perfect setting to explore and relax. Watch the sun rise on your left and set on your right, enjoy the glorious harbour views, the deck, the private sauna or just the whole house boat experience.

name: Studio met gracht zicht, ontbijt is inbegrepen.
description:
From this charming accommodation located in the `Rosse neighborhood' you can reach popular shops, restaurants and bars in no time. Just an 8-minute walk from Central Station. Paid parking is 10 minutes away.
We are happy to help our guests with their plans and provide them with all the information for a pleasant stay in our beautiful city.

Breakfast included.

name: Design studio in Noord with free parking
description:
Experience style and tranquility at our parkside B&B studio in Amsterdam's Noord.

Enjoy picturesque park views, serene ambiance, and lush greenery. Wake up to the sounds of nature and savour freshly brewed coffee in front of our house.

Conveniently close to vibrant centre of Noord with museums, cafes, restaurants, and nightlife nearby. Short stroll to metro for easy access to the entire city and all its main attractions.

Free private parking.

name: Beautiful House w. garden close to Center
description:
This house is located in the up-and-coming neighborhood of Amsterdam Noord. It’s a spacious place with a garden, located very near the center. Public transportation is excellent, several metro- an bus stops take you to the city. Within 15 minutes you’ll be in the center, where you’ll find Museums, Canals, and Anne Frank House. Or take the ferry to central station and enjoy a spectacular view of the city on your way over. There is a
supermarket within 5 minutes walking from the house.
amenities: ['Private backyard – Fully fenced', 'Outdoor furniture', 'Board games', 'Outdoor dining area', 'Baking sheet']

name: Romantic ‘Aft Cabin’ on Board of an Icebreaker
description: Please be welcome on our unique houseboat, a former East-German icebreaker, tug, pusher and fire boat built in 1954. We ourselves live in the front part, the aft cabin – the former crew bunks - we converted into a cozy little studio with a vintage feel. The wooden interior gives a warm ambience, and the acoustics are great. A beautiful, clean place to work or to rest, to relax or to make music in.

name: NEW! Authentic and Stylish Jordaan Apartment
description: This cosy and stylish apartment is located right in the heart of the famous Jordaan neighborhood at the best location you can get! It has just been professionally renovated into a stylish and luxury apartment where the space has been optimally used. Situated in a building that dates back to the 17th this authentic apartment is entirely private and ideal for couples or solo travelers who are ready to explore Amsterdam by foot as most city hot spots are within walking distance!
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Lovely spacious waterfront home with garden!
description:
Lovely detached light spacious villa on the water. Large kitchen with modern appliances, large fridge and wine cooler. Downstairs is a fireplace and a dining and sitting area with TV.

Upstairs on the first floor is a spacious master bedroom with adjoining bathroom with bath and shower. A separate toilet and laundry room with washing machine and dryer. On the 2nd floor are 3 spacious bedrooms with 2 beds each and a 2nd bathroom and separate toilet.

name: Modern studio on Amsterdam houseboat
description: A unique experience in a spacious and luxury room on houseboat Levantus. The room is equipped with a gorgeous bathroom and a comfortable bed. Enjoy a tasty yoghurt-muesli-fruit breakfast in the morning in this private and authentic space on the Eastern Docklands in Amsterdam (KNSM-Island). Close to the city centre and yet peaceful and quit. You'll have your own entrance and a nice sun deck to enjoy the view. Levantus is an original cargo ship completely renovated in 2018 to a luxury houseboat.

name: Captain Pippi; Amsterdam's finest Houseboat
description:
Captain Pippi is a 120m2 houseboat, a true Amsterdam watervilla.

Docked in Schellingwoude, a creative peaceful village in Amsterdam-North. Part of the famous Waterlands, and only a little away from the Amsterdam city center (see exact details in 'More about the location').

Get your organic food from our neighbours the Landmarkt, wake-up by a fresh dip in the natural water pool - The IJ -, see the sun set over the water. Feel like a local.

name: Spacious family home with big garden
description: Create unforgettable memories in this unique accommodation. Located just 300 meters from the beautiful Vondelpark and only 5 tram stops away from the vibrant city centre and Museumplein, you will find our spacious 175 square metre apartment with a delightful garden. Situated in a charming neighbourhood with various playgrounds, cafes and restaurants, this location offers the perfect base to explore Amsterdam and then relax afterwards in the house.

name: Comfy cozy in the midst of Amsterdam!
description:
Great location, beautiful neighbourhood & a modern and quite room in a stylish apartment.
The bedroom is located to the backyard where it's tranquil and green, you'll hear the parrots singing in the morning.
You 'll find the Vondelpark 2 min walking from the apartment, to the city center it would take you a 20 min walk (preferably through Vondelpark ;)) or a 5 min tram ride (the tram stop is 1 min from the apartment).

name: Spacious apartment near city center
description: Apartment in a beautiful residential area close to the city center with trendy cafes and restaurants nearby. It has a bright front-facing, spacious living room and a nice dining room attached to it. The kitchen is equipped with a dishwasher, stove, fridge, freezer and a combination of microwave and oven, as well as a washing mashine. The two bedrooms are located at the quiet rear of the house and give access to the balcony. The balcony is towards the northwest and offers a nice place to sit.

name: Stylish, spacious family home in great location
description:
Modern home with historic charm. Perfect, central location. Situated in quiet and green area – boutiques, restaurants, markets, and the famous Vondelpark, Rijksmusem and Van Gogh Museum are just steps away.

Laid out over 3 floors, with garden, it sleeps up to 6 adults (plus an additional 3 children’s’ beds and 1 baby cot.) The wide back doors create a relaxed indoor/outdoor living vibe.

name: Canal View Residence Amsterdam
description: Welcome to Canal View Residence, a serene getaway in the heart of Amsterdam. Enjoy stunning canal views from this cozy apartment. Features include a comfortable living room, a plush queen-sized bed, a fully equipped kitchen, and a modern bathroom. Amenities: high-speed Wi-Fi, flat-screen TV, coffee maker, fresh linens, and towels. Located near top attractions like the Rijksmuseum and Leidseplein, with easy access to public transportation. Book now for an unforgettable stay!

name: Top location, private bathroom & roof terrace
description: Enjoy a spacious guestroom and the privacy of your own bathroom on the 4th floor of a lately renovated merchant's house from 1896. 5 min walking from the Canal belt, Jordan, and De Hallen, and 15 min walking to the Vondelpark and main museums. Quiet street, yet plenty of restaurants close by. Private roof terrace!

name: Spacious apartment in Amsterdam
description: Spacious apartment on the West side of Amsterdam's city centre. Situated in a quiet and calm street, but only a few minutes walking distances from some of the city's best bars, restaurants, public transportation and the famous Vondelpark. The apartment has two bedrooms, one bathroom, a spacious living room, two balconies, wifi, washing machine, dishwasher, tv and SONOS system. The perfect place to explore the city from.

name: Full privacy in the city! Canoes, bicycles, SUP!
description:
Feel like being in nature while floating in the heart of beautiful Amsterdam! In the large private garden, enjoy your breakfast or evening BBQ in sun or shade at the waterside.
Two master bedrooms with each a private bathroom, one with bathtub.
The sunny living with sliding doors to the waterside has a spacious couch, to enjoy some TV or the Sonos sound system to play ur own favorite music!

name: Sonder Park House | Spacious Double Room
description:
Museums, thrift shopping, and stroopwafels — your Amsterdam experience begins at Park House. Each room includes a coffee maker, space to work, and an HDMI-equipped television for streaming. To unwind, we love the cozy lounge and calming garden terrace.

In the Oud-Zuid neighborhood, there’s plenty to discover. The iconic Rijksmuseum is home to the best of Dutch art. And Vondelpark hosts seasonal outdoor concerts at the Openluchttheater. Enjoy a picturesque stay at Park House.

name: Calm, spacious room in vibrant area
description: Spacious and quiet room in comfortable apartment in the 'Indische Buurt', a vibrant, upcoming neighbourhood of Amsterdam close to the city centre. Floor and Yannick are happy to help you with anything that will make your stay easier.

name: Private room with extra bunk bed & desk
description:
Big private room in a lovely quiet Yoga apartment situated next to Gaasperplas lake, a nature area in Amsterdam South east,

You can use our kitchen, living room, balcony, bathroom and we have bikes and a car for rent . Tours to the local cheese and bio farm in small towns Weesp and Abcoude, we rent kayaks and do airport transfers for 40€

In 20 minutes you are at Schiphol airport and in 15 min you are at Amsterdam Amstel station.
We are easy to reach by foot, bike, train and metro.

name: Loft apartment in Amsterdam
description: Relax and unwind in this peaceful, stylish space. The loft is situated in an old warehouse and exudes zen. The thick walls ensure pleasant coolness in the summer and little radiation. The house is fully equipped. And designed by myself. The environment is very idyllic and so close to the city, with lots of nice cafes and restaurants. Close to the warehouse there is a place where you can swim in the summer. Best combination of city and nature in Amsterdam!

name: Room in Amsterdam  (East/Oost)
description:
Welcome to my home!

Sofa bed in guestroom of 2 bed house
- shared utilities including kitchen and bathroom

Located near to Javastraat high Street and good trsnaport links

name: City centre apartment 2 on corner of two canals
description:
Welcome to the Van Westhouse, a recently renovated canal house in the historic heart of Amsterdam city centre!
This modern and cosy studio (25m2) with double bed, private bathroom (including shower and toilet) and kitchenette is conveniently located at a very quiet canal, yet with all facilities you need around the corner.

Amsterdam central station (train, tram, bus, metro), Dam Square, Nieuwmarkt, Anne Frank house, Rembrandtplein and Waterlooplein are all within walking distance!

name: Canal house Egelantiersgracht ground floor+garden
description:
Immerse yourself in Amsterdam's Jordaan district at our stylish ground floor apartment on Egelantiersgracht. With 70m² of space, our hip one-bedroom abode blends modern comfort with Dutch charm.

Relax in the cozy lounge with canal views, sipping tea or wine as boats pass by. Retreat to the tranquil bedroom with a plush bed and private garden access.

Featured in international magazines, our apartment offers a vibrant Amsterdam lifestyle. Minimum 3-month stay. Experience Jordaan's vibes..

name: Private Houseboat Amsterdam
description: Located in the beating heart of Amsterdam, the ‘Mettina’ houseboat welcomes you to stay on the most important river in the city , the Amstel. The Mettina houseboat is located next to metrostation Waterlooplein in front of the National Opera & Ballet. From Central Station this is a 5 min metro ride or a 20 min walk. Outside the boat has a large deck with a picnic table offering unique views of historical Amsterdam. The houseboat has two double beds in two separate bedrooms as well as a sofa bed.

name: Beautiful house in the city centre of Amsterdam
description:
Beautiful (family) house in the city centre of Amsterdam. It's situated just around the corner of cultural hotspot 'De Hallen', Bellamy Square and “Ten Katemarkt”. In addition, from our house its walking distance to Museum Square, Leidse square and the Jordaan.

Our house is specious and modern. Downstairs there is a large kitchen (with canal-view) and living room. Upstairs there are 5 bedrooms.

We live here with our 4 kids, so it's is perfect for 4 adults or a family with kids.

name: Pearl of Amsterdam
description: Typical Amsterdam apartment with a modern design and view on the park. Perfect location to discover Amsterdam, as it’s in the middle of local restaurants, bars, boutiques and close by the must sees of the city. The apartment is just renovated, so you can enjoy the comfortable facilities and relax  after a day of sightseeing. There’s a workspace included, and therefore also perfect for a workcation. We hope you’ll love Amsterdam as much as we do after your stay in the “pearl” of Amsterdam.

name: Quiet bedroom in canal house. 100% privacy.
description: Top location in the canal belt. This is a convenient bedroom in a house  on a canal in the heart of a vibrant neighborhood in Central Amsterdam. The room is with a private shower, sink and toilet. The location is within easy walking distance to local cafes and shops and a  short walk to museums. You can also rent bicycles nearby to explore the city like a local.

name: Comfortabel huis met ruime tuin.
description:
We are new to Airbnb but have often hosted guests on the Home-Exchange platform. See also the enthusiastic reviews there. We enjoy living with our two children in this wonderful house in Amsterdam-Noord and hope you will enjoy as much as we do!

The Anne Frank house is witin walking distance of this place. The area has a lot of fun restaurants, bakeries and a supermarket. You will love staying at this beautiful apartment!

name: Appartement avec jardin
description: Located in the center of Amsterdam, this garden apartment is quiet and you will be awakened by birds! Close to museums (Nemo and scheepvaartmuseum), train station and transport. Spacious apartment with a wide glass facade.

name: City Break Amsterdam city Center - Room 1
description:
City Break Amsterdam is situated in the heart of the city where everything begins.

iI's a small but secure building, it is cozy, warm and clean. We are a convenient walk away from Central Station and very close to other public transport.

Our living room is shared with the guests as a common room where you can prepare a quick meal and make some tea and coffee.
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Bright private rooms | Centre of Amsterdam
description: Lovely hotel style B&B in the city center of Amsterdam, with comfy beds and a luxurious bathroom. Including little patio. Situated at one of Amsterdam’s most historical neighborhoods, the famous canals and the Jordan district. In a vibrant street with many nice shops and restaurants. 15 mins walk from Central Station.

name: Sail through Holland on a traditional Dutch Ship
description:
Travel through Holland in the traditional Dutch way: by a sailing ship on the countless channels, lakes, rivers, the IJsselmeer and the Waddenzee.

Plan your own individual trip together with skipper, be part of the sailing crew, visit at least one beautiful historical place each day and enjoy sailing.

The former cargo room of the ship is changed into a comfortable accommodation with a cosy mess room, a well equipped kitchen, five cabins with 16 beds, two toilets and two showers.

NO PARTIES!

name: 4E - Congress Centre Apartments

Looking for a 6 months (more or less) rental in the popular De PIJP area Amsterdam? Ideal for a couple of students, University-employees, etc.... Interested? Send us a message for a (FaceTime) viewing. Rent €2200/month + €275 utilities (wifi, gas, water, electric)

The apartment also has a spacious balcony with sun from 14:00-19:00, including a large lounge set and a dining table for 4 to 6 people.

description: Feel right at home at our lovely 1-bedroom apartment in Amsterdam Zuidoost. Immerse yourself in the rich cultural tapestry of the city, from vibrant markets and eateries to full fledged dining experiences. With easy access to public transportation and iconic landmarks, our haven offers convenience and tranquility for your unforgettable stay. Book now and elevate your Amsterdam experience.

name: Lovely, bright and conveniently located apartment
description: Recently renovated appartement (75m2) which you will have all to yourself, conveniently located just outside of the Jordaan.  Within walking distance of delicious coffeehouses, restaurants, cafés, concert venues and gyms. If wanted, we can provide you with our favourites! The bedroom has a high quality matras and blinding curtains (in case you want to sleep in). The kitchen is fully equipped and the living area has a large couch which can be converted into a double bed), and a tv.

name: Romantic small apartment Jordaan
description: Romantic 2-bedroom apartment (50m2) in the heart of Jordaan, one of Amsterdam's oldest neighborhoods. Surround yourself with authentic architecture and canal houses. Just steps away, you'll find the vibrant Saturday market, where locals gather for fresh produce and artisanal delights. An ideal spot to savor local culture. Book this city gem for your stay. And just a 7-minute walk away, explore the historic Anne Frank House. Experience Amsterdam in all its glory!

name: Wonderful loft, central & with amazing canal view
description:
Wonderful loft on the Noordermarkt, with amazing canal view right in the heart of the Jordaan, the coziest area of Amsterdam.
The loft is spread over three floors each one with lots of light: first floor: open kitchen and living room; second floor: wardrobe, king size bedroom (incredibly romantic) bathroom; third floor: super romantic under roof 2nd bedroom with king size bad and an extra single bed if needed (but steep stair to access it!)
Vintage and design furniture, fully equipped kitchen.

name: Apt in City Center / De Pijp
description:
There are 3 bed rooms: 2 private bedrooms and 1 sofa bed in the living room with a curtain around it.
(max allowed: 4 people)

All major sights are close:
- Rijks museum: 5 min walk
- Van Gogh museum: 7 min walk
- Royal Palace: 15 min walk
- Anne Frank house: 20 min walk
- RAI convention center: 2 metro stops, direct connection
- etc

Supermarkets Aldi & Albert Heijn: 2 min walk

Tram & metro: right in front: 30 seconds walk: you will be well connected to Amsterdam and the Netherlands.

name: High-end groundfloor apartment with garden
description:
Welcome to my cozy and stylish apartment in the vibrant neighborhood of Amsterdam Zuid!

Located at Amazonenstraat this charming groundfloor retreat with garden is the perfect getaway for your stay in Amsterdam. This delightful 1-bedroom apartment is designed taking your comfort and convenience in mind.

It's ideal for solo travelers or couples looking for a comfortable and well-looked after place to stay. Within walking distance: Vondelpark, Olympic Stadium, restaurants and cafes!

Lawyers, midwives, judges, journalists and creative people live here close together - right in the city centre and yet away from the noise and bustle of the unbelievably many tourists.

Most unique: it is a few steps away from the Amstel River, the vibrant heart of the city throughout the year.

name: Classical ground floor apartment in city center
description:
Classic ground floor apartment in a historic building, waterfront with garden. Located in a quiet neighborhood in the center, 8 min walk from the canal belt and the Jordaan.

The apartment (60m2) has a large living room with open kitchen and a spacious bedroom. Bathroom with bathtub and loose shower. Separate toilet. Wheelchair friendly.

Near central station (5 min by bus) and easy to reach by car. Westerpark at walking distance and the ferry to North on the same street.

A cosy apartment at a great location in Amsterdam.

All you need for a fantastic stay!

name: Geheel eigen studio/ appartement
description: Just get away from it all in this soothing, centrally located accommodation. You have everything you need in a super centrally located part of Amsterdam. Within 1 minute you walk over Czaar Peterstraat and within a 5-minute walk you are at Artis and the Oosterpark. Around the house are many cozy restaurants and bars to enjoy the hustle and bustle. If you want to stay home for an evening, this house is suitable for enjoying at home in peace.

name: Trendy apartment with balcony 10min from DamSquare
description: The apartment is located in Amsterdam-East, which is one of the more undiscovered areas of Amsterdam. The neighborhood is a bustling melting pot with many amazing hidden gems. It is surrounded by 3 big parks, which again give you the feeling of being far out of the city, if you want to. At the same time, it is only about 10 min away from the city center and there are a lot of public transport options. Of course we prefer to take the bike :).

name: Stylish 1BR apartment close to Vondelpark
description: Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally-located spacious apartment (80sqm). This amazing 1BD apartment is located 10 minutes by bike from the city center! Both Vondelpark and Rembrandtpark a located within walking distance. The apartment was fully renovated in 2022 and includes all the newest equipment. The apartment has a sunny garden with a terrace. Many cozy and hip restaurants and bars are just around the corner and make this the perfect place to stay in Amsterdam.
amenities: ['Coffee maker: espresso machine', 'Outdoor dining area', 'Baking sheet']

name: Suite with City View
description: This romantic option on the upper floor has a walk-in shower and views of the city.

name: private room
description:
You'll have a very comfortable stay in a chill and safe neighborhood. There is a supermarket close by, along with many restaurants, bars, coffeeshops.
Bus and tram are easily reachable as they are here in the street.

Leidseplein, Central Station and Anne Frank House are in walking distance, as well as the hippest district of Amsterdam, Jordaan. You'll have a quiet and relaxing stay at home; fun and entertainment when you're out.

name: 4p apartment near all famous hotspots!
description: Brand new apartment on the third floor at one of the most beautiful streets in Amsterdam. Authentic Amsterdam style apartment in a bustling neighbourhood. This street is perfectly located right between the famous Leidse Square, Vondelpark and the Museum Square. All the hotspots are just right around the corner! The apartment is totally private and the apartment has everything you need. Im sure you will have a great time in our apartment :)

name: Penthouse on the Amstel
description: This unique penthouse on the Amstel is the perfect place to visit Amsterdam. You will have a spacious apartment. With 2 big bedrooms and 2 bathrooms and your own elevator that brings you right in the livingroom. The location is perfect as it is right next to Amstelstation and metrostation Spaklerweg and beautifully located on the amstel  and near the centre. In the area are some amazing restaurants and bars that I would love to recommend to you.

name: Spacious apartment in the center
description:
WELCOME to every: gender, sexuality, ethnicity and culture.

This centrally located apartment offers everything one might need when visiting Amsterdam as a tourist or for a work visit.

The location can't be better: 15 minutes from Amsterdam Central Station, tram and subway around the corner, one street away from the famous Albert Cuyp market and restaurants and bars on every corner.

The space itself offers all comforts one might wish for.


Registration number: 0363 2BC1 E393 2CF5 6944

name: East-side apartment
description:
The apartment is a newly renovated light and cozy apartment with large windows and a new and fully equipped kitchen and with fast WiFi.

The house is in on a quiet street, but when you turn around the corner you feel the lifelines of the city. There are markets, cinema's, stores, museums, public transport, restaurants, bars, parks nearby.

Note: this apartment is my primary home.

name: Central Charm for Your Getaway
description: Discover Amsterdam's allure in our spacious and stylish home. With 124sqm, it boasts a large living area, well-equipped kitchen, 2 bedrooms, modern bathroom, and a private rooftop terrace. Located in the vibrant Baarsjes neighborhood, all of Amsterdam's highlights are at your fingertips.

name: Comfy Double Room 500m from Amsterdam Arena
description:
Standard Double Room with a double bed is compact, smartly designed, and just what you need for a solid night's sleep. Room features air-conditioning, shower, hair & body wash, fresh towels & linen, TV, free Wifi, en-suite bathroom and blackout blinds for your comfort.
Please note that 12.5% Amsterdam city tourist tax is not included in the Airbnb price and must be paid directly to the hotel.

name: Cosy Jordaan Apartment
description:
Welcome to my cute apartment with quirky architectural features right in the best neighbourhood in Amsterdam - the Jordaan.

The street itself is super quiet but is just 2 minutes walking away from all the markets, canals and local bars. You’ll be experiencing a real local Dutch house and neighbourhood and I’m here to help guide you with all the best tips!

The apartment is for living so you’ll feel comfortable and at home with its unique decor and warm feelings.

name: Just off the Prinsengracht and 9 Streets
description:
Lovely BNB apartment in the heart of Amsterdam just off the Prinsengracht canal and around the famous 9 streets.

The renovated BNB has it's own entrance. Decorated as a luxury suite with great amenities like Nespresso coffee, tea, vanity kit and slippers. Enjoy crisp white bedding and towels. Use the iPad to control the tv, blinds, thermostat and smart lock.

All major attractions are within walking distance including the Anne Frank house, Wester Church, Dam square and Leidse square.

name: Beautiful family nest - Jordaan
description:
Beautiful flat made for a family of 4 (2 adults, 1 toddler, 1 baby).
Perfect location: next to the Noordmarkt with the amazing organic Saturday market.
Lot of light, 3 balconies, fully equipped kitchen, bath tube.

name: Room with private bathroom near NDSM.
description: Are you ready to sleep over near the NDSM-wharf? Do you want to explore the old city of Amsterdam? Our sunny room with ensuite bathroom in trendy Amsterdam-North is the perfect home base. It's a 12 minute walk to the vibrant NDSM-Wharf where you can find the Street Museum, go treasure hunting at the IJhallen and sit down and relax at the many local hotspots such as Pllek with an actual beach! Or just hop on the free ferry that will take you straight to Central Station and the city center.

name: Stylish apartment overlooking the Vondelpark
description:
A unique apartment with Amsterdam style high ceilings overlooking the Vondelpark! With lots of light, tranquility and views of the green oasis from our terrace.

Getting around is easy, its 10 min by bike to the famous Rijksmuseum and 5 min to the Leidseplein. Great restaurants within walking distance. It's also very easy to get on a tram as its stops right at the end of our small and quiet street.

The kitchen well equipped. The bathroom has a bath and a walk-in shower.

name: Center, 2 storey cornerhouse, 4 BR, Canalview!
description:
Brilliant 2 storey house for family-friends-colleagues!
-Main Floor: Kitchen & Cooking Island, Dinnertable, Lounge with sofa's
-1st Floor: 4 BR all canal view, marble bathroom: Bath, Rain Shower, 2 Sinks
-2 Benches among flowers and plants with view canal: public garden.
DISCOUNT
voor just 1 floor (first floor) : 4 BR, big Bathroom, table/plates/cutlery

description: Cosy apartment situated in trendy area with nice restaurants, shops and coffee houses.  City centre, Vondelpark and musea (e.g. Rijksmuseum, Van Gogh, Stedelijk) at walking distance. Easily to be reached by public transport from Schiphol Airport.

name: 299 TOPlocated Canalhouse Room private bathroom
description:
299 Superb canal house room with private bath, for solo traveler. Just a 5 mins walk from central station, on Brouwersgracht in famous Jordan area. Single use only room with its own en-suite (in room, private) shower, sink and toilet.

From here you can walk to all main attractions and hotspots.

name: Spacious and luxurious canal house appartment
description: This centrally located accommodation is tastefully furnished. The apartment is located on one of the canals of Amsterdam in a short walk from the famous Jordaan neighborhood and the main attractions of the city. The canal itself is quiet. The house has been recently renovated with a fully equipped design kitchen.  It has authentic details from 1900. From the balcony you can enjoy the view over the water.

name: Appartement met terras in Amsterdam West.
description: Recently renovated apartment. The new kitchen is directly adjacent to the dining table. The bright bedroom gives access to the roof terrace with afternoon/evening sun. 5 minutes walk to Jordaan, 10 minutes walk to Ten Kate Markt and Foodhallen.

name: Monumental warehouse apartment on historic canal
description:
On the corner of a quiet backstreet in The Jordaan, where it seems like time has stood still, you find our home: an apartment on the ground floor of a listed monumental warehouse facing original Dutch houseboats and the canal.

Our apartment has a real "homey" atmosphere and is perfect for a family with children. It has high ceilings with original wooden ceiling-beams. There is a little bench on the pavement where you can enjoy your coffee in the morning sun.

There is one bed room with double size bed and one foldable bed in guest room for two people. 75inc smart tv, Sonos sound system and apartment is fully furnished. Kitchen has great sunlight all the day and all kitchen equipment is new.

name: Spacious family apartment in vibrant area
description:
Welcome to our lovely family home in the vibrant area "De Baarsjes" in Amsterdam. From our renovated apartment (featured in Dutch interior magazine) you can easily enjoy and explore Amsterdam. A real family home with spacious kitchen and living area, 3 bedrooms, bathroom with bathtub and all thinkable necessities. We also provide you with an extensive list of all hotspots in the area.

Mi casa es su casa!

name: Lovely 2-bedroom Apartment in Amsterdam
description:
Spacious 2-bedroom apartment (80 sqm) centrally located in Amsterdam.

The living room is fully open to the dining table and kitchen in a big room, full of light, with direct access to the balcony.

The bathroom is spacious with a double basin, a shower and a bathtub. Toilets are separated.

2 bedrooms large enough to welcome 4 guests as follow
- main bedroom: 1 queen bed (2 people)
- second bedroom: 1 double bed (2 people)

There is a desk in the second bedroom in case one needs to work.

name: Unique luxe house in Amsterdam
description: The house is very centrally located on Museumplein. The house is 250m2 with two outdoor spaces. It consists of three floors with two kitchens; on the first floor is the living/dining/kitchen area. The second floor has a spacious bathroom and 2 beautiful bedrooms. One of the bedrooms also has a roof terrace. The third floor has a gigantic high ceiling of no less than 4.5 m high with lots of light entry. Here, a projector stands to organize the ideal cinema evening.

Stylish 2 floor apartment in Amsterdam’s Old West. Enjoy a bright living room with a modern kitchen and access to a private rooftop terrace to enjoy your morning coffee or evening wine.

The lower level features a cozy bedroom with an ensuite bathroom, complete with a bathtub and walk-in shower. Step out into your own garden oasis, perfect for relaxing. This apartment offers a perfect blend of comfort and charm in a prime location.

description: The apartment is in very good condition and is nice and spacious in a quiet street. The location is great, just next to a nice park (Oosterpark), the Tropenmuseum and Artis, the famous zoo. It's also just a 10 minute tram or bike ride to the city center. The area also has a lot to offer for food and drinks and there is a good daily local market right around the corner. A perfect place to explore Amsterdam from!

description:
Fun with the family in this stylish space with garden. We offer our apartment in Amsterdam. It is available for a couple or a family with 1-2 toddlers. Upon request we also offer our toddler's bedroom, with crib. In addition, we have an extra crib for a baby or toddler.

The entire apartment is at your disposal. Includes a fully equipped kitchen with all necessities, a large dining table, cozy sofa with TV and a nice dark bedroom.

name: Zimmer in einem charmanten Grachtenhaus (23)
description:
Stay where all Amsterdam people want to live. Small private room in a historic canal house. In the vicinity of many museums, the Rembrandsplein and yet wonderfully quiet. Room with shower and toilet ensuite.

This room is part of a licensed guesthouse.

name: Houseboat  private studio & terrace in hip north
description:
This is a private and comfortable studio on a houseboat which is very nicely decorated. Through the big sliding window door you can enter your own private deck which will give you a nice view over the water. You can enjoy 2 bikes for free at the property to explore the neighbourhood and ofcourse the city! The houseboat is located in a peaceful neighbourhood and suitable for people who are looking for a quiet base to discover Amsterdam.

It's important to note that music or any parties/events are not allowed at this accommodation, since this houseboat is located in a quiet and peaceful houseboat neighbourhood.

name: Da Costakade 125-C
description: In a beautiful location directly on the water is this bright two/three-room apartment with terrace and balcony, spacious living room, kitchen, well sized bedroom and a modern bathroom. The Da Costakade is a quiet but very centrally located canal between the Nassaukade and Bilderdijkstraat.

name: Cozy flat next to Vondelpark
description: No description

description:
This is the perfect place to recharge after a day out and about. After a long day of exploring, you can enjoy a warm shower or hop into the sauna! Thereafter, get a pleasant night rest in the comfortable double bed.
This modern houseboat is perfect for enjoying an authentic Amsterdam experience.

description: Lovely apartment in Amsterdam (Baarsjes). An ideal base for a city trip, the apartment is within walking distance of the Erasmuspark and from all kinds of cozy streets and cafes. Suitable for a couple or family with up to 4 people

name: Stylish apartment in the heart of Amsterdam
description: Beautifull apartement located in the Heart of Amsterdam. Jordaan area, in between The Dam and Leidse square and just footstaps away the ‘9 streets’ shopping & dining area, Anne Frank House and the Westertoren!

name: Cosy, Mid-Century Modern Flat
description: Our cosy one-bedroom apartment is perfect for a weekend of easily exploring Amsterdam, but also well-equipped for longer stays requiring remote work. Sandwiched between two of Amsterdam’s most beautiful parks, you can go for a peaceful walk or make your way to the centre in no time to enjoy all the fine things the city has to offer!

name: Spacious apartment in vibrant neighbourhood
description: A privately owned family home; 4 bedrooms, spacious, close to city-centre, and a relaxed haven. Situated in the north, this area is compared to the Meatpacking District in NYC; up-and-coming and full of surprises. Lots of hidden gems (bars, restaurants, food courts, etc. nearby). The house is suitable for 4 adults (+2 children) or a family (2 adults, 4 children)  as we have 2 children's rooms, a second bedroom and extra utilities such as a bassinet, a baby-bath and toys included.

name: Executive Single · Modern light and spacious room
description:
Welcome to The Student Hotel — a place where everyone is welcome. With beautiful rooms, incredible design and a lively vibe we offer much more than just a room — enjoy our in-house gym, co-working space, restaurant and much more.

Be aware that the city tax is not included in the price on the website and is payable upon arrival at the hotel. The city tax is €3 per person per night and 7% of the total booking amount.

name: Entire apartment in the ♥️ of Ams with a balcony.
description: This is a bright modern apartment with access to a gorgeous balcony on a unique central location in the heart of Amsterdam! There’s a queen-size double bed,  easy access to a bathroom with a bath tub & shower that includes: shampoo, body wash, towels, radiator, soft bathrobes, and iron. The apartment comes with wireless speakers, a mini projector, free WIFI and unlimited freshly ground coffe! Located in Oost, a 2 min walk from Oosterpark & Tropen Museum and right next to a vibrant street market.

description: Welcome to our charming retreat nestled in the heart of the Jordaan, Amsterdam! This beautifully appointed apartment, which is our main residence, offers a serene escape amidst the lively city. Located near the iconic Anne Frank Huis, surrounded by picturesque canals and with free access to our bikes, you’ll be immersed in the quintessential Amsterdam experience.

name: Spacious and cosy apartment

The apartment has recently been entirely redecorated, features a kitchen with a comfortable cooking island and a nice balcony with sun all day. The appartement is very close to the vibrant Javastraat, the beautiful Flevopark, has a tram stop to the city centre in front of the door, and the Amsterdam Muiderpoort station at less than 10 minutes walking away.

name: Amazing and modern city centre apartment
description: Very Stylish 2 bedroom apartment two tram stops away from Amsterdam Central station in the amazing area of Amsterdam Docklands - Cafe's and the best restaurant around the corner! This area has it all - only two stops by tram to central station and yet a very quiet modern apartment that allows you to get the best out of your Amsterdam trip.

Cosy interior with an industrial 'touch', and typical Dutch details & vintage design decorations. For 2 - 4 persons. Next to the house is a little park. 20 min walk (and 7 min tram or bike ride) to the city centre.

description:
Our beautiful home in the city centre will make your stay in Amsterdam even more unforgettable. For couple/families only.
The characteristic 19th century apartment in one of Amsterdam's prettiest street is within walking distance to all the city's major attractions.
The 2 bedroom apartment has been recently refurbished and offers a spacious and luxurious place to unwind after a day of sightseeing.

Guests can also enjoy the balcony and roof terrace boasting lovely views of the Amsterdam skyline.
