Welcome to our beautifully renovated apartment on Linnaeusstraat in the bustling heart of Amsterdam! This stylish stay offers everything you need for a comfortable and memorable stay in the city, whether you come for vacation or work. The excellent accessibility, hotspots and enough space ensure an ideal stay.

You will find a booklet with (local) tips inside the house. If you would like to know more or are interested in city walks, please ask me for tips ;)

name: Beautiful and calm Amsterdam apartment
description: The green and gold apartment. Kick back and relax in this calm, sunny, stylish one bedroom apartment in Oud West, Amsterdam. The building dates back from the early 20th century and has a lot of character and charm. You will have ample space to enjoy your break. One bedroom, two bathrooms, large living room, kitchen and balcony. Two smart TVs, Sonos stereo speakers, washing machine, dishwasher, central heating and Philips Hue lighting throughout, A cleaner is also available on request.

name: Canal view apartment with balcony & urban jungle
description: In the popular neighborhood in old-west you have 60m2 by the water, with a balcony at the front and back. It's a very bright apartment, with water views. The living room with open kitchen is very spacious and cozy, there is a bath, separate toilet and quiet bedroom. The latter is the back where it is quiet, so you can sleep wonderfully. Leidseplein, the canal belt and the Vondelpark are around the corner, less than a 10-minute walk away. Lots of cozy bars nearby.

name: Hotel Not Hotel Ams: The Invisible Room Upstairs
description:
Now you see me, now you don’t. The Invisible Room is nothing and everything at the same time. It’s constantly reflecting all of the hotel’s light and colour, making it both full of life and practically invisible.

The Invisible Room was created by the infamous HNH Concept Factory, a group of philosophers, scientists, and visual artists. Be careful not to bump into it on your way into or out of the hotel.

name: Room to Rent Amsterdam
description:
Room to rent close to Amsterdam Center

description:
Stunning apartment in the center with a great view over the water!

Modern and bright 3-room apartment, renovated to a high standard with a view over the Singelgracht. Apartment is located in the center of Amsterdam, on the edge of Amsterdam Oud-West, the Jordaan and within walking distance of the canals and the Nine Streets. Various shops and restaurants within walking distance. Terrace is shared with three other apartments.

NO SMOKING INDOORS, NO PARTIES.

name: Stylish apt. across Vondelpark
description:
A comfortable, beautiful & sunny apartment w everything you need to have a great stay in Amsterdam.
Great location, less than 5 min walking distance to Vondelpark, supermarkets & shopping streets. Schiphol airport is 15 min by car or 20 min by public transport. Walking distance to the canals, Museum Quartier & Leidseplein. Tram stop across the street.
Rented to a maximum of 2 people. While we are away we make our space available for couples or solo traveler's. Ask if you have any questions!

name: Canals & Cocktails: Courtyard view
description:
Welcome to Rosalia’s Menagerie, this modernized 17th-century canal house features a cocktail bar and six personally styled hotel rooms upstairs. Each a unique mix of style, charm and practicality.

Our cozier, quieter and cooler Garden View rooms (18m2) at the back of the building have king-sized bed and a view into a small and infamous Amsterdam inner courtyard area. They have bathrooms with rain showers and natural daylight. These rooms are equipped with fans and have windows on two sides.

On the principal floor you will find our cozy little cocktail bar inspired by Dutch heritage with its rich history in the trade, distilling, and innovation. We look forward to sharing our passion for Jenever and great locally-made spirits with you, as well as, showcase extraordinary products from abroad.

Upstairs you will find “Rosalia’s Inn Upstairs”, our lovely little hideaway. With six lovely rooms overlooking either the canal or a fetching Amsterdam secret

name: Singel Hotel Amsterdam: Standard Double Room
description:
A charming gem, right in the heart of Amsterdam. The Singel Hotel Amsterdam*** is known for its historic charm and offers daily accommodation to both tourists and business travellers. Our fantastic location, atmospheric accommodation and excellent service guarantee you one of the most pleasant overnight stays in Amsterdam.

Our rich breakfast buffet can be booked at check-in for only € 15.00.

name: Amsterdam Stylish Apartment, by popular Vondelpark
description: Based in the popular neighbourhood in Oud-West Amsterdam (old west), our two story spacious apartment has a large master bedroom with a super King Bed (baby cot can be added) with leafy views of the street, bathroom with shower and bath, open plan kitchen and living room with entertainment system (Apple TV) and a quaint juliet balcony. In a quiet but central location you are only two blocks from some of the best restaurants, bars and cafes in the city. Tram also right on your doorstep!

name: Nice room in 2bedroom apartment
description:
You'll have a great time at this comfortable place to stay.
Shared bathroom and toilet.
everything has locks.
Fully arranged kitchen, speedy wifi. Stairs!

name: Houseboat Tante Piet deluxe &  private 4pers
description:
Total privacy & no shared spaces on this comfy houseboat with floor heating throughout.
You will have your own private entrance. and deck terrace with BBQ.
The cabins have each an ensuite bathroom and there is one kitchenette. Coming with four, three or two guests, you will always have both cabins.
Only 5 min by public transport (or 10 min walk) to central station and the famous canal area and bubbling bars.

Welcome on board!
Sietske

name: Luxurious 3 floor loft in the city centre
description:
This amazing 3 floors characteristic apartment is in the middle of the centre of Amsterdam. With an astonishing view of the canals. The apartment has beautiful antique details such as marble floors, sink faucet, large sturdy doors and high ceilings and wonderfully large spaces where you can experience an old typical Dutch feeling right in the heart of Amsterdam.

This apartment offers a separate upstairs apartment with all the amenities needed. Just 5 min away from the central station.

name: Great coffee & fresh bread delivered daily
description: Amsterdam has some of the world’s greatest museums, and Max Brown Museum Square has them right on its doorstep. The hotel is located within a neighbourhood full of vibrant bars, restaurants and cafés, so your nights here can be as exciting as your days. If you ever want a local recommendation, just ask a member of the Max Brown team. Space is tight in this historic buildings so be aware the rooms may not offer a lot of extra space – but plenty of local charm. City tax not incl.

name: Apartment on the boat
description: Nice and cosy! house boat apartment in the Central area. Water experiance in Amsterdam. Short walking/cycling distance from most of the city's main attractions.

name: Apartment in Amsterdam, Old West
description:
Welcome to our light-filled apartment in the heart of Amsterdam's Old West. Ideal for a couple, this spacious home features a queen-size bed, a relaxing bath, and an open kitchen. Enjoy the morning & afternoon sun on the private balcony.

Explore the vibrant Ten Kate Market and Foodhallen around the corner. Easy access to trams for city exploration, 10 minute bike to Museumplein, and 5 minute bike to the Vondelpark.

name: Comfortable appartment
description: Upcoming East, only 5 min from Central Station by train! Rent a bike or take a tram and you'll be in the city centre in 15 minutes. Just around the corner you'll find shops, bars, restaurants and 2 parks.

name: Bb 1971 Hazenstraat shared bathroom
description: This cozy private room is situated right in the city centre of Amsterdam

name: Lovely & comfortable apartment with canal view
description: Lovely light apartment located next to the lively Overtoom, one of Amsterdam's most busiest streets. It is is a short 5 minute walk to Leidseplein and Vondelpark, with many restaurants, cafes and shops in walking distance. The apartment is approximately 60m2 and comprises a spacious living room, one bedroom, a bathroom with shower and a full kitchen.

name: 130m2 bright apartment next to Vondelpark
description:
Our Appartment is with 150m2 spacy and filled with sunlight. It has a very large , luxurious and fully equipped kitchen and dining room area; 1 master bedroom and one TV/office room with a sofa bed (140cm wide) , one bathroom and two toilets as well as a very typical Amsterdam garden. We are located in a lively family neighborhood with lots of cafes, shops and restaurants.

Please kindly note: We have a minimum stay requirement of 7 days.

name: Fijn appartement in de Jordaan
description:
This centrally located accommodation is tastefully furnished and fully equipped. It is a perfect starting point for a weekend in Amsterdam.
All the museums, shops, restaurants and bars within walking distance. Bicycle rental close by.

name: Cosy, beautiful apartment in the popular Old West!
description: Welcome to my home! This cozy ground-floor apartment is all yours, located just around the corner from some of Amsterdam's best spots. A 5-minute bike ride will take you to the heart of the city, or you can reach it in less than 10 minutes by public transport, all within walking distance. The neighborhood is filled with great bars, restaurants, and just a short walking distance to the Vondelpark. The apartment features one bedroom and a comfortable sofa bed, perfect for a stay in Amsterdam!

name: Private room in Amsterdam
description:
All transport is within walking distance (Train: 15 min, Metro: 8 min, Bus: 5 min, Tram: 8 min.).
Walk+train to the airport will take 25 min.
Grocery stores are within 5 min walking distance.
Direct tram, metro and bus to the city centre! Alternatively you could cycle :)

name: Amst (2-4p) - familyhouse for art & design lovers
description:
We would like to welcome art & design lovers in our comfortable family house!

Perfect for one couple (+ max two children max. age 16)
Oosterpark neighbourhood : stylish, renovated in 2016 (architect-designed), modern, clean, quiet, less touristic, hip & happening neighbourhood

You'll enjoy the space. For Amsterdam standards it is a nice industrial looking apartment, very comfortable with high ceilings and a lot of artworks. A typical Amsterdam building (1905)- 2 levels - 140 sq. + garden.

name: Dam Private Room +private toilet
description: This special place is close to everything, making it easy to plan your visit.Only five minutes walking from central station and two minutes from dam square

name: Canal View Loft 41
description: Large 2-bedroom canal view loft with a spacious bathroom. Perfect for couples & families. Near all the major tourist destinations in Amsterdam including : Nine Streets, Anne Frank House, Rijks Museum and much more.

name: Ruim & rustig gezins-appartement vlakbij centrum
description: Welcome to our house! An ideal apartment for a family,  to explore the city from a quiet base. Quiet & greenery, on ground floor, on a car-free square. In the morning you can enjoy your coffee in the morning sun in the garden, in the square children can play football, or you can picnic in the grass. And in the meantime, all the shops of the bustling center are within walking distance, with a tram stop, supermarket, restaurants and bars around the corner. This apartment has best of all worlds :)
amenities: ['Private backyard – Fully fenced', 'Board games', 'Outdoor dining area']

name: Quiet retreat near Vondelpark
description:
Experience comfort in a stylish apartment at an ideal location. Situated on a quiet street, the apartment is just a 3-minute bike ride from Vondelpark (the city's Central Park). The vibrant city center is also just a 10-minute bike ride away.

Your room features a double bed, a desk, a chair, and closet space. You'll have access to a modern bathroom and a fully equipped kitchen.

Your host, a Dutch local, has been living in Amsterdam for 11 years and is happy to share insider recommendations.

name: Urban Jungle Room
description:
Inspiring, tastefully decorated Urban Jungle room, with kitchenette in the green district of Amsterdam. In a quiet area within walking distance of tram, bus and metro. and the Sloterpark and the WFC. In 15 minutes you are on the Leidseplein, RAI or WTC by tram. Wifi is available.
Are you curious and interested? Then book our connect-inn accommodation in Amsterdam or contact us.

name: Spacious room - quiet neighbourhood
description:
Affordable room with two seperate beds. With lavabo. Fast Internet (glassfiber). (Shared) Kitchenette 3rd floor. (Shared) Bathroom and toilet are on 2nd floor.

Location:
Excellent transport facilities to the center and Schiphol Airport.

Parking:
* Paid Parking: Mo-Sa from 9.00 - 19.00
* On Sunday free parking
* Free parking in village nearby (on walking distance).

Bicycles:
* For solo travelers there is a free bike available

Hablamos espanol!

name: Private apartment near museums, RAI and Zuid WTC!
description:
Our comfortable room with kingsize bed has its own entrance and private bathroom (toilet, shower, washing machine). The room is situated in a quiet neighborhood in the south of Amsterdam ("Oud Zuid") close to the museum district, and business district Zuidas. It is very close to Schiphol airport and easy to find.

Please note: it has no kitchen/kitchenette
Heating is only available in September-April

name: Private bedroom & bathroom with roof terrace
description: Cozy private bedroom & bathroom situated at a roof terrace, nearby the historic city center, financial district (WTC) and the RAI convention centre. Walking distance of Vondelpark, outdoor sports facilities and public transport to reach any part of town, the airport or to visit other cities. My house is set up in a way that I can offer you full privacy, but I'm always happy to spend time with guests when I'm free.  For business visits I have provided a small desk and Wifi.

name: Large room in lovely & newly renovated apartment!
description:
Large room in a shared and recently renovated 129m2 flat in Amsterdam, which is a perfect fit for a couple, or solo travelers.

In the apartment, you will find a separate bedroom, large living room, and a fully equipped kitchen.

The apartment is located near the Jordaan area/city center where you will find shops, bars, and restaurants. The Westerpark and Vondelpark are nearby (5-10 min walk). For the rainy days, Prime, HBO & Netflix are included.

We hope to host you in our beautiful apartment.

name: Privékamer in Amsterdam West
description: Cozy Boho chic room in the area Bos en Lommer. The room is located on the third floor and has a private bedroom and bathroom. Extra facilities such as coffee maker, kettle and mini fridge are present. I have been working in the hospitality industry for many years and I am looking forward to welcome you as my guest!

name: Nice and Cozy Room Offered in Amsterdam
description: Private room offered in a elegant furnished, clean and tidy apartment in a nice and quiet area close to the center
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Mini appartement vlakbij het Vondelpark
description: A mini apartment of 32 m2 with use of the roof terrace. 15 min by tram to the city center and 10 min walk to the Vondelpark. In the weekends, free parking is 3 minutes' distance. Quiet neighborhood with a nature area. Outside communal entrance and roof terrace, the mini apartment is completely yours with its own kitchen, bedroom and living room. There is another sofa bed in the living room for possibly 1 to 2 guests extra. Please note that there are many steps.

name: Entire Private Apartment Amsterdam
description: Hassle free on a holiday :-) We made your stay like you were at home. We have thought of everything. If you miss something while your stay we take action at once to make your stay even greater it already is :-) Friendly, very neat and clean, and wants to make our guest feel both at home and on vacation. Everything you need will be here! Excessive quality guarantees!-Excellent quality beds (also separate beds on request).

description:
Only access to room/balcony and shared Toilet and bathroom.

Cooking not allowed by Amsterdam municipalty rules in this system of room rental to tourists. Microwafe available.

Please note this is a residential neighbourhood, so I would kindly ask guests not to make too much noise AFTER 10 pm, especially in the balcony. Had already some issues with the neighbour who complained a few times about guests being loud after 10 - 10.30 pm when he tries to sleep. Before 10 pm it is no problem.

name: Longstay Cozy & Bright apt. with rooftop terrace
description: This apartment is located in the cozy Amsterdam North. It is surrounded with many nice restaurants and bars. It is just a 15 minute walk to the ferry that brings you to the center of Amsterdam. The apartment itself is beautiful and has a shared roof terrace. The perfect stay for people who would like to discover the beauty of Amsterdam. The apt. has air conditioning allowing you to stay cool in the city.

name: Cosy private suite next Westerpark!
description: Very Cozy and comfotable room with own bathroom and tv. Outside the room is a nice terrace and a breakfast space. Small kitchenette to prepare a simple dish is at your service. Near to the center !

name: Large bedroom and bathroom
description:
A large double bedroom with newly refurbished bathroom in a spacious and green house, with a garden.

We're right next to the beautiful Amsterdamse Bos, great for running, yoga, swimming or however you get your kicks. But only 15-20 mins from the main shopping / tourist disctrict by bike.

This is not an entire home listing, but our bedroom and bathroom are very separate on the top floor. We both work in the city and have a little dog. She's very relaxed and loves visitors :)

name: Bathroom ensuite privately 1thfloor and entrance
description: Spacious and bright room (30m) en suite bathroom. The room covers the whole first floor in a nice and quiet neighbourhood in the north of the city. Private door that gives access  without entering any shared spaces. Supermarket only a stone throw away. Easy access to the city center in 25 minutes by public transport with a busstop just across the street. Amenities include; a minifridge, Nespresso, watercooker, microwave and cutlery. Free use of our garden with a picnic table at the waterfront.

name: Beautiful penthouse near Rai and centre
description:
This penthouse apartment is located on the fifth floor, giving this light apartment a unique, unbelievable breathtaking view over Amsterdam. You will have your own front door, living room, fully equipped kitchen, dining area, bathroom and bedroom with a nice queen sized bed!

This penthouse apartment is very close to everything that Amsterdam has to offer, 2 minutes on foot from Rai Convention Centre. All main tourist attractions are nearby.

LGBTQ+ very much welcome here.

Within walking distance from Tram 2 stop with which you will reach Central Station in 40 minutes. Leidseplein square can be reached in 20 minutes and the Museum Square in even less.

You’ll be staying in the heart of De Pijp neighborhood, 15 min walk from the city center, as well as a few minutes away from the Amstel river, the famous Albert Cuyp market, and some of Amsterdam’s best restaurants, bars and cafes.

Inside, you'll discover a bedroom adorned with both twin and double beds, a welcoming coffee table, and soft ambient lighting to set the mood. Your room also comes equipped with a handy mini fridge, microwave, and all the coffee supplies you need for a delightful morning pick-me-up.

Breakfast is not included.


Hostess is also guide. Can be rented for fun trips with or without car.

Windmill, beer brewery and cheesefarm very nearby.
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: ! Great Room in best part of Ams (shared Bathroom)
description:
This is a Private room with bathroom/WC/Kitchen shared! - Great private room in a very nice apartment in Amsterdam South - Near Vondelpark, WTC and Olympic stadium. Keep it simple at this peaceful and centrally-located place. This is a shared apartment !!!

The room is separated, fully private, and can be locked (both sides) - Visitors can use the common areas including Kitchen/Bar, Bathroom and Toilets as well as the sunny terrace. The private room is hosted by the main host.

name: Cosy new room, private bathroom
description: With all necessary covid-19 precautions measurements taken you will enjoy your stay at this new spot that is very close to the city center of Amsterdam.  Hand sanitizer is provided, there is a private bathroom, 50 inch TV with cable,  internet and a Chromecast to stream your own content, WiFi, small fridge, tea and coffee making facilities, hair dryer and a super comfortable bed (160x200)!

name: Modern one bedroom apartment
description:
The one bedroom apartment has an attached bathroom, separate toilet, balcony, and a living room with a kitchen.

The apartment is on the second floor where an elevator is available together with a wide staircase. Just 15 minutes away by foot, the south metro and train station are available. Tram line 5 is five minutes away from the apartment which takes you directly to Leidseplein. In case shopping is needed, 5 minutes by foot the Gelderlandplein mall is available with underground parking.

name: Lovely and light apartment
description: Spacious apartment with sunny balcony in the Staatsliedenbuurt. 10 minutes away from central station, Leidseplein, de Dam by public transportation. Close to the Jordaan en the Baarsjes with many nice cafes and restaurants. 5 minute walk from Westerpark. The apartment has everything you need for a comfortable city trip.

name: Mont Martre of Amsterdam
description: No description

name: Green oases in the city of Amsterdam
description:
We are located in a friendly neighbourhood in the Watergraafsmeer. Our neighbourhood is well known for being relaxed and easy-going while at the same time remaining hip and fashionable. Within a 5-minute stroll from Fleur d’Amsterdam you will find a number of restaurants, parks, shops, bars.
At Fleur d’Amsterdam, you will find a quiet oasis, close to the centre of our great city, Amsterdam. A comfortable home away from home after an enjoyable day in Amsterdam. Breakfast is possible.

Welcome!
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Amsterdam family home in green area
description: Hi! Our designer home in the the city of Amsterdam offers the city and green surroundings. We are two architects who designed a family home that would feel like a holiday home. Our house is fit for two couples traveling together or a family of 4. We have a master bedroom, one children’s bedroom with a full size bed and a queen size pop out bed on the ground floor. Looking forward to your stay at our house!

description:
Bright, spacious and cozy apartment (80m2) in the Rivierenbuurt near the Rai.
The apartment offers plenty of space and still contains the old elements such as leaded doors glass.

The apartment is in an great location. Only 10 minutes walking from the Pijp (Albert Cuijp market), 1 minute walk from the RAI and with the north-south line within 10 minutes on Dam Square and Central Station.

name: Cosy design house at ground floor with garden
description:
Welcome in my tiny house! 40m2 but all the space you need for a pleasant stay in beautiful Amsterdam. In 2018 I (@alaroosmaria) bought this house and renovated it together with my father. With a lot of love and joy I was able to make it the way I want it to be. I have even been featured in a magazine.
With a bathroom en-suite and a spacious living room with open kitchen it has all the luxury you need. Bus and tram stop are in front of the door and take you to the city centre within 10minutes :)

name: Aparthotel North, Spacious Suite for 6 Guests
description:
Discover Aparthotel North, steps from Adam Tower in vibrant Amsterdam. Strategically located, just 2.1 km from A'DAM Lookout and 5 km from Rembrandt House. Explore landmarks like Basilica of St. Nicholas, Dam Square, and Museum Ons' Lieve Heer op Solder, all within 7 km.

Unwind in modern comfort with amenities like flat-screen TV, microwave, kettle, and coffee maker. Immerse yourself in the city's charm in our smoke-free units. Book now for an unforgettable Amsterdam experience!

name: Private Boutique suite Dam Square
description: We are Jelle and Willemijn and we would like to welcome you in an authentic room right in the centre of Amsterdam. The interior of the room is modern but with a typical Dutch touch. The room is located 10 meters from Dam Square and was recently fully renovated.

name: Room with private entrance in heart of A'dam
description:
Recently renovated private room in the heart of Amsterdam. Completely sheltered from street noise, with a spacious and luxurious private bathroom with an amazing shower. Maximum privacy since the room has its own private entrance.

The room is located on the first floor of an historic Amsterdam Canal House.

The location really is as central as it gets. Walking distances:
- 2 minutes from city centre Dam Square
- 3 minutes from main shopping streets
- 10 minutes from Central Station

name: Your own little house in Amsterdam
description: Unique in Amsterdam! Beautiful little house with private entrance and private bathroom! Brand new and spotless. Downstairs: cozy living room with  sofa bed, TV, kettle and Nespresso machine. Full bathroom with toilet. Upstairs two separate beds that can be pushed together as a double bed of 180 x 200. Public transportation and shopping center is a 2-minute walk away. Bikes for rent

name: Pearl of the Jordaan
description:
Welcome to the pearl of the Jordaan! This very tastefully and unique one bedroom apartment is located on one of the most beautiful spots in Amsterdam, the Noordermarkt, next to Prinsengracht.

The large windows in the front and in the back of the apartment provide lots of natural light from outside. The apartment has a beautiful parquet floor and The kitchen is equipped with a quooker for boiling water.

The bedroom has a king-size bed and plenty of wardrobe space.

name: Woonark De Appeltuyn * Gratis parkeren
description:
At our recently built residential park De Appeltuyn, you will be very happy to stay between the ducks, swans and passing boats! Our living area has a separate area to stay in with a kitchen, bathroom, separate toilet and two double rooms. We are easy to reach by public transportation. The NDSM ferry, which will take you to and from Amsterdam Central Station, is a 7-minute bike ride from us.

We are looking forward to welcoming you for an unforgettable stay!
amenities: ['Private backyard – Fully fenced', 'Outdoor furniture', 'Children’s dinnerware', 'Board games', 'Outdoor dining area']

name: Woonhuis met tuin in Amsterdam-Noord
description: A lovely single-family house with garden in a quiet street. Just enough close to downtown. Just far enough from the center to completely relax and unwind completely. Free parking in the street. The city center is easily accessible (15 minutes) by ferry (free) or metro. Walking distance to nature reserve "Twiske".

name: A piece of calm near the Jordaan
description: Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally-located place. This beautiful one bedroom apartment will give you a unique city experience a few minutes walking from the city center. Situated close by one of the best street of Amsterdam, Haarlemmerdijk, the flat will make you love coming back home after a day rumbling through the busy streets of Amsterdam!

name: Eco-friendly Double Room in Museum Quarter
description: No description

name: Luxury apartment in old monumental police station
description: This stylish apartment is located in the heart of Amsterdam. Only 10 minutes walk from central station. Where you can go everywhere by public transport. But walking is also a good option, so you can discover all the nice gems of the Jordaan. The apartment is located on the Noordermarkt, where the farmers' market is held on Saturdays and the cloth market on Mondays.  And don't forget the world famous apple pie at Winkel43 that you can almost smell from the window.

name: SWEETS hotel Kortjewantsbrug
description:
Eye-catching bridge tower with a mind-blowing 360-degree view of Amsterdam’s city centre and waterways. Just like the outside of the tower, the interior is round – even the bed! From this unique hotel room in Amsterdam Centre, perched high above the water, you can see how centuries of development made this city into the miraculous place it is now.

SWEETS hotel Kortjewantsbrug is an independent hotel room with double bed, bathroom, pantry and daily service. The city is your hotel lobby!

name: Studio Apartment Center/Jordaan
description:
Studio apartment for 2 people, who will sleep together in a king size bed, or one on the bed and one on the sofa.
Located in the middle of the Jordaan neighbourhood, 5 min walking distance from the canals belt (prinsengracht), Anne Frank House and 10 min from the station. Super close to the famous "Winkel" apple pie, supermarkets, cafes, restaurants. Pretty, yet off-the-beaten-path location. Fantastic internet and well-equipped kitchen if you like to cook. You will love it here!

name: MyHouseboat: The best kept secret of Amsterdam!
description: Stay up to 3 (4) guests in my luxurious HOUSEBOAT. This fantastic and unique location makes the perfect choice for your stay! This gorgeous houseboat is excellently designed with your comfort in mind. Do not worry you get seasick, you won't notice a thing. A warm inviting living space features nice flooring throughout and deliciously contemporary furniture. Enjoy the outdoor space and the unique feeling of staying on a boat in the beautiful surroundings of Amsterdam.

name: Amsterdam Newest
description:
Discover Amsterdam at the perfect urban retreat in this spacious three-story house.
Our fully furnished house is in peaceful and central area with direct tram STOP to the centre 15 minutes. An ideal Airbnb choice for families or business travellers needing comfort, ample space, Free & super-fast Wi-Fi. Note: It is a family house for non smoker, not suitable for groups who is coming to enjoy freedom smoking in Amsterdam

name: Artist loft on the canal in a chill area
description:
Welcome to our cozy Amsterdam nest! Our colorful loft is facing a canal, tucked away in a quiet and local district with many hidden gems, only 5-minute walk from the vibrant Jordaan and the iconic Westerpaark.

We've poured love into crafting this space for chill vibes and cooking. The well-equipped kitchen will be very much appreciate by cooks while the large premium bed will be loved by everyone.

We love Amsterdam and we'll be super happy to share our tips to ensure you'll love it too.

name: Spacious family house!
description:
0363 033A B366 3D2D FFFA

Wonderful house devided over 3 floors, with 4 spacious bedrooms, equipped with 2 double beds and two single beds and closets. There is a small front garden. Lay out: entrance at groundfloor, private staircase to 1stfloor; livingroom with open kitchen, 2ndfloor; 2 bedrooms with bathroom, 3rdfloor 2 bedrooms, laundry room. This house is excellent located: 15 min. drive to Schiphol, 1 min walk to shops, Tram/Bus, 25 min. to centre, nearby big lake and park, free parking!

name: Art nouveau houseboat overvieuwing Amstel river
description: Very comfortable Houseboat, mahony wooden walls, art nouveau style, with terras on very central location overvieuwing the river. After a break of 4 coronayears, we are back into bussiness. In that 4 years we took the chance to renew our bathroom, renew our steering wheel cabin, a lot of painting on the deck, 3 new roofdeck ligts, and some technical adjustments you cannot see, but will make your stay more comfortable. there is centtral heating and airco for hot summer days.

name: Ruimtelijk appartement met dakterras
description:
Close to park Frankendael in the beautiful, cozy Amsterdam district "Watergraafsmeer".

The apartment with roof terrace is spacious, light and located in a quiet green street. In the neighborhood you will find all you need including countless cozy terraces, restaurants and drinks.

name: Entire 3 bedroom house, 100m2, 20 min to center
description:
Super spacious and comfortable 100 square meters house with a 50 square meter back garden that can accommodate up to 4 persons, located in a green, quiet and very accessible neighbourhood in Amsterdam.

The shopping area is just 5 min. walking distance and beautiful Gaasperpark can be reached in 15 min.

Metro station is around the corner, with direct connection to Johan Cruijff Arena (5 min.), City Centre and Central Station (20 min), Amsterdam Sloterdijk (30 min).

Energy label B.

name: Multatuli Luxury Guest Suite in top location
description: Stylish & spacious 60m2 guest suite in Amsterdam's most desirable neighbourhood. Central and convenient. Perfectly placed in easy walking distance of all the sights, transport, shops, cafes and restaurants. Quiet and peaceful bedroom, large and light living room (can be used as second bedroom),  luxurious and spacious bathroom, handy pantry. The house is a national monument built in 1790, completely renovated in 2019. In the 1820s it was the home of Multatuli, Holland's most famous author.

name: Cozy Two Bedroom Apartment in Amsterdam (75m2)
description:
Fully furnished two bedroom apartment in the heart of Amsterdam. All amenities from coffee machine to 65 inch TV, comfortable boxspring double bed to hanging swing chair, this apartment is for people who would like to have a home away from home.

Only 5 minutes walk to Wibautstraat metro station which is an intersection of M51, M53, and M54 lines. 3 minutes walk tram station (Line 1, Line 3). Bus stop is also around the corner where direct night buses to Schiphol airport pass by.

name: The July - Boat & Co 1-Bedroom Apartment
description: Our The July - Boat & Co One Bedroom Apartment is designed with your rest & relaxation in mind. Unwinding after a day of canals and museums? Happens automatically. Or balancing work and rest on your business trip? That requires no effort here. Generously sized and nicely decorated, it’s a good place to just be.

name: Cozy house on lake. Parking,easy access to center.
description: Our spacious and beautiful home is peacefully situated next to a lovely swimming and beach area by the lake. The tram to Amsterdam's city center is just a 3-minute walk away, running continuously. It's a 15-minute tram ride to Amsterdam Central. With our own parking spot and all kitchen amenities, plus luxury throughout, your stay is guaranteed to be comfortable and convenient."

name: First etage in grachtenpand
description: In our family house in the middle of Amsterdam you share the vibrant life of the city but come home to the quietest house of Amsterdam. On the edge of the Red light district in a 17th century house with a shared bathroom with other guests ( if any) . Don't expect a modern sterile apartment but real house you sleep in our art library. The best location with everything is in walking distance: restaurants, museums, bars, shops.. a real experience with a lot of personality but not a hotel
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Great attic loft with canal view in city Center
description: A very light & airy attic (30. m2) with a private entrance. Lots of windows and a canal view. Modern meets Industrial and bohemian. This 19th century building is perfectly located on the edge of the city center with metro and tram just down the street. Museum District, Waterloo square and the Red Light District are walking distance.

name: Private cosy place with 24/7 access. And 2 bikes
description: It's a petite cosy place with its own entrance. In a nice quiet historical area of the city center. With a stuffed fridge. And 2 bikes. No smoking inside or in front of the house.

name: Luxe benedenwoning met tuin bij de RAI & Pijp
description: Located within walking distance of the RAI and the Maasstraat/ Rijnstraat and the Pipe! Relax and unwind in this peaceful, stylish space. Completely newly renovated in 2022. Extensive with a lovely bath and big rains shower. Possibility to work in a separate room in the garden.

In one minute from our house you can take public transport which will take you to Amsterdam city centre in 15 minutes. The house is directly at the water, where you can swim and enjoy nature. 1 free parking place available

The citycenter is only 15 minutes away by public transport or take a stroll of 30 minuten to the famous Jordaan. Zandvoort Beach is also a short train ride away.

name: Bright, cosy, clean appartment
description: A spacious, bright, cosy and clean apartment in a very chilled and green neighboorhood, 5 min bikeride to the Vondelpark and 10 minute bikeride to the city centre! The apartment has a fully equipped kitchen, clean bathroom, spacious living room and a cosy bedroom.  It's the perfect spot for couples who would like to have a nice week(end) in Amsterdam and be close to all the highlights but prefer to stay in a quiet neighbourhood to chill at the end of the day and have a sunny balcony breakfast.

name: Catch Apartment
description:
Welcome to the Catch my lovely B&B Apartment located in the heart of Amsterdam. This apartment is fully equipped with all the necessary appliances with a relaxing bathtub. I can host up to 3 guests in the apartment. Restaurants, shops, touristic attractions are all a walking distance away. This is a B&B so a shared apartment you will have your own private space as you can see from our reviews our guests have loved the experience.

Registration # Z/23/2193403-4217074

name: Amsterdam central neighbourhood spot
description: Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally-located place.

name: Gezellig design appartement bij jordaan
description:
Stylish apartment with own garden & communal garden.

2 minutes walk from Jordaan, Amsterdam canals. In a very quiet street but very central location. Supermarkets, great restaurants all at walking distance.

Rest of Amsterdam is easily reached by tram or bus which both stop within <1 minute walk from the apartment. Train station is 25 mins walk or 10 minutes by bus.

Any questions or tips about the neighborhood or Amsterdam in general we will happily answer & help you!

name: Amsterdam Centre Studio - Sarphati
description:
Comfortable, nicely decorated and practical bed/livingroom suited for two persons.
Own entrance directly from the street, with a small street patio to drink your morning coffee.
Private bathroom with shower and toilet .
Basic kitchen facilities.

name: Romantic Houseboat in Old Center
description:
Back in the 1600s ! : Your houseboat is moored with its South view on one of the most romantic and peaceful canals, surrounded by a XVIIth century architecture and the Carillon of Zuiderkerk (1614) painted by Claude Monet (1874).

The houseboat is for 2 guests with a king size bed 2m/1m80 with its overhead window for watching stars, surrounded by a paintings gallery and its large Louis XV mirror reflecting the South windows over the canal.
Wifi by Internet cable

name: Cozy Apartment in center
description:
With 5 minutes walking distance from Central Station, this apartment offers easy access to all the city’s highlights.

Located right at the border of beautiful Jordaan district, the area is full of great restaurants, shops, and grocery stores.

The apartment comes with a fully equipped kitchen, a comfortable king size bed, and a spacious shower. The big windows in the living room provide lots of light, and the wide window shelf is the ideal place to relax in the sun or read.

name: Appartement in de mooiste straat van A'dam-Oost
description:
Stylish classic apartment with the largest and most beautiful roof terrace of Amsterdam, located in a quiet and green neighborhood near the center.

The totally renovated apartment (80m2) with new furniture is very comfortable. 2 balconies and a very large roof terrace (65m2) with always sun create an ultimate holiday feeling.

100 m from Park Frankendael with star restaurant de Kas and Merkelbach.

Walking distance of Muiderpoort station and Amstel, trams and buses towards central (within 100m).

name: Bright in the centre of Amsterdam
description: The apartment is sunny and very central - walking distance to everywhere of note. From the living room window you can see the Amstel River as it passes under the famous Magere Brug (The Skinny Bridge), 25 metres away. The apartment is on the corner between the Hermitage museum and the Carre Theatre.

name: limehome Amsterdam Hemonystraat|Queen Room+Balcony
description: At limehome, we believe that everyone deserves a better place while traveling. A place to look forward to return to. A place designed to stay®. Whether you are looking for a home away from home or a quiet place to work - our apartments feature high-quality fittings including a premium hotel bed for restful nights & suite dreams. Our digital-enabled guest journey without a physical reception and staff on-site makes your stay more convenient.

name: Cozy flat in Centrum
description:
Keep it simple at this peaceful and centrally-located place.
Our flat is located in the heart of the city, close enough to all the main spotlights but far enough to also enjoy some peace.
Most highlights can be reached by foot (15 min from the red light district, 30 min to Jordaan) or quickly by public transport or even better by renting some bikes.
There are many local bars and restaurants and cafes around, as well as green open spaces and historical spotlights.

Also situated just a few minutes walk from the lovely Rembrandtpark and Erasmus Park.

There are plenty of cafes, bars and all the essential shops just a few minutes away by foot.

The apt is situated on the canals, in the middle of the sought after Prinseneiland neighbourhood, the loveliest area of A'dam. 15 min from ANNE FRANK HOUSE. Large living room inc dining area, fully equipped kitchen, bar, 1 spacious bedroom with an ensuite bathroom. 1 smaller bed room. ELEVATOR. All amenities close, restaurants, bars, shops, central station (5 min w bus), 20 mn from airport.

name: Simple room 3 persons shared app
description: You will have you private room in a very basic shared apartment of which the kitchen is not included. Note that I live here myself and that I share a room with people that want to experience the life as a local. Note that my place is not like an hotel, but a basis place. Everybody is welcome as long as you respect the place and the neighbours as your own. You get your own key so you can come an go when you like! The area is called De Baarsjes and is very lively with a park at the of the street

name: Cozy apartment in the Oude Pijp
description:
Located in the heart of the Oude Pijp, but in a quiet part of the atmospheric Gerard Doustraat, is my cozy apartment. It was built in 1893 and contains the original facade, tastefully refurbished and equipped with every comfort.

Everything you need is within walking distance. There are several supermarkets and specialty shops for your daily shopping and my (your) favorite restaurants, bars and cafes are around the corner. And even better, within one minute you are at the Albert Cuyp Market!

name: City Center Oasis
description:
Come and feel welcome in our 100m2 design home in the middle of the center behind Dam square.
Enjoy the new kingsize beds with bathrooms ensuite, its many windows and experience the old Amsterdam style with all modern amenities you need such as a fully equipped kitchen, cosy living room with smart tv and wifi throughout the entire house ;-)

name: New apartment in the center of Amsterdam
description:
This centrally located accommodation is tastefully furnished. Perfect for couples willing to explore Amsterdam. It is located next to Weesperplein station and a 15 minute walk to Rembrandt Square.

Nearby activities:
Artis zoo - 5 minute walk
Carré Theater - 5 minute walk
Shopping center - 15 minute walk

name: Beautiful apartment in Amsterdam!
description: Experience the comfort of our charming 2-bedroom apartment in Amsterdam Zuidoost. Dive into the city's rich cultural scene, enjoying everything from bustling markets and cozy eateries to gourmet dining. With convenient access to public transportation and iconic landmarks, our serene retreat ensures both ease and tranquility for a memorable stay.

name: Charming Canal house City Centre 4p
description:
This authentic cozy studio apartment is part of a charming 17th-century canal house in the heart of Amsterdam! It also has its own entrance on the lowest floor. We prefer hosting non-cannabis smoking guests.
Please note that the oven/microwave and the clothingdryer are located in the other part of the house. We live in the other part of the house and are available to help or inform you.

Enjoy your own accommodation, your own living room, bedroom and bathroom, on your own floor. You will have complete privacy.

Several times elected the most beautiful canal of Amsterdam, it's central to everything you want to visit, yet so lovely and calm.

name: Charming family home with garden D
description:
Perfect location for a wonderful stay in Amsterdam with up to four persons. Very suitable for a family with young children.

We prefer to host families and will give them priority with bookings, but also welcome inquiries from other guests.

The apartment is situated on the ground floor and has a garden where you can relax or dine.

This is not a luxurious place, but clean and well kept. It is very affordable and connected to the rest of Amsterdam so perfect for exploring the city.

You can prepare your own meal in the spacious kitchen by the fireplace or enjoy the sun on one of the three terraces.

Sleeping up to 3 guests(no children under 12 years) , this fantastic fully private place, separate sleeping room with a 2 persons bed and a 2 persons sofabed in the livingroom, bathroom with a sink, shower and toilet for your stay in Amsterdam!

There is a closet for clothes

name: @Sisi + Suzie's Stays
description: Questions? I’m frauleinsisi on i g. Experience Amsterdam like never before at Sisi & Suzie's Stay! Dive into the vibrant energy of our youthful abode, nestled amidst historic wonders and pulsating nightlife. From Museum Het Schip to Westerpark, explore iconic landmarks mere steps away. Indulge in culinary delights at Westergasarea, where high-end restaurants and street treats await. Join us for an unforgettable adventure in the heart of Amsterdam!

name: Houseboat on the water with lovely sunny terrace!
description: My place is close to Café-Restaurant Amsterdam. The Movies, Haarlemmerdijk, Tolhuistuin and EYE - Bar Restaurant. You'll love my place because of the location, the view, and the coziness. The place is suitable for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.

name: Luxe boetiek appartement in de Pijp - veel buiten
description:
Our recently renovated apartment is situated in one of the nicest area's of the city centre, 'De Pijp'. It is a light and stylish apartment with a large living room with kitchen and dining area. On the second floor you will find 2 bedrooms and a luxury bathroom with douche and bathtub. The apartment is unique by its luxe, style and because it has 3 roof terraces.
It's perfectly located to walk to the Albert Cuyp, RAI, museum area, restaurants, bars and parks. We hope we can welcome you!

name: House with sunny garden
description: Welcome to our stylish, luxurious, and renovated 60m2 apartment in the best neighborhood of Amsterdam. name: 1. Unique houseboat Amsterdam. Private, airco.

I finally did it! This brandnew houseboat is designed with you in mind. Meaning private entrance and amenities, sound proof walls and the best view in Amsterdam overlooking the Amstel River.
On the left you see the Grand Amstel Hotel and the Royal Theater Carre, opposite Amsterdam oldest rowing club.
The light is reflected over the water. Have you ever seen a Swan lifting up out of the water? Nature at its best straight in the center of Amsterdam with little restaurants and bars gallore.

name: Sophisticated apartment in the heart of Amsterdam!
description: Cosy and spacious apartment with lots of natural light. Very organized, clean and comfortable for friends and family. Located in the heart of Amsterdam. name: Luxury apartment Amsterdam, only longterm!
description:
Beautiful, newly renovated 1 bedroom apartment in most prestigious central neighborhood Oud-Zuid. The apartment has a spacious living room, new kitchen with high end appliances, separate bedroom and luxury shower. Oud Zuid is home to some of the world's best art museums, its one of the most elegant, chic and well-heeled neighborhoods. Visit the vibrant Vondel park which is within walking ditance from the apartment. The tram station is 2min walk.

Also available for long term (6 months+)

name: B&B op woonboot met gebruik van fietsen.
description:
Our B&B - a beautiful guest room with private entrance, private sanitary facilities and private terrace on a houseboat - is a good base to discover Amsterdam and its surroundings. You may use bikes for free.
Breakfast is included. You will receive homemade bread and fresh fruit every morning; the other breakfast supplies are already in the room upon arrival. Breakfasts are vegetarian; vegan is possible upon request.
We make a two-person or two single beds for you of your choice.
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Downtown Terrace House
description: This location is right in the centre of town. The Spui square is just down the street with its variety of cafes and restaurants. Our appartement is tastefully decorated and has a huge terrace at the back. A very comfortable bedroom and large bathroom with shower and bathtub to relax after a day in the city. There's a well-equipped open kitchen where you can cook a bit or warm up take-away meals. There's some city noise but this unavoidable in centre Amsterdam.

name: Hillegomstraat
description: Newly renovated apartment close to the Vondelpark (10 minutes walk). Quiet neighborhood with good public transport amenities. Ideal place to explore the city and get the atmosphere of Amsterdam local life.

name: Home with garden in Amsterdam | sleeps 4
description: Welcome to families & couples. Enjoy Amsterdam in the Summer. It’s the best time to visit the canals, the parks, the museums, the festivals. Stay in our 110m2 home with two kingsize beds and make yourself comfortable. Relax in the garden, enjoy the WiFi sound system, or get creative in the kitchen. There's FREE PARKING in front of the house. The tram is a 1-minute walk and brings you directly to Dam square,  Leidse square, the canals, Vondelpark etc.
amenities: ['Babysitter recommendations', 'Outdoor furniture', 'Blender', 'Bathtub', 'Children’s books and toys', 'Board games']

name: Twin beds, AC, en suite bath & freebie WiFi
description:
This bright and cosy standard twin room comes with two single beds, air-conditioning, 32" TV and free Wi-Fi. All rooms in the Amsterdam City Centre hotel offer comfort and cleanliness at a budget price to allow you to spend time exploring this great city outside of your hotel room.
Please note that 12.5% Amsterdam city tourist tax is not included in the Airbnb price and must be paid directly to the hotel.

name: Backstage Hotel Triple Room
description:
Backstage Hotel is the perfect start and end for your Amsterdam adventure! Close by, you'll find iconic music venues like the Melkweg, Paradiso, BourbonStreet, and Maloe Melo.

You can pick up a guitar and play! (just bring a little talent). If you feel like listening, you can borrow a record player and some records from our collection. All of our rooms are designed in a music theme. Take a look at our gallery!

This room is a perfect fit for 3!

*The Backstage hotel does not have an elevator.

name: Generator - Bed in 4 bed Dorm
description: Book a bed (or more) in our shared 4-Bed Dorm at Generator Amsterdam. This room features 2 bunks (4 beds) and a private bathroom, offering a comfortable stay for travelers. Each bunk is equipped with a light, personal shelf, USB charging station, and under-bed lockers. Pillow, duvet, and linen are included. Towels are available at reception for a small fee. Please note, this room is for guests aged 18 and over only. Perfect for those seeking a social yet comfortable experience.

name: Luxe Design Apt - Dichtbij Vondelpark&Schiphol
description:
- Newly renovated with modern design
- 95m² spacious and bright apartment
- 2 floors, upstairs is the living room
- Modern kitchen with marble cooking island and Miele appliances
- Luxurious bathroom with rain shower and bath
- Bedroom with workspace, ideal for working from home
- Located in sought-after Amsterdam South
- Within walking distance of the Vondelpark, coffee shops, supermarkets and shops
-10min by car/Uber to Schiphol
-20 min by bus to Schiphol
- Perfect for a comfortable stay

name: Bright, Stylish, Cozy Familyhouse
description: Beautiful 3-story house in an old town house just outside the center of Amsterdam.  Recently renovated with wooden floors, a spacious bathroom, two toilets and a modern kitchen. Stunning Roof Terrace on both the first floor and the third floor. This place is great for a family with children.

name: Singel Hotel Amsterdam: Standard Twin Room
description:
A charming gem, right in the heart of Amsterdam. The Singel Hotel Amsterdam*** is known for its historic charm and offers daily accommodation to both tourists and business travellers. Our fantastic location, atmospheric accommodation and excellent service guarantee you one of the most pleasant overnight stays in Amsterdam.

Our rich breakfast buffet can be booked at check-in for only € 15.00.

name: Cosy apartment near Vondelpark
description: No description
amenities: ['Outdoor furniture', 'Blender', 'Bathtub', 'Free dryer – In unit', 'Board games', 'Outdoor dining area', 'Baking sheet']

name: Cute Apartment in the heart of De Pijp
description:
Lovely, cute 2-bedroom apartment (75 m2) situated very close to the city center and in the heart of De Pijp (gastronomical district of Amsterdam).

The bedrooms (master + double bed) are suited for 4 people.

The apartment is fully equipped if you would like to cook at home. I am also happy to give some eating, tourism, or other tips.

name: Numa | Modern Duplex Suite in central Amsterdam
description: This comfortable duplex suite offers 39.4 sqm of space. Ideal for up to two people, its double bed (160x200) and modern bathroom with shower make this stay a perfect way to experience Amsterdam. There’s also a kitchen and a dining table, so you’ll have everything you need for maximum comfort and minimal stress.

name: Studio apartment in Unesco World Heritage Area.
description:
This studio apartement is situated in a 17th Century Canal house, on the Prinsengracht (one of the 3 major canals), right in the center of Amsterdam, within the UNESCO WORLD HERITAGE AREA.

The Studio has its own private entrance along the canal, with canal view and a well equipped private kitchen, a large table and modern private bathroom.

During the day you can sit outside on the bench in front of the apartment on the sunny side of the canal, nice to see people passing by.

name: A stylish and comfortable family home with garden
description:
This airy modern home is in a tranquil location on the edge of a park. The city centre and the popular NDSM harbour area are 5-15 minutes away by bike, bus, metro or ferry. Here you can find the vibrant Amsterdam city life -museums, restaurants, theatres, festivals, the canal district etc.- that you come to see. Go the other way and 15 minutes later you can be swimming in a lake in the conservation area the "Twiske" washing off the city dust.
Suitable for familes or couples, not parties.

name: Amazing appartement
description: Beautiful appartement in amsterdam. Close to the center and the airport.

name: HotSpot 2 Bedroom with balcony
description: Modern two bedroom, in a block of seven apartments, located at Nieuwmarkt, just a ten-minute walk from Central Station and five minutes from Dam Square. The apartment comes with a well-equipped two bedrooms, kitchen, bathroom, separate toilet and private balcony where you can smoke if you wish.

name: 120m2 -   City Center with Terrace
description:
120 m2, dublex, 2 bedroom apartment very close to Jordaan.

Located in the corner Spaarndammerstraat shopping street with nice cafes and restaurants.

name: Cozy room nearby Amsterdam centre with bike rent
description:
Cosy perfectly located private room near city center with bike rent. Dam, Leidseplein and Rembrandtplein are only 15 min by tram or bike. Lively Mercatorplein area offers such conveniences as a supermarket, various shops, bakkery, coffee rooms, cafes and restaurants (i.e. Zurich).
The space is suitable for couples and group of friends of max 2 people (there is a double bed. The guests access the room straight from the entrance hall 24/7 so there is a high level of privacy.

name: Amsterdam - 120m2 Appartement
description:
Public transport in front of the door.
Large apartment with enough space with an extra double inflatable bed.
Running belt, washing machine and dryer available.
House has enough space and a balcony for any bbq.
1 Toilet and 1 Bathroom with toilet and bathtub
2 Fridge cabinets, one small built-in and one American.
Kitchen is electric.
Around the house you have several parks for hiking, also you have several small centers within walking distance.

name: Familiewoning (niet voor vriendengroepen)
description: This home is our home that we normally live in. When you rent our house, we are probably on vacation ourselves. We love to give others a fun experience this way. My friend and our 2 kids are very happy with our house. We live in a quiet green and child-friendly neighborhood and are actually only 20 minutes from the center of Amsterdam. We hope you will have a nice stay in our house and look forward to welcoming you!

name: Parkview Apartment with sunny balcony
description:
Modern, comfy and well equipped apartment in Amsterdam. Right outside is the Erasmus Park. Trams and buses stop just behind my place. A tram will take you to the city centre (Leidseplein) in ten minutes. Balcony is on the sunny side.

You can rent bikes here in the street, and we have a great pizza place and other bars and restaurants around the corner.

name: Family friendly apartment in central Amsterdam
description: Located near a lot of gems within walking distance. There is a patio, kitchen and all utensils, shower room with basic soap and shampoo. Towels and linens are available. You can enjoy a quiet neighbourhood in the city, where it's not too touristy. Preferably we rent out our home to families or couples, but not to large groups of adults.

description: Amazing and bright ground floor apartment in Amsterdam's city centre, perfect for couples or young families! Located on a quiet side street of the Wibautstraat, a 2 minute walk from the Amstel river, where you can find peace and quiet by going for a walk, SUP or swim, or find Dutch "gezellligheid" at one of the buzzing terraces at Cafe Hesp or Ysbreeker. The apartment is equipped with a modern kitchen and bathroom, a spacious living room, bedroom with walk-in closet and a South-facing garden.

description:
Spacious, bright, family house with four bedrooms and a lovely garden. Our house has everything you need to have a carefree and nice stay with young children, including toys :-).

Located in "De Bongerd" in Amsterdam Noord. A short 15-minute walk from the NDSM, the cultural hotspot in Noord and the ferries towards Amsterdam central and the city center.

name: Anny's warehouse city centre!
description: Sleeping up to 2 guests this fantastic bed and breakfast makes the perfect choice for your stay in the heart of Amsterdam! The building is a monumental warehouse founded in 1646, even Rembrandt has passed my beautiful house!
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: HIP AND STYLISH B&B in JORDAAN
description: The B&B is within walking distance (15 min) of C. Station. Located between the Brouwersgracht (most beautiful canal in Amsterdam) and the Haarlemmerdijk (nicest shopping street in the Netherlands). On the edge of the Jordaan, in a quiet street.  Within walking distance of many attractions. The B&B is equipped with comfortable beds, pantry with microwave, kettle, coffee machine. Coffee and tea available. Fast Internet, Smart TV and Netflix. The bathroom has a shower and hand shower. Toilet's separate.
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Hotel room in Adam Tower
description: With its bold presence in Amsterdam’s A’DAM Tower, Sir Adam resonates with the vibrant energy of the building’s present occupants, including Sony, Semifest and MassiveMusic. It’s just behind the city’s Central Station and overlooks the IJ River. Make sure to check out the rooftop for 360-degree views of the city.

name: Large family house near the city centre!
description: When you want to visit Amsterdam with your kids this is the perfect house for you! Far enough from the city to enjoy some peace and quiet, but close enough to cycle towards the city (within 20 minutes on dam square). Or take the tram right on the doorstep straight to Leidseplein. You can enjoy the little beach at the end of the street (Sloterstrand), go to the playgarden 50 meters down the road or walk to the lovely Sloterpark across the road. There is a swimming pool right across the street!

name: Bright and cozy apartment in Amsterdam South
description: Bright and cozy apartment in Amsterdam Zuid. Located in a quiet and friendly neighborhood, it's the perfect spot to enjoy the holiday season. Just a 15m tram or bike ride away from the vibrant city center and around the corner from the famous Vondelpark and Museums District. Enjoy the local favorite spots, visit the spectacular ice skating rink at the Museumplein and when you get home, you can wind down in our cozy place with all the facilities you need.

name: ★★★★ CANAL APARTMENT | AMSTERDAM CENTRAL | 4P ★★★★
description:
This type of extraordinary accomodation, in this amazing neighborhood, is rarely available! A nicely designed 7 stylish apartment.

Warm & cosy with a chique look.

Experience the joy of the center of Amsterdam and the liveliness of this famous historic neighborhood, while enjoying the tranquility of living in a historic apartment which recently has been fully renovated to a beautiful and luxurious short-stay.

All amenities are included, so all you need to do is bring your suitcase!

name: Nederlands
description: This cozy studio in the Jordaan is located in the bustling center of Amsterdam. A stone's throw away you will find the Anne Frank House, Central Station, Dam Square and Nine Streets. The studio is tastefully and efficiently furnished. With a simple folding double bed you can transform the living area into a cozy sleeping environment in an instant. Would you prefer more space and a more "homely" feeling? Fold the bed, plop down in the comfortable butterfly chair or crawl on the teddy couch.
amenities: ['Coffee maker: espresso machine', 'Free washer – In unit']

name: SWEETS hotel Kattenslootbrug
description:
A 1950s bridge house in the late ‘Amsterdam School’ style, bordering the popular Jordaan area and the heart of Amsterdam.

Take a stroll to the tourist-friendly Haarlemmer street (8 minutes) with some of the city’s best bars, restaurants and patisseries. The popular Noordermarkt, open on Saturdays and Mondays is a paradise for organic food lovers and antique fans, within walking distance (9 minutes). Amsterdam Central Station is directly accessible by bus or tram (17 minutes).

name: Comfort & Cultural Charm: 2-Bed Oasis (Westerpark)
description:
Enjoy a stylish experience at this two bedroom flat in Amsterdam West, a 2-minute walk from Westerpark.

The place is a small gem, carefully curated with items and furniture that tell a tale of travel, culture and experiences - from a hard-wood bookcase brought over from Singapore, to plush suede dining chairs that were once part of an Armenian church, down to volcanic rocks that were spat out by Stromboli in the Aeolian Islands.

Close to restaurants, bars and public transport.

name: Cozy Studio in the heart of Amsterdam
description:
Your own private studio at a traditional canalhouse (build in 1750) in the centre of Amsterdam. Close to all the mayor attractions but also located at one one of the greenest and most safest areas of the city.

You will have your own room with private shower and toilet. The room is equipped with a kitchenette, which offers a small fridge, kettle and coffee machine.

name: Beautiful apartment with garden nearby city centre
description:
Do you want to sleep in a very nice apartment with open view and a very nice garden?

You will have fully access to the apartment, including kitchen and bathroom. You even can take a bath after your long walks in the city.
The apartment is located in the South of Amsterdam, in a nice and quite neighborhood 15 minutes from city centre. Tram, train and bus stops are 5 min walk away and are have direct connections to the city center and Schiphol Airport.
Preference for long stay guests (+15 days)

name: 100m2 Amsterdam ground floor family apartment
description: Have fun with the whole family at this stylish place. Less then 10 min from the Rijksmuseum by bike. Walking distance from the Beatrixpark and the Pijp

name: Stunning houseboat in center of Amsterdam
description:
Very nice hidden location on the amstel river close to the famous Carre theater, with international musicals and shows and the even more famous neighbour Amstel Hotel, where international pop stars stay when they do concerts in holland.
Next door is the amazing Lempica bar for breakfast, lunch, and dinner, or just coctails, if you don't want to cook yourself. Close by the Albert Cuyp market, for fresh fruits and vegatables, and 10 minutes walk from the flee market, and the opera house!

2 Sleeping Sofas both expand to sleep 2 people.
2 double beds

name: Fijne woning in de Jordaan
description: Just get away from it all in this soothing, centrally located accommodation.

name: Complete gezinswoning met tuin
description:
A complete family home in a unique, green and child-friendly neighborhood. Enjoy the adventure of Amsterdam, with a quiet village feeling as a base.
Our home is lovingly decorated for a family. It can accommodate two adults and 2-3 children. With 1 double bed it is not suitable for more than 2 adults. With a spacious kitchen, two bathrooms, sunny garden(s) and even toys.
Your family will be close to everything when you stay at this centrally-located place.

name: Calm haven for lovers of art and books
description:
A cozy room in a carefully decorated 76-sq-m apartment.
Your room is small but very comfortable, with a stylish shared bathroom next door.
Guests love the comfort of the bed, the quiet neighbourhood, interior details and ease of access to the rest of the city.
You'll be sharing the apartment with me, a 35-year-old Irishman, and Baloo, a large and gentle dog.
A scenic walk from the Central Station and the charming Jordaan, I think you'll be pleasantly surprised by this little corner of the city.

name: 4prs ruim, licht en nieuw appartement in Amsterdam
description:
Welcome to our beautiful stylish house of 80 square meters in the heart of Amsterdam!

Space:
Enjoy the luxury kitchen. The apartment features two bedrooms with comfortable double beds. The bathroom is equipped with both a shower and a bath.

Location:
Our house is located in the center of Amsterdam, in the desirable Oud-Zuid neighborhood, within walking distance of the famous Vondelpark and nearby attractions such as the Rijksmuseum.

name: Perfect Luxury for business travelers and families

3 minute walk from RAI convention Center

120m2 very light and warm spacious house with huge garden, filled with high quality furniture.

Master bedroom with king sized hotel quality bed and double doors which open to the garden.

Large extra bedroom and smaller 3rd bedroom, large bathroom with bathtub and separate walk in shower.

The open kitchen is fully equipped and connects to the garden.

Close to a variety of bars & restaurants.

Only available for business travelers and families.

name: SWEETS hotel Scharrebiersluis
description: A tiny character-filled bridge house in the heart of old Amsterdam, neighbouring a traditional Dutch brown café. This adorable house is a stone’s throw from the river IJ, the Scheepvaart (National Maritime) Museum and the impressive NEMO Science Museum. The surrounding neighbourhood offers quaint cafés for a bite to eat or to sample a local brew. Amsterdam Central Station is directly accessible by bus (10 minutes).

name: Stylish private studio Waterside Bikes & Parking
description:
Stylish self contained studio B&B in a family villa in a green area of Amsterdam North, within cycling distance from the hip and happening NDSM where the free ferry leaves to Central Station. The studio has a bedroom and living room by the waterside with it's own terrace. You can use the canoe for an evening peddle.
There are free bikes that can be borrowed when requested in advance. The bus that goes to Sloterdijk or the metro is at a 5 minute walk. Also there is a free parking space in front

name: Apartment with canal view close to Vondelpark

The apartment has its own entrance, 1 bedroom with a king-size bed, a bathroom with walk-in shower, a fully equipped kitchenette, spacious living/dining area and a balcony. The location is in the middle of  Hoofddorppleinbuurt, in a green and quiet street. Whitin walking distance you can find various shops, supermarkets, cafes and restaurants. Within minutes you are in the Vondelpark and have good connection for public transport.

name: The Barn with Hot Tub
description: Inspired by the traditional Dutch rural barns. This two story cabin (60m2)  has two master bedrooms with queen size beds, a stylish unique interior and a bathroom on the first floor. On the ground floor is the kitchen and a lounge with a wood-burning stove where you have plenty of space to relax. Large sliding glass doors give access to the private deck in the garden with lounge chairs. The Barn is the ideal place to enjoy together.

name: Comfortable and well-situated apartment (Jordaan)

name: New Pijp Studio
description:
This apartment is located in very hip area of Amsterdam called “De Pijp”, with all kinds of restaurants and bars and also the touristic city centre is very close.
Staying in this apartment will give you a typical taste of how the Dutch people live in Amsterdam.

The studio has a very comfortable bed and a spacious bathroom. The studio has a little kitchenette with coffee and tea facilities.

name: De Baarsjes, Amsterdam
description:
This cozy apartment is located in the beloved and green Orteliusstraat next to the entrance of the Rembrandtpark.
The apartment was completely and high-quality renovated in 2021 and has a bright extension with steel doors. The lovely herringbone floor, modern white kitchen, and thoughtfully applied lighting give this apartment a stunning contemporary look.
The downstairs house has two spacious bedrooms, two bathrooms and a lovely sunny garden on the east of about 36 m2.

Relax and slow down in this peaceful, stylish space.
Welcome to Casa Sereno!

Upon entering, you will be welcomed by a spacious and bright living room, where large windows let in the natural light and offer a beautiful view of the surrounding nature. The interior is minimalist and refined, with hand-picked furniture that embody comfort and style. Soft colors and good materials, dominate the interior, contributing to a harmonious and warm atmosphere.

name: Cozy Apartment in Amsterdam
description:
We live here very comfortably and enjoy everything the city has to offer us, and we hope that you will also enjoy your stay here!

This apartment is located on the 1st floor overlooking a charming garden and an adjacent balcony.

Live like a local in the most vibrant neighborhood of Amsterdam: Amsterdam East. Abundant bars, restaurants, and shops are just around the corner. After a day of exploring the city, you can relax in the nearby park, just a 2-minute walk away.

name: nice clean sunny and central room
description:
The room is 15m² big and very bright with lots of sunlight. The apartment is on the top level in a nice and very quiet and green area next to the Westerpark, situated on a small canal.
You've got a double bed which you can share with 2 people. (Let me know if you wish to have two separate blankets.) There is a height adjustable table (sitting till standing height) and a spare monitor which you are welcome to use!

name: Appartement met tuin, groene gracht! 22 aug-7 sep
description:
Relax and slow down in this peaceful, stylish space. Time to enjoy a prime location in Amsterdam South in our cozy sun apartment with garden, on a quiet green canal and in the vicinity of all the action and sights.

Strolling along the green canals, you'll be in the breathtaking Vondelpark within minutes! Tram 2 takes you to Dam Square in 15 minutes.

The 70m2 apartment is fully equipped with everything you need!

name: Sleeping in a Church - Most Epic Room at BUNK
description: BUNK Hotel Amsterdam is situated in the hip, up-and-coming neighbourhood of Amsterdam Noord, based in the former St. Rita church just 5 minutes from Amsterdam Central Station. BUNK bridges the gap between hotels and hostels by combining affordable luxury rooms and smartly designed semi-private pods, whilst creating a place for communal wonderment, with inclusive events housed in our sustainable restaurant and other shared areas. BUNK... a gathering place for travellers, locals and artists alike!

name: Adorable 4 bedroom apartment
description:
Our one of a kind enormous apartment has 4 bedrooms and 1 bathroom. The 100m2 apartment has a large living room and kitchen especially fit for 7 guests!


Super-spacious apartment for seven guests in the best of all locations at Nieuwmarkt Square. Decorated in a contemporary style, the 100m2 space comprises four bedrooms, living room, well-equipped kitchen, bathroom and separate toilet.

name: Groen en centraal tophuis
description: Green, quiet and yet right in the city center, top house, 6 rooms (3 bedrooms), garden and balcony,. 200 m from Westerpark and 800 m from Jordaan. In ecowijkje, so in the greenery right in the middle of the city. Please rent for more weeks ( than discount possible), due to sabbatical of 4 weeks

name: Perfectly situated cosy apartment!!
description: I love my place and it's location!! Cosy nice condo. well maintained and easy access. Nice calm side street in the heart of the city with an awesome sunny side balcony. Almost everything is walking distance.

name: Historic designer house in the heart of AMS
description:
A concept apartment, on a quiet beautiful hidden street in central Amsterdam.

5 mins cycle from Central Station, the Zoo, Nemo, botanical gardens and the best outdoor swim spot in the city. Some of the most hyped restaurants, bars and cafes in Amsterdam are all within a very short walking distance.

The apartment has its own entrance and is split over 2 levels. it's a smart automated home, with high end appliances; 3 x ovens, coffee machine, dishwasher, washing machine.

name: North Amsterdam family house
description:
We offer you a spacious 85m2 home with a beautiful summer garden perfect for bbqs and a lot of privacy and incl. free parking spot (unique in Amsterdam).
The city centre is within close reach. It's 7 minutes biking to the creative NDSM wharf, with lots of cafes, musea and restaurants. From there you can also cross easily and cozy with the ferry to Central Station or to Westerpark. If you look for nature, it is only a 10 minutes cycling trip to the natural reserve Twiske.

name: "De Pijp" Canal View Guest Suite with Private Bath
description:
Private and luxurious canal side suite with beautiful views of the canals and city skyline, centrally located and just steps away from all the major museums.
You will have a hotel style lockable and air-conditioned room with private en suite bathroom at your disposal. Just outside the room there is a kitchenette featuring a full size fridge, Nespresso coffee maker and electric kettle, suitable for preparing breakfast and light meals. Coffee and tea included free of charge.
amenities: ['Free washer – In unit', 'Canal view', 'Free dryer – In unit', 'City skyline view']

name: Fabulous flat in the heart of Amsterdam
description:
PLEASE NOTE: THIS IS ONLY SUITABLE FOR A COUPLE (no second bed or couch sleeping arrangements)

It can't be more central! Light modern spacious appartment with one bedroom and roof terrace. This amazing place is all you need to have great time in Amsterdam!
Please NOTE: Apartment located on 3d floor and as with most apartment buildings and houses in Central Amsterdam our building DOES NOT have an elevator.

THIS APARTMENT has one locked room, not for guests use

name: Happy Family Home Amsterdam
description: Everything for your family is at your fingertips at this centrally-located accommodation. Very spacious with 4 bedrooms each with a private bathroom, in addition to 3 separate toilets. Very spacious kitchen with all possibilities and garden. That in the middle of Amsterdam within walking distance of the van Gogh museum and the Vondelpark to name a few.

name: B&B Felix De Pijp Amsterdam apartment 2
description: Welcome to my charming Bed & Breakfast located in the vibrant Gerard Doustraat in the 'De Pijp' district, just a stone's throw away from the famous Albert Cuyp Market. The tastefully decorated room offers comfort and charm, featuring a delightful double bed and modern amenities. Immerse yourself in the lively atmosphere of De Pijp, renowned for its diverse array of delightful restaurants, bars, breakfast spots, outdoor terraces, and trendy boutiques.
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Cosy room in bohemian apartment (shared)
description:
Upon arrival you find a cute Bohemian place & room with a high double bed and a lovely lounge couch beneath. You can use our garden, kitchen and shower anytime & use our Dutch bikes for free. No weird house rules, just feel at home here! Private rooms, rest happily shared with Henkk & sons! At times you might meet other guests.

If you are (max) 4 people you could tuse the extra bedroom (big double bed), fee 49€ p/n.

Smoking weed is not allowed in/near the apartment.
Read the reviews!
