name: Luxury city house | Spacious, design & big garden
description:
Beautiful large & luxurious design apartment with spacious kitchen area, living room and dining area. It's located in the hip Oud-West neighbourhood, which is 5 min on foot from the city center, Museumdistrict and Vondelpark. One block away from the cosy Nine Streets.

Garden, open living room / kitchen, luxury bathroom, WIFI.

name: Classic APT in Classy South!
description: This classic apartment is spacious and the perfect place for a loverly stay. Located very close to the city center and the RAI  in a trendy  neighborhood, this apt has 3 bedrooms, one bathroom, a living room and a balcony!
amenities: ['Free washer – In unit', 'Free dryer – In unit']

name: Family house with garden
description:
Our family house is close to the Vondelpark (a 15 minute walk), the start of the city centre. Tram 2 stops just around the corner and takes you to all the nice musea and neigbourhouds, straight through the centre to Central Station. National Geographic says tram 2 to be one of the best tram-rides in the world. By bike is actually the best way to visit Amsterdam, so you are free to use ours, including child seats :).

Our house hosts a maximum of 4 adults and 2 kids. We only host families.

name: Canal view apartment with stunning terrace
description: If you are searching for a real Amsterdam experience, this roof-top apartment is what you need...a Monumental house in the middle of the Jordaan area. This special place is close to everything, making it easy to plan your visit. Once at the top, a very bright apartment awaits you with a beautiful panoramic roof terrace where you can enjoy the view of the city from above.

name: "Serendipity" 22m2 private space + bikes
description:
Located in the greenest neighbourhood of Amsterdam centre ("Plantage Buurt"), we are offering on the ground floor an ideal space for couples. It has a queen size box spring and a bathroom. All the main tourist attractions are easily reachable by either public transportation or bikes. We provide two bikes for you to use.

* Check-in is from 15:00 to 20:00, check your arrival time before you book! *
* Since 2019, it is not possible to cook here!*

name: Amsterdam apartment in de pijp near Museum square
description:
Comfortable and light one-bedroom apartment on the first floor in de Pijp. The neighborhood is hip and lively and the apartment has everything you need.
Right around the corner, you will the metro which will take you straight to the centre. But why leave?
You’ll love my place because of the great natural light, the comfortable bed and the large balcony on the south. I've put a lot of love into designing the space, and I can't wait to share it with you.

Liefs,
Pim

name: Lovely loft next to Westerpark
description:
🙌Gorgeous studio in Amsterdam! You are stone throw away from Amsterdam centrum and 2min from the Westerpark.

Experience real Amsterdam!!! ❤️

Your area a little authentic A’dam 😻numerous restaurants 🧑‍🍳and buzz life 🎇true Amsterdam, authentic vibe not your typical tourist trap.

The studio is truly a 💎 of the city and freedom to explore all around.
Also in the building free gym 🏋️‍♀️🤸‍♀️and terrace to relax after a long day outside.

The studio is primarily for 2 however there is a sofa bed available.

name: Waterfront studio 'Room With A Few'
description: Our design studio is located in the watery and green part of Amsterdam, less than 12 minutes by tram from the historic city center. This family room (max 3 adults and 1child) is on the ground floor, right on the waterfront, with a private entrance and a free parking place and wifi. A beautiful private garden with a fireplace and a floating terrace from which you can take a swim or explore the area  in our 2-person canoe. Around the corner is a shopping center, Saturday market and takeaways.

name: Design loft with sunroom and garden in trendy area
description: Hello, we are Ernst & Sylvia, a married couple who would like to make our loft (82 m2) available to people who appreciate a quiet home base in the bustling Baarsjes neighborhood in our city of Amsterdam.  We completely renovated the apartment and furnished it with design from Scandinavia, Ibiza and other countries. The glass roof makes it a very bright apartment. Guests especially appreciate the adjacent garden where you can enjoy a cup of coffee or glass of wine. We are happy to welcome you!

name: Canal view apartment in Amsterdam
description: Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally-located place.

name: 1 bed apartment with rooftop balcony skyline views
description:
This beautiful sunny apartment on the top floor over looks the lively neighborhood of De Pijp. It is 1 street behind the Albert Cuyp market, short walk to Rijksmuseum, Heineken brewery and Van Gogh Museum and Vondel Park.
This apartment is on the top floor (no elevator) with private 30m2 rooftop overlooking Amsterdam. It has a BBQ, lounge set & dining table. It also includes a washer/dryer and a fully equipped kitchen. The apartment is in a very vibrant area with lots of bars/ cafes.

name: Parkside Spacious Flat with Garden
description: Our spacious flat, nestled between Vondelpark and Rembrandtpark, is the ultimate oasis in the proximity of the centre. It has an open living room with a garden view, spa-like bathroom, a master bedroom and a convertible room: a second bedroom or an office. Our spacious fully-equipped kitchen has a Mocca Master coffee machine, oven and air fryer. Just a short bike ride from Leidseplein and Amsterdamse Bos, the flat is the perfect escape while still remaining close to everything the city offers.

name: Numa | Family Maisonette in central Amsterdam
description: This comfortable maisonette offers 85.3 sqm of space. Ideal for up to six people, its double bed (160x200), sofabed (160x200), two single beds (80x200), and modern bathroom with shower make this stay a perfect way to experience Amsterdam. There’s also a kitchen and a dining table, so you’ll have everything you need for maximum comfort and minimal stress.

name: The July - Twenty Eight-2-Bedroom/Family Apartment
description: At The July - Twenty Eight, we know that ‘the more, the merrier’ could only become such a cliché because it’s true. Our spacious Two Bedroom Apartments provide not just the perfect space, but also that perfect extra space you often need to savour life together – whether you’re on a business trip with trusted colleagues, away with your family or exploring Amsterdam together with fellow-travelling couples or friends – or simply enjoy a palatial feel to your apartment.

name: Charming and spacious apartment
description: Charming and light apartment which was recently renovated and decorated. The atmosphere is warm and cosy.  The apartment is located on the 4th floor, living room basks in the warmth of sunlight. Quiet and comfortable neighborhoud, with bars, restaurants, supermarkets, public transport and highway nearby. Access to the property is convenient with plenty of street parking availability. Great location to explore the city or visit RAI convention center.

name: Floating designer house ( houseboat )
description:
Amazing (floating!) designer house experience! Light, modern, sustainable house built by Amsterdam architect Julius Taminiau. Quiet and peaceful neighborhood, very family friendly. A floating house but feels like a normal house (not moving!). Close to cozy Amsterdam South, Amsterdam WTC, and the city centre (tram/metro/train connection very nearby).

The houseboat is built in 2016 and has all the conveniences of a modern house (underfloor heating, very well insulated (asthma friendly) etc)

name: City Center Amsterdam Luxe King Apartment > 80 m3
description: Modern, bright equipment with kitchen, living room and 2 bedrooms IN the heart OF Amsterdam

name: Beautiful & authentic apartment
description:
Ever wanted to stay in a traditional studio located in a traditional building of the Golden Age in the heart of Amsterdam? This place is situated @ Amsterdam UNESCO Wold Heritage. All the great places and sights are within walking distance! First of all you loive at the canal belt, DAM square-2min, Leidsesquare-10min,Nine streets area- 5min, Museum square- 15min.

Note: like many Amsterdam houses there is a staircase; it keeps us Dutchies fit 😊. There is no TV in the apartment.

name: Lovely apartment in Amsterdam
description:
A spacious apartment for two on its own or in pairs.

The apartment is in the popular and centrally located neighborhood de Pijp. In the Van Woustraat around the corner, everything is available: from sandwich shops to shops and restaurants.

The house has all the comforts.

name: Beautiful central & quiet apartment
description: Cozy two bedroom apartment in a fantastic location, conveniently located on a quiet side street yet within walking distance of all main attractions in the city center.

name: Stylish 4 People Apartment Pijp
description: 2-Bedroom apartment in Pijp, Amsterdam! Contemporary decor, and the fully-equipped kitchen make it ideal for couples, friends, or small families.Located 5 minutes away from Metro. Pijp is a cozy neighbourhood full of nice cafes, bars and restaurants, and it’s one of the most popular neighbourhoods. You can reach the center with walking distance or 7 mins by public transport. Immerse yourself in Pijp's cozy atmosphere, explore nearby cafes, and enjoy easy access to attractions.

name: Beautiful studio in Museumkwartier(long term only)
description: Beautiful, recently renovated furnished studio in one of the best neighborhoods of Amsterdam, Museumkwartier. Famous museums, restaurants, gyms, grocery stores are all within a walking distance. The studio is equipped with everything you need for your stay: modern kitchen with high end electrical and cooking appliances, smart TV, internet, washing machine. Enjoy your stay with a beautiful view of Amsterdam canals! This rental is Long term only : 6+ months

name: Historic canal house studio
description: I hereby rent out my unique, recently renovated and climate-friendly studio apartment. I have been living in this special place for over 10 years now, right in the middle of Amsterdam's historic center and on one of the city's most beautiful canals. Central Station is within walking distance and therefore my apartment is easily accessible from your arrival in Amsterdam.

name: Maisonette with garden
description:
Clean/spacious apartment of 75 m2 +view large courtyard garden. 2 bedrooms, fully equipped kitchen for 6 people, bathroom and separate toilet. Living room, 2 balconies and a spacious garden.
Total sleep capacity: 4 people.
7 nights or more, weekly cleaning lady. For additional payment, more cleaning services can be booked.
- Towels are provided
- Bed linen incl.
- Free use washing machine
- Tips for Amsterdam
- Parking( 15 euros per 24 hours) on license plate.

name: Luxurious Amsterdam apartment with sunny garden
description:
An apartment with a spacious living room, luxurious kitchen, large bathroom, and delightful sunny garden.

The master bedroom is equipped with a king-size double bed and a wardrobe.

The second bedroom will be locked to store our personal belongings, ensuring closets are empty for you during your stay.

If desired, we will set up a nice additional bed for a third person/child.

Lastly, there is a very spacious bathroom with a double sink, walk-in shower, and bathtub.

name: NEW: Exquisite Boat House @ Canal | @AMS Jordaan
description: Enchanting Boat House on Brouwersgracht, Amsterdam. Embrace canal living in this serene retreat. Unparalleled location, cozy furnishings, and captivating views. Discover the city's charm from this unique getaway. Book now for an unforgettable Amsterdam experience!

name: Romantic home in the heart of Amsterdam
description:
During my holidays, Im opening my cozy home in the very center of Amsterdam for guests.

Lavishly decorated with lots of art, pictures, candles, floral wallpaper and retro furniture, the house is literally 10 minutes walking from the Central Station, just around the corner of the Dam square. With a view on the W Hotel and the classic Van Daele café. You can discover Amsterdam on foot!

name: Authentic Amsterdam Canal Home Experience
description:
Located between 'de Amstel' and 'de Plantage', in a beautiful location, we offer our beautiful 19th-century apartment. The home is easily reachable via the Amsterdam metro system, with the metro stop Weesperplein just around the corner.

The Amstel river, National Opera & Ballet House, and Artis Zoo are all just a ten minute walk away.

An ideal place for those wishing for a comfortable stay in a beautiful location in the Amsterdam Canal belt.

name: Cosy room in Amsterdam Oost
description: Modern and newly renovated, 2 bedroom apartment in vibrant Amsterdam Oost. A quiet location yet close to the city centre located next to a fine canal. The flat has a bright living room, a big kitchen, a bathroom with shower and washbasin, a separate toilet and a bedroom with double bed. Facilities: a supermarket (2 minutes walk), many restaurants and bars, the beautiful Frankendaelpark as well as Oosterpark in walking distance (3 minutes). Accessibility: Tram within walking distance.

name: Charming Family House in the Heart of Amsterdam
description: Welcome to our beautiful family home in the heart of Amsterdam, the Jordaan district! Located around the corner of the famous Noordermarkt and amidst vibrant bars and restaurants, yet unbelievably peaceful, this is the perfect getaway. This spacious home boasts a huge, beautifully decorated kitchen, a large living room, and three cozy bedrooms.

name: Numa | Modern Apartment with AC near Oosterpark
description:
This comfortable apartment with one bedroom offers 32 sqm of space. Ideal for up to four people, its double bed (160x200), sofa bed (160x200) and modern bathroom with shower or bathtub make this stay a perfect way to experience Amsterdam. The room also offers air conditioning, a dining table, and a kitchen, so you’ll have everything you need for maximum comfort and minimal stress.

Please note that the rooms are only accessible by stairs as there is no elevator in the building.

name: Great Private studio best location | Center, Canal
description:
For a unique and great experience in Amsterdam, this is the place to stay!

My apartment, which this studio is part of, is located between the Canal district, the famous Jordaan district and the Leidse Square, right in the heart of town.

The fully private studio is quiet and has a nice atmosphere. It's accommodated with a queen-sized bed where you get to rest after a day of sight-seeing.

Note the typical steep Amsterdam stairs, but worth the climb!

*UNDER NEW MANAGEMENT SINCE SEPTMBER 2022*

name: Pretty studio on a ship in the Heart of Amsterdam
description: The Morgenster is a iron ship, build in 1905. In de front end we've created a lovely studio with an high end bathroom. It's just a ten minute walk from the Central Station. It's very light, due to the large windows in the ceiling. The neighbourhood of the ship is very spacious, given the fact that's in the heart of the centre of Amsterdam.

name: Style and location are the key
description: Welcome to the Cosy Room at Ruby Emma Hotel, Amsterdam – where snug meets stylish in the heart of the city. The rooms are pure comfort, surrounded by tasteful decor and vintage-inspired touches. It's the perfect retreat after a day of Amsterdam adventures.

name: Lovely apartment in Amsterdam
description:
Welcome to our cozy and quiet spot in Amsterdam!

This apartment is perfect for a couple. It has a living room, TV streaming, Wifi, a master bedroom, a fully-equipped kitchen and a toilet/shower.
It is located in a quiet residential area, with supermarkets, restaurants and parks 5 minutes walking, 30 minutes from the airport, very close to the Sloterdijk Station and 10 minutes by bus to Central Station or tram 19 to the center.

Explore the beauty of Amsterdam and enjoy your time here!

description:
Enjoy this beautifully renovated apartment in the center of Amsterdam.
The apartment is a stone’s throw away from Leidse square and, from there, it’s only a few minutes more to Museum square.
You will also find yourself minutes away from the famous ‘9 Straatjes’, or 9 Streets, and the canal district.

Recent renovations include a new kitchen, floor, bath, toilet, painted walls and all new furniture.
I would very much appreciate guests who treat my place like their own.
Longer stays upon request

name: Loft - Triple Room

name: New Amsterdam Style

Under the house are several supermarkets, drugstore, restaurants and a bike rental. The house is suitable for people who are looking for a nice house with enough space. The property has a cozy living room. The dining table is next to the stylish kitchen and is very suitable for preparing delicious dishes yourself.

name: Stijlvol ingericht appartement - gratis parkeren
description:
Apartment in Amsterdam West - Bos en Lommer.

Easy to reach by car and public transport and within 20 minutes in the center of Amsterdam.

There are many hip coffee shops and good restaurants in the neighborhood. It is a 5 minute walk to the Erasmus Park + Sloterpark which are perfect places for a refreshing dip, picnic or drinks.

Condo is perfect for couples with a small child (high chair / child cot present).

Double bed OR 2x single bed + cot.

name: Penthouse with Home Cinema @ Great Location
description:
Comfortable two-bedroom apartment with a spacious terrace located in a nice, local and residential neighborhood of Amsterdam.

Enjoy the spacious terrace and rooftop or watch your favorite movies with great sound from the hammock!

Cozy corner home with sweet home cat Stitch in a green, kid-friendly neighborhood in Amsterdam Nieuw-West. Both in the front and back garden, it is good for summer. Want to get into the city center of Amsterdam? On the bike you are there in 20 minutes, and there are several busses, trams and subways going that way.

Modern, bright and spacious (90sqm) apt, stylishly decorated with homely touches. Large living area and fully equipped with everything you may need - Our home is the perfect spot to explore the beautiful city of Amsterdam.

name: Bright quiet furnished apartment with canal view
description: Don’t miss it! An amazing fully furnished apartment for rent within the A10 Ring of Amsterdam, 10min bike ride from the Palace. This well-maintained apartment on the third floor has a beautiful canal view, situated in a quiet and characteristic street at Erasmus park near Mercatorplein.

name: Cozy traditional house in Amsterdam-North
description:
This cozy house in Amsterdam-Noord is fully equipped with a nice spacious bedroom, an office room with good home working facilities, a bathroom with bathtub, and front and back garden. It is located in a quiet neighborhood that is characterized by traditional Dutch houses from the thirties.

The house is 13 minutes biking from Central Station and 15 minutes walking to Noorderpark Metro Station. There are many nice restaurants, cafes and bakeries around.

name: GARDEN STUDIO AIRPORT FREE BIKES & BREAKFAST
description: Our beautiful Garden Studio has a private entrance, a nice bathroom and a large sliding door to your own lovely garden patio. The studio is situated in a classic Dutch dike house at the water. Close to Schiphol Airport & Amsterdam. Free use of bicycles to go to the Amsterdam Forest or to the bus stop to the city center. We also have a private jetty at the canal in front of the door. Breakfast is available on the first day and tea & coffee are always free. We hope to see you soon with us!

name: Sunny appartement in Amsterdam North
description: Enjoy a beautifull sunny appartement in Amsterdam north! a green and spacious area with lots of art, clubs and bars. its very close to the citycenter (3 min bike + the ferry) and located next to a nice park. the appartement is on the opperst floor,  has an open kitchen, 1 bedroom and a large balcony. I'm looking for an enthusiastic traveller or couple who wouldn't mind watering my plants while I'm away.

name: Lovely apartement with garden
description:
Our spacious apartment is a lovely chilled place. It is close to the city center of Amsterdam and the vibrant Pijp. There are various cool bars, cafes and bakeries within walking distance. After a busy day in the streets of Amsterdam, you can hang out in our lovely garden.

Public transport is close by and makes our place easily accessible. As we live close to the "north-south subway line", you will also be in upcoming Amsterdam north within minutes!

name: Modern apartment for couples.
description:
Recently rennovated apartment
private unit no shared facilities
located only 13 minutes walk to Central station

Modern furnished loft offered in Amsterdam Nieuw-West; clean and stylish in a nice quiet area, close to the Vondelpark and perfectly accessible by public transportations from the Central Station and the airport. Day and night.

The loft is provided with a kitchen, fridge, oven, microwave, air-fryer, tv, washing machine, dryer, balcony, wifi and private bathroom.

There’s a tram and metrostation located only 200mtrs from the loft. These can bring you to the citycenter in only 5-10 minutes.

Metro - 2 mins
City centre - 10 mins
Train - 10 mins

State of the art, fully equipped kitchen (SMEG, Magimix, Wusthof, Le Creuset), six-person dining table, large couch, 2 TV's, PS4+ games. Large bathroom with bath that fits 2 persons + shower. Large bedroom with luxury large Auping bed 210/180 cm.

description:
Cozy apartment close to the nicest neighbourhoods in Amsterdam. With 10 - 20 minutes walk you are in the bustling pipe, walk across the canals to the center or be in one of the nice restaurants/pubs at the oosterpark. The oosterpark is 4 minutes by foot, where you can walk around.

The apartment itself has a lot of light which can be enjoyed in the spacious living room. The kitchen has everything needed to cook a good meal.

Welcome!

name: Central Art Apartment - Nieuwmarkt area
description: Discover the charm of Amsterdam from our Central Art Apartment, a stylish, modern and cosy space featuring a unique selection of local art. Recently renovated for optimal comfort. Nestled in a serene canal-side location in front of the Montelbaanstower, you're just a stroll away from Nieuwmarkt, the vibrant Red Light District, Waterlooplein, and a mere 10-minute walk to the Central Station. Experience the heart of the city in unparalleled comfort and endless inspiration!

name: Comfortable Design Studio @ city center
description:
**Design Studio in the Heart of Amsterdam!**

We invite you to stay in our charming studio on Nieuwezijds Voorburgwal. This stylish space has everything you need: a comfy bed, modern kitchen, and a luxurious bathroom. Located just steps from Central Station and Dam Square, you can easily explore all of Amsterdam's highlights. Perfect for couples or solo adventurers. Enjoy free Wi-Fi and lovely views. We look forward to welcoming you! Book now!

name: Spacious modern house with cat.
description:
Our spacious, stylishly decorated house is fully furnished. With a south-facing garden, a brand new kitchen, a bubble bath and a fully equipped study you will enjoy Amsterdam to the fullest. Staying here is a perfect mix of nature and hustle and bustle, with the NDSM (industrial art-district) just steps away and nature reserve Twiske around the corner.

Our house is a real residence, so not just for rental. That means that our super sweet, cuddly cat Jip also likes to be fed and taken care of!

Very quiet spot in the middle of the center with everything you will need. A private bedroom with a big two person bed and living area to relaxt from the walks in the city. Also a private bathroom is for your use.

description: Beautiful  ground-floor apartment. Located in the Rivierenbuurt, Amsterdam-Zuid. One sleeping room with a two-person bed (180 cm), a spacious living room with open kitchen, a stylish bathroom, separate toilet, a study room with a monitor and good WiFi, and a south-west facing garden. Close to metro, tram and train station Amsterdam Rai and Amstel. Relaxed, quiet and cheerful neighborhood. Several nice bars, restaurants and coffee places within walking distance. Kitchen utensils available.

IMPORTANT! OF COURSE THE ROOMS ALL HAVE THEIR OWN LOCK!
AirBnB says that an engineering problem is to blame for the note saying there is no lock.
All rooms lock.
The rooms are freshly painted, with new laminate flooring. Each room has coffee and tea service, along with a microwave and refrigerator, and cups, plates and silverware.

We also have a second room in this location that is a bit smaller and less expensive .
Sleep at Amy's B'n'B Front Room

https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/608432

name: City center/Old town - spacious double room
description: Actually, I wanted to spend even more on  each room, the furniture, the decoration and the many details... my husband and I just didn't seem to be on the same page. But I love my little hideaway in the middle of Amsterdam. Our neighbours in this place full of history are all native ones. Lawyers, midwives, judges, journalists and creative people live here close together - right in the city centre and yet away from the noise and bustle of the unbelievably many tourists.

name: Green room the top floor  with breakfast included
description: Welcome in our 17th centery monumental house with modern details. We are a couple (Italian an Dutch) with one daughter and 2 cats and 1 dog. The room is located on the first floor of our backhouse, We live in the front house. The bathroom you share with the  Blue room. The 2 rooms are suitable for a family of 4. The backhouse garanties a quiet night. We can't except large and heavy luggage because the stairs are steep and small.
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Single City Centre
description:

Next to the lovely Jordaan area, (bars, cafes and boutiques; markets and canals). Not to mention theRed Light district on the other side.
There's a microwave, a fridge, a wardrobe, and an en suite bathroom (shared with me) with bath, shower, washing machine (no dryer).

name: Sleeping in a Church - Pod for 1 at BUNK
description: After just minutes on the free ferry from Central Station, you’ll find Amsterdam’s true north. This up-and-coming neighbourhood is alive and kicking, bursting with cultural hotspots. At the centre of the neighbourhood’s social life there was always the Saint Rita church. Now that it is home to Bunk Amsterdam, this still holds true. Locals and travellers alike come to catch some rays on our terrace, sticking around for an affordable dinner and some free cultural nourishment.

One double bed and one single bed

Situated in the West neighborhood, you'll be close to trendy cafes, shops, and attractions. The nearby tram and bus stations offer direct lines to the Jordaan, city center, and De Pijp.

Perfect for 2 people, we completely custom-designed it last year to optimize its space.
Located on the 4th and top floor of a typical Dutch building, in a quiet, central street, it's fully equipped and perfect for all seasons!

We think of it as a small loft and it's our daily living space, which we only rent out on vacation.

We have an 8m2 south-west-facing terrace, which makes our apartment very bright!

description:
This apartment is located in the heart of the center, just a few blocks from the Dam square. The neighborhood' known for its many cafes, shops, restaurants, coffeebars and of course the canals.

The apartment is close to all the exciting parts of Amsterdam.
Most nice sights are on walking distance, like the Red light district which is nextdoor, The Damsquare, the canals and the central station.
Public transport stop is a 2 min walk and always nearby.

name: TOP Location Lovely Apartment
description:
Perfectly centrally located apartment in Amsterdam within walking distance of cafes and restaurants, museum square (Van Gogh museum, Moco etc.), Heineken brewery, the most popular market of Amsterdam (Albert Cuyp market), beautiful parks (Vondelpark), metro and tram, and much more.

The apartment has a good layout and lots of light and has a great location in the popular district de Pijp. The apartment has an open kitchen, living room, bathroom with toilet and a spacious bedroom with a balcony.

name: Lovely Guesthouse in the suburbs of Amsterdam
description:
Quiet and cosy tiny house in the suburbs of Amsterdam, just 10 minutes by metro from the city center of Amsterdam and 5 minutes away from Amsterdam Ajax Arena and Ziggo Dome
The house is just 20 square meters, but it has everything you might need. It is located in a residential neighborhood, 2 minutes away from the metro station in a lovely green area. It is the ideal place for a couple.

name: Heldere woning met twee balkons
description: With its many windows and two balconies, this colorful apartment feels bright and open. It has a canal view from the balcony and is located next to Westerpark and the Jordaan neighborhood, which is full of canals, cute bridges, boutiques, restaurants and cafe’s. Also Anne Frank’s house is located here. Everything you need is closeby, including multiple supermarkets. In only 10 minutes tram 3 will take you to Museumsquare and the vibrant ‘de Pijp’ area.

name: Beautiful apartment in Ams with 25m2 terrace!
description: No description

name: Cosy, Bright & Spacious luxury apartment
description:
My bright and spacious apartment is close to Schiphol Airport (1 stop, 7 minutes) and Amsterdam Central Station (2 stops, 10 minutes) by train. Closely is a public transport station, which makes your stay very easy to discover Amsterdam (trams, busses, trains & metro)

Theres a mall closeby with 2 big supermarkets and several bars & restaurants. Also 2 different parks are about 10 minutes for a relax afternoon. Relaxing more closely..? My apartment has 2 balconies :)

name: Modern apartment with parkview
description:
This beautiful, modern apartment with plenty of light & space offers everything for a lovely stay for 2-3 pers. It's bright with a sitting area in the window to enjoy the view of the beautiful park. There is a fully equipped open kitchen and many plants! Enjoy the walk-in shower or relax at the balcony that's connected to the comfortable bedroom. Buses and trams (2 min walk) run to all train-stations and city parts.
We absolutely love our house & area, so we'll have plenty of recommendations!

name: Top-appartement

Relaxed apartment on the 4th floor.

x4 separate beds

name: Studio anno 1659 - City Centre - Central Station
description: Situated in an authentic Dutch canal house, our quaint studio apartment with view over Amsterdam's famous "Koepelkerk" is the perfect getaway for two in the heart of Amsterdam's old city centre. Conveniently located a five minute walk from Amsterdam Central Station and within walking distance of famous sights such as Dam square, the Anne Frank house and the vibrant Jordaan district, you will be able to enjoy Amsterdam as we do ourselves on a daily basis. We hope to welcome you to our city soon!

description: Welcome to our private chic airconditioned studio in Haarlemmerstraat! Here, amidst the bustling energy of the city, you'll find a tranquil retreat awaiting your arrival. Our thoughtfully curated space invites you to unwind and immerse yourself in the vibrant culture of Amsterdam's iconic neighborhood. Take leisurely strolls along the picturesque canals, discover hidden gems in the eclectic boutiques and eateries, and experience the enchanting atmosphere that defines this historic district

name: Riverbridge Suite - Historic Center Canal District
description:
Take an early morning stroll and enjoy the nearby famous Rijksmuseum & Van Gogh Museum, without the tourists. Wander around the historic canals while the city sleeps, then head back for a morning coffee at my unique Dutch-styled suite, perfectly situated in the Amsterdam Canal District, close to many attractions.

Riverbridge Suite is the perfect location for a short or long stay in Amsterdam, where you will have all the comforts of home.

The first bedroom with double bed is situated in the front of the house, next to the bathroom with full length bath. entering the living you will find a sitting area, fully equiped kitchen and a dining table. In the living room next to the sofa there can be another super comfortable double bed placed.

It has 2 bedrooms (5 beds) and a balcony. You will have to like animals: we will leave our 2 cats and 2 guineapigs behind, where they are most happy :).

name: Familyhouse in Amsterdam West
description: Our house is located in a pleasant neighborhood between Bos en Lommer and De Baarsjes. Just behind our house is the Erasmus Park. We have 3 children living in our house so there are lots of toys and games to use. we have a garden with a trampoline where it is sunny all day. The bedrooms and bathroom are located in the basement, wonderfully cool in the summer.  We have 2 children's rooms and a master bedroom. on the ground floor there is a guest room with a good quality sofa bed.

name: Govert Flinckstraat (close to Albert Cuyp markt)
description: This cozy, well equipped apartment (51m2) is located very close to the “Albert Cuypmarkt” in “De Pijp”, the hippest neighborhood in Amsterdam. With Heineken Experience around the corner and RAI and the main museums on walking distance!

name: Stylish Top Floor Apartment
description:
In the western part of Amsterdam located conveniently close to all amenities but away from all the tourist noise you will find a stylish apartment (remodelled fully in 2021) with a New York Loft vibe.

The neighbourhood is mixed and has been home to eastern expats for decades, giving you a look into a different type of Amsterdam experience. Many local shops as well as supermarkets open late until 10pm.

*Second Bedroom is only available for bookings for 3+ Guests or on special request*

name: PRIVATE ground floor apartment in Center - Jordaan
description: Do you WANT TO GET OUT and enjoy the CANALS of Amsterdam? This spacious INDEPENDENT apartment is located in a historic CANAL HOUSE in the most romantic neighborhood in the center. This area is like a village in the center of Amsterdam, with lovely ROMANTIC bridges creating that ultimate holiday feeling AND close to the main city’s attractions and public transfer.

name: Stunning and spacious canal home with roof deck
description:
Watch the boats cruise down one of Amsterdam's most beautiful canals from your living room. This apartment has the best of both worlds - right in central Amsterdam, but on a very quiet and residential street

Two big bedrooms and very large living room make this home a great choice for a family with older children (difficult for young children due to stairs) or groups who need two sizeable bedrooms
amenities: ['Barbecue utensils', 'Outdoor furniture', 'Piano', 'BBQ grill', 'Bathtub', 'Board games', 'Outdoor dining area']

name: Cozy apartment with balcony in centre of Amsterdam
description:
Cozy and bright apartment with a balcony situated in the centre of Amsterdam. It's a 48 m2 one bedroom apartment located right between the quiet Westerpark and the popular Jordaan that is known for its many shops, restaurants and markets.
Quiet and central at the same time, it is a perfect base for sightseeing and exploring Amsterdam’s many attractions by public transport, bike or on foot.

name: Leidsegracht - Souterrain
description:
Look no further! Our apartment located in the heart of the city, with beautiful canals and a historical background, is the perfect location for a movie set or just a weekend getaway. For example, the romantic bench from the popular movie The Fault in Our Stars is right on our doorstep.

You can walk to the Anne Frank House, the Rijksmuseum and the Vondelpark within a few minutes. But Amsterdam's bustling nightlife is also around the corner, with plenty of bars and restaurants within walking distance.

name: 3 BR Comfortable Rooftop Terrace CityVilla with AC
description: This comfortable city villa is in the city's bustling Amsterdam North. Within 15 minutes you are the city center of Amsterdam. The property has a lovely sunny roof terrace with relaxing lounge set to spend summer evenings. The home is equipped with air conditioning and is therefore the perfect accommodation for your stay in the hot summer.  The house has 3 color theme bedrooms on the 1st floor and a large living room with a luxury kitchen on the ground floor.

name: Gezellig familiehuis met parkeren op eigen grond
description:
Fully family house with two parking spaces on private land for rent in quiet neighborhood in Amsterdam North. In 10 minutes you can cycle to the NDSM yard for the ferry to Amsterdam Central Station.

The corner house of 150 m2 has 4 bedrooms, a separate study and a spacious garden.

Preferably to rent for a longer period, shorter periods negotiable.
amenities: ['BBQ grill', 'Free dryer – In unit', 'Children’s dinnerware', 'Outdoor dining area']

name: Free Spirit Suite (35 mtrs)
description: Located in the heart of the NDSM wharf of Amsterdam with panoramic views of the city skyline. On top of the crane are three spacious suites, with underneath a studio for Corporate & Music events. Only a private invite shows you Amsterdams best kept secret that's hidden behind an iron door. You'll enter a completely different world after closing that door: an underground scene where artists, free spirits and open-minded people meet. The height and structure makes your stay completely incognito.

name: Familyhouse with garden in Amsterdam North
description:
The building is located in a beautiful quiet street with park in trendy Amsterdam North. Close to ferry, Eye museum, Adam Tower and the hip and happening NDSM-area.

My house is a private unit on the ground floor and 1st floor and is exclusively for you. Although the garden is shared with other families (hence NO smoking and other disturbing things)

Come and experience Amsterdam from this side of the water. This is where an old industrial area is transforming into a vibrant residential hub.

name: Moderne kleurrijke kamer met klein terras
description: Welcome in Boutique Hotel Buiksloterham in Amsterdam Noord! The neighborhood is in full development, with special new construction and also the roughness of former industry and shipyards. We are practically on the IJ and not far from Amsterdam Central Station. In the area, there are also plenty to find such as restaurants/cafes, Street Art and Nxt Museum. It is easy to reach much in the city by bike. There are also public transport connections. Affordable parking available. See our travel guide.

name: Anila's quiet light townhouse
description: Welcome to my light modern townhouse located in Slotervaart, an upcoming trendy neighbourhood just outside the center of Amsterdam and close to the beautiful Sloterpark.
amenities: ['Private backyard – Fully fenced', 'Blender', 'Coffee maker: espresso machine', 'Bathtub']

name: Galeforce One - Jordaan houseboat studio
description:
Galeforce One is a cozy studio with a special view on the canal.

You will have a private space at your disposal with a bedroom and bathroom.In the same space, there is a fridge, microwave, coffee, and tea maker. Coffee and tea are provided and there is a bottle of wine and some beer in the fridge as your welcome. The bathroom is private with a large walk-in shower, toilet and single vanity.

You can use the small terrace just outside the window to experience life as a real Amsterdammer!

name: ★ RIVERSIDE HOUSEBOAT ★ FREE PARKING ★ AMSTERDAM ★
description:
A real oasis of peace and only a 15 minute cycle to the centre of Amsterdam.

This type of extraordinary accomodation, in this green neighborhood, is rarely available!

Experience the joy of living on a houseboat in Amsterdam at the Amstel River, while enjoying the tranquility in combination with being fairly close to the city center.

All amenities are included, so all you need to do is bring your suitcase!

Within walking distance of RAI conference centre and only 5km from Johan Cruyff Arena.

name: 2-bedroom Apartment Erasmuspark
description:
Stay in my lovely 2-bedroom apartment w/ 2 balconies, 15 min by bike from the city center. We can host up to 4 people!

It features a double bed, 2xSingle beds, each room with a private balcony, a bathroom w/ separate shower, a dining area for 6, Wi-Fi, and a fully equipped kitchen.

Located 4 min from a lively square and 3 min from Erasmuspark and Rembrandtpark. Excellent transport links: 20 min. to Dam Sq., 5 min to the metro, and 10 min. to Sloterdijk.

Perfect for your Amsterdam stay!
amenities: ['Free washer – In unit', 'Free dryer – In unit']

name: Huis met dakterras en 2 verdiepingen in Adam West
description:
This centrally located, bright apartment in West with large open kitchen, balcony and roof terrace is ideal for a couple who want to enjoy a few days in Amsterdam.
With many nice terraces around the corner and the Jordaan and parks within a 10-minute walk. The apartment is in a quiet street, but the cozy bustle is only a minute walk.
Ideal that it is so central, but that you sleep in peace.

name: Cosy apartment in Amsterdam City
description:
A charming one-bedroom apartment in the heart of Amsterdam! This apartment is perfect for couples or solo travelers, looking to explore the city's vibrant culture.

The apartment features a warm and inviting living room, a fully equipped kitchen for preparing your meals, a cozy bedroom with a comfortable double bed, and an en suite bathroom. You'll have all the amenities you need for a relaxing stay, including free Wi-Fi, a TV, and a washing machine.

name: Cosy & stylish two bedroom appt
description: With a beautiful and light open plan kitchen you can enjoy many moments here, or on the  balcony which catches the morning sun.    The master bedroom is furnished with a Coco-Mat bed, and uniquely designed built in wardrobe.  The bathroom has a shower, wash basin and towel rack.  The toilet is situated separately.  The living/dining room has a large & comfortable sofa, dining table and TV.  Up the stairs,  from the living area is the second bedroom with a single high bed, for children or adults.

name: New modern Apartment Amsterdam Zuid
description:
The apartment is less than a year in use. It is a bright apartment, very clean, modern, quiet because the apartment is located at the rear and not on the street side. The apartment is 2 minutes away from the Vondelpark and 5 minutes centrum.

it has an amazing double bed, a bathroom, and kitchen with bar, a dining table, a lovely sofa with TV.

no music, smoking or party's allowed!!! My house is in perfect condition and i want te keep it that way! Also because of the neighbors no music!

name: Chique & modern apartment
description: Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally-located place.

name: Familiehuis met eigen oprit
description:
This amazing accommodation guarantees fun with the whole family. Our beautiful house is located in a beautiful location in Amsterdam North. The house is modernly furnished and equipped with every comfort. With, among other things, a private driveway for the car, several flat screen TVs, shower with bath, and a lovely sunny garden with BBQ.
In addition, many transport options with which you can be in the city center very quickly (15-20 min). Also 10 minutes away from recreation area Het Twiske.

description:
Enjoy this lovely house with your family. Within 10 minutes you are by bike on the NDSM wharf where you can take the free ferry to Amsterdam Centraal.

On the other side you are within 10 minutes by bike in the beautiful nature reserve t Twiske. Here you will find beaches, restaurants and an exciting climbing park.

In front of the door are 2 private parking spaces for our guests.

name: loft houseboat Amsterdam
description:
Unique modern loft houseboat in nice area of Amsterdam. It is quiet here and you are only 8 minutes away by public transport from the center of Amsterdam. So perfect to escape from the hazzle in town when you do not need it: when you want to sleep. This boats suits max 6 persons.

IMPORTANT: No smoking, drugs and parties allowed, we are very strict on this......

name: Great corner apartment near Pijp
description:
This unique 70m2 corner apartment on the 3rd floor in a central location in Amsterdam with the RAI, Pijp and city centre on walking distance, everything you need for a perfect stay in Amsterdam. The perfect place for couples, a small family or people on a business trip.

This one bedroom apartment has a spacious bathroom with walk-in shower, separate toilet and generous living room with open kitchen and windows covering the width of the entire apartment. Is there anything else you could wish?

The Rijksmuseum, Vondelpark and Amsterdam Canals are around the corner. The apartment consists of a spacious living room with open kitchen, bedroom, office room, and bathroom with toilet. Feel welcome!

This is your hotspot for a relaxed stay in beautiful Amsterdam!

name: Centraal Museumplein Appartement Kindvriendelijk

Apartment is nice for all ages. Ideal if you have 1 or two small children.

description: Cozy apartment on a houseboat. Walking distance from the Centraal train station (567 meters!!).  A living room with a kitchenette with induction stove microwave and fridge. Two sleeping cabins with both a bed of 160cm x 220cm (63" x 87"). The sleeping cabins are not much greater than the bed. They both have two drawers that fit a rolling suitcase exactly.

name: Unique apartment in the heart of historic Jordaan
description: A unique, bright apartment in a historical building, positioned in the centre and in the best neighbourhood of Amsterdam (Jordaan). The central location makes it the perfect starting point to discover the local gems that are just around the corner. The beautiful local market, the authentic little shops, the typical Dutch cafes and many cosy restaurants. It's this lively area where the locals hang out, yet the apartment is a quiet and friendly basis with everything you need and more!

name: Amsterdam loft with roof terrace
description: Located in the vibrant center of Amsterdam in the Westerpark neighborhood, near the vibrant but traditional ‘Jordaan', this apartment is the best start to your Amsterdam experience. With history on your doorstep,  the location offers all the best Amsterdam has to offer. Canals and architecture, typical bars and excellent restaurants, cultural experiences are close by. The apartment is light with a fully-equipped kitchen and bathroom, roof-terrace, and a feel of home away from home.

name: Zonnig appartement
description:
This apartment is located in a quiet street at walking distance from downtown (20 minutes on foot to Anne Frankhuis). Bus and tram nearby (10 min to Station Sloterdijk, 15 min Central Station and 35 min to Schiphol). Several restaurants, coffee bars, and supermacts in the neighborhood. The apartment (55 square meters) is on the first floor with a living room and open kitchen and two bedrooms each with a double bed.
Only available for families or couples.

name: Cozy Family Suite by Museum Square
description: Ideal for family: two connected bedrooms with own private entry at the ground floor of 1912 historic building in the heart of Museum District. Own bathroom incl. shower. No kitchen. But fridge, microwave, tea and Nespresso machine at your disposal.

name: Near Rijksmuseum, Boutique Apartment w. garden.
description: A protected 17th century house in the heart of old Amsterdam, this is apartment located on the ground floor of a former weavery house. It is completely renovated and extremely suitable for couples and families aswell. There is just one big masterbedroom, with a super kingsize bed and a beautifull wooden design two person loft bed. It has a for Amsterdam standards very sunny spacious patio. It is hard to find a suitable family apartment that is clean and comfortable as this one city center

name: Couples Getaway near Rijksmuseum with Canal View

name: Canal View Loft
description: Five windows overlooking the most beautiful canal junction in the historic city centre make this modern minimalist appartment in a 17th century monument a most wanted location to enjoy Amsterdam at its very best!

name: Unieke locatie in centrum van Amsterdam
description: Spacious and bright apartment in the heart of Amsterdam, with high ceilings and modern decor. Walking distance to Artis, the canal belt, museums and 15 minutes walk from Central Station. Enjoy breathtaking views of the Maritime Museum and the water, perfect for a refreshing dip. Includes fast Wi-Fi, fully equipped kitchen, washing machine and work space. Located in a historic neighborhood with cozy cafes and restaurants. Ideal for experiencing real Amsterdam culture.

name: Amsterdam Suite in the Heart of the City
description:
Enjoy the heart of the beautiful historic city centre of Amsterdam, from our beautiful, authentic, and newly renovated Dutch house. Very bright, neat and spacious, with views on a renowned boutique street.

Be aware that the stairs are steep!

name: Sleep at Amy's B'n'B Front Room
description:
IMPORTANT! OF COURSE THE ROOMS ALL HAVE THEIR OWN LOCK!
AirBnB says that an engineering problem is to blame for the note saying there is no lock.
All rooms lock.

The rooms are freshly painted, with new laminate flooring. Each room has coffee and tea service, along with a microwave and refrigerator, and cups, plates and silverware.

We also have a second room in this location that is a bit bigger and nicer, and quieter:

Sleep at Amy's B'n'B Garden Room:

https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/627188
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: 65 superLOCATED CANALhouse Room, private bathroom
description:
65 Superb canal house room with private bath, for solo traveler. Just a 5 mins walk from central station, on Brouwersgracht in famous Jordan area. Single use only room with its own en-suite (in room, private) shower, sink and toilet.

From here you can walk to all main attractions and hotspots. Vanuit deze charmante accommodatie ben je zo bij populaire winkels en restaurants.

name: Design room in Canal District (historic center)
description: Hello and welcome to our comfortable hide out in the heart of Amsterdam's lively old center, the Jordaan! The 15 minute walk from Central Station is already a great way to get acquainted with the historical center: majestic canals, surrounded with the traditional 16th century 'gentlemen's houses' + cozy little shops, café's... From the elevated lounge area of my split-level apartment you look right down on the street, enabling you to enjoy your new neighborhood along with a cup of tea.

name: Cozy luxury canal view guestroom
description: The first thing you see from your bed when you open your eyes in the morning? The enchanting Brouwersgracht canal. A homey space in a Unesco neighborhood  surrounded by amazing cafes, restaurants, markets, shops and sightseeing.
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Modern appartement
description:
Our spacious 3 bedroom apartment of 106 m2 is located in trendy Amsterdam West. From bakery to nice bars, West has something for everyone. With public transport in front of the door, you can reach museums or canal belts or take a 10-minute train for a day at Haarlem or the beach.
Our home is bright, modern and fully equipped. The balcony is ideal for coffee in the morning and wine in the evening. Shops nearby, but with so many good restaurants, you can also be lazy for a few days.

name: cozy attic apartment, 10 min. from central station
description:
Enjoy a quiet location in booming Amsterdam North within 10 minutes walking distance of the centre of Amsterdam (Including five minutes on the free ferry)
The fully equipped studio apartment has it’s own access and consists a living and bed room, refrigerator, a water-cooker and bathroom with shower, toilet and washbasin.
The small but characteristic apartment is based on the second floor of a typical Dutch workers house. Under the roof, bright and sunny, you will have your privacy.

name: Lovely appartment /w roofterrace
description:
Bright, spacious apartment in Amsterdam Zuid, 5 min walk to Rijksmuseum.

All the restaurants, bars, shops and highlights you need are around the corner, while the street itself is comfortably quiet.

The apartment at the 3rd and 4th floor has a sunny balcony and very big, private roofterrace.
The bedroom upstairs has a kingsize bed and modern ensuite bathroom.
The bedroom downstairs contains a queensize bed.

This appartment is smoke and pet free.

name: Large modern inner city apartment
description:
Entrepotdok is an amazing street with beautiful houses along a big canal. Our apartment is slightly off the canal with a view into a peaceful garden, so you have complete privacy.
There are many great bars, restaurants, museums & parks nearby.

For longer stays feel free to send me a message.

★ Quiet location on a canal close to City Centre & other cool places
★ King bed
★ Fully equipped kitchen with dishwasher
★ Washing machine & dryer
★ Smart TV
★ Fast Wi-Fi
★ Separate office/working space

name: City Center - two rooms downtown
description: Actually, I wanted to spend even more on  each room, the furniture, the decoration and the many details... my husband and I just didn't seem to be on the same page. But I love my little hideaway in the middle of Amsterdam. Our neighbours in this place full of history are all native ones. Lawyers, midwives, judges, journalists and creative people live here close together - right in the city centre and yet away from the noise and bustle of the unbelievably many tourists.

name: Cozy apartment with Canal View
description:
Welcome to your luxury home away from home in the heart of Amsterdam's Rivierenbuurt and on the edge of iconic area “de Pijp”. This fully renovated apartment offers a perfect blend of modern comfort and timeless elegance, ensuring an unforgettable stay in one of the city's most vibrant neighborhoods.

Whether you're visiting Amsterdam for business or pleasure, this offers the perfect base for your stay. Book now and experience the charm and convenience of city living in the heart of Amsterdam!

name: Lovely family house with garden
description: Relax with the whole family at this peaceful place to stay near the center of Amsterdam.

description:
Beautiful, sunny apartment in the North of Amsterdam. The apartment is located in a very safe, peaceful residential area, although there are plenty of outstanding diners and bars situated nearby.

Couples (age 30+) and small families (couple + 1 kid, age <10) are very welcome to stay in the apartment.

City center is 10 min by bicycle (1 available) or 15-20 min by public transport (bus and ferry or metro).

The apartment is spacious and has two bedrooms, each with king size bed. Smoking inside is not allowed.

Fully renovated apartment with stylish interior. Fully equipped (refrigerator, freezer, oven, microwave, stove, nice crockery, etc.). Bed 180x200.

name: Amazing private studio on houseboat
description:
Welcome aboard!

We've transformed part of our houseboat into a luxury design apartment. Come for a unique houseboat stay with your own convenient key safe entrance, spacious, yet cosy living room, a queen size bed, en suite walk-in rain shower, separate toilet, and a kitchenette for making coffee, tea or heating up a light meal.
On the front deck you can enjoy our beautiful harbour and Dutch skies, and if you fancy you can even jump off our boat for a swim, we often do :-)

name: Lovely apartment near Westerpark
description:
Lovely bright apartment with sunny balcony near the Jordaan and Westerpark. From the quiet neighborhood you can start to discover Amsterdam perfectly. The bus stop is around the corner, but actually you don't have to get out of the neighborhood - there is so much fun to do!

Enjoy my cottage that I decorated with a lot of TLC: )

name: Ground floor apartment Amsterdam
description:
Stay in a stylish home in Amsterdam South near the Vondelpark. A unique location within easy reach from the city centre.
A modern bedroom with a queen size bed (2021) is located on the quiet garden of the house.
Completely renovated in 2019 and well kept. The house is perfect for a couple for a holiday in Amsterdam or for business close to the south-as business district of Amsterdam. Schiphol airport 10 minutes by car.

name: Spacious and well equipped apartment at Westerpark
description:
Welcome to our spacious double floor apartment of 82m2 with roof terrace and balcony. The apartment is situated on the 3rd and 4rd floor of the building and very light.

It's recently renovated and well decorated with vintage style attributes and modern art paintings. The vivid colors give it a warm atmosphere. You will definitely feel at home and have a perfect basepoint to discover the Amsterdam. It's just a small strall to Westerpark and the Jordaan. Bars and restaurants are close by.

description:
Discover the charm of Amsterdam by staying in our cozy 1-bedroom apartment, located in the vibrant and lively neighborhood of Jordaan. This spacious apartment features a large living room and a fully equipped kitchen, providing you with all the comforts of home. You'll have privacy and convenience, with all the amenities you might need.

Situated just around the corner from Westerstraat and Nordermarkt, the apartment is housed in a typical “Amsterdam house” that boasts a modern build.

name: The Blue Door
description:
Indulge in the allure of Amsterdam's old center with our rental room in a historic house, dating back to 1492. Nestled amidst the captivating streets, this cozy space offers a tranquil retreat while being within walking distance of the renowned red-light district. Immerse yourself in the city's vibrant energy and have it quiet when you want to sleep.

Location is everything, and you'll find yourself in the heart of it all, next to Dam Square, the Red-Light District, and the Rembrandt Museum.

name: Perfect Apartment in the Heart of Amsterdam
description:
Welcome to this 4 persons apartment in the heart of Amsterdam. This place has everything you need to have a great stay. The apartment is recently fully renovated. It offers a queensize and kingsize bed. One in the bedroom and one in the livingroom.

The apartment is located in a 17th century building! The location will amaze you, in a quiet sidestreet of the vibrant city center of Amsterdam. You can do everything on foot from here. Highlights, supermarkets, bars, restaurants canals everything

name: Historical Romantic Houseboat for Couple
description: This B&B Vrouwe Stefania -named after the ship- is an independent small studio on the frontside of the ship on the Brouwersgracht (canal) in the middle of the famous Jordaan neighbourhood. The area is famous about his small authentic streets, with his shops, boutiques and beautiful to wonder around. Yet there are many cafés and restaurants in the immediate vicinity and you can reach Central Station within a 10-minute walk. Sights and museums within walking distance.

name: Weesperzijde Penthouse Roofdeck
description:
In this bright and spacious 19th Century penthouse (100m²) you will feel right at home. It is located on the third and fourth floor of an old monumental building in a lively neighbourhood (weesperzijde).

The frontdoor will guide you to the stairs and the stylish living room, 6-person dining table and large open kitchen. The living room has a wooden floor, large sofa, airconditioning, smart TV, wifi and sonos. The kitchen contains everything to suit your needs.

name: Beautiful & Stylish Amsterdam House
description:
Exclusive use of the apartment for 4 people can also be booked via this link:

https://abnb.me/CNAbxMKCxjb


Built in the early 19th Century, the apartment is centrally located in the famous 9 Streets neighbourhood of Amsterdam, just a few minutes walk from Dam Square and the Royal Palace and situated amongst the beautiful central canals of Herengracht and Keizersgracht.

description:
Super cozy, artsy apartment in the heart of Amsterdam.
Full of charm. In the middle of the red light district!
My place is an 8min walk from Amsterdam Centraal Station.
A few minutes from the subway. And just across from Oude Kerk. All the great activities are just around the corner as well as lots of restaurants and amenities.
The accommodation is fully equipped complete with a fridge, two beds, a sofa, an oven and a kitchen as well as a microwave.

name: Stylish apartment in Amsterdam
description: In the most trendy and lively neighborhood de Pijp on walking-distance to the city center and some of the most famous museums (like Van Gogh and Rijksmuseum), the Concert Hall, the Sarphatipark, Amstel River, Albert Cuyp Market,  and the Vondelpark. and the coziest bars, restaurants and boutiques of Amsterdam. Public transport is less than a minute from the apartment, and you’ll find a number of rent-a-bike’s nearby to discover Amsterdam the Amsterdam-way.

name: Ruim appartement in De Pijp
description:
Cozy apartment on the 3rd floor in the heart of the famous De Pijp district! The house is easily reached with a wide staircase upstairs.
This sunny apartment with a cozy living room, comfortable bedroom, and a fully equipped kitchen that features a lovely south-facing balcony. Around the corner from boutiques, cafes, restaurants and famous museums, but in quiet and quiet street. Convenient tram stops and bike rental nearby make exploring easy.

name: Spacious appartement near center, 5 min from RAI
description: This spacious and stylish apartment is located in a quiet central point nearby the heart of Amsterdam (10 min by bike). From the large kitchen and dining area you get access to the large outdoor balcony where there is a sitting area and a bar. In the evenings you have wonderful sunlight here. The living room and bedroom are also very spacious and fully equipped. There are plenty of bars/restaurants and parks nearby. It is also easily accessible by public transport.

name: Luxurious apartment near Westerpark + city center
description:
Have nice easy-going time in this cozy, complete apartment. It's nicely stylized and has everything you need to have a relaxed stay! Go out into the city for drinks, dinner or parties and come home to a warm and relaxing environment.

Or just stay at home to watch a movie, Netflix, Amazon Prime and Disney plus are available on the Apple TV.

To make the place feel natural there are a lot of plants. :D

name: Bright and zen city centre place
description:
Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally-located place.
1 bedroom apartment on a quiet street, situated in a convenient location so you can walk to the centre and reach both Central and Zuid stations by metro.
It has restaurants, supermarkets, museums, yoga and training studios all in a short walking distance as well as several picturesque routes to go for a walk.
I’m looking to host 1-2 people max and prefer someone who is tidy and respectful of the neighbours and their peace.

name: Amsterdam Pearl Houseboat
description: Get ready for the ultimate houseboat experience in Amsterdam. After arriving at Central Station you take a left and within a few minutes you will see our lovely harbor, tucked away like hidden treasure, yet right in the city center. Enter your private houseboat apartment and you know you have made the right choice for an unforgettable stay in this buzzing city with your beloved one. Welcome to the Pearl Houseboat!

name: Quiet room in centre-east w/balcony
description:
Always contact me first & explain your requirements.

Quiet apartment, 70m2, with 2 balconies in the east side of the city centre of Amsterdam. All private, the place is not shared with me or anybody else.
Two double beds (160cm wide), rainshower, modern kitchen, flatscreen, fast Wifi.
Walking distance to old town & museumdistrict about 15-20 minutes, subway, tram and bus 2 minutes away.

There’s also a kitchen, a sofa, and a dining table, so you’ll have everything you need for maximum comfort and minimal stress.

name: Luxury  spacious design apartment in city centre
description:
This property is extremely suitable if you are looking for a luxurious home, close to the city centre and still want to be in a quiet location. The property is located in de Pijp, one of Amsterdam's nicest neighbourhoods with lots of nice restaurants and amenities.
The famous Albert Cuyp market is a 5-minute walk away, the canal belt is a 10-minute walk.
The house is luxuriously equipped, cool in summer and quiet in terms of noises.

name: Kids Friendly Home with Large Garden!
description: Welcome to your perfect getaway! Nestled in a serene area, this charming home offers a delightful blend of comfort and beauty, making it an ideal stay for families and couples. Exceptional is the very spacious garden incl. loungeset, outdoor dining area with romantic lights and a playhouse for the kids stuffed with toys and 2 swings. With its beautiful ornaments and stained glasses, the characteristics of this home, from 1880, make it a very unique place - only a 5-min walk away from the Jordaan

Our peaceful family house is minutes’ biking distance from the NDSM (known as Amsterdam's creative and artistic area) and different ferries to the city center.

It’s freestanding, with a lovely garden, in the middle of a small public green park. So if you enjoy the sounds of birds but also want to experience city life, this is your place to stay!

name: Big apartment Amsterdam west
description: This amazing place to stay guarantees fun with the whole family. There are at least 4 sleeping places in 2 different bedrooms. There is also air conditioning, WiFi, TV, washing machine, dryer.

name: Modern appartement with balcony and new interior
description:
This centrally located accommodation is tastefully furnished and fully equipped.

The living room has a new kitchen and is equipped with audio / TV and a cozy dining table. The bathroom has been renovated and is fully equipped. Rain shower, two sinks and washing & drying machine.
The bedroom has a King Size bed, a closet and TV. The bedroom is adjacent to the balcony, where you can enjoy the sun.
The apartment is centrally located in the most beautiful district of Amsterdam, De Pijp

An open kitchen with dishwasher.

description:
Lovely 3rd floor 90m2 apartment with a balcony, next to the Amstel. and in the city center. Nice lively neighbourhood with lots of cool restaurants/bars and several beautiful parks with walking distance. The street itself is quiet with the city life just around the corner.

IMPORTANT: we respect our neighbours, so NO PARTIES are allowed in this apartment. Also, we value our stuff so please handle them as if they were your own.

With a big living room, a beautiful new equipt kitchen and a front and back garden. There are also two large bedrooms, a clean bathroom including a bathtub and two toilets. And dont forget in the street parking is for free!

name: Sunny family app w garden, n center

FOR FAMILIES ONLY (so no students/young party people) With large sunny garden, trampoline, fire pit and BBQ, jacuzzi (for rent seperately in summer) Shops, restaurants, pubs and public transport within 2 minutes walking distance. No animals.

name: Deluxe studio close to C.S. with private entrance
description:
This boutique studio (20m2) with private gated entrance (no-contact check-in possible!) is situated on the ground floor of our family home along the dreamy Buiksloterweg, facing the authentic Amsterdam house boats.
Just 10 minutes (walk+ferry) away from Central Station you are able to enjoy the historic and lively center of Amsterdam but always welcome to return to the more laid back grounds of this funkier part of town: the Amsterdam-North, reached by (free) ferry running 24/7.

name: Ideal for families, 1 double, 2 single beds
description: Ideal for families. The 2 bedrooms in the back of the house offer very comfortable beds, both with their own toilet and shower. 1 bedroom also has a bath tub. In the second bedroom with 2 single beds there is also a table with chairs to sit together. Also check our other 2 advertisements for more details and photo's of both rooms.
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Bright room with spectacular canal view @ Jordaan
description: You will love this room, it’s a bright room with a spectacular (canal) view in a historical house. Located in the center of Amsterdam, near the Anne Frank House, (Jordaan).The Jordaan, one of the most famous neighbourhoods in Amsterdam is undoubtedly the most sung, described and romanticized city district of the Netherlands. Favorite neighborhood for students, artists and young entrepreneurs. A popular area, specially for its history, culture, monuments, canals, shops, restaurants and cafes.

name: Cozy small private apartment. Very central!
description: A  private studio apartment perfect for a young couple visiting Amsterdam. The location is in a lively small street at the heart of the city in a pedestrian-only area. All main tourist sites are within a 10 minute walking distance.

name: 1BR apartment perfectly located in De Pijp
description: Welcome to our modern and stylish 1-bedroom apartment located in the middle op "De Pijp", Amsterdam's most vibrant and hip neighbourhood. You will love the location, close to the famous Albert Cuyp market, Sarphatipark, Museum Square, Amstel river, and many bars and restaurants. The apartment is also well-connected to public transport, with both tram and metro stops nearby. The apartment is ideal for couples, solo travelers, or business travelers who want to enjoy the city and feel at home.

name: Amazing 2-bedroom flat with rooftop - De Pijp
description: If you are looking for a spacious place in the heart of the De Pijp, this flat is for you! Perfect for an authentic Amsterdam experience, you will feel home from the first minute. Just 10 minutes from Central Station by metro. Only 10minutes from RAI too.

name: La Mariposa Coronavrij,Relax, Sauna,pool bij A.dam
description: Air conditioned. Near Amsterdam. This chalet (20 m2) is located back of the back of the garden . In the luxury kitchen, you can make a coffee, tea. In the living room, you can enjoy the latest series on Netflix, surf the internet, WiFi is available. The chalet has its own entrance from the street side. During the day, you can use the heated swimming pool (March to September)  (09:00 a.m.), breakfast can be reserved on request (additional charge). Tourist tax must be paid.

description: This beautiful studio on the houseboat in Amsterdam is located in the heart of the Jordaan. Right next to the famous Noordermarkt and a little above the Nine streets! Although rented part of the boat is not big, you will have everything you need during your visit to our city. Ideal for 2 persons but it can accommodate 4.

name: Gezellig, modern appartement bij Leidseplein (P)
description: Cozy apartment in the heart of the city center near Leidseplein with many restaurants and cafes, movie houses (Pathé City, Cinecenter and De Uitkijk) and various theaters such as the Stadsschouwburg, DeLaMar Theater and Theater Bellevue. The world-famous music venues such as Paradiso and Milky Way and other clubs also ensure a bustling nightlife. You can rent a parking space (garage) of 25,- per day. Tram 7 takes you directly to Leidseplein. We can arrange a tram/bus card with travel credit.

name: Luxe appartement met tuin in Stadsdeel Zuid
description:
Relax and unwind in this peaceful, stylish space.

- Luxury apartment with backyard.
- Centrally located and right on Martin Luther King park.
- Both the Amstel and the Rai are in walking distance.

Spacious and light with 2 bedrooms, one room that can be used as a children's bedroom with a small bed instead of the double bed. Large garden with lots of terrace equipment to eat and lounge. Newly renovated bathroom with a bath a separate toilet. 2 min walk from the metrostation Europaplein. Lovely neighbourhood with the Scheldestraat and Maasstraat.

name: Clean comfi private studio in De Pijp central
description:
Beautiful and characteristic 1-room B&B studio with private bathroom, toilet and kitchenette on the second floor of an old Dutch building (1886) in vibrant neighbourhood 'De Pijp', central Amsterdam.

RAI conference center can easily be reached within 15 minutes.

This studio is for two people only and not suitable for children and infants under 12 years old

name: Luxury canal view suite big and central
description:
This big and compleet appartment is on the best and most central spot you can imagine. Only 10 minutes walk from central station. In a great viral neighborhood.
With lots off restaurants, bars Museums,shops and the Royal palace and shopping walhalla just around the corner.
Beautiful view right on the canal.
Steps outside for a drink watching people .
With the bedroom in the bag for a quiet sleep. Beautiful decorated.
Also available for long stay. Children and more guests possible on request.

name: Family Home with Roof Terrace next to Vondelpark
description: Welcome to our family home of 120 m2 on the third and fourth floor with a great roof terrace.  On the third floor there is a spacious & bright living room with lots of natural light, and an open kitchen, a balcony at the back and one in the front. On the fourth floor there are two bedrooms and a spacious open area with access to our roof terrace. It's located just around the corner of one of the unofficial 'food streets' in Amsterdam. Besides that the famous Vondelpark is a 3 minute walk away.

name: Spacious LOFT, free PARKING in City Centre
description:
We love to welcome you in our spacious loft/apartment in the CENTRE of Amsterdam. FREE PARKING (car not wider then a BMWX5) and save €140/ day on parkingfees. Ask the owners!

The loft has a private entrance, bathroom and pantry (no cooking). Free coffee/ tea & toiletpaper. Often early check in or late check out possible.

All the highlights (zoo, museums) within walking distance. Just around the corner are nice restaurants, bars and supermarkets!

Notice: NON SMOKING, NO DRUGS/VAPERS

name: House with 2 private independent studio's 120 m2
description: You will find this apartment in a prime location in Amsterdam, just 300 meters from the Rijksmuseum and Leidseplein. It is divided into 2 separate, lockable units. Both with their own bedroom and sitting area and their own television. The spacious kitchen is fully equipped for preparing a meal. Very spacious and luxuriously finished. Perfect for 2 couples, expats.The location is unique, you are just in the quiet area. If you walk straight out the door, the cafes start after 100 meters.

description: The beautiful 23 mtr long houseboat, Charlotte Johanna, is situated at the picturesque Noordermarkt alongside the canal Prinsengracht right in the middle of the Jordaan, the historic and lively downtown of Amsterdam.

name: Sleeping in a Church - EPIC Room at BUNK
description: After just minutes on the free ferry from Central Station, you’ll find Amsterdam’s true north. This up-and-coming neighbourhood is alive and kicking, bursting with cultural hotspots. At the centre of the neighbourhood’s social life there was always the Saint Rita church. Now that it is home to Bunk Amsterdam, this still holds true. Locals and travellers alike come to catch some rays on our terrace, sticking around for an affordable dinner and some free cultural nourishment.

name: Bright 1BR apartment (with balcony)
description:
A fully equipped apartment with balcony, located in a quiet neighborhood of Amsterdam West with beautiful surroundings.

The apartment has an easy access to travel around Amsterdam:

• Bus 21 : 25 mins to central station. The bus will pass westerpark & Jordaan area (15mins)

• Bus 61: directly to Amsterdam Sloterdijk (8 mins)

• Tram 13: 5 minutes to Sloterpas & 25 minutes to Dam square

• Bus 369 to the airport (1h)

✔Extra:
- The sofa in the living room can be turned to be a proper bed

name: Cosy & Comfortable apartment
description:
Cosy 2-bedroom apartment in Amsterdam-west. The apartment has a very nice atmosphere, perfect for relaxing after exploring this beautiful city. It is situated in a great area in Amsterdam West. There are 2 kingsize bed.
The apartment has a bathroom/toilet (the bathroom/toilet are a bit outdated But fine) and two balconies where you can relax in the sun.

name: Apartment near centre with amazing view over city
description:
A cosy 3 room apartment with a great roof terrace that has a view over the whole city.

The main bedroom has a double bed and the bathroom connected to it. There is a seperate toilet in the hall. Second bedroom is our child's room where we put big 2persons airmatress.
The living room has an open kitchen (fully equiped). It has a long table where you can sit. There is also a couch with ottoman and a chair to sit back and relax. And you can access the stairs to the roofterrace from there.

name: Creative Apartment in West
description:
Drenched in sunlight in a quiet spot right next to Westerpark our design led home is just a 10 minute cycle from the city centre. Our top floor flat looks out over a tree filled garden and you can hear the church bells on a Sunday. Relax in the roll topped bath or sit on the balcony in the morning sun sipping coffee.

Nearby is an amazing natural wine shop, Fuku Coffee, and many fantastic restaurants. For the sporty are yoga studios, a huge bouldering hall, and paddel and tennis courts.

name: Boutique design apartment
description: Experience luxury and tranquillity in our designer apartment in Amsterdam. Recently renovated, it offers contemporary furnishings and a serene garden view. Located in Spaarndammerbuurt near Jordaan, it's surrounded by history and art. Enjoy the terrace, fully-equipped kitchen, modern bathroom, and spacious bedroom with a walk-in wardrobe. Experience living in a designer home and embrace the oasis of our home. We can't wait to welcome you!

name: Bright and Cozy home in West Amsterdam!
description:
This cozy and recently furnished space in the heart of west Amsterdam surely feels like a home away from home; Surrounded by:
- Westerpark, one of the nicest parks in Amsterdam (5 minutes walk)
- A ton of restaurants, bars, and cafes surrounding the calm neighborhood
- Haarlemmerdijk and Jordaan, hype streets with trendy stores and shops (6 to 8 minutes walk)
- Access to bus and tramway public transportation (2 minutes walk)
- The grocery store is close by (2 minutes walk)

Complete ground floor apartment of 40 m2 with 2 rooms and a large kitchen. Double bed in small bedroom. Front and backyard. Please note: 3 cats live here too! Only cat lovers, please! Someone I can entrust my home to during my absence abroad due to emigration plans.

In my house there is everything you find in a regular household. It's nothing luxurious, just simple.

In the backyard, you can sit wonderfully.

Only 28 to 63 days at the moment

name: Centre-Calm-Nice view

I will try to describe my place with few words:

- It's a modern place in a classic building.
- In the center of the city but in a quiet street.
- A magnificent view, below boats and above airplanes.
- You see from the windows the old and new Amsterdam.
- Checkin after 15 o'clock and checkout before 11 o'clock.
- Breakfast in Fridge, just enjoy it.

You are close to everything in the city center.
