description: Discover this stylish apartment in De Baarsjes. Only 5 minutes by bike from the bustling center. You will find excellent public transport at 100 meters away and have the luxury of two beautiful parks, the Erasmuspark and Rembrandtpark, around the corner. Plus, you'll never have to look far for cozy restaurants, as those can be found around the corner. And despite the proximity of the center, you will enjoy the tranquility of this cozy neighborhood. A perfect location for living!

Large Studio in Amsterdam Noord, 15 minutes biking from the very trendy NDSM area. The boat can take you in 15 minutes to the city center of Amsterdam.
Appartmnent is in a very quiet , green, family friendly neighborhood, just a few minutes biking from the natural reserve of Twiske.
The appartment is spacious, full of light, recently renovated and fully equipped.
Ideal for a get away with the 2 of you.

name: Light, spacious, modern apt.
description:
A comfy apartment (~ 70 m2) on the third floor (no elevator) in a vibrant neighborhood.

The bedroom (bed 180x210cm) and dining room/fully equipped kitchen with a small balcony, are at the front. At the back there’s a cozy sitting room (no tv), bathroom (bath + shower), separate toilet and large balcony.

Shops, restaurants, city centre, main sights, museums are close by foot/bike/tram, just like the station/airport.

A great base to explorer Amsterdam!

name: Familiehuis met 3 slaapkamers & gratis parkeren
description:
Within 10 minutes you are by bike at the NDSM wharf where you can catch the free ferry to Amsterdam Central Station.

On the other side you are within 10 minutes by bike in the beautiful nature reserve t Twiske.

Free parking. At the rear of the house, a wonderfully sheltered garden with sun from morning to evening to relax. At the front a courtyard with a shared garden, where no cars are allowed to come and kids can play freely.

name: Appartement in de fijne Rivierenbuurt
description: Beautiful, newly renovated apartment in the Rivierenbuurt with large open kitchen and living room with lots of light. Separate bedroom with water bed The neighbourhood is quiet, but there is plenty to do and see in the area. Within walking distance is the Rijnstraat where many shops are and you are close to the district de Pijp where nice restaurants and cafes are. Walking distance to the Amstel Station, where you can take tram/bus/train and metro.

name: Rustig appartement met balkon in Amsterdam Centrum
description:
This centrally-located accommodation is tastefully decorated and offers plenty of space to recharge after a visit to bustling Amsterdam. Ideal for a family with children or business travelers. Fully equipped. Modern atmosphere, with classic elements.

Within 2 minutes' walking distance, you will find both the metro and tram stop, so that the whole of Amsterdam can be reached quickly.

High ceiling with original beams and modern en-suite bedroom with hotel quality linnen and premium quality kingsize bed in a beautiful monument right where you want to be.

description:
Bright, spacious and close to Amsterdam City Center apartment, located in trendy Westerpark area.

Great location with quick and easy access to food and transport. Just around the corner on the main street you'll find:

• Public transport - Bus #22 (50 m) to Central Station in 10 min and Jordaan area (5 min)
• Supermarket - 50 m
• Bike rental, pharmacy, bakery, coffee - 100 m
• Restaurants - Pizza, Thai, Brunch, Wine bar, Vegetarian,

name: Teleport Mini Crash Zone - Bed in 4-bed Mixed dorm.
description: This former office building is now a lively, low-key hostel / hotel full of beautiful street art, mind-blowing theme rooms and with private urban beach up front. Breakfast is available daily and, in the lobby, a delicious pizza can be ordered. Our Teleport Cafe opens up after breakfast with a basic menu of drinks and snacks. Ask about our onsite yoga classes or free bike tour. Located at a super comfortable location in Amsterdam-West just a 5 min walk away from the Amsterdam Sloterdijk station.

name: Bright Apartment 10m Vondelpark
description:
Experience Amsterdam at its finest in this apartment with dual balconies, premium minimalist furnishings, and an alluring blend of cozy and romantic lighting.

The interior seamlessly marries sleek design with intimate lighting, casting a soft glow on luxurious furniture.

The serene bedroom features a lavish queen-sized bed. Nestled in a lively neighborhood, this apartment encapsulates the essence of Amsterdam's allure.

name: Midden op de Westermarkt
description:
From this cozy, ideally located accommodation, you can explore Amsterdam on foot!

From the livingroom, you have views of the Westerkerk and the Keizersgracht.

Walk down the stairs, and you can reach the Damplein within minutes, between the pubs and eateries in the Jordaan or enjoy lunch and shopping in the 9 Streets or downtown!

Schiphol Airport can be reached within 30 minutes by public transport, at Amsterdam Centraal you are within 5 minutes by tram.

name: Lovely 3 bed with sunny garden
description: This bright, spacious flat with a sunny private terrace is located in the middle of trendy Oost (east) full of brilliant cafes, bars and resturants. Next door to the park, 5-min from the Amstel and 15min from central it's perfectly located for visit to beautiful Amsterdam. The 2.5 bedrooms (2 bedrooms one snug) comfortably sleep 6.

name: stylisch apartment with garden
description: After a busy day strolling in the city centre you can relax in this hip apartment. In the morning you can get a nice cup of coffee and go to the bakery across the street. There’re nice restaurants and supermarkets on the corner and public transport is closeby.

name: Centrally located monument, quiet, cozy
description:
A quiet, super cosy, apartment located in a monumental building from the 17th century, 15 minute walk away from the central station.
Located in a back of a building with a view on a beautiful garden. Perfect for a couple visiting the city.
I showcase professional photos which were taken 5 years ago and recently taken in the late afternoon.

Beautiful home located next to a large park.

Freshly renovated in 2023. Suitable for families or a group of friends.

Special amenities include:
* Nespresso latte coffee machine
* Quooker instant boiling water system
* Two 65" televisions. The one in the master bedroom has a sound system.

* By bike 16 min

Renovated in March 2022!

*No Coffee Shop Tourists*

The studio is reached by a flight of stairs. 2 bedrooms on your left, a bathroom, and sitting area w/ kitchen facilities & coffee bar on the right. Lovely window canal side window seat.

My bright Amsterdam apartment offers the perfect base to explore the city in a few days - or feel a little longer at home.

The neighborhood "De Baarsjes" is a popular neighborhood in the west of Amsterdam. The apartment is a 15 minute walk from the Jordaan and has a tram, bus stop and supermarket all within 300 meters walk.

description:
Cozy apartment that is perfectly proportioned for an intimate stay. You'll immediately feel at home. Lots of contrasts!
Minimalistic but luxurious.
Central but Quiet

An outside deck where you can enjoy the sun. Its in a quiet neighborhood, and the city center is easy to reach. Tram stop is in walking distance. Supermarket and shops are all in walking distance as well.

The water around the boat is clean and you can swim in it.

description: This beautiful mansion, with deep garden and jetty on the water, is located in a very desirable part of IJburg on the leafy Jan Vrijmanstraat. The neighborhood is characterized by large family homes and plenty of space, green and play facilities. In the nearby area, various parks, the city beach Blijburg and all amenities are within easy reach. This house combines the advantages of being close to the city and the tranquility of living outside in an urban, watery environment.

name: Central & Quiet Canal-view Loft
description:
This stylish place to stay is perfect for groups of up to 4 people.

Located within the beautiful Amsterdam canal district, this apartment is the perfect mix of central yet quiet thanks to to being nestled away on a back canal.

The apartment is loft-style living with ample space for relaxing with an open bedroom / bathroom concept upstairs.

The house has been recently renovated with a brand new kitchen and a rare 4 airconditioners to mange the heat through the summer months.

name: Historic Mansion in the heart of Amsterdam 304m2
description: This beautiful townhouse in the center of Amsterdam has a rich history. The four-story urban villa was built in 1865. It is close to the canals, Rijksmuseum, Van Gogh Museum, Leidscheplein, PC Hooftstraat and the trendy Utrecht street with boutiques, cafes and restaurants. It is a great city oasis for families with children, equipped with all conveniences and comforts, 5 bedrooms, 3.5 bathrooms, a TV room, a beautiful living kitchen and a large garden.

Plus, you're just steps away from incredible eateries like Fort Negen bakery and NNea Pizza. Come and make yourself at home!

You can also enjoy a nice walk or run in the rembrandtpark 8mn walk or wander near admiralgracht canals .

name: Stunning apartment w/ private roof terrace.
description:
One of a kind!

Welcome to our apartment in Amsterdam West. Are you looking for a place to relax, unwind and enjoy Amsterdam in a peaceful yet vibrant residential area - with a view of the entire city? Then this might be what you are looking for!

Especially for families, our Airbnb is the ideal choice. In addition to the comfortable bedrooms, the children can enjoy themselves on the playground equipment in our spacious garden or in the play area in the living room. Enjoy in our garden in the afternoon sun and take advantage of our BBQ. Because we are on the ground floor, our apartment is always nice and cool

name: Spacious sunny house (100m2) in Amsterdam Oost
description:
Imagine relaxing on a spacious porch in a lovely green area after a full day of taking in the beautiful canals and historic places in Amsterdam’s iconic and exciting city center.

We offer you the best of both worlds, conveniently accessible via public transport (20 minutes to the city center) with the hustle and bustle of Amsterdam's many attractions -- start and finish your day in our lovely Amsterdam Oost neighborhood, full of restaurants, shops, markets, parks, and areas to walk or run.

name: Bright and comfortable Amsterdam apartment (60m2)
description:
Bright apartment perfectly situated in the lively and most upcoming district in Amsterdam, called De Baarsjes. Still undiscovered by tourists.

Vondelpark, Mercatorplein and Kinkerstraat with lots of shops and restaurants just around the corner. Tram and bus stop right in front of the door which brings you to Leidseplein, Rembrandtplein, Dam, Museumplein and Jordaan in less than 15 minutes.

Bike rental right across the street to explore the city by bike like a typical Amsterdam citizen.

name: Spacious apartment in the lovely 'Pijp'
description:
Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally-located place. The property is in Amsterdam's effervescent De Pijp. This neighbourhood is widely known for its wide selection of lovely restaurants, countless gastrobars/cafés, a rich variety of boutiques and shops and of course, popular Albert Cuyp market, museum square but also Vondelpark. Nevertheless, this stretch of the street is tranquil.
The recently renovated apartment is equipped with 2 bathrooms, a state-of-the-art kitchen and small garden.

Welcome to our stylish apartment in Amsterdam's vibrant city center! Nestled between Prinsengracht and Keizersgracht canals, our urban oasis offers comfort and style.

Our south faced apartment features three balconies, offering unique views of Amsterdam's canal houses and the Rijksmuseum.

With only a 5-minute walk to the Rijksmuseum and Van Gogh Museum, and a metro station next door for easy travel from the airport or Central Station it is the ideal base for your Amsterdam stay!

The layout spans two floors, a living room and bathroom on one level, and two bedrooms on the other.

Located near public transport, the heart of downtown is easily accessible with just a 5-10 minute stroll.

Discover the perfect blend of historic charm and modern convenience in this unique oasis at the heart of Amsterdam.

description: You will feel like you are visiting your friend's place in this cozy apartment in Amsterdam Old West. There are plenty of bars, restaurants and coffeeshops nearby. The canals are a short walk away. Very centrally located without all the noise of being in the center. We live in this apartment so please expect it to look like that! We are on the 4th floor so that means climbing 4 flights  of steep narrow of stairs. Reduced rates due to construciton on the street.

name: Cosy colourful canal house
description:
Enjoy a cosy and colourful experience at this centrally-located place.

We are looking for guests to stay between
26th of July and 16th of August 2024.

name: SunFlower, A Sunny B&B
description: No description

name: apartamento
description: Enjoy the simplicity of this quiet, central home.

name: Bright and spacious apartment on the canal with pp
description:
Bright and spacious 1 bedroom apartment (with private parking) in one of nicest neighbourhoods of Amsterdam (west).

A true gem located in a quiet street close to multiple parks, while at the same time walking/cycling distance from the canals and city centre. The apartment is spacious, bathes in natural light, is tastefully decorated, well maintained and clean.

name: Stylish Apartment with Sauna
description: Escape to the heart of Amsterdam at our spacious 160m2 apartment, complete with a small garden and sauna. Boasting two beautiful bedrooms, our place is the perfect home away from home for couples, families, or friends. Located in the trendy neighbourhood of The Baarsjes, just five minutes from the city center, our apartment offers easy access to Amsterdam's best bars, restaurants, and attractions. Our apartment is the ideal choice for your Amsterdam getaway.

name: Private Eco Wooden Studio: bath & bikes & garden
description:
PRIVATE STUDIO-OWN ENTRANCE, BATHROOM&TUB, FREE PARKING&BIKES . NO SMOKING
Stylish studio in wooden Eco home 15 minutes by tram from city centre. We designed+built it ourselves! It's CO2 neutral. Has big double bed. And a couch that folds into a 1:40 double bed. Extra baby bed possible. Bathroom with bathtub. You can heat food in a microwave. The area is a beautiful new area with lots of modern architecture and water: swimming! You can use our 2 bikes & 2 SUP-boards. As well as our garden.

name: Room 66 - Spacious studio in 'de Pijp', Amsterdam
description:
This spacious studio with private access is located on the first floor of our 19th century building in trendy and lively neighborhood de Pijp. Walking distance to the city center, the famous Van Gogh and Rijks museum. The lovely Sarphatipark, the coziest bars and restaurants of Amsterdam, public transport or rent-a-bike just around the corner.
High-speed WiFi internet, a kitchen counter, toaster, fridge, Nespresso machine, central heating, and a bathroom all for you!
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Casa Botanica
description: Discover bustling Amsterdam East in this lovely apartment with two tasteful bedrooms. Around the corner from countless cozy bars, good restaurants, green parks and nice shops. The apartment is located in a quiet street with a spacious and sunny south-facing balcony. The apartment is equipped with all the luxuries such as a nice dining area, a comfortable living room and fully equipped open kitchen. A bathroom with a bath, a shower and a separate toilet are provided

name: Romantic room, bathroom en suite. City ring+RAI
description:
A very nice place to stay as a couple visiting the city or as a traveling business man/woman.

A very cozy/cozy room completely renovated in a completely renovated 1930s house. Private bathroom including bathtub and in the hallway a fridge to keep drinks or small bite. Plenty of breakfast places and nice restaurants nearby and new bikes for rent from me.

name: Boutique room style ,room in quiet neighborhood
description: No description

name: Cosy private room in Amsterdam
description:
My apartment is located in a calm and green neighbourhood very close to Vondelpark.

You'll stay in a cozy room with a private balcony which has everything you need to have a comfy stay. The room is furnished with a top notch mattress, fresh linens and a wardrobe.

I live in the apartment so you'll be sharing the common spaces with me.

You will also have full access to the shared bathroom which is tidy and clean and has a spacious shower.

Tea and coffee are always there :)

See you soon!

name: Lovely bedroom with nice balcony & green view!
description:
A bedroom with a nice balcony and wonderful green view in a cozy apartment. The tram station where tram number 1 & 17 passes are 3 minutes walk from the apartment, and in 15 minutes you are in the center of Amsterdam.
very close to Lelylaan station & schiphol airport.
**Blacony can be used for smoking but only normal cigarettes and not anything else**
If the booking is done for 3/4 guests, a single bed and a sofa bed (for 4th guest) in the bedroom shown in the last photo will be provided.

name: Large private kingsize bedroom close 2 city center
description:
Beautifully located newly renovated bedroom. Only 8 walking minutes away from shops and metro station Reigersbos, from where it is a 19 min. trip to Amsterdam Center.

Completely new decorated. Closet, water boiler, senseo coffee maker, microwave and a small refrigerator are available.

The bedroom door can be locked. you have your own private bedroom, you share the bathroom and toilet.

name: Quiet room in a clean and cosy apartment
description:
Private room in a beautiful shared apartment The apartment has all necessities and located in a calm residential area. Vondelpark is just a few minutes walk away and close by you have multiple restaurants, cafes, and grocery stores. Take the tram to and from the apartment which takes around 10 minutes to popular areas as museum-plein. Note that the kitchen and bathroom are shared with the host.

Weed not allowed in/around the property!

Looking forward to hosting you!

name: Independent studio by Vondelpark
description: Keep it simple at this peaceful and centrally-located place. Just renovated in-suite room with independent entrance. The room is at the top floor and has a desk, drawers under the bed for storage, a toilet, shower and a sink. Towels are given by the host. Please notice that no wi-fi is provided.

name: Cozy Room (no couples)Close to Centre & Cute Cats!
description:
Our lovely appartement is located in one of the best spots in Amsterdam!
It´s an absolute pleasure to live across the wonderful westerpark with it´s many nice terrasses and restaurants and fun events going on.
You can even go to the cinema :) Enjoy the garden and our sweet three cats

name: Peaceful Home with Canal View
description: While we are travelling we make our canal view home available for airbnb. (So the entire apartment is yours) . We just recently had a baby, so the apartment is fully equipped with baby and toddler stuff and toys ;). It is close to Westerpark, Central Station, Jordaan, Anna Frank house. You’ll love our place because of the cosiness and the location. You can areach most destinations on foot.  It is good for couples, families and  friends.No parties and loud music;)

name: Private room in renovated apt
description: This stylish place to stay is perfect for solo trips or people moving here permanently and looking for temporarily landing.  If you like to feel excited to see all Amsterdam has to offer and prefer a modern & comfortable place to sleep close to the city centre, then I'd be more than happy to welcome you as my guest! Perfect for a solo traveler wanting to explore Amsterdam for a while or someone moving to Amsterdam and wants explore the city first.

name: BnB Japonica
description: Situated in “de Pijp”, a peaceful, comfortable room with your own entrance, your own bathroom and toilet, with microwave, fridge, electric kettle, coffee machine, TV and WiFi.  Recommended to artists, for a city trip, etc...

name: cozy piano room Amsterdam
description:
Live like a local Amsterdammer: our home is close to the museum quarter (Rijksmuseum, Van Gogh), the hip district called De Pijp, the famous Albert Cupystraat open market, and also the beautiful Amstelpark!

There are 2 tram stops right next to the building.

It only takes 2 mins to reach shops and supermarkets by foot.

Tired of tourist and often overpriced restaurants in Centrum? Here hide in plain sight many low-key yet surprisingly delicious restaurants from different countries!

name: Charming room with great view
description:
Amazing canal view in Ams house, a true authentic experience.
Central location, you walk to main attractions in 5-10 mins.
Window with double glass & great comfy mattresses.
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Cosy room with double bed & lounge (apt shared)
description:
Upon arrival you find a cute Bohemian place & room with a high double bed and a lovely lounge couch beneath. You can use our garden, kitchen and shower anytime & use our Dutch bikes for free. No weird house rules, just feel at home here! Private rooms, rest happily shared with Henkk & sons! At times you might meet other guests.

If you are (max) 4 people you could tuse the extra bedroom (big double bed), fee 49€ p/n.

Smoking weed is not allowed in/near the apartment.
Read the reviews!
amenities: ['Free washer – In unit', 'Free dryer – In unit']

name: Sunny apt great location free bikes
description:
Cosy and quaint
Located in a wonderful part of Amsterdam, next to the desirable neighbourhood Jordaan and Westerpark. Quiet neighborhood, with lively places within walking distance. Public transport nearby: bus 21, tram 3 , and tram 10. We also have two bicycles available. Water view from huge window .

This charming and spacious apartment is located on the third floor of a newly built apartment building along the Kostverlorenvaart canal.

THE NEIGHBORHOOD is known as Westerpark with

name: Twin Bed in private room in center of Amsterdam!
description:
A very friendly house in the center of Amsterdam! You have a private room (lockable door) in a shared apartment with a fully-stocked kitchen, a living room, a toilet, and a shower room.

You can walk to every tourist attraction, or take the tram or bus - it's a 2 min walk to the bus stop! It's a 25 minute walk to DAM square or Central Station, or a 15 min bus ride. Close to the museums, red light district, parks, and central attractions. Flexible check-in/out time. Free fast wifi. 4/20 friendly.

name: Quiet Delft Blue room with airco
description: Spacious and bright room in our home, where we also reside, featuring a king-size pocket spring bed with luxurious cotton bed linens. Your own  ensuite bathroom and a small balcony. The room has fast WiFi and air conditioning/converter. Located in a quiet, residential area in Amsterdam South with free parking. Public transport is just a 4-minute walk away, offering easy and quick access to the city center by tram and metro. WTC and RAI congress centre are within walking distance.

name: Private Studio in the “Pijp” near hotspots
description: The Studio is a all in one apartment on the ground floor, with all necessary things like a own small kitchen, television, wifi etc., and a own shower and toilet en suite. The electric slatted bed (1.80 x 2.00) can function as a sofa. The main feauture of the studio is the location: Situated on the ground floor in a very popular neighbourhood. (de Pijp), , on walking distance of the Albert Cuypmarkt, the Rijksmuseum, van Gogh museum and Stedelijk Museum.

name: Amazing ground floor apt. in city centre @Jordaan!
description: I would love to welcome you in this delightful ground floor apartment in an old factory downtown. There is room for 3 people and a baby. It is a functionally classified studio with all modern conveniences, such as very comfortable beds, your personal entrance at ground level, modern bathroom and fresh towels and linnen. If you are looking for a home away from home, you will not find a better location in the authentic Jordan. The area is full of great restaurants, café's, canals and shops.
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Bed & Beach A’dam, private bathroom + Free Parking
description:
Welcome at Bed & Beach Amsterdam, We have a bed for the night, with private bathroom and free car parking. The room is separated from the rest of the house, so very quiet.
Our house was built in 2020 on a new created island in Amsterdam; Centrumeiland. It is near the new Amsterdam Beach. This is a quiet area where many families live.

—> We don’t serve breakfast, but there is a refrigerator you can use.
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Two private rooms in cosy apartment in "de Pijp"
description: No description

name: Nice quiet room for one person only
description:
The room is situated near a recreational area and has good access via subway to Amsterdam city; The neighborhood is quite and green.
So it combines the city and the country side. You have access to the kitchen and your own refrigerator.

name: Amstel Joy
description:
Our guestroom is suitable for 1 or 2 people, with twin beds, bathroom and tea/coffee facilities. We serve a nice and tasty breakfast for you.
Our home is situated on the shore of river Amstel , very near to the Amstel train station , metro-, tram- and bus stops.
Parking is free of charge on Sundays.

name: Downtown Guestroom
description: In the heart of Amsterdam, you will find both large shopping streets and unique small shops on the canals and in the smaller streets in between. Right there you will find nice cafes, small restaurants and the unique houses and canal houses. Many smaller museums are within walking distance, but also local markets. You will continue to be amazed and amused in the heart of Amsterdam

name: Beautiful and spacious room
description: Private room offered in elegant furnished, clean and tidy apartment in a nice and quiet area close to the center
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Spacious room with private bathroom
description:
A very cozy private room with private bathing facilities (Shower, Sink, Toilet).
The room has its own entrance, and own terrace, on the 3rd (top) floor.

name: Lovely bedroom with balcony very spacious
description: you will get a private room in a shared apartment,( 1 person only sorry no couples)  please don't ask for discounts the price is up to date.

name: Boutique Suite for 3 people near Museum Quarter
description:
The Fabulous suite is a luxury guest room on the 1st floor and completely private,only 4 minutes walk to the Museumplein, Heineken Experience and Albert Cuijp 2 minutes walk.
This room will surprise you, I promise.
The interior has been carefully curated,a combination of vintage,new design,handmade ceramics & luxury materials.
Smart TV with Netflix,wifi and a nice bathroom are waiting for you for relaxation. Very easily accessible with public transportation. 1 stop with the metro of the RAI.
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Bright Nordic Designed Apartment with River View
description:
Roomy 55m2 apartment. It has two double bedrooms, making it ideal for enjoying unforgettable family & friends moments, one bathroom, a living-dining room and a fully equipped kitchen. The apartment does not have a balcony, but it has stunning views to the IJ river.

Maximum capacity: 5 people (sofa bed for 1 guest)

For stays of 7 nights or more, there is weekly housekeeping. Additional cleaning services can be booked at an extra cost. Bed linen and towels included.

description:

The large and luxury appartment has:
• Livingroom

name: Citycenter Canal-house 5 * non-shared room+ensuite
description: Luxury room with private entrance door next to the elevator in historic Canal-house. Totally private, nothing shared. Located just a 10-minute walk away from the buzzing Dam Square is this comfortable room with en-suite.  There is a coffee maker, watercooker, refrigerator, TV and high-speed internet. The room has individual heating and also airconditioning. There is an elevator. Located in the City centre near Waterlooplein, 10 minutes walk from Rembrandtplein and 5 minutes walk from Nieuwmarkt.

name: Bobbi’s luxe appartement
description: This spacious apartment has a perfect location in Amsterdam Oud-Zuid, to explore Amsterdam. In 5 minutes at the Vondelpark or in 10 at the Amsterdam forest. Direct (night)bus connection to Schiphol airport. Wonderful open kitchen, bath, balcony, walk-in closet! Everything you need for a great stay in Amsterdam.

name: Spacious apartment in the Pijp, near Museumplein
description:
Typical authentic local Amsterdam apartment ideal for couples, solo travellers or two friends.

The apartment is very clean, spacious and stylishly decorated and recently renovated. We provide basis amenities and WIFI. The apartment is centrally located with many cafes, restaurants, bars, shops, markets and parks within walking distance and Museumplein around the corner. From the apartment you can easily reach the other famous tourist attractions. Public transportation is within 2 min walking.

name: Cosy home in De Pijp
description: I invite you to my home, which I rent out for period when I am away, so you can have full 'Home away from Home' experience. On a very peaceful typical Amsterdam street of De Pijp, around the corner from the coolest cafes, wine bars, restaurants and boutiques and literally 5 min bike ride (15min walk) from the Amsterdam City Center.

name: Stylish Bos en Lommer Apartment with Sunset Views
description: Discover Amsterdam from our stylish and spacious 2-bedroom apartment in trendy Bos en Lommer. Perfect for exploring both the vibrant city center and hip neighborhoods like De Baarsjes. Enjoy the light-filled, modern design with a large living area and sunset terrace. Close to museums and public transport, making it easy to explore. Free parking in the garage. Ideal for a couple or three friends seeking comfort and convenience. Book now for a memorable Amsterdam experience!

name: 4B - Congress Centre Apartments
description:
Looking for a 6 months (more or less) rental in the popular De PIJP area Amsterdam? Ideal for a couple of students, University-employees, etc.... Interested? Send us a message for a (FaceTime) viewing. Rent €2200/month + €275 utilities (wifi, gas, water, electric)

REGISTRATION FOR 2 PEOPLE IS POSSIBLE

This apartment is bigger than the foto's show - exudes a welcoming atmosphere, providing a cozy ambiance. The WiFi is perfect, stable & strong. Supermarkets & restaurants around the corner

name: Great place near Westerpark/Jordaan
description:
My house, in the center of Amsterdam, is very close to Westerpark and the Jordaan. You will really enjoy the location as it is close to everything you need to make your stay in Amsterdam the best ever.

My house is suited for couples or for business travel.

name: Perfect Artistic & Private City Centre Hide Out
description:
Private ground floor mid-century/modern designed cosy studio apartment with luxury details, as part of our larger home.

Museum Square around the corner with all museums, the famous Albert Cuyp fresh market and diverse restaurants and breakfast/lunch/dinner cafes within minutes walk. The best our city center has to offer!

・ Best suited for 2 guests
・ You can book 3 months in advanced
・ Incl. fridge, kitchenware etc, but no full kitchen (no e.g. microwave)
・ Find our city tips in the Guidebook

name: Boutique apartment - Bens The Highdocks
description: This newly built property is located in Amsterdam Noord, just a 15-minute walk from the ferry to Central Station. It features a restaurant (not open yet), working area and free Wi-Fi. The apartments are split over three floors, and are modernly decorated with peaceful beige color decor.

name: Overnachten aan de kade.
description:
This stylish space is located on the canal near must-see sights. Such as the canal belt of Amsterdam, the trendy district "de Pijp" with numerous bars, restaurants, shops and the Heineken brewery, the Museumplein with, among others, the Rijksmuseum and the Van Gogh museum.
No breakfast is served, there are plenty of options for breakfast in the area.
Check-in and check-out times are flexible.
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Cozy 2BR apartment in the heart of Amsterdam
description:
Bright and cozy apartment with 2 bedrooms and a large balcony, making it perfect for families.

Located in Amsterdam city center in the vibrant neighbourhood of De Pjip, at a walking distance from key attractions like Museumplein or Albert Cuyp, 3min from metro/tram and with a lot of nice restaurants, coffees and supermarkets.

Wide kitchen/living room, 2 bedrooms (baby friendly) and a large balcony, perfect to enjoy Amsterdam. 3rd floor in a typical Amsterdam house, with steep stairs / no lift.

name: Charmante, rustige kamer met airco in centrum!
description: From this charming accommodation you are right in the center of Amsterdam at popular shops and fantastic restaurants. The room shares the bathroom but has its own sink. There is a wardrobe, washer, hair dryer, lazy chair, coffee and tea facilities. There is also a work desk and air conditioning. The room is located at the quiet back of the property.
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast
amenities: ['Free washer – In unit', 'Free dryer – In unit']

name: Suite 7 - Big sunny studio in 'de Pijp', Amsterdam
description:
This spacious and sunny studio with private access is located on the 4th floor (no elevator) of our 19th century building in trendy and lively neighborhood de Pijp. Walking distance to the city center and the famous Van Gogh and Rijks museum. The lovely Sarphatipark, the coziest bars and restaurants of Amsterdam, public transport or rent-a-bike, just around the corner.
High-speed wifi, central heating, a kitchen dresser with fridge and Nespresso machine and private bathroom all for you!
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Comfortable City Centre Apt. with pool and gym
description:
This apartment is located in the bustling city center of Amsterdam. Within walking distance of the Dam, the Kalverstraat and the Rokin with a wide range of restaurants. Enjoying everything Amsterdam has to offer! The apartment itself has a pleasant open layout and a nice balcony overlooking the courtyard garden.

The bustling city center is literally in front of the door here. Incidentally, you won't notice much of this in the apartment or on the balcony.

name: Rembrandt Studio One
description:
This awesomely cosy studio is located in the heart of Amsterdam, you can walk to museums, bars, the park, canals, restaurants, etc. Situated next to Rembrandts plein makes sure that you are in the centre the minute you walk outside the door.
The studio has a comfortable two-person bed and a spacious bathroom, also there is a small lounge area with two nice chairs.
Check out the pictures and imagine yourself staying in this cosy place!

name: Cozy home close to Vondelpark
description:
Beautiful one-bedroom apartment on a short walking distance from Vondelpark.
The apartment (first floor) has very recently been renovated and is equipped with everything you need including a comfortable box-spring bed.
Metro, bus and tram are very close by. Tram 2 takes you along all the highlights of Amsterdam and stops at the end of the street.

name: Amsterdam apt. Sunny garden + 35min drive to beach
description:
Lovely one bedroom apartment in Amsterdam West, just renovated with Scandinavian interior. With a sunny garden (8x6m2) on the south west side.

- Reach the city center within 10 minutes by bike.
- And quiet enough to escape from the buzz of the city.
- Within 5 minutes you walk into Westerpark, where you can enjoy drinks or visit the Fabrique de Lumière.
- You can take the tram/bus around the corner which takes you anywhere.
- Enough lunch, drinks or dinner options nearby (by foot).
amenities: ['Free washer – In unit', 'Private backyard – Fully fenced', 'Outdoor furniture', 'Outdoor dining area']

name: Beautiful & Brand New AP @ NDSM | Near City Center
description: Welcome to my newly built apartment at the heart of the ndsm! We received the keys in July, and it has been furnished with high-end finishes. The space is filled with natural sunlight and features a fully equipped kitchen, a spacious bedroom, and a modern bathroom with a separate restroom. Additionally, the apartment includes a balcony with a view of the courtyard. It's conveniently located it just takes 10-minutes to central station by free ferry, with a quick 3-minute walk to the free ferry.

name: Exclusive Amstel-View Apartment
description: Experience luxurious living at our exclusive Amstel river apartment in Amsterdam's coveted Amstel-bank. Unobstructed river views provide a stunning backdrop for this fully-furnished, designer space. Indulge in plush bedding, high-end appliances, and top-tier amenities. The apartment is sustainably renovated and features plenty of natural light. With a spacious layout, it offers a private sanctuary for discerning travellers. Perfectly located, book to experience the ultimate Amsterdam adventure.

name: Hidden Gem Amsterdam | natuurlijke oase van rust
description: This charming stay has a view of one of Amsterdam's last green landscapes. The private garden, with its own fruit tree garden, is adjacent to the Wilmkebreekpolder. Here, many meadow birds breed and fouragge between the cows and sheep. A view that will never get bored. This unique place - with its own private garden of 1600m2 - provides lots of privacy, peace and breathtaking sunsets.

name: Cute apartment in the lovely Pijp area!
description: My lovely apartment is located in the Pijp: a lively and trendy neighbourhood with a lot of restaurants, bars, shops, the RAI, Albert Cuyp market, the popular Museum square and Sarphatipark nearby. This area is thé place to be if you are in Amsterdam. All great spots are on walking distance. Nearby is a tram stop but also a metro station, that will bring you from South to North in minutes.

name: Bright apartment in the Pijp (Heineken experience)
description: Design apartment in the Pijp– Ideal for couples and business, superbly located brand new apartment. Nice building close to Heineken Experience (most visited place in Amsterdam).

name: Ruim familiehuis in Amsterdam Zuid
description:
A beautiful big sunny house with garden, located at the Top Location: Amsterdam Buitenveldert / Zuidas.

Only 15 minutes away from the center of Amsterdam with public transportation/bike/car.

This home is child-friendly, and NOT for party people but rather for those who are looking for a, comfortable, home-like and tranquil stay in Amsterdam.
It is clean, cozy, spacious, designed for comfortable living.

Close to the Amsterdamse Bos, Gelderlandplein shopping mall and big public playgrounds.

name: Lovely & spacious apartment in charming area
description: This spacious apartment is located in the super nice resident area of Old South. Immerse yourself in the famous & unique 'Amsterdam School' style architecture style for your visit.  Walking distance to all Amsterdam greats, like Rijksmuseum & Van Gogh Museum.  But also the best bakeries, restaurants & coffee stores. It's a 3 bedroom apartment with all the amenities you need. Best suited for a couple (with or without kids).

name: Canal house in Amsterdam Center
description: Beautiful and stylish canal house in Amsterdam City center. Light and clean. 2 bedrooms. Very close to Amstel, Hermitage, Stopera, Artis, Carré and Rembrandtsplein.

name: Spacious home in the heart of Amsterdam, 2-BDRS
description: [I am looking for longer term stay - send me a message]  Super spacious home in the heart of charming Amsterdam with 2 bedrooms, large rooftop terrace and extremely close proximity to canal and shopping area. Rooftop is an oasis with plants and trees, including big BBQ and view over the city. i’ll be away working remotely so my home is looking for a new owner. I prefer someone who stays a month or so, feel free to send me a message for further info - 3rd and 4th Floor no elevator!

name: Lovely private studio in the heart of Amsterdam
description:
Small but beautifully decorated with garden and bath. You will hear the birds whistling & the church bells ringing in the background. Super quiet, but around the corner everything you are looking for within walking distance.
If you want to come on days where the calendar is closed, you can send a message and I will do everything I can to make this possible!

name: Kids-friendly A'dam home with large balcony (+cat)
description:
Feel right at home in our cozy and bright apartment in the charming Bos & Lommer neighborhood. Our place is flooded with daylight and and furnished with love and eye for detail. This is our actual home (us and our 3 kids) — so expect a place that is alive and homely instead of sterile and IKEA-bought :)

Ideal for a young family with a kid.

The centre of Amsterdam is only 10-15 minutes with bike or public transport. A lively street with many shops and supermarkets is right around the corner.

name: Ruime gezinswoning met tuin
description:
Wonderful spacious and cozy family home in an ideal location. Quiet and "hidden" among the greenery, but close to the hustle and bustle of the city. The house has a spacious living room with sliding doors to the sunny garden. Here is seating, a dining table, bbq and a tropical lounge cabin. Upstairs are three large bedrooms (1 with balcony) with large double beds.
The Amsterdam Forest is just around the corner. Amenities and Zuidas within walking distance. Perfect tram connection to center.

Small beaches at the lake nearby. Perfect for little children!

Enjoy the sunny south-facing garden, a spacious kitchen and relax in two comfortable sitting rooms. Their are two bedrooms, two bathrooms and a spare room for your ultimate convenience. Tram 2 will take you to the heart of Amsterdam in just 15 minutes, passing all major museums. Experience the city, where history and comfort come together for an unforgettable stay.

In the middle of the cozy Spaarndammerbuurt, with the Westerpark just around the corner. The hip NDSM wharf can be reached in 6 minutes with a free ferry. Good connection by public transport to all the museums/hotspots in the city.

description:
"Sailing barge Titaan” is a relatively new ship in the Dutch fleet. She is build in 2001 and has been used mostly for romantic sailing trips and weddings.

Nowadays she has been refitted to accommodate groups of passengers (up to 12 people). The traditional white sailing barge in combination with a more modern and luxury interior gives the whole ship an interesting twist and a perfect place to unwind and relax.

shopping street,breakfastcafes ,cafes, many restaurants,markets park. museums are a neighborhood where you can feel between the amsterdammers. In short, beautiful place for a nice time.

Travelling to Amsterdam this summer?
Discover the city from this prime location. Ideally located near the Rijks Museum and Amsterdam's top Spiegelgracht canal, this cozy retreat features a luxurious bedroom with a double boxspring bed, an en-suite bathroom, and two terraces perfect for relaxing evenings. Experience the city’s vibrancy with easy access to local cafes and cultural spots. Suitable for three adults with a sofa bed available. Please note: no parties, pets, or unregistered guests.

This amazing two floor house has everything you and your family needs, luxury, comfort and great surroundings.

This familyproof 5 room appt is easy to get to by public (metro, tram and bus stops are 5 min away). Easy by car as well (10 min drive from Schiphol). The famous Vondelpark is a 10 minute walk away!. There are plenty playgrounds for kids close by, theres plenty of fun for all ages with many nice bars and restaurants close by as well as the sunny canal on the intersection.

Very well connected, right next to frequent ferry to Central Station and Oud-West. The city centre and popular areas like Jordaan and Westerpark are reached on foot and bicycle.

Spacious living area with open kitchen and dining area. Doors opening to a large green and sunny south facing terrace. Two spacious bedrooms with big double beds.

Bonus: great views on the IJ river, restaurants and all the hustle and bustle of NDSM.

description:
Family house in Amsterdam.

Its a recent build and of good quality. more photos underway!

it has 3 bedrooms.

On the quiet North side, 10 minutes from all the uproar.

Ideal for families or multi-couples and if you have a car. EV charging possible. Any more cars can park free nearby.

There's a cat. He has everything, automatic food dispenser, free access. No need to worry about him but he might request some attention.

Spacious 3-layer preserved house with Bechstein wing and harp, and with beautiful deep forest garden, located in green child and dog friendly area, close to shopping center and station.

There are also 2 bicycles available (with additional payment to 35 euros per week per bike, to be paid on site).

Minimum rental period: 20 days, max. 30 days.

Museumplein, Van Gogh Museum, Rijksmuseum, Heineken Experience, Vondelpark and charming canals of Amsterdam are just by 5-10 minutes of walking distance. You are literally in the middle of all kind of restaurants, bars and pubs. The famous Albert Cuyp Market is just in front of your door.

The studio is fully renovated with all brand new furniture.

Cause is big, I have some of my stuff there but no worries.

(tip: rent a bike located around the corner)

The apartment is 120sqm with a 4sqm balcony. Living space on the 1st floor + storage room on the second floor and laundry room on the 3rd floor.
Very silent bedrooms facing the internal court. Smart heating system and Fast Wi-Fi in the whole apartment. Smart TV. Bicycles (also with kid's seat).

Whether you're looking to explore the city or simply enjoy a quiet escape, this apartment provides a comfortable and convenient base for your stay in Amsterdam.

Experience the unique allure of living on the water while enjoying all the comforts of a cozy home. This delightful 25m2 suite on a typical Dutch houseboat offers all you need for a nice stay in Amsterdam, including a private bathroom, a small kitchenette, and a stylishly decorated interior.

name: Lux Appartement The Pijp
description:
A beautiful apparent in the Hot Spot: 'The Pijp'

The Pijp is known as Amsterdam’s Latin Quarter, with a mix of cuisines, terraces and convivial cafés.
You will be close to the beautiful Sarphatipark, as well as to the Albert Cuypmarket (a famous street market).

-This gem is perfect if you want to be centrally located, but stay in a calm area close to the canals and cute cafés and restaurants.

-Public Transport is 2 mins away and brings you to all tourist locations within 10 min.

Enjoy!

name: Lovely apartment in the Pijp! Great location!
description:
Large apartment, 55m2, stylishly decorated, great location. Walking distance to major museums and city center. Albert Cuyp market one block to the north, beautiful Sarphati Park one block to south. Lots of wonderful cafes and restaurants close by.

The registration number for the apartment is 0363 EDD6 1885 DF0C 641A.

We only rent out to guests with positive reviews.

name: Modern & light apartment with lift
description:
Welcome! This is a recently built (2008) non-smoking place for two (70 m2), in the best neighbourhood in Amsterdam! Quiet street, but everything you need is a block away: supermarket, cafes, restaurants, gym, even a cute cat cafe. Tram stop into the centre at 150m, park at 500m.
Inside, you’ll find a comfortable double bed, a bathroom with shower, separate wc, a spacious living room and open kitchen.
Discounted rate since I am a new host, after renting to neighbours’ family a few times.

name: Apartment with rooftop terrace in city center
description:
This stylish & green lofty-feeling apartment is located in Amsterdam city center, bordering the old city center, the museum & canal belt district. All within walking distance!

The apartment is stylish, spacious & bright and has a great atmosphere! There is a fully equipped & open kitchen, a comfortable double bed, great bathroom & shower, dining & lounge area,...and a sunny rooftop terrace with a BBQ.

We're sure you'll have a great time in this apartment, prepare for the trip of a lifetime!

description: In our delightful guest room people feel home immediately. 'It looks better than on the pictures', we hear a lot of times. We have taken care of lots of details to make your stay comfortable and memorable. The bed is great and the view is amazing. It is well possible that you just stay in your bed, open the windows and experience Amsterdam the way locals do. Make your own coffee, tea, or enjoy the lemon water we provide for you in the fridge.

The spacious kitchen/living space at is flooded with natural light. The master bedroom boasts a comfortable queen-size bed & ample closet space. The spare bedroom offers a murphy bed that is very easy to open up for additional guests. We provide a crib and high chair for families traveling with young children.

Welcome!

Located in the Pijp, full of great restaurants and cafes, and near RAI, our spacious apartment is perfect for families, couples or business travelers. Many highlights of Amsterdam like the Rijks, and Van Gogh museum are a brief walk away.

The apartment has a lot of daylight and we recently renovated the entire place. It is easily reachable via a nearby subway station.

We live in the apartment right above so we will be at your disposal for any questions and tips for a great stay!

Beautiful brand new apartment on the Canals. Located between de Pijp and the Rivierenbuurt. Two of Amsterdams hottest neighbourhoods. Lots of restaurants, shops and sunny terraces all around. Walking distance from the convention centre Amsterdam RAI.
This unique location makes this apartment suitable for any guest.
The apartment has a renovated fully equipped kitchen, brand new bathroom. Due to the many windows the apartment is very light.
The main bedroom has a 2x2.20m bed. Second 1.60x2m.

Our master bedroom has a Queen bed (160*200) and our sofa is convertible to a standard double bed.

Perfectly located in the historical centre, 200m from the Anne Frank house, close to the Jordaan and famous ‘nine streets’.
Living room canalside, two spacious bedrooms, bathroom with shower, a bath is installed in the master-bedroom.
Elevator and bicycle-storage.

Consists of all the appliances you might need: dishwasher, oven, washing machine, luxury rain shower and a cozy double bed.
The eyecatcher of the home is the 30m2 roof terrace on which you can have a hang on the comfy couch.

If you need any tips on where to go in the area, I love to help out.

Welcome Aboard! :)

BUNK... a gathering place for travellers, locals and artists alike!

The apartment has a lounge, bathroom, bedroom, a fully equipped kitchen and laundry facilities. The minimum stay is 7 days.

On the other side of the living room you can access our blacony which is big enough to have dinner there, you will enjoy the afternoon sun from 15.00 until the night.

There are all the comforts: fireplace, large stove, smart TV, music system, and large bath with separate shower. There is a large deck in the backyard with sun all day. But the best thing is the silence: there are almost no cars in this street (cul de sac).

I would love to welcome you into my home to let you experience the city in it's best way possible. The apartment is located in the centre of Amterdam in the lively area called De Pijp. When you walk outside you will be in the heart of the vibrant city. There are many shops, restaurants and boutiques within walking distance. Also, the public transportation is within reach to get you to other parts of Amsterdam.

A comfy king size bed, big and sunny balcony, fully equipped modern kitchen, quiet workstation etc. We offer amazing non touristy city tips. And a ride when needed. Looking forward to host the world! Within walking distance you will find the cozy shopping center Kameleon, with weekly markets and all the daily necessities. Close by is the Amsterdam Gate, where you can discover sights such as the Johan Cruijff Arena, Ziggo Dome and various eateries. For a quiet walk, the Nelson Mandelapark and the Gaasperplas are nearby. This location is ideal for exploring Amsterdam and relaxing.

CONTINENTAL BREAKFAST GOODIES IN YOUR ROOM

There is a two person bed, a two person sofa bed and a seating area and bathroom. All on the first floor of the building with a nice view of the alley, just like my profile picture.

We have a Nespresso coffee machine with free teas and coffees, kitchen utensils, newly installed 5G wifi, and comfortable big bed and a very cute balcony.

Oh and the fire spot? Can that be cozier ?

Welcome to our family home, nestled in the heart of Amsterdam, just a stone's throw away from the vibrant Westerpark. Experience the perfect blend of comfort and convenience in this cozy haven, ideal for creating lasting memories with your loved ones. Explore the nearby park, soak in the local culture, and make our home your own during your Amsterdam adventure.

Perfect flat for a couple with (or without) kids

name: Cosy home in city center
description:
Cosy home of two floors in the city centre of Amsterdam with a lot of light and space
5 minutes by walk from the canals and the Albert Cuyp market
Good connection with all kinds of public transport
Located in a quiet street
